Waakhula wawe Minixituru oMosampiiki a Ifaapirika ni Nakoso, Ragendra de Souza, ohimya wiira Namalamula oniira ovaraka muteko woowi nakoso iiriweke vopwanela vo.
Vanihimiwa wiira muthukumano wa Namuloko ni Ithanu ya esetore yoohikhala ya kuveerunu yakhaleliwe ni muhooli a elapo, Filipe Nyusi.
Woothikileliwa opakhiriwa atthu ni kampoyi variyari ya Mosampiiki ni w'Afirika y'Okusini.
Iphiro sa Xipooro ya oMosampiiki soothikilela waapakhira atthu wa xipooro a oMaputo mwaha woohiroromeleya, woovekeliwa ni Mwaalano wa Myaha sa Mulaponi sa w'Afirika y'Okusini.

Sintoko sihimalyaawe muhooleli a nakoso a CFM oXuwanexipuuruku, Fernando Mausse, okathi ola va, epakhira eniiraneya voothikileliwa, wala atthu aninwela kampoyi oMaputo kiyakhuruwa oResaanu karisiya, etuphaka mukano yeettaka mpakha ophiya Epooma yaamukhaani ya Komatipooriti wiira enweleke kampoyi a mpantta wa okusini-w'Afirika.
Iphiro sa Xipooro sookhumiha ikamiyaawu sa miritti soophiyeryaka 400 siruuhenle osarya mikukutta mpikatani ya yaneecexe eriyari ya oMaputu ni oXuwanexipuuruku, otepexa wene okhuma oResaanu

Okhuruwa wa isisapo sa marotta omerekaato wa olumwenku woompakela nakoso, masi muhooleli a nakoso a empereesa ya oMosampiiki enikhala w'Afirika y'Okusini osuwenle wiira nakoso onoophuttiwa ni onoopwatiwa.
Ilapo Soowiraana sa w'Ameerika (EUA) sihittottopela ni ehapari enihimya wiira Mosampiiki soomaala ikapwitthi.
Yaari elapo emoso mwa iye sa moolumwenkuni yahaareere ophentiwa.
Ilapo Soowiraana soottapela nihiku na namacece, mahiku yeettaaya 17, yoolalehiwa ni kuveerunu a oMosampiiki enihimya wi elapo ela yoomalamalihiwa imiina saathipeliwe.

Nwarakhani, namuhupi a Mpantte wa Exitaatu, John Kiby, ohimya wiira, sintoko siireneyalyaaya ni ilapo sikina, omalamalihiwa imiina onrowa omutthuniherya Mosampiiki okela mukwaha wooraala, nuumala ekotto.

Okhuma mwaaka wa 1993, okathi yoowo Mosampiiki ophattunwawe wa iyaakha miloko miloko seene sa ikotto ni okhalaka mwa ilapo iye soowatta imiina soothipeliwa ya olumwenku, Ilapo Soowiiraana sookumiha muhakhu soophiyeryaka ikonto imilyawu 55 sa itoolare wiira yaakihiwe atthu anikhala mittetthe iye muhina mwa eporokaraama yoohononiwa ikapwitthi ya Ilapo Soowiraana.

Mwaha wa waataana wenno - onitakaniha ni nikhuru na olumwenku na anamavaha muhakhu ni makhuru anikumiha imiina sa mulaponi - "waahivariwa muteko wooreerela wiira wiityaala w'atthu, exakaka owulalasa ni owixuttiha anammawaani ni waavaha mirettee ni waakhaliherya alipa owulalasa ni ophuwa wa imiina.

Yoolalehiwa enihimya tho wiira Ilapo Soowiraana sookhalana "wittottopa mwaha wookhala namakhaliherya muulupale a olumwenku, okhuma mukhaliheryo w'eteekinika, ni muhakhu wa ilapo siniwanana ehasara ela yoolumwenku.

John Kirby oohimexexa wiira okhuma mwaakha wa 1993, Ilapo Soowiraana sookumiha 2,5 ikonto sa imilyawu ya itoolare woowi sikhaliheriwe ilapo 90 wiira sivukuliwe sootakhala sa imiina soothipeliwa ni soophuwa soohala ni ekhotto.
"Wikhanyaanya wahu oniira ovukulaka vanceene nummaru na imiina ni nookhaliherya ilapo 16 sihimyale woopowa ni imiina soothipeliwa," oomaliha namuhupi a Mpantte w'Exitaatu ya w'Ameerika.
Namalamula oMosampiiki ohaakhulela sooliviwa sooyevaxa alipa ovara muteko isyaa.

Kuveerunu a oMosampiiki ohaakhulela, nsana, sooliviwa isya sooyevaxa sinirowa opacerya oliviwa okhuma nihiku noopacerya na mweeri wa neecexe wa ipantte thanu neecexe sa miteko, owalaka iporopooxita saaruuhiwe ni sooniheriwe ni nikhuru na Comissao Consultiva de Trabalho (Ekomisawu Konsulutiva ya Muteko).
Iperesentace saakhuleliwe, sintoko mammeru alaleyiwale ni Miniixitara a Muteko, Maria Helena Taipo, sinikhuma 4,15 puru sento mpakha 20,4 puru sento.
Para mpantte wa Muteko w'atthu Otheene, onaavaha muteko atthu anceene, wuncareriwe 8 puru sento, ovikanaka 2780 mpakha ikonto 3002.
Esetore ekhaani enitthatta ihopa kapenta yuncareriwe tho 8 puru sento.
Vanaamwiira siiso, esetore ya miteko soolima, ototha, waala miri sincareriwe vanceene mpakha ophiya 20,4 puru sento, khukhumaka ikonto 2500 mpakha 3010.
Otupheliwa muttetthe wa koopere, oKaapu Telekaatu, woowiiva tho atthu anli.

Atthu acexe aatuphela ohiyu wa nsana muttetthe wa Koopere, Epooma y'oMakomiya, Eporovinsiya y'oKaapu Telekaatu, ni awookotta atthu anli, aapaha ipa 12 ni ahiiya eyoolya, aahimeeriwa alipa ihapari, ni atthu anikhala muttetthe ole.

Anasusukhi yaarumenle ikatana ni ikapwitthi ni yaahikela mmuttettheni anammawaani vohisuwela, khwaakanyereyaka n'atthu yoona efiilime. Okathi vakhani, yahikhumasa mapuro ale, kupacerya waatakari, aahimya atthu a muttetthe ole.
Mutthu mmosa mwaale yookotthiwe, okhwiiye mwaha woopwatakasiwa ni ekatana, yiiraka mukina owo orimoopeliwa, sintoko sihimyalaaya anamoona.
Ovaanelela myaha siluluwanne ni epoliitika oMosampiiki onikawanyiha miyuupuwelo s'atthu

Nikhuru nootakanxiwa wiireliwaka weeteteliwa muthukumano wa peresitente a Mosampiiki, Filipe Nyusi, ni mukhulupale a RENAMO, Afonso Dhlakama , onivira ohimiwaka wiira miteko sinneetta oratteene ni wiira sinnikelela ohoolo.
Vanaamwiira siso, nnakhala nihiku, wala nipuro ninrowa opakiwa muthukumano ola khohimiwe ni aakhala anamoona anceene ni miyaalaano s'anammawaane apacenrye ohiroromela.
Onuupuweliwa siisa mwaha woowi kiivo enivirikana mwa iye siniwanelawe kuveerunu wala RENAMO, sihimiwaka myaha iye sinaakawanya.

Maanalixita akina anniikoha exeeni evirikanne wa mpantta wa kuveerunu enirowa omukuxereriha otthuna onvaha RENAMO, sintoko nlikanyiho, otthokiha iporovinsiya seiyo onihimyaawe omulola mwaathanle a 2014, nnakhala exeeni evirikanne wa mpantta wa eparitiitu ya Afonso Dhlakama woowi etthune waavaha, vekeekhayi, akapwitthi.

Esuma yela, Afonso Dhlakama ohoorwa ni khulavula ayiwiyaka ni atthu anceene athipelelaka yoovekela ya Renamo enihimya olamula iporovinsiya thanu namosa, ahimyaka wiira "nimphavela wiira Frelimo atthune wiira Renamo aatthome makuverenatooro para iporovinsiya iyo."

Vanaamwiira siiso, aakhala atthu aniroromela, ewehaka enamuna aniiraneyaaya mithukumano sa makhuru otakanxiwa ni annihimya wiira yoohimiwa ni muhooleli a RENAMO eniira mpantta womphunya namalamula elapo wiira amalamalihe oruma ikapwitthi mulaponi.
Ilapo Soowiiraana sa w'Ameerika sinrowa okopiha oMosampiiki ikonto 1.2 sa imilyawu sa itoolare, mpakha 2018.
Mwiiwanano wantikhiwe olelo, onrowa okhaliherya Miyaalaano sa Ekumi, Osoma, Itthu sa mulaponi ni Omwene w'Atthu.

Anamalamula a Ilapo Soowiiraana sa w'Ameerika ni oMosampiiki ahantikha enamararu yeela, oMaputo, mwiiwanano onirowa onirowa omutthuniherya Epooma ya oMaputo waakhela, mpakha 2018, waattamela ikonto 1,2 sa imilyawu sa itoolare itoolare woowi ovareliwe muteko musetoreni wa Ekumi, Osoma, Itthu sa Mulaponi ni Omwene w'Atthu.
Mukhaliheryo w'Ameerika oniireliwa okhaliheriwa miyuupuwelo s'anammawaani a mittetthe soorakamela mpooma.

"Okhovana wahu onootepa okhomaala", oolipiherya namuhupi a w'Ameerika onivara oMaputo, Douglas Griffiths, uupuxenrye, okathi owo wiira Ilapo Soowiraana sikhanle namakhaliheryaxa a oMosampiiki, ni ovikana ikonto 5,8 sa imilyawu sa itoolare okhuma mwaakha wa 1984.

Mukhulupale a w'Ameerika wantikhale yoolempwa vamosa ni Minixituru Anakoso a Ilapo s'Okhopela ni Okhovana a oMosampiiki Olmidemiro Baloi, oohimya wikupali ovira iyaakha 30 akhaliheryaka winnuwa wa Mosampiiki ni nimphavela wunnuuherya mukhaliheryo ahu.

Wa mpantta mukina, Baloi ohimyexexa okhomalihiwa okhaliheryana eriyari ya Waashintoni ni Maputo ni oolipiherya wiira mokhaliheryo ola onithoonyerya wiira Ilapo Soowiraana sa w'Ameerika mpatthani muulupalexa ni oolipaneya munkoni wa mukhwaha w'okhomaaliha murettele ni munnuwelo.
Mwiiwanano onaaniherya wiira imilyawu 166 sa itoolare siri woowi siwananiwe Sita.

Muhina wa mananna okhaliheriwa Mosampiiki, Ilapo Soowiraana sinrowa okumiha musurkhu soophiyeryaka imilyawu 104 sa itoolare wiira okeleliheriwe ohoolo osommwa wa ikalase soopacerya mulaponi ni imilyawu 15 sa itoolare woowi ekhaliheriwe Reserva do Niassa (Ereceeriva ya oNiyasa).
Kuveerunu oMosampiiki ohaakhulela sookophiwa nviite-nviite.
Makhuru oovirikana muupuwelo ni kuveerunu aavaanya otakanihiwa musurukhu owo mukonthani y'Exitaatu 2015.

Kuveerunu oMosampiiki oolipiherya enamaxexe ela, mahiku yeettaka 13, wiira onoorowa waakhulela oliva iye siniitthaniwa sookophiwa sookhuwiya, esisapo yoophiyeryaka ikonto piili sa imilyawu sa itoolare, vanaamwiiraru sikophiweene ni inamuna soohireerela.

Okathi ene yoola atthu anitikinihiwaaya enamuna seettakasihiwaaya mpantta munceene wa muhakhu yoola okophiwe ni kuveerunu a Armando Guebuza, wa nsina na Exitaatu, Eparalamento esuwenle wiira yookophiwa yoolepiwa Mukonthani Yulupalexa y'Exitaatu ya 2015, ni enirowa oliviwa no epoolosa ya epoovu.
Nikhuru n'atthu ovirikana muupuwelo ni Namalamula a Empa ya Nlamulo aavanyiha numala wiiwa eshawuri ya namalamula elapo.

Okathi waavanyihaniwaa Ekontha Yuulupale ya Exitaatu ya mwaakha wa 2015, RENAMO ni MDM yahitakaniha masu wiira yooniherye ohisiveliwa waya n'ile eniirelaya "ekirini ya kuveerunu ewiirenlyaawe apoovu."
MDM oovikaniha onyohola, masi tho onnaalopola apoovo a Mosampiiki okhootta oliva sookophiwa nviite-nviite.
Kuveerunu oohimmye wiira olepiwa sookophiwa Mukonthani-Yuulupale ya Exitaatu, okha mweettelo onitthuneya.
Mukumano wa Nyusi ni Dhlakama woovukula waaniheryasa, nnya sookhala sinireerela ophuka.
Nikhuru na CTA ninhimya wiira woovukuwa ohiroromela w'anamuhakhu, nnya asuweli ari ni ephoole.
Nikhuru n'Alipa Nakoso Owiraana a oMosampiiki- CTA, ninhimya wiira otthomiwa okathi onirowaaya omalihiwa nvaanelo wa murettele onnivukula ohiroromela w'alipa mihakhu onihimya wanikelela wa elapo ahu.

Sintoko sihimalyaawe muhooleli namaramttela a CTA, Eduardo Sengo,"eyo enihimya wirra ninttimakela okhuma mmaxakhani, ni wiira atthu animwiira nakoso, woona mwaha ola wohiroromela wovirikana saaryaya khalayi.

Masi, moonelo awe namasuwela ikontha João Mosca, vahinatthi wupuweleliwa ni avareliwa muteko miruku sooreerelaxa etthu ela khenirowa olula, mwaha woowi milattu sa muhakhu wa Mosampiiki kahiyoo pahi onikhumelela mwaha woohikhala murettele.
Musuweli Lourenço do Rosário onihimya wiira itthu soosuwanyeyaxa sa ekhotto khasinatthi ophukiwa.

Owo oohimya wirra mukumaanelo eriyari ya Nyusi ni Dhlakama wiiraneyale ettiminku evinre, etthu enitthuneya, nnya, nihaana nikhalaka ephoole ni imaara sinirwa, okhalaka wiira hiiyo noosuwela etthu xeeni enivaneliwa okhuma mwaakha wa 2018.
RENAMO ohaana avahaka ikapwitthi ni waakeliha asurutaato awe Munikhuruni Noowaakiha ni Okuttelela, ni Namalamula a Elapo ohaana ohiya wikuxererya elapo mekhawe, oohimya musuweli.

Omuthukumanoni wa Ettiminku evinre, oKoronkoosa, peresitente a elapo ahu, Filipe Jacinto Nyusi ni muhooleli a RENAMO, Afonso Dhlakama, aaleehana wa ikwaha sinirwa sa nvaanelo wa murettele, aniwehereryasaaya omaliha mpakha wuumalani wa mwaakha.
Ilapo Soowiiraana sa w'Ameerika soolikanana okhaliherya ovaaneliwa murettele wa Mosampiiki
Ni murettele elapo enoowerya winnuwa ni opwalaha, ohimya Pittman, oManika.
Namuhupi a w'Ameerika onivara oMosampiiki, Dean Pittman, oolipiherya, Enamararu, 17, muxankiho ni wuncerereya owanawana mulaponi.
Pittman ohooniherya olikanana wa kuveerunu a w'Ameerika wootthikiherya murettele oMosampiiki.
Ni murettele elapo enoowerya winnuwa ni othaaciri, okhala wiira ni owanawana nno apoovu tanihaawa, ohimya Pittman, nuumala othukumana ni muhooleli a ePorovinsiya ya oManika, Alberto Mondlane.
Omuthukumanoni, namuhupi a w'Ameerika aahilokoha mwaha wa ehaali ya ekhotto muttetthe ole ni mwaha wa ovaaneliwa eriyari ya kuveerunu ni RENAMO.
"Noororomela wiira nvaanelo onoorowa ophuka milattu" ohimya Dean Pittman, ahoolihaka wiira namalamula awe oniira owiriyanelaka mweettelo wa epurama-pura ya Mosampiiki.
oManika Eporovinsiya emosa mwa iye sihireere wuukhuliwa ni oruma wa ikapwitthi oMosampiiki.
Filipe Nyusi onaalipiherya mamosampiikaano okhala voohoova.
Peresitente a Elapo aahimya itthu ila okathi wapaceriwa otthapeliwa iyaakha miloko micexe okhuma vaavale elapo vapwannyaaya murettele
Mosampiiki ahikhaleke ni woova owali, ohimya olelo Peresitente Filipe Nyusi, olavulaka okathi waatthukulelaawe otthapeliwa nihiku na miloko micexe ya Woopowa wa Elapo.
Esiyaara ya Woopowa wa Elapo.

Alavulaka Epooma ya oMuweta, sintoko enamuna yoowuupuwela ni ottittimiha mukhwaha woopacerya wa alipa oowana ekhotto ya (Frelimo) Fereliimu mulaponi, ehinatthi opaceriwa owaniwa ekhotto Yoowoopowa, Nyusi ohihimyexexa wiira otthuna w'atthu oothene toniwooniherya mamosampikaano sintoko apoovu oowiiraana.
"Nimphavela okhalaka ni murettele, wittyaala ni voohoova owali," oolipiherya mukhulupale a Exitaatu ya Mosampiiki, ovaanyihale woopopihiwa wa murettele enoonaneya mulaponi.

Iyaakha iya soothene sinnisomiha wiira kinivoo nipuro wiira mamosampikaano okawanyeye, woowaanyokha asinna, wiira niwehaneke sintoko awanani, khuuvo okathi woowi nikhuru na mamosampikaano ewoopopiheke asinnaya," ohimya Nyusi, ovekenle wiira "wiraana okhaleke kapwitthi oowiiriha ni oororomeleya wiira niweryeke othaaciri sintoko apoovu, woona nayiraana ninrowa okhala oolipaxa.
Vaniirani, wahipattihiwa Muthuko Woowiiraana ya Elapo, onirowa ivira iporovinsiya 11 sa elapo mpakha nihiku 25 na mweeri wa neethanu ni mmosa, nihiku Noowoopowa wa Elapo.
Daviz Simango oottukhuleliwa w'Afirika y'Okuusini

Nikhuru na Temokarasiya ya oMosampiiki, khanisuwelinhe nlelo ehapari enihimya wiira peresitente Daviz Simango oottukuleliwa mutivela ohiyu exiripitale ya w'Afirika y'Okuusini, mulattu wa eretta yootutuxerya.
Kivanisuweliwa oratteene mwaha wa eretta ya muhooli a eparitiitu eri nipuro naneeraru wunnuwaya ya Mosampiiki ni omalelinhe iyaakha 57 nihiku 07 na Fevereero nivinre.
Anamakhaliherya anli aakhotta olavula ehapari ila.
Daviz Simango nave-tho peresitente a oKaamara Munisipaale ya oBeera, epooma eri nipuro nanenli wunnuwa waya mulaponi.
Owo oyariwe oTanzaniya, mwaana anamaranttela oopacerya a peresitente a Fereliimu, okathi wa ekotto yoowoopoliwa elapo, Urias Simango.
Urias Simango ni amwaarawe Celine arimwiiviwa wa nihiku nihinsuweliwa, mwaakha wa 1979, okhatteya waatthukeliwaaya, Ohittoo wa Elapo.
Mamosampikaano imilhawu 15 anikhala ni osikhini wootepaxa
Yoosommwa ya Epanko ya Olumwenku enihimya wiira atthu imilhawu 15 anikhala ni etoolare emosa ni isentaavo miloko mithanu n'icexe.

Epanko ya Olumwenku ehimmye Ettiminko yeela, mahiku yeettaaya manli, wiira 60 puru sento ya mamosampikaano anikhala ni osikhini wootepaxa ni ori nipuro nanamuloko wa ilapo sirina atthu asikhini anceene moolumwenkuni.

Ewarakha, yoopacerya wa sinceene sinrowa olepiwa, ovenyerya naanaano va, sihimyaka mammeru a osikhini ni oraala wa olumwenku ehinyale wiira imilhawu 15 sa mamosampikaano anikhala ni voohiphiyerya ni etoolare emosa ni isentaavo 90 wa khula nihiku.
Ilapo muloko sootepaxa waatta asikhini sootheene siri w'Afirika Supu-Sahariyaana.

Nikhuru na ilapo sootepaxa osikhini sinihooleliwa ni eRepuupilika ya oSenturu ya w'Afirika, yaattamenle 80 puru sento, iiraka nikhuru na ilapo soowaattana atthu anikhala ni muhakhu woohiphiya 1,9 ya etoolare wa nihikuni ti Intiya, ni imilyawu 224.

Vanaamwiira ovikana erihari ya atthu oovalavela ekhalaka okathi ola va w'Afirika Supu-Sahariyaana, ilapo icexe mwa iye soowaatta asikhini kahiyoo sa muttetthe ola, masi ti sa w'Intiya, oXiina, w'Intoneesiya ni oPankalateexi.
oSan Tomee: Peresitente oxinttiwa otiripunaale owanela mathala
Mathala atekiwe ipa sinimakiwa
"Saahikuxiwe ipa tisawaka," oohimya mutthu oxinttale otiripunaali.

oSan Tomee ni Pirincipe, Peresitente a Elapo ohaana vano omuliva mutthu ihimyale wiira ootthekeliwaa mwaha wootumihiwa mpantte wa mathala awe. Mulattu woopixiwa otiripunaali Superemu ni khuxinttiwa Peresitente Fradique de Mineses okhanle oovaanela ni wiiwanana ni namatthekeliwa António Assunsão dos Anjos. Epuruseesu ekhumale wattamela iyaakha muloko ni yaamanle oTiripunaali Superemo nuumala peresitente ohaleela exariya mukwaha woopacerya. Mulattu ola onihimya mpantte wa mathala atekiwe ipa sa nakoso sa eVila Mariya ya Nikhuru Pexitaana ya oPorutukaale. Mathala awo yaatumiheriwe nikhuru nna ni peresitente oSan Tomee yoowo onihimyaniwa wiira khaaxukurenrye waahimeriwaawe wiira mpantte mukina wa mathala ele yaari a mutthu mukina, ohiya amusi yaamutumihenrye. Peresitente ahixanka ni yoohimiwa ni ahimyaka wiira Assunsão dos Anjos aahaana omurowana oTiripunaali mulipa oomutumiherya mathala voohittharihela nlamulo ni khaapwannye nikanyero nnakhala vakaani nnihimya wiira etthaya ele khiyaahiyoo ya namatumiya.
Kaahimeeriwe nuumala othuma, wiira ele etthummyaaka yaari yootaphuliwa, oohimya Fradique de Mineses.
"Sookhala soohimiwa sikina sinnihiya ooxankeene,"ohincererya. Pele meenuxi empa emosa eri mmathalani ya António Assunsão dos Anjos.
Yaahivaanele ni miyo empa kinoohalana, oohimeerya Nsu na w'Ameerika. Nwiriyane ehapari ya Óscar Medeiros.
Teputaato a vaporovinsiya a RENAMO ohiiviwa Wamphula ni alopwana yaari ni akapwitthi
Mafalume aalokela okathi woophiheryaka ikhatiri thanu ni emosa ehaakhunle mukhaliheryo waavekeliwe.
Alopwana yaari ni ikapwitthi aamwiiva ohiyu wa Enamararu, mahiku 15, Wamphula, namathanliwa awaporovinvisiya a eparitiitu RENAMO.

Amusaawe José Almeida Murevete aahimya wiira sootheene sikhumelenle waattamela ekhatiri ya 11 ya ohiyu, okathi atthu ohisuweliwa nummaru naya, yaarumela akapwitthi arowanse owannyawe ni khumoopelasa namathanliwa a RENAMO, mpakha omwiiva.

Empaawe Murevete enikhala waattamela imeeturu miloko miraru mpakha opoosito ya mafalume a oMwaatala, w'Epooma ya Wamphula, nnya, sintoko sihimyalyaaya amusi, vanaamwiira nvekelo wookhaliheriwa, mafalume yaakhunle nuuvira ikhatiri thanu ni emosa.
Amusaawe ahikhupanherya ni mavarelo aya muteko mafalume ni anikupaleela wiira okhwa wa Murevete wiiraneyale mwaha wa olupatthiwa mapuliitiku aninvaanyiha kuveerunu.
Mahoolela a Hosipiratale Yuulupale ya Wamphula Bainabo Sahal ohaakhulela ovolowa wa murutthu okhwiiye mwaha woowoopeliwa, ohiyu wa enamaxexe.
Okathi ola va ninwehererya otthuniheriwa ni mafalume aniwehaweha ikirini wiira nithokoseke murutthu.
Namuhupi a puliisiya ya Wamphula, Zacarias Nacute, ohimya wiira epuliisiya yookhalana mithoonyeryo sa ekhirini ni oororomeliha othokosa woowi ehimye ni evariwe anasusuki awo.
Enihimya mavareelo aya mafalume, Nacute ookupaleela wiira yaahivonya oxaka ekhirini wa mpantte aya.
Vanaamwiira Nsu na w'Ameerika nihireere wiikhanyaanya wiira nimwiiwe RENAMO, ola okhotta ohimya etthu.
Onoovira okathi woowi oPeera atekiwe vasya, oohimya vereyatoore.

Makhulupale a Emunisiipiyo ya oPeera, emosa mwa iye sihireere wuukhuliwa ni mwanamukhaya (Idai) Itaayi aviraka Mosampiiki, aakupali ovira ekhalaka ni "ehasara yuulupale" ni anilopola wiira Epooma sinoovira iyaakha sinceene woowi epoma etthike saaryaya.

Avaanelaka ni Nsu na w'Ameerika, José Manuel Moisés, Mahoolela a Mwaalano wa muteko wa Munisiipiyu ya oPeera, wiirale khivaniweryaneya walakeliwa isisapo, nnya khanihoverya wiira sinrowa akhala soowaattaxa, ni, munisiipiyu mekhawe, khaniwerya opaka etthu.
Peera epooma emosa ya oMosampiiki enikhala vathi vathi weereryana ni maasi a mphareya ni mukuthe kuthe muulupalexa okhuma khalayi okhupaarela ephareya, mwaha wa mulattu woothipeya etthaya.
Amahoolela a eMmunisiipiyu anihimya wiira ahiira sootheene saaweryaaya woowi ekhupaarele etthaya , masi khuhittottela muraarelo, mwaha woothowa musurukhu.

Mwaakha ovirale, mahoolela a oPeera, Diviz Simango, alavulihiwaka ni Nsu na w'Ameerika, ahihimya wiira, wiira munisiipiyu woowi omalamalihe okhuleya etthaya y'opareya, onitthuneya waattamela wala ovikana imilhawu imiya thanu ni emosa ya itoolare sa w'Ameerika.
Mahiku ala va, isisapo iyo pooti soovirikana, okhala wiira, ni soohonona sipakalyaawe Itaayi, onaanihereya wiira onitthuneya tho woovikana vaavo.
Etthu yootthuneyaxa va opwanya muhakhu woowi nikhupaarele ephareya, okhala wiira mpantte wa exiri khureere ohononiwa ni mwanamukhaya.
Waahiiraneyeru siiso, muhooli namakhaliherya José Manuel Moisés onilopola wiira akhumelela tho Itaayi, oPeera "pooti oveliwa ni okumihiwa mmaaphani ya elapo.
Soohononiwa nlelo sinivira saalakeliwaka ni Ekonseelyu ya Munisiipiyu.
Musuwele saana wa nlaka mwanamukhaya Itaayi
Yookwathula ni olupatthana yoomoomoliha muhooleli a (Credit Suisse) Ekereetitu Suwiise
Epanko Kereetitu Suwise yoohimiwa, esumana evinre, okhuma wa muhooleli Tidjane Thiam, mwaha woohimyaniwa waalupattha axirikha awe a oPanko ni mamempuru a (Nikhuru na Greenpeace) Nikhuru Kirimpiise.

Alipa Ihapari, ethonyaka ehapari y'opanko, anilepa wiira Tidjane Thiam, orina iyaakha 57, onihiya okhala mahoolela, mahiku vanrowaaya weettaka 14 ya mweeri wanenli, nuumala ohimiwa soophureliwa sa mwaakha otheene ya Epanko.

Credit Suisse epwannye maxakha numala ohimeeriwa wiira Igbal Khan, muhooleli akhalayi onisuka mihakhu sa ilapo sa okhopela sa epanko, aarimwetteleliwa wala owehereriwa nuumala okhuma wahaaniheriwa wa mukhulupale anikhuru wiira avareke ni nwanani UBS.
Mwaha ola okhumelenle tho mweeri wa Natali, nuumala Epanko onvaha muteko namathokosa anenli, iireliwa omutholathola mohooli akhalayi a atthu
wuumalani wa esumana evinre, ejoronaale SontagsZeitungg yoohimya wiira nikhuru na ekolocia Greenpeace niheetteleliwa tho.
Thiam, a oFaransa ni oKooxita ya oMarafim, ootthuna ohoolela epanko mwaakha wa 2015, nuumala ovara muteko (Prudential) Purutensiyaale, emperesa enakhupaarela atthu ni itthu ya w'Inkalateera.
Apaceryakaru muteko, Thiam ovenyenrye apaka ipalano sa kula enamuna woowi winnuuherye ni otthokiheryase mihakhu sa epanko ya nakoso.
Thiam onrowa orantheliwa ni Thomas Gottstein, naanaano va, onihoolela miteko sa epanko ya oSuwiisa ni namuteko a nikhuru okhuma mwaakha wa 1999.
Muupuwele wiira Credit Suisse yookopiha mpantta wa musurukhu opattunxe etthu yoonanaraxa ya sookophiwa soovithiwa oMosampiiki.
Amahoolela aya akina akhalayi anihimyaniwa makhwankwa ni Ilapo Soowiirana.
FMI ohaakhulela wuncareriwa isisapo ya kompoxitiivele oMosampiiki

(Fundo Monetário Internacional) Efuntu Monetaariyo y'Olumwenku enaaniherya wiira wuncareriwa isisapo ya kompoxitiivele ehimiwe ni kuveerunu oMosampiiki, esuma evirale, sintoko etthu "yuulupale mwa enama" wa miteko sinivariwa sootthokihasiwa esetore ya kompoxitiivele.
FMI oolakiherya nwarakhani wiira owela wa isisapo sa compoxitiivele :oniireliwa amalamalihiwa ovahiwa mukhaliheryo woolipa musurukhu ni ohinphiyerya.
sinoonelaawe FMI, isisapo sa kompoxitivele oMosampiiki sinikhala sookhuruwa ovirikana esisapo yeekhweeli sinitumihiwaawe imerekaato sa ilapo s'anamwaattamanana.

FMI onuupuxerya wiira etthu ila ekhumelenle ni vapaceriwaaya ovahiwa mukhaliheryo alipa omutumiha compoxitiivele ni enivirikana eriyari ya esisapo etthokihiwe woowi otumiheriwe atthu ootheene ni esisapo enikumihaniwaawe ilapo s'okhopela.
FMI onnuupuxerya tho wiira, ohiya owalamela, mukhaliheryo wa compoxitiivele khonaakhupaarela oratteene amasikhini.
Wamphula: Mafalume ohaatthuka atakhali athanu
Yaatuphela atthu wala yaavolowa mpani yaarumeela akapwitthi.
Poliisiya wa Repuupilika ya Mosampiik Wamphula onimala waavarakasa atakhali aalupale athanu anamatuphela emurumeelaka kapwitthi.
Atthu ala athanu aniira mpantta ya makhuru manli aanasusukhi oowoopihaxa yaatotokhanya ni kiyapaka ikhirini muttetthe wa ohitto wa elapo, otepexa wene ipooma ya Wamphula ni oPhempa
Mukhwaha ola omalenle ni ovariwa waya, mafalume aawerya waapwanya-tho akapwitthi anli, sintoko AK47 ni pexitoola ni ikaraxuuti 11.
Makhuru oomanli aatakhali yaavara miteko saya yiwananasaka ni ovarakasiwa waya wiiraneyale mwaha woohimiwa ni anammawaani.
Aniira mpantta wa nikhuru na atakhali, purusoore onivara Etixitiriitu ya oMoxinkwaale ni namalipelela ekhatteya.

Namuhupi a Poliisiya wa eRepuupilika ya oMosampiiki Wamphula, Inácio João Dina, ohaalikela enamuna evarakasiwaaya alavilavi awo athanu ni onniroromeliha wiira mafalume Wamphula ari oolikaneene wiira evare muteko wa mahiku 45 anihala wiira omale mwaakha.
Muupuweleke wiira mafalume a elapo ahu anirwa iyaakha iya sookhiserya yincereryaka waalopola anammawaani wiira ala ekhaliheryeke owanana ikhirini yaahimyaka atakhali.
Niisiisa, muteko ola woowuncereriwa olopoliwa atthu, onnikumiha muraarelo.
Vanitthuneya osuwanyeya impereesa sa Exitaatu saaheliwaka mmatatani mwaalipa nakoso oomekhaaya, anihimya asuweli a muhakhu a oMosampiiki.
Sinihimiwa impereesa 40 sinooniwa wiira soopwateela.

Asuweli a mihakhu oMosampiiki anikhanyererya osuwanyeya wala wooneyaxa wa impereesa iye 40 soopwateela ni sinrowa ottharuwa okhala s'atthu ootheene, silaleyiwale ni kuveerunu, sintoko mpantta woowikhanyaanya woowi sivukuliwe mikuthekuthe sa othowa soowiiyaathi-mihakhu.
Impereesa iyo sinrowa otumiheriwa atthu animwiira nakoso mekhaayaru wala sinootthukiwa mpakha wuumalani wa 2017.
Miloko miili mwa iyoo, otakaniha ele yapaka ipenewu (Mabor) Mapoore, sinrowa otumihiwa mpakha wuumalani wa mwaakha yoola.
Sintoko musuweli Celeste Banzé, sinceene mwa impereesa iya soopwateela ni sinoomulemela Exitaatu ya Mosampiiki.

Musuweli ole oohimya wiira "waalevela alipa nakoso voohooneya ni voohikhala makhwankwa waarowa omukhweyiherya Exitaatu woowi, ohiya wintthelela musurukhu, masi aarowa opwanyaka musurukhu ni mipooxito waarowa oliviwaka n'impereesa iyo.

Muhooli a Mwaalaano wa Osuka Muhakhu, Adriano Maleiane, ohimya wiira sihiiriwa iporova ni soosomiwa inamuna soolokiherya ni ovukula impereesa 6, sintoko Mosampiiki selulaare, Telekomunikasawu ya Mosampiiki, Iphiro sa misulu sa Mosampiiki, Iphiro sa Misulu a oMosampiiki, eKoreyu ya Mosampiiki ni Mipaka sa Matola.

Banze oniweha, nnya, wiira etthu emosa yoorera ya otumihiwa impereesa orowa ohuliwa marakato, okhala wiira impereesa sinceene mwa iye sinrowa otumihiwa sinimwiira nakoso meekhaaya, "ni omwiira nakoso makhaawe oruuhela ovara miteko soohiloka ni owalameliha miteko saya."
Onihimiwa wiira, nenna va, mpantte wa impereesa sa Exitaatu ya Mosampiikaano erina impereesa 13 s'atthu ootheene, 109 sootakanihiwa ni 2 sa Exitaatu.
Vekeekhayi, sootheene iya sihaana milattu suulupale sootthokiha.
Minixituru akhalayi Paulo Zucula ovolowa tho muntaphani mwa makhwankwa
Ole aari tho muhooli ooxaka ihasara onihimyaniwa otthuniherya sooliviwa soohireerela.

Miniixituru akhalayi a Mosampiiki a Mwalaano wa Ipakhira ni Soolavulela, Paulo Zucula, onimala okashariwa, ni Ekapineeti Yuulupale Yoowanana Makhwamkwa, ahimyaniwaka ikhirini sa ilivelo sa otthuvela woohisuwanyeya atekelaka muhakhu wa Exitaatu.

Sintoko epuruseesu elepiwe, ethonyiwe ni anahapari oMaputu, Zucula ahitthuniherya, mwaakha wa 2009, malivelo ya sooliviwa soovikana imilhawu piili sa metikaale, eliviwaka anamuteko aalupale a w'Inxitituutu ya Aviyasawu Sivile ya Mosampiiki.

Okashariwa weyiwo, aahimiwa tho Teresa Jeremias, Lucrécia Celeste Ndeve ni Amélia Abílio Delane, yaari atiminixitaratoore, mahoolela muulupalexa ni mahoolela a mpantte wa muhakhu, woottharelana, mwaalaano ole.
Epuruseesu erohiwe Otiripunaali y'Ehakhi y'Epooma ya Xamankuulu, oMaputo, ooraaru aya anihimyaniwa wapucari omahooleli (Omwene).
Woowi ehapuxe musurukhu, onihimiwa wiira awo yantikha ixeeke yoothereryaka ohooleliha oliva isalaariyo.
Misurukhu iyo kisaattikihiwa tho.

Wuupaceryani wa mwaakha ola ePorokurayoriya-Yuulupale ya Repuupilika hoohimya wiira Zukula ari mmosa anamakashariwa mwaha wa mixikhwiitti sa makhwankwa waathummwaaya matteeke a empereesa ya oParasiili (Embraer) Emparayeeri ni Iphiro sa Misulu ya Mosampiiki.
Zukula, osomme Miteko Soolima, aari tho Muhooleli Anaayili wa Mwaalaano w'Olima, namuteko a Ilapo Soowiraana sa w'Ameerika ni mahoolela muulupalexa a Inxitituutu Nasionaale ya Ihasara s'Ephattu.
Mwaakha wa 2008 towenlyaawe ekhattera ya Ipakhira, wa kuveerunu a Armando Guebuza, amuramttelaka António Munguambe, otthukweliwe mwaha wa makhwankwa.
Anamawehaweha aavaanyiha moonelo woororomeleya wa poliisiya oMosampiiki mwaha wa mmaaleleyo wa oKapu Telekaato.

Poliisiya oMosampiiki anihimya wiira ehaali ya mmaaleleyo, mukhupaarelo ni winttyaaleya w'anammawaani a Eporovinsiya ya oKaapu Telekaato ori mureeri, nnya para anamawehaweha akina anihimya wiira moonelo ola woorakamela ni ekeekhayi eniiraneya wa eporovinsiya ele.

Namuhupi a oKumanto Porovinsiyaale ya Poliisiya a oKaapu Telekaato, Augusto Guta ohimya wiira "mukhalelo wa okhupaareliwa wa eporovinsiya ori wooreera woona Ikuru sa Okhupaarela ni Olipelela aniira evara muteko muulupale ni vohooceya woowi etthikiherye mmaaleleyo ni mukhupaarelo w'atthu otheene.

Vanaamwiira siiso, aakhulaka yoohimiwa ela, namawehaweha Francisco Matsinhe onihimya wiira "eyoo khehiyoo ekweeli; miyo kaari oKaapo Telekaato esumana yeela ni kiwehalyaaka wiira miyaalaano s'atthu otheene sinceene khasinivara muteko mwaha wa ekhotto.

Moonelo awe, piixipo a oPempa, Luís Fernando Lisboa, aalavulihiwa ni (Carta de Moçambique) Ewarakha ya Mosampiiki, onihimya wiira "olumwenku nlelo khorina akhili niitthu sinikhumelela oKaapo Telekaato, wenno ekhotto eniruuhelaya ohaawa waapinaatamu oophiyeryaka ikonto imiya thanu ni piili (700.000) s'atthu.
Nihiweryeke otteeliwa murima naavahaka yoolya, khireere oyeva, khayireere ihukhumu," oolipiherya piixipo a oPhempa.

Wa mpantta awe, muhooleli a (Centro de Integridade Pública) eSenturu ya Intekiritaate Puupilika (CIP), Edson Cortêz, onihimya wiira khanisuwela eniwiiriha amahoolela a kuveerunu yaahimyaka wiira ehaali oKaapo Telekaato eri salama, okhathi ene yoola va onihimiwaaya ekhotto khwaasi mahiku otheene, ohiya wiira, ekhotto ela kheniweryaneya ophukiwa ni ikapwitthi.
Chikoti ohaakhulela wiira olosowa tonihonona opatthanana ni Mosampiiki
Miniixituru a w'Ankoola a Opatthani n'Ilapo sa Okhopela oopacerya oxukurya Mosampiiki

Minixituru a Opatthani n'Ilapo Sookhopela a w'Ankoola ohaakhulela wiira ilapo iya piili sahaana sipakaka itthu sinceene muhina mwa okhaliheryana ni oolakiherya wiira ovonhya nno eniiriha olosowa wa mipantte soomili.

Okathi waalavulawe naalipa ihapari oMaputu, nuumala ovaanela ni Minixituru Oopacerya a Mosampiiki, Gerges Chikoti wiirale vannitthuneya osuwela "wiira ilapo sookhana ikaruma sowiiwanana, nnya, yuulupale mwa enama okeliherya ohoolo opatthanana.

Chikoti oohimya wiira Mosampiiki ni Ankoola aniphavela wunnuherya opatthanana ni mavalo eriyari ya ilapo iya khivanireerela okhala mulattu no oothoonya sintoko kaakuveleni isetore sa enereciya, olima ni turicimu.

Hiyo nrina nttaava nimosa ni estooriya emosaru ni etthu ila yaahana okhala etthu enivaha Ikuru," ahihimya mukhulupale a oLuwanta, uncereryaka wiira vanireerela wiira anamuhakhu a w'Ankoola ni oMosampiiki ethukumaneke imaara sinceene.
Mweeri wa namuloko ni mmosa onvinre, Ankoola ooleva eriyari ya sookophiwa sa Mosampiiki saaphiyerya imilhawu 30 sa itoolare ni waahanle owo opakenle nakoso oMosampiiki.
Mweeri wanenli, makuveeru owanli yaahiwanana oMaputo okhweyiheryana iviixitu, sintoko enamula y'owaaluxa anakoso a esetore yaaxineene.
Minixituru a w'Ankoola opacenrye nihiku noopacerya na muteko nenna, mahiku vaneettaya 09, oxukurwa oMosampiiki.
Namuhupi a mahooleli a RENAMO ootthukweliwa ahimyaniwa otetheererya epuruma-puruma.
António Muchanga ootthukiwa mpaani mwa Operesitensiya ya Repuupilika nuumala wiira mpantta wa Nikhuru na Anamiruku a Olamulela Elapo.
oMosampiiki, namuhupi a mahooleli a RENAMO António Muchanga otthukiwa, olelo, okhumaka omuthukumanoni ya Nikhuru na Anamiruku a Olamulela Elapo ni anihimyaniwa otetheererya epuruma-puruma.

Otthukiwa wa António Muchanga ovekeliwe ni Eporokuratoriya-Yuulupale ya Repuupilika enimuhimyana namuhupi a Afonso Dhlakama oolavula itthu sinitharamula ekhotto ya RENAMO elapo yoothene, otepexa wene wa eriyari ya Eporovinsiya ya oSofala.
Atthu oovilkana miloko miili ahookhwa ni akina aawulala mwa masurutaato ni atthu ohittheka etthu ni itthu sinceene soohononeya, mwwha wa epuruma-puruma yeela.

António Muchanga wiirale mpantta wa muthukumano wa Nikhuru na Anamiruku a Olamulela Elapo yiireliwa ovaaneliwa mwaha wa soolamula, muhakhu ni sanammawaani a mulaponi ni yoovekela omalihiwa epewe ya namuhupi a Afonso Dhlakama, ori mempuru a Nikhuru na Anamiruku a Olamulela Elapo.
RENAMO oolavula mwaha wootthukweliwa w'António Muchanga mwaano wa Manual Francisco Lole, mempuru Nikhuru na Anamiruku a Olamulela Elapo Ahu, para owo, Muchanga namatthukeleliwa epoliitika.
Nnya, Lole oohimya wiira Afonso Dhlakama aaroomaala ni onaawiriyana mamempuru awe etthu xeeni yoowiira.
Atthu akina yaahoniherya ni ohisiveliwa waha ni omaala wa Exitaatu, ahimiwaka Eporokuratoriya-Yuulupale ya Repuupilika, mwaha wa soohimya sa António Muchanga, sinooniwa okhala soopaha.
Akina anuupuwela, nnya, wiira otthukiwa wa António Muchanga khonirowa waamaaliha akapwitthi aatoropa a RENAMO.
Imiya imiya sene sa mamosampikaano ohisooniheryasa oMaputo
Imiya imiya sene sa mamosampikaano aakhumasa, olelo, khurowa mpikatani woowi owanela myaha sootepexa waaxankiha ni sikhanle tisinlavulasiwa mahiku ene ala va.
sookophiwa s'atthu otheene, ikhirini ni ekhotto sikhanle myaha siniwananiwa.

Okathi woophiyeryaka ekhatiri emosa aheettasa mmaphironi ya oMaputo, ewehaxaxiwaka ni mafalume yaakunxeene akapwitthi, ekunxeene iwarakha sinihimya maalumo onithoonya, sintoko ala: "yookophiwa ela khaninliva" e "Emalihiwe ekhotto."
Peresitente a Repuupilika, eparalamento ni ale aniphuka milattu waatthuneya evareke muteko ni vanirerelaaya, yaaroyihaka otiripunale alipa okopa musurukhu ole onitthaniwa sookophiwa soowipitheya.
Nuuvira ekhatiri emosa waahimala wisooniherya, waaniheriwaka ni owehereriwaka wiira enookhumelela yooreerela.
Maporofisionaale a w'Ankoola ni Mosampiiki ni ivixitu sookhweyiheriwa
Mamperesaariyo, anamithukumano, anamalokoha, alipa itiini, ni yanla yanla, enittottela muraarelo mwiiwanano eneetta.

Atthu a w'Ankoola ni a Mosampiiki aniphavela oweha weha marakaato, wunnuwiherya mivaanelo sa impereesa, nakoso wala ohela muhakhui wa ilapo soopiili sinirowa okhalanaka aviixitu voowaakuveyaxa ni ovolowa wa okathi woophiyeryaka miyeeri miraru wa khula miyeeri mithanu ni mmosa.
Aviixitu anirowa opakiwaka okathi wa mahiku mathanu, sintoko mwiiwanano wookhweyiherya iviixitu siniiraneya okhuma mahiku 30 a mweeri wa neethanu.
Ohiya atthu arina empereesa, mphimo ola onnakhweyiherya, atthu aniira mithukumano suulupale, makonsulutoore, alipa itiini, ni akina.

Yoolakela sa makuveerunu a oMaputo ni oLuwanta siniiraneya mwaha woowi vanitthuneya "wunnuwiherya ni okhweyiherya ovira vira wa maporofisionaale a ilapo soopiili ni "omalamaliha itthu sinikhoottiha okelela ohooli miteko sa impereesa ni oruhiwa mihakhu."
Anawiiye a mpahari: Ekalawa ya oMosampiiki vano eri oSomaaliya
Alipa aneettiha ekalawa akumi, masi nlelo khanatthi olavulana ni anamalamula oMosampiiki wala oXipaanya.

Ekalawa (Vega 5) Veeka elakasenhe oMosampiiki, epareya ya oSofala, eri mmaasini ya oSomaaliya, ni anawiiye, oohimya oMaputo Miniixituru anenli oMosampiiki a Miteko Soomiserya, Gabriel Muthisse. Sintoko miniixituru ananli, alipa weettiha ekalaw, ootheene aya akumi.
Sintoko muhooleli, nlelo khalavulaniwe mamosampikaano 19, atthu a w'Intoneesiya 03 ni maxipanyoole anli, nnakhala anawiiyee yiiyale ekalawa ya oMosampiiki.
Alipa weetthiha ekalawa ari nimurettele.

Ekhweeli wiira nlelo khanilavulanne alipa weettiha ekalawa, nnya, nihaana ekontoroole, nniira niwehexexaka, ni nookha ohimyaka wiira alipa aneettiha ekalawa akumi, oohimya Gabriel Muthisse. Etthu yoorika owehaxaxa yoohimiwa ela.

Mukwaha woopacerya Mosampiiki vaniiraneyaaya etthu ela yoowiiyeriwa mmaasini mwa mulaponi mwahu. oExipaanya, elapo oryaaya arumatori, Pescanova, onivara ni Mosampiiki, woopahavela enamuna yoowaatthikiha ale yiiyiwe.

Empereesa eneene ya Vega 5 erina mihakhu sootakanihiwa s'Oxipaanya ni mosampikaano. Namuhupi Oxipaanya oMaputo oniira alavulaka okathi wootheene ni amahoolela oMosampiiki, nnya, khaavo onisuwela ekeekhayi, khahimyanse eniphavelaaya alipa wiiha.
Cólera faz cinco vítimas mortais em Moçambique
Aakhala atthu 870 oomurava koolyera oNiyasa, Wamphula ni oZampeeziya.
Iporovinsiya sa oMosampiiki sa oNiyasa, Wamphula ni oZampeeziya sookeleliwa ni eretta ya koolyera owiivale atthu athanu ni akina oovikana 870 amuranve.

Mammeru ala ahimiwe enamararu yeela oParalamento ni miniixitara a Mwaalano wa Miteko sa Ekumi Nazira Abdula, okathi yoowo okhontte okhala epitemiya mwaha wookhala mammeru ari eriyari ya miphimo sinitthuniwa ni Nikhuru na Ekumi na Olumwenku (OMS).
Mosampiiki ori nenna va okathi onirupa epula, yoosuweliwa okhala okathi vanimwareelaya ele enireliwa eretta ya onyala.
Mahooleli oororomeliha wiira inamuna sootheene sooxaka siniira sittokihiwaka, nnya onnivaha ephoole wiira ohimiwa itthu soowothiwa sinihimya wiira koolyera eretta enikayiwa ni alipa okunya.
Sintoko Nazira Abdula, itthu soowoothiwa siniiriha woowi eretta atepeke omwareela.
Mosampiiki ahikhala wa iyaakha soowaattamela muloko ni ithanu sivinre ehasara ya koolyera enuupuweliwa mpakha va ni yaahiiwiva atthu imiya imiya sene, epooma ya oMaputo pahi.
Nuuttharela ni ehasara ele, elapo yaahimootola mwaakha wa 2006 mwaapomphe oniwanana koolyera, ahaareere ororomeleya mpakha 90 puru sento, nnya, khaakhuleliwe ni Nikhuru na Ekumi na Olumwenku (OMS).
Mosampiiki: "Ohithalana" ti waari mwaha waalavulaxiwa wuumalelani wa olaleyiwa mwaathanle
Anamwiilepiha okhala peresitente a Mosampiiki aniwala ekoothekoothe eroromelihaka ompaka kuveerunu aathhu ootheene.
oMosampiiki omulaleya mwaathanle woomala wuumalani wa esumana yeela.
Wuumalelani wa ekoothekoothe, Afonso Dhlakama oruuye Okusini wa elapo, wenno wahaaxukureryaawe okathi wootheene waamulaleyaawe mwaathanle.
Filipe Nyusi, namayiilepiha a Frelimo oronwe Ohitto wa elapo, oKilimaani ni Wamphula, mittetthe sinlipanaawe namawanana a kuveerunu.
Daviz Simango a MDM ahanle mmuttettheni oniisoonawe ophenteliwa, variyari wa elapo.
Mwaha waalavulaxiwa waari ohithalana, ni Dhlakama ni Nyusi eroromelihasaka wiirela mpantta attthu ootheene wa makuveerunu aha.
Muxerexere ya oMaputo, Dhlakama olavula ni mttaava na eShankaana akhottaka wiira onrowa waathanya akhali a Okusini wa elapo.
Namayivahererya a Frelimo, Filipe Nyusi aari Ohitto wa elapo ni muhupi awe tho waari ororomeliha ahaathala atthu.
Já o candidato do MDM, Daviz Simango, ficou se pela sua praça forte de Sofala onde a sua promessa foi quase idêntica.
Yookophiwa ya imetikaale 50 ahakuxereriha okhwa atthu acexe oMossampii
Mwaavano a iyaakha 23 oopattiha mooro vampani nuumala onyakulihana ni mwaneene empa.
Mwaavano mmosa orina iyaakha 23 oopattiha mooro empa, Eporovinsiya ya oGaza khumwiiva mayi ni anaawe araru, yiiraka tiityaawe onipwanyaneya awnanaka ni ekumi oshipiritaale.
Ehapari ela ehimiwe oMaputo ni namuhupi a eKumanto Yuulupale ya Poliisiya ya Repuupilika ya Mosampiik (PRM) okathi wiiriwaaya epalansa ya esumana, vohihimya nihiku.
Inacio Dina ohimya wiira mmiravo oroolakela opattiha mooro nuumala onyakulihana ni mwaneene empa mwaha wa yookophiwa ya imetikaale 50, waattamela isentaavo 55 sa itoolare.
Namuhupi a poliisiya khahimyaxanxe oratteene mwaha wa yookophiwa ela ni onyakulihaniwa nno, nnya oohimya wiira mwaavano owo onipwanyaneya atthukweliweene.
Mamperesaariyo oMosampiiki anunlaseya othowa wookopha musurukhu
Athiyana ananakoso oophiyeryaka 700 anivaanela makhalelo a impereesa sikhaani ni savariyari oMaputo.
Athiyana ananakoso anunlaseya waatta mikuthekuthe woowi okophihiwa musurukhu opanko oMosampiiki, okathi wiiriwa eFoorum Yoopacerya ya Imperesa sa Athiyana.
Muthukumano wa mahiku mararu opacenrye olelo oMaputo ni onathukumanya mamperesaariya a elapo yootheene.

Ninmalele oniireliwa, wuupaceryani, wooniherya miteko sineettihiwa ni mamperesaariya athiyana ni ale anooniherya okhalana akhili ni ikuru soowiivaha muteko, poti okhala esetore yoorepeliwa wala yoohirepeliwa wa muhakhu.
Khasireere myaha sinivaaneliwa, masi mulattu muulupale woorikiheriwa okophasa musurukhu w'opanko ni okhaliheriwa tori mwaha w'athiyana alipa nakoso.
Wookiseryani, enoonaneya wiira epanko orika ovaha musurukhu.

Eulalia Nhatitima, a eForum y'Athiyana Mamperesaariya yoohimya osuwela tho wiira sookhala mixankiho, mmosa mwa iya eforomasawu, nnya oolopola wiira ipanko sihaana waxukurerya athiyana, woona ala ahooniherya wiira anniweryasa.

Aakhulaka, Katia Meng, muhooli a Ekoophiri y'Osuka ya Muthiyana, nikhuru naamukhaani nnikopiha musurukhu, nnikhala oMaputo, ohimya wiira nakoso onnikelela ohoolo ni wiira anamakopha awe, oowaattela, atthu arina muhakhu vakhaani yaawo animwiira nakoso ootumihasa vapooma yuulupale y'elapo ahu.
Yoohuliwa 2013, Ekoophiri y'Osuka ya Muthiyana yookhalana anamakopha waattamela 1000 ni vanixela animuncerereya
Meng oohimya tho wiira yoolakela ya nikhuru naamukhaani ninkopiha musurukhu ninhoolelaawe okhanyererya owoonela vatthu anammawani oovalavela, iiraka icuuro vakhani.
Muthukumano onimala mutivela, mahiku vanrowaaya weettaka 17.
Alipa ohimya ihapari anitumererya owananiwa epewe yaanamalepa
Paulo Machava ohookotthiwa n'ikaraxuuti n'atthu oohisuweliwa onikhumaaya ni oronwaaya.
Epooma yuulupale ya Mosampiik, evennye niwunla enamathanu yeela, mahiku 28, mwaha woowookotthiwa Paulo Machava, mulipa oohimya ihapari oosuwanyeya.
Saari ikaraxuuti icexe soopiwe sa kapwitthi enamuna AK 47 seyiyo voosiisu ya enamathanu yeela simmaalinhe nsu na mmosa aanamuhupi oosuwelasiwa a Mosampiiki.
Paulo Machava, ayisuwelaxinhe ni raatiyo, ni nuumala khuvara wuulepani, wookotthiwe ni atakhali oohisuweliwa, okathi wiiraawe ecinaaxitiika mmaphironi ya Epooma ya oMaputo.
Mafalume aahimya wiira aapacerya okohakoha, nnya khahimwale oratteene.
Nikhuro naalipa ohimya mihupi nooxanka ni mookotthelo ola wootakhala.
Oxanka ohaapwanya nave tho alipa olamula elapo.
Muhooleli a MDM, eparitiitu envara miteko sa epoliitika yaneenli ya nwanani a kuveerunu ohooniherya musura wamphento ni wunla wawe ni okhwa wa Paulo Machava.
Paulo Machava namuhupi aneenli a Mosampiki owookotthiwa munaanaanoni, nuumala Carlos cardozo.
Ehasara ela enikhumelela nuuvira mahiku mararu waaphukiwaaya anahapari anli ni namuhakhu, anihimyaniwa ikhirini siniwanana ororomeleya wa Exitaatu.
Wookotthiwa wa Machava ni mphuko onirowa wiiraneya nihuku noopacerya muteko ninrwa sinooniwa ntoko etthu enoopopiha miteko sa alipa Ihapari ni Exitaatu y'Ihakhi oMosampiiki.
Ilapo Soowiirana sinnittottopela omaala wa ikapwitthi ni annivekelela murettele ohinimala oMaputo
Ewarakha enihimya "okeela ohoolo woowi opwanyiwe murettele ohinimala.

Namuhupi a Ilapo Soowiira onivara oMaputo oottottopela wuncareriwa mahiku yiiwananiwe ohiruma ikapwitthi ahimiwe enamanli ila, mahiku vaneettaya 03, ni peresitente a Renamo ni ohooniherya nroromelo wiira onoopwanyiwa murettele woohimala oMosampiiki.

"Ohoolela woominyala wooniheriwe ni mukhulupale a elapo, Filipe Nyusi ni muhooleli a Renamo, Afonso Dhlakama, evahaka mavalo ala anittoonyerya okelela ohoolo woowi opwanyiwe murettele woororomeleya," onnisomiwa nwarakhani eveleelihiwe alipa ohimya ihapari.

Namuhupi onnihimya tho owehererya wiira "ni etthuvo ela" kuveerunu ni Renamo "ooniherye ominyala mpakha imaara sikina aaphukaka soovirikana sa poliitika" ni opwanya "murettele ohinimala ni erimarima ya temokarasiya onitthuneya woowi elapo ni mihakhu sa mamosampikaano sunnuweke.

Alaleyaka wuncareriwa mahiku miloko mithanu na mosa ahinrowa owaniwa, muhooleli a Renamo oohimya okhalana nuulumo "waavaha murettele mamosampkaano," yiiraka ovaaneliwa wiiraneyaka n'alipa oweha a ilapo s'okhopela.

Afonso Dhlakama oohooliha wi ahaaroromeliha nsana alavulaka mutelefoneni ni mukhulupale a elapo wiira alopwana awe "khanirowa opaca mukaritela ya makhuru a kuveerunu" ni wiira owo oniwehererya siiso wa mpantta wa makhuru a kuveerunu.
Muhooleli a Renamo oororomeliha wiira alipa okhaliherya ovaanela a ilapo sookhopela anirowa otthikela, ni wiira, makhuru manli a miteko anrowa ovara muteko woowi opwanyiwe wiwanana.
FMI "onimuttottopela" Mosampiki
Nikhuru nootumererya wiira Maputu ohaana wiira ni ekekhayi iporokarama sowanana osikhini.
Nikhuru na Muhakhu w'Olumwenku nnoona okhala "yoottottopeleya ehaali ya muhakhu wa Mosampiiki, masi oolopola okhala iriixiku wa okathi vakhaani wiireliwaka elapo.

Makhulupale a FMI aathukumana oWashintoni woowi ewehawehiwe ehaali ya muhakhu wa Mosampiiki ni wuumalani wa muthukumano, muhooleli aneenli Min Zhu oohimya wiira muhakhu wa Mosampiiki onniira wunnuwaka mwaakha wa 2011 ni wiira infalasawu yahilokololiwa.

Waaniheriwa wunnuwa wa muhahu okathi wa eriyari etthu yooreera nnya eriixiku wa okathi vakhani sinikhuma wa olumwnku sihaana otthokihasiwa n'inamuna sooreerela," yoohimya ewarakha ya Zhu ahimyaka othowa muhakhu moolumwenkuni. Muhooleli anenli a FMI oohimya wiira vannitthuneya wiira Mosampiiki avare muteko ni wikhanyaanya wiira avukule osikini. Nave tho yooreera othipelela wiira itthu vakina woowi olipiheriwe olokololiwa wa yookopha, otthokiha oheliwa muhakhu mulaponi ni olokolola muhakhu wa atthu ootheene.
Min Zhu ootumererya nlelo okhala etthu yootthuneya ororomeliha olokololiwa ni ottokihiwa oratteene isetore sootheene sinikhuma muhakhu ni ottokiherya olivihiwa musokho.
Muhooli aneenli a FMI ohimya tho nlelo nwarakhani mwawe okhala "etthu yookelela ohoolo ni okhala ephiro yooreera" yoolakela ya Mosampiiki ovolowa munikhuruni ya Ifaapirika Sinimuthipa Compoxitiivele.
Mosampiiki ovukula ihalahala sa nakoso a itthu sootthuneyaxa
Nikhuru n'Atthu Oowiiraana a Mosampiiki Ninaakhuparela anamathuma, atthapela yoolakela ya kuveerunu.

Kuveerunu onimala waakhulela eporopooxita ya Nlamulo nnihimya omalela waya ihalahala sa itthu iye siniitthaniwa soolya sootthuneyaxa, wiireliwa ottharuxiwa alipa oweliha isisapo yaatumiheriwa atthu ootheene.

Eporopooxita ya kuveerunu enihimya iyoolya ni itthu sootthuneyaxa 12 siniira sencareriwa esisapo aya mweemexeryo wa muhakhu onavirikana, sintoko ehopa ya nipuru nanenli, elhyaku yoocelariwa, musoro, otthu wa nakhuwo, ni sikina ni iye siniira sencereriwa anammawaani enaxanka, seyo sikhoottihiwe ehalahala aya ovikana 15 puru sentu yaanamathuma vakhani vakhani ni anamoopola.
Nikhuru n'Atthu Oowiiraana a Mosampiiki Ninaakhupaarela anamathuma, nootthapela yoolakela ya kuveerunu, nnya nnihimya wiira onkhala ntoko mwaalo woothokolowa ninno ninno.

Wa mpantta wa anamathuma, mphimo ola ti wooreera ni veekeekhayi wamalihiwa wuncereriwa isisapo pure pure, vanooweryaneya wiira avalaveli ekhalaneke etthu enaakhuparela ni okhalana owerya woothuma, nnya, vaniphaveleya wiira kuveerunu akhalane owerya woowi mireerelo siruuhiweke mmarakaatoni, waahiraneyeru siiso, vanimwaattiya iphula anamatumiha, mwaha wa sookhumelela sinceene sininyaanyerya wa muhakhu wa mmarakaato," ohimya Mouzinho Nicols, avanelaka ni Nsu na w'Ameerika.

Eporopooxita esyaa ya nlamulo enirowa ovahereriwa naananoru oparalamento woowi yaakhuleliwe ni enooniwa ni alipa olokohimya a mulaponi, sintoko enamuna ekina ya etthu ya mutthokiheryo muteko ya 'sexita paasika, muupuwelo ohireere opwexa muru, okhuma vaavale vaapuweliwaaya mpakha vakhwiyaaya.
Vahiphaveliwa owiriyaniwa muupuwelo wa Nikhuru Naanamatumiha ya Mosampiiki, nnya khivaweryanen'ye, okhala wiira mahooleli enihimya wiira khareere waatteliwa miteko soovara.
Miniixituru oopacerya oPorutukaale onixekurya Mosampiiki
Eporokarama awe onitakanihiwa wiirela mpantta Muthukumano III Porutukaale-Mosamoiiki.

Miniixituru-Oopacerya oPorutukaale, Antonio Costa, inipacerya, enamacexe yela, oxukurya oMosampiiki, w'okathi yoola onooneya ntoko khoreere okhovaniwa eriyari ya ilapo soopiili, ohiya mwaha wa namuhakhu oPortukaale wiiyiwe waattamela iyaakha piili sivirale, yoola othokosiwa waha omanle otthikeliwa ni alipa okunya oMosampiiki.

Moonelo awe Porutukaale, wiiyiwa wa Américo Sebastião, mweeri waneethanu namosa ya 2016, Epooma ya oMarinkwe, ePorovinsiya ya oSofala, yaari etthu yoothananiha, owehaka mpatta wa okhovana, nnya, naananoxa, alipa okunya a oPorutukaale ahaakhela nroromelo, ninkhuma oMosampiiki, nookhalihana wiira osuwelihiwe mulattu ola.

"Nvarihano wa epoliitika ola wookhovana tiwootthuneya", woowi niphuke mwaha ola, ohoonela sakarataari a Exitaatu y'atthu oPorotukaale, Jose Luis Carneiro, wuumalani wa muthukumano, mwaamahiku, oMaputo, ni miniixitara anenli a oMosampiiki a Mwaalaano wa nakoso a Ilapo Sookhopela ni Okhovana, Manuela Lucas.
Othukuleliwa tho epuruseesu othokosiwa evekeliwe ni amusi awe mperesaariyo, wiiyiwe vaxikasawu vaniwurya mikukutta, oNyamapaaza, oMarinkwe.
Sintoko sihimyalyaaya Nahapari Lusa, anawiiye aakhuxa ikarataawu sa mpanko ni khukuxa musukhu 4.000 sa iweero.
.Eporokaraama ya oxukurya ya Miniixituru-Oopacerya a oPorutukaale oMosampiiki onitakanyiha wiirela mpantta wa eSimeera Porutukaale-Mosampiiki.
Amahoolele a w'Afirika anipaka nikhuro na nakoso ootthukuliwa
Nithukumanyaka ilapo 26, nuulupale ya ekontinente yootheene.
Zimpaapwe ni Matakaaxikare vanupuweliwa oheliwa munikhuruni.
Amahooleli a wAfirika ahaakulela, olelo, oXuwanixipuuruku, mwiiwanano woowi epake nikhuru na nakoso noovuluwa nitakanihaka ilapo 26, noowaatteliwa ya ekontinente yootheene.

Wiiranen'ye, olelo, osuwelihiwa opakiwa muttetthe wa muhakhu a miyoono miraru ya nakoso ootaphuwa, otakanyihiwaka SADC, Nikhuru n”Alipa muhakhu a w'Afirika Awuxitaraale ni Marakaato Mamosaru a w'Afirika Oriyentaale ni Awuxitaraale.

Opaceriwa nno wiiranen'ye okathi mmosaru ni Muthukumano Wootutuxerya wa SADC, onirelaawe mpanntta Muhooleli Armando Guebuza, a Mosampiiki, ni miniixituru a Nakoso a Ilapo Sookhopela a w'Ankoola, Jorge Chicoty, ahoolelaka elapo awe.

Muthukumano Wootutuxeriwa wa SADC oniraneya okhuma Mutivela woowi ovaaneliwe ehaali ya oMatakaaxikare ni oZimpaapwe, myaya miili soowalamela seiyo amahoolela a nikhuru na muttetthe vanaaniheriwaaya ohipwanya yoowakhuliwa voowaakuveya.
Nikhuru n'atthu a mulaponi nihikhanle mparitiituni anivaanela okawana mireerelo sinivaha etthaya Wamphula

Makhuru aatthu a mulaponi-ahikhanle mparitiituni, namalamula, omahoolela a mmuttettheni, mateputaato a oParalamento ni asuweli mamosampikaani anoovaanela, okhuma olelo, mahiku vaneettaaya 19, vapooma ya Wamphula, Mosampiiki, okawaniwa wa mireerelo sinivaya etthaya, wiireliwa oraala wooreerela para atthu otheene .

Sintoko sihimyalawe muhooleli a Nikhuru na Anamakhalihana ya Mosampiiki, nikhuru noohikhala na kuveerunu na mulaponi na okhupaarela ihakhi s'atthu ootepa ovalavela Antonio Mutoua, muuupuwelo woowaathukumanya atthu anikhuma ipantte sinceene sa mulaponi enikhuma numala owehiwa wiira mivaanelo sa mireerelo s'ovaha s'etthaya khasiniiriwa mapuro yaawo akhanle sinooneleliwaaya mireerelo iyo, yaatthuna waatakanyihaka anammawaani wa mivaanelo sotheene.
Muupuwelo ahu opittikuxa epiraamite ela
Nimphavela orukunuxa etthu ila.
Mivaaanelo iye siiraneya oMaputo sihaana opacerya wiiraneya mporovinsiya, sihaana wiiraneya mutixitiriitu.
Nihaana omukuxa teputaato mpakha waanammawaani ni ovaanela n'awo itthu siniwira mpantta, oohimya Motoua okathi wiiraneyaaya esiminaariyo.
Dhlakama wiirale otthukiwa wa Muchanga etthu yoowoopopiha ni opacana
Muhooleli a Renamo oohimya wiira khanirowa waakhula n'ikapwitthi nnya ohaakhulela ohikhala ni nroromelo okhuma oKoronkoosa.

Peresitenti a Renamo, Afonso Dhlakama oolavula ni alipa ihimya ihapari, emakaaripi y'olelo, mutelekonferensiya, ni oohimya wiira otthukiwa wa namuhupi awe, António Muxanga, etthu yoopacana ni waapucari omwene.

Nsu na Afonso Marceta Dhlakama khinaathukumanyale anamahimya ihapari pahi, masi tho nahaakuxa atthu a elepo yeela mpakha oseeti wa Renamo oMaputo, khusariwa mpakha okutteleliwa erampha Ahamed Sekou Toure.
Dhlakama oohimya, nnya, wiira khanirowa waakhula n'ikapwitthi.

Afonso Dhlakama ohinyexexa wiira khaniroromela okhupaareliwa okhuma mutakhwani ya miyaako y,oKoronkoosa ni ohaakhulela wiira Peresitente a Repuubilika oniwerya etthu wiira arowe amukumaanane, envare ni emookotthe.
Mosampiiki elapo yoowoopihaxa y'olumwenku wiira omiire nakoso
Mosampiiki elapo yoowoopihaxa y'olumwanku wiira omwiire nakoso, mwaha wa icuuro s'okopha s'atthu otheene sineetta 25, puru sento.
Nokhuru na Ihapari sanamihakhu Bloomberg (Ploompeereki) nihimya wiira elapo yoomuxira Venezuela (Venezuweela) ni enimulaleya karaafiku ni wuncarereya wa sookophiwa s'ilapo sopiili

Owela wootutuxa wa sookophiwa s'atthu otheene sa mamosampikaano, sintoko sinooniheryawe karaafiku olaleyiwale, wiiranenhe nuumala esumana evinre, Mwaalaano wa Muhakhu owooniherya alipa nakoso a Londres (oLonterexi) wiira khaniwerya oliva s'okophiwa s'atthu otheene, otepaxawene imilyawu 38 sa itoolare sinilokihiwaya Empereesa y'oMosampiiki ya Atum (Ematum), sithatuxiwe sookopha s'atthu otheene.
Mosampiiki opakeya elapo yootepax woopiha ohela muhakhu waananakoso, sintoko owela w'icuuru ya sookophiwa.
Mosampiiki Exitaatu emosa ya Waafirika erina ehaali yoowalamela mwaha woowaattanela sookophiwa s'atthu otheene.
Yookuttula ti ya Yoosoma ya makhuru a Waalemaanya na Misereor ni Erlassjar (Misereyoore Erilasacar)

Makhuru manli a Waalemaanya anaakiha oleviwa wa sookopha s'ilapo sootepa osikhini anihimya wiira Mosampiiki Exitaatu emosa ya Waafirika erina eyaali aya yootepa oxankiha mwaha woowaatta wa sookopha s'atthu otheene, ohiya okhalana soohimya sa mihakhu sootepaxa oyeva ya nikhuru na ilapo.

Makhuru ohikhala a kuveerunu a Waalemaanya, Misereor ni Erlassjar anihimya nwarakhani elaleyiwale esumana ela, wiira Mosampiiki yaari elapo ya Waafirika yaattottopeliwa mpakha wooneneliwaaya, w'iyaakha piili, iye siitthaniwa sookophiwa soowiipitheya.

Makhuru awo anikhala waataana w'Alemaanya ya makhuru atthu ahikhanle mParitiitu Politiku, ikereca ni atthu antthara-tthara miteko sa politika, anoonela wiira sookopha sa impereesa ProIndicus (PoroIntiku), Mam (Maami) ni Ematum yookhaliherya woowi Mosampiiki ohaleele nlemeliho sa miteko sa sookopha, ni esisapo eruuhenlyaaya.

Asuweli akina a mihakhu anihimya, vanaamwiira siisa, wiira sookopha sa impereesa iya tthaaru sitepihenrye mulattu wa enamakopha ya Mosampiiki, naanaanova nto sihinvileleya, mwaha woohikhala enamuna yoosuka muhakhu mulaponi memmo, ohiya oyeva sooruweriwa sa mulaponi.

Wa isumana piili sivinre, oLontereshi, w'Inkalateera, namalamula khawenrye wikupaliha ni alipa okopiha mihakhu omutthunela iporopooxita sawe woowi attokihase tho yookopha, ni wa mahiku vakhaani awo anootthikela othukumana ni anamakopiha yaawo, mukwaha ola onrowa okhala vapooma ya Waameerika, Waashintoni.
Namalamula ni Renamo aathipelela owalameliha ovaanelela myaha siluluwanne ni epoliitika
Frelimo onivekela wunteyiwa miteko sa eparalamento mwaha woohikelela ohoolo ovaaneliwa wiireliwaka ohihiwa akapwitthi Renamo
Ovaanelela myaha siluluwanne n'epoliitika eriyari ya Kuveerunu oMosampiiki ni Renamo khoniiwananiwa ni pooti ompwapwaneeliha mwaathanle amunisiipiyo, mweeri wa namuloko onirwa.

Ohiiwanana woopacerya nuumala okhwa Afonso Dhakama ni wiirinhe wunteyiwa muthukumano wootutuxerya w'Asempeleya ya Repuupilika, wuupaceryani yaarowa okhala mahiku yeettaka 21, wiireliwaka oheliwa munlamuloni na mwaathanle itthu iye sayiwananiwe eriyari ya Mukhulupale a Elapo ya oMosampiiki, Filipe Nyusi, ni mukhulupale muharoyiye a Renamo, Afonso Dhlakama.

Namuhupi a Nikhuru na Mahiku ootheneya w'Asempeleya ya Repuupilika, Antonio Amelia, ahimya wiira yoovekeliwa wunteyiwa muthukumano okhumme mpantte wa nikhuru na eparitiitu ya Frelimo, mwaha wooxakanakeela mivaanelo vasulu va myaha sa masurutaato.

Amelia aahakhulela wiira "sintoko nikhuru ”nanamathanliwa a moono wa Fereliimu, woonaka wiira onnaattamela okathi wa mwaathanle a mmunisiipiyo, memmo sintoko sinihimyaaya nlamulo wiira amwiilepiha otheene ahaana othanla ni othanliwa, mwaathanle ohaana iraneyaka vohikhala nikhuru na epoliitika nnakhala nimosa nirineene ikapwitthi.
Wa mpantte awe, Ivone Soares onihimya wiira nikhuru na eparitiitu ya Renamo khenirowa waakanyerya mvaanelo "oniira wimmaka mihokorokho soorera."
Nlelo khanihimiwe nihiku nnakhala nimosa woowi wiiraneye muthukumano w'oparalamento ni makhuru anirehererya epuruseese ya mwaathanle aapacerya oxukhumeya okhala wiira mahiku anootepa waapunyapunya.
Mosampiiki "ooxipheeleliwa" ni muritti woolemela wa yookopha y'atthu ootheene
Mosampiiki elapo ya w'Afirika Supusahariyaana yoowaattana sookopha sa musurukhu wa ilapo sookhopela

Nikhuru na owehaweha erixiku Standard & Poors onoonela wiira Mosampiilki Elapo ya w'Afirika Supusahariyaana erina eperesentage ya sookohiwa sa muhakhu wa ilapo sookhopela, waattamela 84 puru sento, mwaha otepexa wene wa Eurobond (Ewuroponti) ya 2016 ni sookophiwa sa impereesa s'atthu ootheene.

Asuweli awiriyaniwe ni nsu na w'Ameerika anihimya wiira mwaha woowiira mpantte munceene wa yookophiwa yaattjhu ootheene ya Mosampiiki okhala ya itoolare tenipunya itivisa s'elapo ahu ni khiatepa olemeliha muritti wa yookophiwa, otepaxa wene wakhawiira sookophiwa sinceene khasinivareliwa muteko oninnuwiherya elapo.

Musuweli a mihakhu Roberto Tibane oohimyexexa mwaha wa yoolaleyiwa ya Comite de Politica Monetaria do Banco de Moçambique (eKomitee ya ePoliitika ya Muhaku ya Epanko ya Mosampiiki, esomiwe nihiku noopacerya muteko nenna, mahiku vaneettaaya 26, ni muhooleli, Rogerio Zandamela, ookupaleela etthu ela, aimyaka tho ohooneliwa vatthu wa musurukhu maporo aniturukiwaaya, mwaha woovirikanasa misurukhu suulupale sa ilapo sookhopela.

Roberto Tibane oolakiherya wiira "ohiya ophunyiwa ekiisha ya itivisa, mutakanxeryo wa yookophiwa wa musurukhu wa ilapo sookhopela nave tho onoorowa okhalana mikuthekuthe yoohooneliwa vatthu musurukhu ahu
Awo yatthuna oliva yookophiwa, ahaana oturuka imetical ni imoweta sa ilapo sookhopela, ahaana othuma itoolare."
"Hiiyo noosuwela wiira nakoso ahu khahiyo ooreera, ni ophunyiwa vakhani pahi vasulu va makatthe wala kanyeryo sahu woowi oliveliwe yookophiwa poti otepiherya ohooneliwa vatthu musurukhu ahu.
Tivo, khahiyo etthu yooreera elapo yaahiweryeke opaka ikanyeryo ni okhalana yookopha aya ni moweta w'ilapo s'okhopela, ohimya Tibane.

Ni moonelo awe, musuweli a muhakhu Constantino Marrengula onaaniherya wiira ekhalaka 84 puru sentoYa yookopha eri ni mwaawalo wa ilapo sa okhopela vanihimya wiira okathi etoolare, eweero wala erantti sinwelaaya, yookophiwa nave tho enimuncerereya, ni siisa khiyatepa owalamela miteko sa yookophiwa.
"Ni eyo teniiriha otepaxaka olemela muritti wa khula okathi onivira," olokohimya musuweli ole.
eteerusu emosa ya athiyana annivarela muteko internet (intereneeti) oMosampiiki
Ohisoma, othoyiwa ni owalamela toniiriha etthu ila.

Yoosoma ya (Instituto pesquisas em Ciencia, Inovaçao e Tecnologia da Informaçao e Comunicaçao (SIITRI) ) Inxitituutu y'Otholathola, Siyensiya, Opaka vasya ni eTekonolociya ya Soohimiwa ni Soolaleyiwa yoohimya wiira eteeruso emosa pahi ya athiyana aoMosampiiki tanimuurela intereneeti.

Yoolempwa yooniheriwe enamathanu y'olelo, mahiku 27, omuthukumanoni oniireliwa ophavelasiwa olikanihiwa n'ihakhi s'athiyana online oMaputo, olakiherya etthu ela na ohisuwela ovarela muteko ikaruma siniticitariwa ni othowa wa ikaruma sene seyiyo.
yoosomiwa, ewiiwale atthu 1.044 alopwana ni athiyana wa ipaayiro 29 sa Epooma yuulupale ya oMosampiiki, enithonya tho owalamelihiwa wa intereneeti okha eniiriha.
Eriyari wa iye situmereriwe woowi erukunuxiwe etthu ila, SIITRI onithoonya opakiwa ipoliitika ni inamuna sinikhoottiha ohasuliwa ni ovekavekiwa athiyana muretini sosiyaaleni.
Uniao Africana (Mwiiraano wa Waafirika woolaphela omukhaliherya Mosampiiki wawanana atakhali oKaapu Telekaatu

Mwiiraano wa Waafirika oniphavela omukhaliherya Mosampiiki owanana ekhotto oKaapo Telekaatu, okathi ene yoola mulaponi memmo onilopoliwaaya ni onaaniheriwaaya ekhotto omwareela iporovinsiya sikina, okhala wiira kuveerunu khanivaha mukhaliheryo onipwanela woowi ewananiwe atakhali.
Mukhaliheryo ororomelihiwe ni Peresitente a Nikhuru na Mwiiraano wa Waafirika, Moussa Muhamat, akhumaka waathukumanalyaawe ni Peresitente oMosampiiki, Filipe Nyusi, oMaputo.
Okathi owo, Muhamat ohoonela "okhala moopopiho muulupale wa murettele oMosampiiki," ekotto eniiraneya ohitto wa elapo ele ya Waafirika.

"Nooxanka vanceene n'etthu ela y'oKaapo Telekaatu," oohimya tho Moussa Muhamat, wuuluulaka malopolo a nikhuru n'atthu ohikhala a kuveerunu a oMosampiiki ni mipantte sikina sa Namalamula, woowi alipa okunya ekuxerye ekeekhayi ekhotto ya oKaapo Telekaatu.

"Khivanipwanela ophuka mulattu wa ekhotto voohikhalana mireerelo, vohihela muhakhu, otepexa wene nikhuru waakiha ni okhupaarela ni exariya," owanela porokuratoora-muulupale anenli a wa Repuupilika, Amabelia Chuquela.

Analiixita a epoliitika Raul Domingos, oohimya wi "Enitowa mutthunelo wa namalamula woowi ophuke mwaha wa ekhotto ya oKaapo Telekaatu," akohaka exeeni ehinithokosiwaaya anikhuma vayi, nikhuru xeene ni taani onaavaha sootheene anivarelaaya muteko atakhali."
Atthu oovikana 200 ahiiviwa okhuma vaavale epacenryaaya ekhotto, waattamela iyaakha piili, wa itixitiriitu khamosa khamosa sa muttetthe w'ohitto ya oKaapo Telekaatu.
IXooku olimpiku a Elimwe: anamattikha athanu ni mmosa a waAfrika anxinttana o pekim.
Maatleta athanu ni mmosa a waAfrika yahikhala waattikhiwa axooku o Pekim
Athiyana anli a waAfrika yaahikhala maxi numuru na maatleta a waAfrika ti nooyeva ovikana mwaakha wa 2018

Maatleta mathanu ni mmosa a ilapo ithanu sa waAfrika ari mwaakha ola muxookuni olimpiku wa eyiita wa o Pekim, numuru nimosa nooyeva vakhaani ya likanyihiwa ni ale yaari mwaakha wa 2018 oKoreya ya oSuuli, okathi ilapo ithanu ni iraru sa ixooniheraya.

Maatleta awo mathanu ni mmosa, alopwana athanu ni mmosa athiyana anli, anrowa oxinttana mikhalelo miili paahi, nsina naya exiki alpino ni exiki (wala exiki nootiku wala ya ohitto) ni enthoonyihera oNixeeriya, Kaana, Eritereyiya, Marroko ni Matakaxikare orina maatleta anli wa muthukumano ole.
Axithiyana oowanli ta oMatakaxikare ni Eritereyiya.
Maatleta athanu ni mmosa ti Samuel, Ikpefan a oNixeeriya okhanle o exiki krosse-kontri.
Oyariwe oFransa aari kampeyawu a “spirinti” amaxoove maxi ohiya othoonyihera Nixeeriya mwaakha wa 2018.
Mialatina Clerc muthiyana oopacera a Matakaxikare ommwiira exiki ni ompacenre oKoreya a oSuuli mwaakha wa 2018 waarinayiye miyaakha 16.
Muthiyana mmosa awaAfrika onkompetiri oPexim onrowayiye wiilepiha exiki alpino wii oxintte.
Clerc oyariwe muxerexere wa epooma ya Antananarivo ni orowa olikanyihiwa ni amusi amosa a Fransa onnunwe muttetthe mmosa okhuveela o Alpinexi a ofransa.
Matheu Neumuller a oMatakaxikare onrowa okompetiri o exiki alpino ni ohaana olimalela ilapo sa okhopela okhala wii ookompetiri wa ekampiyonaatu ya muntiyaale.
Yassine Aouich a oMarroko onrowa okompetiri o exiki alpino
Oyarinwe o Ifrane muttetthe wa miyaako sa ottayiwa khahiyo okhuma enamwane ohinsuwelaawe makaasa ni exeelu.
Ookhalana olimalela ya ilapo sa okhopela okhala wii aari ekampiyonaatu ya muntiyaale ya mukhalelo
Carlos Maeder a oKaana osuweliwe ntoko Kojo Benya Brown, ori wa exiki alpino.
Oyarinwe oKaana maxi oolikalihiwa ni amusi a suwiisa weyiwo onnunwayiwe.
Xanon Abeda a Eritereyiya onkhala o exiki alpino.
Aari wa mukhalelo mmosa a xooku a oKoreya a oSuuli
Muxooku olimpiku yaari atthu ootheene 2.871 ya maatleta (1.581 alopwana, 1.290 athiyana) ya 91 ilapo.
Instituutu aAfrika enni mutthuvela Nyusi ni mamosampikaano mwaha wa olipiha murettele.
dfsfsdfdsfds

Muhooleli a Mosampiikhi, Filipe Nyusi, mamosampikaano ahooniheriwa, nihiku 25, ni Instituutu aAfrika-Ameerika mwaha wa muteko aya wa olipihiwa wa murettele ni temokrasiya, wa niira niiriwe oMusewu ya Ithale sa ephattu, oNoova Yorki.
Otthuveliwa wooniheriwe 65a eKaala ya Instituutu, wohi khala Nusyi wa 73a muthukumano wa Assempeleya ya Ilapo Soowiinana.

Kaaniphavela koonihenreene oxukhurela wahu mwaha wa waakhela etthuveliwo eyo, enrowa olipiha okupwali wahu ni orowa ohoolo ni lipihaka elapo ahu wii ekhalane mukhalelo wa oreera wa atthu ootheene, ni ukuru sahu sa ovuwiha , etemokarasiya olamula wa oreera ni ohiipitihiwa etthu, oohima Nyusi.
Waataana ni Harvart
Okathi ole, Instituutu ele yaahi lepa mwaataano eriyari ya Universitaate ya Harvart ni Universitaate Petakooxika wiira elipihiwe iporoxeetu siniiraneya oMosampiikhi.

Mwaakha wa 1964, nipacenre ekhotto ya woopola elapo ahu, mwaakha wa 1975, elapo aka yoopowa; etthu yootepa orrera okhala ni muhooleli a elapo ni opacera muteko ola ni Universitaate ta Harvart, ohimme Jorge Ferrão, Muhooleli wa Universitaate Petakooxika.
Eriyari ya itthu ikina, yoolayihana enrowa wunnuwiha mukhalelo ahu wa exuttiho wa mwaaruuxi ni sa osoma mwaha wa afrotesitente.
Atakhali oKaapu Telekaatu ampaka itthu sa otakhala ntoko owiiya axiruuxi, onnihima Save the Xiltren.
Ewarakha ya olempwa ya ohikhala alamuli Pritanika enhima wiira wiiyiwa wa axiruuzi mwiirelo musiya wa atakhali oMosampiikhi
LONTERE

Atakhali Xihatista anhaaxa mittetthe sa ohitto wa Mosampiikhi miyaakha miraru sa okisera ni eriyari, aawiiya miloko sa anamwane wa muteko sootakhala mwaakha wa 2020, enhima muxovo wa ikharari pritaaniku Save the Xiltren wa ewarakha yoolempwa elaleyiwe namararu ola, 9.

wiiyiwa wa anamwane icapa masya ni makhalelo othananiha wa mixovo ni ikaruma siniikeliha moohaaxani, ennilepa muxovo, ontumerera wiira mammaru a ekeekhayi tari maalupale waanyiheriwa waya, muniha mwa sa olempwa sikuxiwe ni otholathola mixankiho wa Estaatu Uniitu, AKLET.

Anamwane oophiyera 51, anceene aya axiruuxi aavariwa eprovinsiya ya Kaapu Telekaatu, weyiwo opaca wa amaka eweettinhe atthu 700 miili okhuma okathi opacenraya mahooxo ewiivale atthu imiya miloko miili.

Yiiyiwaka, envahaka namooni oowiiyiwa, ehooxiwaka, yoovihiwaka ni echawaka mixovo sa ikaruma, iya itthu siranenhye sootepa waatutuxa anamawe ni axiruuxi vamosa ni amiravo, ensommwa ewarakha elempwe ni yaasinariwa ni muhooleli wa muthukumano ole Xanse Prikixi
E Save Xildere ootumerara wii yoopoliwe anamwane ootheene yiiyinwe vowaakuveya ni atakhali ale anvara miteko iya evariwe ni eroyihiwe epwaro ya exariya.
Mweeri wa Marsu,akhotto aniira mpantta wa muxovo wa Amaka yahaatakari epooma ya oPalma, ewiiva atthu miloko sene yachawihiha atthu akina numuru noophiya 67 miili yaahinhye inupa saya.
Numuru na eriyari ya atthu achanwe ari anamwane ni numuru na ekeekhayi ya anamwane oowiiyiwa nnookhala nuulupale ovikana ikwaha silaleyiwe.

Eviitiyu emosa elaleyiwe mweeri wa akooxitu mwaakha ovinre ni akhotto, efilimariwe okhuma oMosampiikhi mpakha eRepuuplika Temokraatiku ya Konko, olikanyihiwaka ni esite Intelixense, Kroup, enkhala oEUA, ewoonihenre anamwane araru ni akapwitthi a ekeekhayi, erukururiweene ni atthu atokweene ohoolo wa mpantta wa muxovo wa Amaka.
Ataake emosa yiiriwe mweeri wa Xuunyu wa mwaakha ole ovinre, axiruuxi muloko yaahi kuxiwa erikaka maasi veehimeni, oohima Save The Xiltiri
Ankoola oomwinternasiyonalisari Kisompa
Kisompa oothatuwa ekoma ya ilapo sa okhopela, omphwanyaneya oFransa, Estaatu Uniitu, Ewuroopa onkhuma nsuwa..., onhima namathale a waAmeerika Marissa Moorman.
Tiyoo vuwiheya wa atthu otheene a waAnkoola
Ola opacera paahi, Kisompa onrowa otthayiwene, onnihima namwiipa Tony Amado, ahimaka esirkwiitu ya ekoma ya waAnkoola.
Tony Amado, othokorerya wawe wootheene ori ni Kuturu, exitiilu emukhalihenre ovuwiheya, onni kupwali wii “anayikoma anceene anrowa omutakiha yiipaka exitiilu emosa yele ya Kisompa”.
Nnaamwi arineene okathi munceene ni ekoma ele, Kisompa opacenre ovuwiheya vanceene wa okiserani wa 1980.
Nipuro na opacera opakiwa ekoma ele oLuwanta, okapitaale, maxi ovuwihiwa, ilapo sikina a waAnkoola yokhalihera vanceene, epakaka ifexitivaale sa osuwela vanceene mipantta sinceene sa olumwenku.
Marissa Moorman, purusorra a nikhalelo wa Universitaate ya Intiya, to lempe eliivuru “Intonatiyons”, enlavula mwaha wa ethale ya mukhalelo wa atthu wa ekoma waAnkoola, 1945 wa mahiku anaanano.

Okohakohiwa wa VOA, Moormam oolavula mwaha wa okathi wovuwiheya onceene wa ekoma ya waAnkoola, vamosa ni miyaakha 1940 ni 1950, vawenhaaya okhuma wa mixovo ntoko Nkola Riitimu, si markanri osuulu ni meskla saya sa ikoma sa olimaleliwa ni sa ilapo sikina.
Evinreene nihiku na woopowa, Novempuru wa 1975, anayikoma akina awaAnkoola yahikhalihera miyuupuwelo sa elapo esiya.
Eteekata ya 1980 ahikhalihera, ntoko sinhimaawe nathale Moormam, muupuwelo wa elapo ya Kapinta wa Kuneene.
Maxi, nnaamwi oreene siiso, wahikhala okathi wa ovaanyana, ntoko sinoonihereya ni intuuxitriya ehinsuwanyeya ni Alamuli enkontorolari itthu sootheene.
Mixovo sa ikoma si noopa, maxi sihirina ikuru , onnuupuwela Morman.
Kisompa ni Kuturu sironwe oxintta mikhalelo wa ikoma, ni omala wa ekhotto, epacera ovuhiheya
sireene ikoma sinxintiwa ni amiravo, waatana wa ala ni anayikoma atokweene ikwaha sinceene ti sa onyakulihana
Mooeman otaphelela wii, mpantta mukina eyo enoonihereya mwaha wa anayikoma akhalayi, akhalihenre wa woopowa wa elapo, aniixona ohooneliwa vatthu ni ministeeriyu.
Mwiiwelele:
"Okhwa etthu anlipelelaya atthu ootheene, maxi okhala okathi ohanle na nihiku nanyu khahiyo," Vanessa Bryant
Namukheliwa a Kope Bryant oneeherera oreherera ekumi ni onnihiya mitthaka sa waavaha ikuru ale akhweliwe
Namukhweliwa a namattikha pasketi Kobe Bryant oolavula mwaha wa moota xeeni onivahaawe ikuru sa ovinya, ovinreene mwaakha mmosa okhweliwawe ayiyawe ni mwanawe Gianna.
Wa okohiwani wa eseeriye ya revixita Peyople “Women Changing the World” - Athiyana ampittikuxa olumwenku - Vanessa Bryant onhima wii anaawe axithiyana anninvaha ikuru.
Owo onniivaha ikuru sa opoaka ekumi awe ni anaawe, 18 Bianka,4 ni Capri, orina miyeeri 20.
Otthikelaka vanyimmayiye, Bryant onkhala ohoolo wa Krainty Stuutiyu, muxovo wa mulitimeetiya ya namattikha pasket aahivinxa siiso iporoxertu sa miyuupuwelo sahaamanle.
Owo onnivuwiha muxovo wa ohiphavela musurukhu orina nsina na KobeMampa & Mampasita Sport Fountation awiirelaka apapawe ni mwanawe.
Muxovo wa ikharari onnivaha okathi woolikana wa maateleeta ahinooneliwa vatthu, moonelo wa khalayi wa Kobe.
Vanessa Bryant onlavula mwaha wa moota xeeni onhovaawe ophwanya waarya mweepiphini ni moota xeeni "wiiniwa murima eraaya okathi wa miyuupuwelo sohisuwanyeya".
Oole onnihiya mitthaka okhwa ti waatthu ootheene, maxi okhala okathi wa nihiku nihanle khahiyono. mphwanye enoovahani ikuru.
Yookhala ikume ohiya ohaawa
Ithale muloko sinlavula mwaha wa 60 imilyawu sa atthu anamachawa.

Oweha mayitho anoona ni otheya wa Yusra Madini, namachawa a oSiiriya okathi wa opittikuwa phakiti, ephareya Metiterraneyo akata iwoora iraru mpakha ophiya exerexere ekina yaari etthaya yoolipa, orula ovela wootheene wa 12 iwoora sa ottharana wa muteko ole wa okata.

Yusra ethoni emosa ya muxovo olimpika ya anamachawa ( OTR, ela esikala ni enkelixi), khensuweliwa waari mwaha wa okhalana mwaavano a iyaakha 18 - ni mwaha wa otheya-theya wawe na atthu anceene ni mwaha wa olavula wawe saana enkelixi.

Ole okenle muxovo wa anamaloli aalupale a Olimpiyata a 2016, ntoko otthweliwaawe ni ahooleli a muloko wa olimpiku ni imperensa nnaamwi ekhoottiheriwaka wala anamitthaka a muxovo wa xi neene, khenkhootta omana matata wala waatthapela ma eroyi.

Yolanda Bukasa, onimmana karati a oKonko aahiwale wa hoteele ya oPrasiili ni teekniku awe avoliwa etala mpakha okhalano epaphelo enhima wii namachawa a ekhotto, khanteya, ethoni awe tiyo waleya, ooniheraka etthu eninwereya, nnaamwi oreene siiso, ole onniwera orukunuxa etthu ele eninwerya ni ikuru sawe sa oxintta ophavelaka woonihera wii hiyo anamachawi na pinaatamu ni nookhala oovara miteko sinvariwa ni atthu ootheene ntoko kileliwaka okonferensiya ya anamitthaka namanli
“Kinweha ohoolo waka eyo tenki waniha”, owana wawe wa okisera Yolanda, ni mwaparaawe ni ole oninmana karate, Popole Misenga, owo onni kakwa otheya-theya wawe wa muxovo ole.
“Kootteeliwa murima oPrasiili, kinkhala ootteeliwa murima mmuttettheni, ni amwaaraka ni vano mwaana mmosa, ootheene a oPrasiili”, okileela Popole.

Aphiya oVila Olimpika wa niira na otthapeliwa wa owra saana, a ORT yaahi rukureriwa ni anamuteko a olaleya mitthaka, ootheene ahu naaphavela elatarato, nlove nimosa, maxi masekuransa yaamuniphunya ni anamarehera ikwaha sinceene yaaninleela yiiraka xontte, mutthekule vampuhanyu niira nla.
Oreene siiso, namitthaka mmosa a oXiina alavula saana ekunya ahinvaha Popole ilatarato sa anamwane a elapo awe ohima wii ilatarato iye sahinvaha ikuru wa ithale sa omuxintta karate.
Wu kaahiwera omutheyiha mutthu a oKonko ni yoohimmwa emosa: “nkireere otteeliwa mirima ni oXapawu khareere atthu ankitthara”.
Iri muloko ithale saovaha ikuru sa oxintta, sa ekhotto, ya otthikela oyariwa, iyo sinthonyihera 60 imilyawu sa atthu amphavela paahi okala ni murettele ni wooneliwa vatthu vakhaani.
Khampavela etthu ekina waahikhala wooniwa ntoko pinaatamu, wooneliwa vatthu ni ottittimihiwa ntoko atthu.
Muxovo Olimpika ya anamachawa a ekhotto, Riyu-2016
Vawenhaawe ithoni saya, otheya-theya waya, ithonyihero saya, woona etthu ahinooniheraya, wokhalela okhala oRiiyu te Xaneyiro ni okawana iminuutu ni muxovo olimpika wa anamachawa a ekhotto.
Yookhala ikume ohiya ohaawa
FIIFA onnakhulela wii oopaka manyala ni okoolu ya Fred ni Kamarawu
Mwiirelo wa televisau yoohel munlaano wa fora de xooku okhuma wa nnawu na noolopwana ya David Luiz, yaarowa a okhala opacera wa poola.

Muhooleli a Tekinoloxiya ya mitthaka ya FIIFA- Niclas Ericson - ohakhulela olelo manyala a televisawu ofisiyaale ya muxovo wii, oluluwanya mukano oheliwe, yooniherenye wii Prasileyiro Fred aaphwanyaneya ota wa imphira wa ekoolu ohenlaawe ni Kamarawu nsana, nihiku 23.
Nahinyakulihana ni ekiipa ya protusawu okhala wii mukano eopakiwe khiwakhalenle.
Waari nthoriho noohikhalela.
Manyala annikhumelela, ohima Ericson, oleeliweene wii mukano waareerela opakiwa okhuma wa opacera wa poola omuhiya xokatore(David Luiz) onvanhe poola Fred.
Ninkupwali wii nookhalano maprotutoore oosuwela muteko aya
Khula protutoore ookhala oopaka manyala, ninniweha yootakhala ela.
Yookhala yooheliwa mukano woohi khalela.
Ninvara muteko wii ekhumeleleke vakhaani atakhaaxera.
Nnaamwi ekhumelenle manyala, owo oohima wii khonrowa ohiya woonikera ilanse soowaanyiheriwa okhala wii muteko ovekiwe ni itelevisawu onoonihera eKoopa.
A HBS (Host Prowatkaxit Syxitem) a haakhulela mahiku avinre wii woonihera wa nenli wii yooniwe areene ota wa imphira, khahiyono 10 por sento ya ororomeleya, opaka manyala ori muhina mwa pinaatamu
Ohima wa Ericson, onookhala okhaliheriwa wa maprotutoore wii olikihe muteko ola.
Muxankiho mukina waari ni ekra sa ekampo Mane Gariincha woonihera elanse
Ikwaha sinceene, wooniheriwa imphira, khenooneya ilanse sinkhanle sookumiha onyakulihana, wii atthu ale aninweha poola wala ale ammuttikha, ehikhale oomutumerera arpitu.
