Atthu akinaaku alumenle etthu ohiyu wa nsana, nihuku neettaaya 28 mweeri wa Fevereeru ari:
Netflix!

Miteko sa streaming ophura iwooro xexe mwaha wa efiilimi ya nsina ´´The Crow´´; efiilimi enilavula mwaha wa muthiyana mmosa onimuttilkha mpira wa xaaterexi, mphiira yoola oniiriwa ´´ The Queen´´s Gabit´´,ophura tho mureerelo wookhala naviitiyu woosuwaneya mwaha wa viitiyu yeela eniitthaniwa ´´ The Chigago 7 Trial´´; ni ophurela tho wooro eviitiyu ya nsina ´´ Ma Rainey´´s Black Bottom´´ ni woomaliherya opurela mureerelo fiilimi ya nsina ´´I Care a Lot´´ ni opurela mureerelo mwaha wookhala namapaka woosuwela wa efiilimi sowaatta.

Nikhuru na Disney, noopurela mureerelo wootthuniwaxa wa Wooro mwaha wa oreera wa efiilimi yeela yeela epakiwe ti Nomadland, ni ettharelanaka ophurela mureerelo mwaha wookhala namapaka osuwela wa efiliimi, masi vaavo tho, muthiyana mmosa onaakhula nsina na Chloe Zhao, yoola muthiyana opacerya wa elapo ya Asiya ophurenle muraarelo eyaakha ya 1984 mwaha wi ahaakhela ewooro mwaha wookhala namapaka osuwelaxa wa efiilimi.
Mphira yoola wa CAN-2021, elapo ya Kaapu Veeriti yoophiya oxiye ni yoophwanyaneya ekacamiheyaka.
Nikhuru na anamphira anaakhula nsina na Garanhoes yohaalola anamphira akinaaku anaasimwa Tubaroes Azuis 1-0.
YAOUNDÉ —

Nikhuru na anamphira a elapo ya OKaapu - Veeriti khaweryanse ekharimpwiwa ittikitti saya wi amuttikhe mphira wa ephantte thanu na tthaaru yoola onittikhiwa elapo yeela ya Afirika (CAN) 2021 ni alolasiwa namathanu, mahiku ettaaya 13, ni anamphira OPuru- Kinafaasu 1 -0.

Ahenle ekoolo ari namphira mmosa onaakhula nsina na Boureima Bande okathi weettaaya 38 minuutu opaceryaka mphira yoola, ekoola yeela yoomuvaha olola Purukina - Faasu, nkumaano yoola woomuhela Kaapu - Veeritinkhuru A, ni ipontu tthaaru, seyiya atthukulannaye amuvaka olola Etiyoopiya.
Anamphira ale anaasimwa Os Tubarões Azuis anirowa omuttikha ni anamphira elapo ya Kamarooxi yaala omaliha alola ni aniphwanyaneya orowaka ohoolo, noomulola Etiyoopiya 4-1.
Okathi yoopacerya, anamphira yaale anaasimwa Garahoes ahoonaneya amuttikhasaka saana, okathi yoola kwarata-reeti aya ahivara saana.
Sangare teve duas oportunidades de marcar mas sem êxito.
Okathi woomaliha, Kaapu - Veeriti ahimuttikha saana mphira okathi weettaaya 50 minuutu, masi owerya nno aatthuna otthikiha ololiwa wiiranen´´ye mahiku avinre.
Ekiipa khayakhilanthi vapanko okathi woomuttikha mphira ni ekiipa ekinaaku.
Kaapu- Veeriti ahiwerya na ahimuttikha saana mphira wakathi weettaaya 20 minuutu.

Ni mmphurelo ola, nuumulola Etiyoopiya wuupaceryani mphira yoola avaraninwe ni Purukina Faasu ( Purukiina Faasu ahiloliwa ni ekiipa ya Kamaroxi) , Kaapu -Veeriti ni Purukiina Faasu ari mphantte wa 2.º ni ipontu sene 3.
Anawiipe annikuxa acipo saya anarowasa wiipa elapo
Mahuku ala, mutthu onniweha elapo onkilantheene owaani, erretta yeela ya Koronaviiru, yoowumpelela atthu otheene wi akhalase mmawanya aya, mukwarutu ni musaala.

“Niire sayi?”, ala muulumo atthu otheene anikohaaya, masi anawiipa otheene a elapo anniphavela namuna yoowasiveliha ni owaatteliha murima atthu: mwaha wi, anawiipe yaala annikuxa mureerelo anaaruuhela atthu yaala oovelavela nlaponi.
Sookhala muupuwelelo soowaatta nlaponi mwahu ni elapo sikinaaku.

Elapo ya Okaapo Veeriti, mahiku eettaya, 5 ni 11 mweeri wa Apiriili, anamwiipi oophiyelela 70 elapo sootheene anirowa okuxa ecipo saya arumeelaka Ixitagaramu wakathi yiiraneyaya nthukumano wiihaniwa Vanyukhu.

Avinreene mahiku thanu na piili, khula namwiipe aniipa owanya awe oonelaka okathi wa 30 minuutu, anawiipe yaala avarasa muteko yoola atthunasaka ophwana musurukhu wi aroyihe oxipiritaali avahasiwe atthu aniwereyiwa eretta yeela ya koronaviiru.

Namwiipe mmosa onaakhula nsina na Alberto Koenig wa elapo ya Kaapu - Veeriti yoola onnirowiha ohoolo mukhalelo wooreera mwaha wi anaavarelela atthu mwaha ecipo sawe, namwiipe yoola ohuuluma wi muthukumano yoola wa anawiipe, onirowa wiiraneya onitthuniwa akupaariwe atthu yaale ari nkhaya ni otthuniwaka musurukhu wi okawiwe mulaponi.
Wiiwa macipo
Khula namwiipe, etthareliwaka muulumo antthuna olavuliwa olelo, onirowa wiipa 3 minuutu ´´ okathi yoola onirowwawe wiipa ecipo awe atthuna onnithoonyiherya khula etthu ontthunawe wooniherya´´.

" Atthu owaatta apacerya otthara muteko yoola wa wiipa ni othoonyiherya, mwaha wi wiipa wenno nkhalelo wooreeraxa", muulumo ala alavuliwa ni mulopwana mmosa onaakhula nsina na Alberto Koenig, ni mulopwana yoola onnikupali wi anawiipe otheene “ annunuwiha elapo ni anaaxuttiha ”.
Elapo ya Mosapiiki, ecipo etthu emosa yaavarelenle ni waakupaarela atthu okathi wa koronaviiru.
Ecipo etthu emosa enixakiha iretta.

Namwiipo mmosa anaakhula nsina na Feliciano dos Santos, yoola annilamula namuna soowaxakiha atthu mulaponi, olavula iraka ´´ okhala wi atthu oteene akhalano owerya wa Muluku wowuuluma itthu anoonaaya ni iye sinaawereya, anawiipe mpakha alepe ecipo saya atthuna wi avarelele atthu yaala ahikhanle saana´´
Santos Calisto

Santos Calistos ni axapara awe a nikhuru Massukos, yaala anikhumasa elapo ya Niyaasa, onnirowiha ohoolo, anrumeelaka raatiyu, tilivisaawu ni reeti sociyaale, awaalakaka ´´atthu wi anyawase wiira omeelo ehaaphanye eretta´´.

Ehapari iya siniruuhiwa ni nikhuru na Massukos silempwe vacipo nniihaniwa ´´ tissambe manja´´ ( ninyawihe matata ahu´´, esumana ela ´´nikhuru nenla nohaasimwa ni National Geographic wiira niire mpantta wa owaasomiha atthu mwaha wa eretta yeela ya koronaviiru.

Ehapari sa mmuttetteni siniruuhiwa mwaha wa ecipo khikhanle etthu mulopwana yoola Santos onitikhinaawe, ni ayaakha ya 2008, opurela ni aphwanyerya muraarelo ameerika Goldman, mwaha wa ecipo awe yeela enilavula mwaha wa wooreriha mmuttetteni.

Santos olavula ohimyaka wi niwane ekhoto mwaha wa eretta yeela ya Koronaviiru, ni akhulupale a mulaponi akhale atthu ´´aniwuupuwelela atthu yaala ahikhalanne televisawu wala raatiyu´´ muhina wa elapo ya Niyaasa ni mapuro makinaaku a elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
Komuuriyana vaava purukaraama ´´Masuwelo´´
Elapo ya Afirika lusoofona yoohira mpantta wa mphira yoola wa elapo sotheene.
Anamphira a elapo ya Okaapu Veeriti ni Ankoola ni mwiixuttihi mmosa wa poola yoola oyariwe elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Mmwaathanle wa anamphira a elapo ya Afirika yeela enilavuliwa nttaava na Ekunya ehiira mpantta elapo ya Ruusiya, masi akhala anamphira ayarasiwe elapo ya Kaapu Veeriti ni Ankoola anirwaasaka okati wootheene mapuro yaala onittikhiwa mphira.

Ekiipa ya elapo ya Porutukaale tiyeela erinano anamphira owaatta yaala akinaaku anikhumasa ´´ elapo sookhopela´´, masi nave Ekiipa ya Suwiisa yookhalana anamphira owaatta a elapo sikinaaku ni mwiixutihi wa mphira oyariwe variyari wa afirika lusoofonu.

Ekiipa ya OPortukaale, okhalano namphira mmosa anaakhula nsina na Manuel Fernandes yoola oyariwe elapo ya Lixipoowa, masi amusi aye ayarasiwe elapo ya Kaapu Veeriti, mwaha vaavo namphira ola okhalano ilapo piili.
Namphira yoola Fernandes onintthika poola variyari wa kampu ni oniira mpantta wa kiipa ya Lokomotiv de Moscovo.
Moono weelopwana wa ekampu onniphwanyaneya attikhaka namphira Ricardo Pereira, ni yoola onittikha mukerekhere, namphira ola oyariwe elapo ya OLixipoowa ni axipapa awe elapo aya OKaapu Veeriti.
Mahuku ala, namphira yoola onttikha ekiipa ya Leichester, ya elapo ya Nkalateera.
Namphira João Mário, oyariwe elapo ya OPoorutu, yoola mwaana wa atthu ayariwe elapo ya Ankoola ni olelo okhalana eyaakha 25 amuttikhaka mphira ekiipa ya West Ham.
Ekiipa ya ´´das quinas´´ yookhalana nave anamphira ayili ahiyarasinwe elapo yeela ya Porutukaale.
Gelson Martins namphira mmosa oyarinwe elapo ya Kaapu veeriti ni Wiiliam Carvalho oyariwe Ankoola epooma ya Luwanta.
Anamphira yaala ayili, mpakha olelo anttikha ekiipa ya Sporting wa Purutukaale.
Enuulumiwatho wi ekiipa ya elapo ya Suwiisa onniira mpantta namphira mmosa a elapo ya Kaapu Veeriti, onaakhula nsina Gelson Fernandes, yoola oyarinwe epooma ya Paraaya.

Naahiyaka axapara awe a ekiipa, namphira yoola Fernades, okathi amutthikhelaawe mphira ekiipa ya Eintracht Frankfurt elapo ya (Alemaanya), okathi inraawe mpantta wa neeraru wa mphira wa elapo sotheene, nootthika elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli ni OParasiili.
Nmphira William ophwanyaneya ekwaha ya piili eraka mpantta wa mphira yoola wa elapo sotheene.
Noonelaka mwaha wa amwixuttihi a mphira, ninoona wi Carlos Queirós, yoola oniwiixutiha anamphira ya Irawu, oyarinwe elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Nthukumano IX onnithoonyerya namuna sa Soosoma ni Opaka itthu elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Nthukumano ola wahoolelinwe ni mukhulupale Miniixituru Woopacerya, Aires Ali ni yoola ontthuna alamula mapurelo a masomi ni waaruhela atthu atthuna ovara muteko soosoma ni osomiha.
mapuro anivariwa miteko sa Kuveeruno ni soohikhala.

Nkhulupale, Minixituru wa namuna Soosoma ni Opaka itthu elao ya Mosampiiki, Rufino Gujamo nhooleli wa Moonihero onikumaanyiha , muhina wa itenta suulupale sootekiwa vaxikola Sekuntaariya Josina Machel, elapo ya OMaputu.

Moonihero woosuwaneyaxa tuule wa Nxituutu tu Kurasawu, ICOR, exikola yeela ennoonaneya evaraka muteko enivira olelo iyaaka 10 erumeelaka masomelo oosuwaneya saana, ntoko, waavoniha atthu ni wiira mpantta wowaasomiha atthu elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
Opacerya waya ovara muteko, Ixitituutu yeela yohaavoniha aretta ophiyelela 800, mwaha vaavo, avukuwa vanceene okhwa wa atthu mulaponi.

Etthu yootepaxa oreera, ntoko alavulaye Biatriz Fereira, nkhulupale wa Nxitituutu yeela, mwaha wa nikhuru na atthu anivara muteko exipiritaale yeele okhala yaale ahinivara miteko ixiripitaali sikinaaku, ni yaala, mameetiku osomaxa a elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
Nthoohero yoola anniira mpantta nave atthu a elapo sikinaaku.
Elapo siniira mpantta tiiya, Ankoola ni Afirika tu Suuli.
Wa elapo ya Ankoola, anniira mpantta nikhuru nimosa na atthu 15, yaala ankhalamo mapurusoore ni atthu akinaaku osoma.
Nikhuru nenla ninvareleliwa ni Minixiteeriyu tu Ensiinu Superiyoore ni Siyensiya Tekonoloxiiya
Univerisitaati emosa tiile ya Kuveerunu, yeele ya Agostinho Neto, ni ekinaaku khikhanle, tiile eniihaniwa Belas.
Mulopwana mmosa anaakhula nsina na Domingos da Silva Neto, mukhulupale wa namuna soophavela osuwela, Minixiteeriyu yeela ya Ankoola ohuuluma ahinyaka wi atthu otheene tootteliwa murima.
Muthiyana mmosa anaakhula nsina na Tatiana Lima ohiya wiira mpantta ORiiyu - 2016.
Nave, Judoca guinense ololiwa ni mwaapara awe wa elapo ya Kasakixitawu.
Judoca wa elapo ya Kine-Pisawu, Taciana Lima ololiwa esumana ela, mahiku ettaaya 6, mphira wa Cooku Olimpiku a ORiiyu-2016 amuttikhaaya ni ekiipa ya Otgontsetseg Galbadrakh, elapo ya Kasakixitawu.
Mphira ole oneettiwa atthu awanaka ekhotto, akhalamo anamphira anilemela 46 ikiilusene, masi okathi woowaniwa apisanse iminuutu thanu na tthaaaru ni omalenle aloliwaka namphira mmosa.

Ehinapaceriwe ekhotto, nahimuulumana mukhulupale wa DOA, yoola oveleelihiwe elapo ya Kine Pisaawu aphwanyaneyaka ORiiyu-2016, Renato Mouro, yoola okupali wi ´´namphira yoola olonle okhalane ekuru sinceene amuvikana namawanana mukhwa awe´´, yoola ololinwe apacenre saana ekhotto yeela ya mphira.
Moura, ohuulumatho ahimyaka wi miyo kookupali wi judoca guineese ahiphiyelela okathi woolola, masi yoola ololiwa mwaha wi mphira yoola wa Cooku Olimpiku ari woopacerya wa namphira yoola.
Taciana Lima oyariwe elapo ya Olinda, epooma ya Perenampuuku nkhalelo awe nampira yoola tuwa oreera osuwela.
Olinda yoola ohuwiwe ni amama awe, khamusuwenle papa awe, onunwaawe, eyaakha ya 2077 anamuhaavya mutereneetini.
Okathi woomuhavya papa awe, Taciana ahiphwanya nsuwelo wi mulopwana yoola ahirwa elapo ya Parasiili osoma eyaakha 1980, eyaakha yeela omusuwenlaawe mama awe anarupala erukulu ya Taciana.
Mulopwana mmosa onaakhula nsina na Oscar Suca Balde otthikela elapo oyarinwawe ophiyaka onaliyala vatthu akhalawe mwana awe.
Mulopwana yoola ahitthikela elapo ya OPararasiili wi amuthole mwaaseta awe ni mwana awe, masi khaphwanyanse.
Omusuwenwe papa awe wi onivara Osakaratari wa ipeexika, Taciana Lima ahirowa mpakha wuuwu amusuwela, vaavo tukupanlaawe nsina na nawe ni othamela elapo ya Kine-Pisaawu.
Mahiku ala, Tatiana onaakiheya elapo ya Kine - Pisaawu, mwaha wa elapo yeela, Tatiana onnilola ni apurelaka mureelelo wooreera mmuphirani. wootheene wa Afirika.
Nikhuru na ONU, nootthapela ovahiwaka mphurelo mulopwana anaakhula nsina na Aldo Marchesini, yoola meetiku ni nlupa wa tiini (phaatiri).
Mulopwana yoola ahithanliwa ni nikhuru na ONG elapo ya Mosampiiki nenla nnnlavula mwaha wa athiyana, othanliwa nno waari mwaha wa mitewko onivavarayiye elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.

Meetiku onaakhula nsina na Pedro Andre Machesini wa elapo ya Itaaliya , yoola onikhala elapo ya Mosampiiki, ni purokaraama woosoma wa mulopwana mmosa onaakhula nsina na Jonh Hopkis , ahaakhelasa olelo, mahiku ettaaya 12, epooma ya Noova Yooriki, mphurelo wooreera wa Atthu a nikhuru na Nações Unidas 2024.
Dr.
Mulopwana mmosa anaakhula nsina na Marchesini, oyariwe elapo ya Itaaliya, onivara muteko elapo ya Mosmpiiki opacerya eyaakha ya 1974 ni mahiku ala onikhala epooma ya Zampeeziya.
Othanliwa wawe wi apurele nreerelo wa ONU wuupuwelelinwe eyaakha ya 1981 wi asuwelaxe makhalelo wala miteko sa ekumi sa atthu mulaponi.

Othanliwa wa mulopwana yoola wiirinwe ni nikhuru na athiyana a elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki, yaala anivaanyiha ni olamulela namuna soolikana wa atthu mulaponi atthunasaka wi osuweliwe muteko wa namasoma ole.
Meetiku mmosa anaakhula nsina na Marchesini, yoola oniloola eretta ya fixituula opexitetirika elapo ya Mosampiiki, muteko ola onnaakhaliherya athiyana ekumi aya.
Marchesini, ohaaxuttiha mameetiku otheene anivara miteko elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
Meetiku yoola nave, aphavela musurukhu wi avonihe aretta ni oliva arowaka owaani, olya ni othuma ikuwo.
Okathi yaawaniwaya ekhotto, Meetiku.
Meetiku Marchesini, kharo woona ekoyi mwaha wi emaara sinceene ahiiyiwa anatthuna otumihiiwa elapo sikinaaku.

Miteko onivarewe soomuvaha mphurelo, mphurelo mmosa-mmosa tuule oruule elapo ya ya Itaaliya, mphurelo nkinaaku ewarakha ya elapo ya MosampiikiA, ewarakha yeela elempwe Otiresaawu Porovinsiyaale ya elapo ya Zampeesiya
Mutthu mukinaaku ophurenle murerelo ti wa purokararaama wa Jonh Hopkis yoola onuuluma namuna sa osoma ekumi elapo sotheene.

Noovira iyaakha 40, porokaraama yoola ahavarelela atthu ophiyelele 160 , atthu yaala ari elapo ya Mosampiiki ni mahiku ala, porokaraama yoola onnivara miteko na atthu 30, elapo ya Mosampiiki ni ilapo sikinaaku.
Porokararaama yoola owiixuttiha atthu anivara oxipiritaali ophiyelela miloko mithanu.
Atthu anikhala epooma ya Riiyu ti Caneeru annunla mwaha woomoliwa manupa anikhalaaya.
Elapo ya Riiyu ti Caneeru enniwaakhelela atthuyaala anirwa omoona mphira wa Cooku Olimpiku iyaakha seyiya piili, mwaha yoola manyakunyaku khanimala nanaano.
Mphira wa elapo ya OParasiiii ni elapo sikinaaku, muupuwelelo wa mphira onnooanaya mmuttettheni wotheene.
Mphira yoola nave onnihiya manyakunyaku mwaha woowakhiwa inupa sa atthu okathi ettiwa mphira.
Nkhalelo yooa woowapwetheya atthu itthu saya , wootthikela okathi anamphira OParasiii ittottelasaaya atthunasaka orowa omuttikha mphira wa Cooku oimpiku epooma ya Riiyu ti Caneeru, eyaakha ya 2016.
Nttetthe wa Awutotoroom, nttetthe mmosa okhalanne atthu awaataana wa emusi ni makhalelo aya atthu yaala poovelavelasa.
Nttetthe yoola opattuxiwe mwaha wa mphira yoola wootthyawiwa , mwaha wa ilapo sikinaaku sumuttikha wenno . Olelo ennivira iyaakha 40 nttetthe ola okhanlanleene ni attikhiwaka mpira.
Ekampu yeela yaattikhiwa mphira yoola yoopwexakasiwa.
Kuveerunu wa elapo yeela onniphwanyaneya awoomolaka atthu ophiyelela 500 anikhala epooma yeela.
Atthu owaatta akhumasa mmawanya aya, mwaha wi inupa saya siroopwexiwasiwa.
Woomoliwa wa atthu ettharelanaka ni opwexasiwa manupa aya orumme Kuveerunu mwaha wi yoola onitthuna oteka ekampu yuulupale wi attikhiwemo mphira wa Cooku Olimpiku wa eyaakha ya 2016.
Nave atthu owaatta anikhala nttetthe yoola wa Awutotoroomo anikhotta okuma ni ohiya impa saya.
Muthiyana mmosa onaakhula nsina na Jane Nscimento oniira mpatta wa nikhuru na Asosiyasaayu ya atthu anikhaa elapo yeela ovekela wi eruuhiwe inerexiiya , avekalaka wi Kuveerunu aruuhea atthu otheene.
Kuveerunu ohuuluma wi onitthuna mathala wi ateke ekampu ya Cooku Olimpinku.
Tadeu mulopwana mmosa nave onikhala nttetthe yoola, mulopwana ola omuvanyiha Kuveerunu yoola.
Tadeu yoola onnihimya wi ekeekhayi wa elapo yeela eitthuna mathala oreera okhalana itthu sooreeera.
Mathala yaala ahaano akhalanaka inupa sooreera, mapuro anivariwa miteko ni sinitumihiwa itthu soolipaxa saana.
Muopwana mmosa onaakhula nsina na Peixoto, oliva musurukhu woophiyelela ikontho 10 sa elapo sa Ameerika, alivelevaka empa awe , enivira olelo olelo 21 iyaakha sene.
Olelo empa yeela enihimwa musurukhu woowatta saana.
Mulopwana yoola onnihimyatho wi, olakenle olipelela mwaha wi empa awe yeela enoolinvwa musurukhu wowaatta.

Okathi atthokeliwaaya mphira wa elapo sotheene arowa wiiraneya eyaakha ya 2014, kuveerunu ahiwoomola atthu atthu owaatta mmawanya aya nttetthe wa Riiyu ti Caneeru ni ipooma sikinaaku sa elapo ya Oparasiili.
Woomoliwa nno wa atthu mmawanya aya wahiruuha manyakunyaku mwaha wi atthu yaala oomoliwa anuuluma ahinyaka wi muraarelo yoola wa mphira itthu sinaaruhela oreera atthu yaala okhalana musuruku.

Epooma ya Riiyu ti Caneero tiyawakhelenle anamphira owaatta akhuma ilapo sikinaaku iyaakha seyiya piili, mwaha yoola, manyakunyaku kharowa omaala nanaano. E com o Rio de Janeiro como anfitrião dos Jogos Olímpicos dentro de dois anos, estas manifestações não deverão acalmar tão cedo.
Anmwiipi a elapo ya Ankoola annivekela ´´travao´´ wi iipe ecipo enilavula namuna soothelaana.
Atthu akinaaku annuuluma wi enikhala ntoko enooniwa efiilimi ya epwiti wala malavi oreene nave muusika.
Elapo ya Ankoola ennoonaneya nkacamiho mwaha wowaatta icipo sinoonihera namuna sa epwiti wala malavi.
Atthu akinaaku annuuluma wi enikhala ntoko enooniwa efiilimi ya epwiti wala ya malavi oreene nave muusika.
Muusika sinceene, savira minuutu miili wala miraru, itthu sinihimwamo tisoonanara, muulumo ala ahimwe na atthu akinaaku.
Nuulumo ´´Nkintthuna´´ nihimwe ni mmiravo onimurumiha viyola, yoola oyariwe epooma ya Luwanta ni anaakhula nsina na Félix Costa.
Nihuku nootthapeliwa namuna sa muusika, nniiraneya nihuku neettaka 1 mweeri wa Owutuupuru, nikhuru nimosa na anawiipe ahuupuwelela mwaha wa meettelo a muusika wa elapo ya Ankoola.
“ Itthu sinikhumelela elapo ela ya Ankoola khayi itthu sooreera ni soovirikana ni iye saatthariwa ni atthu yaale a khalayi.

Mapuru wala inupa seyiye enittharela namuna sowiipa mpakha sohaana sonaxaxaka saana namuna iya ni attharela exariya´´ muulumo ala alavuiwe ni namwiipe anaakhula nsina na Bruno Netho, yoola nave purusoore wa muusika, yoola tho alavula ahimya wi ´´ anamwiipe anceene khaniipa itthu sooreera, yaala aniipa itthu sa malavi wala epwiti ni itthu sooruwana, atthu yaala akhala ntoko anivekela ephaawu.
Netho ohuuluma tho wi ´´ Nohaano niwewehaka saana makhalelo yaala a wiipa elapo ahu ela´´.

Mookwaxa wa muteko yoola wa muusika Caros amartine, ohuuluma wi ´´ moota onihononiwaaya muteko ahu yoola wowiipa, kinnoova omeelo ohiphwanyeryatho etthu ni kinnimuvrkela Kuveerunu wi onooxaxe saana nkhalelo yoola.

“ Muttetthe ahu anniwereyiwa, siiso anamwiipe ahu, naapaceryaka ale anipacerya wiipa, ninnaavekela wi ahiipeke icipo sooruwana wala iye sinooniherya epwiti ni itthu soonanara, ´´ muuumo ala alavuliwa ni Belmiro Carlos, namwiipe ni namapaka mususika.
Namwiipe yoola ohuulumatho wi ´´ khinitthuniwa wi ntoko musika seyiya sinipakeliwa anamwene wala alweene.
Anawiipe owaatta anipwanyaneya okacamiheya murima mwaha mwaha wa nkhaleo yoola ni yaala annuuluma wi ´´ makhalelo yaala tooriipiha murima, hiyo khaninsuwea´´.

Muulumo anawiipe yaala anni ´´ itthu soohononeya ni atthu otheene annoona itthu seyiya: muusika soohononeya iphantte sotheene, oraruwelaniwa, wiivananiwa ni ihapari sikinaaku sa muusika seyiya sinuuluma nkhalelo woovirikana ni iye sa elapo ahu. Atthu! waakuveliwe muteko ahu ola, noovelavela.
Anawiipe annivekela ikano sa muusika wa elapo ya Ankoola
Mwiiwelele vaava:
Mooro woopatthiha musewu ihononeyamo itthu sowaatta saari mmusewuni muumu.
Itthu sowaatta saari mmusewu muumu soopatta ni itthu seyiya khinisuwanyeya isapu aya.
Mooro yoola opattinhe Musewu yoola khuwaareera waatta, ni ehasara ela yiiranen´ye nttetthe wa Poowa Vixita, epooma ya Sawu Kirixitaavawu, waattamela epooma ya Riiyu ti Caneero, ohiyu wa Ituminku.
Mooro yoola ottipihinwe namararu yeela.
Empa yeele enaasimwa pisentinaaria yaahirumeeliwa okathi mooro yoola waapattaaya wi akelihiwemo atthu yaale savyiyaale impa saya.
Atthu owaatta kharo opwetheyiwa ni itthu saya mwaha wa mooro yoola.
Itthu sowaatta saphwanyaneya mmusewu , seyiya isapu aya tiya ikonto 20 sohoovyi sotheene.
Nikhuru nenla na itthu soovya, sinnoonaye itthu seyiye sakkhalayi, ntoko manyaka, atthu awuumihiwa ni ikarataawu sa khalayi, iwarakha....
Akhulupale anivarelela Musewu yoola ni nikhuru na amapompeero alaavula wi khakha mutthu onne oweryeya mwawa wa mooro yoola.
Akhala atthu axexe arisa nipuro nenle naapatta mooro, masi yaala ahikhumasa ahonne owereya.
Atotoropa ahuuluma wi ikaruma seyiye sinittipiha mooro saareyiwe mmsusewu muumu khasavanre muteko, ni seyiya sookacamiha muteko okati waattipihiwaaya mooro yoola.

Nkhulupale wa atoropa yaala amapompeero ni sekeretaari wa atoropa elapo yeela ya Riiyu ti Caneero, Roberto Robadey, olavula wi mooro yoola khuro waariipiha murima atthu, mwaha wi oro opaha Musewu wootheene ohiyu wa Tuminku.
“Nihuku nimosa konnaka onanara, koopaceraro ovara muteko .
Hiyo ninnikupali wi itthu seyiya sihononen´ye Musewu saahikhalana nreerelo wooreera.
Axipapa aka akiruuha vava.
Miyo kinnuupuwela wi, kireene mwaana, kahoona nikhuwa nuulupale na Paleya.
Mahiku yaala avinre, miyo koomuruuha mwana aka neettakasa mmusewuni wootheene.
Itthu sootheene narinaahu mmusewuni soonipwetheya ni ovoluwa mmusewu muumu etthu yowoopiha.
Enooneya etthuura, itthu sotheene tisoovya´´ , olakiherya.
Enoorowa ophaveliwa etthu ephattunxe mooro yoola.

Mapuluusa atthukulu puruseesu, yeela enirowiha ohoola ni Telekasiiya ya namuna sa oxaka nttetthe ni impa sa Kuveerunu, yeela enirowa ophavela osuwela moota xeeni yiiranen´ye wala opacenre mooro yoola.
Musewu yoola opahenye saahikhalamo itthu sowaatta sa khalayi sa elapo yeela ya Parasiili.

Noonelaka wa itthu seyiya sivyaale mmusewu, ninpacerya makhuva atthu akhalayi yaala aphwanyiwe elapo yeela, patisato ya ´´Luusiya´´; nikhuru na itthu sa khalayi sa elapo ya Exipitu, seyiya saavithulinwe ni nkhulupale Dom Pedro I; itthu sa khalayi ntoko ikarataaxi sa atthu yaala awanihe ekotto; nikhuru na itthu soovirikana.
Nkhulupale wa musewu yoola, Paulo Knuss, ohuuluma ahimyaka wi mooro yoola wooruuha´´ ohaawa´´.
"Ohaawa wooriipiha murima.
Mmusewu muumu sahikhala itthu soottittimiheya ni sihinvya.
Yaahikhala pipiliyoteeka yooreera.
Itthu saaphwanyaneya mmusewu muumu khasari sa elapo ya Riiyu nnakhala Oparasiili.
Itthu seyiya sipahen´ye saniruuha mureerelo wa elapo sotheene.
Elapo ahu ela khikhanle puliitika enaakiha musewu sahu´´ muuumo ala ahimwa ni Paulo Knauss.
Namphira yoola anaakhula nsina na Mesi otthukeliwa mwiyeeri 21, masi nave yoola oleveleliwa.
Otthukiwa wa Mesi yoola waari mwaha woohiliwa mpoxito ni ahiireliwa wi alepe ewarakha aroyihe OTiripunaale Supereemu.
Namphira yoola wa elapo ya Arixentiina, Leonel Messi ni papa awe , Jorge Messi, atthukhasiwa myiyeeri 21 mwaha woowoka, yaala atthukasiwe ni tripunaale ya elapo ya Pareseloona.
Otthukiwa wenno, onoophiyelela olevelaliwaka, mwaha wa exariya ya elapo ya Xipaanya enihimya wi mutthu mpakha atthukeliwe wansera myiyeeri 24.
Otthukiwa wa atthu yaala wiiranen´ye namararu, mahiku ettaaya 6, ni anamatthukiwa yaala avahiwa otthuna wi alepa ewarakha oroyihe Otripunaale Supereemu.
Namphira yoola ni papa awe ahiiwasiwa ni Otiripunaale mwaha wa owoka finansa ya elapo Xipaanya musurukhu woophiyele ikonto 4, 1 mwaha wa iratarato sa namphira yoola eyaakha ya 2007 ni 2009.
Okathi alavulayiye Otripunaale, namphira yoola ahihimya wi khaasuwenle itthu seyiya siiraneya, mwaha wi amukupnli apapa awe wi eetthihe itthu sotheene .

Nikhuru na atthu yaala aniwaakiha atthu otthukiwa, avekelasa wi atthukuliwe evukuliwe myiyeeri seyiya atthukelaninnwaaya, avahiwe myiyeeri 10 papa awe, masi ativokaatu wa elapo ya Xipaanya atumererya wi sikhale 22 wa khula mutthu.
Nlelo khuxaale wi ovekeliwe muswamaha wa eteeni, muulumo ola alavuliwe ni Joaquim Chisaano.
Elavuliwaka namuna ya nyakunyaku ya elapo, Joaquim Chissano ohimya wi etthu yooreera wiiwanana.

Peresitenti yoola ettinhe elapo ya Mosampiiki ekhalayi, Joaquim Chissano, onuupuwela wi nlelo khuxiiye wi avekeliwe nswamaha atthu yaala anilokiha elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki, ni ohaavekela anamalokiha yaala wi elevelele elapo yeea.
Chisaano ohuuluma wi musurukhu yoola ovekeiwa nlelo khunavareliwe muteko.
Alavulasaka akhulupale a elapo yeele, eriyari ya musurukhu yoola evekiwe mukina waatthuneliwa otthumwa ikaruma wi savareliwe miteko mwa Impereesa ya Atum.
Musurukhu mukiinaku waathumelinwe ikaruma sa atoropa.

Okathi okohiwaawe ni raatiyu VOA, elapo ya Xowanesipuuruku, Chissano ohuuluma wi elapo awe kharo waatta manyakunyaku, mwaha yoola atthu owaatta ahiiviwa ni akinaaku ahiya impa saya atthyawelasaka elapo ya OMalaawi.

Chissano, ohuuluma wi Mosampiiki wookhala mukacamiho mukinaaku, yoola onoonaneya mwaha woohikhala mutthu onilamula muulumo a paritiitu Renaamu, mwaha wi nkhulupale wa paritiitu yeela, Afonso Dhlakama ori mutakhwani, masi khikhanle nreerelo mukinaaku ohikhanle wowuulumihana.
Chissano mukhulupale mmosa ovelelinwe ilapo sikinaaku ntoko Niyawu Afirikaana phantte ya Sahaara Ositentaale, elapo yeela akhulupale aya akunya a elapo ya Maroko.
Sahara Ositentaale ni Maroko elapo siniphwanyanela elapo ya Afirika.

Nlelo akohiwaka, Chissano ohaakhula wi iparalamentu sa ilapo sa Afirika khasinilavula namuna sa Saha, mwaha wi Maroko enookhanyarera wi eniira mpantta wa elapo ya Oxipaanya mwaha wi mwiinaano sa elapo seyiya piili orokumaana.
Nlepi Paulina Chiziane onikoha nkhalelo wa atthu a elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Namalepa, Chiziane olepa eliivuro ya nsina ´´O canto dos escravos´´, eliivuru yeela enniruuha muupuwelelo wa nkhalelo wa elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
Eliivuru yeela “O Canto dos Escravos” Chiziane olempwe nanaano, ni enilavula namuna sa ohooxiwa wa atthu yoola wiiranen´ye khalayi elapo yeela ya Afirika.

Nsuweli yoola, Chiziane olavula wi olempe elivuro ela wi aleele atthu otheene a elapo yeela wi avarelele saana namuna sowiiwanana, ni otthunana ni exakiwe itthu seyiya sikhumelenle okathi ole wa khalayi.
"Miyo kinikhuma mapuro ohaawa, mapuro ohaaxiwa.
Olelo kiri va kihakalalaka mwaha wi okhala mutthu okivanhe ohakalala nno.
Vano, moote xeeni kiniroowaka ohiyerera ohakalala nno wi otthyawe ? muulumo ala akhohiwa ni nlepi yoola.
Chiziane olakiheryatho wi eliivuro yeele muupuwelelo wa itthu sowaatta siniiraneya elapo yeele, ni onnaalaleya atthu otheene wi onaxaxe makhalelo a atthu a elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
"Okati ola khurooxakiha, vano khanisuwaneya ntoko noriipe wala mukunya, paritiitu xeeni mutthu oneettelaawe; .
Munileele moota xeeni apakiwaya eteeni, epakiwe sayi, miyo nkisuwela...´´ muhimye.
Muulumo ala alempwe ni Namuupuwela Dionisio Bahule, onileeherya wi atthu opuwelele nkhalelo wa elapo ya Mosampiiki.
"Hiyo naani?
Mwiisuwele mmansa anyu, eliivuru ela mwiihano, wi nitthikele owaani wi nuupuwelele nkhalelo ahu, ni niphavele namuna ya wiireeriha , ahinyaka mulopwana mmosa anaakhula nsina na Dionísio Baule.

Elivuru ya Paulina Chiziana ´´ Ocanto de Escravo´´ erinano 122 ipaxina, ni tiyookawiwa iphatte thanu na piili, nneene eliivuro yeela onitthuna wi ekhale ikaruma yoosomwa wi asuweliwe makhalelo anooriipa, ohooxiwa waya, ohakalala waya ni moonelo wa omeelo ni nneene eliivuru ela onitthuna wi namasoma asuwele ovirikaniha nkhalelo wa nanaano, ovinre ni ole onirwa.
Elapo ya Mosampiiki: Atthu yaale anivara muteko OParalamentu "khakupai wi muulumo anaaphira atthu´´.
Lipakiwe nikhuru na nootumerera muhina wa Paralamentu.

Ewarakha elempwe namararu yoola ni Ixitituutu ya Miitiya ya Afirika Awuxitaraale, Miisa Mosampiiki, ohuuluma wi annoonayeya makacamiho nnikhuru na Paralamentu ya elapo yeela okathi yaatthapeliwaaya exariya yoowuuluma. Ewarakha yeela enaasimmwa ´´Exariya Yowuuluma mapuro ovirikana´´, kookupali wi nookhala nikhuru na atthu anilepa exariya seya, ´´yaala anikhula ni wiiwa nkhalelo muulumo otheene anivira elapo yeela´´, nimalihaka, atthu yaala khanoona exariya ntoko etthu enaarumeela atthu mmuttettheni.

Mmaliheryo olempwe onihimya wi akhala atthu aniira mpatta mparalamentuni anitthuna oreeriha itthu , masi atthunasaka olavuva, anikhumelela atthu akinaaku ahintthuna etthu´´ muulumo ala alavuliwe ni Bordina Muala, nkhulupale wa Komisawu Esekutiiva wa nikhuru na Miisa Mosampiiki. Mulopwana mukina anaakhula nsina na Ernesto Nhalana, namasomi ni naphavela osuwela itthu sosommwa, okhanleene nroromelo wa ixariya wa muulumo ni moota woophwanya muulo yaala mmutthettheni anoonaneya makacamimiho owaatta.

Mulopwana yoola onaakhula nsina na Nhanala onnikupalitho wi atthu anivara muteko Oparalamentuni khanicali namuna yeela omwarya ihapari ni ophavela exariya anaaxakiha atthu olavula ahoovaka, mwaha wa Oparalamentuni wenno khasireere iparitiitu ni khula emosa ephavela etthu aya. Mulopwana yoola olavulatho ahimyaka wi, iparitiitu seyiya sootepa iye sookhalana ikhuru ´´enitthuna wi ihapari sihiphiyeke saana mmuttettheni, mwaha wi enoopihi atthu osuwela itthu sinikhumelela.

Nanaano va, noopakiwa nikhuru aniira mpantta atthu ophiyelela 20 a mmuttettheni wi arowase iire mmpantta Oparalamentuni, wi yattharatthariwe saana namuna yeela yoomwarya ihapari mmuttettheni elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
Anamphira a elapo ya Olanta ahaalolosa anamphira a elapo ya Xile ni ´´atthwawela´´ OParasiili.
Mphira yoola avaraaniwe khakhanle ´´epatthani´´, masi yanooneya wi Ekiipa ya Olanta ni Xile khayaalikana moota woomuttikha mphira yoola, ekiipa iya sotheene saatthuna khula mutthu omulola mukhwa awe.
Ekiipa ya Olanta ni Xile sahivolowa mukampu okathi woomalele sitthunasaka: ololana .

Noomala oxinttaaniwa ekiipa iya piili, ekiipa ya Olanta yaahilola ikoolo 2 ni Xile arina ikoolo 0, onamala mphira ola avahinweene mpurelo nikhuro B, anaroromelihiwa wi onirowa ovaraana nikhuru na nenli A.
Mphira yoola avaraaniwe khakhanle ´´epatthani´´, masi yanooneya wi Ekiipa ya Olanta ni Xile khayaalikana moota woomuttikha mphira yoola, ekiipa iya sotheene saatthuna khula mutthu omulola mukhwa awe.
Okathi woopacerya wa mphira yoola khareere waatta manyakunyaku ovarana ni omoroxana.
Ekiipa ya Xile onne otutuxeriwa ni ekoolo eviraka mmatthavini.
Ekiipa ya Olanta khiyaareere osuwela omuttikha mphira,mwaha wa namphira onaakhula nsina na Roben.
Ephantte yoomalela ya mphira yoola khayareere woonaxeya.
Ekiipa ya Xile yaatthuna olola wi exakaxake ekiipa ya Parasiili, vaavo eroomuvolowiha namphira mmosa mukampu wi attikhe ephantte yeeriyari.
Ekiipa ya Olanta yahireereliwa mphira yoola: Okathi ovolunwawe namphira Fer mukampu, okathi emaninwaaya ekantu waakhelenle ni muru ohelamo ekoolu.
Mphira nkinaaku, okathi warowaaya omala, mamerikaanu ahimuttikha saana mphira, ekiipa ya Holanda yaala ahimuvaha ephiro namphira onaakhula nsina na Depay.
Ekiipa ya Xiile yaatthuna waaveyiha aneene elapo, emalakaru analolasiwa.
Mphira yooa nave, Ekiipa ya Parasiili mpakha elole ekiipa ya Kamaroxi.
Muupuwelelo ola wiiraneya siiso, okumaana wa ekiipa ya Suli- amerikaanu wuumalihani, onirowa wiiraneya Esaapatu elo enirwa, epooma ya Minerawu.
Ekiipa ya Olanta enirowa omuttikha mphira etuminku, elapo ya Marakana, ekiipa yeela enirowa omuttikha ni komantaatu te Filipawu yaala aphwanyaneyasa phantte ya nenli nikhuru A.
Rosa Roque olavula wi: Anawiipe a elapo ya Ankoola iwananasaka anniphiyelela aroohika icipo saya elapo sookhopela.
"Ennihaleela nttottopelo wowaatta , nikhuru na anawiipe, masi noonelaka namuna yootthuna othukumelela itthu sahu ni sa elapo ahu " muulumo ala alavuliwe ni nkhulupale opattuxale nikhuru ´´As Gingas".
Elapo ya Ankoola ennithapelo, olelo, mahuku aneettaaya 8 mweeri wa Caneero, nihuku na Itthu sa elapo ahu.
Niira nenla na ntthapelo linnaaruhela atthu ni anawiipe muupuwelelo wa mureerelo wowiiwanana wa anawiipe otheene , muulumo ala alavuliwe ni DOA.
“Miyo kiniphavela wi niiwananeke niiwananeke, niira siiso onnoorowa ohela ohoolo muteko ahu yoola wowiipa niphiihaka elapo sikinaaku´´ ahimyaka.

”Ahiyaka ottuli mikacamiho, Roque ohaalele axikhwa awe wi ´´ nivarelele saana muteko ahu ola wowiipa, mwaha wi etthu yooreera saana ni icipo khasiniliyaliwa (...), mwaha wi elapo ahu yuulupale ni tiyookhalana itthu sowaatta ni amusi ahu anniphwanelela okhalana wala wiiwa icipo sooreera.

Nkhalelo wa elapo ya Ankoola enimukacamiha namwiipe ola , eyaakha ya 1983 opaka nikhuru Lexentaariyu niira mpantta axithiyana ´´As Gingas´´: Atthu owaatta anitthuna otthara nkhalelo ahu yoola wowiipa , masi olelo itthu soovirikana mwaha wi atthu sinaasivela itthu sikinaaku.

Asuwelaka wi ´´sookhala ni sinnihimwa ipuliitika, meettihero´´, Roque onoona wi ´´ nittharelaka exariya, elapo sotheene siniphavela orumeela itthu imosaru ni yiiraneya siiso, itthu sowaatta sinoopwetheya.
Ni “ noonaxaxa saana, anamwiipe anceene siniiwiya icipo saya, yaala osuwaneyaxa´´, ninnoona khakhalanse yaala ´´ aiipa ecipo sa elapo ahu wala aniipa arumeelaka nttaava na elapo ahu.
Miyo kinuupuwela wi, yareera okhala nkhumaano wa itthu sa khalayi ni sa niinaano.”.
Ephiro yeela nintthunaahu nitthare ´´ mpakha ekhalane owerya wa akhulupale ahu, masi khinoonaneya yiiraneyaka siiso.
Ennihaleela vanceene wi atthu akhalane nreerelo wa itthu sa elapo ntoko ottittimiha icipo sinihimya nkhalale ahu, ottittimiha itthu seyiye siri sa elapo ahu yootheene.
Onniriipiwa wa murima mwaha okhwa wa anawiipe iyaakha iya sivinre ni onnuuluma wi khayo phaayi icipo ahiyansaaya anankhwa yaala sinirowa onitteeliha murima.
Enniphwanelela waavaha nreerelo atthu yaala anipaka itthu sa mulaponi.
Naahiyaka anawiipe ninnrowa omulavula Roque, purusoora ni muteko awe yoola onnuuluma wi khahiweno pahi osomiha , etthu yooreeratho nave itthu yooreera owiixuttiha atthu makhalelo a elapo ahu.

Purusoora yoola onnihimya wi "mpakha okhale waataana wa nikhuru noosoma ni nikhuru na kulutuura nkhalelo yoowo onitthuniwa wi makhalelo a kulutuura akhalana mureerelo osuwaneya oopacerya muxiko mpakha nkhutti ya kulutuura ya elapo yotheene.

Nilavuliwaka nikhuru na ´´Gingas´´, Roque onnikupali wi nikhuru nenla ´´ enniiraneya´´, masi onnittapela nikhuru nenla mwaha wa ecipo siniruuhelaya elapo yeela ya Ankoola, ni nikhuru nenla linnivara miteko sowaattittimiha athiyana elapo ya Akoola.
Mwiwuriyane:
"Anamalepa yaale aniihiyerera wi avarihiwe wala iiwelele miruku sa kuveerunu khampisa ohiya aya yoola woolepa "
SAN-PAAWULU-

Eviitiyu ela ya neeraru okathi akohiwaawe ni Raatiyu Voxi Ameerika namalepa yoola a elapo ya Mosampiiki, Ungulani Ba Ka Khosa, ohaakhula wi etthu yoorera anamalepa otheene wiikasoopiha namuna sa puliitika, namuna yeela enniruuhela nreerelo wa iliivuru sotheene.
Ungulani, ohuuluma wi iliivuru ni anamalepa yaale anivara muteko ni epuliitika, miteko saya khasinirowa ohoolo ni khinikhalakhala sireeraka.

Ungulani olavulatho wi ekhotto yeele yiiranen´ye elapo ya Mosampiiki yoolipihereya muliivurini seyiya sinipakiwa elapo yeela ni anamalepa otheene aphwanyasa namuna yoolepa itthu seyiye siranen´ye khalayi.

Okathi okhohinwaawe, wi nyuwo mwa ntthu woreera murima ni ntoko wootheyatheya mahuku otheene, mwinniwerya okhala mahuku otheene mwilepa makhumelelo, Ungulani ahakhula wi olepa etthu emosa enikiruuhela oratta.
Yoola nave olavula wi onnitthuna olepa itthu sikinaaku soohikhala iye olamalenla iye.
Nlaleyo yoola avahinwa iye elapo ya Parasiili wi arowe ooniherye eliivuru awe ya nsina Orgia dos Loucos wapacenre ni editora Kapulana.

Ungulani olavulatho wi ahipacenre oreheriwa eliivuru, apacenre wootoota othanla eliivuru yaatthuniwa ni nikhuru nenle naarowa oreriha, iliivuru sikinaaku sinirowa wooniheriwa elapo ya OParasiili eyaakha yeele enirwa.
Ela yaari eviitiyu ya neeraru ni yoomalela ya mwaha yoola wiiranen´ye ni namalepa mosampikaano, Ungulani Ba Ka Khosa yoola wiiranen´ye Oraatiyu Voxi ti Ameerika.
Iilya ya Koowa ni Seena sootthuka mikhora saya mwaha wa nkutakutho yoola wiiranen´ye.
Ilya seya sakmukhaani (Koowa ni Seena) enoosomwa mwaha wa mukuthokutho yoola wiiranen´ye, osomwa wenno anoorohimya nkhalelo wowakhela wala woohiwaakhela atthu.
Ennirowihiwa ohoolo osommwa wa Ilya seyiya.

Akhulupale a epooma ya Iiya ti Mosampiiki, akottihasa nraarelo wa atthu yaala aruuye woona itthu, ohakalala, weettakasa ni apaka ipanca ipooma sa Koowa ni Seena, elapo yeele ya Wamphula. Okottihiwa nno wiiranen´ye mwaha wa osarya wootikiniwa wa maasi muphareya aphiyelelaka akhwaaka atthu thanu na tthaaru, etuminku yeela yoomalela, ni okottihiwa wenno khunisuwaneya nihuku onirowaaya omala, olavulaka Alfredo Matata, nkhulupale wa Munisiipiyu wa epooma ya Iilya ti Mosampiiki, yoola alavula muraatiyuni wa Voxi ti Ameerika.
Nkhulupale yoola wa Munisiipiyu, Matata olavula wi, okathi ola ipooma seyiye sa Ilya akhalamo atthu anisoma etthu xeeni ekhumelenle nuumala vaavo inoopacerya awaakhela atthu.

Osoama wenno wa Ilya seyiya opacenre namararu yeela ni anniira mmpantta mateekiniku a nikhuru na INAMAR. Mwaha wi Ilya ya Koowa ni Seena onnikelawo atthu owaatta, Alfredo Matata olavula ohimyaka wi, nikhuru nawe na muteko nipacenre etuminku yeela ovara muteko woowalakiherya atthu anikhala mmuttettheni muumu wa Ilya na ale akinaaaku onirwaasaka othotola wi ohikhalakhale apiyasaka mapuro yaale anithotoliwaka elapo yepooma yeela ya Ilya ti Mosampiiki. Osarya wa maasi yoola wonanen´ye etuminku yeela evinre, akhwaasa asomi thanu na mosa ni atthu ayili aneettela etiini (ntthu ni muhima iye), elapo ya Xipannya.
Olelo, yohiiraneya, Okerexa ya Owamphula, miisa yoola osuwaleliwaka atthu yaala akhwiiye, miisa ola ahiira mpantta maseseritooti, misiyonaariyu ni apatthani.
Elapo ya Ankoola onnilavuliwawo wi- Armando Machado: ´´Ekiipa yeela yaarowa opaka itthu soreera´´.

"Akhulupale a nikhuru nle Mphira na elapo ya Ankoola ahikhalanase owerya wi nikhuru nenla niroweke ohoolo, nto mpakha ahiyase ekhatera akele atthu akinaaku, ´´ muulumo ala alavunle nkhulupale wa nikhuru nenle, Armando Machado.

Iiraka mpantta wa porokaraama ´´Ankoola mwilavule´´, Machado ohuuluma wi nikhuru nenla na mphira na elapo ya Ankoola naronwe omuttikha Mpira yoola wa CAN19 elapo ya Exipitu ´´ naarowa opaka itthu soreera, masi khaaweryanse opaka etthu mwaha wootapanyaseya´´.

“Akhala atthu alikarelanse anamphira areene OXipitu wenno anaaleela wi apakelase manyakunyaku anaane nikhuru nenla na mphira´´, oroohimya, upuwelelaka okathi saamalelinwaaya iterenu ni anamphira mwaha woohilivasiwa.
Nikhuru na FAF ´´khanaalenle”. wi ´´ anamphira ahikhalanase musurukhu´´ khanivara muteko aya saana, ni nkhalelo yoola waarohiyereriwa ´´onatepa´´.
Machado olavulatho ahimyaka wi “ iterenu sa anamphira yaala khasaarenrele, saari sotakhala”.
Nkhulupale yoola nave ahilavula wi” anamphira yaala ari oriipasiwa murima, mwaha yoola ekiipa ya Akoola yaahariwa omuttikha mphira ehikhalanne nreerelo na anamphira awe.

Armando Machado owooniherya atthu wi okathi ola ekiipa ya Ankoola khiniphwanyaneya ekhanleene saana ni anamphira awe, mahiku ala ikulupi piili tikhalanne ixikola, yoopacerya ti Pirimeero ti Akoxitu ni ya piili ti Peeturu ti Luwanta, ikiipa iya soopiili tisa Nikhuru na Atoropa ni Sonangol.
“ Khukhanle musurukhu wi akusanyiwe anamphira´´, olavulaka peresitenti wa nikhuru nenle na mphira oniheryakatho wi ekampiyonaato yeeye eniiriwa ´´cassolinhas´´ khinoonaneyatho.

Okohinwaawe wi ohiya nkhalelo yoola woohikhala musurukhu wookhala nkacamiho mukinaaku wa mapuluusa yoole wakumihe manyakunyaku ophwanyaneyaka owaakuruxaka akhulupale a ikulupi ni onhononaka mphira wa elapo ya Ankoola.
Machado ohimya wi ” khukhanle mukutakutho mwaha wi atthu owaatta aphwanyasale ekhulupale sa ikulupi ihisomanse.

Yoola ohuupuxerya wi okathi araawe mukhulupale wa nikhuru nle na mphira nnaasimwa FAF, nikhuru nenla naahikhalana Hotel Palanca yaaruha musurukhu noovira okathi, Hotel yoola akumihiwa atthu amukupali Kuveerunu wi onoorowa waavaha musurukhu.

Okohinwaawe mwaha wa nkhalelo wa Kabuscorp, nkhulupale yoola wa FAF waakhula wawe apaceranne muupuwelelo wa makacamiho ikulupi yeela yakhalannaaya mwaha wowaaruuha anamphira yaale ahalemphwasale ni atthu otheene asuwelaka wi anamphira yaala akhumasa ilapo sookhopela khaalinvwanse” noomala omuttikha mphira´´
“Olelo, Kabuscorp onniphwanyaneya alivaka mwaha wa itthu seyiye soonanara´´, olavulaka.
“ Etthu enihaleela elapo ela ya Akoola osoma ni osuwela meettettelo sa ikulupi sa mhira”, olavulaka wuumalelani.
Radar Magrebe Lusoofonu: " Kulutuura ya Soba"
Nipuro xeeni afikaano onitthunaaye oweha, oweha wa puliitika /etiini ya arapiiya/ namwiikumiherya wa nikhuru na VOA/oweha ntoko nteena wa Magrebe, Rul M. Braga Pires Mwanteenani #6.

Wuupuwelela wa atthu yaale otheene anuupuwela, nnimoona mwathanle wa eperesintensiya ya elapo ya Zimpwaapwe yoole iranen´ye eyaakha ya 2008, irale mpantta nave namaxinttaana wa eparitiitu wa moono weethiyana, Morgan Tzvangirai, yoola khaaronwe omanakasiwa ni mapuluusa, okathi amaniwaaye ahithaliwa muru ahiiwa akilantheene muramphani ehilokenle enapacerya ´´ekhotto ya mwathanle´´ nkhumelelo yoola waarowa woonaneya nave elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Muupuwelelo mukinaaku ohinikhuma mmuru mwaka, tuule kamonnaaka Purusoore Manuel Enes Fereira olavulaka otilivisawuni, yoola awiixuttiha atthu a elapo ya Afirika namuna yooweha, wuumalihani ahuluma wi nkhalelo woovaanela namuna sowiiwanana yoola warowihiwa ohoola ni Peresitenti wa Afirika tu Suuli, Thabo Mbeki, khuwaaruha nreerelo, mwaha wi mulopwana yoola akhala mwa mwaana wa mukhulupale ole anaakhula nsina na Robert Mugabe.
Wuumalihani, Purusoore Enes Ferreira ahivukala mulakiheryo awe, mwaha wi mutthu yoole ohiniiwa wala ohinsuwela ´´ekulutuura ya Soba´´ elapo yeela ya Afirika, khanisuwela Afirika yootheene.

Nihisuwelakatho meettettelo a mwathanle wa elapo yeela Zimpwaawe, , nintthuna okathi yoola wuuluma wi, elapo ya Mosampiiki khiyaarowa orwa okathi yoola, mwaha wi onoophiyelela akacamihaka nvaanelo wa peresitenti Nyussi ni nkhulupale Dhlakama.

Ni, kinnuuluma kihoovaka wi, peresitenti Dhlakama okathi oniirowawe omala mwathanle, elapo ya Mosampiiki yohaano ekawiwaka ekhulupale ntoko ´´Kuverenatoore wa iporovinsiya sa Nooriti´´, ´´Marexaale wa elapo soorovuma mpakha Zampeezi´´ Oba wa elapo sa Nooriti´´ Mwene wa Nooriti´´ khula nsina onirowaawe otthunvwa, yoola onirowa otthikela okhala peresitenti wa Nooriti´´ mwaha wi orothalinwa ni atthu.

Peresitente Nyuusi, ntoko nuulumahu muraatiyuni Magrebe Lusoofonu#, otumereriwa OKonkereesu wa FRELIMO, apahavele namuna yoovaanela ni mkhuluaple wa eparitiitu RENAMO, wuulumasa wenno onooruhela nkhalelo wooreera wa elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Onnuupuweleliwa wi ohikhala saana wenno wa elapo ya Zimpwaawe, onniphwanyaneya woonaneyaka elapo ya Mosampiiki ni wenno onnirowa oruuha mikhalelo soonanara seyiye sowiiriwa ni mutthu mekhawe, muuthu yoola tuule onirowa ophavela w ” wiira etthu yooreera avonyala aneera itthu soonanara´´!
Ekiipa ya Mosampiiki ´´yoolola´´ elapo ya OTuniisiya
Efiilimi mosampikaano ya nsina ´´ Kampoyi wa maakha ni asuukari´´ ya Licínio de Azevedo, yoolola mpurelo Wooru, nnukhuruni wa ifiilimi Carthage Festival, elapo ya Tuniisiya.
Kine- Pisawu

Ninnooni ntoko elapo ya Kine- Pisawu enipacerya esumana ela, munyakunyaku wookhootta, manyakunyaku yaala apacenre mwaha wa iparittitu 18 seyiya siniira mpantte sa Iparitiitu Temokaraatiku sinaakiha namuna sonyoholiwa wa atthu, owaalattula atthu wi ire manyakunyaku okhottasaka itthu soonanara, manyakunyaku yaala anirowa wiiraneya mahuku 2, yiiraneya siiso, JOMAV, peresitenti a elapo yeela onnirowa omuriipa murima .
Ennihimwatho wi manyakunyaku yaala annirowa woonaneya epooma ya Roosiyu, elapo ya Lixipoowa ´´epooma ya Kine-Pisawu´´.

Namwiipe Kim Kardashian ohiiyeriwa, elapo ya Pariixi imaali sawe sa xooya sinkhwa musurukhu woophiyelela ikonto imiya muloko 10 sa itoolari
Kim Kardashian yoola aphwanyinwe ´´ onmurimpeene murima ni woocenyeene ahikhalane mutthu´´ alavulaka namuteko awe, Ina Treciokas.

Atthu yaala amwiiyenre Kim Kardashian yoola akhunenle amayithoni wayasa ni ahimuthoonyiheryasa kapwitthi ni amutthukasa muthiyana yoole amwiiyerasaaya, itthu iya sotheene siiraneya muxowero wa enupa yooreera saana, elapo ya Pariixi, ni okathi yoola ahikuxasa ixooya sinikhwa musurukhu woophiyelela ikonto muloko 10 sa toolari, itthu seyi siiraneya ohiyu wa namararu.

nawiiye athanu, otheene akhunenle amayithoni waya ni ahiwarasa ikuwo soolikana ni iya sa mapuluusa, avolowasa mpaani, okathi weettaka miraru woohiyu, aphwanyaneya Kim Kardashian, yoola aruuye wiira mpantta niira noowara ikuwo, elapo ya Paris, olavulaka puluusa wa Reuters.
Nuumala omoopopiha kwarata, alopwana ayili ahikelasa mpaani muumu araawe Kim Kardashian.
Kim Kardashian khamaninwe, masi anawiiye yaala ahimuthoonyiherya kapwitti vamuru ahipacenre omutthukasa, alavulaka yoola akohiwa.
Atthu annuuluma wi, yoola atthukaniwa mukhoyi wa efiita.

Atakhali yaala ahiiyasa ekaaxa emosa yookhalana ixooya enkhwa musurukhu woophiyelela ikonto miloko mithanu ni emosa sa eewuro ni aneli onkhwa musurukhu woopiyelela ikonto miloko mixexe sa eewuro, alavulaka namakohiwa yoola.
Kirdashian, iya awe ti namwiipe Kanye West, nuwiiyeriwa ahirowa wuuluma ni mapuluusa noomala ahiwela eviyawu awe anahiya elapo yeele ya Faransa.

Namphira yoola anaakhula nsina na Messi onitthapela iyaakha 20 sa Paraseloona mwaha wa ikoolu sooreera.
Messi okhalano itthu sikinaaku sootthapela.
Lionel Messi oniira olelo iyaakha 20 areene ekiipa yeela ya Paraseloona.
Epaaxina ya Instagram ya ekiipa yeela onittikhaaye Meesi yoolepa: olelo ennivira iyaakha 20 Messi opacenraye omuttikha mphira ekiipa yeela... itthu sikinaaku tisoopakiwa”.
Nihiyaka otthuli nkacamiho yoole onoonaneya wa namphira ni elupi aye, mpakha olelo,messi namphira mmosa woottittimiheya.
Mphira yoole avaraninwe ni ekiipa ya girora, Messi ahihela ikoolu piili, emosaya ennireera otthikela woona

Epaaxina ya paraseloona yoolepwa wi, olelo meesi onipaka iyaakha 20 attikhaka ekiipa yeela ya paraseloona, yoolepwa ni eviitiyu yeela yohaasivela atthu owaatta ophiyelala ikonto emiya thanu sa atthu yaala onne eviitiyu yeela.
Nikhuru na UEFA ninrowa omukumiha Ruusiya ni Nkalateera mpoolaniwa Ewuro 2016.
LONTERE enitthuna waveleeliha mapuluusa wi amaalihe manyakunyaku atthu yaala anirowa omoona phira yoola oxittaniwa ekiipa ya ruusiya ni mankeleexi.

Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Piritaaniya ohuuluma wi oriipiwa murima mwaha manyakunyaku yaala akhumelenle, esaapatu epooma ya Mariseeliya okathi attikhiwawe mphira wa taasa wa ilapo sa Ewuroopa, vaavo, Kuveerunu yoola ohiikumeherya atthunaka waaveleeliha mapuluusa elapo yeela ya Faransa.
Okathi siiraneyaya itthu seyiya, nikhuru na UEFA ahilamula wi ekiipa ya nkalateera ni Russiya sinookumiwa mutoroneeyuni mwaha wa anamatthapela sa ekiipa seyiya.

"Kuveerunu wa Piritaaniya onniphwanyaneya omutteelaka murima mwaha wa manyakunyaku yaala akhumelenle ni ekiipa seyiya piili, epooma ya Mariselya ohiyu wa nsana, majoronaliixita annihimya wi nyakunyaku yoola apaceriwe ni anamattapela a ekiipa ya nkeleexi arovaraanasa ekhotto ni ekiipa ekinaaku, ahimya itthu mukhulupale yoole anivarana muteko Pirimeero Miniixituru.

Mukhulupale yoole olavulatho wi, Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Piritaaniya oniphavela waaveleeliha mapuluusa makinaaku wi iire mpahntta wa mphira yoola onirowa wiiraneya ekiipa ya Nkalateera amuttikhaka ni elapo ya Kalexi.
Atthu ophiyelela 35 ahivulalihasiwa epooma yeela ya mariselya okathi anamatthapa makeleexi ni ale a Ruusiya awanasaaya mukerekhere wa kampu.
Nuumala ottikhiwa mphira yoola ahaaphwanyanen´ye aloliwaka mutthu, anamatthapa a ekiipa ya Ruusiya ahipacerya waamanasa ale a ekiipa ya nkeleexi ni ala ahipacerya owela wi atthyawase ekhotto yeele.
Epooma ya Nayisi, atthu ophiyelela thanu na piili ahivulalihiwa mwaha ekhotto yaakhumelenle ni anamattapa a ekiipa ya Irilanta tu Nooriti ni ale a epooma yeele ya Nayisi.
Nikhuru na mphira, UEFA noolavula nihimyaka wi nnoorowa otthokiha wi okhale ereerelo ikampu seyiye piili ni enoorowa opakhiwa epuruseesu evahiwe nikhuru namphira na elapo ya Ruusiya.

soovira iyaakha xexe yiiranenyaaya elapo yeela ya Polooniya nyakunyaku wa anamatthapa a ekiipa ya Ruusiya, nowiiraneya siiso ekiipa yeele ya Ruusiya yahoomoliwa ni yahakhasiwa ipontu thanu na mosa nuwiira siiso ahileveleliwa.
Nikhuru na UEFA nooveleeliha muhupi ekiipa ya Nkalateer ni Ruusiya aleelasaka wi anoorowa okumihasiwa mumphirani yoola onittikhiwa anamatthapela aya atthikelasa a ekhotto ni waamana atthu mukampu.
Mphira wa nikhuru D, yoola ottikhiwe olelo, ekiipa ya korowaasiya yooomulola Turukiiya poola-0
Malepa, ikoma ni osuwela opaka itthu sinooniherya elapo ya Parasiili.
Epooma ya Marakana enooniherya murima wa elapo ya Parasiili.

Ntoko siisaya waahimwale, atthu yaale areeriha niira nla na mphira wa cooko olimpiku-2016 yoola oniiraneya epooma ya riiyu, ahooniherya ithhu sowaatta sinirumeeliwa elapo ya Parasili,niira nenla khinaarooreera, mwaha nipuro nenle niiraneya waahicampuliwavo ni ikoore soovirikana, saahoopiwa ikoma ni itthu sikinaaku.

Nivirikanihaka ni niira nle na mphira na Cooku Olimpiku yoole wa iyaakha ya 2014 epooma ya Sa-Paawulu, nenla khinaasuweyanse mwa wa musurukhu warumeelinwe khuwaaphiyenre waarovuliwa ni mateekiniku yaala aholelanse ,nkhalelo yoola whiruuha mukuthokutho wa atthu yaale amuttetthe wa kariyooka nimutelevisawuni ahilavuliwa mwaha yoola.

opacera wa niira nenla ahoonaneya wiipiwa hiinu wa Parasiili ni Paulinho da Viola, Caetano Veloso, Gilberto Gil, Seu Jorge,nave yaalasa ahiipa ecipo yeele enaasimwa "pantheera" ya Parasiili, muthiyana wa Ipaneema, anoonaneya atakihaka meettelo a susperi - muteelo Gisele Bunchen, ecipo ya sampa nave yiipinwe ni Zeca Pagodinho, Marcelo D2 e Elsa Soares, atthu akiinaaku ntoko nikhuru na liinya reeta, kuuruva ni sompora ti Oxikaare ahittukasa eperesenti yoottittimeheya saana´´ eperesenti yeela Muluku ahisomela ni ahitthuna wi niira nenla na Coocu Olimpiku niiraneye elapo yeela ya Parasiili

Ohooleliwaka ni ntthapelo, elapo ya Karanavaale yooruuha Yohaaruha elapo ya Omarakana atthu owaatta ni amwiixuttihi ovirikana a exikola ya Sampa, okathi yoola nave ahirwaasa anamwiine yaala omuratta sampa
Moonihero wa makhuru ophiyelela 206 ahilyaasa okathi vanirani vaava, ahipisawaya waari woophiyelela iwoora 3 ni minuutu 55.

Naahiyaka anamphira a elapo yeele, ahaakheliwa akinaaku okathi wamalaaya moonihero yoola woopacerya, ilapo sikinaaku sahakheleliwa saana, ntoko Exitaatu Uniitu, Kuupa, Ayiti, Alemaanya, Palexitiina ni, Ekiipa yeela ya Amarefuxiyaatu.

Nsu noorumela vaniira vaava niiranen ́ye okathi mukhulupale wa nenli, Michael Temer apacenraawe olavula nuulumo noopacerya noohiyu, nenla nave naari noomalela: ́ ́noomala niira nla, kinihimya wi apaceriwe mphira ola wa cooku olimpuku wa riiyu, yoola oneetta nkhuntti ya 31a.
Mphira yoola onirowa omaniwa okathi wa nanaano. ".

Okathi yoole, Nkhulupale Temer ahoona anyakula akelasaka anamphira ottittimiheya ntoko Marta, Oscar Schmidt, Sandra Pires, Emanuel, Joaquim Cruz ni Torben Grael yaala akhuminhe noomala niira nenle noopacera wa mphira wa elapo sotheene, erowiwaka ohoolo yarowa etooxa olimpika.

Atthu a elapo ya Parasiili ahivelavela, namphira yoole wakhalayi, Guga Kuerten ahirwa okunxeene etooxa, mphironi amuvaha namphira wa pasiketipooli,Hortência ni yoola ahikuxa etooxa yeela eettana amuvaha namphira yoole alonle ni aphurela nreerelo wa poronzi epooma ya Atenta-2004, Vanderlei Cardoso.

Ekampu yaarosareya enatthuna ophutuwa. Etooxa epattaka yaamhittharihela ni yahoona niira nenle noosarya iköore ni ecipo, ephantte sotheene ya ekampu ya Marakana yaarosareyiwa, ni atthu saattenleene mirima
Atthu otheene OParasiili wahaatteela murima ni ahitthapa, ntoko Amanda Ramos Areta, yoola akhanle wa João Pessoa.
´´Nkirorootthapela ni yaahikisivela woona oreera wa niira nenle noopacera wa mphira yoola elapo sotheene´´, nlavulaka nikhuru na VOA, naahicerera niiraka ´´miyo khonne elapo ya Parasiili´´.
Muthiyana a elapo ya Kanata, McLellan khaarotthapa ni ahiphiyelela olavula ahimyaka wi khurookitteela murima mwaha itthu seyiye konnaaka okathi yoole wa niira na mphira.
Mwana awe, Rosie McLellan, namphira wa tarampolim tiyoola avarelihinwe epantera ya Kanata: ´´Waahikitteela murima, mwaha wa mwanaka ni moota niira nle liiranen´yaya
McLllan ohuuluma wi ´´noosuwela elapo ya Parasiili, kahoona moota elapo yeela eraaya ni yattannaaya ekuru´´.
Okathi omanlaaya mukumaano yoola wa niira, oxa waya ekampu yaaphwanyaneya ahikhalemmo mutthu.
Aphwanyaneyamu majoroaliixita ni anamuteko yaala omaalela ahivelavelasa mukampu wootenemo ewoora emosa paahi.
Maxoronaliixita khanimaala ottittimiha muthukumano yoola wa niira na Coocu Olimpiku, alipelelasaka owela ekaaro otthikela muuteeli.
Enalokele , okathi weettaka 10 oora, onoopaceriwa mphira.
Namphira ole onaakhula nsina na Ibrahimovic olola mwaha wa ekoolu yeele mwaakha.
Namphiwa wa elapo ya Suweesiya olola mphurela nreerelo wa Puuxika mwaha wa ekoolo yeela eyaakha ya 2012, masi namphira yoola okhenle khuntti ya Poola wa Wooru eyaakha yeela.
Namphira Ibrahimovic ohaakhela 48,7 ipontusene, ni Matic ari ephantte ya na nenli ni 308, 8 ipontusene
Namphira Neymar ohanle epantte ya neeraru.
Ekoolu ya yoola wa OParasiili yohaakhela 205,5 purusentu sa ivootu.
Namphira a ekiipa ya Penfiika, Nemanja Matic aphwanyaneya nikhuru na anamphira yaale athanlinwe, okhalana ikoolu sooreera mphira yoole ovinre.
Namophira mukinaaku ololinwe ti Neymar, yoola wa elapo ya Parasiili onimuttikha mphira ekiipa ya Paraseloona.
Meettelo a maakihero namuna sootumihiwa ni onyoholiwa wa atthu elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Kaaza, Nyhampaani, Maniika, Zampeesiya ni Sofwaala, ilapo sikhalanne, mammeru owaatta a atthu otumihiwa elempwale.

Mapuluusa yaale anikhala mmwiinanoni wa ilapo ahinya wi, anamwane ophiyelela 160, a iyaakha 3 ni akinaaku a iyaakha 17, ahoopoliwa eyaakha ela epooma ya Resaanu Karasiiya. Anamwane yaala akhuxasiwa aroohiwaka elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli.
Muulumo ala alavulinwe okathi atthu eettaaye anyakulaka wala akhottaka mwaha yoola woothumihiwa atthu.
Nkhalelo mmosa wooxakiha namuna seyiya soothumiha ni onyoholiwa wa atthu epooma ya Resaanu, nttetthe yoola oniira mpantta Etixitiriitu ya Muwampa, porovinsiya ya OMaputu, elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Nthukumano wiiriwe ni nikhuru na Save The Children vamosa ni nikhuru nle nnaxakiha wi atthu ahitumihiwe ni ahinyoholiwe ni ahiira mpantta atthu akinaaku a Kuveerunu ni atthu akinaaku anivara miteko sowiikumiherya sa mmuttettheni.
Vanthukumano vaava, waahihakaliwavo ni akhulupale ahuulumasa.
Mutthu oopacerya alavunle ari ti José Luís Muchisso, nhooleli wa Mapuluusa yaala anivara miteko mmwinaano wa elapo ya Resaanu Karasiiya.
Ni Muchisso yoola ahihimya wi, opacerya mweeri wa Owutuupuru mwaakha yoola, anamwane ophiyelela 160 ahoopoliwa, anamwane yaala akina arina myeeri 3 mpakha iyaakha 17.
Anamwane yaala arowiiyiwa oroyihiwaka elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli.
Okathi yiyasiwaaya, anamwane ophiyelela 147 ari naxipapa aya ni 13 arisa ni atthu yaale antupha mwiinaano namuna yowiipitheya.

Nkhulupale wa mapuluusa yaala anivara miteko sa mwiinaano wa ilapo ya Resaanu Karasiiya, José Luís Muchisso, epooma yeela ya Resaanu nipuro aniviraaya atthu yaala owiiyiya orowihiwaka elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli.

Atthareliwaka mammeru olempwa ni Minixiteeriyu Puupiliku, elapa yootheene ya mosampiiki soolempwa iporoseesu sa atthu oowiiva soophiyelela 36, seyiya sinaahimya atthu atthu oowiva ni sikinaaku sa atthu sootumihiw atthu, seyiya siiranenye eyaakha ya 2012 ni 2013 ni sinniphwanyaneya silempwaka ipuruseesu sikinaaku sa eyaakha ya 2014.
Exankiho enkuxeriwa ohoolo ni nthukumano wa ONUSIDA elapo ya Ankoola onhimya muhina mwa nthoonyero naya na akhulupale Siyaka
Molumo a Semo anhinya wi, elapo ya Angola ohanle vakhaani wi atthikele ottuli wahaakuviwe wa nivalo wiira okeliwa wa okathi woohimeya wa ekumi, ni otthuneya wa omala wa epwepwetthe
Masi ahooleli amphanyaneya ari
Nummuru na atthu ootheene oowereyiwa aninyiwa a Sakarataari a Elapo ya mpantta wa ekumi, Eleuteeriyu Ivenikwa wa oreeraxa wa muttetthe

Ivenikwa inhimya wi eyo ekhanle mahala ya nvarihano na ahooleli wi ehoolelihe sooreerela wa miteko sa mipantta soovirikana sa okosoopa ni olola eretta ya VIH Siita ni axirikha ookhalela wa mipantta soovirikana sa mixovo sa atthu ammukosoooa kuveerunu ni mixivo sa ilapo soowiiraana
Nkhulupale Nyusi ohaaruma anamuteko awe wi awehexexe moota sinrumeeliwaaya itthu seiye sikawiwe elapo yeeya ya Omosampiiki.

Onnooneya waatta mithukumano sintthuna akhaliheya elalo ya Mosampiikhi woowi owerye oxintta mixankiho sootakhala sa epula ya mutaaseke Itayi ni, woowi olipiherya mweettiho wa wooneya, Mukhulupale Filipe Nyusi oolaleya wii Exititutu ya elapo yotheene ya mweetthiho sa otakhala onrowa ovaha muteko ethoriho ehikhanle ya kuveerunu, olaleya mahiku eviraka muloko ni mahiku mathanu soohimya mwaha wa soovahiwa ni, sa vamosa ni mixovo sa ilapo sa okhopela, weettiha miyeettiho sa sooreerela soovahiwa.

Wa mpantta mukina, Namalamula oolamula namathanu, 28, wa ohiya, mpakha mweeri muloko ni miili, wa itaxa sootheene sinliviwa muxipitaali sa atthu oothene wa mmutttettheni siphwanyiwe ni, wa mananna makina a okathi wa etakhaelo.

Atthareliwaka makhalelo eekumi, ohommwa exisawu atthu oophiyelela ikonto 800 wi axakaxakihiwe eratta soovirikana, wiira wiikasoopa wa erumelo ya eretta yootakhala, wa olaka olepa ni okawela wa iliivuru sa ixikola vamosa ni okateerunu
Wa enerexiya, onrowa ovukuliwa miloko miyhanu sa pursento wa mipantta sinruwerya, siniitthaneya woowi ananamakoso ya ifaapirika ni cakoso olalenye mukhupule a erepuupilika
Oxutta ni itayi

Wahiso, erowaka wuuma miro, onnipacera mweettelo wa oteka inupa vakhaani ni wiira seyiyo sikhale soolipa wa epula ya mutaaseke a mahiku a ohoolo, wa UN Hapitaat oninvaha miruku Msampiikhi wiira ovarele muteko meettiheryo isya.
Hiyo, nimphavela miirelo isya sa oteka mMosampiikhi mu, sineettihana ni etekelo sa olipa muhina mwaya, ohimmye muhooleli a UN Hapitaat.

Ninnisuwela wi elapo yeela ya OMosampiikhi khasinreera oruma ipheyo sowoopiha saana, ipheyo seiya sinpaceryaka ni ovirikana wa makhalelo elapo ahu, yiiraneyaka siiso, namalaleya a epheyo ya mutaaseke Akasiyo Tampe, onnivaha miruku soowi ethaamihiwe atthu ale ankhala mukerekhere wa miro.

Ninnivekeliwa wi nivare muteko soowarelela atthu mapuro ankhalasaaya, nipaceryaka ni waatumeryerya atthu yaale ankhalasa mapuro owoopiha mwaha wa maasi eepula, mwaha wi atthu yaala anniphanyaneya atekaka inupa soohikhala saana ni mapuro ohikhalelana, moolumo ala onlavula ti Tempe.
Ewakha elempwe naanaano ehimya wi nikhuru na IDAI nohaaruhela opwetheya wala okhwa wa atthu amphiyelela 493 ni anoonaneya awereyiwa wa atthu ophiyelela 150 wa eretta ya koolera.

Nikhuru na INGC noohimya wi atthu oophiya imiya miloko ni imiya mithanu ni miloko miili ni araru 1.523, oovira numuru na imiya miloko miloko ni miloko ithanu ni mukolo mmosa ni athanu ni araru, 168 miili, wa amusi yaahiphwanyiwa ni mutaaseke, waatakaxerya atthu otheene ari imiya ithanu ni imiya miraru ni miloko mixexe wa atthu anhaawa, wala khuwa mananna, miteko sivanryaawe mutaaseke va vinryaawe muttetthe wa osentru wa elapo ahu.

Nittharihelaka mwaha wa itthu sooteka, soohala waalikela ixitaraata, iphiro sooviriwa ni inupa sikina, masi mwaha wa inupa, seiya imiya miloko ni ithanu sahiraya maasi, imiya mikolo mithanu ni ithanu ni 55.463 tisoophweeya ni 28.070 tisoophweya vakhaani.
Osuwele saana namuna sa Mutaaseke Itayi
Oyeeheya wa phataroya vatelta wa Niixere aphiya mammaru maalupalexa
Ehinapaceriwe ekhotto, ohinatthi othupuluwa patarooya, e Telta ya Nixeree yaakhala mwa etthu yooreeraxa
Mahasu avariwe mwaha wa oyehiwa wa patarooya muttetthe wa onixeeriya wa Telta wa Niixer woophiya mammaru maalupalexa oniira oopopihaka mukhalelo wooreera, wa elapo yoowaattaxa atthu wa Afirika
Mapuro ala annihimya wi atthu anookhwa eriyene amiravo, wala anchawa muttetthe ole, nnaamwi imperesa sa phataroya, ni tho anamalamula oolavala anthaaciri ni muhakhu wa ephattu
Empereesa sa patarooya sinhimya wi miteko sa ohonona siri oorulela wa miloko mithanu ni miili ni ithanu sa pur sento 75 por sento sa oyeeheya.
Ehinapaceriwe ekhotto, ohinatthi othupuluwa petrolyo, e Telta ya Nixeree yaakhala mwa etthu yooreeraxa
Nlelo olelo tiyooreera, opakeyaka muttetthe mmosa wa waatta itthu sirina ekumi ya Afirika, ni miro saamukhaani ni suulupale simmwaramwareya ntoko ratasi ori vatakhwani ya murattani.
Masi naweha saana, ninrowa ophwannya wi makhura ooripa, ankhuneela mitathaari sa miri ni sinveveleya mmaasini.
Makhalelo yaala aphwanya anammuttettheni oxanka waya onikhala wootepa.
Atthu amphwanyana nipuro ninkhala aphakiti waattamela waaliteyiya.
Ale ootheene, ni axipapaya ootheene, yaamiserya ntoko mukhalelo wa ekumi, mpakha okathi phataroya iivalaawe ihopa.
Iyaakha iya ithanu sivine , muteko wa omiserya woovukuwa vanceene ophiyelelaka ovukuwa waya numuru na miloko mithanu ni iraru 80.

Mukhalelo wa olevelela wa ilapo sa okhopela onhimya wii, iyakha miloko mithanu sookiserya, eriyari ya ithanu ni ixexe wala miloko ni iraru wa imilyawu sa micima sa phataroya sooyeeheya mmuro saamukhaani wa Telta wa Niilu, mmuro ni va kolufu eneene
Eri wa wunnuwa ntoko okhalanaka eyaakha tiyaakha ohononeya wa emuxeeni wa Exxon-Valites, yiiraneya miyaakha sinceene.
Nkhulupale Aribogha onhoolela imiya soowaatta sa mittetthe seiye siyehennyemo patarooya.
Ntoko sinhimyawe, empereesa suulupale sa patarooya khasimphavela osuwela moota heeni sineetaaya miteko l, ehinatthi oxukhurya, wii mapuro oohihooxeya
Tiyoowooneyaxa wi patarooya ohaahooxa atthu
Eniphanyaneya ehimwaka wi patarooya khahonxe muttetthe, ohinatthi oxukhuriwa muttettheene yoowo.
Anamahooleli a kuveerunu anhimya wi, wa nlamulo, impereesa sa phataroya sihaana saalivaka atthu apweteyiwe ni oyeheya wa phataroya
Yiiraneyaka siiso, atthu ahinaakhele musurukhu, ahaana yooniheryaka ni asuwelaka wi patarooya atathelenye mmirini ni oyehenye mmaasini oowurya, etanyale oyeheya wa ekekhayi.

Mitthenkeso sa makhura a ikaruma annihima wiira kharina mpantta wa oyeheya vanceene wa makhura, okhala wiira manceene aniyeheya mwaha wa atthu otakhala murima - mwaha wa wiyiwa wa makhura, wala mapuro amutakhali anooxa makhuwa ohikhalano ipaphelo.
Annixinla wiira anamwettiha a elapo khankasopa saneene sovara saya.
Ororomela okunya ni mithinto sa makhalelo sinnothereriwa ohaxiwa wa'xithiyana ohimalaka w'Africa, onnihimya Teresa da Silva.
Muttetthe anampomani aalattuliwa wiira yettelele muteko wa maholeli.

Mussuweli a muttettheni ni namiteko a Ixariya s'Atthu, Teresinha da Silva, onnihima mmuthukumano w'atthu o VOA, wiira khivammmalela wAfirika okhalana ikaruma sinkeleliha oholo waakihiwa wa ixariya s'athiyana.
''Onirerela ovaara'', oolipiherya.
Owo onithoonya Nikhuro na oMaputo wiira " na nikhuru nimosa notepexa orowa oholo mwaha wa wakhapepela athiyana" nnamwi vahoneliwaka etho wa athu yale a politika wiira avaarele muteko.
Nave ewarakha yela, sokhalamo ithu sinceene sintoko omaleleya, wunnuwa ni ophavelihiwa oyara.
"Wa miloko mixexe ni thanu ni tharu sa ilapo, ilapo muloko mmosa ni tahu ni pili nlelo khiyakhulenle>", tivooxankiha.
Vano , ororomela exefi onnittikiherya elapo ottuli, maxi athu yaawo aniphavela musurukhu pahi.
Owo onnihimya wiira ilapo sinceene sa wAfirika ''onniweryaneya okhala munnuwelo wa musurukhu, mano naari wammuttettheni''.
mpantta nikina, hiyo wAfirika nihana etthu soothene simmalela wa ohoolelo ni soolimalela.
Nnoothererya meettelo ni miirelo wa nsina sa ephattu ni soolimalela.
Mwa elapo ela, sinithipeleliwa sowiira ntoko ''waattheya, ikano sopacerya, othelana akithi, ni soowira ikinaku siri soovirikana wa Ixariya s'atthu''.
Sinonahu iya sinniphavelaxa waakiheriwa wa muttetthe w'anampomani wiira miteko sa akhulupale eelapo sikhanyereriwe ni seettiheriwe.
Teresinha da Silva muholeli a Nikhuru na Muthiyana ni Ekano a aAfirika wa Vathi, wa elapo ya oMosampikhi.
Owana woomalamaliha makhankwa onninnuwa oMosampikhi.
Sowireya sinceene sa makhankwa sinnoniheriwa mmapuroni mme simphukiwa milattu, oMosampikhi, moonelo onihimya wiira Nikhuru Nuulupale na Mweetiheryo nopatxerya wooniha moteko woovariwa.
Onkhala wira Nikhuru na Xariya ninnixintta ekhotto wohi nipuro, nimalamalihaka makhankwa, wala wiya musurukhu wa elapo, mwa mapuro ale sinnvariwa miteko saatthu othene, oMosampikhi.
Ekwaha vamosa vamwerini onnikhala ophukiwa milatto wala otthukweliwa waanamuteko a eelapo ela aniivolewiha mmiyeetteloni soothaciri wookhottiheriwa, ni musurukhu wa elapo ela.

Esumana ela, niporo nle na muphukelo wa milattu wa ixariya weelapo ya oCabo-Delgado, wampantta woosulu wa elapo y'oMosampikhi, nihaatthukwela tthaaru aanamilattu athanu ampakha miloko mili wala miloko mili ni pili. Anamutthukhweli awo yaari anamuteko wa Muholelo wa Musurukho, yawo yaavara muteko oMwettiheryo wa elapo ya oCabo-Delgado.

Veeri wa mwaakha 2007 ni 2008, yawo yaahikuxa imiya 43 ni ikonto 450Mt, enlikanherya ni idolari emiya emosa ni ikonto iithanu sa wAmerika, veeri wa soosoma soma wa Musurukhu wampantta woolipaxa. Mano naamphuki Aderito Malhope, aahiwerya othonyerya ekekhayi wi anamuteko ale atthanu yahiiya musurukhu eelapo aroihaka mukonthammwaya, ni ahaathukwela miyaakha miloko pili ni pili mwaa khula mmosa, ni iyaakha miloko pili mwa muthiyana mmosa.

Anamphukeli akina anli kiyavariinnwe mwaha wohikhala mooniheryo anthoonyiherya wiira yowo ari mpuwa. Mana, namwaakihe ammosa waanamuphukeli aili, aari nanhooleli a nikhuru naanamuphukeli, onira wi enroowa wiiraneya veeri wa mamaliheryo oophukiwa.
Mamaliheryo ala a maphukelo niinlelo khavikanenle wa yophukiwa.

Nihana okathi wira nihelele vasulu mwaakiheryo''-oohimwa Teofilo Shreiber . Nnakhala namwaakihe yowo okelelaka oholo ni mwakiheryo, soothene siinthonyerya wiira vanniweryaneya ophwanya ovukuliwa okathi wookhala mu kalapusoni, mana khenrowa ohiyereriwa.
Nikhuru na exariya ninnikhanyereriwa wiira yoonihe muteko mwa elapo eniraneya wi ohitthukweliwa nlamulo waanawiye a musurukho a elapo ela ennoniwa ntoko ohooli veeri wa anamuteko.

Elapo ya Zambezia, anamuteko a Instituto Nacional de Seguranca Social anirowa ooniphukiwa milattu mwaha wiira annithoonyiwa wiira aakuxa imiya 14 sa musurukhu, onilikana ni imiya 500 sa itolari. Nikhuru nuulupale na Elapo niinnitthapela ni soomaliherya siphwanyinwe wa woowana woomaliherya makhankwa, maxi nlelo maasi vakhani wa maasi manceene wa makhankwa ni aanamakhankwa.
Ohaaxiwa axithiyana nasiiyeya ohincerereya mwaha wa mananna osakya eretta ya Covid 19 oMosampikhi.
Nave nto ewarakha ya mononelo ya elapo onohaniwa Amnistia Internacional awehaweha mukhalelo wa ilapo sa oMosampikhi, Afrika tu Suli, Zimbabwe, Madasgar ni Zambia.

Mokontha wa sokhottihiwa sikina mwaha wa eretta ya Covid 19 yorukunuxa itthoko sinceene wa ilapo sa wAfirika wa vathi mapuro owana wana, otuphelana, ni ohaaxiwa wa athiyana ni asirusi owalela ni anammusini oowali.

Okumihenrye vaate nikuri nimosa nnihaniwa Amministia Internacional (AI), anihima wiira wottowa wocawela ni worowa okhapeleliwa wathu ohaaxiwa, mwa m'warakhani ethonyeriwe namanli, nihiku 9, ninsina "Owoniwa wa ikaruma sa vaate- ohaaxiwa axithiyana ni wakhuliwa wa Covid 19 wa elapo ya wAfirika vathi"
Elapo ya oMosampikhi ela po emosa ehinakuparela athihaya, nawe nto awo ahasuliwaka mphaka mmukuttani.

"Makhalelo ephatu oonanara, anihima wiira athiyana epotha ya mulopwana, nave mulopwana onimmana muthiyana onosiveliwaxa, sinnincererya ohaaxiwana athiyana ni asirusi a elipa sa oMatakaskari, oMosampikhi, wAfirika tu suli, Osampiya ni Osimpapwe", ennihima ewakha elempwale ni muholeli a nukhuru na wAfirika Ositentale ni Australi.

Ohiyatho ohaaxiwa athiyana, mananna yala osyaka eretta ya Covid 19, nave Daprose Muchena, ' "nave nto ohathererya mixankiho sa khalayi sintono ohawa, othanyana, ikhotto, othowa muteko, ni ohivara sana wa anamaphuka milattu"

Yoosoma ya Al enthoriha wiira ni makhalelo a wiikosoopa, axithiyana khaphunkwe oxaaxiwa ni axiiyeya, wala okhuma mmawannyeya ephavelaka okhapepleliwa ni wa otepihatho, mukhalelo owo, anamwaakiha ni mithukumano sinvara muteko sa okhapelela, ni waakhaliherya axithiyana khooneliwe vatthu ntoko muteko wookhalela, yiirinhe wiira, ehikhaliherye.
Ohaaxiwa wa athiyana ni makacamiho a makhalelo wa mMosampiiki
mMosampiiki, ativiixita mmosa ahupuxerya wii " axiruuxi annixutihiwa wii alopwana anaamana axaraya yakhala wii annaphenta", mukhalelo wa ephattuwelo enthonyiherya wahaaxa athiyana.
Ewarakha elempwale enihimya wii ophiya okathi wa mukhalelo oothanana aruuhale etala, vanceenexa wa anammawane yaakhala moohaawaane yaakhala mwaha wa sootumihasa sa mmawaane. .
Athiyana, waatta waya anivara muteko mukintaali, vawenhaya musurukhu anakhelaya "athumaka soothuma sowakuveya" ni "miteko yapwanyaya musurukhu omalaka" yiirihaka wii mukhalelo aya onatthikela ottuli.
Ettharihelaka siiso, "ovukuwa wa makhalelo oothaciri amusi yaahiruuhela manyakunyaku, onanariwa, oweryiha muru mwa amusi.
Muhooleli a muthukumano wa athiyana , Nsira te teus, onnilavuliwa muliivuruni, ahimyika wi anipwhanyaneya encerereyaka mammeru aathiyana anihaaxiwa mmuttettheni.

Mmukukuttani aatthu, Al onlepa ohinyakaa wi ovukuwa wa sa ovahiwa ehaahiya " athiya mmakhaleloni mwa ohaxiwa" , nthoko mooniheryo, yoolempwa ya " namuteko wooxipitaali yuulupale ya oMaputu, mwaha wi onivara ohiyu okathi mikukutta sihineetaaya, nihiku neettaka 31 Mweeri wa Maayu eyaakha ya 2020, ahiyeriwa, amaniwa, arupaniwa ni eviwa"
Ahirina nipuro noororomela.

Muthukumano yoola wa Al, onihimya olepaka makacamiho owaatta aphwanyasaaya wa ohaaxiwa athiyana yaala aphiyelela orowa ohimya mikacamiho seyiya waakunya, ntoko ohilipaneya okunya wa elapo ahu ni akunyanya yaala khankupali wi itthu iya siniiraneya.

Ninlelo mMosampiikhi, athiyana anceene anihaaxiwa annoova wakaxari axiiyeya ni ohula epaphelo ya sohakohiwa wa mapiliisa, mwaha wa woopopihiwa wa muxovo wa atthu mwaha wa ovilela wa ohaaxiwa wa athiyana otheliwa, " ohikhalana musurukhu wa namahaaxa ni oharoromela mukhalelo wa anaxariya

Teprose Muchena oohinya wi " othananiha wowii atthu anceene waAfrika ayustarale okhala muttetthe wowoophiha okhala muthiyana wala mwaaruxuri okathi wa eretta ya kovit-19 okhala owaani, ni onihimya wii ahooleli wa muttetthe wa mukhalelo wa okhumelela wa aAfirika Awustaraale (SADC) ahaana eroromeliha " ni okhapeleliha wa athiyana mwaha wa ohaaxana wa emuxeeni ni mukhalelo oxaxiwa athiyana ni axiyeya, eri mpantta woomeleliha wa sowaakhula sa elapo ahu mwaha wa ertetta ya korona viruxi ni iretta ikina.
Wuncererya wa iretta.

Wa Afrika tu Suli, esumana yoopacerya okhala mpaani mwaha wa koronaviiru, mapiliisa ahilepa wi yaahitthaniwa ni telefone atthu ophiyera 2.300 , 21 athiyana ni anamwane akhwiye mwaha wa axiyeya akina ni amusi aya.
O Zimbwawe, muthukumano mmosa nnakhapelela athiyana ooponnwe ohasuliwa, aphiya 764 nummuru na ohaaxiwa vatthokoni vaya mahiku muloko ni nihiku nimosa na owaleliwa mmpaani mwaha wa kora viiru.
Nihiku neettaka 13 mweeri wa Xunyu mwaakha wa 2020, nummru na athiyana ohaaxiwa yahiwela niphiya 2.768.

Ilapo sikina sookhopela, ntoko Madagascar, wuncererya wa osikhini, titepinhe mukhalelo ola wa nihasu na imuxeeni, ni athiyana ni axiruxi akhalakaoosikhine vanceene, wohi khalana musukhu, osikhini ola tunaahaxiha ni axiiyeya, wakhalihaka makhalelo oohasuwa.

Sampiya elapo emosa yonihenrye nummuru namukhani na athiyana oohaaxiwa, ovukuwa wa nummuru naya eri ya 10 puru sento, mweeri woopacerya eyaakha ya 2019, masi nthukumano na naasimm'mwa Younk Women's Cristian wahilepa ohimyika wi khaarere athiyana ohaaxiwa elapo yeele ya osampyia.

Ewarakha elempwe 45 ipaaxina, sinaanyiherya mipantta sinkumanaya wa makhalelo ohaaxiwa wa athiyana, makhalelo a eretta ya koronaviiru, makhalelo a mmuttettheni ni makacamiho soopukiwa milattu wa Afirika Awustaraale.

Ewarakha enkaliha, wanyiherya wa okiserya, wa nthonyiheryo na ohilamula saana wa aAfirika Awustaraal okhapelela wa makhalelo oophwanela a pinaatamu wa athiyana ni axiruuxi,okathi wa eretta ya koronaviiru .
Muthukumano wa Al onooniherya ihapari sowaatta, ihapari sikinaaku silempwe khalayi, masi khasintthareleliwa .
Mosampiihki: anamwane ophiyera 50% ya anamwane arina iyaakha vathi wa iyakha ithanu ohasuwasa ni owereyasiwa.
Anamwane owootta, aninnuwa ni ovelavela ni ohikhalana ephome iya mixankiho sohoola mwaha wa okhla ohilyaaka saana
Ohilya saana elapo mMosampiikhi.
Ohilya saana etthu emosa enaakacamiha anamawaani a oMosampiikhi, ewarakha yohikiserya ya mikohi kohi sa atthu ya ekumi { ITS}, olelo sinlaleyiwa ni Institutu Nasionaale ya Estatiistika {INE}.

Ohimya wa ewarakha ya neeraru ya emuxeni ya elapo ahu yotheene, elempwe eyaakha ya 2011, enihimya wii anamwane a nummuru na eriyari aanamwane otheene a elapo ahu ale ahimphiya miyaakha mithanu, akhalana eretta yeela envaliwa mwaha woohilya saana ni olya itthu pure-pure vatthokoni.

Isisapo mwaha wa wuncererana wa mathonyiheryo anooniherya ohilya saana wa anamwane, okhuma oveya waya ni ohinnuwa saana ni ohikhalana ephome, enahukhumu iterusu piili ya anamwane arina iyakha soophiya mithanu
Nnamwi muxankiho ola wa eretta mwaha wa ohilya saana etepaka, ewarakha ya okohakoha enihimya wii nummuru na anamwane akhwiye ninni vukuwa.
Iyaakha 15 sookiserya, okhwa wa anamwane oniphwanyaneya ovukuwaka okhuma 158 wa khula 1000 anamwane an'yariwa, mpakha 64 anamukhwa, wa khula ekonto emosa ya anamwane an'yariwa.
Wuncerereya wa mananna oohommwa ni evasina, ni miteko sa oyara wookhaliheriwa wa muxiripitaali iya miteko sirinhe wii mammuru a anamwane ankhwa enavukuwa.
Ankoola elapo emosa emphwanyaneya evukuwaka makhaliheryo aya a nikhuru na Freedom Hause.
Othowa wa patarooya elapo yeela ya Ankoola ni waattihiwa namuna soottharela sa ekunya ennivukul ohakalala wa atthu ela yeela.

Nthukumano yoola onaavarelela atthu, Feretoni Hawusi, onihimya arumeelaka ewarakha yoolem'pwa ayaaakha ya 2016, yeela emphwanyaneya esomwaka nihiku na namararu ehimyaka wi ovukuwa mahakalelo wa atthu nlaponi onnittikela eyaakha nloko soottharelana.
Ankoola elapo emosa ya Afirika enlavuliwa ekunya, yeela enniphwanyanela evukuwaka mukhaliheryo aya n'nikhuruni mommo.

Ewarakha elem'pwe ennihimya wi opaceya ohaawa opaceren'ye mwaha wa ohikhala saala wa atthu a elapo, ntoko Ankoola ni Asaperiaawu, elapo seyiya sinrumeela wahaaxa atthu yaale anivara miteko soowavarelela atthu.
Nimpaceya nummeru 100 ni nitthunaka osiviherya elapo ya Ankoola, yeela emphwanyaneya n'nikhuru na elapo soohaxiwa, mphwanyin'we mammeru 24.

N'nikhuru na nikhuru na exariya ni woopowa wa atthu- lummuru ninvahiwa ti nootepa oyevaxa thano na mosa, Elapo ya Ankoola naphwanye nummeru mathanu na mosa, niphwanyaneyaka kuntti na piili na warakha yoolepwa yeela yowarumeela atthu.

Okhuruwa ola wa mammeru opaceren'ye mwaha wa ovukuwa wa makhalelo mmuttettheni, mwaha yoola ohaaripiha murima atthu eelapo ya Ankoola, mwaha wi aniphanyaneya akacamiheyaka mwaha wa makhalelo aya oolya, waahasula atthu yaale anlavula ehapari, amiravo, anamavara muteko sa mmuttettheni ni ale anivara miteko sa tiini.
Ankoola elapo emosa eri muhina wa elapo sikinaaku sintthara opacerya mwaakha wa 2016 mwaha wa owaakhaliha atthu.

Nittharela muthukumano yoole omphwanyaneya elapo ya Owaxintto, yoola onihimya wi " oxakiheyaka mwaha woowela ehisapu ya patarooya, mukhulupale a epooma ya OLuwaanta onnirowa ovukula wiiwela masu anhimwa mmuttettheni ni aphwanyaneka waattiha makhalelo mwaathanle a atthu a elapo yeela ya Ankoola.

Nittharelaka elapo sikinaaku sa Afirika seyiye sinlavuliwa ekunya, ntoko Kaapu Veeriti elapo emosa yoottittimiwa mwaha wi eniphanyaneya ewelaka mammeru oophiyelela 90, ni elapo yeela khikhalanne nkacamiho.
Elapo sa Arikepeelaku sinnikhalana mammeru oowaatta, nummeru noopacerya, ti noowiitthuniherya makhalelo ohakalala mmuttettheni .

Nikhuru nennla sa elapo sa Arikipeelaku enoonaneya elapo ya Santome Pirinsipi, elapo yeela enniphwanyaneya ewelaka mammeru aphiyelelaka 81, ni phantte piili mwaha wa makhalelo ohakalala mmuttettheni .
Nitthikelaka ottuli nin' mphwanya elapo ya Mosampiiki, elapo yeela emphanyaneya nummeru 56.
Elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki miruku soowakhaliha atthu sinniphanyaneya siwelaka wa lummeru xexe, masi nave sookhuruwa miruku soohakalala mmuttettheni.
Nave, elapo ya Kine - Pisaawu yoonaneya ni nummeru 39, elapo yeela yaahalanne nimmeru nithanu miruku soohakalala mmuttettheni .

Nthukumano yoola Frentoni Hawusi anihimya wi ohaawa wala othowa musurukhu mulaponi ni ohiiwanana wa atthu elaponi makacamiho mamosa sikunxe elapo ntoko Ruusiya ni Xiina, ni elapo sikinaaku suulupale ni soottittimihiwa saanyoholaka atthu ankumiha manyakunyaku.
Nitthikelakatho, othama pure-pure wa atthu ni okhotto namuna iya sooruhela eyaakha ya 2015 manyakunyaku owaahasula atthu elapo sikinaaku.

Ewarakha elempwe enihimya wi elapo soopiyelela 72 sohoonaneya eyaakha ele evinre ovukuwa namuna sa makhaliheryo a atthu mmuttettheni, nave ovukuwa wa makhaliheryo yaala ahinceryereya iyaakha 10 seyiye sivinre.
Nthukumano yoola wa Ferentoni Hawusi onnihimyatho wi elapo soophiyelela 43 sinniphwanyaneya sivukuwaka makhalelo mahasu.

Muhina wa elapo 195 seyiye soonaxaxiwe soophwanyiwa 44 soohikhalana manyakunyaku a mahasu, elapo sikinaaku simphiyelela 30 sinoonaneya ovukuwa vakhaani mahasu yaala ni elapo 26 iya sootepa okhala soohasuliwa.
Nikhuru nenle na surutaatu aniwiva atthu elapo ya Opaaluma, linaakhula lihmyaka wi khankhoottasa waatthukula anamavariwa eekhotto.
Anamaalevelela atthu wala yaale anwaniha ekhotto ahimya wi nikhuru nnaasimwa Tiiki nahaarwela yaarweyiha mmapa mwaya atthu yaale otteela avarinwe nkhottoni mahiku yeettaaya 40 mweeri Maarusu.
CUWANISIPUURKU

Nikhiru nimosa na masurutaatu anlinvwa ni avarihiwa muteko ni akhulupale yaala a elapo ya Mosampiiki anikhootta ahinyaka wi khanimuthanla mutthu, atteele wala ariipe okathi woowarowela mutakhwani oroyihaka owaani,moolumo yaala amhimwa mwaha wa akunya avarinwe Opaaluma, mwaha wa ekhotto, mahiku yeettaya 24 mweeri wa Maarusu.

Anamaalevelela atthu wala yaale anwaniha ekhotto ahimya wi nikhuru nnaasimwa Tiiki Atibisiyori Kurupu anaathala akunya anaahiya anooripa okathi anaarwelaazaaya atthu yaale avarinwe nkhottoni aphwanyaneyaka Muuteeli Amaruula.

" Anamoona itthu soowathanya atthu ooripa sikhumelenle Oteeli Amaruula" anileela ahimyasaka mwha yoola, moolumo ala ohimye ti Deprose Muchena, nkhulupale wa nikhuru nenla ninaalevelela atthu ni ela seyiye simwaniha ekhotto muttetthe wa Afirika Oriyentaale ni Awuxitaraale.

Moolumo yaala alavuliwe ti owoopiha,mwaha wi wathanla atthu owaakuxa mwaha wooriipa wala otteela mukhottoni etthu yoonanara saana, makhalelo yaala anniphiyelela attittimihiwaka wala apaceriwaka othanliwa atthu yaale otteela.
Ohiiwanana wa masurutaato elapo ya Mosampiiki

Nikhuru na Tiiki Ativisiyoni Kuruupu noohimya nihiku na thanu na mosa wi alikooputuru aya owoopola atthu ophiyelela 24 aphwanyaneya Oteeli , atthu yaala thanu na mosa aari akunya akinaaku 18 aari anooripe.
Ekhuntti DAG khayamuthanlale mutthu aarowa woopoliwa.
Ekhuntti yeela yaahivarelela wala yaahireriha vatthu aarowa omorelala alikooputuru ni yaahapakhira atthu yaale aruhelinwaaya ni mukhulupale wa Oteeli.

Muteko yoola wootheene woowapakhira atthu mwaalikooputuni, "waavariwa ni atthu oothukumana makhuru a thanu na mosa, waavariwaka muteko yoola, anamuteko ahu khammumula" ala moolumo anisomwa va ewarakha yeela ya ehapari.
" Atthu owaatta naakhuminha ahu mukhottoni naarowanaka owaani, mahiku eettaaya 10, elapo yeela ya Opaaluma, otheene ari eelapo yeela ya OMosampiiki".

Nave, lummeru na atthu noophoyelela 240 yaale naakupenryaahu mukhottoni yeela enoonaneya ekisurwa ya Afunxi, lummeru nenla atthu 12 ari akunya, naahelakamo atthu yaale ookhwaasa mwaha wa ekhotto yeela naahakuxa naaroyihaka waamusini waya, moolumo ala anihimwa vawarakha.
