Nikhuru anaavarelela atthu noohimya wi etthu yaakunxe atthu ala awiivaka atthu akinaaku atthunasa ovitha itthu soonanara iransaaya, itthu seyiya namarumiha ti Marcelino Vilanculo, mukinaaku ari ti José Ali Coutinho yoola omalela ti ari namuhooleli.

Mukhulupale omphuka milatthu, Marcelino Vilaculos ivenwe nihiku 11 mweeri wa Apiriili mwaakha wa 2016, mukhulupale yoola atthuna osuwela moota xeeni avariwaawe mutthu yoole avarin’ we epooma ya OMaputu ni OMatoola.
Okhala muthiyana elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli avarin’ we ni itthu soohapala .
Muthiyana mmosa aakhuma epooma ya Sawu Paawulu lirowaka OMosampiiki ephoma ya OMaputu.

Muthiyana mukina atthukin’we namararu akunxe itthu soohapala, mahiku eettaaya 22, avarin’we nipuro nimmorea ntteeke elapo ya Afirika tu Sul, epooma ya Xonansipuuruku arowasaka elapo ya OMosampiiki, itthu seyiya akunxaaya sahimwa 223.
Mutthu athumiha itthu soohapala, yoola khahiminwe nsinana , masi yoola arwa epooma ya Sawu Paawulu arowaka OMaputu ni yoolya ahihya wi khakhalanne maphuta .
Maala mamosa alamuli anhimiya wiira tawaya, aveleeliwe elapo ya o Sam Pawulu, erowaka mpakha oMaputo. ahooneliwa mirupa mithanu ni eraru sa ikomputatoore sooveya sisarennye mataakhuru.

Valavuliwaya okathi vakhaane, muthonyiheri oolavuva a miteko sa okoporar miritti sinvira sirowaka wala sirwaanka waAfirika a oSuuli, Sandile Memela, oohimya wiira maala yarina mataakhuru aphwanyiwe okathi wa nsuwa nihikhumme.
Vavinraaya othorihiwa ophwanyiwe wiira muritti ole waari wa muthiyana mmosa aarowa oMaputo ole, orowa atthukeliwa.
Mapiliisa annikhuwa, ohimya nsina na muthiya onhoviheriwa onrowa okhumelela omphukiwa mulattu mahiku anoorwa.
Nakoso vaMuttetthene
Mahiku mathanu avinre, nipuro nimosa na ayereportu yophwanyiwa 6.5 ekiilu sa kokayiina muhina mwa ituupu sa ekereme, muritti mmosa onkhuma oSam Pawulu onrowa ephiro ya oharare, oSimpaapwe.
Mwaneene muritti khaphwanywe.
oreene siiso, otthukeliwa wuulupale okhumelenle niinano mweeri wokiserya, wonelinwaya 271 wa ilkiilu sa kokayiina armazem mamosa waattamela wayereportu oxowanespuurukhu
Mataakhuru ankhuma oSam Pawulu erowaka epooma ya okeeniya ya Nayiroopi.

Mwaha wa muthiyana otthukeliwe namaxexe ola okiserya, ohoviheriwa wawe wuulupale wowii mataakhuru yaarowa etthikiheriwa waAfirika a oSuuli, ni mikukutta, nyonelaka okhweya eforonteyira eriyari ya Mosampiikhi ni aAfirika ya oSuuli.

Atthu ayili oomosampiikhi aatthukeliwa mwaakha ovinre ikwaha piili sovirikana muhina mwa aAfirika a oSuuli, evinreene mukano wa eriyari ya ilapo piili ni mataakhuru manceene erowaka oXowanespuurukhu, iwe oneettihiwa nakoso muulupale a mataakhuru

Mosampiikhi, khorina mananna oorerela oweha-weha mukano, ole onvareliwa ontoko nipuro nivirihiwa mataakhuru eroyihiwaka wa aAfirika a oSuuli, ohinrere ovareliwa muteko aya opwaha ikwaha piili yalikanyihiwa ni mapuro a olumwenku wotheene, onvareliwaya muteko saana.
Oreene siso, mwakha ola wokiserya, amiravo athanu ni mmosa a elapo ahu ahokhwa yakhala elapo ya waAfirika a oSuuli ni atthu anlha mataakhuru yala.
Kuveerunu ohaana okoha kohaka wowaakuveya soottheka sa ekhotto sa oKaapu-Telekaatu, oleveleliwa soottheka wa ilapo sa okhopela.

Imiya imiya sene sa atthu oottittimiheya akhiiye, okaapu Telekaatu, ni muxovo wa muttetthe wa eporovinsiya yeele, Al-Shapaape, muxovo wa ovarelela ni Tyck Ativisoore krupu( DAG), muxovo wa atoropa wa xineene, atholinwe ni kuverunu, onlaleya oleveleliwa wa ilapo sa okhopela (AI), onvekela wiira omale ohooxana ni okoha-kohiwa sotakhala sa ekhotto.

Ekhotto, epacenre mwakha wa 2017, a Al, ohimmye wii muteko worerela wa ottottela sohimya mwaha wa ophwanhana ni miteko sa ekhotto, yohimya wiira ovikana 1300 ya atthu oottittimiheya akhwiiye, ni opwaha numuru na imiya imiya sene ya atthu avareliwe othaama muttetthe yakhalaya.

Yolempwaya yokiserya ewenhaka waari okhwiiwa: Sotakhala sa ekhotto oKaapu Eliyaliwe ya Mosampiikhi, a Al oohimya wiira mipantta miraru siri muhina mwa ekhotto sinni vara miteko sonanara sa ehakhi sa ilapo sa pinaatamu, ohiya okhwiiwa wohooxiwa, emaliherennye ni onyanyeya wa itthu sotheene ni muxankiho wa attthu.

Anamaki a oKaapu Telekaatu ari ookelihiwa eriyari ya mixovo sa ovarelela sa oMosampiikhi, ni mamiliisiya aaxineene anwana emukhaliheryaka kuveerunu ni muxovo wa anakhotto anwananaya oniitthaniwa Al-Shapaap, khaavo eriyari ya mixovo sa ekhotto seya miraru onttittimiha Ehakhi ya anammawaane, wiira ekhalana ekumi, nnakhala weettela malamulo a ekhotto, oohimya Deprose Muchena, muhooleli wa muxovo wa Olevelela wa ilapo sinceene siri waAfirika Awustaraale.

Muchena, oohimya wiira muxovo wa ilapo sa okhopela khonwerya omaliha muxankiho ola, owo onaavekela ale ari muhina mwa muxankiho ole wiira emalihe waahukhumu anammawaani, ni kuverunu a oMosampiikhi okohe-kohe vowaakuveya miteko iye sotakhala sa ekhotto.
Othikila exoko ya atthu ni mwiikho

Yolempwa, murivathi wa sokoha-kohiwa sa 79 wa anamacawi a ekhotto a mittetthe sophiya 15, a Al oohimya wiira anakhotto a Al-Shapaap ( ahikhanle vamosa ni Al-Spaap a oSomaaliya), aawiiva wooolakela anammawaane, epattiha ipooma ni inupa sa mwaaliteyiya ni evara miteko sa otakhala (...) ewiiva atthu anceene yathikilaka ixiko ni evara miteko sa mwiikho sa mirutthu saatthu akhwiye.
Atthu oovuluwa ahaaleela Al wiira, oKisanka, mweeri wa Marso wa eyakha yokiserya, muxovo ole wowiiva atthu, akina waahukhumu, akina waakuxa, aapaha inupa ni ahiiya etthu.
Onaakuxa amiravo no athiyana
Akina annikuxa wiira eniive exokolakaexiko
Akina anaanyesererya axitthiya wiira ekhale axaaraya ni wirra evareke miteko okuaritelo waya.
Amiravo enakhaliha akohotto aya, ohimmye nawoopowi.
A Al ohimya yookhumelela emosa ya muthiyana oorupala ya miyeeri mithanu ni miili, oopeliwe ohiiwa nipuro naari ekhotto waari karera, wa aliteyiya ya Nkita, mweeri wa Xuulyu, ayiyawe yiiviwaya.
Muthiyana ole aahivilela mpakha omuyara mwanawe ni mwakhwatta aarinaawe.
okusya miyuupuwelo sa wakhapelela anammawaane.
A Al oothoriha muxovo wa ekhotto sa kuverunu mwaha wa waakuxa erowaka oKaapu atthu ootakhala murima owiinana ni anammawaane, anwootherya wakhaliherya wala okhala vamosa ni Al-Shapaap
Yolembwa enhimya wiira atoropa ni mapiliisa aawiiva atthu ehinatthi ophukiwa ni miteeko sa ohukhumu ni miteko sotakhala sa oxikila erutthu ya atthu.

Eriyari ya mwaakha ole ovinre, enhimya yolembwa, sokhala miteko sivariwe enhimya wiira axithiyana yaakuxiwe ni atoropa a kuverunu erowa othupeliwa ekwaritelo emosa, weyiwo atthu akina yiiviwa ehiphukiwe.
Atthu yanilakaseya.
Yakuxiwa enaroyihiwa wari miithe suulupale wiira yiiviwa eriheliwekemo.
Awo annoowra ni ilista ya masina enanikoha nasuwelaka.
Hiyo khannotha, wiira ehinikuxe ntoko atthu ale akhwiye, ohimmye ti Al ovulunwe.
A Al onnuupuwela yolempwa enhymya wiira muthiyana ohiwanre ekuwo ahareere ohaaxiwa mpakha wiiviwa, mwaaka wa 2020, ni alopwana yaakhala wirra yaari atoropa a kuverunu a oMosampiikhi.

Woowi Al, atoropa a kuverunu oMosampiikhi khiyakhalenle wa ovara muteko aya okhanle waakhaliherya anammawaani wa ekhotto, atakhali, okhuxa atthu wohitthuna waya, ni miteko sikina sotakhala savariwa ni Al-Sapaap.
Mutthottokolo wa exipiritaali ya Mocímboa: Omusimpwa

Dyck Advisory Group (DAG), empereesa: empresa ya anakhotto yoohikhala ya kuveerunu ya Waafirika wa osuuli: sul-africana eri ti yiihaniwe Mmosampiikhi: Moçambique wiira ewane ni maconi akhumelenle Okhaapu Telekaatu, Al onnihimeerya wiira anamakhalela anilavula wiira eyo ti etthu yootepexa onyoonya epakiwe.

Anakhotto a DAG "aamoopasa kapwitthi muulupale anarisi mweelikoopeturuni: helicópteros, arihelaka ikaranaata: granadas sa mmatatani mapuru ale yaaphwanyaneya atthu ni tho atthikelaka yaanirihela mapuro ale saapwahanyaneya tho infaraxiturutuura sivili: infraestruturas civis, ixipiritaaali: hospitais, ixikola: escolas ni impa sinikhaliwa", moolumo ala asomiwe murelatooriyuni: relatório.

Wa sookhumelela soohilokasa sikina, Al onnihimeerya wiira mweeri wa Xuunyu: Junho, epooma ya Omusimpwa: Mocímboa, "ilikoopeturu: helicópteros sa DAG saahipwanyula exipiritaali okathi wooniwaaya maconi a Wal-Xapaapi: 'Al-Shabaab' yeepithanse muxipiritaali mwemwe"
"Maconi owaatta yaaphwanyaneya muxipiritaali: hospital, yuupuwelaka wiira ilikoopeturu iye khisaarowa opwanyula."

Masi anakhotto yaari mweelikoopeturuni asuwelasa ele yiiraneya ni alakelasa opahasa exipiritaali: hospital, ti vo, exipiritaali yootheene ehanle yoopwanyuwaseene. - oolavula namakhalela/namoona mmosa.

Muchena onihimya wiira "empereesa: empresa (DAG) khetthanre voowoonaneya ehakhi ya atthu a mulaponi mwahu ni ale a ota mwaha voomoopa kapwitthi mapuro ale yaaphwanyaneya atthu, ophwanyula sootekasiwa sa atthu ni wa ohisuwela waaweha anakhotto ti avi wala atthu oohikhala anakhotto ti avi".
"Vanniphaveleya waavahererya wa sootheene iye ahononniyaaya wiira alokiherye". - Oolavula Muchena.
Musukho wa mulaponi mwahu ti wootepa olimitareya: limitada.
Inxitituutu sa Misomo sa Ikonoomiku ni Isosiyaale: Instituto de Estudos Económicos e Sociais enilamula wiira elapo ahu kherina musukho wa mpuwa.

Inxitituutu sa Misomo sa Ikonoomiku ni Isosiyaale: Instituto de Estudos Económicos e Sociais enilamula wiira musukho okhanle Mmosampiikhi ori vakhaani, ni khoniphiyerya ovaha ipurusentu: por cento soophiyeraka 10 wiira wiira apakiwe anakoso ooreerela muhina mwa elapo ahu sintoko sinooniheryaaya ilapo sa ota, ti vo elapo ahu enikhalaaya okopha musurukhu ehiniweryaaya oliva.
Mosampiikhi oninnuwa ni mukhaliheryo wa mwaakakaniho wa musukho wa mpuwa ni ole wa ota, eyo ti enooniherya wiira elapo ela ya Omosampiikhi khenipaka musukho aya, sintoko vanooniheriwaaya ni IESE.

Wa sootheene, wuumaleloni wa miyaakha iya, woopacerya okhala musukho wooreerela, masi nlelo khoreere oyeva "okhala wiira khoniphiyerya ovaha ipurusentu: por cento soophiyeraka 10 wiira apakiwe anakoso ooreerela muhina mwa elapo ahu", sintoko onihimya awe tiretoori: director a inxitituwisawu: instituiinstituição ele.
António Francisco ookhupaleela wiira"ekonomiya: economia ya Mmosampiikhi elokiheriwe ni misukhu sa ilapo sikinaku, sintoko, anakoso a ilapo sa ota, mukopiho wa musurukhu ni soovahiwa"

Namasoma ole onihimya wiira eyo yookhalana ehisapu aya "okhala wiira ti ele ehimiwe wiira ottharelela ewooro:ouro elapo ehaana winnuwa ni musukho aya ni enamalelihiwa ni misukho sa ota, masi mpantta ahu, muthanlo ti woovirikana"
Sintoko onihimyaawe Francisco, muttharelelo wa musukho wa ota onniruuhela mukopho wa musurukhu woorika oliva.

Tiretoori: director wa IESE oohimya wiira mpakha mwaakha wa 1984 elapo ya Omosampiikhi yaamooceela oliva musurukhu waakomphaaya ni yaahaana olavulela tho vakina ni mukhaliheryo wa Ifuntu Monitaariyu Interenasiyonaali: Fundo Monetário Internacional FMI.
Mwaakha wa1999, mwaha yoola waahitthikela tho ni oleveleliwa.

"Mukhumelelo wa niinaano, mwaha ola khoreere waakuveya okhala wiira khasireere okhumelela myaha soowaatta sa okomphwa musurukhu wa mananna oovitheya", oolavula António Francisco, ohimyaka wiira yooreera Mosampiikhi opacerya orumeela musukho wa ota wiira omulipiherye nakoso ni ohiya olyaaka musurukhu owo.
The Economist "onnivirikaniha" miruku sa Kuveerunu a Mmosampiiki.
Maxipesiyaliixita: Especialistas annithoonyerya mwinnuwelo wa ipurusentu: por cento soophiyeryaka 3,8 ohiya ipurusentu: por cento 4,5.

Muhina mwa moonelo wa Maxipesiyaliixita: especialistas wa Economist Intelligence Unit (EIU), onihimya wiira mwinnuwelo wa ekonomiya: economia ya mmosampiikhi woophiyerya ipurusentu: por cento 4,5 muhima mwa puruxeetu: projecto wa Kuveerunu a mmosampiikhi: Governo moçambicano ti "wootepa olipaneya".

Muveleeliho wa niinaano wa alipa a anakoso, maxipesiyaliixita: especialistas a reviixita piritaanika: revista britânica The Economist annithoonyihera mwinnuwelo wa ipurusentu soophiyeryaka 3,8 ovirikanihaka muupuwelo wa niniixituru wa Ekonomiya ni Ifinansa: ministro da Economia e Finanças waarina ntoko mwinnuwelo wa Musurukhu wa Exitaatu: Estado ovahiwe olelo Oparalamentu wa mmosampiikhi.

Muvukuwo wa ekonomiya: económico onileeliheriwa ''mpantta ni mpantta'' mwaha wa mikhumelelo sa ota, sintoko ihisapu soopunttheya sa makhala, alumiiniyu: aluminioalumínioni titaaniyu: titaniotitâni, imateeriya pirima: matéria-prima sooreerela Mosampiikhi oniroohaawe ilapo sa ota, masi tho maanaliixita a Economist annithoonyerya tho mikhumelelo sa mpuwa, sintoko "murumeelo woohireerela wa ekonomiya: económica mpantta wa Kuveerunu" ni mikopho sa misurukhu soovithiwa, siruuhenle mmalamaliho wa mikhaliheryo sa ilapo sa ota.

Maxipesiyaliixita wa EIU annoopererya okhala murumeelo wa olipihereya saana, "wiira ohikhale mukutokuto wa mwinnuwelo", ohiya oruuhela "muthowelo wa miteko ni mihaawelo sootepexa winnuwa'', soowuncereriwa ni "mukhalelo wa othacirelo wooreerela wa mmwaani"

Nitthikelaka tho, meekonomiixita: economistas ni miniixituru ookhalayi a Ifinansa, Abdul Magid Osmane, oohimya wiira elapo ahu ehaana opakelela miruku sikina, ohiya okhalana murumeelo wa olipiherya paahi, wiira nimalihe ohaawa oniphwannye niinaano, onoonaneya ni muthowelo wa miteko, oyevihiwa ehisapu musurukhu wa elapo ahu ni mwinnuwelo wa ihisapu sa itthu.

"Ti ola okathi wooreerela ovaanelana ni FMI, siiso paahi tontthunaaya oweryaneya oruuhela mulipiheryo wa macro-económica ni mulipaneyo wa alipa a nakoso", ohaakiherya Osmane, ori ti wooperenrye okhala irefooruma: reformas, sintoko oyevihiwa ehisapu ya musurukhu, wiira nilipiherye ekonomiya: economia ya elapo ahu mpakha eriyari ya mwaakha wa 2017.
Mmosampiikhi ahaakheleliwa atthu akenle niinaano mukoorupuni mwa mmaaleleyo: Corpo da Paz.
Mutikiniho woopacerya ophinye mulaponi mwahu mwaakha wa 1988.
Nikhuru na niinaano na anamwiikumiherye na maamerikaanu: americanos wa mukoorupuni mwa mmaaleleyo Mmosampiikhi nookhalela enamayili ela, mahiku yeettaka 2 a mweeri yoola, Omaputu.
Mwaattelo wa anamwiikumiherye ooforumariwa: formados epetakooxika: pedagógica ari 54 anikela opacerya ovara muteko muhina mwa iporovinsiya 10 mulaponi mwahu, mpakha miyaakha miili.

Olavulaka okathi weeraneyaaya ettiyansa, namavahereriwa a Anakoso wa Empaxaata ya waameerika: Embaixada americana Mmosampiikhi Mark Cassayre oororomeliha wiira anamwiikumiherye ale aakhalana owerya miteko sa osomiha, ti vo, anookela waathoonyiherya mapurusoori ni anaxikola wa ele anisuwelaya.

Cassayre oolipiherya wiira anamwiikumiherya ahaana okhala ntoko muthoonyeryo, yaataanaka ni atthu muhina mwa iporovinsiya iya anivaraaya miteko saya wiira elekaatu: legado ya muvahereryo wa osuwela atthuru ehirimeele.

Muliipa Onaahoolela anakoso a Empaxaata ya Mittetthe Sowuuraana a Omosampiikhi oxukhurela nikhuru na aliipo owivahererya ale yamiini waahiya amusi aya yireelaka yaakhalihe apinaatamu akiina ni ilaapo sotteevela.

'' Nyuwosa mohiiya opuuha wa mmawaanyinyu Wameerika wi mweette ekwaaha yoowatteevela amusi anyusa ni okathi anyu mwireelaka ovaha, ikuuru ni mukhaliheryo anyu muhiina mwaale amphavela'' ahikupali nekekhayi muhooli.
Nikhuuru na aliipo Owikumiheerya aniirela mmpantta ti amwiixuuttihi a ekelexi, piyooloxiya, Kiimika, fiisika ni aliipo a ikootha.
Nniikhuru nna, Mosampiikhi oviira onaalika ni 175 emiiya emoosa ni milooko mitha namiili ni athaanu a mamampuru atthu amureettele.
Anamwivahererya opaceerya amulaaponi mu aphimwaakha wa 1988.
Muraano amwixuuttihi Omosampiikhi anoovelela muhina mwa manamuna otthikela osoomwa Wamphula

Muraano amwixuttihi Omosampiikhi osuwelexiwa ni (ONP), Wamphula, ota ya Omosampiikhi, anoova wi ixikoola wi khasitthokiihe volokasa wi itthikeele vasya wala ikeleelihe omuhooli miteeko sosooma, mahiiku yaphiya 27 wa mweeri yoola.

Miteko soteene sosoomwa sihitetereriwa mweeri wa neraaru mulaapo moteene wi eikasoopiwe walaanyeya wa mwaxiitthu onintanyerya koroona, maasi amhooleli akwanyererya wi itthukuleeliweke vakhani vakhaani, mukhalelo ohireere okhoottiwa muhina mwana mawaani ovirikana.

André Jana, Sakrataari a muraano wa ONP, onihimwa wi nnaamwi Kuveeruni eteteerye otthikeliwa vasya wa miteeko sosooma onroowa wonaneya nihiiku na 27 na mweeri yoola, vekeekhayi ixiikola nnleelo khiirina mireerelo sa maana.

Muraano ole oni wi otthikeliwe vasya miteeko sosoomwa ti vopwanelela wi nivukuule wakweeherya mamwiixuuttihi ale ari anaxiikola muhiina mwa mwaxiitthu mutaanyeryo wa Covid-19, ntooko nilipiheryaka miteeko sowirattela ni oweha weha mukhuruuru a eruutthu.

Ole, ohuupuxerya wi mapwanyeryo maasi, ori tiyuulupalexa erumeeliwa wi niraattele,toori muxaakiho muluupalexa a ixiikola sa Wamphula, siirina wa khuta etuuruma mwaattelo mmoosa okhanle ophiyaka anaxikola 74. Ole, ohuupuxerya wi mapwanyeryo maasi, ori tiyuulupalexa erumeeliwa wi niraattele,toori muxaakiho muluupalexa a ixiikola sa Wamphula, siirina wa khuta etuuruma mwaattelo mmoosa okhanle ophiyaka anaxikoola 74.
Epuruvinsiya ela ti yootepa watta apinaatamu ya elaapo,nnakhala vakhaani, ta imilyawu thana moosa sapinaatamu.

Vanilipeleliwa wi wopaceryani miteko soosoma, ituuruma sinakhupaarela anaxikola 20 wa khuta, yaawo Jana onoorowa okhanyererya wuncereeriwa wa nuumaru na amwixuuttihi , alipo ankhaliherya ni esupusiitiyu ya ekasoopa.

Axitiitthi ni aliipa ohoolela amwiixutti, vayiwiwe aya muhina mwa ehapari VOA, anisuweeliha wi nnakhala khani yoroohe anaaya Oxikola, maana musaala munsoomwa, mookhala okhala mapuuro ateepa yoopiha omuraavamwaxiitthu , ni anivaaha moneelo aya wi mwaakha wosooma wunteeriwe.

Nnaamwi okupaleelaka mixankiiho iya, Jana aniisuweliha '' amwixuttihi ari owitthokihe ene wi atthikeele ovaara muteeko, maana wi wunteererya mwaakha wosooma onotanyerya mixaakiho sowaatta, vanceenexa waale ari anaxikoola a mwaakha okhiseerya''.
Mosampiikhi oreepela ampaakha oleelo va , mahiku aneetta aya 9 mweeri wa nethana miili, ekooto 1092 sa mwiiha sa Covid-19.
Wamphula ti muttetthe a epuruviisiya yootepa walaanyeya ni mwiiha imiiya 247.
Mulaaponi mu, ekwereere ohaaviriha etuniiya atthu thana xexe.
OMS, onikhanyaanya ni miriira sa axiitthu elaapo ya an Tome Piriinsipe.
Thana neeli paahi watthu ale ekooto 1.445 tapwanyaniwe ekwereere ya wiipa mitiika, apwanya exikhaani oratteene.

Anamattanleliwa a miteeko sa Muraano Olumweenku a Okuumi osuwelexiiwa (OMS) anikupaali wi akalaana mihuupi sikhaanle wakweeherya wattemuleela axiitthu aari tantanyerya opwattuwa wa ekwereere yotthowa yapwaanye atthu imiiya- imiya sene an Tome Piriinsipe.

Noovira okaathi woophiya miyeeri mithanu mwa sothokosiwa muhiina mwa ekwereere, epaceerye wiliipiha mweeri wa Namulooko a mwaakha wa 2016, suweeli athoonyerya mikhaleelo sopaceerya muhiina mwa maphattuwelo wa wiipa mitiika wapwanye atthu owattameela ekooto 1.500.

Ntooko vasuweliha awe Kamal Mansinho, sookhala mwaanyiheryo sa makweeheryo wa ireetta siiri sintanyerya oraava yeera aari axiitthu a nikhuuru na mitthaali sokhaleene mulaaponi mu siniireliwa wi oloolaniwe viira vapaceryaka vaavale ekwereere ela viira ewereyaka vaceenexa envaara miyoono ni meetto.

Musuweeli Purtukeexi ole olipiheerya vaavale wiira awe osuhelihaaka muhapaarini wi araaru wa axiitthu athanleliwa mmpanntta aya ni wi vaniinanoni va ti vopwaanela owataaniha variyaari wa aleesa ni anamuuno ni sintaanyerya .

Mansinho nleelo osuweeliha wi axiitthu anruwerya itookisina, sinkhaala vamoosa napinaatamu ni ani wakameela nikhuuli vokweheriwa ni waatthama waya onitatuuxa nomwaxiittu aya, onviira onateepa ni onaweereya ni manaamuna oviriikana ntooko mukhalelo amaphattuwelo a khuta mureetta.
Ntooko musuuweli ole, okaatthi ola okhaala mwaattelo mmoosa wa areetta ariina maruupela owiixa ni omwarya-mwareya ni wi mpaakha va khanrumeela mitthali paahi wi apwanye exikhaa.

'' Vahaana yoperaariwa ni mmpaaka akinaaku akhaala orwa okhalanaka mikutha kutho sa mukhaleelo wala muxankiho owookola moono wala mweetto wiira okhaathi wovoola ehitthariheliwaka ikettelo sa watteeriwa oxiripitaali'', othalaakasa.
Musuweeli onikupaali wimwaattelo wa wiipa mitiika sirepeeliwe Osan Tome Piriinsipe, sinoorowa okweherya othokosaasiwa mwaha wa ekwereere ele mipaatta sa ilaapo ikiina.

Ntooko vasuweeliha amahooleli a miteeko sa okuumi sa Osan Tome Piriisipe, wa ekooto 1.445 sa mwiiha sisuuweliwe mulaaponi mme mpaakha vaniinanoni va atthu thana naali paahi tapwaanye exikhaani yomaalela.
Kuveeruni Omosampiikhi ni aliipa okoopheliwa akhoopela aari ni '' mivaanelo sootepa awalamela'' Olootere.
Anamawewa aniihimwa wi waminiiwa wa estaato ompwanyaneya owoopopiheya.

Koveeruni Omosampiikhi onroowa othukumaana mahiiku yettaka 20 mweeri wa neraaru, Olootore, Reinu Unido, naalipo wakophele awe akhoopela wi omanaanihe othookiha vasya-sya okoopha vireliwa aka anamunceene, wi apwanyiwe manamuna oruuhela exikhaani.

Anamiruuku anihooviherya wi mivaanelo iya ti ookorakora muhiina mwa iye oniitthaniwa okoopwa wohataneeliwa, vahinaatti oleelaniwa mmaleleke wa ikootha ni otumereeriwa atthu ale ari muhiina mwa okoopha nno mpantta waale aari ahooleli Omaaputu .
Variyaari va iyaakha sa 2013 ni 2014, impeeresa sa Ematum, ProIntikus ni Mam, sokoopha, vohitthariheela ikettelo, musuurukhu ikooto ikooto seene piili sa itoolare.
Vanirowaaya mpantte mukina ni woowaattexa wa muhakhu onivira otthuneyaka osuweliha vakelalyaaya, n`impereesa sinceene sinihimya wiira ela essiri yookhupaarela elapo.

Sintoko sihimyalyaawe musuweli a mihakhu ni oruwerya, Antonio Francisco, Ofalume wa oMosampiki khonikupaliwa ni yoohiya ororomeliwa n`aalipa ookopiha muhakhu ni ananakoso, otepaxa wene , maana namalamula yoola oovirikanya mlamulo.

Esenturu y`Intekiritaate Puuplika (CIP) wala Nikhuru Noororomeleya na Atthu Otheene onikhanyererya ovekela wiira Eminixiteeriyu y`Ootthariha Milattu s`Aatthu ewiirele sintthuneyaaya wala yaahukhumu atthu ale akomphe muhakhu voohitthokiheya, yiirelaka wiira ala ehaakanyerye othokosiwa oniiraneya.
Axithiyana ari ni ihamela anihaaxiwa vaili vaili.
ONG sinimphunyaphunya namalamula woowi ophuce nikanyero naakhanyereriha othamiheriwa osoma ohiyu axithiyana ari ni ihamela.
oMosambiki, orupala oyenveene oniruuhela othelaniwa w`aatthu ohittokottha, ni ori wa nikhuru na ilapo sootepaxa wa olumwnku.
Makhalelo a mmuttettheni ni sawatiminixitarasawu sinaahimyana axithiyana okhala tanivonya, nnya, makhuru ohikhala a kuveerunu aniphavela orukunuxa etthu ila.
Mwaakha wa 2004, Adelina Tiroso ahirupala ni aahonexexa othanyiwa: "Aari mwaamukhanixani aahikhanyererihiwa osoma ohiyu ni atthu aalupale.
Mwaha wookhala ni ehamela kaaiweha ohooneliwa vatthu.
Kiwaarere orika ovilelela etthu ila."
Nuumala oyariwa mwaana muthiyana, mweeri wa Junyu wa mwaakha yoowo, Tiroso ahiraana ni nikhuru ninakhupaarela axithiyana.
"khavanireerela waathamiherya axithiyana osoma ohiyu.
Etthu ila enikhaliherya ovira wuupuweliwaka wiira mwaamuthiyana arupala ohana atheliwaka," oohimya.
Sintoko ola, axithiyana anceene aathamiheriwa osoma ohiyu.
Ohukhumiwa nno waakhuma Omwaalaano wa Osoma
Maativiixita aanyohola imara sinceene yoohimya eri mutekeretuni nummaru 39/GM/2003.
Yoohimya ela, eniruuhela onyokhiwa wa mwaamuthiyana mmuttettheni ni onnikhaliherya ohiyererya osoma.
Nnya, oniroromeliwa wiira ohaaxiwa nno ohanle omala.
Wamuthukumanoni wanaananoxa ni makhuru ohikhala a namalamula, Mwaalaano wa Osoma woororomeliha ophuca yoolepiwa ela.

"Minixituru mwaneene ookupali ophuca (...) ni kinikupali wiira okhuma va mpakha ohoolo khanniweha-tho itthu soolikana seiya.", oomuhimeerya VOA mukhulupale a Nikhuru n`Aanamalaleya Aapatthani Aanamwane.
Mureerelo ola wa onamakhaliyerya wa Recac ni makhuru makina kahiyo yoolaru pahi, ohimya Claudina.
Sintoko sihimyalaawe owo, Recac onivira aaxuttihaka alipa ihapari woowi osuweliha mureerelo woowaahiya axithiyana muxikola ni ootumererya mwaha wa mixankiho s`ootheliwa axithiyana enari acikhaani.
"Nimphavela wiira alipa ihapari yaahimereyeke ananmawaani wiira axithiyana yasomasa onoorowa owerya okhaliherya sinitthuneya waamusi.
Khoniphiyerya ohimya wiira hooye waathela axithiyana, onitthuneya olakiherya sihinvaha mureerelo," ohimya Claudia.

Mphimo wa makhuru sintoko Recac omukumiha Mosampiki nipuro na namuloko (10o) wa ilapo iye axithiyana anitheliwaaya ehinatthi ophiyeriha iyaakha muloko ni thanu ni tthaaru ni anihukhumiwa ovira okathi wooteene wa ekumi aya ni osikini wootepaxa.
w`Aasiya: Muttetthe wa misulu onikhupaareliwa tonirowa waattela mixukhurwo wa Joe Biden.
Namaranttela a mukhulupale a w`Aamerika onirowa oJapawu, oChina ni Okuusini wa oKoreya esumana enirwa mmunkoni wa mukwaha oniireliwa okhomaalihiwa opatthani ni nakoso.

Anamaweha ahimya wiira vanaamwiira wuupaceryani muxukurwo wa Joe Biden oPekim wiireliwa mwaha wa mihakhu ni mipantta sikina s`ookhalihaniwa, ohiiwanana wakumelenle naananoxa ni yoohimwa ya muttetthe wa misulu onikutteleliwa, ohitto wa ephareya ya oXhina ni namalamula oXiina, onihaleela vakhani okhala mwaha muulupale onirowa ovaaneliwa.

Anamaakhulasa ya atiminixitarasawu ya Obama ahimya wiira Joe Biden onirowa ovekela mwaha waapuxeriwe ni muttetthe wa misulo onikutteleliwa omanle opakiwa ni ophavelasa ovukuwa onyakula, nnya khanirowa olavula ntoko n´wanani a kuverunu a oPekim.

Yaawo ahooliha wiira mukwaha owo onrowa okhala okathi wooreerela wiira Biden olavule vamosaru ni amahooleli amaxiiina mwaha wa yoolakeliwa, ohimya itthu simuthananiha oWaashintoni ni ophavelasa osuwela vakhiviru vene ekiisha ya Xiina.
Jonattan Pollack mempuru a Instituutu ya Borookink ya oWashintoni DC, ni onihimya wiira etthu ela tenirowa omukuxereriha wiira okhalane okathi vakhani woowi ovara miteko sikina.
Owo ohooliha wiira muttetthe wa misulu onikhupareliwa kahiyo pahi onirowao ovaaneliwa oPekim, navetho oTokiyu ni oSewuuli.

"Ankha owo, Biden onirowa mukwaha mmosa wiira khula mpantte wiira awehexexe oratteene mitthaka saanamalamula ya muthukumano waneeraru, koosuwelexa wiira mwaha ola wa muttetthe wa misulu onikhupaareliwa onihala orowa otakaanihiwa moovanelani ya mukwaha yoola ni mananna owiwanyeya, vahinaaniheryaka okhala ele eniphavelaawe Xiina".

Ilapo anaittoko a oXiina aavanhiha ni nthiti opattuxiwa wa muttetthe owo wa ophareya ya oXiina, ni matteeke amasurutaato, maamerikaano, majaponeeshi ni okuusini-makoreyaano aatupha nipuro voohaahimeerya alipa okunya a oXiina..
Pekim ahilopola wiira matteeke anirowa ovolowa muttetthe ole voohihimya akhala oohaaxiwa ni osurutaato.
Waakhula wawe, namalamula amaxiina opacerya weettelela muttetthe wa misulu onikhupaareliwa.
Sintoko Japawu siisaale Okuusini ya Okoreya aahimya wiira yaanaaniherya wuncererya tho mittetthe saya sa misulu sinikhupaareliwa.
Nanmuranttela namalamula Joe Biden, onivenya Ettiminku arowaka oJapawu ni woottharelana mpakha oPekim ni oSewuuli, weiwo onitthikelaawe oWashintoni, Mutivela
Biden onirowa opacerya ovaanela ni makhulupale maxiina vamosa ni Muhooli Xi Jinping ni minixituru oopacerya Li Keqiang.
oJapawu, onoorowa okumaana ni minixituru opacerya Shinzo Abe ni navetho ni anamalamula a Eparalamento ya oJapawu.

oSewuuli, mukhulupale namakhaliherya a wAmeerika onoorowa ophavela osuwela sa miteko sokutteleliwa sosyakihiwa sotakha muttetthe wo Koreya ni onorowa olavula oxikola ekhulupale yo Yonsey wariyari wa opatthani wa muttetthe wohitto wo Koreaya ni elapo yo Ameerika ni olavuliwa sa miteko sa politika sa wAmeerika, mpantta yoole.
Ohitiwa wa namasuweliha ihapari a wAmeerika "Mukhalelo wotakhala", ohimya mukhulupale Obama
"Ale anvara sa manyala sowatuphela atthu a wAmeerika anorowa oxutta wiira hiiyo khininliyala, wi wanalokela wanorowa ovariwa muteko wowoneehiwa exariya ”, ohimya mukhulupale Obama.
Mukhulupale a wAmeerika Barack Obama ohoona wiira wokotthiwa wa namasuweliha ihapari a wAmeerika ni masurutaatu a nikhuru “Estado Islamico” okhala ntoko yotakhala yotapanyihiwa mukhalelo.

Wolavula ni anamasuweliha ihapari wa ekwaha yoorowa w'Estooniya, Obama ohimya wiira ale akhwerenkhwe Steven Sotloff aavonya iye saphavelaaya okhala wiira elapo yo Ameerika ni olimwinku wotheene ohawereya yotakhala yiiranen'ye ni khanrowa woova nnakhala vakhaani: "Ale anvara sa manyala sowatuphela atthu a wameerika anoxutta wiira hiyo khinniliyala , ni hata wanapisaka onovariwa muteko woliverya yiiranen'ye wa xariya siiso.

Mukhulupale Obama, olavunle siisa nomala atakhali a nikhuru Estado Islâmico, akhalenle mittetthe khamosa-khamosa sa oSiriya ni w'Irakhi, woniherya eviitiyu emosa yohitiwa namasuweliha ihapri mukina aneenli a wAmeerika, Steven Sotloff.

Afalume elapo yo Ameerika akupaleela okhala ekekhayi eviitiyu olaleeriwe mu internet wa yeeyo atakhali a nikhuru "Estado Islamico" nnihimya ovara sa manyala amuthonyaka mukhulupale a wAmeerika Barack Obama wi tiwakuxererin'he sivanryaaya ni ikhotto sa ipompa savonyiwa ekhumelo ya musulu mwa elapo yo Irakhi.

wa ntoko siranen'yaaya wa ekwaha yopacerya yo wokotthiwa namasuweliha ihapari, namasuweliha ihapari a wAmeerika onooneya okokhonre ni wemeleliwe ni mutakhali owikhuneela owiitho ni ompacerya olavula toko: "Kinitthaniwa Steven Joel Sotloff.
Kosuwela wiira wannisuweliwa miyo pani ni exeeni enkhumelelaka wa eviitiyu yeela".

Ottharela waya wa eviitiyu yeeyo mutakhali yoowo olavulaka wa nttaava na ekelesi enkhala ntoko ya opiritaanica onnimuromola mukhulupale Obama: "Amiikhi anyu yatuphelaka atthu-ahu, muxovo-ahu, mwaalo ahu onopwahererya wikittha ixiko sa muxovo anyu".
Wottharelana mutakhali onnihita ni eviitiyu enmalela wa ikhalelo sa othunku.
Mutakhali wahimya ipompa sa vonyiwa musulu mwa muttetthe wo paraaxi wo Mosuli, ekhulupale ya elapo ya w'Irakhi, ni ikhotto sikhumelenle wa Amerli epooma ya muttetthe woota wa w'Irakhi.
Wa muttetthe yoole ananmuttettheni atthapela nomala masurutaatu afalume a w'Irakhi ookhaliheriwa ni masurutaatu a wAmerika omalamaliha mukuttelelo wonaneya wakhaleliwe ni "Estado Islâmico".

Warokhalaru mwanvaavo, Washington wanamwi wokotthiwene namasuweliha a ihapari, axitokweene aasuweliha wiira khan'hiyererya otuphela wa khotto wampwaheryo wa muttetthe wo Mosul, ntoko sisuwelin'haawe miya-muhupi Almirante John Kirby: "Awo yaphwahereryakaru wopopiha mapuro munivarahu muteko, ninopwahererya watuphela wa khotto".
Ekumi ya Steven Sotloff yaari yowopopiheya ekhumelo wa khatir ya isumana piili, okathi mutakhali owikhuneela owiitho wopopihaawe ni nsu na ekelesi.

Ntoko sahimyaawe mutakhali, Sotloff waarowa wokotthiwa ntoko James Foley, namasuweliha ihapari mukinaku eelapo yo wAmerika wokotthiwe wa nenanoxa ni nikhuru nenna, yakhala wi khiwarowa ohiiwa ovonyeriwa ipompa sa khotto.
Owalamela wa makhalelo onnitepa mMosampiki
Ovunyeya wa muhakhu ophiya ipursento muloko ni piili.

Owalamela wa makhalelo onnitepa wa khuta nihiku mMosampiki, ovunyeya wa muhakhu wophiyererya ipursento muloko ni piili mpakha wimaloni wa mweeri ovinre, onakuxereriha owalamela wa makhalelo ni wincerereya ihisapo sa eyoolya, ni wahoonihereyaka ovukuwa, walikanihiwa ni ohirupa epula ononaneya muttetthe wohitto wa elapo.
Wa muthananiho yoola, ori mpuwa owanawana wa miteko sa politika ononaneya.

Musukhu wokomphwa mulaponi oniphiyerya imilyawu imiya thannattaaru ni miloko mithanu wa toolari ovekeliwe ni mutthenkeso wa Ematum wireliwaka othumeliwa apakiti ni woneleliwa wanenanoxa ni Wall Street Journal okhala tho evaale ya imilyawu imiya thannapiili ni miloko mithannamiraru ni thannapiili sa toolari, mukhalelo otepin'he owela evaale ya mulaponi wa ipurusento miloko miili ni thanu nave mukhalelo onihinmwa otepihaka owalamela wa makhalelo mulaoni, ntoko sihinmyaawe musuweli a mite sa muhakhu Alfredo Mondlane.

Wa mpantta mukina, musuweli a miteko sa muhakhu Edilson Mungumbe, oniroromela wa yothananiha yeela, okupaleelaka wiira yakhala wi afalume anophwanya musurukhu mukina evaale yokhala oolinwaka nnya wohikumiherya sokacamiha wa ukhalelo wa muxovo.

Wanenanoxa, axitokweene a miteko sa ofalume mmosampiki ahimya wiira wanoweheriwa saana sa mukhalelo wa muhakhu wa ipurusento thannapiili, mwaakha yoola, mwaha wokacamiheya makhalelo wa elapo yeela ni mmuttettheni sikina sa mplimwinkuni, mutthokelo mmosaru ohinmwe ni mutthenkeso wa FMI ni mitthenkeso sikina sinivara miteko wohilipana.
OGE yo Mosampiki kahiyo ipakhira, attikhela ekhuma anamiruku
Mukhalelo wakhuleliwe muuke ni partiitu Frelimo, masi Renamo ni MDM khiyakhulenle

Anamakhalela a empa ontthokihiwa sa malamulo mmosampiki ahakhulela enamararu yeela, 5, wowiwanana mutthokelo a nlamulo na miteko sa muhakhu sa mwaakha wa 2019, vaavo, ntoko sin'himyaaya anamiruku, mukhalelo ohinsuwanyaseya oratteene ni mirereelo sikina simphwanyaneya ni sinsuwelyaaya amahoolela a kuverunu nnya sihinsuweliwa ni muxovo.
Mutthokelo wakhuleliwe ni mithanlo sa Frelimo, masi Renamo ni MDM khiyakhulenle.

Anamasomela a miteko sa muhakhu ahimya wiira wa mutthokiho yoola wa muhakhu mirereelo sinceene kikhanle mu, wa seeyo sinceene sihatthuneya ohiheliwa mpuwa, ntoko moonelo wa musomi wa ikhalelo sa muhakhu Antonio Francisco, sinceene.

Wottharelana, musomi a miteko sa mihakhu Joao Mosca, ohimya wiira sookhala tho mirereelo siri mpuwa mwa mutthokelo wa muhakhu woovareliwa miteko sikhanle orumeeliwaka ni kuverunu, nnya wohitthuneya wakhuleliwa hata ovaneleliwa ni anamatthokiha sa nlamulo, woohiya mirereelo sikina sa misokho.

Wa mutthokelo yoola wa muhakhu, wannoneya wiira woovukuwa musurukhu wovareliwa miteko sanamunceene, wa mukhalelo mmosa ononeeha wiira mirereelo sikinaku simphaveliwa mpuwa mwa miteko sa mitthenkeso sinonaneya, wireliwaka otthokiheriwa wa ikhalelo solikanela.
Noomala wemereriwa, muholeli a elapo, Carlos Agostinho do Rosario, ohima wiira mwakha wa 2019, kuverunu onilipelela wunnuwa wa sa oruwerya woophiyakha 4.7 purusentu.
Owela wa esisapo ya oliwerya wa ikhokhola ennaxankiha athu a Wamphula.
Wathereriwa iwo oniwerya mwaha wowii athu anceene khanonela muralelo mwa mitrko sa munisipiyu.
"Moono na eyuuma".
Wokhala moono wa yuuma variyari wa athu ni nikhuri niniyolela epoma ya Wamphula, ota wa omosamphiki.

Eniriha wathereriwa esisapo ya ekokhola wa 10 erowaka 30 sa ikonto, mwaha wa ovoluwa ewarakha ya ninano ya elapo yele, athinihiwe nasitokwene a elapo. nave nto, wathereriwa nno onikhumelela okati athu aninnlelaya wiira arerihiwe makhalelo a elapo ni ikhumpweke ikokhola. Okhala wiira epoma ya Whamphula ikokhola sinikhumwa variyari va opama paahi.

Ananmutteheni, anirihela ikokhola mmalittiki athimpaha, nave nto omawannnyaha. Osariheliwa esisao nno onniwereya wiira athu anceene khanonela muraarelo, annihima athu wa VOA. Nave nto munisipihu onnithipepela.

Abdul Paulo, muholeli a ikharuma sa wooneya, onihima wiira mpakha olelo nnamwi ihikhumawaka ikokhola, mwaha wohiwanana athu. Nto anamuholeli a iparititu sinceene annatumererya athu wiira yiweleleke iyo sinelpwale invarakhani.
Maxi nnakhala voo, athu ancene annilaseya khula mahiku.
Nakhuru sa ophaka isukhiri anninuw, nave nto mixankiho sinceene, anahima anamoona.
Ohiranyiwa athu wa nakoso yola a esukari muxankiho mmosa.
Elapo Yomosampihi ehanle vakhani wunnuwa mwa opaka esukari, eniphaveliwa imiya 500 sa itonelata va mwakhani, maxi muxankiho wokhala mwa vohivareliwa muteko itu ikina sa mihali.

Wa mapuro maxexe anipakiwa esukhiri elapo ya omosampikhi, ori Oxinavane ni Omaragra, elapo ya Omaputo, ni Omarromeu ni Omafambisse , elapo ya Osofala, enilipeleliwa opakhiwa imiya 430 sa itonelata , ovikana 16.4 purusentu wa mwaka wa 2016, mwaha wa othowa massi.
Namasuwela osuka Eduardo Sengo ohima wirra nnamwui wunnuwa iwo mixankiho sinceene.
"Muxankiho muulupale osoma simota xeni nikhanlahu ottottela murarelo muhali wiira ohiya omaka esukhiri aahi nipakeke nto nlinkwiti".

Nave nto, Rosario Cumbe, muholeli a nipuro ninipakiwa esukari Oxinavane, ohima wiira eniwerya opaka imilya 90 sa itonelata sa esukhiri va mwakani, yopacerya ya elapo ahu, enorowa omalihiwa mweri wa utupuru wa mwaka onirwa, nave eyo enoriwa wakhanayanya wiira nincere opaka wahu.
Mwakha wa 2016, elapo ya Omosampikhi yoovelela opiha imiya 138 sa itonelata sa esukhiri wa ilapo sinceene, maxi votepaxa wa elapo ya Europa.
Mwaha wa ohiheliwa muhina athu a mmawani muxankiho muulupale wa nakoso a esukhari, anihima anamasuwela a nikhuru nenla, yahi esumana ela Omaputo.

Jorge Manjate, muholeli a nikhuru na olima, ohima wiira oniphaveleya ovahiwa musuruku nikhuru na olima mihali wiira yacereriwe napuro a mihali nave nto avaheke mapuro anipakiwa esukhiri, vo noto anamutetheni ahana aheliwa muhina.
Epula yinceene yowiva anamwane anli oPera.
Muholeli Daviz Simango ohima wiira ephareya erowa vuncererya maasi namararu.
Epula yinceene enirupa okhuma etuminku, ni maasi manceene anirya ophareya, awiiva anamwane anli oPera, elapo ya Osofala, ohima muholeli Daviz Simango namanli nihinu 28.

Muana mmosa a iyakha ixexe ohokwa oomireya ovannyawe sekunta fera, nihiku 27 muttehthe wa Mangunca. ni mwana mukina a miyeri mithanu ni pili ohokwa mpani, vavale axipapawe yarupaya, muthete wa Vaz, onisareya maasi okhuma khalayi.

"Asuwelin'wene makhalelo a eoma ahu, nave yopapatheleya, yohikhala moko, ni yokala ephareya, ni ipula sinceene, nowehaweha simota ninrowahu opaka ephiro ya maasi" ohima Daviz Simago, aleleka anamalaleya, ohimaka osareya massi muramphani ni ipa sinceene sa mittethe sa Opera.
Simango onilaleya wiira omelo, 1 ya marusu, ephareya enophiya imeturu 7.09 nave wiira ephiro ya massi eyakiha vanceene.
Epiro ya massi enirowa opahreya, eniwelela ephareya, ohima Simango " nave vonaka mikora sihihuliwaka mahiku oothene, wiira esyakiwe maasi ophareya orya opoma, yarowa okhala muxankiho muluupale".
Muholeli o Opera owunpererya athu wiira athariheke mihupi sa eholeli a elapo, wiira avarele sana maasi, nave voniherya ihime wiira asyakiwe omorela anamwane.
Fernanda Samuel a wangola namaxintta a ethutu ya "Anamiravo Olola a Elapo 2020".
W'Angoola Fernanda Renée Samuel, orina iyaakha miloko miili, ni ti mmosa mwaale athanliwe wa elapo ya w'Afirika.
Nave mulipa onkhala oparazili Eduardo Avila, orina iyaakha miloko miili, onniwataaniha anamamaliha w´Amerika Latina ni oKarayipas
ohimya wawe Pnuma, anamathanliwa annoonela mukhalelo woovirikana samireeriho sotikiniha ni soowerya okhalana itthu sikina suulupale wa mukhalelo wa olumwenku.

W’Angoola, Fernanda Samuel, mucinyero weyiwo ompakiya pataroya, onvara muteko wooreriha mukhalelo wa epheyo, nave tho ompattunxe AmbiReciclo, startup yowo wa mmosa onwaniha mukhalelo wa muhakhu wooreerela.
Fernanda ohimmya wiira winnunwe mmankalini ni ankha itthu soorera samukhalelo sa inama samphareya sintoko anaapalame, ihopa, ikhoropa.
Nnya, sootekiya sammihaavani pooti otharamula omoroxa inupa ni winnuwiha osarya maasi.
Purucetu, Otchiva, ohaalattula anamakhala otheene wiira arwe avele ni areerihe, yakunxe atthu awinnuwihaka yawo, ikhala ni ihopa.
Wa iyaakha iya sanaanano, owo ari muhooleli ya ekampanya ya atthu otheene, ohiya miteko sa mureriho ni mukhalelo ni mukhaliheryo wa atthu wa emiya yivaherenrye.
Muteko woopacerya okhaleliye ni mukhaliheryo wa kuveerunu avate.
oloha wamulipa woomaliha, "woona imankali w´Angoola soovarexexiwa, wa mulipiheryo wa mphareya, ni mukhalelo woorera wa inama iye samphareya ni omutakaniha mutthu.
Mulipa oomaliha mukina wa nttava ni ekunya namuhakhu wooparasili yoowo ti Eduardo Avila.
Empereca awe, Revolusolar, emphela opaka mukhalelo musya wa mooro wa enerciya wa atthu otheene oohaawa.

Avila oomuhimerya Pnuma wiira ekwatthi emosa ya atthu otheene a oRio ya Janeiro ankhala moophunyeya, awanihaka ikhotto , inupa soohiloka ni mooro wa enereciya wooyeva ni epereso yoovunyeya wa iyakha soomaliherya.
Moonelo awe, miteko sa mooro sa enereciya epereso aya ti yoowaatta, sohireera, soohiroromeleya ni makhalelo aya ti ovirikana wa atthu ale ankhala memmo.
Revolusolar ootakaniha muhakhu ni mapuro ale oophunheya meeli woowi ohuwe mukhalelo musya wa enereciya yoophwanelela, iraka wiira muttetthe ni woolyiha.
Soheliya ipayineli solar ni atthu osomihiya ntoko maleteresista naale antthavelela.
mutthenkeso owo ohinkomeleliya woowi otthokiherye makhalelo oolya wa anamwane ammutthayani.
Eyaakha ya 2020, empereca yoothokiherya mukhalelo mmosa a solar wa mapuro ale oovunyeya.
Mukhalelo wootakaniha muhakhu onreerela okhalana namavaha muhakhu ni namwaalukariha woowira namaphwanya aliveke wakhula mweeri.
Eporocetu yoosuweliya mmapuroni wanakoso wa anammuttettheni a elapo Yooparasili ‘’Lab amukhalelo: ankhili ni wookhala‘, ni porokarama sa ilapo sokhopela soovirikana. Climate Finance Lab".
Wakhula namalola wa mwaakhelo wa amwavano a Vathi, wa Pnuma, onaakheela ikonto muloko wa US$ wa mukalihero wa Pnuma woowi sipakiye iporocetu sawe.
’’Naamukhokho ompwanyula mithinto soorera ohaana omala’’- Barack Obama
Obama ohimya tho ''owali waamaRussu'' ni nthowa na wuukaraania ohimmye wiira Rusiya onoopaca sooruma yamala ekhotto.
Mukhulupale a elapo ya waameerika Barack Obama ohahimerya anamahooleli a ilapo soothene soolumwenku wiira yuuraane woowi ''avukule ni anyaanye '' epooma ya mwisilamu.

Yuuluma aka naanaano, muhina wa atthu otheene a ilapo soothene soowuuraana, oNova Yorque, obama ahimya wiira nikhuru nno ninoowoopopiha atthu ohiittheka oYiraque ni osiiriya, awiiva aka anamwane ni epaala, yamwarexa aka atthu ookhwa nlitti noosariya, yaavolihaka etala anamalompa.
Mukhulupale a elapo awaameerika oovekela olumwenku ni amwiisilamu wiira akhotte ankhili ale a epoma ya mamwiisilamu ni al-Qaida.
Naamukokho ompwanyula soorera omale wakhulelin'he mwene awaameerika.
Obama ohimya tho ''owali waamaRusu'' ni nthowa na wuukaraania ohimmye wiira Ruusiya onoopaca wa sooruma yamala ekhotto.
Wuulumaka nlelo, Obama oovekela wiiraana wolumwenku woowi amuxukhurele mwaaxitthu Epola owiivale atthu ikonto ikonto sene wa elapo enkela nsuwa ya w'Afirika.

vahinatthi, otthukuliya wa mukumanyero musya wa mwiiraano wootheene, sekeretari wa niira nootheene wa ONU, Ban-moon ohaakhuleliha wiira nikhuru nle naari noowoopopiha wa mukhalelo wa atthu ammuttettheni woolumwenku.

Obama ohiira mpantta wa epooma yoowiiraana wiira khanhireyra waakiha itthu sawe wala ''natiri'' amulummya awe wa ONU mwaha wa makhalelo apinaatamu -wiira murettele tori orwa wa ekumi yooreera, ohiya ohikhala wa ekhotto.

Atthu awaameerika anootthikela ''ovara muteko woowi yaakhule mikacamiho...waawaanela asuweli aya ni...ovaanyihana yaahiwerye sootheene '', irale Obama wincererya aka tho epooma yoowiiraana anyakulihana aka mukhalelo aya ''wa nipuro nle nootthukuleya wa omweene wa atthu ni nttittimiho wa nlamulo ni avaha aka nipuro atthu othene amakhuli otheene.
Nuulumo na mukhulupale a elapo ya awaameerika mmutthukumanoni wootheene wa ONU, oNova Yorque, voosisu.
Alipa a ikuru anaakhotto ahaana akhalaaka owiikumanyera woowi awane oKapu-Telekaatu, nave olavunle muhooleli aminixiteriyu nle.

Muhooleli aminixiteriyu aalipa anaakhotto a elapo ya oMosampikhi, Salvador M'tumuke, ookwanyuwa woovelavela mwaha waanakhotto ookaapu-Telekatu, hata akhalaka etistiritu xexe ya elapo ele yoMosampikhi.

esumana evinre, oohimya wanaakamera oMosampikhi wiira anakhotto aatuphela itistiritu ttharu, oNankati, oMwitumpi ni oMakomiya, ahookhwa atthu atthanu ni neenli, yaattihaaka ipheyo sowoopiha wa elapo ele.
Nave muhooleli ule w'alipa aanakhotto oMosampikhi, makhalelo oowanihana wananvara sootakhala awo nlelo soohala.
Mukhalelo ola ti wootikiniha woowi anakuru anakiha ikhotto sootheene ni ale anakuru aanakhotto ekhaleke mapuro aya.
Olavulaka Omaputu vanikhuruni ni akhulupale a atoropa, mukhulupale a kuveerunu a elapo oohimya wiira atoropa akhaleke oowiikhaliherya voowaakuveya wiira apittikuxe eniiraneya.

Nenna va, mutthokiheryo wa miruku sa kuveerunu sa ohooleliha soowaavaha atoropa wiikasoopaka ni anamurwa annyaanya elapo onniruuha sookohakoha munikhuruni sa miruku, ohimmwaka wiira mwaha wa exeeni ohinlokaaya saana.
Enihimwa wiira aakhala, amwaavano anceene amuttettheni ahirina muteko, tenkweyiherya waathukumanya anamurwa anyanya elapo, yoothereryaka ovaha muteko.
Enoota yooreerela wa koverno awankola woowikasopa koronavirus
Polisiya olavuliwa mwaha wa ntata noolemela nikumihenrye anookhwa wamwiirelo woowikasopa

ohinaphiye mwaakha mmosa ovolonwaawe koronavirus asomi awankola yanikupali wiira koverno aahiphima saana moolumo oowiikasoopa omurava koronavirus musiya mulaponi masi anivahasa enoota yoohireerela soopaka anamatumereriha miyeeri soopacerya ekolomolihinwe okhala ya emergencia.
mwiirelo amapolisiya, yaahimera okhoottiha orava, khooniheryaka anookwa aatthu anceene, aahikhala meetiku mmosa ni musomi oniversitati, mmakhalelo ohisuwanyeyasa nlelo ahihimwale.
Musomi anamuttettheni Joao Lukombo onhimya wiira orwa sa milattu soopacera yeepaluwa ehaatutuxa apoovu, kisoonaka oowakanyeriwa ni ovalanyiwa wootutuxeriwa nave woohiilokiherya
"Okhala ya emerxencia yaari yoohireera erwiiye saana ", ohiimye musomi awankola.
Mpantta mukina, natthale Silva Cabaca onooniherya nsisi neekumi kovernu oheelawe epooma yooLuanta ehinatthi orwa milattu soopacera weettakasa mmuttettheni wa koviti muloko ni thanu na xexe.
"vaatepa oreerela varookhala wiira atthu khiyaasuwenle, woopacerani yaari yoowiikaspopa ekumi aaya", otthipanerya.
wa ativista amuttettheni, Rafael Morais itthu sinceene iwehenye soovara sapulisiya okatthi woorumeeliha wiikasoopa " sihooniherya waavonyerya ehaakhi yaapinaatamu wangola
Ankola oosuweliha mulattu oopacerya otthaphuliha wa koronavirus musya ya miloko miili ni thanu ni piili wa meeri a aprili, ovinrene meeri mmosa kuverno ovanheene nlamulo ya okhala wa emerxencia

Mahooleli eekumi anuupuwelela waavasinari muloko tthanu ni axexe pursentu aatthu, amaliheraka ikonto muloko mmosa ni thanu ni mmosa, imiya thanu ni tthaaru ni muloko miili ni tthaaru, imiya piili ni miloko thanu ni tthaaru ni axexe atthu aalupale ni iyaakha muloko thanu ni mmosa, nene na mahiku yeettaka mayiili wa mweeri wa marsu, ahaareeriha atthu anceene wa ekonto ni emiya ni muloko tthaaru osyakihaka koviti- muloko ni thanu na axexe.

Mooniheryo oomalela eelapo, ettharihelaka ni soowoniheriwa isya ipakinwe enamayili, ni minixiterio a ekumi yaaleliherya ikonto piili ni piili soomalela ni emiya emosa ni miloko tthaaru ni piili milatthu soowooniherya saana, ni imiya thanu ni miloko tthaaru ni axexe anamukwa, ikonto piili soomalela ni imiya tthaaru ni miloko thanu ni tthaaru oopenuwa ni econto emosa yoomalela ni imiya piili ni muloko mmosa ni thanu ni tthaaru oyooniherya/ akhalane.

Oyooniherya, thanu ni amosa akhanle ootepaxa, thanu ni tthaaru ootepa, miloko miraru ni thanu ni amosa anoona vakhaani vakhaani, miloko miraru ni piili anoona vakhaani ni ekonto emosa yoomalela ni emiya emosa ni miloko miraru ni thanu ni emosa ahinooniherya/ ahinsuwanyeya.
Asomi anikoha, itthu sinlavuliwa soovaha samateputatu ya MPLA ni ya UNITA wa mwaakiheryo a koviti- muloko ni thanu na xexe
Mateputatu sa partitu soowoonaseya saWankola soohimasa woopaceryani wa mweeri wa apriili muthukumanyo wa musurukhu anaakhelaaya mweeri yoole wa musyako wa koronavirus musya.

Maparlamentari ya MPLA amwiira natiri ovaha miloko miili ni thanu pursentu ya salaariyu, wano epartitu yuulupale yammpantta mukina, UNITA, yiirale atthipanyerya ovaha ipursentu miloko tthanu soowaakhelasaya woomaleliha vaavo.
Nena va, asomi Wankola anhima wiira natiri ola ovinre paahi wamaalumo ooreerihela otthune waawoka anamwaathanle.
woomalelani, muthukumanyo wa mateputatu imiya piili ni emosa yaanweliha ikonto tthaaru ni thanu ni xexe ikwansa, epihaka miloko thanu ni emosa miili itolari

Wa oswaahiha soovaha, ya VOA ahaalavulano mahooleli malamulo a UNITA, Marcial Dachala, akhoottale ovaha masu ni onivahererya olavula ni mukhulupale oothanliwa a moono wa Partiitu,Liberty Chiaka, varookhala wiira khinireere otumeryerya wiitthana, ni khanaakhule.
yoottharihana yookhumelela ni wiihaneliwa ya Albino Carlos, mukhulupale ovaha masu oothanliwa a moono wa Partiitu MPLA, woopacerani ahihimya wiira mateputaatu aawe yaahipacerya otthukumanya.
murukureryoni wa alipa antthara-tthara miteko sa Politika ooLuwanta, amooniheri anlavula maalumo ooreerihela
wa jornalista Ilidio Manuel, vaareerela otthunela ni khavanweryaneya omooniherya ovariheliwa natiri.

"weekeekhayi khavansuwanyeya wiira epartiitu X yootthukumanya, vano kinoonaaka awosa yaatthuna olavulaka mpantta mmosa ya ikanaali wiira ahimakaserye neekekhayi yaavanhenre musurukhu, kavi avanhaaya ni avahiinwe taani", oniwaniherya Manuel.
Mulipa ontthara-tthara soosoma sa Poliitika Rui Kandove nave onnsuwela wiira natiri ovinre paahi wamaalumo ooreerihela otthune waawoka anamwaathanle.
Wa Kandove, kakhanle manumeru wala irelatrorio sinlipiherya ovahereriwa musurukhu anatiri.

"sinceene ihinsuwanyeya wahala sameelo sapartitu yeelapo yeela mwaha soolaleya ifarawoonico moota anamattharihela atthu anikumiha enaakhelaaya vakhaani, ni yooniheryaka saana, ti woowaattamela wootha ni onkhala ntoko niri isepwere sapolitiku walani itthu sikina", ohaacererya Kondove.
Nena ttho, oLuanta, mmuttettheni wa Talatona ni Cacuaco, antthikela ophiya maalumo aanamwane ankwa mwaha woohikhalana eyoolya.
Benjamin Netanyahu ohootheriwa opaka sootakhala samukhottoni.
Mutthu eelapo pritaniku oovonya yooveka wiira Netanyahu okhale ootthukiwa anyakela etthaya yooReyinu Unitu

Yooveka yoovahereriwa woopaceryani wa mweeri ola mutthu eelapo pritaniku Damian Moran ni yootthoonyiheriwa musaayitini onlayini wakuveeru wooReyinu Unitu onhimiya wii "ettharihaka nlamulo sayilapo sootheene Netanyahu ahana okhalaka ootthukweliwa mwaha woopaka sootakhala samukhottoni anyakela etthaya ya Reyinu Unitu, ela mwaha woowahukhumo masivili ovikana ikonto piili eyaakha ikonto piili soomalela ni milioko ni xexe" (2014).
moovekamu, Moran onhimakasa soowaakanyerya samahiku miloko thanu ni mmosa, saayikuru mayisrayelita okaasa eyaakha evinnre.
Nto manunmeru a ale anilepa iwarakha sa ovekeliwa saphiya emiya emosa , ale anivekela anoorowa sanyakulihaniwa oparalamentoni piritaniku.
Masi Moran, oohimya omutthenkeso woovuwiha mitthaka wiira owo khonkupali wiira ale anvekela anoopiixa mukaamerani mwaha wa opatthani okhanle Wistarayeeli ni Oreyinu Uniitu.

Kuveenunu Piritaaniku oothipepeliwa waakhula ewarakha yaasinariweene ni atthu imiya ithanu, wiiriwaka wiira "amuhooleli a epooma ale onixekurya elapo, ntoko ministuru oopacerya Benjamim Netanyahu, ookhalana epewe ya iwarakha soosuweliwa ni khakhanle ootthuhweliwasa ."
Noosuwelela wiira manyakunyaku ookaasa aawiiva atthu anceenexa, ennaacererya yoowakhuliwa.
"Ntoko ministuru opacerya David Cameron iiralaawe, mmirimani-mmirimani enninriipiha murima ohaaxiwa ni Oreyinu Uniitu okhala ohoolo woowiilipiha wiira evenyihiwetho. "
Enaamwi siiso ministuru oopacerya aahihimya saaneene wa osuwelela wawe a Istarayeeli wiira ohele miphemo soolikalena wiira yaakihiwe mpuwa wa minlaano sa ikano sa elapo " ennihimwa yoowaakhuliwa.
Reeyinu Uniitu onnikhanyereyra orehererya ipooma piili wiira ophuke milattu ostarayeelo-palestiyaanu ni, "onrowa olipiyerya muhupi ola muhina wa oxekurya wa Netanyahu, mweeri wa setempuru".
Oninnyereriwa moota xeeni muvekelo Oreeyinu Uniitu?
Khula mutthu eepooma yeela piritaaniku onninyererya muvekelo musayitini mwa anamulamula, atumereryaka mwiirelo oreerela anamulamula wala a makaamara aale oolikana.
Atthu ellapo yeeyo paahi mapiritaaniku takhanle olepa wala ocica ewarakha wa muvekelo, masi onireerela nsina, wooveleelirerya imeeyili ni ekootiku postaale yooreerela.

Hamas ootupheliwa ni Istarayeeli nipuro na Okaasa mahiku yeettaka mathanu ni mararu mweeri wa xuunyu mwaakha ole ovinre, owiivaka mapalestiyanu imiya piili ni atoropa mastarayelista miloko mithanu ni mosa.
Maativokaatu piritaaniku emaara Apelestiina yeeherenryaaya ni ahiwerya omutthukwela ministuru akhalahi mwa eexariya istarayelista Tzipi Livni, ekhumeleleka ekhotto okaasa miyaakha seettaka 2008-2009.
Ele enaakhulela Ostarayeeli olonterexi hoonenle muvekelo hookiserya "ohokiwa yoohimmwa woohisuwanyeya".
Oparasiili: Omora-mora wa maministuru ayili ohaannariha Adilma Rousseff
Ohisuwanyeyasa wa itthu, onoorowa omukhaliyerya Rousseff opacerya othanla sootthunasawe wiira yiirele mpantta wanamulamula

Otteettheya wa maministuru ayili wa nikhuru na muhooleli mukhulupale eelapo parasileiru Dilma Rousseff, ivinreene miyeeri mithanu ni mosa sa muxatoro, onnikhumelela ohisuwanheyasa oparasili ni onavenxa mikattamiho sa meelo wa otthokiha wa muhooleli ya oparitiitu wa anamuteko.

Atthu ale animwiiriha paralamento, ale oovaanyiha anitthuna wiira ikohaxaxiwe saana wa wootheriwa wa itthu sinvirihiwa wiiphiini sintanyenrye okhuma wa ministuru a mikukutta, Alfredo Nascimento, enamararu, ni wa enupa ya mitthenkeso ikano mweeri wa xuunyu, António Palocci.

Siyentixita mulamulela Oswaldo Dehon,ethoni ya namulamula a Muhooleli mukhulupale elapo Dilma rousseff onikumamaniwa ni mithinto soovirikana, masi moota anaakhulaaya amuxatoro itthi iya saakhumelelaka tonrowa wooniherya moota xeeni awosa anirowaaya okukhumuliwa.
"Mmarepuupilika, okhuma wa maninisturu onilikanaka, woonaneyaxaka eminixiteeriyu yuulupalexa ntoko ya Dilma orinaawe" onuupuxerya namaweha-weha.
Owerya wa orehererya wa ohisuwanyeyasa itthu tonrowa wooniherya waarowaka ovukuwa owela wa atthu wala anaari.
Mpantta ola, vanceenexa wa muhooleli amikukutta, Alfredo Nascimento, owo aahikhalana aahaakuveyaxa vancene" oohimya Odehon.

Nnaamwi anamawehaweha anceene maparasileyiro woonela wiira moota amuhooleli yaakhunlaaya manyakunyaku wa itthu iye sinvirihiwa wiiphiini waamurowa okhala woowakuveyaxa, siyentixita mukinaku mulipa ontthara-tthara miteko, Leonardo Spencer, oohimya wiira ala annaaleelaka mwaha wa muhooleli mukhulupale elapo ya oparasiili.
Woopaceryani namulamula mmosa oniixoona wiixinnyererya ni okhala wawe onittikiyeriwa vathi ni niira nene nenla.

Nirowaka ohoolo, yooniyereyaka muthinto ene yoola wa eminixiteeriyu ya mukukutta moota waakhulinwaaya woowaakuveyavo, waahikhala okumihiwa ni oheliwa woowaakuveyavo nikhuru nootheene na eminixiteeriyu, amuhooleli mukhulupale elapo aahimyatho wiixinnyererya wa okuxa mulamulo wiira okhale saana", oohimya Spencer. Spencer, okhuma wa maminixituru, onaamwi okhanleene anamanyakunyaku, onniira siiso amukhaliheryaka muhooleli mukhulupale elapo moota makina okhalanaka mamulamulo aawe.
Namulamula Dilma Rousseff oyariwe ni mavarihano avareleliwe ni namulamula ovinre.
Nto, vakhani-vakhani, ni ohisuwanyeyasa itthu sulupale ni saamukhani, amuhooleli mukhulupale elapo anoohiya maarakha aya ni anoothanla nikhuru naya", orowe noone.
Nrowe nuupuwele wiira maminixituru manceene awenle ekhatera ni Dilma yaari Anamulamula a Lula.
Oweha-wehiwa wa iye soolamulela sipakiwe emaara ya mwaathanle a 2010 wiira olipiherye othanliwa wa Muhooleli mukhulupale elapo

wa moonelo, wa mwaakha ola woopacerya wa anamulamula, tiwi, itthu sinceene ikhumelele sooniheryaka owela nno wa namulamula okhalaka muhooleli mukhulupale elapo," ohaattererya. Leonardo Spencer, oniira okathi ola woohisuwanyehasa itthu okuruxiwa wa muhooleli a minixituru Pllocci, ntoko nthoonyero, ookhaliherya ni olipiheryaka maarakha a mulamula a Dilma.
Namaliva muulupale ni nanakoso a muhooleli mukhulupale elapo aari António Palloci, aahanle okhala opweheriwa khiisi mwa anamulamula a Dilma Roesseff.
Emaara awo waamukurunxaaya ekhatera ministuru ni khaninrowa okupali wiira oroovekela ohiya muteko, onnihimyathomaarkha awe aahelaka atthu animusivela.
Wa miyoo, waari nihiku muhooleli mukhulupale elapo Dilma, wa ekeekhayi akunxaawe elapo"", oohimya namaweha-weha.
Anamasoma ahoonela oyareriwa onakhaliherya anamwane awaafirika wa malaariya
Anamasuwela anihimya wirra wooneliwa nno onoorowa onyaanyerya eretta, ononiherya okhwa wa anamwane 500 wa khula mwaakha.

Osomwa wooniherinwe enamararu ela, 30, onihimya wiira anamasoma apyanerenrye mayareraniwo oovirikanasa sinthoonyerya wakhapelela anamwane akina awaafirika wa wunnuwa wa mithinto sinceene sa malaariya.
Anamasuwela anihimya wirra wooneliwa nno onoorowa onyaanyerya eretta, ononiherya okhwa wa anamwane 500 wa khula mwaakha.

Osommwa wuulupale opakiwe, anamasoma oottharelela anihimya wiira opyanyereriwa wa soovirikanasa sa oyareriwa wa nipuro noothanleliwa mwa erutthu enikhaliyerya ohimya mwaha wa anamwane akina aninnuwaaya axikokho aye oovelaveliha a malaariya navetho akinaku khaninnuwa, mmuttettheni mme atthu akina anilummwaaya ni pwilimwithi oniruuhela eretta.
Amahooleli maafirikaano otyawa Opurtukaale mwaakha wa 1961 anthukumanaasa Okaapu Veerte

Epooma ya Oparaaya enoothukuumanya mpaakha mayiiku yeettaka 2 a mweeri wa nethaana miili, muthukuumano ya asoomiakhalaayi yoowo yatyaawe akhumaaka Oportukaale ni khikhanyaanyerya wataanela ekhootto wiireliwa otaphuula elaapo muhiina mwa ilaapo sahuukhumu.
Amahooleli maafirikaano otyawa Opurtukaale mwaakha wa 1961 anthukumanaasa Okaapu Veerte

Mukumaanonk yoole da asoomi a vakhalayii o akhaale tiyaattyawaase akhumaaka oportukaale owaanya da 1961 ,.onthoonyeya ti nfaluume omosampiikhi Joaquim Alberto Chissano, da miniixituuru avakalaahiini a elaapo ya Ankoola Van D'une ni tho ti miniixituuru a akhalaayiini a elaapo há omosampiikhi Pascoal Mucumbi.

Nfaalume oyaareliiwa elaapo ya Okaapu Vereeti,Pedro Pires, oxuukhurela muhiina iya muraarelo wa ankhiili ole yaarina asoomi emaara yeele, yakhupareele aya muruuku wileeliwa otaphuwa ni wixeetta sa ilaapo sooluluwaana.
Pedro Pires onikupaali wi akhaala othukumaanya mureerelo simpwaneela wi ethokiihiwe ewaraakha wi ekhale ekanyero ya mwiiriira wa itthu sa vakhalayini.
Miniixituuru oppaacerya a vakhalayini awankoola,Van Dunen, ohuupuwela okaathi ncooko owo ohimwa axe ori da ovuura okaathi ,enooniheriwa ni oxiirika muulupale oriina awe ni nfaalume Pedro Pires.
Nitho Joaquim Chissano ohooniherya musiveeliwo add munceele mwaaha wi osikuula axiriikha add ekhalayi.

Nfaluume no muhooleli da miteko sa kuveeruni akhalayi Omosampiikhi, ottottopela muruuku ole, ni tho onilipeleela wi mukhaliheryo ovaahiwe naalesa afin asoomi akhaalayi athaana ottittimihiwa, mpaakha wi amwaavaano akhaaleeke otakiiherya ni okhupaarela mwiiha sikiina sinooniiherya muraarelo wa ekuumi wa ilaapo sinthareelana.
Greta Thunberg ophiita Omatiriiti ni oneteteerya mihuupi sovaanyiha variyaari wa amahooleli amolumweekuuni.
Ativiista nattoope Osuweeka Greta Thunberg ophiita Omatiriiti,enamaatanu ya mahiiku,6,omurumeelakq kaampooyi wi oreele mpaatte muhiina mwa mukumaano da mukhaleelo wa Ekiliima COP25.

Ola ohaana othoonyiherya mihuupi aroroomelo vireliiwaka okhupaarela ipheeyo weewo oroowa add wavaanyiha amahooleli a moolumweekuni yaawo,ntooko ole, mukhaleelo onikoosya muhiina lda manamuuna okhapeleiwa Mukhaleelo a ipheeyo.
Okaathi wakhuruuwa add mukampooyiini ohiiyu Lusitânia, esakasaawu ya ephiiro ya eyuuma ya Xamariti.
''koowerya ophiiwa Omatiriiti vosiisu yoola".
Kinoona si khokhaale okiweehe...
Da nihuuta manamuuna, ti toreera okhaala Oxipaanya'',oleema Thunberg orumeelaka ekaruuma ya Twitter nuumaala okhuuma oxikaasawu.

Muthukuumaano ya mukhaleelo wa ipheeyo opaceerya esekuuta wala nihiiko noopacerya na muteeko,2, ni ekasoopa emoosa wi sakarataari-xeraale a ONU, António Guterres, wi ola ohikhaanle"muxoovo watyeela othaaya evyaaka".
Thunberg ohaana wiirela mpaatte muhiina mwa okhoottela ni ovaaha mihuupi maasi nleelo oleelo vaava.
Mosampiikhi: Mameetiku ahunteererya ekhereeve
Anakhereeve akweeherya voohikhala nnakhala ethu yoxiitta muhiina lda sowuupuwela saya.

Mameetiku ni atthu a Sara muteeko sa okuumi a Omosampiikhi, yaapwanyaneeya yiiraaka ekhereeve voophiyaka mahiiku 27,alaleerya wunteerya wa ekhereeve, wisiiso avaahasa muxiitto kuveeruni yoowo akhootte wakhuleela sowuuleela saya.
wunteeriwa da ekhereeve okhumeleeld noovira mahiiku vakhaai nuumaala Efuuntu Monetaariiyu Internasionaale enganos aya vokupaleela si kuveeruni khokhalanne oweerya wuncerereya lhe sinileeliwa.

Muhiina lda mulaleeryo a miteeko solaleerya sa Muraano sa Ameetiko a Omosampiikhi (AMM), copiosa ni Ekomiisawu sa aliipo avaara miteeko sa Okuumi Owiraana(CPSU), anixaakiiherya ni ikettelo sinthoonyeexiwa wi nnaamwi ahiweerye opwaanyabiye sinaxaakiha, yanisuweeliha si "nisooso ni velaveelelo sapinaatamu ohaweene"

Asuweeliha,oholeeliwa ni miyuraano lhe miili, aniholeeliha si tubo anisuweela si masooso amamosqmpikaano, wyaawo anaamyi emaara soteene, anooniherya othuuku aya, ni vowixumaaliha aweerya olipeelela iphukeeliwo mwaaha sovirikaana soluuluwanya ni ohataana da aliipo a Sara muteeko sa Okuumi ni ale ari tavareeliiwa muteeko.
Miyuraano lhe sinithipeleela do Kuveeruni khoriina ehaakhi yowaahukhuumu aliipa ari mukereeviini.
Ekereeve Erik okhuuna lda nlamuulo, ohikhaala ehaakhi eri muhiina lda ekostituwisaawu yotumereeriwa.
Maliiho aleepwe ti owaakiveeriwa!

Mikhalelo iya somananiiha woopopiha sihaana sihiimwaaka vowakuveeya mooni sa Ekomiisaawo sa Asuweeliha mitekooko sa Okuumi Owiraana(CPSU), vatthuuneeya ni(AMM), pas mikhleelo saay soteene, yaawo muhiina lda mukhaleelo yoola yookhaala departamento eyehaweeha ihaakhi" yosuweliihiwa mmuuthaakani mme.
Ele esuweliihe si ncooko vathokihiwaaya muhiina pas nlamuulo muthenkeeso saahirya ovaaha ekasoopa muhiina mwa ekhereeve.

Mikhleelo ola da asuweeli a migeeko sa Okuumi otupweela muhiina mwa mukhaleelo ohiwanaaniwa variyaari ni ale ari tavareeliiwa muteeko, ori Koveeruni owoopeleele anamaloola si athaana asuwelaaka muhiina mwa ekereeve evoonyola nlamuulo, siiri muhiina mwa mikhaleelo okweeherya ohukhuumwa ithariheliwaka erekulameento tisipilinaari, ni soteene siiri sintaanyeerya aya ethaliheeliwaaka nlaamulo,votakaaheryana ni wikiitthiwa musuurukhu aya.

Okathyeene yoowo okhaale vaavale vanteereriwa aya migeeko, nthooko vanthoonya aya muthenkeeso, solipiheeriwa migeeko siniireeliwa exikhaani, asuuweli ale a migeeko sa ekuumi asuweelasa otumeererya ni othuuku varireliwaaka mwaaha si vaahikhaala, okhaala ni onoorowa wakhaale wa khuuta okaati muthuunelo wanamunceene, eniireeya ni woopwaanela ntooko ele eri yoholeelaxa.
Akuluukhana anikhanyereerya wuncereriiya wa 100% vasuulu va musuruukhu anakhelaaya okhumaaka ipuruseeto 10 %irooka 35% ta esupusiitiyu ya moopiheryo.
" Ninilooha, ninilupali no niniira, khiivo nnakhala emoosa enopopiiha wala enitutuuxa ekhaale yonikurumuliiha ele er teloherya ahu" enihiimwa nlaaka na nikhuuru na AMM vamoosa a CPSU.
Mpaxatoora a elaapo ya wameriika,mukiina mA ONU onakiheerya" istaato piili" nthooko maphukeliiwo vireliiwaka do ohiwanaaniwa variyaari va ale ari atthu a wisarayeeli ni ale aari a opalestiina.

Mmpaxatoore awameerika muhiina mwa Nasooxi Uniita, Nikki Haley, osuweliiha enamaaxexe yeela, 16, si islaaposa Estaato Uniitu sinikhaliha " vomaleleene" epwukeliiwo sa ilaapo iye piili wu omaliihiwe mulaattu variiyari va aliipo a wisarayeeli ni aliipo opalestiina, khohiimwe"Iphiiro" sihithalakaasiwe.

'"Hii tu o ninikhaliheerya vomaleleene mwiraanelo a ilaapo iye piili,maasi tho ninuupuweela si nipwaanye iphiiro saya", ohiimwa Haley okaathi awakhulaa awe anamuhuupi wumalaani wa epaaca tá Ekoseelyu tá Esekuraasa vireeliwaka mpaatte Omeetiyu Oriyeete.

Nsaana, noomaala muthukuumaano mmoosa no miniixituuru Opaceerya a Wisarayeeli Benjamim Natanyahu iraaneya Okaawa Paranka, nfaluume awameerika Dald Trump, ohiimwa wi ilaapo saawe khasiiroowa othaanya mwiiwanaano istaato iya piili
Trump ohiimwa wi Istaato Sowiraana siirowa okhanyaanyiherya variiyari va Muraano muulupale muhiina mwa wiraaneliwa murettele"
Vakohiwe awe wi mwivaavo onoorowa okhaliheerya maphukeeliwo ala a ixtaato iye piili, Trump ohaakhuuleela wi vookhala vothara ele enrookha okhanyereriwa variyaari va mipaatte iye sopiili.
." Miiyo kinikupaaleela wi iiri Ixitaato piili, hoothe ni exitaato emoosa, ni miyo enikisiveela (maphukeliiwo ) ale ari tansiiveliha variyari va mipaatte somiili.
Miyo kinoona wi inkirotteeliwa erooho, ni oye siiri sinthapiiha mipantte somiili" ole Ohiimwa.

Viraneeyaka epaacaya Ekoseelyu Esekuraasa wiraneeye oleelo elaapo ya Onaaca Iyoorokhi, murumeeyo a Nasooxi Uniita mwaha sa Omeetiyu Oriyeete,Nickolay Mladenov, okhaliheerya oriilu wi" iphukeele sa mipaatte iye miili ti ephiiro emoosa" ekhaale oweryaneya wi omalamalihiwe ohiwanaana iwe variyaari va atthu a wisarayeeli ni Opalestiina.

" Oreela waata muhiina mwa istaato oye Sopiili sinitthikeela okhala ephiiro emoosa yowoneyaaxa si iphaanyiiwe miruuku sithunaana muhiina mwa miyuupuwelo sa inasaawu ni sapinaatamu a mitteetthe oye Sopiili", ohiimwa Mladenov okonseelyu ni okhanyererya osuweeliha oriiki "miraneeyo iye isya" muhiina mwa manyaaku nyaaku ale athaana axankiohaka olumweeko oteene, okasoopaka manamuuna wa ikettelo sohisuwaanyehiwa seeyi iniireeliwa omałamaliha manyaaku nyaaku ale.

Withana wa iphuukelo sa istaato piili, nookhala nttittimiho nnoonaneyaxa wi ninemereeriwa wu ikumunitaate sa ilaapo sa okhoopela ni waari muthaalo othokihiiwe ni Istaatu Sowiraana Sonya ithariheliwaka okhuuma okhuuma olaa-tho tá nfaluume Bill Clinton.

Mladenov, yoowo tho wiire wi ekeleele omuhooli, ti vopwaneleela wi elaapo ya Isarayeeli ohaana otumereerya mipaatte sowataleleeya yeeyo siiri sirumeeliwa ni atthu Opalestiina yahaaxaka ni yatumereeryaka sohilooka.
Sakarataari- Xeraale a ONU,Antônio Guterres, otumereerya wi Opattuxiiwa mitteetthe Opalestiina ti "eri ephukeelo emoosa".
Okhuruuwa wa esisaapo ya patarooya" enimukhanyreeriha" Kuveeruni a elaapo ya Wankoola si wuluule mukhaleelo waettikiittiya orosameento ya

Okhuruuwa wa isisaapo ya epaariili ya patarooya wa ikhatiiri soovira 24 vowattameela iya irei itoolaari 30 oohiya ekasoopa ya kuveeruni wa Ankoola yoowo onaamwi mpaakha nsaana, anilipiheerya do oni oweeha wehaka variyaari va mwaaha ola,Maadi voowu vaninaanoni va khaarowa yuluula ettikiitti ele ya orosameento wa estaato. (OGE)
Mikhaleelo ovirikaana okhaala anamathokoosa a mavareelo a João Lourenço viireliwaka mwaha eniiya yeela.
Ettikiitti ya patarooya onooniheerya omoora ehivareele noovira emoosa ya" ekhootto yotaphuuwa" variyaari va Araapiiya Sawutiita ni Ruusiya

Ni mavoonyeelo wa mivaanelo muhiina mwa mwiha saanakooso wiireliwaka otaanyiwa Moxukoovu wi witakaaherye wiireliwaka othikiliiwa miteeko sopaakiwa sa aporokaraama a miyuraano sa Ilaapo Simulovoola Patarooya iniithaniwa(OPEP),Riad okhanyererya ohooliha ovuukuwa votutuxeerya mikhaleelo a esisaapo ni yuncereerya opaakiwa wawe.

Nsaana mahiiku terra aya,8,miniixitaara a Wankoola muhiina mwa miteeko sa Ifinaasa Vera Daves, ohiimwa Oluwaanta wi Kuveeruni oniweeha weva vaninanooni va soteene siiri sinimunuuherya kathoowa ontanyeeriwa ni epaateemiya ya mwaxiithu Koroona.
" Nni niweleelaka vakiviiru miyuunuweelo, ni ekasoopa ni ekeekhayi, ni niniwehereerya si sotaanyeerya waya sikhaale sohiteepaxa sithuuna oweryaneeya" ohiimwa Vera Daves.
Mwivaavo,viraawe othalakasaaka muhiina mwa ehapaari VOA, namuhaakhu Martines Afonso ohaakiherya si Kuveeruni onithuuna oreerihela vowakuveeya mukhaleelo wa(OGE).

Wa emoosa wa irasaawu ele Éric yokweyiiherya ti ekhoottiha woopeleeliwa atthu, ni Kuveeruni ohaala oheelaka enaayeve muhiina mwa orosameeto, vahakhaale wi vanookhaala mulipihezryo okhaale okhupaarela itoolare 20 wa khuuta epariilii yoovirikana" Ohiimwa Afonso.

Ni tho namuuhakhu Faustino Mumbica onuncereeriha oriiki, va mpaatte awe,vokhaala muraarelo vowinuuherowa migeeko sowehaweehiwa wa mireerelo wuncereeriwa wikhanyaanya ni ele eromolii eriisa mavirikaneelo a mukhaleelo ovirikaana amuhaakhu wu ilaapo ohithokele wilipiherya ni patarooya.

" Mukhoora mmoosa wookhuuma ri xi ekwaatuuru ya ivareeliwo sa Orosameento ohaana owehaaka ikastareeliwo soohiteepa wu vawehiiweke mukhaleelo ovukulaovukula ni okasoopiwa ofaturaariwa vasyaasya vakhaale vowiraneeya muhiina mwa ikhuruweelo ya esisaapo wa khuuta epaariili" ohuncereerya Mumbica.

Okhuuma-okhuuma mwaakha wa 2016, nikhuuru na OPEP ,(Oholeeliwa ni Araapiiya -Sawutiita) ni ilaapo sikinaaku sivaarana aya vamoosa( vowoneeyaxa elaapo ya Ruusiya) siinirya inapwaanya miyuraanelo si itapwuliiweke mikhaleelo sa maruweryeliiwo sanroroomelo si ithipeleliiheke ottikittha sa mihokhuruukho sirumeeliwa ikettelo sinttuneeyaiiwa.
Maasi ettimiiku, mipaatte Sopiili khisaapiixe siira ihiwanaane saana muhiina mwa mwiraanelo musya, emuhuule kathoowa mmoosa onavelaveeliha akafuukho vowoopiha mpaakha mahiiko ala avaano .
Vaavale vathukuuwa aya omoora iwe, Weel Street, Onoova Iyoorokhi, olipiheeriwawi omwiire si owaale nakooso okaathi mikhariikhari 15 wirelaak aokasoopa ovuluuwa wa sovariiwa oye.
Estaato ya Teekisa yovekeela wi Etiripunaale Supereemu ettiyeele ivootu sa Ixitaato xeexe.
Mwaahaya ti wi, ivooto sa ikureeyu, vamanaaniho okhiserya vokasoopa muxiitto wa Joe Biden.

Estaato ya Oteekisa yovaleya mmatatani mwa Etiripunaale Ekhulupaale, asayu mmoosa oromoosa Estaato ya Xeyoorixiya Mexikaan, Penselivaaniya nPensilvânia ni owiskoonsiWisconsin, mesmo evekaaya ovirikanyiihiwa manamuuna mwa sowiiriwa variyaari va mwiha sa mwathaanle siiriwe mwaha wa ekukuuthu ta mwaxiithu Koroonaviiru ato ahimwa aya si sinivonyoola ikettele sa nlamuulo.

Sowiraneya iya, silaleeriwe no Porokuratoore -Xeraale repupiliikano a Oteekiisa Ken Paxton, sooniheriwe vookhuma Otirimunaale Yulupaale, nthooko vanthunihiwa aya muhiina mwa mwiiha ikiina sinulaanya Ixitaato.

Migeeko iya tiive irei muhiina mwa muruuku isya sa marepupilikaano wirelaaka wu arukuuxe oxiittiwa wa Nfaluma Donald Trump muhiina mwa mwathaanle a mahiiku terra aya 3,mweeri wa Namulooko ni mmoosa, yoowo vekekhayiini olipiheriwe ni Ixtaato sotheene.

Ni migeeko Selene weeya, Porokuratoore -Xeraale O Teekesa onaaromoowa amahooleli a mwaathale yaawo a mitteetthe a ixitaato xeexe mwaaha wohikhupaarelasa ivooto sa ekureeyo wu okasoopiwa muhiina mwa efaraawuti, vireliiwaka ovuluuwa wisiiso" ekhiitta ya Ovootu sithonyeerye" ixitaato sikiina sirumeele ikettelo sa sothanleliiwa muhiina mwa mukhaleelo a ikettelo sa mwathaale sileepwe mulamulooni mwa elaapo.

Makhulupale a miteeko sa mwathaale a mitteetthe oye sa Exitaato, thaaru wiseeye sinileeliwa ni marepupilikaano, wiihimwa wu khapwanyaase nnakhala mwaha mmoosa eferaawuuti woopwaanela orukuuxa mukhaleelo a muxiitto.
Porokuratoore- Xeraale a Exitaato- Uniita, William Barra, Oyo tho ohaakhuuleela ohiikhala nnakhala etho ekhaale yokupaleeliha wiiyiwa.

Vekeekhayi, vahoonihereya owaattavo mmoosa a ikootha sa ivootu sa mukureeyu mwaha wa ireetta, mwaaha wi mamerikaano yahitteyivelaasa mapuuro iraneeya mwaathaale wi wikasoope omwarya mwarya wa (Covid-19).

Muhiina mwa sowiraneeya iya exitaato ya Tekiisa eniveekela Etiripunaale Ethokweene ewareeriha Ovootu sa Ekoleexiyu ta mwathaanle muhiina mwa ixitaato oye xeexe, somaleleene siiri ivootu sene 62, siwateerihiwe siiso, mwivaavo mahiiku arowaaya wetteleela,14, Joe Biden wakhalaane ivootu iye 270 sinttuneeya wi silipiheerye owuutta waawe.
Iresultaato iye silaleeriwe sinilipiheerya wi emokaraata apwaanye ivootu sothaala, 306 sowataananihiwa niiye 236 sa Trump.
Ni Ivootu sanamunceene, nnaamwi iri iye sihikoonthiiwa mmwathaalebi,Biden oxiitta niiye sovirikaana emilyaawu thanapiilisa Ivootu,ivootu imilyawu 7.
Niveekelo nikina na Porokuratoore a Teekisa tiine nni wi Etiripunaale Ethokweene emuteererye mwathaanle a okoleexiyu ale oroowa wiraaneya mahiiku ari 14 , mweeri wa namulooko ni miili.
Ekampaanyaya ya Trump ni axirikhaawe orooha omuhooli mwaaha sa Otirimunaale, oye sikhotteliiwe ni itiripunaalesa Oxeyoorixiya,Mixikaane,Penselivaaniya ni Wisikoosiini.
Macrom oni wi ataake aninaanoxe Omosampiikhi anithoonyiheerya mopopiiho A Teroriixiimu Emwisilaamu
Sakarataari- Xeraale a Inasaawu Sowiraana, onihukhumu wokothasiiwa wa atthu ni oveeka xi itholaatholiiwa vemukaakuveele.

Sohiimwa muhiina mwa ataake aninaanoxe va anahaaxa apinatamu ohikhupaarela Omosampiikhi anithoonya mopoopiho a teroriiximu amwisilaamu a mitteetthe Sokhopeela, oleema Nfaalume a elaapo ya Faraansa Emmanuel Macron muwaraakhani mwaweTuwitter, enamaraaru yeela,11.
Omosampiikhi, voovukaana atthu 50 ahasaariiwaeyo piiyo , athiyaana otyaawihiiwa, mitteetthe socomolasiiwa ni votharana nivaavo iheyeeliwa mooro.

Atthu awoopiha ale anrya akamelaala etiini ta mureettele weeyo arumeela aya amwaryamwaryaka mukhaleelo wa teroriiximu: Teroriiximu wa Emwisilaamu ti mopopiiho okhomeela opwaneleela wakhuula wa akhopeela",oleeva Macron muhii mwa mataava a epwittikiisi ni efaranseexi
Guterres oniveekela waveriiwa haako.
Voophiyaka atthu 50 akwaasa, akeene ohitakasiiwa,
Sakarataari-Xeraale a Ilaapo Sowiraana, Antônio Guterres, oveekhela ehaako Eyo piiyo muthokooso moosa.

Sakarataari-Xeraale, ori onyoonyiiwa muhiina mwa mihupi osya so ohasaariiwa atthu siniiriwanibmalhuuru anarumeela akapwiithi (...) iniraaneya mitteetthe sovirikaana sa epuruviisiya Okaapu- Telekaato, mpaatte wa ota weelapo tá omosampiikhi, votakahereya ni ohitakasiiwa atthu, otyawiihiwa axithiyaana vamoosa ni anamwaane" ninihinya nlaaka nittikitthiiwe ni namuuhupi a Guterres,Stephane Dujarric.

Nmuhuupini mme,Sakarataari-Xeraale,"oniwoopa amahoolelia elaapo si akeleelihe omuhooli miteeko sothokoosa mmuhiina mwa sowiraneeya iye ni wi okwanyereeriwe aliipa opaaka manyaala ale"ni "ni watumereerya aliipo aniirela mpaatte wa mwanyaaku nyaku ale wi arumeelekesotumereeriwa saya mmuhiina mwa ihaakhi sa ilaapo Sokhopeela sowoonela vattthu atthu ni ihaakhi sapinaatamu".

António Guterres, Ohiimwa ni otumereerya "ntumereeryo a Ilaapo Sokhopeela othiikela waava mukhaliheryo apinatamu ni Kuveeruni Omosampiikhi sahiimwaka mwiiha sowakuveeya wa makhaari a itho sothuuku somukaakuvele ni mikhanyaanyo sikiina wi sakaheeriwe ihaakhi sapinaatamu, okweeheriwe oraala ni wikasoopa mwa waluuwana wa mukhaleelo a miyopoopiiho sa ihasaara.
Kathoowa akfuuko a muhaakhu wookhala otanyerya miteeko solooliwa ekwereere a SIDA, omosampiikhi.
Ativiista César Mafanequiço onoveleela wi "kathoowa opwoova mithaali".

Khathoowa amukafuukoni okhaala ophiyaaka mmuhiina mwa miteeko sokhaliiheriwa areetta- a ekwereere ya sida Omosampiikhi, viira ohivariiwaka mukhaliheryo onanyiheerya César Mufaniquiço, a Muraano iniireeliwa Okweeherya mapwanyero miteeko solooliwa.
Noovira vaavale voneleliwe ayaolookihiwa wasiiri wa1.4 imilyawu sene sa toolari Mosampiikhi oweeha, volokeela miyeeri miili, anamakhaliha awe aroromeelo ahunteererya mukhaliheryo ole.

Mufanequiço oni si vothareelana ni mwaha yoola volaleeriwa wu mitheenkeo khamoosa khamoosa alipiherya nolaleerya oloola anoorowa yahiye ovaaha mukhaliheryo variyaari va Kuveeruni, mwi vavo vaarowa oruuhela muxaakiho a makhuleelo ale ARI ohithulwasereya nikhalaayi.
Ativiixita ole onimwaanyiherya" khathoowa opwoova ntiitawa mithaali sirumeeliwa wi iloolowe ikwereere sowakaamela".
wunteeriwa wa mukhaliheryo ola okhaalatho opwanyereerya ikhaleelo osya siiri" omwaaleya ni oloola,oniira Mufanequiço.
Makhuleelo, Muraano, nthooko vasuwelihe awe, oniirya opakaaka miyuraano ni mitheenkeo sa ilaapo sa okhopeela wi okhupaarela wi ikhomaalihzrye othikeela wa aporokaraama olooliwa.
Olipiheraya makhuuru amawaani

Amanhã cano nikhuuru na Mufanequiço ovaaha nroromeelo na mulipihezryo wa mitheekeso wa atthu elaapo ya Kanata Stephen Lewis Foundation si niveexerye makhuuru amawaani akhaliheerya meteko soloola, mapantte wa ohitto wa elapo.

Ola othalakasaaka i makhuuru alaanikhaliherya miteeko sa mavareelo sa elaapo muhiinamwa miteeko sa Okuumi xi apwanyiiwe ni yeteeleliweke aretta, erii ti yulupaleexa ei muteeko wolooliwa ole okele omihooli.

Miyalikeelo sa Onusida,nipuuro na miteeko sothaleeleya muhiina sa Ilaapo sowiraana, sinithoonya eu Omosampiikhi, nnakhala vakhaani,1.5 sa imilyawu sa atthu akhalana mwaxiithu HIV, muhiina mwa namutthu a emilyaawu 25.
Viyaala, opwoova ikooto imiiya 700 sa atthu taarya yettelaala miteeko sololiiwa, yeeyo terei tekweheerya oheela elaapo muhiina mês nikhuuru Sa ilaapo siphoove mitteetthe saya.

Manamuuna okweya opwaanha olooyiwa oroowa oovanyihaniwa opancaani wa akhulupaale a Wasempeleeya Xeraale a Ilaapo Sowiraana mwaaha wa mareetta, eroowa opaceerya enamaraaru mahiiko yeettaka , 8, Onoova Iyoorokhi.
Anamwaane oviikana ikooto imiiya 350 anipwaanela ovahiwa mukhaliheryo mukhaliheryo a mukakuve Okaapu- Telekaato,osuweeliha muthenkeeso Save the Children.
Anamwaane anceene taale ahinsoma Eyo piiyo ahineettela exikola ni anuulaa etala.
Epooma ya Omapuutu

Muthokooso mmoosa wa muthenkeeso Save the Children, oni si nnakhala vakhaani, anamwaane a ikooto imiiya 350 otyaweela, mwaaha wa ohasuuliwa irumeeliwaka akapwiithi Okaapu.-Telekaato, vokaathi vakhaani ariisa okhanyererya eeneé okhaala museeturu mokhupaareliwa ni anithuuna mukhaliheeryo owakuveeya.em Cabo Delgado: Okaapu -Telekaato

Mothokosiwaani," niwiriyaniiwaka nsu na anamwaane Okaapu-Telekaato" onoroomola mukhaleelo wa khuuta nihiikuwa anamwaane alaas, ni eni wir axitityaaya arimeele, ni vatanyereyaka no othoowela ixikoola nu iwaraakha sikootha mayareeliwo ayasa sirumeele, thi mixankiiho wa iye khamoosa khamoosa samukaakuve ithoonyasa aya anaxikhaani ale.
Soolwanyiwa seeyotho variyaari mês sokohaasiya siiriwe, anamwaane Okaapu-Telekaato ottyaweela muhiina mês mitteetthe a epuruviisiya ni iye sowattamana Oniyaasa ni Wamphuula.

Tiretoore a Save the Children Omosampiikhi,Chance Briggs, Ohiimwa eu miteeko iya iniireliwa epwaanye exikhaani tá manamuuno saayi sowakhuliwa mixaakiho sanamwaane oye muhiina mwa olaa-tho wa ekhootto epuruviisiya ele.
Briggs, ohaakhuuleela si" anamwaane anihoolela muxaakiho nthooko othoowa yoolya, sowaara ni maxikaara wu yikasoopeke awaneelaka C ovid19, m ikhina ikiina sinulaanya sotepeexa othuneeya.

Yothokeela va iye soteene, opwuula Riggs," axinamwaane aniira eu anittuna okhalana nroromeelo ni arrumasa exikola, ni ale khamoosa khamoosa khalhanle ovooliwa muxikoola , maana khakhaale nnakhala orepeliiwa volipihereya".

Chance Briggs Ohiimwa wi waavaha maasu anamwaane Okaapu-Telekaato, mutheekeso Save the Children onilipeelela eu ale ari anamakhaliha ni Kuveeruni wiiwe, tthiri,iye ale asuweliha aya ni opwaanye ikettelo sikhaale owakhupaarelasa ni wakhaliherya muhiina mwa okumi aya ni alhalaane nroromeelo, nnaamwi ihirowaarta ikwakhathula.
Antony Blinken vamoosa ni Sergei Lavrov athukumanaasa Oxeneepera enamathanu mwaha wa elaapo ya Ukaraaniya yaari osuulu wameesa nthukumaano.
Sakarataari- a Estaato amarikaano onoorowa ovekela epoola ya Omuxikhoovo si( avaahe mphiimo vowakuveeya) wu ovukuuwe iyupuweliyo sa mmikanooni mme variyaari va ilaapo iye piili.
WASHINGTON:WAXIITOON

Sakarataari a Estaato ya Wameriika,Antony Blinken,Ohiimwa eu onoorowa ovekela kuveeruni Orusiiya wi" yikhanyaanye muhiina mwa sowiirelala ovukula" ihaamu iye sihipaarya mapuuro ala amukanooni mmoosa ni elaapo ya Ukaraaniya
Blinken ori ephiiro ya Wukaraaniya weewo onira awe avaanele vamoosa ni nfaluume, variyaari vootepa woopiha ohinimaala wi Muxikhoovo onothokiiha omukeleela mwattamanani aya.

" Vaninanooni va miiri mukhaleelo oni si Ruusiya okhaala, wa khuula okaathi, ovoonya ikaruuma sawe sa ekhootto owehihaaka elaapo ya Wukaraaniya " osuweliiha namuteeko ni mukhulupaae a etepartamento ya Estaato, erumeeliwe nmuhuupini nloosa, ahunteererya eu EUA anirooha ohoolo" mweteteteeryo wi soolwanyiwa sovirikaana" viira Muxikhoovo okhanyererya oroohela omuhooli ni omiisa natoroopa pacaaka elaapo Wukaraaniya.
Elaapo ya Ruusiya enoonihera oroowa omuhooli ni onatyataanya atoropa awe ni nleelo onilipiherya mamuuna awe mmoosa osuweleela wooliha wa .

Namuteeko mulweenexa a eteparatameento ya exitaato okupaleela wi " mwiwananeelo sa ilaapo kasikwiiye" ni wi ixitaato Sowiraana sinikupaleela wi" manamuuna mmoosa ophuka manyakunyaku ale voreerela ti orumeela miyiraanelo yo piiyo itipolomasiya".

Enamaali yeela,18, Blinken ovaanela orumeelaka ikaruuma isya vamos a ni Lavrov ni othalakasa"muraarelo othikeela ephiiro emoosa ta Ekhulupaale wi ovukuuwe ihaamu variyaari vowuncerereya orya watoroopa ampaatte o Ruusiya ,Vasco vaari vootepa oxaankiha", ohuncereerya namuhuupi yoole.

Sakarataari otumereerya wikhanyaanya waawe ohopopiheyaka muhiina mwa EUA ni wilipiiha ni ohikawanyeeya ya mitteetthe a elaapo ya Ukaraaniya no Ohiimwa saana wi wa khuuta muulumo muhiina mwa miteeko sowikhupaarela Sa ilaapo sa wewuroopa,ohaana itakaheryaka iye sivaraanne ni NATO ni iye simpakaana onthamweene ni islaaposa wewuroopa, votakaaherya ni Ukaraaniya",onuncereeriha mihuupi mmoosa okhuma o tepartamento ya estaato.
Antony Blinken athaana othukumanaka meeli,19, Okievvamoosa ni nfaluumeVolodymyr Zelenskiy ni miniisturo onaakhula mwaaha sa Waataana ni ilaapo sa okhopeela Dmytro Kuleba.
