Vootharelana, muhooleliwa wa itipolomasiiyas amerikaana eheetta ekwaaha orooka epooma ya Opereeli muhiina mwas muthukumaano nloosa orowa wiraneeya ni miniixitara musya a miraano ni ilaapo sa okhopeela mpaatte wa alemaanya Annalena Baerbock, niyoowo orowaaya hoothe "Ovaanyihana muhina mwa miyataanelo isya muhina mwas etipolomasiiya vamoosa ni Rusiiya ni mlipiheryo sowiraneeliwa wu iwaterihiwe owaaniwa ekhootto variyaari va ele Yamaruusu ni Ukaraaniya". Omaaliha mihuupi.
Asuweeli anihimwasa wi" Teroriiximu" okaapu-Telekaato ohaana osuweeliwa manamuna osoomwa wawe.
Ihapaari somosampiikhi nleelo sinitthikeela okhaala seeye sowana-wana watoroopa mutteetthe wa epuruviisiya ya okaapu-Telekaato.
Teroriiximu,isuruxeesiya, ekhootto, ti mwaaha oye khamosa-khamoosa ,sohiimwa siholeelihiwa eu ethalakasiiwe mukhaleelo ole.

Ni wi esuwelexiiwe vakhaani maasi mwaha wa mukhaleelo, oleelo ninoorowa wiiwa maasu maraaru, oluttelelaana ni osoomiha muhiina mwas miyatanelano ni ilaapo sokhopeela ariina muraarelo ni soosomwa ni mwiiha sa murettele ni wikhupaarela:Calton Cadeado, onkhuuma Univerisitaate Joaquim Chissano,Emílio Zeca,tiretoore onyakela makhaataa eseeturu ya wosoomwa sa inamuuna sa ilaapo sokhopela,Rufino Sitoi, muleepi a Eliivuru“Terrorismo em África,Presença da Ameaça em Moçambique” silaleeriwe vaninaanyeenexa va sipixiiwe me situmihiwa aya.

Ni eliivuru ntooko nipuuro nopaceeriwa novaanela nialeesa araaruari makateemiku nromolaaka mwaha wa mukhaleelo,sowuupuweleliwa ni oye siiri sinthuneeleya okhaala iphiiro wu waakhula vorereleene variiyari va mwaha ole.
Mwa miruuku oye sinithipeleela, sookhala iniraanyiiha wi nikhuuru nihaaxa Okaapu-Telekaato kahiyo makhuuru amateroriista ekeekhayi ni vanireerela wi asuweele osoomwa saneene.
Nwiriwanele nlaaka "Agenda Africana"
Afiirika ni munuweelo munceene oteepa woopiha mwaha wa ieeetta siraaviwa, onihimwa OMS.
Mwaaha ola wookhala worukuuxiwaka, wahiyaaru oompaaha soona, owuurya vakhaani, wuncereeriwa olya mihokhorookho ni ikithikithi ni olipiherya mmwiilini moolipa.
Mutheekeso Olumweeko Okuumi Olumweeku,onriiwa(OMS) onihaaya osuwanyeeyiha mwaha mulupaalexa omanaaniha wi weelihe okwa mwaaha wa ireetta sihiravihaniwa Waafiriika.
Mpaakha etaakha ya 2020, vanalipeleeliwa wi atthi imilyaawu sene animookwa mukontineeti.
Ni oweela nno oniireye vakhaani vakhaani mwa iyaaka iya sovira mulooko.

Erlalatooriyo esta emoosa ya OMS eni ele miyopoopiiho iya sovikaana mutiita sookhala olipeleelaka maana anceena athu alupaale Waafiriika akhalana nnakhala vakhaani ethu enoowa ya eriixiku enuncereerya mwanyiheeryo WA wunuuheriwa ereetta enoowa ehinravihaniiwa ni mopiiheryo wa ekuumi, vatakahereyaka mixaakiho sinvaara erooho, kaankuru, atiyapeeti a mithiito 2 ni ereetta ya ekaaxa.
Mwa meettelo seryo, okwiiwayotaanyeriwa ni ireetta oye sihiraavya sirookhala , mwaakha wa 2030 sootepa ovikaana oye simphattuuwa bem mwaaha siraavya.
Iyaakh iyo xeexe siirya, ikheeliwo mwaha ireetta sihiraavya sokhaala ophiyaaka Imilyawu 44.

Nthooko muhooleliwa muttetthe a Waafiriika, Dr Matshidiso Moeti, " wa iyaakha iya sokhiserya, mpaatte munceene Sá okasoopaka ni mureerelo sa Olumweeko oholeelihiwemuhiina mwa sowoopiha sa ekuumi yanamuncee sowakuveeya nthooko axiithu anoonaneya, Siika ni Epoola".

Moet oni si ti vopwaneleela" wuupuca qui variyaari va sowoopiha iyamuhiina mwa mukhaleelo a ekuumi wanamunceene, ntooko Siika ni Epoola, khanikhaale owiliyaala mwa miyopoopiiho si qui ikuumi wa ireetta sihiravihaniwa, vothaleleyaxa maana sinceene wiseeye sookhala wikasoopiw aka, norukuuxa manamuuna owuupuwela ni mithiito wa Okuumi.

Sookhala mikweeheryo mixeexe sowoopihamuhiina mwa mukhaleelo a miyupuwelo sinthoonyeexiwa vanceenexa ni OMS: urumeeliwa soona, orumeeliwa voweettiha erooho wa eviinyu, malyeelyo oteepa okhaala osikhiini ni okhuruuwa wa munuweela wa miteeko anilipiheerya mwiili.
Variiyari va ilaapo sawaafirika sothokosasiwe, ekwaarutu emoosa ya atokotooko anikhaleela nnakhava vakhaani thaaru wa mwiiha iyesawo sowoopiha.
Anamunceene waalesa ari atokotooko yaarin vowanyiheerya athiiyana variyaari va iyaakha sa 45-65.

Orumeeliwa soona ti mmoosa yootepa yoopopiheye wa mikhalelo a ikuumi wolumweenku, okhupaarela vasuulu wa ipuruseentu milooko 70% sa kaakuuru a ipulumaawu, 40% sa ireetta oye sivaara ipulumaawu sootepa ni 10% ereetta ssinvaara irooho ni manamuna oweetta ephoome.
Mittetthe sa Afiirika, sinithipeleela iye sorumeeliwa soona wa khuta mahiiku variyari vaatokweene orukunuuwe onkhuuma 5% orowaaka 25%( 12 % mutthetthe wotheene).

Muhiina mwa mwaaha sa manamuuno owilyiiha, OMS ohiimwa wi atthu khanweerya olya mihokhorookho ni ikithikithi sinphiyeerya, yeeyo ekhaleelo voophiyaka ipuruseeto seene 14% sa mwiiha sa atthu ankwawaha ni kaankuru onithaniwa kaxitointexitinaale ni vowiraaka ipuruseeto 10% sa mwiiha sokwiiwa mwaaha wa ireetta sinvaara erooho ni ihasaara sa ehaamu.

Nnaamwi sotaanyeerya mwaha sa manaanuma owilyiiha ohikhaala wokuumi yuncereerya muhiina mwa muttetthe sikiina sa OMS, a firiika othi wa osahaara tiwotikinihaasa ni muttetthe mmoosa wa OMS ohaawa vaali vaali mwaha wohilokasa mukhaleelo yoolya ni yaata atthu otikaanasa mwiili.
Othipeleleya wa atthu owattaneexa mukhaleelo okhoola worukunuuwa mwa ipuruseeto 12% Omatakaxikare wa 60% Osiyiixeele, ni mwukhaleelo okhiserya wa ipuruseeto 35%.
Axithiyaana atukweene taari vowanyiheryeene onooniheerya mwukhaleelo woophoova ilemelelo saya viira vatananihiwaka ni aloopwana.
Owuuriwa eviinyu muhiina mwa mmuttettheni vanceenexa onooniherya okhuuruwa waawe.
Vananyiheriwa wu iteerusu piili sa axitokweene khawuwurya eviinyu.
Othipeleleya wa owuurya mwaha wa sowiraneeya yolemeleexa variyari va axilopwaana awuurya worukunuuwa voophiyaka epurusento 1% Okaampiiya ,a 69 Oxaatu, niitho ni munuweelo aya a ipuruseeto 31%.

Variiyari va ilaapo 32 sithokosasiiwe,okaathi eriiyari onnviira veeriwaka muteeko sokhaatta erutthu vohikukhumuwa wala okhaathi worakaama tuule mikharikhaari 21, wa khuuta nihiku, Omawuritaaniya, a mikhaari khaari 368 wa khuuta nihiku, Omosampiikhi, ni emetiyaana emoosa ya mikhaarikhari sa 116 sa nihiiku nothaleeleya.
Axilopwaana taavira okhaathi munceene yiiraaka miteeko silipiheerye mmakhuvaani vatananihiwa nai athiyaane.

Ni OMS,onoona wu vookhala opwaanya vokweheriwa ni iviirikaneelo sa mukhaleelo wa okuumi wunteerya omuulya soona ,owuurya ikhaacu nikasoopa, wuncerereya okhuura mihokhorookho ni ikithikithi tisinnthatuxa mwiili okhoomala.
COVID-19: Looxi Anxeeli Okumiiha ewooroti muhiina wvokhanyereeriwa okhootta.

Muncerereeyo mmoosa sa mwaaha sa koroonaviiru okuuxa nlemeeliho ya looxi anxeelo, okalifooriniya, othookiha ntumeereryo mmoosa wi okhaaliwe owaani Minions mas isumaana thaaru, yoowo oroowa opaceeriwa nihiiko nopaceerya Nmuteeko eyo piiyo esekuunta.
Ekontaato waahihiinys khalayeene wi amuletos muhuupi a ntumeereryo owikasoopa veera mwaaha isya sa Covid-19 serra iphoovaaka mwaattelo wabikooto 4.500 sa khuuta nihiikumuhiina wa mahiku mathaanu.
Enamaathanu,mwaattelo eriiyari ya mahiku mathaanu waari wa imposto 4.751.
Yoruuma ele eniwateeriha ipaaca, sanamunceene sala as ari mapirivaato, atthu ahinnkhalasa ethooko emoosa.
Ilooca sikupaleeliwa wi mukupaleelo sua tamurareelexo sookhala ohiiwa sothukuliweene, ivaraaka muhiina mwa ipuruseento 50% sa manamuuna aweryaaya.
Ilooca ikiina nnleelo sirowiraaka wiira ihuliiwe,maasi sihaana ovaara muhiina mwa ipuruseento 20% satananiihiwa mavareelo olimalenlya aya okhaathi wa sothuumwa siniireliwa anataali.

Makhulupaale a muteeko sa okuumi a wameerika anakhuleels eu mwaattelo wa mwiiha isya sa covid-19 sookhala olaattanaka voohilokasa mwa mahikuanrwa mathaanu, eresulutaato vakhaani sa imwaleeyo sikhupareeliwe muhiina mwa okhaathi wa ifeeriyaato no muteeko semahaala no sovukuuwa sanokhaathi wamapuuro ale amwaleyaaniwa.

Sothuumwa muhiina mwa mwiiha isya sookhala wanyihereyaka sinto sootepa okhuruuwa vatananiihiwaka sexikhaani sitaanyeriwe mwaaha wa ifeeriyaato,maasi miyaattelo,anihiimwa anamatokoosa, kisiivaha nlnlaaka nothareeya wa Maputo EUA aniirasa anwaanela mwaxiithu.
Enamaathanu, EUA avikanaasa maarakha a imilyaawu13 muhiina wa mwaattelo sa mwiiha sa mwaxiithu koroona,maasi wa khuuta manamuuna nipuuro nikiina na molumweekoni, ntooko ni univerisitaate Johns .
Totoora

LeanaWen, ukulukhaanaa munikaakuve ni mwixittiihi o ohiiwa oGeorge Washington University ohimeerya Associated Press:"kilipeelela paahi wi atthu ahitaphuuleele ninyooho miyaattelo ni athooke wi kivakhaale muncerereeyo owaatta mmoosa otannyeriiwe nihiiku na ithuu sa mahaala, nibmwivaavo ommalihaase opaaka muthokiihobwa ekwaaha ya instalar, Hunukkah ni ikiina"

Mwaattelo wa aretta wimaathi aariina koviit-19 muhiina mwa ilaapo sa estaatuuxi Uniitu aphiiya ikooto 90.000,enamathanu, novira wiiraka ikwaaha piili mweeri ole oviire,ntooko vansuweliha aya axeesiya a ihapaari Reuters.

Ala ari tiyimmaannthi muxiripitaali anithaara isumaana isumaana seene ni mukupaleelo owunncereereya mwaattelo okupwaattiwa muttettheni mme mwa ixitaato Uniitu mwivaavo noweliiha maxankeelo o wi mikumaano saninanooxe sa itthu semaani yamukuuxa nnleelo iraveliiwo iye ni inimuncererya mwaatte waale yimannthi muxiripitaali.
Antony Blinken ohemereeriha nikhuuru na ilaapo paaltiikuwi wi akapwiitthi a ilaapo sa EUA aveleeheriweke ukaraaniya .

Mutumereeryoole,ntooko vansuweliha sakarataari a exitaato amerikaano, anireeliwa wi " olipiheerye muttetthe aya elaapo ya (Ukaraaniya)"ikuuru está sowixaakiha muhiina mwa wakameeliwa woohipaca eyawa ni vohittitthimiho wa elaapo ya Ruusiya.
WAXIITTONi-

Sakarataari a exitaato awameriika ohemereeriha ilaapo palitiiku sa Exitooniya, Letooniya ni Lituwaaniya wi iveleeliheke imiisi antitaaki ni iye sinakiheryaniwa-musuulu simmpaakiwa muhiina mwa ilaapo sa exitaato Uniitu siroohiwaka Wukaraaniya, variyaari.

" mito kihaakuviiha ni kiheemwiha, ni noovaha mukhaliheeryo ahu omaleleene wa othaamihiwa wa mreerelo sowaakiiherya seeyo sanawiraane a nikhuuru NATO, Exitooniya, Letooniya ni Lituwaaniya anikweheeryavelaapo ya Ukaraaniya wi alipiherye ikuuru sowixaakiha otikiha"olaleerya Antony Blinken muhiina mwa ekaruuma ya Twitter esaapatu yeela,22.
Xeethi a etipolomasiiya wa wamaeerika oxukhureela ilaapo iye" muhiina mwa mukhaliheeryo iye sihiroovahiwa Ukaraaniya.

Waporoovariiwa olaleeriwe wa Blinken opakhiriihiwa okapwiithi oniraneeyanhiiku nimoosa nooviira vaavale ole ni muxirikha awe ruusu, Sergei Lavrov, yathukumanaase aya Oxeneepeera, maasi voohilokasa ithuu suluupale sinceene, vohiikhala ovaara mururomeelo wi mivaanelelo simphitaanya Waxiittonino ni Muxikhoovo sinoorowa okeleela omihooli.

Womalaan wa epaaca ya enamathaanu, 21, sakarataari a exitaato ya wameerika yokasoopa, ekwaaha emoosa tho, elaapo ya Ruusiya wi enoorowa ohooleela emmoosa" mwaakhulo ohi mahiku,owitipeeryaxa ni owiraneeliwa"okhuuma muhiina mwa ixitaato sawiraana ni ale ari tavarana awe ole yiira omwakamelaka Ukaraaniya.

" khanipithiihe:Vieira atoroopa oruusiya yatuupha mikaano sa Ukaraaniya, Iwo otupheela vowuluuliwa no anoorowa wakheleeliwa ni manamuuna owakhuliiwa makiina ni vowakuveeyaxa, otuupexabni vowiraneeliwa ya nikhuuru na exitaato Uniitu ni ale avaranaawe muteeko valiosa sala apathani awe" ohiiwa Blinken virasse olaleerya maasi a muhapariini Oxeneepeera.

Sakarataari a estaatocamerikaano ohimeath oriiki wi waxinttooni okupaali waakhuula ni ewaraakha yolepeliiwa Ruusiya niwiira Muxikhoovo okhanyereerye nliipiheeryo na nroromeelo, otakaaheryaka ororomeelihawi Ukaraaniya khankhaala khala yakhuleliwaka ni mukupaleelo wa NATO.

" mito kihaleelasa (a Sergei Lavrov) wi, vamslakaru othokoosa nirowaahu okhalaana mahiku aniirya,vamoosas ni anamwiraano ahu ni anamakhaoiiha, nookhaala omusweliihaka a ni Ruusiya mixaakiho saiu ni moneelo ahu ni mithalakaaso sowaatta sikiina ni sirookhala solempweene esumaana eye enirya " ohiiwa,Blinken.

Alesa nnleelo anihimwasa wi Ostaato Uniitu somanaanihasa osuuwela wakhaala wi Muxikhoovo ori owireheryeene wi othanle etipolomasiiya ntooko manamuuna ovukuula ehaamu sa mmuttettheni ni variyaari va ostaato iye piili.

Onthukumanooni, sakarataari a exitaatostação amerikaano ovekeela wi Ruusiya wi otyonyiheerye matheeso wi Muxikhoovo khoriina miyupuweelo somwakamela namwattamanani awe ni wi akuumihe atoroopa ophiiya vowiiraka ikooto 100 apwehaawe mmikanooni.
Koretenatoore- atuxuutu a porkaraama owaneeliwa ekwereere ya ettekuuxa Wankoola enikhootta yotheeriwa essa mmotaatani mwa etiripunaale.
Nilton Saraiva ti onoottheriwa wi omusuryeele kontoraato vamoosa ni empereesa awe.

Etiripunaale ya Epuruviisiya ya Luwaanta, yonnwiriyana nihiiku notupheela muteeko mesma, 27, reewu Nilton Saraiva, ole oriina okhaale tokhiseerya wa wapinataamu araaru anakusarasiwa vamoosa ni Minixiteeriyu Pupiliiku wi aviitha mixookhu sa iveerepa sireeliwa wi irumeeliwe muhiina momalamalihiwa ekwereere ya ettekuuxa mukheliheeryo wavahiiwe variyaari va efuutu Kolopaale.

Saraiva ole ekhalaayi aari korotenatoore- atuxuutua eporokaraama yowaneeliwa ettekuuxa, muhiina mwa Minixiteeriyu a Okuumi, tonakusaariwa okhaalanole omusuryeele contrato ereeliwa wi ipaakiwe mireerelo sa ilataarato sa iporopakaanta saarowa irumeeliwe muhiina owopooliwa wa anamawaano.

Reeyu anakhuleels ohoola wa etiripunaale waakhele ekhuumaka wa Unitaate Tekiniica Kolopaale voopwoovaka imilyaawu sente milooko 76, wa iye emioya 123 ni imiiya 750 sa kwansa, siliviiwe ikwaaha piili, ni masiina a impressão sawe.

Ntooko vanthoonya awe Minixiteeriyu Pupiliiku(MP), kontoraato ole osuryeeliwe ni arikwiitu orumeelale wi okweherye ohapuuxa eveerepa ele nnaamwi siharumeeliwe wi ipaakiwe ikaruuma saleepwe nmuranooni mme.

MP aniira wi iwaraakha sotakaahereya tho sosuryeelasiwa wi MP aniira wi iwaraakha sotakaahereya tho sosuryeelasiwa wi MP aniira wi iwaraakha sotakaahereya tho sosuryeelasiwa wi MP aniira wi iwaraakha sotakaahereya tho sosuryeelasiwa wi okophihiwe " nakooso" ni nuulumo nimoosa na muxinttano ni impesreesa sikiinaku.mpesreesa sikiinaku.okophihiwe " nakooso" ni nuulumo nimoosa na muxinttano ni impesreesa sikiinaku.mpesreesa sikiinaku.MP aniira wi iwaraakha sotakaahereya tho sosuryeelasiwa wi okophihiwe " nakooso" ni nuulumo nimoosa na muxinttano ni impesreesa sikiinaku.mpesreesa sikiinaku.okophihiwe " nakooso" ni nuulumo nimoosa na muxinttano ni impesreesa sikiinaku.mpesreesa sikiinaku.
Nilton Saraiva, ohiinya wiiraka winoyo othariihela ni sotumereriwa sawe muhiina mwa akontoraato ni ohakula wi khaasuwela mwaaha ompiixe onaakhula ohoola wa etiripunaale.

Etiripunaale yovaanyiha reeyu erumeelakav ekontaato yavaaha nroromeelo notupheela mmuxinttanooni wokweehera othanliiwa olha namakweherya a ikaruuma voohi okhaathi nowiwaniiniwa ni tho paahi ottikitthiwa oromolaaka nsiina nawe.

Waakhuula sawe, arikwiitu ole ohiiwa wi omwasinaari kontoraato,maasi kahiiyo importa wa mwaneene a empereesa worumwa muteeko, maasi ntooko Korotenatoore- atuxuutu a eporokaraama owaneeliwa ettekuuxa, ni ovohikhaala mahooleli a nikhuuru, Filomeno Fortes.
Koretenatoore a Eporokaraama owaneela Ettekuuxa,Filomeno Fortes, waari opaceeriwa owiriyaniiwa oleelo, variiyara voopwoovaka anahiimwa 20 aromooliwa aluluwaane ni mulaattue le.

Namanyiherya João Lukombo,nonoona mireerelo wi miniixituroakhalaayi a okuumi,José Van-Dúnem, ohaana tho owiriyaniwaka ni mukupaleelo wa namaahimwa wi othalakaase manamuunaxeeneni iveerepa iya sihiwale aya ota wa mukupaleelo awe.

Minixiteeriyu Pupiliiku enathoonyasa Sónia Carla de Oliveira Neves, Nilton Saraiva Francisco e Mauro Filipe,wi ahapuuxa mireerelo sireeliwa owanaaniwa ettekuuxa yophiimwa muhiina mwa voophovaka 160 imilyaawu sa ikwansa, ni vowanyiheerya ikooto imiiya 500 sa itoolari sa ta wa elaapo ya wameerika.

Vaavale viraneya muthuku,etiripunaale yowiriyaana reewu Mauro Felipe, wakhuleele wi ottikiiha musuurukhu ole vakhaani, okhanyereerye wi ottikiha muhaakhu ole vakhiini, niwakheleela muhuupi wa ekoresponteensiya ya Minixiteeriyu a Ekuumi yoowo ovekeela ottikiha muxookho ole.
Ophukiiwa wopaacerya, muliipa olamuliiwae Sónia Neves,ohemereeriha ohoolo wa etiripunaalewi oviitha eveerepa ya efuutu Kolopaale wixireelaka mmansawe.
Voluttelela ni miruuku sa ekolono sikhanle omalamaliha" ohiiwa tiretooreTiretoore - Xeraale a OMS wa mwaaha omwaleyasiiwa Wafiriika.

Tiretoore - Xeraale a muraano Olumweeku muhiina mwa Okuumi,(OMS) othaalela" mivanyihaniyo volipiheryaniwa sothaanlela mukupaleelo wa nikhuuli iyo piiyo soothanyaana" silaleeriwe vaninanexa va muhiina mwa siira sikhumeleelaka othaalela" mivanyihaniyo volipiheryaniwa sothaanlela mukupaleelo wa nikhuuli iyo piiyo soothanyaana" silaleeriwe vaninanexa va muhiina mwa siira sikhumeleelaka miraneeyo muhiina momwaleyiiwa mwaaha wa evasina ewaneela muunamuuno musya sa mwaxiithu koroona muhiina mwa ekontineeti ya Wafiriika.
Vohithoonya nsiina,Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus ohiimwa wi muthiinto wa sohimwa iya sinilaleerya" sohiiwa emoosa ya mupuweleelo ekoloono" wi ole," ohaana omaala".
" thiinto iya mwa sohiiwa soothanyana khoovaha mukhaliheryo ni nnakhala wi ekeleeke ohoolo.
Sinivonyoola mupuwelo wa erooho a othuunku.

Afiriika, khokhaale ni nnakha khoroowa nkhaala ekaapo emoosa mwa soomwaleyasiwa vireliwaka nnakhala evasiina " olipiherya Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus,okhaathi serra awe olaleeryaka ekonfereesiya ya ehapaari orumeelale ikaruuma isya sa nvaanelo esekuunta, 6.
" Ennromoliwa yoluluwana ni manamuuna owupuweela ekoloono ahaana omala" ohuncereerya.

Sohiimwa siphattuuwe nooviira nvaanelo mmoosa wiraneeye esumana eviire yawuraanye tiretoore a mithokoosa sa Ixitituutu Ofaraasa ya mithokoosa sekulukhaana nniitthaniwa (inserem),Camille Locht, ni Xeethi a muteeko sa ekulukhaana semukaakuve sa oxiripitaali Cochin Opariixi,Jean-Paul Mira,a ekanaale LIC,yoowo oni wi ohiikoohiwa muhiina wa sosoomwa siiriwe wi ipwaanye evasiina emoosa ewanaana koviit -19.

Jean-Paul Mira,omukooha " wakhaala wi okhaala opaaca,kinaakhaale oholeeliha muteeko sosoomwa iya Waafiriia, weyiiwo ahikhale maxilar wala olooliwa, nnakhala ohihimuxiwa, ntooko virose aya muhiina mwa sosoomwa khamoosa khamoosa siniireliwa ekwereere ya siira?
" Munoonela sayi?"
Musoomi ohaakhula: " nyuwosa ehaakhi tiyaawinyue".
Miyupuweelo opaaka, votharelaanw, yosooma emoosa a Waafiriia yooyo woluluwana, ehitaphuleela wi khanikhaale tho wupuweela mwa soosoma siiromoola Wewuroopa ni Awuxitaraaliya".
Masiyentiixita ale anli avekelasa musammaha nooviira okhaathi ole ahareere aya ovanyihiiwa ni miyuraanyo ni Minixiteeriyu a Miyataano sa Okhoopela ya Ofaraasa.
Womaliheryani, oleelo,Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus olipiherya wi" vowuliiha muuru, vowoopiha wiiwa wi masiyentiixita apaaka muthiinto wa sohiimwa sa iyaakha sabikooto 21".

Axitokweene Ofaraasa ni Waafiriia, ntooko muliipa onittikha mphira owaariwa omariifi Didier Drogba ni muliimi Samuel Etoo, ahakhulaasa,sa ntooko muraano SOS othanyana,ovekeela wi nikhuuru na anamiruuku Nulupaale na ikaruuma sa awutiyuvisuwaale o Faransa ewanaana ovaara mukhaliheryo awe owanelaak porokaraama.
Maliitere a nikhuuru nisuweliiwa ni G7 nolaleerya nokhoottelan eweero ya oruusiya ni imilyaawu ikooto imiiya 600 siniireliwa ilaapo Siri mphironi mothawaali.
Peviyeera

Mamfaluume ni amahooleli a Kuveeruni athanaali oteepa othawaali sa molumwenkuuni, nikhuuru na athannaanli(G7).,apakaasa muthoonyeryo a mwiraano mmoosa owaanla wakameeliwa elaapo ya Ukaraaniya ni Nfaluume Vladimir Putin, ,omuthukumanooni opaceerye ettimiiku yeela,26,o Apee wa Paviyiia, walemaanya.

Omuthukumanooni, maliitere a exitaato sowuraanyeya, aAlemaanya, Faransa, Reyiinu Uniitu, kanaata ,Xapaawu ni Itaaliya,avanyihaana manamuuna ovukuleela eye sotanyeerya ekhootto muhiina mowuncerereya manamuuna owalameela wowulaana wav ioolya ni maluuxu.
Alesa alaleerya muruuku mmoosa wi apaake muxinttano ni Roots ya vaseeti, Oxiina.
Nfaluume a EUA ,Joe Biden,ni xanseleeri Owalemaanya, Olaf Scholz, athukumanasa vahinatthi opaceeriwa mivaanelo ekeekhayi.

Okathyeene yoowo Scholz ahiira wi" Alemaanya ni EUA wa khuuta okhaathi wotheene aroowa wiraanelaka muteeko wiira mwaaha okhalaakawa wikhupaarela wa elaapo ya Ukaraaniya, ni nohiimwa saneene ekwaaha vamoosa tho.

Peresiteeti awameerika olaleerya wi ilaapo da nikhuuru, nipaceryaka ni Exitaatu Uniitu, anoorowa okhanyereerye okhoottiha eweero ya oruusiya, tokhiseerya ya nikhuuru da isaasayu sa ilaapo spots okeela nnssuwa sihukhume aya Muxikhoovo, voweteteeliwa ohukhumwa mwaha omwakamelaka Ukaraaniya.

Vohiyatho vobmwaaha iye sivanyihaniwa variyaari va ikhootto iye sirya seettaka elaapo ya Ukaraaniya ,maliitere a nikhuuru G-7 alaleerya muruuku Juína mwa esetoore ya muteeko sotekasiiwa soophiyaka imilyawu ikooto imiiya 600"sa itoolari wireliwaaka okhaliheriwa ilaapo Siri ephiiro yothawali, ephiiro emoosa ya eroota a serra ya Oxiina.
Exitaato Uniitu, ohivahereerya eteerusu emoosa wa mukhaliheryo.
Peresiteeti Joe Biden ottweela muruuku" mukhaliheryo mmoosa ororuuha othiika wa wotheene, votakaherya napinataamu owameeriika composta naale ari atthu ateene sa ilaapo sahu.

"Enoovaha olipiheerye ilaapo sahu ni ti mmoosa wa mukhweeheryo ni wi nikawaaneke miyoonelo sahu sooreera iniireliwa mukupaleelo omeeloni wakweheerya anamuttettheni ovireela Olumweeku niwehe,niwehevo tho mwivaavo bmireerelo data sowooneyaxa sa miraneelo a mikhalelo a itemokarasiiya" olipiheerye Biden.

Esekuunta onoorowa wiraneeye muthukumaano mmoosa oroowa wireela votteyiivela, ni erumeliwaka ikaruuma isya, sa Peresiteeti a elaapo ya Ukaraaniya Volodymyr Zelensky, votharana yeeyo eroowa okhaala epaaca esya ya G7 eriina myaha soluluwana ni mukaleelo a ipheeyo, maluuxu ni Okuumi.

Nleelo orwa olimaleliwaka muthukumaano oroowa wiraneela otharihlaka ephiiro saninaano, ntoSakarataari -Xeraale a ONU mweekunyane António Guterres, yoowo oroowa ovanyiiha mukupaleelo wa inroroomelo muhiina mwa soolya olaana ni mukupaleelo olattani variyaari va mukupaleelo wa athiyana ni alopwaana.

Evosiisu ya enamaali sinoorowa owehawehiwa miyataano sa miraneyo sa mipantte sovirikaana ni mukhaleelo musya a manamuuna wolempa mihuupi, ohinatthi wiraneeye muthukumaano muhiina mwa silaleeriwe wokhiseerya wa amakhaanya a G7 wirelaka othonyiheriwa myaha soluttelelana ni yomalelaani wa muthukumaano wa mittetthe iye.
Nihiiku neenotho,28, onoorowa opaceerya Omatiriiti, Oxipaanya, epaanca emoosa ya nikhuuru na NATO, eroowa omala enamaxeexe,30.
Ettimiiku yeela, ikooto ikonto seene wala muttitthi wa atthu anixiiliha muhiina mowixaakiherya ni muraano atoroopa a moonono otupheela nsuwa.
Omalaace, ekwereere ya Siita yomwiiva mureetta wuntereerye muteeko .

Nnakhala vakhaani milooko 63 na atthu ahokwaasa okhuma okhuma mweeri opaceerya oroowa mweeri wa namuloko ni miili wa mwaakha yoola voluluwaana ni myaaha wa makhuru a ikwereere soluttelelana siniraviiwa iniitthaniwa Siita mwaha wowunteererya muteeko solooliwa ni mithaali sinivukula owali wawe.

Mukhulupaale a ikoothw sa porokaraama a Epuruviisiya oweha wehiwa VIH/SIDA,Hionor Canda,osuweliha saneene enamaali yeela,17, wi mwaattelo waaretta ale ari ahiiye othaara muteeko solooliwa ta imiiya 262 na tthu.
Viriyaari vareetta ale anixiiyerya muhiina molookiwa mwaakha wa 2019, emioya 149 taari athiyana ni emiya 113 alopwaana" osuweliha Canda.
Eyo ti sinthoonyerya mwaattelo mmoosa vatananihiwa ni mwaakha oviire okhaathi yoole virara aya yuraanyiwa waari wa emioya 119 viira aya milooko 64 axithiyaana ni 55 alopwana, oholeeliha.
Masi mwaattelo wa ifaraati i namukhaani.

Wa ifaraati wiraneeye mwaakha yoola analikeeliwa 53 atthu atokweene ni anamwaane milooko, variyaari va imiiya 202 wa atthu omuraaveene mwaxiithu VIH, vatananiihiwaka ni mwaakha wa 2018, vookhala orepeliiwa wav milooko 77 sa ifaraati, wiyawob milooko 63 atokweene ni 14 anamwaane, olipierya Canda.

Mukhaleelo iya muhiina mwaale aariina mmuhiina mwa mittetthe acepuruviisiya ya Omalaace silaleeriwe variyaari vanamunceenr viraneeya aya muthukumanobareheriiwe ni Reeyu a muraano wa Ekhootto yowananiiwa SIDA nitweliiwe (ANASO) nanamihuupi a muraano samawaani mme.

Korotenatoore a Epuruviisiya a ANASO Waldemar Sebastião Cassombe, okupaali muteeko abikaruuma sirumerliwa wi ilaleeweke ihapaari ni mihuupi Sa mitumereeryo wikhupaarela owanaana ekwereere, olaleerya wi miyuraanyo wireela mipantte a nthaavi na Omalaace arimeelasa.

"hiyo nahikhalana makhuru manceene a miyuraanyo sikhanyaanyela, nahikhalana tho wulaane wooneyaxa muhiina mwa mittetthe wa epuruviisiya ni oleelo va khanireere ovukuula muhiina mwa miyuraanyo de makhuru makiina anivahereerya ovaara muteeko yoola variyaari vanamuttettheni", ohiiwa, yuncereeryaka maalumo oriiki wi" nnaamwi vreyaka silaleeriwe ni iye vakhaani nikhalanyaahu thanu wala xexe miyuraanyo sente siiri sowilipiha mmpatte oteelne wa epuruviisiya enikhanyaanya wi yunuheryeke saneene muteeko iye, vaavo varões aya Ivana mukhaliheryo aya wi avukuule mwaattelo a mwaxiithu VIH ni wotheene sintanyerya awe variyaari va Okuumi wapinataamu ahu.

Reeyu wa mitheekeso sinwaneela Siita,(ANASO) onakhapeleela Omalaace atthu ikooto 3.608 yaawo akhaala nnaamwi amuranveene mwaxiithu HIV/SIDA ni iyoolya, mukhaliheryo amupuweelo ni ahiira athokihaka inamuuna wi hoothe naale aroowa wivahererya yuraanya ale ari mafinansiyatoor wi alipiherye owanela ihaakhi waale anikhaala anamwi ariina.

Asuphaayi a ANC" aniweha muteeko sa epuliitika ntooko ephiiro yokweherya vootepa wakuuva ni ororomeleyanmuhiina mothukumaanya muhakhu" onikasoopa muliipa ovanyiiha a awankoola.

Ninyooho na epuliitika" vonyoonya" nookhaala wulanyeya o Wafiriika ti Suuli vokhiseya wala vanatteyimelaru, ohiimwa muhiina mwa yosooma emoosa yoluluwana ni mukhaleelo wa elaapo ele sinamulaleeyiwa ostaatu Uniitu nno. Ewaraakha yotweliwa nisiina .“ As Ténues Fundações de um dos Estados Estáveis de Africa” eleepwe ni Dr.

Assis Malaquias, namathokoosa a eseenturu Afiriika eniireliwa muteeko sosoomwa muhiina mwa minamuuna Sa univerisitaate ya etefeesa nasioyonaale yavixitaato Uniitu.Malaquias okeela wi myaaha Sá ninyooho noluluwana ni epuliitika mulaponi onryo otepaaka ni " muthiinto sofaraakuwa wilipiiha" wa elaapo.

Ninyooho bjs ti vaceenexa nitaanyiwa mwaha wa kathoowa, ovirikanaasa ni " onthamweene" a mapuliitiku, ohithawaali saneene, ohilipiiha wa mapuuro amahooleli ni ni othoowa manamuuna osoomw snipwexereery" muhiina mwa Kuveeruni othariihela ikettelo samwathaale nooviira mukhaleelo a aparteeti ori topiipisa wetta wawe wi aphatuweke mapuuro Obatalá muteeko wala okweherye muteeko sexikhaani muhiina mwapinataa, enihimwa yosooma ele.Totoore ole.

Malaquias onakhuleela wi porokaraama “Black Economic Empowerment” oniirela ohuula mikhoora a muhaakhu wa ikoopanyiya ni apoovu onoriipe attottenle muraarelovari vakhiinyeene olutteleela manamuuna aya muhiina mwa ANC yaawo anamwi aholeeli aya oniweeha epoteeri ntooko "nipuuro nimoosa wala manamuuna othawaali womutthu .

Amakhaanya a epoteeri muhiina mwa ANC, okeela Malaquias, nnakhala kahiiyo vothaleleya vamakhaanya nooviira okhaathi wakolooniya awafiriika, enikhanyererya etukumeento erumeeliwe wi nnleelo okhala mwaattelo muhiina mohisuweliiwa ni omooranwa mitharihelo Sá muteeko varumeliwaka elaapo.vavale vireya aya okohakohiwaka ni eheapaari ya meu na wameerika Totoore Malaquias oruna wi erelatooriyo awe ti yootepa .
Tekekhayi.
Mito kiniweha ni kinithalakasa ekeekhayi muhiina mwa eyaraakha ya totooreAssis Malaquias, yeeyo ekuuxaye vakopooni voripeleela wa osuuluxe.
Musoome erelatoriyu nteeryeene murumeelaka ntaava na keleexi muttapunyaka va.
Ankoona ni Mosampiikhi anithoonyiwa wi onyohola ihukhuumu mmatataani Koreeya onooroti.
ONU, onithokosa othumwa okapwiithi variyaari va Mosampiikhi ni muteko sa ekonpanyiya ya ota wa okoreeya Oluwanta.

Nihiiku nne ekonseelyu ya esekuraasa ya ONU yathukumanyaaya iniithokeleela muhiina mwa ihukhuumu isya variyaari va elaapo ya okoreeya yavonooroti vohimwa wi muraano onithokosa ninyooho na ihukhuumu savakhalayini Sá ilaapo sovirikaana viyeeyo iye ni Mosampiikhi Ankoola.

Erelatooriyo emoosa ethokihiiwe ni epayineeli emoosa ya kaxipesiyaliixuta athaanararu enihimwa wi empereesa emoosa ya Ota wa okoreeya onithanleela muhiina mwa watumiiha akapwiitthi enitthaniwa Green Pine Corporation, eweero aya epwanyaneeya Wankoola.
Epereesa ela ti yookweya muhiina mohukhuumwa ni ONU okhuma -okhuma eyaakha ya 2012.

Muhooleli mmoosa a muraano ovaara Wankoola ni viixita a muhiina mwa Itipolomasiya ni vothareleela eyaraakha ya ONU "ti onaakhula myaha Sa Green Pine Corporation, "muhooleli okhaleela ororiheliwa wapakiiti a Erepuupilika Temokaraatika Populaari ya Okoreeya, yeeyo evonyoole maphukeliwo ekhoopela".

Aliipo onaakhulasa myaaha Sa Ota wa okoreeya ahettasa ekwaaha elopaanyerya Ankoola ni Osiri Lanka,muhiina mwa mmananho mmoosa wotumihiiwa wapakiiti arumeeliwa mukhottoni yeeyo enaamwi eharuuhale muraarelo,yosuweliha ewaraakha.
Wankoola, nikhuuru na ONU nirpwanyaneya tho nithokosaka winihiiwa nikuruuta a makwaarata amaperesiteeti ni a mapuuro makiina ohithalakasiiwa muteeko oholeliwa ni atoroopa a oata wa okoreeya.
Kuveeruni a Wankoola nnleelo khakhuule sokohiwa muhiina mwa sokoha kohiwa siheliwe Vameesa ONU.
Muhiina mwa myaaha enihimwa nttitthimiho na Mosampiikhi,ewaraakha enilaleerya wi okaathi munceene khakhuule sokohiwa muhiina mwa ivolowelo sawe munivonyoloni mwa ihukhumu .
Asuweeli aniholeliha wi ekampaanya nooriti -koreyaano Haegeumgant Trading Corporation, yohivolooha muhiina mwa anakooso wi otumihieriwa akapwiitthi epereesa ya omosampiikhin Monte Bingo.
Monte Bingo, te ekompanyiiya eriina ipuruseento 50sa muteeko Sa ProIndicus, wa empereesa emoosa wa te situpweliihe muhiina mwa exikantaalu ele.

Ewaraakha ya asuweeli a ONU anithoonya nnleelo wi mithokoosa sitikitheerye muhiina mwa wotumihiiwa sa omosampiikhi Sá imiisi sinetthaneya vathayani ni musuulu, nibisisteema Sa wixaakiha nibikaruuma inakiherya okapwiithi sosulu, muthinto nikiina wa imiisi Sá vathayaani- asuulu ni ikaruuma a Sa rataari

" Mosampiikhi nnleelo khokweyiheerye waaykhula nnakhala emoosa mwa sokohiwa iye vanceene Sá ipayineeli" enisoomwa Juína mwa erelatooriyo enincereerya wi ilaapo piili siniirelabojaapurubwa ONU" onakhuula wi Haegeumgang eribyowilipiiheene Omosampiikhi.
" ekaapo emoosa eri maapuru othaleela wi Haegeumgang okweherye muthinto yoole wabimiosi savaathi ninosuuluba Mosampiikhi ni Otansaniiya" omaliha mutthala.

Namiruuku awankoola Francisco Tunga Alberto onikupali wi mwiraneyo sa ONU khonakhala khala orumeelaka mitumereeryo sokhottela ilaapo sinanyiheriwa wi sihataanela ni Ota wa okoreeya sinihela muhiina mwa mwaha wororomeleya wao miraano.
Alberto onupuwela wi kahiiyo ti ekwaaha yopaceerya eni elaapo ya Ankoola teeri nthoonyeryo na ONU vamoosa ni ilaapo sinkhaliherya ophuula ekwathukwathu ya okoreeya ti nooriti.

Eyaraakha ya 2015, ehapaari emoosa ya Washington Times, enisuweliha , yilipiheryaka muhiina mwa sohiimwa muhiina mwa tipolomasiiya ini wi mukhaleelo a Ota wa okoreeya anikvaaha ikaruma satoroopa ni eforomasaawu elaapo ya Ankoola, ovnyolaaka mitumereeryo a ihukhuumu salutteliiwe ni ilaapo sowiraana.

Okhaathi yoowo, hapasri ele yophiimwa wi nakoso anuraanyavefiirima to oota wabokoreeya Saengpil Associated Co ni mariinya ekhootto ya wawankoola ninoniireliwa wi ipwanyiwe ikaruuma soreheryaniwa apakiiti a erootta 18.
Koviiti -19:okhaleela sa Wankoola ohaanabopaaka mutumereeryo wala iyo sinorowa owaliiwa.
Amakhulupale owankoola anitumereerya ikapeela ihittharehele mitumereeryo sa ekasoopa ya Koviti-19 iyo sinopoopihasa wi importa owaliiwa.

Wi nilavuule muhiina mwa mwaha, nihawiriyanasa Revereeto Luís Nguimbi,ni Piixipu Emílio Sumbelelo ,ni Korotenatoore a iwaaroti wa mapaxitooree Aurélio Pombo ni Francisco de Castro Maria, tiretoore a winxitituutu Nasioyonaale wa myaaha Sa Etiini.
Ikapeela sa Wankoola sothukuleela mikhoora muteeko solooliwa sa mukapeela, mahiku milooko mithanaxeexe.
Nooviira solaleeriwa sa exitaato muhiina mwa emukaakuveve yulaane mulaponi
Mukhaleelo a myaaha Sothuunku ovoloowe esumaana yeela ekwahaaya ya nayiili.

Nileelo doido, amakhaanya awankoolo alaleerya wi, vovirikaana nivaavo voohiya vale valipeleliwa, mapuuro olooliwa anoorowa othikeela owaliiwa Oluwanta ni mittetthe o Kwaasa Nooriti, mwaha wi mwa mwaha enincereerya mahiku wotheene, vothaleleya ohiimwa te ekapitaali ya elaapo.

Koveeruni awankoolo onikasoopa tho wi" ohithariheliwa ikettelo Sá wikhupaarela womekhaawo ni sanamunceene" oirwa wiraneyaka , ni muthukumaano Sa mmuttaalsni,vahirumeliwaka ikettelo sotteyivelaana ni vohiwaara maxikara.
Ntooko Kuveeruni awankoolo, ovonyoliiwa wa mitumereeryo iya sokhaala okumiheryaka womooliwa muhiina mwanttittimiho nekeekhayi na mithiitho Sá itiini mwa okaathi wa mwaakha mmoosa.

Muhiina mwa nlamuulo na etekereeto yakhalayi vahukhuumwa ni mukhaleelo wa ekhiriime amahooleli a itiini yapwanyiiwa olompaaka wala miriira ikiina soluluwana ni satiini, viira ohithariheliwa mitumereeryo sa exitaato ya mukaakuve.
Vaninaanoni amakhulupale owankoola anixiiliha mwaha wi
Maliitere a itiini ahitharihele mutumereeryo mpwanyaneya mu
Nlamuulo na Peresiteeti nniirema myaha Sa mukhaleelo emukaakuve.

Mwa nivenxeriiwo mwa ohiyereeriwa, mitthiitthi sanatiini atumereryasiwa wi areheerye o ikaruuma silipiherya wikhupaarela, osyaaka wiiravmithukumano sa olooliwa no mwaattelo mmoosa wa atthu ovikana imita 150 ya atthu.
Peresiteeti a efoorum Yakirixitawu Awankoolo anivaha mutumereeryo ikapeela wi sihinakhala.
Wanyiheriwaka waamini muhina mwa ekhootto ni Koviiti-19.
Revereeto ole Luís Nguimbi,oyoopa wirelaaka nttittimiho ni wetteela nihivonyoola nnakhala mitumereeryo okaathi ola wotthikela ahu muteeko sa .
Atthu ariina HIV akhalana oweerya voviriha né Ekuumi yexikhaani ni mukhaleelo owilipiiha wakhuleele milooko.

Mosampiikhi onikuupara nipuuro na nethaau na molumwenkuuni variyaari va ilaapo sootepa okameliiwa ni ekhereere ya HIV/SIITA, ntooko vahimwa sakarataari ovariiha muteeko muraatteli wa Ekonseelyu Nasioyonaale Yowananiiwa ni HIV/SIITA, Idalina Libombo.
Eyaraakha ya 2019 sahurepeliiwa voohiya ikooto emioya 145 Sa myaaha isya soraviiwa.
Oveehiwa ni otyanyiiwa siiri veriyaari wa myaaha sotepeexa okorakooriha mwa iye siirina nttitthimiho na wikhapeleela, omukooha nivwikasoopa variyaari va HIV.

Vakohakohiwaka ni nossos na meu na Ameerika Júlia Fara ofisiyaale a eporokaraama ya Muraano Kugarissica poderá,olavuula muhiina mwa eporoceetoCelebrando a Vida," ( nithapelaaka okuumi) eriina nnaata ntooko mutthokiiho ovukuula mwaattelo ni okwiiwa mwaha wa mwaxiithu HIV, olipiheryaka wemereerya ni ni okhupaali wamwaava no ale anithaara muteeko solooliwa, vamoosa ni amuusi aya.
Eoroceeto, epacerihiwe mweeri wa nithanamoosa wa mwaakha wa 2019, opheela wi akhupaarele atthu vomaleela ekooto 1000 yamwavaano a mittetthe Sa ipuruviisiya sa Kaasa,Mapuutu ni epooma ya Opeera.
Muraano Kugarissica Opeera yokhalaana ntooko mphiimo, silipiherya ovaara muteeko vamoosa na amwaavano imiiya 200, variyaari va iyaakha 10 ni 24.

Ntooko vahimwa awe Fara, muteeko sovirikana tisothokihiwa, ntooko ipaleexitira siroowa wiraneyaka mapuuro a oakhapeleliwa ikwereere ni muxikoola, nvaanelo vamoosa nanamawaani nibaxitiith, alipo anakhuleels amwaavano, notho correrá ni mamaampuuru amawaani.
Osuuka. Soolya ni okhoohiiha onireeliwa axitiithi ni alipo anakhuleels amwaavano,bthobtothikiheya ni muteeko sowahaaya aximiraamo yuntereerye olooliwa.
"Celebrando a Vida" ti muthenkeeso olipiheriwa muhiina mokweheriwamuhaakhu né enpaxasta ya Suwiisa Omosampiikhi, ni votakaherya ni muruuku a Mittetthe wa okhaliheriwa mupuweleelo oriiwa (Repssi).
Muraano Kugarissica onivaara ni wataanela ni Repasso
Wi nipwaanye sohiimwa mwaavye miyuraanyo Omapuutu, Okaasa ni Opeera, ou yooye muxukuurye nikuukhu na Repassi murumeelaka iyapelaano wala mathaanu
Sohapaala nnleelo sinithikela wiiva Omaniika
Vowiiraka amwaavano ayiili anipwanyiwa wikwelaase mwaha woowurya alikoora voophoova.
Mwaattelo wanattompe ahokwaasa mmpikataani mwaha wohapaliiwa wovirileela wa alikoora oniirya wuncereryaka viwaatta muhina mwa mittetthe a Epuruviisiya Omosampiikhi ya .

Itaata Sa mapiliisa Omaniika sinithoonya wi , wakhuta esumana, miruuthu sinipwanyiiwa satalaleeyene mmpikataani, vanceenexa amwaavano ahinamuteeko, yiira yithiteele ni alikoora vootepeene, suite inanyuheriwa wi yikurunuuxe soothooka data mwaha wa mukhaleelo amawaani otyanyiiwa mwaha wothoowa moovara.

Mwaha aninaanoxe olaleeriwe enaayili yeela, 18, nimapiliisa, yooyo oni miruuthu a mwaavano a iyaakha 36, onivaara muteeko, waahipwwnyiiwa mupikataani mittetthe wa 7 Abril Oximooyu, novo!ala wirikeleela woowurya ntooko alikoora ohinatthi olya etthe.
" Niniirya nirepelaaka mwiiha iya vohipiisa vô, vanceenexa epooma ya Oximooyu, ni wi sinaxaakiha mapiliisa mwaha wi sinivereereya mwiiha sente seeya.

Mukhaleelo Sa Okuumi siirya ithukunukiwaka ni alikoora, nnaamwi wi sinceene mwiiha iya khasinthoonyiherya mukhaleelo wa ikhiriime, mulaattue wohiluttelelanaka ni mwaaha soheleeliwa" ahiira Elsidia Filipe, namuuhupi amapiliisa Omaniika.

Nileelo ntooko muhooleli , mwiiha sowaatta Sá miruutthu sinttottiwa mmpikataani, kisinkhalaana ettikiitti , mwaha oruuhela mikacamiiho wpwanyiiwa amuusi ni ohuncereerya ekasoopa emoosa mwaha wa mawureeriwo alikoora.

" Akulukhaana foreese muhina mwa mwiiha wotheene soneleliiwe wi ale arii tiyapwaanye ehasaara aniwuurya ahiwehawehaka mitumereeryo khamoosa khamoosa, ntooko wilyiiha aninaatthi wala awuryaaka sisaake, seeyo eri yuluttelelana térrea enataanyerya anaakwa" olipiherya Elsidia Filipe.

Mwaha wokhuruuwa esisaapo ya alikoora, vanceenexa iye seiiri sihiimweexa" pooyina veremeelya" ni mukhaleelo otupeexa wa alikoora, ni ale akhaale tanapeewa mmawaani onataanyeerya amwaavano anceene okhaala anamuhapaliiwa.

Ohiwehereerya mwaha ya otuuruwa makhaleelo, ni vamoosa wuncereereya wovelaveeliha wa mukhaleelo wa ekuume, tinooneya volattaneene ntooko mwaaha mmoosa orya wakakhelaaka ananttomoe anatupweela mukhaleelo wenamuhapaliwa.
Kuveeruni Omosampiikhin onivaara nroromeelo novaara muteeko ni ONU muhiina mwa mwiiha Sá Koreeya ti
Epayineeli wasuweeli aniweha seja waari wi Mapuutu ovonyoola ephukeeliwo wa muxookho famosa wa Kuveeruni Omapuutu

Kuveeruni masampikaano onivaara nroromeelo noosuweliha, omihooli, ni ano wi muteeko wothokoosiwa orwaaya okhalaaka eriiyari awe ni epayineeli ele wasuweeli ohiluttelelana ni ONU, vireliwaka miyanyiheriiwo sovonyoliiwa maphukeliwo ihukhuumu sithukweliwe vireliwaka Koreeya wa Onooroti.

Waakhulaaka ehapaari ele eluluwaane mahiku okhuseerya ala, namuuhupi a nikhuuru na Ekonseelyu ya Mamiixuturu Ana Comuane, enamaali, 12, onakhuleela wi yokhaala ekomisaawu emoosa wa asuweeli ani avaraka muteeko muhiina wa mwaha ole ni ororomeliiha Miyataanelo ni Kuveeruni.

" Kuveeruni oroowa ovaara muteeko vamoosa ni ekomisaawu ya asuuweli aniireela mpaatte wi esuwelexiwe saneene khuuta mwaaha okhaale otupheela ni , mwaha wosuwelihiwa okaathi woreerela" olaleerya Comuane yomalelaani wa muthukumaano wa esumaana wa Ekonseelyu ya Mamiixuturu.

Namuuhupi khotthuune okeleeliha omihooli ninothalaasa variyaari va mwaha ole, yoowo paahi osuweliihe wi , ni mukhaleelo wa elaapo, Mosampiikhi ti sikinataariyu a nikhuuru naesekuraasa ni oniroromeliiha wi Kuveeruni onirwa ivaraaka muteeko awe wi ovareleelihe ovonyeriiwa miwananeeliwo iye oniirela awe mpaatte.
Comuane, otthipanyerya olelo mukhaleelo wa nlamuulo na elaapo, wi" wakhiherye ottikihiiwa akapwiitthi yumaaleela a vathayaani- wa ilaapo wotheene.

Analiixita ni namavaaha moonelo awe mosampikaano Ericino de Salema, oweeha othoonyiwa, nnaamwi ovahaaka moneelo mwaha wohisuweleexa muhiina mwa Kuveeruni, onihimwa wi ela mukhaleelo mmoosa owoopiha wa Kuveeruni.

"Akhala mwaha onamphukiwa mmoosa a erexiime wala mukhaleelo, muhina mwa ehaakhi yekhopeela, silipiherya muhiina mwa mphironi mwa ilaapo sowiraana ixineene ti voxankiiha wa elaapo emoosa ntooko waawihu wi ethoonyiweke wi tiyeele ehittitthimiihe iye silutteleliiwe, ntooko manamuuna a iphukeeliwo" okasoopa Salema, ovahaaka moonelo awe thana thanaru, " mithokoosa mmoosa woothipeeya a muhiina wi wpwanyiiwa mukhaleelo ni ohukhuumwa ale ari amahooleli".
Muliipa omaliherye oriiki wi vakhaala wi ihukhuumu iya siira silipiheriwaka ithooni ya elaapo vamoosa vacekumunitaate wakhuleele sinookhala" sootepa otikiha waya".
Nito Alves ni Arante Kivuvu anihimwasa wi arunasa elaapo ya Noruweeka.
Mativiixita anihimwasa wi amuleela Kuveeruni ankolaano ohoolo wa etirpunaale Penaale Interenasiyonaale,Ohaayia.

Anli wa amativiixitavalesa 17 awankoolo ahukhuumwe mwaha wowehereerya okameelw nipuuro na muhooleli wa elaapo ni muraano wanasusuukhi votherelaani alevelelasiiwe okhoottasa ottwawelasa ya mukhaleelo ovahiiwe no Kuveeruni o Noruweeka.
Omalamaliha esiiri wiriiwe ni VOA okweheriwa ni Nito Alves ni Arante Kivuvu,athikanse wa ekwaaha ethikeliia wavenyaawe ya isumaana thaaru Opurtukaale,Alemaanya, Olaana ni Onoruweeka.
Mativiixita aniirasa wi niwoniherya sokaxaari saya yaromoolaka mamaampuuru khamoosa khamoosa a Kuveeruni a elaapo ya Wankoola ohoolo wa Etiripunaale Penaale Interenasiyonaale ya Ohaayia, Wolaanta
Onoruweeka, Kuveeruni ovaaha mukhupaarelo amapuliitiku owireelaka mativiixita a, yoowo okhoottiwe vohipiisa,ntooko vanthalakasa awe Nito Alves.

" mwaha wa mupuweleelo omuuthu ala ni vohittettemeela kokootta ovahiiwe mukhaleelo a mukhaleelo a epuliitika Sá elaapo ya Noruweeka mwaha nkimpheela okhaala yomwalanaasa, enikisiveela vanceene ethayaaka ni ikwaaha muhina muumu, maasi kinxukhureela elaapo ya Onoruweeka mwa yovaha aya, olipiheerya Alves, olipiheriwa ni Arante Kivuvu.

Wolaanta, ntooko Nito Alves, aleesa akumaananse vamoosa ni anamuteeko a Otiripunaale Penaale Interenasiyonaale, yaawo amukaxanri aya Kuveeruni awankoolo" mwaha wovonyoola ihaakhi wapinataamu, yahasasaraka mativiixita Cassule, Kamulingue ni Hilbert Ganga ntho Rufino, omanakasiiwe mwaha yovuwiiha mukhaleelo aya nibtho mwaaha wa wiiyiwa bmireerelo sanamunceene mmpatte wa maxeneraale awankoolo vamoosa ni Ana afaluume elaapo".
Muhina mwivaavo,Alves oni wi ovaaha" iwaraakha, isinyaalo ni mayeesu Sa miraneyo sokaxariiwa".
wivaavo wi awehaasa muhiinamwa ilaapo iye siirina mukhaleelo onthalaniiwa,Arante Kivuvu onikupali okhaala muteeko munceene wi epakiiwe elaapo wa Wankoola.
" Nnleelo khanireerane muteeko soovara Waafiriia ni Wankoola nno, wi othatuuwa niphelaahu, wi nirukuude manamuuna owupuweela ya atthu awankoolo.ohalikeela.

Vakohiwaaka muhiina mwa mithoonyo sa João Lourenço wi omuraattele José Eduardo dos Santos a MPLA viraneyaka mwathaale wa 2017,Kivuvu onaakhula wi" ole oribtohinsuuwela onimukupaali mphiira mwaha José Eduardo dos Santos toori mmoosa wa ale othaleleya okhaala watthaara a Maquiavel ti João Lourenço ti paahi namalawiha eyuumw a Nfaluume okhaala Ota ovaraaka sovirikana João Lourenço onirukureerya paahi niohimwaaka okhala xeetthi".
Xipaanya okarakanyuula nthaavi nathoothela athiyana wi aroohiwe mmatataani mwa exitaato ixilaamiku.

Makwaarata siviile Oxipaanya,cahaavarsbatthu acesse anoorowa wi anipakaasa nthaavi na nikhuuli xihatiixita na exetaato yamamwisilamu enviará muteeko saya Sa wavarakasa ananttomoe othiyaana orumeelaka ikaruuma sa internet, yolaleerwa oleelo, 24, miniixituru a interiyoore.

Oliipo aroowa Tavares anli otthukiiwe Omeliils, mittetthe oxipanyoole Omarooko, tanaakhula wi" taari ohooleela mwaha wi athokiiha matumereeryo" wa ikaruuma sovirikana vmuhiina mwabnternet salaleeya muthinto wotheene sanmireerelo sa eporopakaante sa nikhuuru na mateririixita ", vithanlrleya ale ari a Exitaato Ixilaamiku.

" Ale atthukwelasiwe yivahereerya muhina mwa manamuuna owavarakasa axithiyana waano enaamwi waviira okhaathi munceene alaleeriwaka mukhaleelo semwisilaamu, oponta waaya wamalrela waari wireela mmpatte a nikhuuru bjs materoriixita, enakhuleela ehapaari ya Minixiteeriyu.
Makwaarata siviile ahaavara oakinaaku anamwaniheriwa mittetthe sa Epuruviisiya ya Pareseloona otaaxe wa elaapo ya Oxipaanya.
Obama, oniveekela ekhootto yowananiiwa makwaankwa ni wixeetta Wafiriika"puxaante "
Nfaluume awameerika Oni wi okupaleela Wafiriika ni miruweeryo saya maasi onivahabokasoopa wi aari atthu awafiriika okhaale ophukaa mwiiha saya.

Nfaluume o exitaato Uniitu,Barack Obama, owoopola enamaali yeela, 28,ilaapovsa awafiriika wi ohaana sittittimihaka eketteelo sa etemokarasiya ni wi ipatthuxeeke mapuuro avariiwa muteeko wi ikasoopeke mukhaleelo samanyaku nyaku wala ohiwanana.

Vilavuula wopaceera wa mmoosa nfaluume ya noiroti amarikaano oseetii wa Uniyaayu Afirikaana ,Atiixi Apeepa, Etiyoopiya, Obama ohimwa eu nihaasu nniiriwa! nninuuwihiwa Opuruuti muhina mês ntumereeryo nfaluume wowaneela ohivileela wa neeraaru onooniherya mopiiheryo ohisuweela ikettelo sa nuluumo nelaapo.

" Afiriika oneteteerya, ni Afiriika musya mmoosa onamphattuwa" ohimwa Obama, wuncereryaka oriiki eu wakuuva wuunuwa wa muraalo onivirikaniha "ithu sohiimwa sa ekhalaayi " sa ekhootto ni osikhiini ilaapo sa Waafiriika".

" Afiriika ohaana othokihaaka imilyaawu sinceene sovikaana sa mapuuro ovariwaaka muteeko voovukaana iye sithokihiwe va ninaanoni va" osuweliiha ,Obama, oriiki wi verra vawehiwaaka ometiiyo oriyeete ni ota Afiriika vanonaneya" mwattelu mulupaalexa mmosa amwaavaano ahinamuteeko, maasu maasi okhuweela waya omalihiiwa, ni mwukhaleelo sikhaale olyiha ohisuawanyeya ni ohiwanaana."

"Othawali wa Afiriika onoorowa olipiheriwa ni mukhaleelo a etemokarasiiya" ohupuxeerya Barack Obama wupuxeerye si waatthuukwa anahapaari nnakhala wawateeriha miriira sa makhuura opthaleleeya a mmpaatte makiina ampwanyaneya ni mwukhaleelo wa " etemokarasiiya ya nsiina, asi kahiyo ekeekhayi paahi".
Nfaluume awameerika oniira wi amahooleli yahaanasa orumeela malamuulo, ni Uniyaawu Afirikaana ohaana wakhanyereerya amahooleli si akhalaneeke mukaano.
" Miyo nkinsuuwela mwaha wa atthu amptthuuna aya mwukhaleelo ole okhaathi munceene, ononaneya vanceenexa viira apwanyaaka musuurukhu munceene." Oniira Obama, opacaaka otheeya a ale yaari ohoolo wawe.
Nfaluume owameerika ohakhulela omusiveela She oniira ser,Maasi wi okhalana evontaati witthhukwela mwukhaleelo waarina aya ohinaatthi ohoolela Okaasa Paraanka.
"ari ovoloowaka mmuxinttanooni ekwaaha ya neeraaru, amuxinttao, omoopa Obama si,mwivaavo, ohuupuwela wi mukaano anlamuulo otumereerya sawe ni si" ithuuvo ori osuulu sa nlamuulo"

Vaavale vira awe olavulaka , muulumo wanteereriwa ni makuuphi wala otheyiiwa,Barack Obama, oveeka ekhootto enoowa yowoopopiha yowananiiwa" kaakuuru wa makwaakwa" ni ohavekeela amahooleli mafirikaano wi atthariheke Mme mes nfaluume avakalaahiini o Waafiriika wa ohiitto, muhooleli owaane wirelaaka omałamaliha mwukhaleelo wa "apartheid", Nelson Mandela" ohiiya Soovara sawe sihitthipiheya ni oweerya okhuuna vamunhuukhuuni ni norukuuxa ikuuru orumeelaka manamuuna amuretteele.
Nfaluume a Ixitaato Sowiraana, onoorowa ohiiya muttetthe wa Etiyoopiya emakaaripi yeela ni oroowa otthikela elaapo sa Ixitaato Sowiraana.
Angola Fala Só-Maria Encarnação Pimenta: oni "woova oniirela mpaatte wa mwukhaleelo amupuweelo atthu owankoola"
Musuweeli a miyiraneeyo sa mmwiilini Wala manamuuna owuupuwela wamaloolo anihiimwa woova wa mankolaano ti va mahiikhu 27 wa mweeri wa nethaanu eyaakha 1977
Mukhaleelo axaana axithiyaana awankoola ti" woceela ohilooka ni yootepa onaanara", ahimwa pisikooloka a keliinika ni mwixuurltttihi a Univerisitaate,Maria Encarnação Pimenta.

Wireelaka mmpaatte wanlaaka na“Angola Fala Só”Encarnação Pimenta Ohiimwa nihiiku nothaleeleya athiyaane oteene a mulaaponi nakhalaane opuuro esumaana heepa ohikhaala etthu yoophiita athiyaane a frente Wankoola ahinsuwelaaya.
" Owalameena manamuuna okhaala aniirela onyaala wa khuuta ekwaaha ottiya iphumu", onikupaleela pisikooloka wupuwelaaka nnleelo aí, ankaano ankeene," nipuuro nookhala tonoonaneyaxa"
" mukhaleelo yootepa onaanara, oteepa onyoonya" oniira.

Nookohiwa muhiina mwa oromolaaniiwa ni manyaaku-nyaaku wiraneeya ni muholeli sa Sonangol, Carlos Saturnino vamoosa ni PCA avakhalayini Isabel dos Santos, pisikooloka la onithalakaasa mwaaha nthooko" wakakwaniiwa wa mapheelyo.
"aninanareela a mathamweene ni sinoneleeliwa mataari", ohimwa mwixuurltttihi, wuncereryaka si" tthiri miraneeyo iyo sininanaara owaruuni sa aatthu awankoola".

Mankolaano kahiiyo anamaveeha ni akhaalana osuuwela sa othawaali sa mmuuttettheni kwa Ankoola ni yanilipeleelasa si waarya akhale saana" ohakhulela, ovekaaka si" olé oroowa okhalana irooho yowilipiiha ni oruuha waarya ohimwa saneene"

Vaniirero nleelo mukhaleelo ola oniira ohiphukiiwe,nleelo aí khokhaale owarakhula muhiina mas ikhiriime sikhaale sowiiriwa mais boina mas mikweeheryo sa. Mukhaleelo amineepani aniira saana muhina kwa ankolaano si yiiweniyo".onaakhula pisikooloka.
Vakohiwe awe si mwaha wa eheeni yoova wa mankolaano Pimenta wirya awe woova iwe withipeele Wankoola noviira miyiraneeyo sa 27 mweeri wa nethaanu wa 1977.

Woova vuluupaale khivahiiyo vale vekhalaayi, masi ti ole withipeele noovira 27 a mweeri nethanu " ohaakhuula, ithoonyasa eu vaari vaavo vanothereeriwa omananihiiwa wakanyeeriwa omweene wa Nito Alves , otanyeerye manyaaku nyaaku amwareexe mmapikataani mwa epooma ya Oluwaanta ni, vootharelana ni, okwa wa imilyawu saatthu okelihiwa mukalaapooso, wokootthasiiwe ahiriina nnakhala mwaha mmoosa muhina mwa amalamuloonie.

" Oxayiiwa mapuruuxa waari wootepa wunuuwa okweheerye we oviire okupaleeliwa sotheene ni khisavanyihaniwa",ohuraanya Maria Encarnação Pimenta, wuupuwela eu amwaavaano a okhaathi yoowo yahasiweliiha anaaya mwa sowiraneeya oye ahithaveeye muhina mwa ipuliitika.
" Amwaavaano owooma wanomooliwa ni yanokootthiwa ovenya vaavo amiraavo yahixuutta ni khikupaleela mwa sotheene" olipiherya.
" woova oniirela mpaatte wa mukhaleelo wa manamuuna owuupuwela atthu awankoola

Nookohiwa muhina mês ireetta sa mmineepani Wankoola pisikooloka wiire si Oxiripitaali Waneepa ya Oluwaanta anakheleeliwa na analooliwa variyaari va 150 ni 180 sa mwiihasene wa khuta nihiiku, ni ohixuiliha mwaha wohikhaala exikaatta wu iwananiweke mwiiha sa ikwereere saaneepa, nthooko mukhaliheeryo wa nneema sikhaale worumeliwaka nthooko nluutte variyaari va athu ari akulukhaanani amuusi a atthu apwaanye ekwereere e amukhaleelo weneepa.

Pisikooloka ole Pimenta, alavuula tho mwaaha wa manamuuna ovoolowa muniverisitaate, olipiherya wi mukhaleelo waleelo asoomi" anemereeriwa mwaha wokhalana musuruukhu, ni kahiyo mwaha mwa sooweerya saya.
" Univerisitaate yothaattuwa okhaala empereesa epwanyiiha muhaakhu", ohiita wixiliihaka tho mwaha woothoowa mureerelo wa amwicuttihi.

Maria Encarnação Pimenta anixiiliha tho mwaha wi sookhala namakweherya muteeko oxuutta mmoosa a anamithoope ahivoloowa muniverisitaste no vohiikhala akuuruusu a mukhaleelo eriyaari ni exikoola politeekiniika.
Ereetta yothoowa yomwarela mmittetthe Piriisipe
Mwaalano wa ekumi onnikupaleela okhala nikhwatta namurupela.
Amahoolele a miteko sa ekumi ooSantumeya aneteteya ni oretta wotikiniha wakuxereriihe wavekela mukhaliheryo amahoolela a mutthenkeso wa ekumi molimwinkuni, ni anvelelihenrye musuweli mmosa.
Mwaalano wa ekumi onikupaleela okhala oretta ila nikhwatta namurupela.

Wa miyeeri mithannamiraru, atthu ekonto emosa ni miloko mithannamixexe ni axexe ohaphwanya oretta ni yinmathi muxipiritaali ekhulupale ya elapo, mwaha wa oretta “mpakha va ohinsuweliwa ni amahoolela a miteko sa ekumi“ ntoko simusuwelihaawe VOA namaweherya a miteko sokhapeleliwa ekumi, Maria Tomé.
Ntoko oretta ohinsuweliwa, nnakhala enamuna xeeni yowaloola aretta yinmaanthe okathi munceene muxipiritaale.
Ithonyeryo sa oretta ola simpacerya ni ithuku, wantepanelo mmononi, nthanathana inathatuwa ni ihinavola.
Momosa wa aretta yanmathale oXiipiritaale Ayres de Minezes omuleela VOA wi, nomala orava oretta, opacenrye oloola owaani ohinatthi orowa wunmaathi oxipiritaale.

Luís Francisco ookhala wa khatiri ya miyeri miili ni nriyari-nriyari oxipiritaale, okhunmewu wepaceroni wa mweeri wa Xaneero, masi nileelo khonatthi ovona mana, “kihaana makhwatta, kinetta ni ixinelu, okiwereya ni kihemeleke okathi munceene”.
Wa khatiri ya nriyari nriyari na emeya aretta ampwahererya wunmaathi oxipiritaale wo Ayres yo Menezes ni wa isumana sotheene annikhumelela atthu tho onaphwanya oretta yoola.
Akinaku ooretta wosareya osookhiri mwirutthuni aphwanye orettta amalenle okhwa, mwaha wowoceya mwirutthuni.

Mpaka va wa miteko sotheene wokhalihiwa ni anamakhalela miteko sa ekumi oPortukale khiwaweryaneeye ottemulela sa oretta yoola nnakha inamuna soloola oratteene, nnya axitokweene a oSantumeya anihoverya okhala oretta wamurupela.
Wafekanexitawu : “Ekhotto emosa ehinereryana/ehinakhwana ni sintthuneya sitthokiheriwe” - namatthoka a mMosampiki.
“Wa nweheryo waale ankhala Wafirika e wa elapo eri molimwinku wa neraru aakhala okhalanaka maanelo/itthokelo sovirikana”, onnoona Egídio Raposo

“Ekhotto ela khenoneeha okhumelelaka iye sikhanle miteko sitthokihiwe ni EUA, okathi wahinkhumelela aya sorereela sitthokiheriwe orattteene”, ohimya mutthokeli a mmosampiki Egídio Vaz Raposo, olavulaka monkoni wohinmwa enamararu ohiyu, ni mukhulupale Barack Obama opacerya okumihiwa masurtaatu Wafekanestawu.
Ophwanyaneya masurtaatu Wafekanexitawu a ilapo sohiyana-hiyana
Wa nvaanelo wa nlaka “Voz da América”, Raposo ohimya: “Wahonexixeya wiira muhakhu ti mwaha muulupale.

Wannimananihiwa ohiweherya sa mukhalelo wa muhakhu, masi sookhala siri mpuwa mwa miteko sitthokihiwe wophavela wi sonaneye sororomeliha awe Barack Obama, okathi wavekela awe othanliwa, wophavela ohihimuxa ovuwawawe wariyari wanamathanla”.

“Wa maanelo aya ale ankhala Wafirika ni elapo eri mpuwa wa olimwinku wa neeraru aakhala okhalanaka itthokelelo sinceene ni wa mithinto sohiyanasa”, ohoona Egídio Raposo, onahimexexa: ”yopacerya ni yotepaxa wanamuna wankhalahu: wa ekekhayi khinemiheriwa mikhaliheryo mapuro ale muhitthokiheriwe enamuna yovariwa muteko, ni muhikhanle okhumelela murereelo onupuweleliwa ni ontthuneya”.
oPisawu ohinakhala "ekaxuti ya ikokhola yanoowali" - Nlaka na ihakhi sapinatamu.
Ministuru opacerya onvaha opuro wowittukuttherya Gadhafi.
Anamakhalela a nlaka ahimya wi "wa ikhalelo sopinatamu" tiwakhanlya aya okupaleleya mutthokelo yoowo.

Wariyari wa ikettelo sa opinatamu paahi tiwakhanlyaaya owupuweleley saana sihimya awe ministuru opacerya oKine Bisawu wi elapo awe eri yoolikna wi emwakhelele Muammar Gadhafi ntoko namatthyawela, ohimya mahoolela a nlaka na ihakhi sapinatamu,Luís Vaz Martins. Wumalani wa sumana ministuru opacery ooKine, Carlos Gomes Júnior, ohimya wi kuvernu ori olikana wi onvahe opuro wowittukuttherya Gadhafi. namakhomaleela olaleerya ihakhi sapinatamu ohimya wi Okine Bisawu ohinakhala “ekaxuti ya ikokhola“ yireliwaka ahooleli owali athorihiwe, kinnikupalela ehinmyaaya Gomes Junior, ntoko mutthokelo wa epinatamu. Mahoolela a nlaka na ihaakhi sapinatamu oKine Bisawu otthokoleliha wiira Kine Bisawu onlipana itthokelo sa ilapo sikina sa molimwinkuni, ni “wahaana ohiliyalela iye sintthuneya nave“.

Luís Vaz Martins onyohola mutthokelo ni maanelo anamunceene a ilapo sikina sokhopela wotthokiha makerka owathoriha afalume Oolipiya masi kihithokorerya siniraneya oSiiriya. Mwiiwe nvanelo wothokosa wa Lassana Cassama muhelelaka mpantta woripelela wikhaani.
Ameerika ankhomaleela mwiwanano sotthokiheya ni muttetthe wo Afirika.
Mukhulupale Barack Obama oothukumana ni axitokweene miloko mithanu a muttetthe a Wafirika, oWaxintoni.

Amerika anorowa ohimya wa muthukumano, onrowa wiraneya ekhumelo ya mahiku athanu ni mathannanmosa, mweeri wa nathannararu, oWaxintoni, mukhulupale Barack Obama ni makhulupale a ilapo miloko mithanu so Afirika, ipiliyawu sa toolari sireliwaka nakoso, malaka okhomaaliha murettele, olima ni amaluxu.

Muteko muulupale wa elapo yowerya molimwinkuni ni eninnuwa wa miteko sa nakoso ni olelo va wanvaneleliwa enamuna yotthokiherya mwiwanano wokhomaaliha ikettelo ni miteko sanakoso a elapo yo Wameerika ni ilapo so Afirika, AGOA, ethoonyeryo aya wa ekelesi.

Muthukumano onihimexiwa ompacerya meelo, enamanli, mahiku mathanu, ni nvanelo mmosa wariyari wa ikettelo sanakoso Wamerika ni muttetthe wAfirika, wa muthukumano yoowo kuvenu awameerika onirowa osuweliha wonaneyaka musurukhu oniphiyerya epiliyawu emisa wa toolari onireliwa anakosa a mipantta somiili.

Rajiv Shah, musyatoro a nlaka na EUA ninireliwa munnuwelo wa ilapo (USAID), osuweliihe sa ehapari yeela, ohimya wiira oWaxintoni onokumihiwa musurukhu onireliwa wooniherya itthokelo sa kuvernu a Wameerika wariyari wa mmuttettheni mwa Afirika.

Shah ohimya wiira onokhomalihiwa muteko wokhaliheriwa womeekha opacerihiwe ni mukhulupale Barack Obama mwaakha wa 2012 ni onorowa okhweeherya atthu imilyawu miloko miili owooraka amaluuxu mpakha mwaakha wa 2018.

Ninleelo, ntoko sihinmyaawe namasuweliha mmosaru, onimwincereriwa mukhaliheryo wa miteko somekha ntoko soolima, monkoni mwa inamuna sokhomaaliha yoolya ni malyeelyo sitthokihiwe ni afalume a Wameerika.
Wampwaheryo wa mahiku manli, afalume e anamuhakhu a muttetthe Wafirika anirowa othukumana ni mitthenkeso suluupale so Wameerika sinirowa osuweliha muhakhu munceene a miteko mmuttettheni mwa Afirika.

Anamatthoka anihimya wiira muteko afalume a Wameerika aniirena ovukulela hata oxintta sinvara aya axiina, masi axitokweene Owaxintoni annisuweliha wiira amphavelexaaya khahiyo pataroya ni mihakhu sa mutthayani paahi, axiina sikhomalelenxaaya.
Annikhalela muthukumano ola axitokweene miloko mithanu a ilapo ila anamakhalela akina Awafirika.
Ilapo ntoko oZimbabwe, Eritereya, República Centro Africana ni oSutawu khilattuliwe mwaha wovaluliwa ni Ameerika.
OMS onnivaanyiha sinthoonyaawe mukhulupale a wAmeerika monkoni wokhaliherya

Amaholela a mutthenkeso wa ekumi molimwinkuni (OMS) aavanyiha enamarau yeela, 8, sohimyasawe mukhulupale a Wameerika Donald Tramp ohinmye nsana wiira nlaka nne ninkhomalelela othoriha oretta wa covid-19, oXiina ni waari okathi womalamaliha okhaliheryawu.

Ninleelo nimphwanyaneya okathi oretta ola wahinatthi awe otepexa, nto ola okathi wovukula mukhaliheryo”, ohimya muhooleli a muttettheni a OMS wo Europa, Hans Kluge, wa nvaanelo ni anamasuweliha ihapari wariyari wa viitiyu, wowakhula yokoha emosa mwa moolumo a Tramp.

Hans Kluge ohincererya wiira “wuncerereya wa oretta wa mpantta mukina wo Atalantiku mukhalelo ononeeha mukutakutho vanceenexa muttetthe wo Europa“, ni otthokoleliha wiira ninleelo muteko khoreere wamphwaheryo wa okathi.

Wa mpantta mukina, Bruce Aylward, namiruku a OMS, nave ottottopela mwiwanano no afalume Ooxina, ohimyaka wi muteko ni axitokweene o Pequim waari woreera, wakhanlyaaya osuwela saana sa oretta, opacenrye o Wuhan.

“Yaari yuulupalexa, wepaceroni wa oretta, okhalana sotheene sintthuneya, opacerya ovara muteko ni axiina wophavela osuwela”, ohimya, wincereryaka wi oovariwa muteko mmosaru “ni ilapo sotheene sikina muphiiye oretta, ntoko Oxipaanya”.

Aylward nave ohakhuleliha iyupereryo sa OMS wi mikano sikhale sohuliwa, ohimyaka wi Xiina khoreere ovara muteko wothokosa sa miyaha sopacerya sa oretta ni atthu akuaaniwe, woohiya okupaleliha wi atthu yaawo ahette mukwaha, wosyakiha wuulana oretta,
Nave mu Twitter, mahoolela a nlaka nimosa nowiraana Wafirika, Moussa Faki Mahamat, ohoniherya othnku awe mwa mutthenkeso wa ekumi molimwinkuni ni mahoolela aya, Tedros Ghebreyesus.
Mahamat oolepa okhala otutuwa ni sin"himya aya afalume aWamerika wonyohola ohoolela waya axitokweene a OMS, opwahereryaka Mwiiraano a Wafirika onnikhaliherya miruku ni miteko sa OMS ni mahoolela.
Tedros.
Muteko okhaleke opwahererya osyakiha oretta wa covid-19 wa muuke, ntoko mmuttettheni motheene.
Okathi wothonyana onoophiya".
Miruku seey-iya sothunku ari mpuwa afalume o Nixeeriya, oNamiipiya, Wafirika tusuuli ni oRuwanta.
Afalume oNixeeriya aalepa "annimukhaliherya OMS ni mahoolela awe Dr.
Ninnixukhurela ohoolela ni mitthaka mutthenkeso wa OMS sinlaleerya awe wophavela othoriha ekwerere ela".
Wookhomaliha yolempwa mu Tweeter mwa Moussa Faki Mahamat, Cyril Ramaphosa, mukhulupale eelapo yo Afirika tusuuli, omuhimya OMS "osuwelela" ovar muteko wa okathi wonaneya oretta.

Paul Kagame, mukhulupale oRuwanta, okoha yakhala wi Tedros, OMS ila Xiina annyoholiwa, walaani otheene aya, wuncereryaka nrowe niiranele oretta, wa khuta orina erinaawe wa oretta yoola onamurowaka okohakohiwa nthanathana ni oratteene.
Nivukuleliwe otepihiwa ikhalelo sa politika muttetthe wo Afirika sihmphavela awe.
Amphavela pani?
Enamanli, 7, wa nvaanelo wa khuta nihiku oKasa Paranka monkoni mwa oretta, wa elapo, Tramp ohimya wiira wamuttikihiwa mukhaliheryo wereliwa miteko sa OMS".
"OMS wahivonya wekekhayi", oolepa ohinatthi mu Twitter, wuncereryaka" ni exariya, onkhaliheriwa vanceenexa ni Wameerika, masi oniwupuwelexa aXiina.
Nrowe niwehexexe oratteenexa...”
Nomala nvaanelo, Tramp ovaanya wi khonatoko ohimya wiira wamuhiina mukhaliheryo wa muhakhu, wanamwi walavunle opuro waphwanyaneya anamalaleerya ihapari anceene, khalayi.
"Miyo kinre kinorowa owehexexa oratteene", omaliherya.
Elapo yo Amerika emosa ehinreere okhaliherya miteko sa OMS.

Mwaakha wa 2019, mikhaliheryo sireliwaka nlaka yenna sahivikana imilyawu imiya xexe sa toolari, atthunaka nriyari-nriyari wa mukhaliheryo muulupalexa wa nenli wa ilapo sikina siri mpuwa mwa mutthenkeso yoola.
Afalume Oxiina, wa mpantta mukina, akhaliherya ni imilyawu miloko mixexe ni xexe sa toolari.
Afalume a wAfirika tusuuli anvekela muswanmaha wa samanyala sivariwe wa mukhalelo atthu a ilapo sokhopela
Afalume a Wafirika tusuuli ahavekele muswanmaha atthu a ilapo sikina sokhopela mwaha wa samanyala sahoonxe atthu imiya piili Onsipinku, mpooma mo Durban, esumana evinre.
Atthu yaawo yavolonwewu yattyawenle ompa emosa yo Puluusiya weywo othamihiwaaya arohiwaka muttetthe mmosa womaka.

Ministuru oniweherya miteko sa mapulusiya oxekurya opuro omankaaya atthu yaawo avariwe sa manyala oSipinku ni ororomeliha wakhaliherya ale amphavela ohokolowela mulaponi mwaya ni whela mmuttettheni ale aniphavela okhala wAfirika tusuuli.
Mpaxatore a Mmosampiki mulaponi mwa Wafirika tusuuli, Fernando Fazenda, nave oxukurya opuro yoowo ni ohoona wiira atthu miloko miili ni athannanli amphavela ohokolowela mmosampiki.
Atthu miloko mixexe ammosampiki ahaphwanyerereya mahooxo otupheliwa atthu a ilapo sokhopela mmuttettheni mo oSipinku, wa mwattelo ikonto piili ni imiya thanu ankhala oporovinsiya wo Kwazulu-Natal.
Mpaxatore Fernando Fazenda ohoniherya othunku awe mwa kuverunu ammosampiki mwaha wa atthu atupheliwe wohooxiwa, ororomeliha wiira onovariwa muteko wokhaliheriwa ale aniphavela ohokolowela owaani.
Wa sotheene, wansuwanyeya wi antthokiheriwa makahano otheene ntoko ipakhira wireliwaka muteko yoola.

Masi wa atthu akina wa avolonwewu, yakhala wi kuverunu onovonya ikettelo sowahela mmuttettheni ohaana otthokiherya opuro wakhanlya awe owathukumanya, maana mulaponi mukhunmmyaaya sinonaneya ikhotto, ntoko elapo yo Khonko.

Mukhalelo mmosa wokacamiha wa miteko sa kuverunu a Wafirika tusuuli, atthunaka wa khuta okathi okhanyereriwa ovekela muswanmaha wa atthu anihooxiwa ni afalume a ilapo sinikhumaaya, mwaha wohonaneyaka olevelelana ni atthu Wafirika tusuuli watuphelaka akina anrowawu.
Wepaceroni wa mwaakha yoola, atthu muloko atthowenle mmaawani mo Afirika tusuuli ahokotthiwa mpayiro sa mpooma eriyari.
Mwaakha wa 2008, atthu miloko mithannanmosa orowawu ahokottiwa ni ananmawaani eelapo yeele.
Wankoola: Okhalaka wi amwaavano antepexa ophwanya oretta wa covid-19?
Amwaavano a Wankoola tahinreere ohinmwa wattela ophwanya oretta wa koronaviru.
Wophavela olavula mwaha yoola, noomwiiwa Joaquim Fernandes, musomi exikola ekhulupale, namuhakhu Katumbela Costa ni namuhakhu Carlos Rosado de Carvalho.

Wolikana ni iniraneya wa ilapo sinceene munonaneya samikacamiho sotharamuleliwa ni oretta wa koronaviru, Wankoola khovirikanne ni ikhalelo piili sinnitharamulela sikinaku somihoolo, wantepelanelo wa mukhalelo wa mwavano, anihimwa okhalexa mpuwa mwa mikacamiho.

Eniriha sookhumelela sinrowa otepa, vanceene tho, mmamutekoni munvara aya amwaavano anceene onnonaneya wiira wanikelela wookhala otepexaka okacamiheya, mwaha woowi mitthenkeso sinceene wopopiheryaka owoomola anamuteko, ikhalelo sikhanle owiraneyaka wampwaheryo wokathi, wamalamala oretta.

Ofalume a Wankoola okupalela, wa nenanoxa, ikettelo sinceene sinireliwa ovukulela mikacamiho sa muhakhu sotharamuleliwa ni koronaviru, wariyari wa malaka aniireliwa ovukulela miteko sintthuneyaxa muhakhu.
Ikettelo sikina okhomaaliha sa mukhaliheryo wa muhakhu wi wonaneyeke.
vakhaani wa miteko sikhaane, ni hata wa mitthenkenso suulupale
wa mapuro amuruweryo.
Wanaamwi amahoolela atthunaka, masi ninleelo, anamakhalela a miteko sanakoso khankupalixi wiira ikettelo sitthokiheriwe sinokhalelana ni okhumeleleke mureerelo oratta ene.
Ni eyeva miteko sa muhakhu, mitthenkeso sohiyererya olaleerya ni
mitthenkeso sanamunceewne sinaphwanyiha muteko, ntoko nlikanyiho amwaavano yaawo mwakhumelenle muhaleliho mwaavara aya, wakuxereriheyaka siso ohihiwa ovara muteko anamuteko ikonto miliko miili.
Ntoko solempwa ni mutthenkeso onarepa atthu wosuwanyeeha mwaattelo aya, Wankoola onniphwanyaneya atthu imilyawu xexe ari wa ikhalelo sohivara muteko, anceene wiiyaawo athiyana.
Joaquim Fernandes, mwaavano mmosa musomi onoona miteko Wankoola ntoko etthu enonaneya, wa khuta mwaakha, ni malokoleleyo anunterereya wa khuta okathi.
Com oretta wa koronaviru, mukhalelo wo mihoolo wamwaavano aWankoola onikhala ninleelo wohisuwanyaseya.
Okhumulana wa kampoyi wowokottha atthu anli ni miloko mithannamiili awulalasa muttetthe wo Karolina wo Hitto.
Amahoolela aniwherya sa sotakhala sinkumelela wotutuxereya oKarolina wohitto ahimya wi owulalasa weywo wunteya ni wonyokowa wotepexa.

Kampoyi onakuxa atthu ekhumelo ekuluttu yo Amtrak okhumulana ni mukina onikuxa miritti oCSX mmuttettheni mwa Wameerika yo Karilina wohitto, ettiminku yeela, atthu anli akhwa ni akina miloko mithannamiili awulalasa.

Kampoyi ni atthu emiya emosa ni miloko miraru yapakhiriwe ni anameettiha athannararu yeeta ekwaha ovenya oNova York ni Miami nto khikhumulana ni mukinaku wakunxe muritti ni khivalanyeya, ohimya Amtrak mmuhupini.

“A Amtrak Train 91, wetta ekhumelo oNova York ni Miami, okhumulana ni dede a muritti a CSX, ekhumelo ya iwoora piili ni minuto miloko miraru ni mithanu sa vasiisu okayse, Okarolina wohitto“, ohimya Amtrak.
Amahoolela aniwherya sa sotakhala sinkumelela wotutuxereya oKarolina wohitto ahimya wi owulalasa weywo wunteya ni wonyokowa wotepexa.
Atthu otheene owulalasa aalovoleliwa muxipiritaali simphwanyaneyawu.

Amahoolela oopuro oniweheriwa sa miteko sa kampoyi oLexington aahimya wiira wathukumanyiwa aya atthu yapakhinre wattamela oxikola emosa ni otheene yahakhanle mukampoyini ni a mutthenkeso wa Kuruxi Vermelya yanakhaliherya.
Othokosiwa wa Gbagbo: Mwaalo mmosa wa mithinto miili
Laurent Gbagbo onanyihereriwa okhala moosa a manyala ovara ikhirini sa mahooxo a pinatamu.

Mukhulupale akhalayi eeLapo yo Costa do Marfim, Laurent Gbagbo, onihimyaniwa ovara sa manyala sowahukhumua atthu siraneeye nomala wonaneya mwathanle, wa ekwaha yopacerya, opuro mukhulupalexa wa milattu molimwinkuni.
Calton Cadeado, musomihi a mutthenkeso mukhulupale a miiwanano ni ilapo sikina oMosampiki
Owiriyaneliwe ni namapuka miyaha eelapo yo Argentina, Silvia Fernandezde Gurmendi, Ohaya, opuro wa miteko sophukiwa milattu moolimwinkuni.
Mukhulupale a khalayi eelapo yo Kosta de Marfim, a iyakha miloko mithannanmosa ni thannamosa, mukhulupale eelapo opacerya opixiwa wa milattu otiripunaale yeele.

Laurent Gbagbo, a iyakha miloko mithannanmosa ni thannamosa onihimyaniwa okhala yoowo akuxereriihe ovariwa sa manyala wa mukhalelo aya apinatamu wa sotakhala sakhumelenle nomala wiiraneya mwathanle elapo yo Kosta de Marfim, ntoko wookotthiwa, ohasuliwa, otthratthariwa atthu ni masurtaatu wahoolela awe ekhumelo ya mahiku muloko ni mathannanmosa, mweeri wa Tesempuru, mwaakha 2010 ni muloko ni manli, mweeri wa Apiril, mwaakha wa 2011.

okhootta onvahererya omwene namaxintta, mukhulupale Alassane Ouattara, othamulela oKosta de Marfim ikhotto mmawaani, ntoko sinanyihererya aya amahoolela a ONU - wakuxereriha okhwa mwaattelo wa atthu ikonto ttaaru.

Namaphua miyaha Sílvia Fernandez de Gurmendi oosuweliha wiira owiriyaneliwa wophavela okupaleliwa sin'himyaniwa awe ni okohakohiwa wa mukhulupale akhalayi oKosta de Marfim, atthunaka, onirowa opacerya mahiku muloko ni mathannamararu, mweeri wa Junho, mwaakha wa 2012.

Calton Cadeado, musomi wokhaliheriwa eexikola Rutgers University, namatthoka ni muthokosi a miteko sa opuro onikhomaalihiwa miteko sa murettele ni mawanawano a mutthenkeso muuluple a miiwanano ni ilapo sikina yo Mosampiki, onnisuweliha sikhanle okhumelela ni okohakohiwa wa Laurent Gbagbo.
Exipiritaale emosa yo Benguela "yowakameliwa"
Ministuru a miteko sa ekumi ohimya wiira miteko ntoko iye kahiyo sa haalali.

Oxipiritaali ekhulupale yo Benkela (HGB) opittikuxiwa opuro mmosa opakiwa ekilinika nnya wohittharihela ikettelo ratta, masi khivaniweryaney ovra muteko ontthuneya ni wannonaneya muhleeliho wa ikaruma ntoko iluuva ni akwilya.
Atthu alavulaniwe ahimya wi opuro onakheleliwa aretta, wanamwi ihisapo sikhanle sopunttheya, masi sinvariwa miteko someekha.
Mwamahiku, opuro wanexexe wakhapeleliwa oretta wa maytho ni owaruni, masi va ekilinika tenweherya, wunmaathi onliviwa itoolari emiya emosa wa khuta nihiku.

Asuweli a miteko sa ekumi, wiiyawo akina anamuteko a HGB, ahimya wiira opittikuxiwa weywe khononiherya soreera wa miteko sinvariwa, maana ninleelo wannonaneya muhaleliho wa mirereelo, ni khivan'hinmwa othowa mirette.
Wohiromola Obenkela, ministuru a ekumi Luís Gomes Sambo, osuweliha wiira va wahinatthi aya otthokiheriwa ikettelo sinsuwanyeeha sa miteko iya, mukhalelo ntoko ola manyala.
Nva, ni mwaha wa khuta nihiku, omunyohola mutthu okhanle oviraka miyeri mithannanmiili olipelelaka olokoleliwa mukacamiho awe wa ekumi
Kinnivekela omwaleywa mwa ekumi, kilivaka ikonto muloko sa kwanza, masi wohireera etthu.
Omuta yoola va, nva (omwaleywa mwa ekumi) muteko tuwomeekha, va khahiyo wanamunceene’’, onyohola António Chimbili, khini Domingos Branco winre oretta khonlipélela’’.
Wowiwiwa ni Voz America, naxariya Francisco Viena winre wi “wittottopexa wamutokweene a Wankoola“ onnivikana nlamulo ni onnikoha murereelo aya mwa elapo.
Nva wookhala mutthokelo wotthuneliwa wa nnyoho, muupuwelo wophavela omwiira sivavaru ni oraala piriyele.
Sokhala ikettelo sisuwanyeeha makhalelo a ixipiritaali sa mupuro munkhapeleliwa anamunceene“, ohimya naxariya.
Mahoolela ni muxatoro oXipiritaale wo Benkela, Bernabé Lemos ni Eduardo Kedisobua, wanamukhuluwiru, khaphavenle osuweliha etthu wa nvaanelo ni VOA.

Wa muthukumano okhaleliwa ni ilapo sikina otthokihiwa ni exipiitaale ekhulupale yo porovinsiya, musatoro otistiritu, namakhaliherya a miteko sa miteko sa okuvernatire wa ikhalelo sa politica ni mmawaani, Laurinda Baca, ohimya wi onnoona soreera nno onrweela.
oSavora onorowa okhala opuro woololiwa
Mutthenkeso wanawivahererye anoorowa wuulaniha miteko sa ekumi sinkhomalelexiwa muttetthe yoole wa mmosampiki.
Muttetthe mmosa wa ekuluttu yotteyvela yo Savora, Mmosampiki, onoorowa okhala opuro wovariwa miteko sa ekumi.
Opuro yoowo onirowa otekiwa ni mutthenkeso “Drs.
For Life” (Asuweli a ekumi, wa emakhuwa), enivara miteko wa ilapo sinceene so afirika ntoko Wankoola, Onamiipiya, Osampiya, Osimpaapwe ni mmosampi.

Mário Rocha, namwikumiherye a mutthenkeso yowo oniva miteko mmosampiki, ohimya wi opacenrye ovara mmosampiki ni opuro mmosa wa ekumi wovekeliwa ni anamiteko oSiyani, oSavora yatenke exikola aya mapuro yale.

“Ninneemya mulattulo ni nipacenrye ovara muteko mwaakha wa 2004 nirumeelaka itenta“, ohimya Mário Rocha, wincereryaka wi nthanathana tiwatekiwa ekilinika emosa epacenrye ovara muteko mwaakha wa 2009, ni metiku mmosa eelapo yo Olanda.
Mutthenkeso “Drs for Life” otthokiherya opuro wokhapeleliwa axithiyana mmuttettheni ni wepaceroni wene waniwa wiira watthuneya opuro woololiwaka athiyana okacamiheya ehamela aya.
Vano mwaakha ola wakheleliwa mwiwanano wowemereriwa otekiwa opuro mmosa wowiriwa oporasawu.
”Ola atthunaka muteko wowalamela ni wokacamiha monkoni mororomeela wiile ekhanlyaahu ophwanya,” ohimya.
Mutthenkeso “Drs For Life” okhalana mametiku ekonto emosa ni imiya ttaaru akhanle oovaraka miteko okilinika ni waalola atthu, ni wa khuta okathi.

“Khiwankoherereya wiira wantthuneya okhaliheriwa ni ilapo sokhopela maana hiyo khaninkuxa nnakhala wettana musurukhu omutekoni ni atthu anivara muteko anikhala owivahererya, muteko mmosa ninirelahu wakhaliherya atthu a Wafirika“, omaliherya Mário Rocha.
Koronavirus onnalaaheya molimwnkuni mukhalelo onthananiha miteko muxipiritaale simphwanyaneya sokacamiheya.
Oruusiya elapo ya nenli yotepexa okhwa atthu ni ottharelana waya EUA.
Waxintoni

Mwaakha wa 2022 wapaceriwa aya ohinmwa sa ihapari sa muthinto Omicron wa koronaviru ompwahererya walaheeya wa olimwenku wotheene ni wuncerereya wa atthu amphwanya oretta yoola onotepiha mikacamiho muxipiritaali mwa ilapo sohiyanasa.

OWinkalatera mahoolela a miteko sa ekumi, Mathew Taylor ohimya wiira muthinto yoola wa Omicron onorowa ”wererya ni oswahiha owerya orinaaya miteko ni ohompererya wiira muxipiritaale” ” munokhanyereriwa ovara miteko sowalamela” w okathi wowemereriwa mwaha wowuncerereyaka atthu onaphwanya oretta wa COVID ni muthinto wa Omicron.

Mwaattelo waretta ni COVID anakheleliwa wa khuta nihiku ahincerereya muxipiritaali mwa elapo yo Inkalateera ekhumelo ikonto muloko ni emosa ni imiya xexe ni miloko mithanu ni anli, enamaxexe, mpakha ikonto muloko ni piili ni imiya ttaaru ni miloko mithannamixexe, enamathanu.
Walikeleliwa Okara Peretaanya alempwa atthu ikonto emiya emosa ni miloko mithannamiraru ni thannaxexe ni imiya thannattaaru ni miloko mixexe ni athannamosa, enamathanu.

Minixituru a miteko sa ekumi elapo yo Wintiya oosuweliha wonaneya atthu ikonto miloko miili ni piili ni imiya thannapiili ni miloko mithannamiili ni athannanli waphwannye oretta wa koronaviru, olelo, ni okhomaaliha osuweliha wiira mwaattelo watthu arina muthinto wa Omicron aphiya va ekonto emosa ni imiya xexe ni miloko miraru ninmosa.
Axitokweene eelpo yo Wintiya ahimya wi mwattelo yoola toyeva ni ookhala ohikhalaka wa ekekhayi.
Oruusiya wohinmwa opweteya atthu imiya thannattaaru mwaha wa COVID-19 wa iwoora miloko miili ni xexe sokhiserya.
Nlaka na Reuters noosuweliha wiira oRuusiya vano elapo ya nenli ohireere okhwa atthu mwaha wa COVID, mpaceryakeene elapo yo Wameerika.
Ofaransa woohinmwa wi atthu ikonto ttaaru ni imiya thanu ni miloko mixexe ni araru amphwanyaneya akhapeleliwaka ni totepa.

Mukhulupale Emanuel Macron ohimya wolavulawawe monkoni woomla mwaakha wiira isumana sinrowa okhala skacamiha oFaransa mwaha wowuncerereyaka oretta wa COVID, masi Macron ohimya wiira elapo eri nipuro nooreera woovirikana ni mwaakha ovinre ni wuncerereya atthu oolya murette.

Ehapri yoreera tiwi muteko ovariwe wosomeliwa Okara Pretanya osuwanyeehe wi mopopiheryo wa atthu ophwanya muthinto Omicron ni wunmaathi vakhaani wakela olikanyihiwa ni atthu aphwannye muthinto wa Telta.
Mittetthe so Emiratos Arabes Unidos woosuwelihiwa wi anoorowa okhottihiwa atthu oohilya murette ovenya arowaka ilapo sikina ekhumelo mahiku wanrowa aya wettaka muloko.
Atthu oolya muretta anirowa nave olyaaka murette wa ekwaha ya nenli “wolipiheriwa” ahinatthi okhuma wa elapo yeele.
oEUA: Mwaattelo wa mukhaliheryo wa muhakhu onnanyihereriwa oyeva.
Nkinkupaleela wiira oyevela onnopopiheya, ohakhula sakataari a muhakhu.

Mukhulupale Joe Biden ni namakhaliherya okhulupale Kamala Harris anoorowa wetteetta wa mittetthe so America yirelaka osuweliha sa mukhalelo a muhakhu okhaliheryaniwa miteko, oniphiyerya itiriliyawu piili wa tolari wowemereriwa ni ekonkeresu yo Wameerika.
Mwattelo ola wa mukhaliheryo onooniwa ni anamatthoka okhala nlaka nimosa ninireliwa ovukulela sa makacamiho a muhakhu anonaneya mwaha wa oretta wa koronavirus

Ntoko nlikanyiho, nlaka yenna oheliwe mpuwa wa mukhaliheryo wa amusi ni anamwane, wotthariheliwa ni mwattelo wa anamwane, etthu atthu anceene enlipelela aya okhala yankhalaka ntoko wanonaneya aya wa ilapo sinceene sa muttetthe wa Europa.

Masi aakhala anceene, wohikhala anamanyohola paahi masi nave asuweli akina a muhakhu ari wa nlaka na partiitu Temokarata ya Joe Biden, annovelela wiira ikhalelo seeya sa musurukhu wa muhakhu waakhala otharamulelaka ohaleliheya nave oyeva.
Janet Yellin, sakarataari a miteko sa muhakhu a kuverunu a Biden khonkupaleela, ohimyaka wi, “waakhala moopopiho vakhaani ni kunipuwelela wiira wakhala owehaweheyaka”.

“Ihisapo sinceene sokhuruwa okathi ovinre nomala opacerya ethaawuuni ya oretta” ohimya Yellen okupalelaka wi imosa-imosa sa ihisapo sinowela vasyavasya okathi muhakhu wanrowaawe wuncerereyaka okathi ola wa elimwe.

“Masi eyo etthu enivira wa mukhalelo wa ihisapo ni wonaneya mukhalelo oyevela vanceene ntoko sonanen'yeaya mwaakha wa 1970 etthu ehinlipeleka nnakhala vakhaani”, ohimya sakarataari a miteko sa muhakhu wonne wi amahoolela a miteko sa muhakhu annanyihererya “Wonaneya othowela muhakhu ntoko sinweheriwa aya ni epanku ekhulupale, enitthaniwa Federal Reserve exuttenrye enamuna yolokolela mukhalelo wothowela muhakhu”.

Nkinupuwelela wi (othowela) onokhala moopopiho munceene ni yakhala etthu entthuna wiiraneya niri owitthokiha eene wakhanlyaahu owehaweha ni nookhalana ikaruma sokompeleliha mukhalelo yoowo, ohimya Yellin ni wanvaanelo ni anamasuweliha a ihapari wa etelevisawu ABC ohinmye ni tho kokhanle okutakutheya ni wuncerereya okomphwa wa elapo yo wAmeerika.

Maanelo a sakarataari a miteko sa muhakhu wahaana otthokiherya raata miteko sa ixuuru ni wohikhala okomphwa ni ntoko sihinmyaawe, sinrowa opwahererya oyeva wa ilapo sothaciri mwaha wa enihinmwa okhala “opittikuwa wa ikhalelo”.
Wampwaheryo wa okathi, owo ohimya siso, wahaana owehawehiwa muyevelo wakhanlyaaya okhomaleleya okhala saana wowehaweha.
Wanvekeliwa ikettelo wophavela othoriha nihasu oParasiili.
Muteko mmosa wa nlamulo ninthoriha sa manyala sotakhala ni sa ikhirini sotharamuleliwa wa manyakunyaku onoorowa ovaneleliwa wa muthukumano,
Estaatu Unitu ni Exilovenia akwerekhwa mwiwanano mmosa wa muuke monkoni mwa mukettelo musya wa 5G

Sakataari a estaatu yo Wameerika, Mike Pompeo, ohaana okwerekhwa enamaxexe yeela, 13, ni Exiloveiya, mwiwanano mmosa wa muuke monkoni wa etekonoxia 5G, vaavo elapo kekhanle owehawehiwa ni kuverunu elapo yokhopela wohiwehiwa ni miteko sa xariya so meekha.
Mwiwanano mmosaru okwerekhwiwa okathi ovinre ni ilapo so Poloniya, Estoniya ni Repuupilika Xeka.

Muxukuryo wa Pompeo elapo yo Esloveniya tiwopacerya wa sakarataari a estaatu yo Wameerika ekhumelo ya mwaakha wa 2011 ni wampwaheryo wokhala wawe onoorowa okumanela ni tho purumeero ministuru Janez Jansa ni mukhulupale Borut Pahor.
Afalume a Wameerika ahimya wiira mivaanelo sulupalexa sinrowa okhala sa amaluxu, oheliwa mpuwa ipalka sa muttetthe wa Ositente ni miyaha sa mihakhu.

Enamararu, 12, Mike Pompeo waphwanyaneya oRepupilika Xeka, weywo ohinmya awe wiira owerya wa muhakhu wo Xiina ori, wa mukhalelo, onopopiha awe vanceene wovirikana ni Mwiraano wo Soviyetika ookathi wa ekhotto.

Muteko omananiha osyakiha mopopiho wa PCC (epartiitu Komunixita yo Xina) mukhalelo mmosa wokottopa maana PCC emphwanyaneya muhina mwa muhakhu ahu, mmutekoni mwahu, mmawaani mwahu wa mukhalelo mwiraano wa oSoviyetika wahiniryaawe.
Oparaka, Pompeo wahivaneela ni purumeero ministuru Andrej Babis, wa nihiku na nenli wa muxikuryo wa muteko wa esumana emosa muttetthe wo Europa wa eriyari.

Axitokweene owanli aweherya ni avaneela wa mukhalelo wamaluxu ni mutthokelo Três Mares, wa mukettelo mmosa wa ipolitika wokhomaaliha oluttelelana ni ilapo so Europa wa eriyari ni woriyenti, wariyari wa miteko sotekateka, amaluxu ni okumanelana wa ikhalelo sa vano.
Mutthekelo ookhalana masina a ipahari ttaaru sinkawanya wa mikano ni muttetthe: Opahari oPalitiku, oMare Nekuru ni Watiriyatiku.
Mukwaha awe yoola Pompeo onophiya oViyena, elapo yo Wawustiriya, ni Overisooviya, elapo yo Poloniya.

Mukwaha oniraneya okathi elapo yo Wameerika wanntthokiherya wakumiha masurtaatu ikonto muloko ni piili mmuttettheni mwa Walemaanya, anirowa othamiheeriwa elapo yo Polooniya ni ilapo sikina sa mutthenkeso wa NATO.
