Nave nto, Adriano Manuel, mukulupale a SINMEA, ohima wiira ekerebe kherere muthinto ni awosa anniphavela ovanela.
"Varihari va nri pahi 25%, ninniphavela ovanela, nto kuvernuru awankola ahiphavele ovanela ninrowa okhala 15% ni nto 10% isumana sinorwa, ohima.
Manuel oxankihiwa mwaha wa ohivariwa muteko vopacerya ni vaninano wii kuverunu khavanre ethu.
"Nlelo nnakhel vakhani ni khinikhanle owokhiwakha tho sisa" ohima mukhulupale owo.
Nikhuru na ekumi nlelo khehimme ethu mwaha wa ekereve ela.

Luís Francisco ookhala wa khatiri ya miyeri miili ni nriyari-nriyari oxipiritaale, okhunmewu wepaceroni wa mweeri wa Janeiro, masi nileelo khonatthi ovona mana, “kihaana makhwatta, kinetta ni ixinelu, okiwereya ni kihemeleke okathi munceene”.

Paul Kagame, mukhulupale oRuwanta, okoha yakhala wi Tedros, OMS ila China annyoholiwa, walaani otheene aya, wuncereryaka nrowe niiranele oretta, wa khuta orina erinaawe wa oretta yoola onamurowaka okohakohiwa nthanathana ni oratteene.

Nikhuru na Hamas nowopa akapwitthi amiikhi novira okathi vakhaani waphiyerenryaaya iwoora thannamosa soohiyu, okathi mphimo wavahiwa elapo yo Isareyele wi yahaana wakumiha masurutaatu aya wa muxikitthi mmosa wa al-Aqsa opooma wo Velya de Jerusalém ovinreene.

Nakoso awe Nkubana okhomalelen'ye ni AGOA (Nlamulo na munnuwelo ni miteko so Waaririka), opacerihiwe mwaakha wa ikonto piili, otthukulenle emerekaatu yo Wameerika wa anamuhakhu a Wafirika, ni mutthokiheryo a Wameerika onireliwa okhomaaliha munnuwelo a muttetthe a Wafirika, ekhalihenrye ni etthenkense mpacerakeene, wa khatiri ya iyakha muloko.
Lesli othoonya wannuwelo ratta ononaneya elapo yo Kheeniya wa itekonoloxiya sa iyapelano.

Soohinmwa sa mutthenkeso wa ekumi molimwinkuni sinsuweliha wi mwaattelo wa ipurusentu miloko mithannamiraru ni ithanu sanookhwa mwaha wa oretta wa ettekuxa mwaakha wa ikonto piili ni muloko ni thannattaaru yonanen'ye wa ilapo miloko miili sa mmuttettheni mwa Wafirika ni Wintiya. Onixeeriya ohoonaneyawu mwaattelo wa ipurusentu miloko miili ni xexe wanookhwa otheene mwaha wa ettekuxa, ottharela waya elapo yo Khonko (ipurusento mulok ni emosa), oTansaniya ni (ipuruseento thanu) ni Wankoola, oMosampiki ni oNixeri ni (ipurusento xexe wa khuta).

Ohiyereriwa ikhotto wenno ohinmwe ni namakhaliherya ookhulupale a wAmeerika, Mike Pence, nomla mivaanelo Wankaara ni mukhulupale oTurukiya, Tayyip Erdogan, ni ninanoru ottottopeliwa ni mukhulupale Donald Trump, ohinmye wi yamopola“ imilyawu sa atthu“.

Mwa nsina na FMO, muthinto wa musurukhu, muholeli a CDD, Adrano Nuvunga, ovanya muholeli a elapo, Filipe Nyusi, ohiruha ithu soothene siniphaveleya.
Nto nikuru na kuverunu nohima wiira nnorowa opithikuxa, nave nto Adriano Nuvunga, ohima wiira awo arokhanyereriwa, wi nto khiyapavela owoniherya iya athu a elapo yothene.
"molumo ala anihima yele yalipeleliwa, ovonya wa otekiwa ipa,ohihimmwa sana simota weettihinwaya musuruku" ohima Adriano Nuvunga.

Mweri wa marusu wa mwakha yola, kuverunu ovekela wophiyaka imiya 700 ya imiya sene sa itoolare, wi oholele ovalavela wa musurukhu wa mwaha wa Covid 19, wi ewaniwe ni eretta ela ni wi avahiwe ethu ale ohikhalana.
Mwa ale a mittinto sincene, anihima wiira " mwaha wa ovalavela mumcene wa eretta ela, kuveruvu ohana otthonyiherya sanene simota onittihawe musurukhu oniwahiiwawe".
Minixiteriyu a musurukhu, nave nto olavulaka Rogerios Nkono, ohima wiira musurukhu yowo onivareliwa muteko wa owopola athu ohawa mwaha wa eretta Covid 19
Wa ewarakha ya oparlamentoni, mukhulupale a elapo ohima wiira musurukhu yole wa 700 imiya imiya sene, mosampiki akhenle 340,8 nave nto yowo 309 ti ya FMI.
muhupu mukina olempawe mwa Mail&Guardian, Francis onira wiira "sowothiwa sinimoniherya ni onitheya vokiserya, onniteheya sana.
André Hanekom, ni athu otansaniya anli anottheriwasa waholela a ankhoto a okapo telekatu.

Elapo ya Inhambane ti yotepaxa.
Elapo ya Inhambane, akunya anihima viira athu 600 ahiya owurya murette wa elapaha mwakha wa 2017, yathereryakha nto athu okwa mwaha wa eretta yela.
Andrecio Cumbe, nfirimeru onivara ni muthinto wa omamaliha elapaha elapo ya Inyampani, oxankihiwa mwaha wa ohiwa owuriwa murette, nto ohiha mwaha wa okhwa athu, iwo onnacerya orava athu ancene.
Wa elapo ya inyamanpani, khiisuwelaxiwe orattene exeni eniriha athu ohiya owurya murette wa elapaha, nto onyaheriwa mwaha wa othehivela exipiritali, nave nto ni mwaha wa ithu solimalela mmawani.
Nto, vannumperereiwa wiira elapo ya omosampiki, yilipihe wiira emalaamleihe eretta ya elapaha, wii nto yonele murarelo, nto vavale athu imiya 159 anipwanyaneya 50 wala 60 purusentu pahi.
Ramos Horta onihima virra muthanle a elapo ya okine pissawu ohoceliwe.
Namurummwa a ONU wiira orowe okine pisawu Ramos Horta ohima olelo wiira soothene sanipwanyaneya wi opakiwe mwathanle nihiku 13 na apirili nto othikeliwe tho wunteriwa.
Mammaru anihima wiira vopihaka athu imiya 700 anithonyerya athu a 95%.
Ewraka ya mukulupale akhalanhi a elapo ya otimor lexite, ohima wiira wokhala mutinto wa ororomeliwa orattene mwathanle, owo onirowa woniheriwa elapo ya okine pisawu, ni waxutariwa ni e ONU ni Cedeao.
Sintoko ohimmawe, eyo anathukumanya athu elapo yotene sintoko apilixa ni atoropa.
Nave nto, Ramos Horta ovekela wiira makhuru a ilapo sokhopela sikhalihere avirya mwathanle elapo yele.
Sintoko ohimmawe mukhulupale a murettele, vannirerela ohihatho okhaliheriwa opaka elapo, sinniphaleya ithu sikina.
Wa nsisa sa ilapo sa CPLP, muholeli a elapo ya omosampiki Antonio Gumende, ohikhupanyerya mwaha wa anamuteko a kuverunu okhala miyeri miraru ahilinvyale.
Wa mutthukumano yowo, mukhukupale a elapo ya okine pisawu ni ONU Joao Soares de Gama, otthapela mwaha wa olepiwa athu amwathanle nawe ohavekwla athu a ilapo sokhopela.
Nave nto nlelo ohimaka Ramos Horta alempwa makhuru 14 ni athu 12, nave awo 8 meekhaya ni 4 ancene.
Murummwa a elapo ya okaraniya, ohima wiira"quid pro quo".

Muholeli a nakoso a elapo ya ukaraniya William Taylo, ohalela mateputatu namanli, 22, wiira Amerika onorowa okhaliherya ni atoropa wa elapo ya Volodymyr Zelenskiy, wiira nave onorowa omukhaliherya Joe Biden wa anakoso amwanawe peresitenti aakhalani mwaka wa 2020.

Mulumwawe Taylor, onavyavya mwaha wa womoliwa Donald Trump, onivanyiwa wiira peresitenti yola kakumanenle ni ukaraniya. Taylor ahithikela masu awe wiira khivanrerela athu orowa anyakhulihana mwakha wa ekurupusawu ya Joe Biden.
Owo ohima tho wiira Sondland Trump aphavela Zelenskiy ohime vathuni.
Anamayoli anavya osuwela wiira Trump avarenlene muteko, mwaha wa omopopiha ukaraniya wiira omyavayaye peresitenti 2020.
Erewa " Kiwalaka olelo na Bill Taylor tiyotepaxa oxankiha".
" nto mulumo a otthonyana" ohima Debbie Wasserman Schultz
Nave nto athu 87% anithuna omoliwe, ni 6% khanthuna.

"Vanihikuni muthu temokarata akhala peresitenti, marepupilikanu akanyari, nto peresitenti orohiweke okalausu"
Elapo ya oxapawu yovaha murette wa eretta epola.
Kuvurenuno oxapawu, ohima wiira oniphavela ovaha murette wa eretta ya epola.
oshihide Suga, a OMS ohima vwiira "xapawu onorowa ovaha murette ohanle wemereriwa ni onivariwa muteko wa nikuru"
Nikhuru na OMS, anilepa ivasina nlelo sohemereriwa, nave nto iyo siniphavela osyaka eretta ya epola wafirika ewinhe athu 1.427 ni 2.615 athu orava.

Nto mwaha wa ilapo sincene opwanyaneya olosowa, wophiherya wiira athu otehene avaranei wiira omale COVID 19 wankola.

Solemppwa m'warakhani sa namanli, 15, ONU ni OCHA ohima wiira athu ancene anicawa ekhotto ahacereya amphaka imiya 172 mweri wa apirii wa 2020 mphaka imiya 732 saathu mweeri wa apirili wa mwakha 2021.
Nave nto awo, athu ancene anicawa vancene.
"Ekhotto ela yorowa mphaka variyari va mwakha wa 2021, yacacawihaka athu ni wahaxa athu ancene. Ohima OCHA nave wiira wamanlaha ekhotto athu ocawa aphiya imiya 68.
Nave OCHA ohima wiira athu ovikana imiya 900 anohawa vancene nave athu yale aniwakhelela athu ohawa nave annihawa nto.
Elapo yaarina milyawu mmosa muhina wa nohiku nimosa nave 95,5% yapacinve ni omicron.
Ohima wiira "yacerereya wa mammaru" nave omwira "isumana ninorowahu tisotepaxa okacamiha" mwaha wa wakhuveya oraveya omicron, yowo opance esekunta fera pahi, 3, emilyawu.
Munpereryo ala yakhumme mwaha wa epanxo ya muteko namanli, 4, nave womalani omwuira "ntotteke murarelo nirinahu" nave omwira " khivakhakanle ohivasinariwa".
Biden ohima wiira otowa wa ivasina sinnahiya athu onyema,nave omwirira "ninpaheval olokolela".
Ohipahevelaka okohima ethu, muholeli ohavekela anamaholeli a nikhuru na osoma othene wiira ahule ixikola, nave nto vavale sawulinwaya ixikola.
Muncerereya mammaru ahiya ixikola sincene vohikahala mapurusori, nave nto ixipiritale athiwa manferemeru, nave nto ni ikaru ni iviyawu.
Smithsonian Institution ohima wiira nipuro na imusewu sa Waxiinttooni sinowaliwa wala sinirowa ovaraka mphaka othana, mwaha wa othowa anamuteko.
Mweri ole ovinre, Joe Biden ohoniherya ewarakha ya omalamaliya eretta ela, ni maxi nlelo khiviranen'ye.
(CDC) ohima olelo wiira omicron muneene oraviwa wohihaka 95,5% isya sa Covid 19, nave nto va mweri mmosa omuvikana delta, howo ari mphaka mweri wa novempuru 99% sa oraviwa wa amerika.
Covid 19 tiyoxankiha wa elapo sothene, ohima muholelil awankola.
Muholeli a ekumi awankola, Silvia Lutucuta, ohima sekunta fera wiira elapo yopinttela oraviwa covid 19 ovikana mwakha wa 2020 nave mwaxithu a akunya otepa ophiya 70% oluwanta.
Muholeli a empa ya peresitenti ohima wiira eretta ela momopiho mulupale.
yeyo yohimiwa yari mwaha wa okwa athu 800 ni nto yala 82 mwaha wa yola musya.
Muholeli owo olipiherya wiira, okhottihiwa sokhottihiwa onnikhaliherya nakoso ni okawiwa iyolya imuttetheni.
Nto nave sekunta fera, kuveruni ohacererya mahiku mpakha 30 vale nto elapo erinaya athu 32.854 orava eretta ela ni 29.329 openuwa eretta yela.
Wa mokumo a Sílvia Lutucuta, sophiheryaka ilapo itanu ni tharu sokhalana eretta ya Covid 19 ya wafirika tu suli ni winkalatera, ni "sopwanyiwa mumu ni sikina soruhiwa".
Neve nto mukulupale a empa ya pirisitenti, Adão de Almeida, okupali wiira elapo yokuthakutheya ni nave wilipiha ohana okalaka wathu otheni ni iparititu sene.
Nave nto, infirimero anamwane Luís Bernardino onikupali wiira elapo yokhalana vaniinano imilyawu miraru sathu orava eretta ni mammaru athu anilalehiwa kahiyo ekekhayi.
Nave mukwaha wa ohomiwa athu oniphaveliwa athu imilyawu 15.7 ophiyaka iyakha 16.
Muholeli owo ori nave operetoriya, wiira olipiherye wiira EUA onniphavela okhaliherya mikuso sa ilapo.
Wa muwarakhani, ohima ari awe omaputo wiira onirowa ovanela wiira omalamalihe ekhotto ya ISIS, yeyo eri ethonyero ya anakhotto a amaka.
Mukhulupale Sales onirowa wafirika tu suli namathanu, 4, " ovanela mwaha wa elapo yele okhala yulupalexa ni muthinto ekhanlaya okhaliherya ikina"
Yawo anihaniwa Al-Shabab aniwanela mwaha wa exariya ni anira wiira ahiviwa amusaya.
Vamanlaya iyakha 50 ahettettelanaka, amerika ni kupa athikela opathani, ahimme namaxexe aheleli a ilapo iya.
"Niniphavela opaka opathani mukina" ohima peresitente awamerika, Obama, ohimaka wiira musuruku ni mupuwela ohikala woninaniha, vanto ninipwanyaneyahu ni wopopihiwa ni anakhotto Al Qaeda ni ISIS.
"Iyakha iya ohettetelana khonrera" ohima Obama.
Niivavale Obama alavulawe, nave Raul Castro, alavula ni athu okupa.
Wa elao ya Wavana, muholeli orihe wiira onipahvela othikela opathani wavaneliwe "wakhuleliwa miyettelo sa elapo ya okupa".
Anamalaleya anira wiira Obama ni Castro alavulasa mooramini mwaha wa elapo ya okanata.
Nave iwarakha sehiyo sinihima wiira erowa ohuliwa impaxata sa owaxintoni ni wavana.
Mphaka va eri exikiritori emosa pahi.
Olelo, kuverunu a okupa omatahula muthu awamerika Alan Gross, awaleliwe okhuma mwakha 2009 ni arowa okhala miyakha 15 mukalapusu.
Mapuro anivariwa miteko sa Kuveeruno ni soohikhala.

Nttetthe yoola opattuxiwe mwaha wa mphira yoola wootthyawiwa , mwaha wa ilapo sikinaaku sumuttikha wenno . Olelo ennivira iyaakha 40 nttetthe ola okhanlanleene ni attikhiwaka mphira.

Eduardo dos Santos vasyaa oPareceloona
Muxukuryo waneecexe "woomeekhaawe" okhuma mwaakha wa 2023
Nuuvira mahiku manli numala wooniherya onamwilepiha tho wiira okhala mahoolela a MPLA, Peresitente a w'Ankoola José Eduardo dos Santos oorowa wiira muxukuryo woomeekhaawe oPareceloona.
Khasihimiwe oratteene ishariya sa muxukuryo waneecexe, Santos oniiraawe wa epooma ele ya oXipaanya okhuma mwaakha wa 2013 ni wiira ottuli ahiwuupuweliha atthu wa mwaha wa ekumi ya Peresitente.
Mwaakha owo muhooli aari epooma ele ya oXipaanha imaara piili ni mukwaha mmosa wa mixukuryo iyo ahilokela mpakha isumana thanu ni emosa.
Eyo yahiruuhela exukhuli mwaha wa ekumi ya Peresitente ni iparitiitu siniwananaawe yahiphiya okhathi owo evekelaka wiira ohimyakasiwe orattene etthu enimukhaliha okathi munceene oXipaanya.
Mwaakha yoowo tho Peresitente aahirila mukhwaha wanenli arowaka epooma ele wa okathi wa isumana tthaaru ni nuusu.

Namalamula a Wankoola aahivaanyiha amanaka etthirima wiira Peresitente arimwaapaxari okiliinika ya oPareceloona, asikulaka okathi owo "enamuna yoolosowela ni ohikhalana erexiponsapilitaate" ya ehapari elaleyiwale ni Raatiyo Televisawu oPorutukaale.
Mwaakha wa 2014 Peresitente a Wankoola aari vasya oPareceloona wa muxukuryo musyaa "woomeekaawe".
Mosampiiki ohaafetariwa ni Kovite-19 ni otupheliwa ohitto ni eriyari ya elapo

Ekotto ya ale aniisiirela (junta militar da Renamo) nikhuru n'asurutaato a Renamo oManika, wokotthiwa wa mamosampikaano anli oMalawi ehimyaniwaka ommwaryamwarya mwaaxiitthu a korona soohiiha ohimiwa ihapari sa KOVITE-19 s'anahapari oMosampiiki, anixaka ohimya omwareela ekhotto oKaapu Telekaatu.

Muhooleli aale anisiirela Nikhuru Namasurutaato a Renamo, Mariano Nhongo, ohaakhulela, aahimeeryaka alipa ihapari, otuphela omwiivale, nihiku noopacerya na muteko, mutthu oViyatenaame, wiiranen'ye oMataraara, ePorovinsiya ya oManika, Eriyari ya Mosampiiki.
Nhongo oohimya wiira "namalamula ohaana ophukaka mulattu wa Renamo, woona vahiiraneye siiso onoorowa woonaneya mulattu" ni ookhanyererya wiira masurutaato aniira
sooruma sawe

Nhongo ohoopopia ohononasa mihakhu sinikhuma ilapo sa okhopela ni okhoottiha ele eniirelawe "wiiyiwa wa mireerelo sa mutakhwane ni maluku oowaarya" ni atthu anikhuma ilapo sa okhopela, waahiya anammawaani amittetthe iye.
Nikhuru na Masurutaato aapahasa mikukutta mithanu ni piili ni maakina maalupale manli wuumakani wa maviyatinaame yookottiwe vootakhala

Vanaamwiira siiso, soophiya oTeete, enamararu yeela mahiku vaneettaya 08 ya mweeri waneecexe, mirutthu sa mamosampikaami, mmosa a yaawo aari poliisiya , wookotthiwe voowooniha othunku ahimyaniwaka omukawa mwaaxitthu a korona
Mosampiiki ohaapwanya atthu 17 amuranve, nnya vohikhwa mutthu
Maputu ni othowa wa kaaxi a onaapeeliwa

Akhali a Epooma ya oMaputu khareere oxukhumeya mwaha woothowa ni wuncereriwa isisapo sa mireerelo khamosa-khamosa sootthuneyaxa wa okathi ola vanitupheliwaaya okathi wa meera a wumalani wa mwaakha ni vanoonaneyaaya otakhala wanamatumiha akina.

Atthu anikhala Epooma ya oMaputu khareere oxukhumeya ni othowa ni owelihiwa puree isisapo sa mireerele sootthuneyaxa khamosa-khamosa, okathi ene yoola oniphiyaaya meera a wuumalani wa mwaakha onoonaneyaaya otakhala wanamatumiha akina. Mureerelo wootthuneyaxa onaaxankiha anampoomani ti kaaxi a vatee, oniira vanaamwi ororomeliha w'alipa omukawa oosuwanyeya, onivira aaxankihaka alipa omuurela. Wa mapuro vakhaani anipwanyaneyaawe, isisapo sinitumihaniwaawe sinniphiya 100 puru sento ovikana esisapo enihimiwaawe. Empereesa ya elapo enimuruuha patarooya, enihimya wiira khenisuwela ishariya soowelihiwa pure siniiraneya va. Nuumala othowa woonanen'ye miyeeri sa namuloko ni namuloko ni mmosa sivinre, empereesa ele ennaavaha apotinyo ikonto thanu wa khula nihiku. Miphimo iya soovikana wa iye mahikhweene siniroohiwa mmerekaato ya epooma yuulupale ya elapo ahu, tivo, kiivo eshariya woowi isisapo siwelihiweke, otepexawene wiira athoweke. Mwaalaano wa Nakoso woohima wiira ehaahela amayoowehaweha aya ni ari oolikaneene wiira yawehaweheke alipa otumiha anittottela muraarelo, enihimya mwaha wa isisapo. Vanaamwi sihimiwaka iya, ekekhayi enihimya wiira iye sinilavuliwa ni iye sinoonaneya, khasireere orakamelana, yaahiyaka alipa omuurela exankaleene, yuupuwelaka wiira waanikelela, mireerelo sikina sinrowa ottharihiwa ephiro emosaru yeela yoowelihiwa isisapo, wala othowa, ovirikanaka ni soororomelihiwa.
Clinton:Xiina ti "namapottha musyaa" a w'Afirika
Clinto oolopola "ohela muhakhu onikhaliherya" onirowa ottottela muraarelo Aafirika

Wa nikhwaha nawe nna oronwaawe ilapo sinceene sa w'Afirika, sakarataari a exitaatu a w'Ameerika, Hillary Clinton, oohimya wiira Aafirika ohaana okhala oosuwela wa "namapottha musyaa" ni Xiina ancereryaka opatthani awe mukontinenteni.
Aafirika aahaana, moonelo awe Clinton, aaxukureryaka apatthani anikhaliherya othaaciriha ikuru sa mulaponi.
Alavulaka ni Televisawu ya oZampiya, Clinton oohimya wiira apoovu a w'Afirika yaahaana okhalana ephoole ni elapo y'oXiina enikhovana paahi ni anamuhakhu a w'Afirika.
Khanimphavela onweha namapotta musyaa w'Afirika.

Atthu yaarowaka Waafirika orowa owiira anakoso, nimphavela wiira alipa nakoso ekeleleke ohoolo, nnya, nave tho nimphavela wiira awo yiireke sooreera (sakarataari ohincererya nlelo wiira) khanimphavela wiira awo ehonone olamuliwa wooreera ilapo sa Waafirika.

Wuupuxerya wiira mammeru a 2009 onihimya wiira Xiina oohela musurukhu woophiheryaka ipiliyawu 10 sa itoolare, ni nakoso ni Ilapo sa Waafirika sihuncarerya voowaakuveya okhala wiira Namalamula oPekim oniphavela omuthuma patarooya ni mireerelo sikina wiira eheleleke mihakhu sawe sinivira sunnuwaka.
Clinton oolopola "oheliwa muhakhu enireerela" wiira okhaliherya Waafirika nuupuwelaka "nihoona okathi waakolooniya enamuna vaakheyaaya okumiha mireerelo sa vathi, waaliva amahoolela ni orowa."
Ni muhooleli a muhupi a w'Ameerika ya Ohitto oottottela muraarelo wuupuxerya wiira wikhanyaanya wa Waashintoni oniirela okeliherya ohoolo epoliitika yoolamula ni muhakhu.
Ohuulula nanco wiira ilapo sa Waafirika sinniwerya wiixutta inamuna anamalamula a Waasiya aniwerya okhaliherya wunnuwa wa muhakhu, masi wiira eyo kahiyoo eniiraneya ni Xiina.
Oohimya ntoko nlikanyiho omananiha wa kuveerunu oXiina woowi awehawehe ovahiwa wa intereneete.
Ohincererya wiira milattu ikina sinrowa woonaneya oXiina sinihimya olamula elapo vanipwanelaaya
Mosampiiki: Peresitente Nyusi onilopola wiira wikhanyaanya wiireliwaka murettele

Peresitente oMosampiiki, Filipe Nyusi, ohaalopola vanceene olelo, mahiku vaneettaya 27 a mweeri wa neethanu nimosa, oMaputu, atthu ootheene ni alipa itiini wiira yiireleke mpantta wa wikhanyaanya ophaveliwaka murettele, okathi yoola onihimiwa wiira sootthuniwa soovirikana sinoowalameliha murettele wa mulaponi.

Nyusi aalavula waatthukuleliwa muthukumano wa neethanu ni mmosa ya Eparitiitu ya FRELIMO, ni oohimya wiira "nniira nivaanelaka, ni nnaaniherya wiira khanireere okela ohoolo ni wiira yela t'etthu yooreerela ya omihooli wa elapo ela", oohimya Nyusi.
Mahoolela a Exitaatu ya oMosampiiki ohuulula "kiniira kikhanyaanyaka ni ophavela murettele woohimala oMosampiiki.
Noosuwela wiira kahiyoo muteko wookhweya, ni khonikhala; ovaanela etthu yoowoopiha wuupuwela, nnya ninnikupali wiira etthu yooreera eniiraahu nivaraka".

Nyusi oottottela muraarelo okathi ole wiira olopola "atthu ootheene ni makhuru a itiini wiira ekelee munikhuruni nna voohilipelela olattuliwa ni iwarakha, woona eniphaveliwa okhuveeha okathi oniwehereriwaaya murettele".

Mulopolo wa muhooleli a Exitaatu ya oMosampiiki onikhuma okathi onihimiwa wiira sookhala sootthuniwa siniwana, kahiyoo pahi okhala wiira atthu anithaaciri mwaha wa ekhotto, masi tho mwaha wa osuwanyeya waya munikhuruni mwa epoliitika, annirikiha wiikhanyaanya w'atthu woowi eruhe murettele mulaponi.
Onihimiwa wiira makhuru khamosa-khamosa owaataana ni Frelimo wala ni RENAMO, khaniweha saana murettele woohimala.
Anamwivahererya a Ekuruxu Yooxeerya aatupheliwa Wamphula
Anihimyaniwa ni Ananmawaani okhala alipa animukawa koolyera.
Anamwivahererya a Ekuruxu Yooxeerya ya oMosampiiki Wamphula animoopopihasiwa ni olupatthiwa ni apoovu, anaahimyana okhala tanimmwarya koolyera onitholosha eporovinsiya okhuma mweeri woopacerya.

Sintoko sihimalyaawe Hermínia Silva, sakarataari porovinsiyaale a Ekuruxu Yooxeerya ya oMosampiiki, ekoothe koothe ya ovyaluwasa ni koolyera khanireere otthikiherya ottuli muruweryo ni miteko sa mmawaani.

Mweeri wanenli, nikhuru naanamwivahererya yahoomoliwa epaayiro yoowaattiwaxa ya oNamikhopo ni mukina aahoopopihiwa wookotthiwa ni apoovu okathi waaphavelaawe omuhela koloro mwiihimyeni ya maasi aniwuriwa.
Apoovu a Wamphula anihimya wiira kuveerunu onnisuwela onikhumaaya eretta ya koolyera.
Hermínia Silva oohimya, nnya, wiira wiirattela ni orattati ti enamuna yooxaka eretta.

Anamwivahererya khamosa-khamosa a Ekuruxu Yooxeerya ya oMosampiiki Wamphula yaalavulaniwe ni Nsu na w'Ameerika aahimya wiira anookhoottiheriwa ovara miteko soolokiherya ni okawa mireerelo woowi ereerihiweke maasi mmawaani.
Sintoko iyaakha ikina, amahoolela a mmawaani nave tho anoolupatthiwa mwaha wa niyoko nenna.
Mupuweleke wiira oTixitiriitu ya oLalawa, sakarataari aahiiputthiwa mpakha okhwa esumana evinre.
Mosampiiki oneetetela efexitivaale "Hip Hop ni epowesiya ya Nlamulo"
João Pereira onihimya wiira yoolakela osuweliha emutthu ni mireerelo ni oratta ni nnaari ikapwitthi.

Nikhuru na Inamuna Soowakhaliherya Anammawaani ni Othanla Mosampiiki nnuupuwelela efexitivaale "Hip Hop ni Epowesiya ya Nlamulo", ni yeeyo "amwaavano enrowa ohimyaka ni temokarasiya ele eniphavelaaya mulaponi".

João Pereira, muhooleli a Funtasawu Masc, onihimya wiira "wuukhiceryani oniphavela inamuna isyaa sinuncererya omutthu ni wiirela mpantta atthu miteko sooxuttiha miteko sa ipoliitika ni okhupaarela ihakhi" ni mwiirelo woowootola owo ohooniherya wiira onnikhaliherya.

Nvaanelo ola, Pereira nlelo onihimya wiira mpantte muulupale w'amwaavano ni athiyana khaniirela mpantta miteko sa mwaathanle ni mwiirelo ola opaceriwe oniphavela orukunuxa ovarelaka muteko oratta ni vahikhanle ikapwitthi
Nwiriyanele nvaanelo ni Pereira wa nlaka Oratta wa Nsu na w'Ameeika
Ohononeya wa ekaruma onninanariha mwaarepele a muthanlo Wamphula
Anamathanla anceene a Wamphula khaniwerya orepeliwa wiira emwiire mwaathanle a mwaakha yoola, mwaha woohononeya wa khula okathi wa ekaruma, woohimya mutthenkeso Okhaliheryana Mosampiiki.
Nikhuru nna nnoona wiira iporovinsiya sa Wamphula, oZampeeziya saakhenle ikaruma sa mwaarepele a mwaathanle soowuntta.
Iporovinsiya iya sinikha apoovu anceene oMosampiiki, ni waattamela wala opwaha imilyawu 11 wa ale ootheene oophiyerya imilhawu 28 ni nuusu ya akhali.
Moonelo awe António Mutoa, muhooleli a Okhaliherya Mosampiiki, weemeshasiwa wa ipooxito sa mwaarepele mwaha wa ohononeya wa maakina enihimya muhupi woothanya wa anamathanla.
Eyo, enoorowa okhalana nyoko nihiku na mwaathanle ni okawiya waanamathanliwa.
Owo onuupuwela wiira atthu anitthuna wiirela mpantta mwaarepele, nnya enamuna sinivaraaya muteko ikharuma khasinikhweyiherya.
"Ola kahiyoo mulattu wa makhuru a mwaathanle a mporovinsiya.
Awo aniira yikhanyaanyaka woowi ereerihe, nnya yaakhenle ikharuma soowuntta" oohimya.

Owo onnuupuxerya wiira "mitthenkeso s'atthu ohikhala a kuveerunu yaahaalopola anammutthenkasa mwathanle a nivele nuulupale woowi evahe ikaruma sooreerela ovareliwa muteko wiira sinaakwana atthu anceene, nnya khayiirale siisa iporovinsiya iya piili ni vanivirikanaaya iporovinsiya sirina anamathanla vakhaani sintoko oKaaza, muteko oneetta vooreerela".
Mutoa ootumererya wiira anammutthenkasa mwaathanle ni nikhuru na maminiixituru yuupuwele wuncarerya mahiku wiira anamathanla anceene eweryeke wiilepiha.
Mwaarepele a mwathanle ohaana amalaka mahiku yeettaa 30 ya mweeri wa neeethanu.
Mwaathanle onirowa okhala mahikhu yeetaka 15 ya mweeri wa namuloko.
Mosampiiki:Nlelo onimwiiraneya ekhirini yoowookotthiwa atthu voohihimiwa etthu.
Namatholathola a Repuupilika timanle wookotthiwa

Mosampiiki ori ni exukhuli mwaha wa ikhirini sa ephome, sihinihimiwa alipa aniira, ni mookotho wa naanaanoxa, nihiku noopacerya muteko nenla, mahiku 11, ya namatholathola Marcelino Vilanculos, aawehaweha epuruseesu yoowiiyiwa atthu, enithoonyiwaawe Danish Satar, okumihiwe w'Itaaliya mweeri wa namuloko ni miili wa mmwesana aruuhiwaka oMaputu.

Ohiya pahi wookotthiwa wa nahapari Carlos Cardozo, ikhirini ikina soowoopiha ni soolavulaxiwa, otepaxa wene okhwa wa musuweli a mihakhu Siba Siba Macuacua, ya mulipa opaka ekonxitituwisawu Giles Cistac ni ya mempuru a Nikhuru na Elapo ya Okhupaarela ni Waakiha, nleleo khahimiwe alipa wiira ikhirini iya.

Anammawaani oMosampiiki anihimya wiira aaxanka ni ikhirini sootakhala ni sihinihimiwa, etthu emwiirinhe Abdul Carimo, aari peresitente anenli wa Muthukumano wa Repuupilika ni muhooleli a Nikhuru na eTeekinika ya eRefooruma Lekaale, onnitaphulela mixankiho simpwanyaaya alipa otholathola.

Enihimya okhwa wa Namatholathola Marcelino Vilanculos, nihiku noopacerya muteko nenla, oMatoola, Poliisiya a wa Repuupilika ya oMosampiiki onihimya wiira oniira avaraka muteko vamosaru ni poliisiya a Epooma ya oMaputu, wireliwaka osuwelihiwa mwaha ola.
Vilankulo aari namatholathola vapooma ya oMaputu.
Vanaamwiira siiso, musuweli a eSosiolociya Francisco Matsinhe khanikupali wiira mwaha ola onoothokoreriwa, sintoko siiranen'yaaya ni ikhirini ikina, seyiyo othokosiwa waya ohmalihiwe.
Matsinhe onoona wiira ikhirini enamuna ela khasinihimiwa mwaha woowiira atthu aniira aakhala "atthu ooweryexa a epoliitika ni anamihakhu."
Ottottopeliwa ni waaniheriwa wa muhakhu wa Mosampiiki sihaana opixeriwa murima, anilopola alipa osuwela
Muhakhu w'oMosampiiki ahaana nlelo milattu sinceene, annihimya.

Asuweli a muhakhu khamosa-khamosa anihimya otthuneya owehiwa ni opixa murima ottottopeliwa ni waaniheriwa wiira eFuntu ya Muhakhu wa Olumwenku onipakaawe enihimya Mosampiiki, mwaha woowi muhakhu aya nlelo ahaana milattu suulupale, siniweriha wiira iye sinaaniheriwa sihiweryaneye wiireya.
Nikhuru na FMI, naahooleliwa ni Ricardo Veloso, naari naanaano oMosampiiki, khuhimya wiira, wa mahiku vakhani, muteko wa muhakhu ohaana openuwa vakhani vakhani.

Veloso oohimya wiira onaaniherya wunnuwa wa muhakhu wa mulaponi woophiyeryaka 3,5 puru sento mwaakha wa 2018, wuncarereyaka mpakha 4 wala 4,5 puru sento mwaakha wa 2019, owehereriwaka wiira inflasawu enihala enari 6,5 puru sento mwaakha ola ni wiira ekhuruwe mpakha 5.5 puru sento mwaakha onirwa.
Enihimya weteteliwa Orosamento wa Exitaatu 2019, FMI onitumererya eheliwa eporopooxita ya orosamnto ya ekeekhayi, sintoko waaniheria wa muhakhu onrowa okela ni onrowa okhuma.
Mpantta wa muhakhu onrowa okela, FMI onitumererya ottharuya othikiliwa mpooxito wa eValore Yoowuncareriwa IVA, ohiya mireerelo sootthuneyaxa.

Okathi owo, maanalixiita khamosa-khamosa anihimya wiira waaniheriwa wa okathi vaakhani wala eriyari ohaana okhalaniwa ni ephole mwaha woowi vaniweryaneya okhala itthu sinirukunuxa miyaaniheryo sootheene sinitthuna okhumelela.
Kuveerunu ni Renamo aneetetela mivaanelo voohikhala alipa olapelela
Filipe Nyusi oolaleya omala wa onamoona w'alipa olapelela a ilapo sookhopela

Peresiente oMosampiiki oolaleya enamathanu yeela, mahiku 3, opacerya wa mukhwawa musyaa wa nvaanelo wa epoliitika ni Renamo, ni onitthuneya opakiwa makhuru a muteko manli oovukuliwa ni ahaana ophavela ishawuri sa myaha ya owunnya akapwitthi ni waakheleliwa mmawaani wa asurutaato a Renamo ni omwaryamwariwa wa epoliitika.
Yoolaleyiwa yiiriwe okathi waalavulwepara elapo ottapeliwaka meera maalupale a Nihiku Namuharoyee nnuupuweliwa olelo.

Filipe Nyusi oohimya tho omala wa mukhwaha wa nvaanelo waakhaleliwe n'alipa olapelela a ilapo s'okhopela, yaawo yaaxukhurenlyaawe mwaha wookhalela epuruseesu yoottamaniha iyee sinaakawanya eriyari ya kuveerunu ni Renamo.

"Apoovu oMosampiiki aaxukhuru vanceene ni annitthapela wikhanyaanya w'alipa olapelela wiira mwaattamano wa mipantte eriyari ya Kuveerunu ni Renamo", oolokohimya Nyusi, ohimyale wiira ohaalepela ewarakha alipa olapelela aaxukhurelaka okhalela waya, vanaamwiira akupaliki wiitthaniwa, wakhala wiira vanootthuneya.
Peresitente oohimya wiira onivira alavulaka ni mukhulupale a Renamo Afonso Dhlakama, ni yoowo okalanne awe ephiro emosa ni nroromelo wa mavalo a omihooli.
Makhuru omanli a miteko anirowa ovarakasa myaha wa masurutaato ni omwaramwareya wa epoliitika, eniphavelawe Renamo.
Owo khahimyale, nnya, itthu sinceene.
Othowa wa ipakhira s'atthu ootheene ohemexa oMaputu
Poliisiya ookumiha ipikete saari mmaphironi

Nuuvira mahiku manli yahaareeryaya osarya mafalume wa mapuro anithukumaniwa ni onimalela ipakhira s'atthu ootheene vapooma ya oMaputu, ehaali yootthikela okala mwaaleyiwe enamararu yeela, mahiku mathanu.

Ekereve y'alipa ipakhira yaalakeliwe khekhumelenle, poliisiya ookhootthiha olattuliwa, nnya mapasacero anivira ewananaka mulattu ola vano otempe ovikana vale waahiyaka alipa owela ipakhira exankaleene.
Mapuro aniweliwa ipakhira osareyiwa, otepexa wene voosisu ni makaaripi ni ohaawa woovila olimalela, para atthu ale mahiku ootheene anikhanyererihiwa orowa ni otthika opooma, wiira yaphavele ephawu.
Owalamela wa kompoxitiivele onivira owoocelihaka alipa opakhira anceene orowa ovara muteko mpikatani, etthu enikhala ntoko othikileleliwa woomaaleleya onikhala ntoko khonimala.

Ipakhira s'atthu ootheene n'iye siniitthaniwa my love sikhanle ikamiyawu icikhani s'atthu omeekhaaya, nlelo siniwoopola atthu anceene ni animananiha, mahala, ophuka othowa wa ipakhira nenna va, oruye para ohala.
Nwiriyane ehapari:
Waattamela atthu imilyawu piili anihala ovoliwa etala

Nuuvira miyeeri mithanu ni micexe vaviralyaawe mwanamukhaya (Idai) Itaayi ni (Kenneth) Kenneti wa eriyari ya oMosampiiki, ohikhala yoolya yoororomeleya pooti waapwanya atthu imilyawu piili ni ikonto ikonto sene anihala owereya ni iretta wa okathi onirwa.

Mulopolo ovahiwe ni Efeterasawu Y'olumwenku ya Ekuruxu Yooxerya ni eKeresente Yooxerya, nihiku noopacerya muteko nenna, mahiku 11, wa Yoolempwa yeeyo enilopola wiira "waattamela ikonto 38 s'anamwane anihala owoottasa.

"Noosuwela wiira ihasara sinirwa khavaniweryaneya ohapuwa, nnya vanniweryaneya ovukula vakhani vakhani otakala waya nayikhanyaanya waaxuttiha atthu a mmuttettheni, nuncareryaka oratta ni ovara miteko soowirattela ni sootekiwa, sitekiwaka ipa soolipa sinirowa waakhupaarelaka ni ipheyo" onihimya Jemilah Mahmood, sakarataari-muulupale namaranttela para anamakhaliherya, yoowo ohimyale tho wiira okathi wa epula onaattamela onirowa okhala "yootutuxa yeekeekhayi ya ekumi yaanammawaani yaala, ari oovalavelaxa".
Sintoko IFRC, ovira wa mwanamukhaya yoohiya soosoma "yoowereyaxa ni soorerela" para Mosampiiki otthuneya mihakhu wiira "sivukule ohaawa w'atthu ni woopola ikumi".

"Tivoo ninaalopolaahu anamalamula, anamavaha mihakhu ni makhuru makina oolumwenku wiira evareke muteko munceene wooxaka ni ovukula ihasara s'ohoolo Mosampiiki mu," ohuncererya Muhmmod, aaluulaka, nnya, amulopolaka IFRC ovara muteko vamosaru ni mittetthe sihasuliwe wiira seeteteele okathi wa ipula, "otekiwaka tho ipa soolipa ni osarya maasi ni ipheyo, sikhaliheriwaka mittetthe ni oxaka iretta ni ekhaliheriwaka alimi waala ipyoo soolipaxa para owanana etala".
Mutthenkeso onihimya wiira ohaavaha mukhaliheryo atthu oovikana ikonto 192.
Ikonta sinihimya wiira atthu 714 ahookhwa ni akina oovikana imilyawu 2.8 ahaafetariwa ni amwanamukhaya.
Oohoneliwa ni otthipha wa ikaaxa sinikumihiwa misurukhu anivekela oliviwa
Kuverenatoore a Epanko ya oMosampiiki okhotta wihiiha ekhattera

Vanaamwiira ahireere ovihiheriwa ni mitthenkeso sinceene s'atthu oohikhala a namalamula wiira kuverenatoore a Epanko ya oMosampiiki ayihiihe ekhattera, mwaha woottipha ikaruma sa ipanko siniliva musurukhu eleterooniku, Rogério Zandamela ookhotta.

Zandamela onihimya wiira otthikiheriwa wa Reeti Simu variyari ya oliva wa epanko ya nakoso wa mpantta wa namavaha BizFirsts khiyaahiyoo eshawuri ya mpantta mmosa ni wiirela mpantta wa Epanko Yuulupale ya Elapo.
Nnya, musomi João Mosca onithonya mwaha wa yoottipha oruhela ohiroromeliwa wa epanko ni wiira ale ahononeliwe pooti oliviwa.

Khivanireerela otthuneliwa wiira elapo ekhaleke ni makhalelo ari aya, okhala wiira eniruuhela mikacamiho sinceene para apinaatamu, mekhaayaru, mumusini, mmapereesani ni wiira elapo eneene vaavaraaya miteko saya ni ilapo s'okhopela saatthuneya oliva wala waakhela mihakhu, tivo yaari etthu enikumiha ororomeliwa ni miteko sa oliva oMosampiiki", oohimya Mosca.

Wa mpantte awe analiixita Simaão Mhambi onoona ekhala "etthu eniweryaneya wiira sookhala mixikhwitti khamosa-khamosa sinithyawiha miraarelo s'atthu akina ni ahinisiveliwa, nave nihaana nuupuwelaka enamuna eniwehanaaya oMosampiiki eriyari ya ipanko sa nakoso ni epanko yuulupale".
Etthu ekina eruuhenlyaaya yootthipha sinivikana mihononelo saapwannye alipa wuurela miteko sa ipanko ni impereesa.
Ni moonelo ola, João Mosca onaakiha wiira alipa oohononeliwa eliviwe.

"Vale nyuuwo mwaahilive muteko wookopha orinaanyu ni epanko onoohelelani icuuru ni khanookohani etthu xeeni ewiirinheni muhalaka ohiliva, ni yookhumelela ela tho wakhala wiira kiliyente a epanko khasivelihiwe wa khula okathi, ookhalana ehakhi yooliviwa, vanahimiyakaru ishariya sa epanko, atthu ahaana ehakhi okoha", ohaakiha musuweli a mihakhu ole.
Zimpaapwe aaphavela ototha itthepo arumeelaka imiina siniwiiva atthu anceene
Xavier Tocoli, kumantante a poliisiya ya ePorovinsiya ya oTeete, onihimya wiira sinootikhiniwa, naanaa va, mapuro xeeni wapwanyiwe aya imiina soowaatta siisaale.

Mutthu a elapo ya oZimpaapwe ootthukiwa ni poliisiya a wa Repuupilika ya oMosampiiki akunnxeene voohikhalana eshariya siniwiiva atthu anceene imiina 32 saarowa ovareliwa muteko wuutothani woonanara ya itthepo wa eporovinsiya yeeriyari ya oTeeete.
Nuulolowana ni mulattu ola ootthukeliwa okumanto y'oTixitiriitu ya Poliisiya ya oMaakwee, oTeete, mutthu mukina a elapo ya oMosampiiki.
Xavier Tocoli, kumantante a poliisiya wa Porovinsiya ya oTeete, oolavula wiira alipa otthukiwa masivili, otikhiniwaka, nenna va, opwannya awe nummaru ninceene na imiina sootakhala.

Vanaamwiira siiso, yoosuka ya ototha Maromewu, eTixitiriitu ya nsina nenno, eporovinsiya yeeriyari ya oSofala, oMosampiiki enirwa ewehaka wuncarereya ya atothi anikhuma mittetthe soovirikana ya elapo, anceenexa anikhuma mittetthe wa eriyari ni ilapo s'anamwaattamanana, yoopopihaka inama, otepaxa wene itthove.

Wa milattu 12 sihimiwe okhuma mweeri woopacerya mpakha mweeri ovinre wa namuloko ni mmosa, ya naanaanoxa ni onihimiwa otepa oxankiha ti ole otthukiwaaya atthu 16 wa yaawo akina ta oZimpaapwe, opwanyeriwe muhina mwa yoosuka yeele.
Okathi owo, yiira yivaleeni etthove emosa.
Maputu onimutholathola mpatthani wiira amwaakihe LAM, namawehaweha onihimya wiira onikhala ntoko onwurya "axipiriina'.
Egídio Vaz onihimya wiira LAM oniphavela irefooruma suulupale

Analiixita ni musuweli a Hixitooriya Egídio Vaz onihimya wiira yoolakela ehimiwe ni kuveerunu yoomutholathola mpatthani wiira ekumihe nikhuru na Iliinya sa Misulu ya oMosampiiki (LAM) muupwatani "eshawuri enikhala ntoko axipiriina."

Moonelo awe Vaz, empereesa ele enitthuna ipittikixeryo suulupale, mwaha woowira yoopwateela otakaniha ni sookopha sihiniweryaaya oliva, sinikhoottiha oheliwa muhakhu, sintoko nthoonyeryo, othumiwa matteeke masyaa.
Nahapari oMosampiiki onihimya wiira wa mattheeke mathanu ni manli arinaawe, LAM anivara muteko mararu pahi.
Etthu eyo teniiriha opisa ni wunteyiwa wa ikwaha oniiraneyaxa wa ekumpanyiya ela nnimwiira nakoso meekhaaya mulaponi.

Muhooleli a Mwaalaano wa Osuka ni Muhakhu, Adriano maleiane, ohimya, nsana, mahiku 03, aaleelaka anamathanliwa wiira milattu iyo sinoorowa ophukiwa naanaanoru ahaari opatthani ni ekumpanyiya ya olumwenku, yeeyo ensina naya ohihimmyawe.
Opatthani onitakaniha, sintoko Maleiane, oheliwa matteeke anivara muteko wa ekumpanyiya, nnakhala oreeriha otthenkasa waya.
Vaz onoona wiia ela "esahawuri yootthuneya ya epoliitika" wiira ophukiwe naanaano va yoopwatela, mulaponi oniira weetta mukhwaha ni ntteeke, ohiya olipaxa esisapo othatunwe yootikiniha.

"Sookhala irefooruma sinceene sinirowa otthariheliwa wiira epwanyiwe wilyiha," onihimya Vaz yoowo tho onoona wiira eyo enitakaniha ni ophuka yookopha yunceenexa, oreeriha osuka ni waakusherya maturiixita woowi evirikaneke inamua sa mapasacero.
Mapasacero anceene a LAM ta impereesa.
Itthu iyo, onnitumererya, "khasiniphukiwa ni otthokiha vamosaru ya mikhwaha.
Frelimo ootthapela evalore ya Dhlakama mukhwaha wa murettele.
Sakarataari-oopacerya a eparitiitu yoowaatteliwa oniroromeliha wiira epurusee eniroa otthikela

Frelimo, epartiitu eri vakhatterani oMosampiiki, onaanihery wiira Afonso Dhlakama aarina mutthu ooreerela munkoni ya nvaanelo para murettele woohimala ni onnilaseya ni okhwa wa mahoolela a Renamo enamaxexe yela, 03, mwaha wa eretta.

Alavulaka ni anahapari oPooxito Atiminixitarativo y'oMakaloce, eTixitiriitu ya oSanka, oNiyasa, sakarataari muululupale a eparitiitu yoowaatteliwa, Roque Silva, ookupali wiira okhwa wa Dhlakama "yootutuxa" eparitiitu awe ni onilopola opixa murima wa mamosampikaano, otepaxa wene anarenaamu.

"Frelimo onoorowa omukhaliherya Renamo ovira okathi ola woorika mwaha woopweteya mahooleli awe ni ninniveleeliha musura wa mphento para amusi Dhlakama, aniira mpantta wa amusi mamosampikaano", oohimyexexa sakarataari-oopacerya, aroromelihaka wiira "epuruseesu enirowa wiiraneyaka ettharaka iphiro sooreerela, okhala wiira otthuna wa mamosampikaano olipiherya okhala vooreerene ni muruweryo.
Afonso Dhlakama okhwiiye oxaka wa namararu, mahiku yeettaka 3, oSeera ya oKoronkoosa mwaha wa eretta.
Renamo nlelo khalavunle ni roromelinhe ohimya etthu enamathanu, mahikhu yeetaaya 4.
Oruma wa ikapwitthi onnikhottiha ovolowa wa nikhuru na mwaarepele oKoronkoosa.

Ottikhelaniwa wa ikaraxuuti woonanen'ye oxaaka wa nsana, mahiku yeettaka 24, eriyari ya nikhuru na kuveerunu ni anakapwitthi a Renamo, muttetthe wa Kaasa Panana, eTixitiriitu ya oKoronkoosa, oSofala, wookhottiha opacerya ovara muteko wa nikhuru anamarepela athanu ni araru yaarowa okhala muttetthe ole wa ekhotto, okhuma nsana.

Saari sootheene soolikaneene wiira opacerye, voosiiso wa nsana muteko wa mwaarepele muttetthe wa oKanta, oKaasa Panana, oTazaronta, oVuntuuzi ni oSantunciira, oKoronkoosa, weyiwo onikhapeliwa wiira tonikhalaawe Dhlakama ni alopwana awe, yaatthuneya orepeliwa nuumala mwiiwanano eriyari ya kuveerunu ni eparitiitu yeela, waalehaniwaaya wiira mukhuru anamarepela ewerye ovolowa, voohikhala vo mafalume.

Niisiisa, ovonyaniwa itiiru woonanen'ye muttetthe wa oKaasa Panana, ohooceliha okela wa makhuru mathanu ni mararu anipwanyaneya yeemenleene vapooma ya etixitiriitu ile okhuma vapacenryaaya muteko wa mwaarepele.
Ehapari ya oruma itiiru esuweliwe voosiisu yoola pahi 25 ya mweeri waneecexe.
Infalasawu ni icuuru soowela oMosampiiki
Mosampiiki oowala mwaakha wa 2016 ni infalasawu yoothukumanyiwa ya 25,26 puru sento, ovikana etoopuru ya 2015
Ikontha sihimiwe enamanli yeela, mahiku 10, ni inxitituutu Nasiyonaale ya Exitatiixitika sinihimya wiira mweeri wa Natali, infalasawu yari 3,47 puru sento, yootepa waatta yaari oPeera, ni 6, 92.
Mwa ipooma ikina suulupale piili, Maputu aarina 2,84 puru sento ni Wamphula 2,92 puru sento
Okathi wa Natali ni wuumalani wa mwaakha, wuncareriwa wa isisapo yiirinhe, otepaxa wene, iyoolya ni soowurya.

Mwaakha wa 2016 osuweliwe ni owela isisapo wa mireerelo sootepa otthuneya ni ifatore suulupale siniruuhela owela wa mireerelo ni miteko, sintoko o INE, ahimuhimyaka compuxitiivele, enereciya ni maasi.
Mireerelo saavukunwe mweeri wa Natali saari sa ipa, maasi, enereciya ni kaaxi a okucinya.
Itaatu iyo sinihimiwa okathi epanko JP Morgan enihimya wiira icuuru sinikhanyereriwa ni alipa nakoso wiira etuphihe mihakhu sa yookopha y'oMosampiiki soovikana 26 puru sento, enamanli yeela.

Wuncareriwa iwo onikhumelela nuuvira nihiku nimosa nenno epanko valalen'yaaya ewarakha yaahimerya anamathuma yeeyo enaaniheryaaya okhala "etthu ehinaaniheryeya" wiira Maputu awerye oliva mipaantte wa sookopha sa mahiku anirwa.
Wootupheliwa tho ohitto y'oMosampiiki - ahiiviwa atthu araru ni mireerelo sinceene soopahiwa.
Sintoko yoolaleyiwa Ewarakha ya Mosampiiki, atakhali aatthikela otuphela ohitto ya oMosampiiki, otepexa wene oMiyankalewa, oTixitiriitu ya oMwiitumbe, oPorovinsiya y'oKaapo Telekaatu.
Mutuphelo wiiranen'ye mutivela, mahiku 16 ya mweeri wa namuloko ni mmosa, yoohimya yoolaleyiwa, yaahimyaka alipa woona anaathonya anawipake akhala alipa otuphela, yiirinhe okhwa atthu araru.
Ohiya atthu akhwiiye, yoolepa Ewarakha y'oMosampiiki wiira nikhuru naatakhali noopaha iparaka, mikukutta sinceene, ni etaratoore ya mmatta, ni ahiiya soolya.
Yoolepiwa ele enihimya nlelo wiira ohiyu wootheene wa mutivela ni voosiiso ya Ettiminku nikhuru naanawipake aavonyakasana ni itiiru ni Nikhuru na Waakiha ni Okhupaarela.
Aafirika oniphavela wikuxererya mihakhu sa Ilapo Soowiiraana sa Waameerika

Muthukumano Ilapo Soowiiraana sa Waameerika-Aafirika emaara yooreera wiira wikuxererya mihakhu sa ohitto w'Ameerika para ekontinente, oohimya Peresitente oMosampiiki, Filipe Nyusi, olelo, mahiku 19, oMaputu.
Nyusi oolavula okelela ohoolo, siniwananiwa ni itthu ekontinente ya Waafirika enivahaaya wiira yunnuuherye opatthanana ni Ilapo Soowiiraana.
Ottotteliwa muraarelo imaara, oohimya, onitthuneya mwaawalo munceene ohinipwanyaneya nanaano va mulaponi.
Owo ooromola Epanko Yooraala ya Waafirika aolavulaka wiira "ekontinente kherina mihakhu para sootekiwa siniphiyerya ipiliyawu 68 mpakha 108 sa itoolare sa Waameerika".
Sakarataari anenli a Nakoso a Ilapo Soowiiraana sa Waameerika, Karen Dunn Kelley, oohimya wiira etthu yooreera wiira sithukumanyiwe ikuru wiira oreerihiwe mukhalelo wa nakoso mukontinente.
"Hiiyo noosuwela wiira Kuveerunu a Ilapo Soowiiraana onniwerya ovara vanceene wiira winnuuherye woonelana vatthu impereesa ni mukhalelo woowiivaha muteko wa poovo a Waafirika", oohimya.
Kelley
Waari ni muupuwelo yoowo owo ohimyalyaawe yoowuupuwela Muthaaciri Aafirika yeeyo enireliwa omukeleliherya ohoolo nakoso ni mihakhu eriyari ya mipantte soomiili.
Nwiriyane:
Renamo onilipiha tho ipaace awmiirelaka mwaathanle
Maanalixita anihimya wiira Afonso Dhlakama ohaana akhumaka mutakhwani ni iirele mpantta muteko

Eparitiitu yuulupale nwanani a kuveerunu ya oMosampiiki, Renamo, enipwanyaneya evaraka miteko soovenyiha ipaase saya, elipelelaka wiwanana onaaniheriwa ni kuveerunu, wiira, sintoko sihimyalaawe Ivone Soares, muhooli a nikhuru na Renamo oParalamento, enootthuniherya othanliwa makuverenatoore a mporovinsiya, mwaakha wa 2019.

Makhuru a Renamo aamwareela iporovinsiya sootheeene wiira evenyihe Ikonseelyu sa Mporovinsiya sa eparitiitu, wiira, sintoko moonelo wa Maria Angelina Enoque muhooleli akhalayi a nikhuru na oParalamento ya eparitiitu yuulupale nwanani a kuveerunu, anirowa okhalana nipuro nuulupale wa miteko sa mwaathanle sinirwa.
Maria Angelina ovanre muteko oKaapu Telekaato ni Ivone Soares, muhooleli a naanaano ya Nikhuru n'oParalamento ya Renamo aari oNiyasa.
Othanliwa wa Ikonseelyu Porovinsiyaale isyaa onihimiwa mwaha woowiira murettele woohimala ori vakhiviru.

Nikhuru nikina nivanre eporovinsiya ni Epooma ya oMaputu, weyiwo, namathanliwa a Muthukumano wa Repuupilika ni namuhupi a Renamo, António Muchanga, othanliwaawe wiira eereleke mpantta ya eKonseelyu ya weyiwo.
Vanaamwiira mahoolela a Renamo, Afonso Dhlakama ahikhumelenle wookokola, Maria Angelina oohimya wiira owo oosuwela sootheene siniiraneya.
Nnya, mapuru makina anilavuliwa oniwaneliwa wiira Afonso Dhlakama aahaana aakhumaka mutakhwani, wiira aweryeke okhalela muteko ola woovenyihiwa.
Moonelo awe muhooleli a Efuntasawu MASC, Enamuna Yoowaakhaliherya Atthu ohikhala a Kuveerunu, João Pereira, nvaanelo wa epoliitika oniiraneya nenna va waahaana okelelaka ohoolo.
Mosampiiki "ephiro yuulupale" ya heroyina

Mosampiiki opakenhe ephiro enivirihiwa miritti suulupale ya soohapala/sotakha, otepexa wene heroyiina, oohimya muhooleli a Ekapineeti ya Ilapo Soowiiraana eniwanana soohapala/sootakha ni Ikhirini, oMaputu.

"Nuumala oreerihiwa wa makhalelo ovareliwa muteko nlamulo na mphareya ni nayittoko Tanzaniya ni oKeeniya, soovariwa sa naanaano va sinuupuxerya wiira muritti muulupale wa itthu sootakhala sinitumihiwa oMosampiiki," oohimya César Guedes, ohooniherya oxanka wawe ni nakoso a itthu sootakhala mulaponi.

Yoohimya ya mahoolelaa UNODC yiiraneyale oSeminaariyo ya orukunuxa ya etthu enireerela wiiriwa eniwanana ikhirini sootthokihiwa ni enitupha mikano, soohapa/sootakhala ni ekhotto, eniiraneya oMosampiiki.

Itaatu sa Ekapineeti Yuulupale ya Mwaakiho ni Owanana Itthu Soowaawa/sootakha sinihimya wiira 2012 mpakha 2016 soovariwa waattamela ikonto 27 sa ikiilu sa esuruma, itonelata 06 sa haxixe, ovikana ikiilo 1000 sa efetiriina, ikiilo 553 sa heroyiina.
Mukhulupale a Mihupi oParasiili onixukurya Mosampiiki

Miniixituru a Opatthanana ni Ilapo Sookhopela ya oParasiili, Mauro Vieira, oophiya, olelo, mahiku 30, oMosampiiki, nuumala oxukurya oKaana ni oSan Tomee ni Pirinsipe, weyiwo ororomelihaawe oxukurerya vanceene Waafirika wa mpantte wa kuveerunu oParasiili.

Vieira onirowa othukumana ni mwaaparaawe, Oldemiro Baloi, ni omuthukumanoni wooleehaniwa wantikhiwa "mireerelo sinceene sa okhovana wa ilapo soopiili, enooniherya olipiherya ni wuncererya wiwanana", eriyari ya Paraziili ni Mosampiiki.
Mukhulupale a Mihupi a oParasiili onirowa tho othukumana ni miniixituru a Mireerelo sa Vathi ni Enereciya oMosampiiki, niihoowo onrowanaawe wantikha iwarakha sookhovana.
Vieira onoothukumana tho ni mamempuru akina a kuveerunu

Okathi wa muxukuryo woomarakhariwa wantikhiwa iwarakha wiiraa sikhweyiheryeke oheliwa mihakhu ni iviixitu sa nakoso, ohiya miyaataano sa okhovana, wakhupaarela anammawaani ni mwiiwanano wa inereciya sinittikelasiwa.
Nnoopakiwa nlelo nikhuru na muteko wa ilapo soopiili wiira sisuweliheke iweryelo sa eheliwa mihakhu.
Nihiku naaweliwa ekhattera, nikhuru na ilapo sookhopela ninvekela mweemexeryo
Anamalattuliwa a mipantte soothene sa olumwenku yaahipwanyaneya oniirani yoowelihiwa ekhattera ya Peresitente Filipe Nyusi, oMaputu.

Amahoolela khamosa-khamosa a nikhuru na ilapo sa okhopela ahooniherya ni nsu nuulupale otthuna waya wuncererya opatthani, wiwanana ni ohela mihakhu oMosampiiki, nnya ahinyexexa oththuneya otthikela murettele woohimala elapo yootheene.
Murumeyi muulupale a Sakarataari-Muulupale a Ilapo Soowiiraana, Mirko Manzoni, oohimya wiira nikhuru nri noolikaneene wiira nimukhaliherye Mosampiiki muteko wa nvaanelo wiira opwanyiwe murettele.
Namuhupi a Ilapo Soowiiraana sa Waameerika, Dennis Hearne, ni namuhupi a Wankoola, José João Manuel, nave tho ahooniheryasa moonelo aya mwaha wa murettele woolipaxa oMosampiiki.
Mahiku manli vahinatti owela ekhattera Filipe Nyusi, awenle ekhattera anamathanliwa a Wasempeleya.
Mércia Viriato oopaka ethale oMosampiiki, nuumala okhala mwaavano mukhaanixa namathanliwa oorakala ene owelaka ekhattera.
Ilapo Soowiiraana anikhaliherya miteko soolima ni ipakhira sa mittetthe soohikhala sa mpooma oMosampiiki.
Maputu -

Mosampiiki ohaakhulela othanla miteko soolima ni wa ipakhira sa mittetthe sohikhala mpooma sentoko isetore suulupale sa "kompaakutu" a ipuruceeto sa muruweryo sikhaliheriwe ni "Millennium Challenge Corporation" ya kuveerunu a Ilapo Soowiiraana sa Waameerika, yoohimya empaxaata ya Wameerika oMaputu.

Sintoko sihimyalyaawe namuhupi Dennis W Hearne, "kompaato ola onirwa okathi woohela muhakhu oniphiya meelo esetore yoolima ya Mosampiiki, ekhanle enooniherya okhala etthu eniruhela muruweryo wa elapo yootheene".

Mukwaha mukina wa epuruseesu ya mwinnuwelo wa kompaakutu, sintoko sihimyalyaaya empaxaata, wuupuwela ni woona itthu xeeni siniriha opwanyiwaka muruweryo vakhaani esetore yoolima ya Mosampiiki ni owela wa ipakhira.

Ni ishawuri iya, nikhuru na muruweryo ya Kompaakutu ya Kuveerunu oMosampiiki, ahooleliwaka ni namatthokiha a mulaponi, Hgino de Marrule, onoorowa opaka iporopooxita sootthuneya wiira sooneliwe vatthu mukompaakutuni mu.

Moonelo awe muhooleli amulaponi a MCC Kennth Miller onihimya wiira oheliwa atuupu vakhani ni mimiso soohireeraxa pooti wiirihaka opwanyiwa muruweryo vakhani muulimani, yiiraka othowa ipikata mmittettheni soorakamela opooma teniriha owelihiwa isisapo sa epasaci ni ennaakhottiha imaara soorooha okhopela soolima saya.

Mwaakha wa 2008, a MCC ni Kuveerunu oMosampiiki yaahikhalana Kompaakutu a iyaakha thanu ni esisapo yoovikana imilyawu 500 ya itoolare saavareliwe miteko sa maasi, oratta, ipikata, opwanya etthaya ni olima.
Owo waathipeliwa ihimye 614 mmawaani sa iporovinsiya ya Wamphula ni oKaapu Telekaatu, weyiwo nummaru naatthu aniwurya maasi ooreera niwenlyaaya vanli.
Wamphula nlelo mooripelani
Muttetthe oniiriha mahiku 28 voohimaluuxu ni onithyawela iciratoore wiira sivareke miteko saya.

Vanaamwiira empereesa Yamaluuxu ya Mosampiiki ewenryeene ottikiherya enereciya, nihiku noopacerya muteko, 09, muttetthe wa ohitto wa elapo, vapooma ya Wamphula sookhala ipaayiro nlelo ahikhanle okokola.
Muttetthe oniiriha mahiku 28 voohimaluxu ni onithyawela iceratoore wiira sivareke miteko saya.

Sintoko atthu alavunle para Nsu na Waameerika, mikacamiho sootthikiheriwa ovarela wa maluxu wiirenen'ye mwaha woowi okathi waattimphe enereciya, anamuteko khamosa-khamosa a empereesa ahiiya ifiiyu sa maluuxu.
EDM nlelo khakhontte wala khaakhunle soohiimiwa ni apoovu.
Nnya, akhala anihimya wiira EDM onittottela muraarelo okathi wootthipa enereciya wiira oreerihe iliinya sinikawa maluuxu.
Vanaamwiira enereciya etthinkeene vakhaani, alipa ovarela muteko katteeliwe murima, mwaha woowiira enereciya ene enivahiwa kherina ekwalitaate.
Soohokolowa mikacamiho sakhalayi, othikileleya khula okathi, enaahiya makiliyente a EDM oowoova.
Etthu ela khinaaxankiha apoovu pahi, nnya otepexa wene aretta anipwanyaneya yaapaxanryeeni mmaxipiritaali.

Sintoko nlikanyiho Nsu na Waameerika nooweha olelo, 11, Hoxipiritaali Yuulupale ya Wamphula, yuulupale ya muttetthe wa ohitto wa elapo, ethikileleya enereciya imaara tthaaru, voohiphiya ekhatiri anuusu athanu n'enli.
Tivo, apoovu anikohaaya ele eniiraawe EDM "ni enereciya onnoteka omihooli."
Adina Sualehe
Mosampiiki: eTensawu poliitika enimwaafetari oheliwa mihakhu
Okathi wookiserya, Mosampiiki oniwanana otthukiwa anaattuttu khamosa-khamosa onikhottiha wiira muhakhu winnuwe sintoko iyaakha tthaaru wala icexe sivinre.
Emosa mwa iye sootthukiwa sinihimmwa ovukuwa oheliwa muhakhu onikhuma ilapo sookhopela, waakhaliherya vanceene winnuwa wa elapo.

Analiixita Tomás Rondinho onihimya wiira ovukuwa nno oniiraneya mwaha woowi anamahela muhakhu aahaleela nroromelo mulaponi, woona ehaali ya epoliitika kahiyoo yooreerela, mwaha woowiira oMosampiiki woomaka woova ni ohiroromela.

Rondinho onihimya wiira oosuwela iporoceetu sinceene siraarenle mwaha wa ekotto ela, nnya onnilakiherya wiira ohiya etthu ela sookhala milattu sinikhuma ota wa elapo sintoko okhuruwa wa isisapo sa mireerelo mmamerekaatoni sa olumwenku.
Para analiixita, opaceriwa eporoceetu ya kaaxi, onihooleliwa ni nikhuru na Waameerika Anataaruku, ohitto ya Mosampiiki, enimwaafetariwa ni itthu sinceene soowiiraana.
Manalixita khamosa-khamosa anihimya wiira ehaali ya ekhotto ni makhalelo a muhakhu moolumwenkuni satthikela okatthi munceene, Mosampiiki onoorowa ovukuwa muhakhu.
Nnya, para Rondinho etthu yootthikela ottuli muhakhu ennivileleya.
Wiira etthu ila ehinixankihe tho, musuweli a mihakho Ragendra de Sousa onilopola wiira Mosampiiki ohaana ovukula sookopha.
Ni wakhala wiira onoophaveleya wiira sipakiwe mireerelo, elepo ehaana othanla "okopha muhakhu avahaka owerya impereesa".
UNITA onihimya wiira khaakhenle sipwanyiwe sa iteexite sa makhuva a Jonas Savimbi.

Nikhuro na Elapo aneeteteela matthanka a Jonas Savimbi nlelo khiyaakhenle soopwanyiwa sa omooxitara a ADN siiriwe ni makhuva a namapattuxa a UNITA Jonas Savimbi, oohimeerya Nsu na Waameerika, namuhupi a eparitiitu, Alcides Sakala.
Nikhuru nootthikela othukumana enamanli yeela, 23, oLuwanta, "muthukumano wooleehaniwa," sintoko sihimyalyaawe Sakala,

Ovirikana sihimyalyaawe mulipa ophentela eparitiitu, owo ovekenle wiira ahihimiwe nsina nawe, "wiira ohaatthekele amahooleli," woowi nikhuru naahaakhela soopwanyiwa sa amooxitara, anihimya wiira makhuva tawawe Savimbi, Alcides Sakala anihimya wiira "khanisuwela onikhumaaya ehapari ila".

"Kinaakhenle etthu nlelo wa okulukhana," oolipiherya namuhupi, owo waakhulenle "okhala muhina mwa ehaali" ni wiira "emalakaru waakhela soopwanyiwa sa icaame iyo, onoovirikanya moolumo ni anoohimya itthu sinrowa wiiraneya wanikelela."

Niira noowihuliwa mahiyee ni okhuxiwa amooxitara a makhuva a Savimbi, wookotthiwe mukhottoni mahiku yeettaaya 22 a mweeri wanenli mwaakha wa 2002, yiiranen'ye mahiku yeettaka 31 a mweeri woopacerya, oLuyena, eporovinsiya ya Muxiko, weyiwo waavithiwe awe.

Amooxitara arowaniwe olaporatooriyo oPurutukaale ni Waafirika ya Okuusini, nave tho Wankoola, ni vaawehrreriwa wiira soopwanyiwa sinrowa wiira silikanneene wa okathi wa isumana piili, ehikhumelenle mpakha va.
Ovithiwa wawe omarakhariwe wiiriwa oLopitanka, eporovinsiya ya oPiyee, weyiwe mirutthu saamusaawe sinimumulaaya.
Mamosampikaano aahaleela muteko mmikotini sa Waafirika ya Okuusini
Alipa okunya oMosampiiki anunlaseya ni anivaha miruku wiira yoonelaneke vatthu.

Mamosampikaano oophiyeryaka 1000 ahanle woomoliwa muteko mmikotini sa palatina mwaha woovarelaka muteko ittikitti soowisuweliha sa Waafirika ya Okuusini ni akina imiya thanu natthaaru ahoomoliwa miteko sa ikumpanyiya khamosa-khamosa, wa miyeeri mithanu ni mmosa sa mwaakha ola, mwaha wa ekirise ya efaapirika enithipa maluku.

Nikhuru na Mwaalaano wa Muteko ya oMosampiiki, Muteko ni Nvarelelo Waanammawaani a Waafirika ya Okuusini onisikula woopopihiwa woomoliwa mamosampikaano 1000, anivarela muteko ittikitti sa Waafirika ya Okuusi ni akina 800 yoomoliwe muteko, ni onihimya wiira kiivo ekhanlyaawe oowiira.
Mwaalaano onaavaha pahi miruku anamuteko wiira eroweke owaani yavareleke muteko iyee axunttyaaya wiira evareke miteko soomeekhaaya.
Esisapo ya ephaawu enoowela oMosampiiki okhuma meelo
Ephaawu onoorowa owela 15 puru sento oMosampiiki okhuma enamathanu yeela, nihuku noopacerya na mweeri waneethanu ni mmosa.
Nikhuru Naanamapaka Iphaawu ninhimya wiira yuncareriwe mwaha woowi siroowela isisapo sa mireerelo sinipakaniwaaya.
Ephaawu eyoolya yootthuneyaxa wa khula nihiku para mpantte muulupale wa mamosampikaano oophiyeryka imilyawu 26.
Ni, okhuma enamathanu yeela, enirowa otepa olipa esisapo.

Peresitente a Nikhuru Nanamapaka Iphaawu ya Mosampiiki, Victor Miguel, oohimya para Nsu na Waameerika wiira "anamapaka iphaaawu yaanimananiha oweliha esisapo ya ephaawu, nnya alipa okunya yaamukhoottiha owela esisapo okathi wootheene.
Vanaamwiira siiso, anamapaka iphaawu anihimya wiira anikhala ni ophunyiwa.
Wa ishariya sinceene, isisapo sa itthu sinipakaniwaaya soowela ni nakoso oohiya ovaha maakha, ni sookhala ipatiriiya siwaliwe mikhora ni yoomoliwe anamuteko.

Wa sootheene iyo, Miguel onihimya wiira owelihiwa onaaniheriwa enamathanu ila khonitthikeya ni oohimyexexa akhala "esisapo eniweryaneya ni yooreerela, wuncareriwa wiiriwe siwehiwaka ilemelelo sa khula ephaawu.
Mamosampikaano ahaatthikiherya masuuli afiriaano
Atthu owikokotta ni aatuphela mukukutta ni mamosampikaano yaaothyawenle Waafirika ya Okuusini aatthika.

Mikukutta miili sa namapakhira Translux a Waafirika ya Okusini sootupheliwa olelo, mahiku vaneettaaya 17, ni atthu oohisuweliwa oTixitiriitu ya oMuwampa, okuusini ya Mosampiiki, ni atthu oophiheryaka 50, yayikokontte ni miyaalo, ikatana ni mipottolo.
Ekhuwelasaka "mamosampikaano mutthikase," alipa otuphela yaahittiyelela mikukutta ni yaahimpwexa para-pirisa.
Poliisiya oMosampiiki aahaakhula ni ookhottiha wiira mapasacero etupheliwe, ohiya woopopihasiwa.
Mwaha wa etthu iyo, eri otthikiha isikula wa otupheliwa wa mamosampikaano Waafirika ya Okusini, empereesa Translux eheemexa mikwaha saya para ilapo piili.
Wa mpantta mukina, Sasol oolakela waattikiha masuuli afirikaano 340 yaavara muteko Inyampaane nuumala ashirikhaaya mamosampikaano wiisooniherya, nsana, mahiku 16, ewananaka okhala waya mulaponi.
Ekumpanyiya ya kompoxitiivel yoolaleya nave wiira enimweemexa miteko saya wa okathi vakhani oMosampiiki.
Kuveerunu oMosampiiki oopacerya nsana waatthikiha atthu awe aniphavela othama Waafirika ya Okuusini.
Nikhuru noopacerya na mamosampikaano 107, mwa yaawo 22 anamwane, aaphiya oxaaka ola, okampo para athyawi ya oPowani, Eporovinsiya ya oMaputu.

Sintoko mulipa ihapari a Nsu na Waameerika onivara Waafirika ya Okuusini, mamosampikaano 600 aaphavelasa voothyawela, wa mahiku ookiserya ala, mmasenturu anaakheliwa atthu oovelavela a muttetthe wa oTaarpan.

Poliisiya a Waafirika ya Okuusini ohoopa olelo ipaala sa mphira ni ekaranaata wiira amwamwarexe nikhuru na anamurwi a Waafirika yayikokontte ni miyaalo, epaayiro yoohononeya ya Xuwanexipuuruku, oohimya mulipa okumiha ilatarato a Reuters.
Mosampiiki ni Purutukaale anisoma mukhaliheryo wa enereciya
Sakarataari a Exitaado ya oPurutukaale ori oMaputu
Porutukaale ni Mosampiiki aniphavela okhalihana

Isumana vakhaani pahi nuumala waakhela Eparaaxi ya Cahora Paasa, Mosampiiki onoovaanela vasyaa ni Porutukaale ophavelaka okhalihana musetoreni ya enereciya. Amahoolela a enereciya a makuveeruni a oLixipowa ni oMaputu aalopola wiira sipakiwe miiyiraano para oheliwa mihakhu eriyari ya impereesa sa ilapo soopiili.

Olavulaka oMaputu waatthukuleliwa esiminaariyo "Mosampiiki, Porutukaale apatthani para enereciya," sakarataari a Exitaatu ya oPorutukaale, Artur Trindade, oolavula wiira sihaana omwaramwariwa "onthamwene wiira mwinnuwelo wa iporoceeto sa mipantte soomiili."

Sakarataari a Exitaatu ya Enereciya oohimya wiira "opwaha wooreerela," ekhumelenle ni otumihiwa, mweeri waneecexe, sa miteko sootheene Hitoroyeleetirika ya Kahora Paasa saari sawawe Porutukaale, "soohula mikhora suulupale wiira opatthani wooreerela ni para okhalihana wootepexa eriyari ya ilapo piili" musetoreni ya enereciya. Namuhupi oPorutukaale kharuuhale iporopooxita sa mihakhu sinirowa eheliwa masi okhalihana ni Porutukaale wa estore ela onnoniwa okhala wooreera ni Mosampiiki mwaha wa iporoceeto siri mmatatani ya exitaatu ya oMosampiiki. Miniixituru oMosampiiki a Enereciya, Salvador Namburete, oohimya oweryaneya okhalihana eriyari ya ilapo iya piili: "Mosampiiki ni Porutukaale aakhala osuwela wunceene wa enereciya, yeeyo ekhanle etthu yooreera ni eniruuhela muraarelo mipantte soomiili," oohimya namalamula a oMaputu.
N'tumpuluuku onivela ophareya ya oKatempe
eKooperativa na wixuttiha ampiyentaale N'tumpuluuku aniira, olelo, 14 ya mweeri wa 11, ekampaanya yoovela oKatempe, mpantte mukina wa epaya ya oMaputu.

António Pereira, mmosa a memempuru anamapattuxa a ekooperativa, oohimeerya Nsu na Waameerika wiira ekampaanya eri muhina mwa "operasawu kaako," enireliwa oleelihiwa apoovu okhala mapuro ooreera ni anipwanyiha ekumi.
Pereira oohimya wiira "N'tumpuluuku" oniphavela wakhaliherya atthu orukunuxa enamuna aneettihaaya ikokhola.
Okathi ola va, oMaputu "ahaleela omutthu, aahiya inamuna sootheene soohiya itthu sooreereene (...) ni yootepa onanara okhala wiira naanaanoro anirowa ophareya weyiwo anirihelaaya ikarafa.
Ni operasawu kaako, N'tumpuluuku oniphavela okhaliherya orukunuxa makhalelo.
Ikampaanya sinivarela muteko areeti sosiyaale, olaleya ni iviitiyo ni maleya wiira yaalattule atthu ni waahimeerya mihupo.
Pereira onitumererya irixiku ikaaku sirinaaya.
"Kaako eviituru yoopweya yaamukhani, eniira okathi oniveliwa eniliyaliwa," nnya ela "tenaawulaliha atthu anceene."
Erineene mahoolela aya ampiyentaliixita Carlos Serra Jr., nikhu N'tumpuluuku nipakiwe mwaakha ovinre.
Nrina mamempuru 07, ootheene aya oowivahererya.

Wa okathi vakhaani vanikhalaaya, ekooperativa yoopaka ikampaanya soolakiherya ophareya ya okooxita tu Soole, Miratooru, oXayi-Xaayi ni opaayiro ya oMafalaala, yiirelaka mpantta atthu waattamela ikonto thanu.
N'tumpuluuku onnivekeliwa ni iporovinsiya ikina wiira avare miteko soolikana.
Orooromela onikhala eriyari ya mamempuru a N'tumpuluku.
"Ninwehererya okhaliherya orukunuxiwa makhalelo," oohimya Pereira.
Nave tho etthu yootteliha murima mwaha woowi alipa okunya, onihooleliwa ni Mwaalaano wa Etthaya, Nipuru ni Opwalaha Wanammawaani, aapacerya waahukhumu atthu ale animwarexela ikokhola mpironi.
Ole ontthuna opwanyiwa amwarexaka ikokhola mapuro oohireerela onrowa ovahiwa muluta wa ikonto piili sa imetikaale, oniphiyerya itoolare 50 sa Waameerika, waattamela mulivelo wootepexa oyeva.
Pereira onnikupali wiira "mutthu owo, esumana ekina khanrowa tho otthuna otthikela orihela ikokhola vathi."
Sihaavo ikanyero ya waakuvihiwa ekoothe koothe wa muxukuryo wa Nyusi oZampeeziya
Onihimiwa wiira okathi owo waalavulaawe, Nyusi khahimyale etthu yoololowana ni ekhotto eniwoopopiha apoovu ya oKaapu Telekaatu, okhuma miyeeri miraru sookhiserya sa mwaakha wa 2017
Peresitente a oMosampiiki, Filipe Nyusi, onipwanyaneya oZampeeziya ahimyaka wiira oniwehaweha opakiwa wa eporokaraama ya iyaakha thanu ya Kuveerunu 2015-19
Wa itixitiriitu sa oNamaroyi ni oMolumpu, sintoko nthoonyryo, Nyusi ohiwa mikacamiho s'apoovu sinihimya othowa muteko, othumiwa wa mireerelo sa mmatta, othowa murettele oKaapu Telekaatu, ni sikina.
Onihimiwa wiira okathi owo waalavulaawe, Nyusi khahimyale etthu yoololowana ni ekhotto eniwoopopiha apoovu ya oKaapu Telekaatu, okhuma miyeeri miraru sookhiserya sa mwaakha wa 2017
Ohiya ovaanela ni apoovu, Nyusi oothukumana ni amahoolela aweyiwo a Frelimu, eparitiitu awe, oniiriha waaniheriwa wiira anittottela muraarelo mikwaha sa exitaatu wiira ophuka myaha sa eparitiitu.
Mosampiiki onimweetetela okathi ola va mwaathanle a munisiipiyo onirowa wiiraneya mweeri wa namuloko.
Wavira mwaakha mmosa onirowa okhala mwaathanle muulupale.
Nwiriyane myaha suulupale sa muxukuryo wa Nyusi wa nsu na nahapari William Mapote.
Onnucerereya owananiwa oliviwa sookophiwa nvite nvite ni Exitaatu ya oMosampiiki
Eparitiitu Yoowilamula ya Mosampiiki eninvekela mwaathanle ohinatthi mahiku alakeliwe

Esenturu ya Intekiritaate Puupilika (CIP) enivira elaleyaka owanana oliviwa wa sookophiwa nvite nvite wa mamosampikaano, okathi ene yoola alipa epoliitika akina vaniwanelaaya opakiwa mwaathanle anamalamula vahinatthi ophiya okhathi olakeliwaawe wiiriwa wiira epakiwe eParalamento enitthuna owanana ni mulattu ola ni oreherya nlamulo na mwaathanle nootheene.

Eniihaniwa "Miyo nkinliva sookophiwa soowipithihiwa," ekampaanya eniireliwa, ohiya waawopa anammawaani otepexa wene mureti sosiyaaleni, okawa maleya ni opaka iviitiyo sinitumererya ohiliva wa iyee siniitthaniwa sookophiwa nvite nvite.
Nihiku noopacerya muteko nenna, mahiku 21, poliisiya oorukurerya eseti ya CIP ni ohaaruma orula atthu yaawanre maleya, ni khukuxa.

Moonelo awe CIP, etthu yiirinhe ti iyee sinihimiwa mwaha wa othokosasiwa oniiriwa ni alipa eshariya a ohitto w'Ameerika mwaha wa epuruseesu yiirinhe otthukeliwa wa mahoolela a Mwaalaano wa Muhakhu, Manuel Chang, waanayitthoko Waafirika ya Okuusini.

Makhuru manceene a epoliitika ni makhuru ohikhala a kuveerunu nave annisooniherya eewananaka oliviwa sookophiwa sa impereesa PoroIntikuxi, MAM ni Ematu woona, wawehaxaxa wa mpantta wa muhkhu, Mosampiiki onipwanyaneya enamuna yoorika.

Vanaamwiira siiso, mahoolela a eParitiitu Yoowilamula ya Mosampiiki (PIMO), Yaqub Sibindy, onaaniherya wiira ekampaanya eniwanana oliviwa sookopha soohixariya etthu yuulupale, nnya siniphaveleya miteko sikina.

Okathi ola va vanitthuneya okhala, voowaakuveya, mwaathanle owaakuvihiwa oMosampiiki, wiira epakiwe eParalamento yoophuka ni opakiwa Kuveerunu Owiiraana a Mulaponi, onitthula waakhulela nlamulo nintthuniherya owanana oratteene wiiya nno opwatinhe muhakhu, oohimya mulipa epoliitika ole.
Sintoko muhooleli a PIMO, ni otthukeliwa wa muhooleli akhalayi a Mwaalaano wa Muhakhu, Manuel Chang, Waafirika ya Okuusini "owerya wootheene, otepexa wene wa anamalamula, siri soohiroromeleya".

Onihimiwa wiira CIP onikhanyererya ohiiya voowaakuveya ottokihaiwa wa sookophiwa voohileeliwa empa ya nlamulo oonaka wiira sookhala ikanyeryo sonooniherya wiira sookophiwa iyo sipakiwe voohittareleliwa nlamulo.
Minixituru a w'Interiyoore ohaakhulela otupheliwa wa Anataaruku nnya khalavunle wiiviwa atthu anihimiwa n'alipa ihapari.

Miniixituru a w'Interiyoore a oMosampiiki, Basílio Monteiro, ohakhulela otupheliwa wa ikaravaana sa empereesa ya Waameerika Anataaruku ni ohimya wiira "alopwana acexe oowikokotta ni ikapwitthi" aatthukweliwa, nnya khalavunle okhwa wa mutthu mmosa ohimiwe ni ekompanyiya.

Monteiro ohaahimeerya anahapari nihiku noopacerya muteko nenna, 22, wiira sihiiriwa mituphelo miraru mmuttettheni, ni wiira mmosa a seyiyo, oMatapata, mikukutta sa Anataaruku saavira mapuro awo sihoopeliwa ni "anamuteko anli awulalihiwa" ni atthu anli anikhala muttetthe ole.

Nikhuru na Waakiha ni Okhupaarela, ohuncererya miniixituru, "ahaana mulayihano wiira elipiheherye mmaaleleyo ni withyaala wa anammawaani" ni, "otepexa wene ororomeliha wiira impereesa sootheene sinivara muttetthe ole, mapuro a patarooya ni mapuro owaattamela anrowa wikhanyaanya nikhuru mipantte sa FDS wiira elipiherye waakiha mixaxa sootheene mapuro a miteko sa impereesa sa patarooya ni soowaattamela," okathi onirwa.

Basílio Monteiro khaalavunle onookhwa, nnya Anataaruku ohaakhulela wiira namuteko mmosa a empereesa ya oPorutukaale Gabriel Couto ohookotthiwa ni akina athanu ni mmosa aawulalihasiwa wa mutuphelo yoowo.
Acensiya AFP animuhimya nahapari amuttetthe ole wiira namuteko okhwiiye oroohitiwa, ehapari ehinweryaahu waakhulela.

Nnya, olelo, anammuhimeerya Nsu na Waameerika aahimya wiira mutuphelo musya wa atakhali ohiiriwa muttetthe wa oMatapata yaathyawinhe akhali ehiyaka ipa saya ni ephavelaka voowipitheya wa mittetthe sikina sa eporovinsiya yeele.
Amusi ootheene anithyawela ephiro enirowa w'Afunci.
Ofalume Woowiiraana onithokosa ipanko sivanhe "sookophiwa soowiipitheya" oMosampiiki

Alipa Okunya a Makhalelo a Mihakhu sa Ofalume Woowiiraana woopacerya omuthokosa (Credit Suisse ni VTB Bank) Kereetitu Suwiise ni ePanko ya VTB mwaha wa sookophiwa soovikana ekonto ya imilyawu sa itoolare, okopihaaya empereesa y'atthu ootheene oMosampiiki, Ematu.

The Wall Street Jounal (WSJ) Ejoronale ya Waameerika yoohimya wiira namawehaweha a mihakhu wa Ofalume Woowiiraana oniphavela osuwela wakhala wiira ipanko iye soovonyola nlamulo nnikhanyereriha soohimya sootheene ni seekeekhayi sa otthokihiwa empereesa y'atthu ootheene ya oMosampiiki.

Vanikhumaaya mithokoso aakhala alipa okopiha musurukhu anihimya wiira khiyaahimeeriwe mwaha wa sookophiwa saakhanle mpakha nihiku naattokasiwa tho iye sinikhanyererihiwa, khukopihiwaka ehileeliwe sootheene sinitthuneya.

WST onilepa wiira anakoso anihimiwa aatepanya sookophiwa soophiyeryaka imilyawu 622 sa itoolare wiireliwa othumiwa ikaruma sa masurutaato ni imilyawu 535 sa itoolare para exitaleero yaanaviyu, ni tho imilyawu 850 sa itoolare saakopheliwa wiira sithumiwe ikaruma para omutthatta atum.

Vanaamwiira siiso, ennipwaherya ejoronaale ya Waameerika yoopakeliwa ophuka myaha sa mihakhu ni osuka, mpantte wa musurukhu munceene wiireliwa othumiwa ikaruma sa omutthattela atum oroohapuxiwa wiira sithumiwe ikaruma sa masurutaato, sintoko itukumento sa mihakhu sisuwelihiwe ni kuveerunu oMosampiiki.
Kereetitu Suwise ni namalamula a Ofalume Woowiiraana aakhottasa olavula, wiiraka mutthu oosuwanyeya a ePanko ya VTB yoohimya wiira kiyaasuwenle etthu ya othokosasiwa.

Mweeri wa neecexe, kuveerunu mosampikaano oohimya wiira mmuthukumanoni ya ePirimaveera ya eFuntu ya Muhakhu Woolumwenku, oWaashintoni, wiira yahikopiha "soowipitheya" esisapo yoovikana ekonto ya imilyawu sa itoolare

Nuuttharelana, eFuntu ya Muhakhu wa Olumwenk, ePanko ya Olumwnku, Ofalume Woowiiraana ni nikhuru na G-14, nikhuru na ilapo sinivaha mukhaliheryo wa muhakhu wa mulaponi, aheemexa okhalihana waya ni Maputu.
Ilapo Soowiiraana, namakhaliherya muulupale a Mosampiiki, soohimya akhala suupuwelaka tho okhalihana ni Kuveerunu oMaputu.
Kuveerunu oniphavela okumiha sookophiwa sa PoroIntiku ya erexiponsapilitaate ya Exitaatu.
Mosampiiki omphavela inamuna sookanselari ikarantiya sa kuveerunu soopere sookophiwa ni empereesa ya exitaatu ya PoroIntiku, mpantte wa okwathula wa "sookophiwa soowipitheya."
Muupuwelo ohimyaxaxiwe olelo, mahiku 13, ni miniixituru-oopacerya, Carlos Agostinho do Rosário, omuthukumanoni ni anamathanliya, oMaputu.
Eshawuri yoolehana, oohimya, ehaana okhala ele enivulusha otthuna wa elapo.

Ni siiso, owo ohupuxerya, yoolikhana ni mwiirelo opakiwe ni ePorokutoriya Yuulupale ya Repuupilika hoothe ni etiripunaale ya oLonterexi, eniireliwa waanulariwa sookophiwa ni PoroIntiku saakhuleliwe oliviwa ni kuveerunu.
Empereesa ela yaakhenle waattamela wala ovikana imilyawu 600 sa itoolare, seyiyo moonelo awe namalamula khasinireerela omorela mukoofirini yaatthu otheene.
PoroIntiku aahooleliwa ni António Carlos do Rosário, nenna va otthukweliwe, oMaputu.

Soopere esisapo yaakhuleliwe mwa nsina na EMATUM ni MAM, namalamula khanuupuwela ohiliva, wa naanaano va, ni, avirikanyaka ovihiheriwa ni atthu oohikhala a kuveerunu, onhimya wiira onirowa oleehana paahi, aphavelaka inamuna soowoopola sinitthuna elapo.
Mosampiiki:Yoovahiwa ya imilyawu 688 sa itoolare para orosamento wa 2012
Sooruuhiwa para orosamento yuulupale ya Exitaatu ya mwaakha onirwa, imilyawu 688,8 sa itoolare.

Ilapo 19, ePanko ya Olumwenku ni ePanko afirikaano ya Muruweryo sihaakhulela, oMaputu, mwiiwanano wiiria oruuhiwe musuruku para orosamento yuulupale ya Exitaatu ya Mosampiiki, mwaakha onirwa, imilyawu 688,8 sa itoolare.

Mwiiwanano ni ale aniitthaniwa Apatthani Amukhaliheryo wa Soottokihiwa sa Namalamula wantikhiwe okathi wa niira n'atthu ootheene nenno niirenlyaawe mpantte Mahooleli a Mwaalaano wa Mihakhu oMosampiiki ni mahoolelo aanamihupi. Mukhaliheryo wa makhuro a ilapo sa okhopela oniireliwa okhaliherya ohela muhakhu oMosampiiki ni sookhala soovirikana sihilaleyiwale.

Nnya, tiyoosuweliwa n'atthu ootheene wiira alipa okhaliherya oosuwanyeyaxa, sintoko Wiraana w'Ewuroopa ni Ilapo Soowiiraana, annimphunya kuveerunu oMosampiiki wiira okuxeriwe ekeekhayi orosamento. Alipa okhaliherya anivekela mikhora soowaliwa sene wooniherya oratteene ovarela muteko musurukhu w'atthu ootheene, ottittimiha orattheene ihakhi s'apinaatamu, temokarasiya owooneya waalamuliwaka elapo, wiira okhaleke ovaaneleya, wiira ohikhaleke onyokhana wa atthu, sintoko ovukula wintiriviri wa Frelimo mmiyaalaanomo sa Exitaatu, ele awanani a namalamula enunlelaaya wiira Exitaatu emwalanxiwe ni eparitiitu.
Dos Santos vasyaa oXipaanya
Mukwaha wanenli mwaakha ola ni muxukuryo waneecexe woomeekhawe okhuma mwaakha wa 2013.
Namalamula khanihimya oratteene
Alipa okunya a Wankoola nlelo khahimyale oratteene wa muxukuryo mukina tho wa Peresitente José Eduardo dos Santos oXipaanya.
Dos Santos ovennye Mutivela vahaawehereriwa arowaka oXipaanya, mukwaha "woomeekhaawe," wanenli eyaakha ela arowaka elapo ela ya Ewuroopa.
Khavahimiwe oratteene wa nipuro peresitente nimakalyaawe oXipaanya ni exeeni enimwiiriha muxukuryo "woomeekhaawe."
Okathi ovinre peresitente ahikhala pele meenuxi imaara icexe oPareseloona, mukwaha wookiserya wa seyiyo waari mweeri wa neethanu ni miili wa eyaakha yeela.
Muxukuryo woopacerya wa peresitente oPareselona wiiranen'ye 2013, eyaakha waarowalyaawe imaara piili.
Mukwaha mmosa wa mixukuryo iyo aahipisa isumana thanu ni emosa khuruha exukhuli mwaha wa ehaali ya ekumi ya mukhulupale a Exitaatu.
Eyo yahiruuhela exukhuli mwaha wa ekumi ya peresitente ni iparitiitu siniwananaawe sahiphiya okhathi owo sivekelaka wiira ohimyakasiwe orattene etthu enimukhaliha okathi munceene oXipaanya.
Mwaakha yoowo tho muhooli ahirila mukhwaha wanenli arowaka epooma ele wa okathi wa isumana tthaaru ni nuusu.

Namalamula a Wankoola ahivaanyiha amanaka etthirima wiira peresitente arimwaapaxari okiliinika ya ya oPareceloona, asikulaka okathi owo "enamuna yoolosowela ni ohikhalana erexiponsapilitaate" ya ehapari elaleyiwale ni Raatiyo Televisawu oPorutukaale.
Mwaakha wa 2014 Peresitente a Wankoola aari vasya oPareceloona wa muxukuryo musya "woomeekaawe"
ONU oothikilela miteko oMalawi mwaha wa mavampiiru
Ewarakha ya Ilapo Soowiiraana enirwa oMosampiiki.
Pele meenuxi atthu athanu ahookotthiwa naanaanoxa Okuusini ya oMalawi, nuumala oohimyaniwa okhala ntoko vampiira.
Peresitente Peter Mutharika oovekela othokosiwa mwaha wa anookhwa ni ohoopiwa muxiini wookilaathiwa mmawaani ni Namalamula woowi oxakiwe wookotthiwa atthu akina.
Mwiwanano wa Ilapo Soowiiraana ohaakumiha anamuteko a itixitiritu piili nuumala woothiwa mwaha wa mavampiru omwareela okuusini ya elapo.
Atthu yiiviwe yaahimyaniwa owurya ephome y'atthu sintoko mpantte meera a okhwiri.
Muxiini wookilathi onikhoottiha weetta ekhatiri ya iwoora muloko - ovenya 07h:00 mpakha 17h:00 ya elapo ele.
Ephattu ya Mosampiiki
Wa Ewarakha elaleyiwale, ONU onihimya wiira woothiwa wa okhala ovampiiru onikhala ntoko epattunwe oMosampiiki, "atuphaka" mukano orowa itixitiriitu sa oMulanje ni Phalompe, oMalawi.
Ewarakha enihimyaxaxa wiira kinisuweliwa etthu xeeni yiirinhe woothiwa iwo ni yooruma "weemexiwa miteko sa ONU muttetthe owo mpakha ehaali olula."
Elapo emosa ya iyee sootepa osikhini moolumwenkuni, oMalawi aakhala makhuru aapinaatamu ni acensiya a ilapo s'okhopela.
Makhalelo oosoma nave tho khareere okhala vathi, waamini okhwiri etthu eniiraneyaxa ni woothiwa okhala ovampiiru waattelaxa.
Epuruma puruma yoololowana ni soowoothiwa soolikana seyiya yaahikhumelela mulaponi eyaakha ya 2002.
Mamosampikaano anivaanyiha mphimo wa "ikonto tthaaru sa irantti" wiira ovoluwiwe Waafirika ya Okuusini
Apoovu oResanu Karasiya yaahittiya ikhatiri sookhiserya mukano ni Waafirika ya Okuusini, yiirelaka okhoottiha ovolowa mikukutta oMosampiiki

Sintoko nipuro "eFoolya y'oMaputu" apoovu anipwanyaneya evaanyihaka mphimo onaakhanyereriha mamosampikaano aneetta mukwaha para Waafirika ya Okuusini okhalana, sooyeva, ikonto tthaaru sa irantti (waattamela itoolare 280 sa Waameerika) wala exitaraato ya opanko yanaanaano ekhalanne esisapo eyo
Okhuma nsana mphimo ola vanaaruhelaaya muxankiho atthu anceene aneettamikwaha apwanyiwe ni mututuxeryo.
Ola kahiyoo mukwaha woopacerya alipa okunya a Waafirika ya Okuusini anipakaaya miphimo ntoko seyiya voohilopola.

Wuupuweliweke wiira nlelo mwaakha yoola mphimo mmosa mmosa wapakiwe waari okhoottihiwa ovolowa wa mutthu oMosampiiki voohikhalana pasapoorote piyomeetiriku, mwaha waaphukiwe nuuvira okathi munceene ni waatthunen'ye ophuka wa kuveerunu mosampikaano.
Mosampiiki oohaeela owanana ekhotto yoomalamliha makhwankwa, anihimya maanaliixita
Maanalixita anihimya wiira mwaha wa makhwankwa ovolowa mmwaalaanoni ya okhupaarela Exitaatu enihimya wiira Mosampiiki oohaleela owanana etthu ila.

Juriixita Tomás Vieira Mário onihimya wiira okathi miloko sa anamuteko anivara miyaalano sa okhupaarela Exitaatu enatthukiwa, vanihimya wiira Mosampiiki makhwankwa anihiya okhala etthu yoonanara, ni khayakupaliwa okhala mweettelo wa Exitaatu yeeyo.
Esumana yeela, Porovetoore a Exariya, Isac Chande, oohimya wiira otthukiwa wa miniixitara akhalayi oMosampiiki a Muteko ni namuhupi a Wankoola, Helena Taipo, onihimya omala ohittharuxiwa oMosampiiki.

"Hiyo nakhalana alipa amahoolela aalupale sintoko Miteko sa Ihapari sa eExitaatu mukhatteya, nakhalana miloko s'anamuteko a Miteko sa Mikarasawu ekaxariwaka, nakhalana miloko s'anamuteko Miteko sa Elapo ya Othokosa Ikhirini, vanihimya wiira nirina makhalelo anikhupaareliwa Exitaatu enikhala ni woopiha", oolipiherya Vieira.
Sintoko juriixita ole, "naweha makhalelo ala, miyo kinoona wiira yiiyo noohaleela ekhotto yoowanana makhwankwa, ni ela yoohela Mosampiiki nipuro nootepa woopiha, ntoko Exitaatu".
"NIhana oteka Exitaatu mosampikaano, yoolipa" oolaphela Tomás Vieira de Mário.
Nwiiwelele:
Isisapo soowela Inyampaani
Atthu anikhala anihimya wiira khanisuwela yoowiira woowi yikhalihe.
Atthu anikhala epooma ya turiximu ya inyampaani, okuusini ya Mosampiiki anunlaseya owela wa ehaali ni khanoona yoowiira.
Emerekaato yuulupale ya epooma ya Inyampaani, Nsu na Waameerika nuulavula ni anamatumiha anceene ahimyale wiira wuncareriwa wa isisapo mwaha woowela mapuro anithumaaya.
Kuverenatoore a eporovinsiya Daniel Chapo onihimya okhala ixariya sinceene siniiriha mulattu woowalamela ehaali.
Emosa mwa itthu siniiriha mwaha wa oruwerya vakhaani ya elapo ahu.
Chapo onithoonya nave tho mulattu wa ikhotto, nya onthipelela wiira ohaana oruwerya vanceeneni wiira atthu ehihaleele nroromelo noowiira mahiku ooreera annirwa.
Renamo oolipula ekaritela yuulupale onirowa waforomari mafalume para mmaporovinsiya
Ekaritela-yuulupale enikha oMorumpaala.
Renamo oolaleya enamacexe yeela, mahiku 3, otthukuliwa nsana ekarirtela yuulupale otixitiriitu ya oMorumpaala, eporovinsiya ya oZampeeziya.

Mmuthukumanoni w'anahapari, oMaputu, namuhupi a eparitiitu António Muchanga ohimya wiira mafalume anirowa ovara mmaporovinsiya weyiwo Renamo oniphavelaawe olamula anirowa osomihiwaka ekaritela-yuulupale yeeyo.
Muchanga anihimya wiira oMorumpaala weyiwo Renamo oniphavelaawe opakaka makereka ya waakiha ni okhupaarela iporovinsiya sinrowaawe olamula.

Vanaamwiira mikwaha iya sithikilenleene mivaanelo ni akhottaleene olattuliwa ni Muhoolelia Elapo wiira ovaaneliwe eriyari ya Nyusi ni mahoolela awe, Afonso Dhlakama, Renamo onikhanyererya wiira nvaanelo ontepenteri Kuveerunu.

Ohuliwa wa ekaritela esya wiiranen'ye nihiku nenno, nanenli na mweeri wa neethanu ni icexe, nihiku namalepa iliivuru oMosampiiki, Mia Couto, omuloponlyaawe kuveerunu ni Renamo wiira ehiyee waavarela muteko apoovu sintoko etthuvo ya ekhotto.
Eduardo dos Santos muhooleli oniphenteliwa ni atthu vakhaanixa a Waafirika
Peresitente Armando Guebuza ori nipuro na 14o ni okhalana nnema noowaakhuleliwa.
Ekumpanyiya ya ohotta Gallup enihimya wiira peresitente a Wankoola, José Eduardo dos Santos mahoolela oniphenteliwa ni atthu vakhaani Waafirika supusahariyaana.
Ohotta opaceriwe mmweesana wa ilapo 34 sa Waafirika supusahariyaana onihimya wiira 16 puru sento paahi ya mamkolaano annakhulela ovara wawe muteko José Eduardo dos Santos.
78 puru sento aakhotta evarelo awe peresitente ori vakhatterani ovira iyaakha 32. Enihimya ohoolela wa elapo okathi wootheene kuveerunu a wankoola kharina nuulumo nooreera.

Nave tho 16 puru sento anaakhulela ohoolela ya elapo. Mosampiiki elapo ekina ya Waafirika ya nttaava na ekunya weyiwo Gallup omuhotta mahoolela, Armando Guebuza onipwanyaneya nipuro 14o enihimya waakhuleliwa. Sintoko ekompanyiya ya ohotta 68 puru sento ya mamosampikaano annakhulela ohoolela wa Guebuza yiraka 31 puru sento aakotta.
Niivele noowaakhuleliwa ya ohoolela wa elapo yootheene yooyeva makhani, okhala wiira 66 puru sento aawaakhulela amahoolela aya.
Sintoko Gallup mahoolela ootepa ophenteliwa ni apoovu ti peresitente oPurunti, Pierre Nkurunziza.
89 puru sento ya atthu a elapo awe annaakhulela enamuna enihoolelawe elapo.
Mamosampikaani aneeteteela oviriha mwaakha ni otuphela eyaakha esya vowisumaaliha mwaha wa ekirise
Ophareya pooti okhala yoothyawela yookhweya.
Nikhuru na Hoteeli ni ipa sinimakiwa sa vapooma yuulupale y'oMosampiiki siniphavelasiwa vakhaani ni makiliyente aniphavela oviriha omala wa eyaakha ni otuphela mwaakha musya.
Othowa wa musurukhu onoonaneya mulaponi toniiriha othowa athumi ekuxererinhe mapuro a eturiiximu ni ipa sinimakiwa sithanlalyaaya wiira ifeexita sowisuumaaliha.

"Olikaniha ni iyaaka sivinre, olikanihaka ni othupa e ovolowa wa iyaakha 2015/2016 noowehaokhuruwa wa sootumiha, okathi ene yoola nnilavula omakhiwa mpakha 60 puru sento ni noohala 40 puru sento nnaaniherya okheliwa mpakha enamathanu,"oohimya Jaime Bila, mahooleli oKaya Kwanka, elamaleliwe okhalana ifeexita soowaaluwa okathi wooviriha mwaakha.
Bila oohimyexexa ohuncareriwa wa isisapo woona "atthu khaniwerya othuma.

Woowi evirikanyiwe erixiko yoomaka atthu vakhaani, ipa s'aletto sa niivele naneecexe ni naneethanu sithanlale opaka meera masikhaani wiira exake ohonona musurukhu ni weeteteela, sintoko sihimmyaawe mulipa waapeya Carlos graça, a Hoteeli Cardoso.
