Omuthukumanoni wa Ettiminku evinre, oKoronkoosa, peresitente a elapo ahu, Filipe Jacinto Nyusi ni muhooleli a RENAMO, Afonso Dhlakama, aaleehana wa ikwaha sinirwa wa nvaanelo wa murettele, aniwehereryasaya omaliha mpakha wuumalani wa mwaakha.
Ni murettele elapo enoowerya wunnunwa ni opwalaha, ohimya Pittman, oManika.
Namuhupi a w'Ameerika ovaraka oMosampiiki, Dean Pittman, oolipiherya, Enamararu, 17, muxankiho ni wuncerereya owanawana mulaponi.
Ni murettele elapo enoowerya wunnunwa ni othaaciri, okhala wiira ni owanawana nno apoovu tanihaawa, ohimya Pittman, nuumala othukumana ni muhooleli a ePorovinsiya ya oManika, Alberto Mondlane.
Omuthukumanoni, namuhupi a w'Ameerika ahilokoha mwaha wa ehaali ya ekhotto muttetthe ole ni mwaha wa ovaaneliwa eriyari ya kuveerunu ni RENAMO.
"Noororomela wiira nvaanelo onoorowa ophuka milattu" ohimya Dean Pittman, ohoolihaka wiira namalamula awe oniira owiriyanelaka mweettelo wa epurama-pura.
Manika Eporovinsiya emosa mwa iye sihireere wuukhuliwa ni oruma wa ikapwitthi oMosampiiki.
PR aahimya itthu okathi wapaceriwa otthapeliwa iyaakha miloko micexe okhuma vaavale elapo vapwannyaaya murettele
Mosampiiki ahikhaleke ni woova ekhotto, ohimya olelo Peresitente Filipe Nyusi, okathi waalavulawe vaavo otthukulenlyawe otthapeliwa nihiku na miloko micese ya Woopowa wa Elapo.
Wupuweleliwa Woopowa wa Elapo.

Alavulaka Epooma ya oMuweta, sintoko mananna wuupuwela ni otthapela mukhwaha woopacerya wa alipa oowana ekhotto ya Frelimo mulaponi, ehinatthi opaceriwa owaniwa ekhotto Yoowoopowa, Nyusi ohihimyexexa wiira otthuna w'atthu oothene toniwooniherya mamosampikaano sintoko apoovu oowiiraana.
"Nimphavela okhalaka ni murettele, wittyaala ni voohoova yootakhala," oolipiherya mukhulupale a Exitaatu ya Mosampiiki, ovaanyihale woopopihiwa ya epuruma-puruma enoonaneya mulaponi.

Iyaakha iya soothene ninsomihiwa wiira kinivoo nipuro woowi mamosampikaano okawanyeye, woowi waanyokha asinna, wiira niwehaneke sintoko awanani, khuuvo okathi woowi nikhuru na mamosampikaano ewoopopiheke asinnaya," ohimya Nyusi, ovekenle wiira "wiraana okhaleke kapwitthi ooromeleya ni ootthuneya wiira niweryeke othaaciri sintoko epoovu, woona owiraana ninrowa okhala oolipaxa.
Vaniirani, wahipattihiwa Muthuko Woowiraana ya Elapo, onirowa ivira iporovinsiya 11 sa elapo mpakha 25 na Junto, nihiku na Woopowa wa Elapo.

Nikhuru na Temokarasiya ya oMosampiiki, MDM, khanihimmye nlelo ehapari enihimya wiira peresitente Daviz Simango oottukuleliwa mutivela ohiyu para exiripitale ya w'Afirika y'Okuusini, mulattu wa eretta yootutuxerya.
Kivanisuweliwa oratteene mwaha wa eretta ya muhooli a eparitiitu eri nipuro naneeraru wunnuwa ya Mosampiiki ni omalelinhe iyaakha 57 nihiku 07 na Fevereero nivinre.
Anamakhaliherya anli akhotta olavula ehapari ela.
Daviz Simango nave-tho peresitente a oKaamara Munisipaale ya oBeera, epooma eri nipuro nanenli wunnuwa waha ya elapo.
Owo oyariwe oTanzaniya, mwaana anamaranttela a peresitente a FRELIMO, okathi w'ekotto ya Woopowa, Urias Simango.
Urias Simango ni amwaarawe Celine arimwiiviwa wa nihiku nihinsuweliwa, mwaakha wa 1979, okhatteya waatthukeliwaaha, Ohittoo wa Elapo.
Yoosommwa ya Epanko ya Olumwenku nihimya wiira atthu imilhawu 15 anikha ni etoolare emosa ni isentaavo miloko mithanu ni ecexe.

Epanko ya Olumwenku ehimmye Ettiminko yeela, mahiku yeettaaya manli, wiira 60 porucento ya mamosampikaano anikhala ni osikhini wootepaxa ni ori nipuro nanamuloko wa ilapo sirina atthu asikhini anceene moolumwenkuni.

Ewarakha, yoopacerya wa sinceene sinrowa olepiwa, ovenyerya naanaano va, sihimyaka mammeru a osikhini ni oraala wa olumwenku ihinmye wiira imilhawu 15 sa mamosampikaano anikhala ni voohiphiyerya ni etoolare emosa ni isentaavo 90 wa khula nihiku.

Nikhuru na ilapo sootepaxa osikhini sinihooleliwa ni eRepuupilika ya oSenturu ya w'Afirika ni waattamela 80%, viiraka nikhuru na ilapo soowaattana atthu anikhala ni muhakhu woohiphiya 1,9 ya etoolare wa nihikuni ti Intiya, ni imilyawu 224.

Vanaamwiira ovikana erihari ya atthu oovalavela ekhalaka okathi ola va w'Afirika Supu-Sahariyaana, ilapo icexe mwa iye soowaatta asikhini kahiyoo sa muttetthe ola, masi aayo ti sa w'Intiya, oXiina, w'Intoneesiya ni oPanklateexi.

oSan Tomee ni Pirincipe, Peresitente a Elapo ohaana vano omuliva mutthu ihinmye wiira apahuleliwa mwaha wootumihiwa mpantte wa etthaya yaari yawawe. Mulattu woopixiwa otiripunaali SuperemU ni khuxinttiwa Peresitente Fradique de Mineses okhanle oovaanela ni wiiwanana ni namatthekeliwa António Assunsão dos Anjos. Epuruseesu ekhumale wattamela iyaakha muloko ni yaamanle oTiripunaali Superemo nuumala peresitente ohaleela exariya mukwaha woopacerya. Mulattu ola onihimya mpantte wa mathala etekiwe ipa sa nakoso sa Vila Mariya ya Nikhuru Pexitaana ya oPorutukaale. Mathala awo yaatumiheriwe nikhuru ni peresitente oSan Tomee yoowo onihimyaniwa wiira khaaxukurenrye waahimeriwaawe wiira mpantte mukina wa mathala ele yaari a mutthu mukina, ohiya amusi yaamutumihenrye. Peresitente ahixanka ni yoohimiwa ni Etiripunaale ahimyaka wiira Assunsão dos Anjos ahaana omurowana oTiripunaali mulipa oomutumiherya mathala voohittharihela nlamulo ni khaapwannye nikanyero nnakhala vakaani nnihimya wiira etthaya ele khiyaahiyo ya namatumiya.
Yaahivaanele ni miyo empa kinoohalana, ohimya owo woowi A Voz da América (Nsu na w'Ameerika). Nwiriyane ehapari ya Óscar Medeiros.
Teputaato a waporovinsiya a RENAMO ohiviwa Wamphula ni alopwana yaari ni akapwitthi

Empaawe Murevete enikhala waattamela imeeturu miloko miraru mpakha opoosito ya mafalume a oMwaatala, w'Epooma ya Wamphula, nnya, sintoko sihimmyaaya amusaa, vanaamwiira onvekelo okhaliheriwa waakhuliwe nuuvira ikhatiri thanu ni emosa.
Amusaawe ahikhupanherya ni mavarelo aya muteko mafalume ni anihimya ni anikupaleela wiira okhwa wa Murevete wiiraneyale mwaha wa olupatthiwa mapuliitiku aninvaanyiha kuveerunu.
Mahoolela a Hosipiratale Yuulupale ya Wamphula Bainabo Sahal ohaakhulela ovolowa wa mutthu owoopeliwa, ohiyu wa enamaxexe.
Okathi ola va ninwehererya otthuniheriwa ni mafalume aniweha weha ikirini (PIC) wiira nithokoseke murutthu.
Namuhupi a puliisiya a Wamphula, Zacarias Nacute, ohimya wiira epuliisiya yookhalana mithoonyeryo sa ekhirini ni oororomeliha othokosa woowi ohimye ni everiwe anasusuki awo.
Vanaamwiira VOA ahireere wiikhanyaanya wiira omwiiwe RENAMO, ola okhotta ohimya etthu.
Sinoovira iyaakha sinceene woowi oPeera otekiwe vasya, oohimya mahoolela a mwaalano wa muteko wa oMunisiipiyu

Makhulupale a Emunisiipiyo ya oPeera, emosa mwa iye sihireere wuukhuliwa ni mwanamukhaya (Idai) Itaayi aviraka Mosampiiki, aakupali ovira ekhalaka ni "ehasara yuulupale" aalopola wiira Epooma sinoovira iyaakha sinceene woowi epoma etthike saaryaya.

Avaanelaka ni VOA, José Manuel Moisés, Mahoolela a Mwaalano wa muteko wa Munisiipiyu ya oPeera, wiirale khivaniweryaneya walakeliwa isisapo, nnya khanihoverya wiira sinrowa akhala soowaattaxa, ni, munisiipiyu mekhawe, khaniwerya opaka etthu.
Peera epooma emosa ya oMosampiiki enikhala vathi vathi olikanela ni eniivele ya maasi a mphareya ni mukuthe kuthe muulupalexa okhuma khalayi okhupaarela ephareya, mwaha wa mulattu woothipeya etthaya.

Mwaakha ovirale, mahoolela a oPeera, Diviz Simango, alavulihiwaka ni VOA, ahihimya wiira, wiira munisiipiyu omalamaliha okhuleya etthaya y'opareya, onitthuneya waattamela wala ovikana imilhawu imiya thanu ni emosa ya itoolare sa w'Ameerika.
Mahiku ala va, isisapo iyo pooti soovirikana, okhala wiira, ni soohonona sipakalyaawe Idai, onaanihereya wiira onitthuneya tho munceene.
Etthu yootthuneyaxa va opwanya muhakhu woowi nikhupaarele ephareya, okhala wiira mpantte ya exiri khireere ohononiwa ni mwanamukhaya.
Waahiiraneyeru siiso, muhooli José Manuel Moisés onilopola wiira akhumelela (Idai) Itaayi, oPeera "pooti oveliwa ni okumihiwa mmaaphani ya elapo.
Soohononiwa nlelo sinimwaalakeliwa ni Ekonseelyu ya Munisiipiyu.
Musuwele saana wa nlaka mwanamukhaya (Idai) Itaayi
Yooveha ni olupatthana yoomoomoliha muhooleli a (Credit Suisse) Ekereetitu Suwiise
Epanko Kereetitu Suwise yoohimiwa, esumsna evinre, okhuma wa muhooleli Tidjane Thiam, mwaha woohimyaniwa waalupattha axirikha awe a oPanko ni mamempuru a (Nikhuru na Greenpeace) Nikhuru Kirimpiise.

A AFP, ethonyaka ehapari y'opanko, nlepa wiira Tidjane Thiam, orina iyaakha 57, oniphiya omahooleli, mahiku vanrowaaya weettaka 14 ya mweeri wanenli, nuumala ohimiwa soophureliwa sa mwaakha otheene ya Epanko.

Credit Suisse epwannye maxakha numala ohimeeriwa wiira Igbal Khan, muhooleli akhalayi onisuka mihakhu sa ilapo sa okhopela sa epanko, yaarimwetteleliwa wala owehereriwa nuumala okhuma wahaaniheriwa wa mukhulupale anikhuru wiira avareke ni nwanani UBS.
wuumalani wa esumana evinre, ejoronaale SontagsZeitungg yoohimya wiira nikhuru na ekolocia Greenpeace niheetteleliwa.
Apaceryakaru muteko, Thiam ovenyenrye apaka ipalano sa kula enamuna woowi winnuuherye ni othokiheryasa mihakhu sa epanko ya nakoso.
Muupuwele wiira Credit Suisse yookopiha mpantta wa musrukhu opattunxe etthu yoonanaraxa ya sookophiwa soovithiwa oMosampiiki.
Amahooleli aya akina akhalayi anihimyaniwa makhwankwa ni Ilapo Soowiirana.

(Fundo Monetário Internacional) Efuntu Monetaariyo y'Olumwenku enaaniherya wiira wuncareriwa isisapo ya kompoxitiivele ehimiwe ni kuveerunu oMosampiiki, esuma evirale, sintoko etthu "yuulupale mwa enama" wa miteko sinipakiwa woowi etthokihasiwe esetore ya komoxitiivele.
FMI oolakiherya nwarakhani wiira owela wa isisapo sa compoxitiivele :oniireliwa amalamalihiwa ovahiwa mukhaliheryo woolipa ni ohinphiyerya vanceene.
sinoonelaawe FMI, isisapo sa kompoxitivele oMosampiiki sikhala sookhuruwa ovirikana esisapo yeekhweeli sinitumihiwaawe imerekaato sa ilapo s'anamwaattamanana.

FMI onuupuxerya wiira etthu ela ekhumelenle ni vapaceriwaaya ovahiwa mukhaliheryo alipa omutumiha compoxitiivele ni enivirikana eriyari ya esisapo ettokihiwe woowi otumiheriwa atthu ni esisapo enikumihaniwaawe.
Yaawaasalatari atthu yaarumeela akapwitthi.
Mukhwaha ola omalenle ni ovariwa w'anasusukhi, mafalume aawerya ahaapwanya-tho akapwitthi anli, sintoko AK47 ni pexitoola ni ikaraxuuti 11.
Makhuru oomanli aatakhali yaavara miteko saya yiwananasaka ni ovarakasiwa waya yiiraneyale mwaha woohimiwa ni anammawaani.
Aniira mpantta wa nikhuru na atakhali, purusoore onivara Etixitiritu ya oMoxinkwaale ni namalipelela ekhatteya.
Wuupuweliwe wiira mafalume a elapo ahu anirwa iyaakha iya sookhiserya yincereryaka waalopola anammawaani wiira ala ekhaliheryeke owanana ikhirini yaahimyaka atakhali.
Niisiiso, muteko ola woowincereriwa olopoliwa atthu, onnikumiha muraarelo.

Asuweli a mihakhu oMosampiiki anikhanyererya osuwanyeya wala wooneyaxa wa impereesa iye 40 soopwateela ni sinrowa ottharuwa okhala s'atthu ootheene, silaleyiwale ni kuveerunu, sintoko mpantta woowikhanyaanya woowi sivukuliwe mikuthekuthe sa othowa mihakhu.
Miloko miili mwa iyoo, otakaniha ele yaapaka ipenewu Mabor, sinrowa otumihiwa mpakha wuumalani wa mwaakha yoola.
Musuweli ole ohimya wiira "otumiha voohooneya ni voohikhala makhwankwa waarowa omukhweyiherya Exitaatu, ni ohiya wintthelelaka musurukhu, masi aarowa oliviwaka mpoosito.
Onihimiwa wiira, nenna va, mpantte wa impereesa sa Exitaatu ya Mosampiiki erina impereesa 13 s'atthu ootheene, 109 sootakanihiwa ni 2 sa Exitaatu.
Woonexexa, ootheene iya sihaana milattu suulupale sootthokiha.

Minixituru akhalayi a oMosampiiki a Mwaalano wa Ipakhira ni Ilavulelo, Paulo Zucula, onimala ohimyaniwa ni Ekapineeti Yuulupale ya Owanana Makhwankwa, ya ikhirini sooliva soohipwanela ni musurukhu wa Exitaatu.

Sintoko epuruseesu 85/GCCC/13-IP, ethonyiwe ni anahapari oMaputu, Zucula ahitthuniherya, mwaakha wa 2009, malivelo ya sooliviwa soovikana imilhawu piili sa metikaale, eliviwaka anamuteko aalupale a w'Inxitituutu ya Aviyasawu Sivile ya Mosampiiki.

Mukhwaha yoowo, aahimyaniwa tho Teresa Jeremias, Lucrécia Celeste Ndeve ni Amélia Abílio Delane, yaari atiminixitaratoore, mahoolela muulupalexa ni mahoolela a mpantte wa muhakhu, woottharelana, mwaalaano ole.
Woowi musurukhu, onihimiwa wiira awo wantikha ixeeke yoothereryaka ohooleliha oliva isalaariyo.
Misurukhu iyo kisaattikihiwe tho.

Wuupaceryani wa mwaakha ola ePorokurayoriya-Yuulupale ya Repuupilika hoohimya wiira Zukula ari mmosa anamahimyaniwa ya mixikhwiitti sa makhwankwa waathumiwaya matteeke a empereesa ya oParasiili (Embraer) Emparayeri ni LAM.
Zukula, osomme Miteko Soolima, aari tho Muhooleli Anayili wa Mwaalaano w'Olima, namuteko a Ilapo Soowiraana sa w'Ameerika ni mahoolela muulupalexa a Inxitituutu Nasionaale ya Ihasara s'Ephattu.

Puliisiya oMosampiiki anihimya wiira ehaali ya mmaaleleyo, mukhupaarelo ni winttyaaleya w'anammawaani a Eporovinsiya ya oKaapu Telekaato ori mureeri, nnya para anamawehaweha akina anihimya wiira moonelo ola woorakamela ni ekeekhayi eniiraneya wa eporovinsiya ele.

Namuhupi a oKumanto Porovinsiyaale a Poliisiya a oKaapu Telekaato, Augusto Guta ohimya wiira "mukhalelo wa okhupaareliwa wa eporovinsiya ori woorera woona Ikuru sa Okhupaarela ni Olipelela aniira evara muteko muulupale ni vohooceya woowi otthikiheriwe mmaaleleyo mukhupaarelo w'atthu otheene.

Wa mpantta awe, muhooleli a (Centro de Integridade Pública) eSenturu ya Intekiritaate Puupilika (CIP), Edson Cortêz, onihimya! wiira khanisuwela eniwiiriha amahoolela a kuveerunu yaahimyaka wiira ehaali oKaapo Telekaato eri salama, okhathi ene yoola va onihimiwaaya ekhotto khwaaci mahiku otheene, ohiya wiira, ekhotto ela kheniweryaneya ophukiwa ni ikapwitthi.
Miniixituru a w'Ankoola a Opatthani n'Ilapo sa Okhopela oopaverya oxukurya Mosampiiki

Minixituru a Opatthani n'Ilapo Sookhopela a w'Ankoola ohaakhulela wiira ilapo iya piili sahaana sipakaka etthu vanceene aniivele ya okhaliheryana ni oolakiherya wiira ovonhya nno eniiriha olosowa wa mipantte soomili.

Okathi waalavulawe naalipa ihapari oMaputu, nuumala ovaanela ni Minixituru Oopacerya a Mosampiiki, Gerges Chikoti wiirale vannitthuneya osuwela "wiira ilapo sookhana ikaruma sa sowiiwana, nnya, yuulupale mwa enama okeliherya ohoolo opatthanana.

Chikoti ohimya wiira Mosampiiki ni Ankoola aniphavela wunnuherya opatthanana ni mavalo eriyari ya ilapo iya khivanireerela okhala mulattu no oothoonya sintoko kaakuveleni isetore sa enereciya, olima ni turicimu.

Hiyo nrina nttaava nimosa ni estooriya ni etthu ela yaahana okhala etthu enivaha Ikuru," ahihimya mukhulupale a oLuwanta, ncereryaka wiira vanireerela wiira anamuhakhu a w'Ankoola ni oMosampiiki ethukumaneke imaara sinceene.
Namuhupi a mahooleli a RENAMO ootthukweliwa aahimyaniwa otetheererya epuruma-puruma.
António Muchanga ootthukiwa mpaani mwa operesitensiya ya Repuupilika nuumala wiira mpantta wa Nikhuru na Anamiruku a Olamulela Elapo Ahu.
oMosampiiki, namuhupi a mahooleli a RENAMO António Muchanga otthukiwa, olelo, okhumaka omuthukumanoni ya Nikhuru na Anamiruku a Olamulela Elapo Ahu ni onihimyaniwa otetheererya epuruma-puruma.

Otthukiwa wa António Muchanga ovekeliwe no Eporokuratoriya-Yuulupale ya Repuupilika enimuhimyana namuhupi a Afonso Dhlakama oolavula itthu sinitharamula ekhotto ya RENAMO elapo yoothene, otepexa wene wa eriyari ya Eporovinsiya ya oSofala.
Atthu oovilkana miloko miili ohhokhwa ni aawulala (masurutaato ni masivili ohittheka etthu ni itthu sinceene soohononeya, mwwha wa epuruma-puruma yeela.

António Muchanga wiirale mpantta nimmalele a Nikhuru na Anamiruku a Olamulela Elapo Ahu yiireliwa ovaaneliwa mwaha wa soolamula, muhakhu ni Sá mmawaani sa mulaponi ni ovekela malihiwa epewe ya namuhupi a Afonso Dhlakama, ori mempuru a Nikhuru na Anamiruku a Olamulela Elapo Ahu.
Nnya, Lole ohimya wiira Afonso Dhlakama oroomaala ni onaawiriyana mamempuru awe etthu xeeni yoowiira.
Akina anaahimeerya, nnya, wiira otthukiwa wa António Muchanga khanirowa waamaliha akapwitthi aatoropa a RENAMO.
Imiya imiya sene sa mamosampikaano aakhumasa, olelo, khurowa mpikatani para owanela myaha sootepexa waaxankiha ni sikhanle tisinlavulasiwa mahiku ene ala va.
sookophiwa s'atthu otheene, ikhirini ni epuruma-pruma tikhanle myaha siniwananiwa.

okathi woophiyeryaka ewoora emosa aamararaxari mmaphironi ya oMaputo, ewhaxaxiwaka ni mafalume oowinkiya ene, ekunxeene ewarakha enihimya maalumo onithoonya, sintoko ala: "yookophiwa ela khaninliva" e "Emalihiwe ekhotto."
Peresitente a Repuupilika, eparalamento ni ale aniphuka milattu waatthuneya evareke muteko ni vanirerelaya, yaaroyihaka otiripunale alipa okopa musurukhu ole onitthaniwa sookophiwa soowipitheya.
Nuuvira ewoora emosa waahimala wisooniherya, waaniheriwaka ni owehereriwaka wiira enookhumelela yooreerela.
Ananakoso aalupale, anamithukumano, anamalokoha, alipa itiini, ni yanla yanla, enittottela muraarelo mwiiwanano eneetta.

Atthu a w'Ankoola ni a Mosampiiki aniphavela oweha weha marakaato, wunnuwiherya mivaanele sa impereesa, nakoso wala winvexitiri wa ilapo soopiili sinirowa okhalanaka aviixitu voowaakuveyaxa ni ovolowa wa okathi woophiyeryaka miyeeri miraru wa khula miyeeri mithanu ni mmosa.
Iviixitu sinirowa opakiwaka okathi wa mahiku mathanu, sintoko mwiiwanano wookhweyiherya iviixitu siniiraneya okhuma mahiku 30 a mweeri wa neethanu.
Anawin'ye a mbahari: Ekalawa ya oMosampiiki vano eri oSomaaliya
Alipa aneettiha ekalawa akumi, masi nlelo khanatthi olavulana ni Mosampiiki wala oXipaanya.

Ekalawa (Vega 5) Veeka elakasenhe oMosampiiki, epareya ya oSofala, eri mmaasini ya oSomaaliya, ni anawiiye, ohimya oMaputo Miniixituru anenli oMosampiiki a Miteko Soomiserya, Gabriel Muthisse. Sintoko miniixituru ananli, alipa weettiha ekalaw, ootheene aya akumi.
Koolera oowiiva atthu athanu oMosampiiki
Aakhala atthu 870 oomurava koolera oNiyasa, Wamphula ni oCampeeciya.
Iporovinsiya sa oMosampiiki sa oNiyasa, Wamphula ni oZampeeciya sookeleliwa ni eretta ya koolera owiivale atthu athanu ni akina oovikana 870 amuranve.
Mosampiiki ori nenna va okathi onirupa epula, yoosuweliwa okhala okathi onimwareelaya ele enireliwa eretta ya matata onanara.
Mahooleli oororomeliha wiira inamuna sootheene sooxaka siniira sittokihiwaka, nnya onnivaha ephoole wiira ohimiwa itthu soowothiwa sinihimya wiira koolera eretta enikawiwa ni alipa okunya.
Para Nazira Abdula, ohimiwa itthu soowoothiwa etthu eniiriha woowi mwaaxiitthu atepeke ototholana.
Mosampiiki ahikhala wa iyaakha soowaattamela muloko ni ithanu sivinre ehasara ya koolera enuupuweliwa mpakha va ni yaahiwiva atthu imiya imiya sene, epooma ya oMaputo pahi.
Voottharela ni epitemiya, elapo ahu yaahimootola mwaakha wa 2006 mwaapomphe oniwanana koolera, yoonaneyale okhala yooreerela ovikana 90%, masi, kiyaakhuleliwe ni OMS.
Mosampiiki: "Ohitalana" tiwaari mwaha waalavulaxiwa wuumalelani wa olaleyiwa mwaathanle
Anamwiilepiha okhala peresitente a Mosampiiki aniwala ekothekothe eroromelihaka ompaka kuveerunu aathhu ootheene.
Wuumalelani wa ekoothekoothe, Afonso Dhlakama oruuye Okusini wa elapo, wenno wahaashikhashikhaawe okathi wootheene waamulaleyaawe mwaathanle.
Filipe Nyusi, namayilepiha a Frelimo oronwe Ohitto wa elapo, oKilimaani ni Wamphula, mittetthe sinlipanaawe namawanana a kuveerunu.
Daviz Simango a MDM ahanle mmuttettheni iniisonawe otthuniwa, variyari wa elapo.
Mwaha waalavuliwa ni waari ohithalana, ni Dhlakama ni Nyusi eroromelihasaka wiira mpantta attthu ootheene wa makuveerunu aha sa.
Yookophiwa ya imetikaale 50 ahakuxereriha okhwa atthu acese oMossampii
Mwaavano a iyaakha 23 oopattiha mooro vampani nuumala onyakulihan ni mwaneene empa.
Ehapari ela ehimiwe oMaputo ni namuhupi a eKumanto Geraale ya Poliisiya ya Repuupilika ya Mosampiik (PRM) okathi wiiriwaaya epalansa ya esuma, vohihimya nihiku.
Inacio Dina ohimya wiira mmiravo olakenle opattiha mooronuumala onykulihana ni mwaneene empa mwha wa yookophiwa ya imetikaale 50, waattamela isentaavo 55 sa itoolare.
Namuhupi a poliisiya khahimyaxanxe oratteene mwaha wa etiivita ela ni onyakulihaniwa nno, nnya ohimya wiira mwaavano owo onipwanyaneya atthukweliweene.
Mamosampikaano arina impereesa anunlaseya othowa wookopha musurukhu
Athiyana ananakoso ophiyeryaka 700 anivaanela makhalelo a impereesa sikhaani ni savariyari oMaputo.
Athiyana ananakoso anunlaseya waatta mikuthekuthe para okophihiwa musurukhu opanko oMosampiiki, okathi wiiriwa eFoorum Yoopacerya emperesariyaale y'Athiyana (PME).
Muthukumano wa mahiku mararu opacenrye olelo oMaputo ni onathukumanya mamperesariya a elapo yootheene.

Ninmalele oniireliwa, wuupaceryani, wooniherya miteko sineettihiwa ni mamperesaariya athiyana ni ale anooniherya okhalana akhili ni ikuru soowiivaha muteko, poti okhala foromale wala inforomale wa muhakhu.
Khasireere myha sinivaaneliwa, masi mulattu muulupale woorikiheriwa okophasa musurukhu w'opanko ni okhaliheriwa tori mwaha w'athiyana alipa nakoso.

Eulalia Nhatitima, a eForum y'Athiyana Mamperesaariya (PME) yoohimya osuwela tho wiira sookhala mixankiho, mmosa mwa iya eforomasawu, nnya oolopola wiira ipanko sihaana waxukurerya athiyana, woona ala ohooniherya wiira anniweryasa.

Aakhulaka, Katia Meng, muhooli a Ekoophiri y'Osuka ya Muthiyana, nikhuru naamukhaani nnikopiha musurukhu, nnikhala oMaputo, ohimya wiira nakoso onnikelela ohoolo ni wiira makiliyente awe, oowaattela, atthu arina muhakhu vakhaani animwiira nakoso ootuimihasa vapooma yuulupale y'elapo ahu.
Yoohuliwa 2013, Ekoophiri y'Osuka ya Muthiyana yookhalana makiliyente waattamela 1000 ni vanixela animuncerereya
Meng ohimya tho wiira yoolakela ya nikhuru naamukhaani ninkopiha musurukhu ninhoolelaawe okhanyererya owoonela vatthu anammawani oovalavela, iiraka icuuro vakhani.
Alipa ohimya ihapari anitumererya owananiwa epewe waanamalepa
Epooma yuulupale ya Mosampiik, evennye niwunla enamathanu yeela, mahiku 28, mwaha woowookotthiwa Paulo Machava, mulipa ohimya ihapari oosuwanyeya.
Saari ikaraxuuti icexe soopiwe sa kapwitthi enamuna AK 47 seiyo voosiisu ya enamathanu yeela simaalinhe nsu na mmosa aanamuhupi oosuwelasiwa a Mosampiiki.
Paulo Machava, ayisuwelaxinhe ni raatiyo, ni nuumala khuvara wuulepani, wookotthiwe ni atakhali oohisuweliwa, okathi wiiraawe ecinaastiika mmaphironi ya Epooma ya oMaputo.
Mafalume ahimya wiira aapacerya okohakoha, nnya khahimwale oratteene.
Wookotthiwa wa Machava ni mphuko omarakhariwe para nihuku noopacerya moteko nnirwa sinooniwa ntoko etthu enoopopiha miteko sa alipa Ihapari ni Exitaatu y'Ihakhi oMosampiiki.
Ewarakha enihimya "okeela ohoolo nvaaneliyo woowi murettele ohinimala.

Namuhupi a Ilapo Soowiira onivara oMaputo oottottopela wuncareriwa mahiku yiiwananiwe ohiruma ikapwitthi ahimiwe enamanli ela, mahiku vaneettaya 03, ni peresitente a Renamo ni ohooniherya nroromelo wiira onoopwanyiwa murettele woohimala oMosampiiki.

"Ohoolela woominyala wooniheriwe ni mukhulupale a elapo, Filipe Nyusi ni muhooleli a Renamo, Afonso Dhlakama, evahaka mavalo ala anittonyerya okelela ohoolo murettele woororomeleya," onnisomiwa nwarakhani eveleelihiwe alipa ohimya ihapari.

Alaleyaka wuncareriwa mahiku miloko mithanu na mosa ahinrowa owaniwa, muhooleli a Renamo ohimya okhalana nuulumo "waavaha murettele mamosampkaano," yiiraka ovaaneliwa wiiraneyaka n'alipa oweha a ilapo s'okhopela.

Afonso Dhlakama oohooliha ahaaroromeliha nsana, alavulaka mutelefoneni ni mukhulupale a elapo wiira alopwana awe "khanirowa opaca mukaritela ya makhuru a kuveerunu" ni wiira owo oniwehererya siiso wa mpantta wa makhuru a kuveerunu.
Muhooleli a Renamo oororomeliha wiira alipa okhaliherya ovaanela ailapo sookhopela anirowa otthikela, ni wiira, makhuru manli a miteko anrowa ovara muteko woowi opwanywe wiwanana.
FMI "ommuttottopela" Mosampiki
Nikhuru nootumererya wiira Maputo ohaana wiira ni ekekhayi iporokarama sowanana osikhini.
Nikhuru na Muhakhu w'Olumwenku (FMI) onoona okhala "yoottottopeleya ehaali ya muhakhu wa Mosampiiki, masi oolopola okhala irixiku wa okathi vakhaani para elapo.

Makhulupale a FMI aathukumana oWashintoni woowi ewehawehiwe ehaali ya muhakhu wa Mosampiiki ni wuumalani wa muthukumano, muhooleli aneenli Min Zhu ohimya wiira muhakhu wa Mosampiiki onnira wunnuwaka mwaakha wa 2011 ni wiira infalasawu yahilokololiwa.

Waaniheriwa winnuwa wa muhakhu w'okathi weeriyari tiwooreere, masi sookhala iriixiku s'okathi ori vakhiviru sinikhuma mutuniyan wootheene ohaana ovareliwa muteko sinipwanelaaya, yoohimya ewarakha ya Zhu alikanihaka othowa muhakhu w'olumwenku. Muhooli aneenli a FMI ohimya wiira enrowa okhala etthu yuulupale woowi Mosampiiki ovare vanipwanelaaya itthu sintthuneya wiira ovukule osikhini. Yuulupale tho, oohimya muhooli a FMI otthikela opaka irefooruma woowi "winnuwiheriwe olokololiwa sookophiwa, otthokiha mihakhu sininvexitiriwa ni olokolola mihakhu s'atthu ootheene
Min Zhu ootumererya nlelo okhala etthu yootthuneya ororomeliha olokololiwa ni ottokiha oratteene isetore sootheene sinikhuma muhakhu ni ottokiherya olivihiwa musokho.
Muhooli aneenli a FMI ohimya tho nlelo nwarakhani mwawe okhala "etthu yookelela ohoolo ni okhala ephiro yooreera" yoolakela ya Mosampiiki ovoluwa munikhuruni ya Ifaapirika Sinimuthipa Compoxitiivele.
Mosampiiki ovukula ihalahala wa nakoso a iyoolya

Kuveerunu onimala whaakhulela eporopooxita ya Nlamulo nnihimya ihalahala sootepa para iye siniihaniwa soolya ni itthu sihinipwanela ohaleela vate, wiireliwa okontorolariwa wuncareriwa isisapo sinitumihweriwa atthu ootheene.

Eporopooxita ya kuveerunu enihimya iyoolya ni itthu sootthuneyaxa 12 siniira sencareriwa esisapo aya mweemexeryo wa muhakhu enavirikana, sintoko ehopa ya skunta, elhyaku yoocilariya, musoro, otthu wa nakhuwo, ni sikina ni iye siniira sencereriwa ananmawaani enaxanka, seyo sikhoottihiwe eluukuru aya ovikana 15% anamathuma vakani vakhani ni anamoopola.
Nikhuru n'Atthu Oowiiraana a Mosampiiki Ninaakhuparela anamathuma, nootthapela yoolakela ya kuveerunu, nnya nnihimya wiira onkhala ntoko mwaalo orina iponta piili.

Wa mpantta wanamathuma, mphimo ola ti wooreera ni veekeekhayi wamalihiwa wuncereriwa isisapo pure pure, vanooweryaneya wiira avalaveli ekhalane etthu enaakhuparela ni okhala owrya woothuma, nnya,vaniphaveleya wiira kuveerunu akhalane owerya woowi mireerelo siruuhiweke mmarakaatoni, waahiraneyeru siiso, animwaathiya iphula anamatumiha, mwaha wa sookhumelela sinceene sinintiriviri wa muhakhuni ya marakaato," ohimya Mouzinho Nicols, avanelaka ni VOA.
Vahiphaveliwa owiriyaniwa muupuwelo wa Nikhuru Naanamatumiha ya Mosampiiki, masi khivaweryanen'ye, okhala wiira mahooleli enihimya wiira khareere waatteliwa miteko soovara.

Miniixituru-Oopacerya oPorutukaale, Antonio Costa, inipacerya, enamacexe ela, oxukurya oMosampiiki, w'okathi yoola onooneya ntoko khoreere okhovaniwa eriyari ya ilapo soopiili, ohiya mwaha wa namuhakhu oPortukaale wiiyiwe khwaasi iyaakha piili sivirale, yeyo othokosiwa waha ovanle otthikeliwa ni alipa okunya oMosampiiki.

Moonelo awe Porutukaale, wiiyiwa w'Americo Sebastiao, mweeri waneethanu namosa ya 2016, Epooma ya oMarinkwe, ePorovinsiya ya oSofala, yaari etthu yoothananiha, owehaka mpatta wa okhovana, nnya, naananoxa, alipa okunya a oPorutukaale ahaakhela nroromelo, ninkhuma oMosampiiki, nookhalihana wiira osuwelihiwe mulattu ola.

"Nvarihano poliitiku ola wookhovana tiwootthuneya", woowi niphuke mwaha ola, ohoonela sakarataari a Exitaatu y'atthu oPorotukaale, Jose Luis Carneiro, wuumalani wa muthukumano, mwaamahiku, oMaputo, ni miniixitara anenli a oMosampiiki a Mwaalaano wa nakoso a Ilapo Sookhopela ni Okhovana, Manuela Lucas.
Sintoko sihimyalyaaya Acensiya Lusa, anawiiye aakhuxa ikarataawu sa mpanko ni aalevantari musukhu 4.000 wa iweero.
Amahoolele a w'Afifirika anipaka nikhuro na nakoso livere
Amahooleli a wAfirika ahaakulela, olelo, oXuwanixipuuruku, mwiiwanano woowi epake nikhuru na nakoso livere sitakanihaka ilapo 26, noowaatteliwa ya ekontinente yootheene.

Wiiranen'ye, olelo, osuwelihiwa opakiwa muttetthe wa muhakhu a miyoono miraru ya nakoso livere, otakanyihiwaka SADC, Nikhuru n”Alipa muhakhu a w'Afirika Awuxitaraale ni Marakaato Mamosaru a w'Afirika Oriyentaale ni Awuxitaraale.

Opaceriwa nno yiiranen'ye okathi mmosaru ni Muthukumano Wootutuxerya wa SADC, onirelaawe mpannta Muhooleli a Elapo Armando Guebuza, a Mosampiiki, ni miniixituru a Nakoso a Ilapo Sookhopela a w'Ankoola, Jorge Chicoty, ohoolelaka elapo awe.
Nikhuru n'atthu a mulaponi nihikhanle mparitiituni inivaanela okawana mireerelo sinivaha etthaya Wamphula

Sintoko sihimyalawe muhooleli a Nikhuru na Anamakhalihana ya Mosampiiki, nikhuru noohikhala na kuveerunu na mulaponi na okhupaarela ihakhi s'atthu ootepa ovalavela Antonio Mutoua, muuupuwelo woowaathukumanya atthu anikhuma ipantte sinceene sa mulaponi enikhuma numala owehiwa wiira mivaanelo sa mireerelo s'ovaha s'etthaya khasiniiriwa mapuro yaawo akhanle sinooneleliwaaya mireerelo iyo, yaatthuna waatakanyihaka ananmawaani wa mivaanelo sotheene.
Nimphavela orukunuxa ehaali.
Nihaana omukuxa teputaato mpakha waanammawaani ni ovaanela n'awo itthu siniwira mpantta, oohimya Motoua okathi wiiraneya esiminaariyo.
Dhlakama wiirale otthukiwa wa Muchanga etthu yoowoopopihana ni opacana
Muhooleli a Renamo oohimya wiira khanirowa waakhula n'ikapwitthi masi ohaakhulela ohikhala ni nroromelo okhuma oKoronkoosa.

Peresitenti a Renamo, Afonso Dhlakama oolavula ni alipa ihimya ihapari, emakaaripi y'olelo, mutelekonferensiya, ni oohimya wiira otthukiwa wa namuhupi awe, Antonio Muxanga, etthu yoopacana ni waapucari omwene.

Afonso Dhlakama ohinyexexa wiira khaniroromela okhupaareliwa okhuma mutakhwani ya miyaako y,oKoronkoosa ni ohaakhulela wiira Peresitente a Repuubilika oniwerya otthu wiira arowe amukumaane, onvare ni omookotthe.
Mosampiiki elapo elapo yoowoopihaxa y'olumwenku woowi omiire nakoso
Mosampiiki elapo yoowoopihaxa y'olumwanku woowi omwiire nakoso, mwaha wa icuuro s'okopha s'atthu otheene sineetta 25.1%.
Nokhuru na Ihapari s'namihakhu Bloomberg (Ploompeereki) nihimya wiira elapo yoomuxira Venezuela (Venezuweela) ni enimulaleya karaafiku ni wuncarereya wa sookophiwa s'ilapo sopiili
Niisisa, Mosampiiki opakeya elapo yootepax woopiha ohela muhakhu waananakoso, sintoko owela w'icuuru ya sookophiwa.
Ehimyale sa Yoosoma ya makhuru na Waalemaanya na Misereor ni Erlassjar (Misereyoore Erilasacar)

Makhuru awo anikhala waataana w'Alemaanya ya Mikhuru atthu ahikhanle mParitiitu Politiku, ikereca ni atthu antthara-tthara miteko sa politika, anoonela wiira sookopha sa impereesa ProIndicus (PoroIntiku), Mam (Maami) ni Ematum yookhaliherya woowi Mosampiiki ohaleele nlemeliho sa miteko sa sookopha, ni esisapo eruuhenlyaaya.

Asuweli akina a mihakhu anihimya, vanaamwiira siisa, wiira sookopha sa impereesa iya tthaaru sitepihenrye mulattu wa enamakopha ya Mosampiiki, naanaanova nto sihinvileleya, mwaha woohikhala epoliitika yoosuka muhakhu mulaponi memmo, ohiya oyeva sooruweriwa sa mulaponi.
Ovaanelela myaha siluluwanne n'epoliitika eriyari ya Kuveerunu oMosampiiki ni Renamo khoniiwananiwa ni pooti onpwapwaneeliha mwaathanle amunisiipiyo, mweeri wa namuloko onirwa.

Amelia ahakhulela wiira "sintoko nikhuru ”nanamathanliwa a moono a Frelimo, woonaka wiira onnaattamela okathi wa mwaathanle a mmunisiipiyo, memmo sintoko sinihimyaaya nlamulo wiira amwiilepiha otheene ahaana othanla ni othanliwa, mwaathanle ohaana iraneyaka vohikhala nikhuru na epoliitika nnakhala nimosa nirineene ikapwitthi.
Wa maptte awe, Ivone Soares onihimya wiira nikhuru na eparitiitu ya Renamo khenirowa waakanyerya mvaanelo "oniira wimmaka mihokorokho soorera."

Nikhuru na owehaweha erixiku Standard & Poors onoonela wiira Mosampiilki Elapo ya w'Afirika Supusahariyaana erina eperesentage ya sookohiwa sa muhakhu wa ilapo sookhopela, waattamela 84%, mwaha otepexa wene wa Eurobond (Ewuroponti) ya 2016 ni sookophiwa sa impereesa s'atthu ootheene.

Asuweli awiriyaniwe ni VOA anihimya wiira mwaha woowiira mpantte munceene wa yookophiwa yaattjhu ootheene ya Mosampiiki okhala ya itoolare tenipunya itivisa s'elapo ahu ni khiatepa olemeliha muritti wa yookophiwa, otepaxa wene wakhawiira sookophiwa sinceene khasinivareliwa muteko oninnuwiherya elapo.

Musuweli a mihakhu Roberto Tibane ohimyexexa mwaha wa yoolaleyiwa ya Comite de Politica Monetaria do Banco de Moçambique (eKomitee ya ePoliitika ya Muhaku ya Epanko ya Mosampiiki, esomiwe nihiku noopacerya muteko nenna, mahiku vaneettaaya 26, ni muhooleli, Rogerio Zandamela, ookupaleela etthu ela, aimyaka tho ohooneliwa vatthu wa musurukhu maporo aniturukiwaaya, mwaha woovirikanasa misurukhu suulupale sa ilapo sookhopela.
"Hiiyo noosuwela wiira nakoso ahu khahiyo ooreera, ni ophunyiwa vakhani pahi vasulu va mikatthe wala kanyeryo sahu woowi oliveliwe yookophiwa poti otepiherya ohooneliwa vatthu musurukhu ahu.

Ni moonelo awe, musuweli a muhakhu Constantino Marrengula onaaniherya wiira ekhalaka 84% Ya yookopha eri ni mwaawalo wa ilapo sa okhopela vanihimya wiira okathi etoolare, eweero wala erantti sinwelaaya, yookophiwa nave tho enimuncerereya, ni siisa khiyatepa owalamela miteko sa yookophiwa.
Ohisoma, othoyiwa ni owalamela toniiriha etthu ela.

Yoosoma ya Instituto de pesquisas em Ciencia, Inovaçao e Tecnologia da Informaçao e Comunicaçao (SIITRI) (Inxitituutu y'Otholathola, Siyensiya, Opaka vasya ni eTekonolocia ya Soohimiwa ni Soolaleyiwa yoohimya wiira eteeruso emosa pahi ya athiyana aoMosampiiki tanimuurela intereneeti.
Eriyari wa iye situmereriwe woowi erukuxiwe etthu ela, SIITRI onithoonya opakiwa ipoliitika ni inamuna sinikhoottiha ohasuliwa ni ovekavekiwa athiyana murete sosialeni.
Uniao Africana (Mwiiraano wa Wafirika woolaphela omukhaliherya Mosampiiki wawanana atakhali oKaapu Telekaatu

Mwiiraano wa Wafirika oniphavela omukhaliherya Mosampiiki owanana ekhotto oKaapo Telekaatu, okathi ene yoola mulaponi memmo onilopoliwaaya ni onaaniheriwaaya ekhotto omwareela iporovinsiya sikina, okhala wiira kuveerunu khanivaha mukhaliheryo onipwanela woowi ewnaniwe atakhali.
Mukhaliheryo ororomelihiwe ni Peresitente a Nikhuru na Mwiiraano wa Wafirika, Moussa Muhamat, akhumaka waathukumanalyaawe ni Peresitente oMosampiiki, Filipe Nyusi, oMaputo.
Okathi owo, Muhamat ohoonela "okhala moopopiho muulupale wa murettele oMosampiiki," ekotto eniiraneya ohitto wa elapo ele ya Wafirika.

"Nooxanka vanceene n'etthu ela y'oKaapo Telekaatu," ohimya tho Moussa Muhamat, uuluulaka malopolo a nikhuru n'atthu ohikhala a kuveerunu a oMosampiiki ni mipantte sikina sa Namalamula, woowi alipa okunya ekuxerye ekeekhayi ekhotto ya oKaapo Telekaatu.

"Khivanipwanela ophuka mulattu wa ekhotto voohikhalana mireerelo, vohihela muhakhu, otepexa wene nikhuru waakiha ni okhupaarela ni exariya," owanela porokuratoora-ceraale anenli a wa Repuupilika, Amabelia Chuquela.

Analiixita a epoliitika Raul Domingos, oohimya wi "Enitowa evontaate ya namalamula woowi ophuke mwaha wa ekhotto ya oKaapo Telekaatu," akohaka exeeni ehinithokosiwaaya anikhuma vayi, nikhuru xeene ni taani onaavaha sootheene anivarelaaya muteko atakhali."
Miyo namasuwela, elenta enirimeela.
Mukhwelo wa ''pantera ooriipa'' waahikhumelela otthunku olomwenku wootheene.
Trending: Alicia Keys oomukumiha aalupu mpheya.aalupu
Namwiipa soul R&B Alicia Keys ootthika ni aalupu awe mpheya, ekhanle ti enikela ''omuliyaliha'' okathi mukina Tiwiiteri mikhumelelo sootikiniha sa ipuliitika.
Aalupu ''Alicia'' ti myaha simphavelexiwa nihiku na olelo.
Ituwiita soophiyeryaka ikonto 50 ti sa aalupu ola ni mwiirelo wa mpantta wa Khalid musiponi mwa ''So Done''.
Aalupu ola tho enniirela mpantta esipo ya ''Underdog", elepiwe ni namwiipela Ed Sheeran.
Wa "Underdog" Alicia Keys onihimya wiira esipo eyo enooniherya muhaawelo wa aximaama oohitheliwa oniwiiraneeleya wiira aphwanya etthu yoolya ya axinamwane ni oliva ikontha.

Namayariwa Nova Iorque, namwiipela okohiwaka oohimya wiira, owo ti ole waakela okhala ''namararuwasa ni okhala maama onarina iyaakha 16, omwinneela itthu soohapaliha murima mwiirutthuni mwawe, okhala mapuro oohireerela ni okathi woohireerela''.
Masi kehiyo eyo emukhumelenle Alicia Keys, ori ole onitthika ni aalupu mpheya noovira miyaakha mixexe woomwariwa “Here” mwa 2016.
Muhina mwa top trending sookhala ipupilikasawu piili ni sinihimya mwaha mmosa.
Justin Bieber ohiipa esipo niinaano ni ekilipi ya eviitiyu epheya.
Esipo eyo eniihaniwa "Holy" ni Chance the Rapper ohiira mpantta!

Vanikhala ntoko Bieber ephiro onittharaawe ti yooreerihiwa ni muluku wala yoohikhalana mikutakuto (holy) ni enipacerya saana, ni tho opancerya wiipa niinaano, eteyaaseri ya eviitiyu-kilipi ehooniwa ni atthu oophiyeryaka ikonto 700.
Oyuutuupi eteretinki ya esipo tho ninniira mpantta nsina na Justin Bieber.
Eviitiyu-kilipi yootepexa wooniwa niinaano va ti ya "Popstar", esipo ya DJ Khaled ni Drake ni mukhalelo wa Justin Bieber.
Eviitiyu eyo ehooniwa ivaara soophiyeryaka imilyawu 53.
Wa seyiye sinooniherya sa trailers, "Mandalorian", eseeriye enitakiherya voottharelana ya Star Wars, ti yootepexa woonaxiwa imaara soophiyeryaka imilyawu 7.
"Mandalorian" epakiwe oTiisineyi, etemporaata yoopacerya khiyaarere osivela ni niinaano va enitthuna opakiwa etemporaata ya nayili.
Oweepisayite ya VOA www.voaportugues.com ni sohimmwa sinaasivela atthu ale anrowa oweha:
Lokua Kanza: “Olumwenku oniphavela mphento”

Lokua Kanza ookhalana etiixiku epheya, “Moko” (opacerya wala waataana), ni onihimya wiira ti yootepexa omusivela okhuma khalayi, epacenrye okhuma mwaakha wa 1980, elapo awe, eRepuupilika Temokaraatika ya oKonku.
“Ti etiixiku wa sooloha waka , ” oohimya.
Mpantta woopacerya wa etiixiku, “Tout va bien”, Lokua oniipa wa mahiku ooreera, olumwenku onoonaneya mihaawelo.
“Kinoona wiira olelo, olumwenku oniphavela mphento”, ookhupaleela.
“Moko” mkhumelelo wa ikwaha 12 sa moolimwenkuni, ni okelaka oKonku, Aafirika a okuusini, oParasiili, Ilapo Soowiiraana, oFaransa wala Wintiya.
Nele, Lokua oniipa ni mattaava 14 ni anniirela mpantta anamwiipa oophiyeryaka 100, wa yaawo ti ale a Orikweexitara Sinfoonika ya oPuutapeesiti, oHunkuriya, anihooleliwa ni Grammy Chris Walden.

Nvaanelo ola, Lokua onihimya wiira esipo ya waAfirika yookhalana mulipelelo wooreera, masi anamwiipa ahaana ophavela oruuha ekwalitaate; ni apatthani awe a Mmosampiikhi, oniveleeliha mtthaka a mulipelelo.
Lokua Kanza, tiithi awe konkoleexi ni maama awe ruwanteesa, oyariwe mwaakha wa 1958, oPukavu, eRepuupilika Temokaraatika ya oKonku.
Owo opacenrye wiipa okathi wa 1980, waattharelelaka anamwiipa akinaku sintoko Miriam Makeba ou Ray Lema, iriitimu sintoko rumpa, rhythm and blues, poosa mpheya wala poopi.
oKonserivatooriyu, wa oKonku wala oFaransa, onniphwanya isipo sa Basch ni saakinaku, ni onnisoma maxuttelo a isipo ni mwiipelo aya.
Mwaakha yoowo, onivara miteko iyo ni rayiinya Abeti, Abeti Masikini, ootepa osuwelaxiwa wa anamwiipa elapo ya oKonku.
Okathi yoowo, onakhala namwiipela ootepa osuwelexa: ePantolim, eFalawuta, ceece, epiyaanu ni wiipela.
oPariixi, weyiwo waathaamenlaawe mwakha wa1984, Lokua Kanza onivara miteko iyo sa wiipa ni Manu Dibango, Ray Lema, Papa Wemba ni nikhuru na Sixun.

Noovira muthoonyeryo, Olympiya wa ePariixi, mwaakha wa 1992, omutthukulelaka Angelique Kidjo, Lokua onaxintta ni onatepa osuwelaxiwa – ni mwaakha yoowo enakhuma etiixiku awe yoopacerya – ni, noovira miyaakha miraru, namasuweliwa "Wapi Yo", onaanyiheriwa ni malepelo a nsina nawe.
Terentinki: Snoop Dogg "ni" DMX
Tuwiiteri ti nipuro nikhanlaahu oophwanya khula muthinto wa miruku soovirikana.
Olelo myaha kamosa kamosa sootepa olavulaxiwa ti moomoleliwo wa Nick Cannon, namwiipa ni mmwalanani a namwiipa Mariah Carey.
Cannon woomoliwe ni reeti televisiiva CBS, enimoothererya namwiipa wiira onimwarya mwarya moolumo oophwavela waanyohola akinaku.
CBS onihimya wiira namuthoonyiherya a mihupi a khalayi a eporokaraama "Wild N Out" oovonya mwaha woohivekela muswammaha mwaha wa moolumo awe.
Wa yoolempwa yooreerela ni moolimwenkuni wa reepi, onnirwa muxinttano woolipelelaxiwa wa miyaakha sa niinaano.
Yoolempwa ele enilamula muxinttano wa reepi okhuma namwiipa Snoop Dogg ni namwiipa DMX!
Anamasiveliwa a reepi old school khanirowa orupa mpakha mahiku yeettaka 22 a mweeri wa xuunyu, niri ti nihiku nuulupale na muxnttano.
oKhuukili mwaha oolavulaxiwa: nsina na Chrissy Teigen, mwaara wa

Namwiipa John Legend, onikhala osuwela othokoca murowelelo wa mahiku ala yeettaka 15 a mweeri wa xuunyu, noovira mahiku a mikhumelelo soovirikana sa ohankawaani onihimya wiira mukhalelo ni Muhooleli a okusinya anniira mpantta wa mwaha Jeff Epstein, ompaka taraafiku a athiyana.

Mukhalelo onihimya wiira oottipiha ituwiita soophiyeryaka ikonto 60 okhala wiira onikhala waathokoca amusi awe mwaha wa moothereryo owo oniviraneya, yeyiyo owo onihimyaawe wiira sootheene itthu soowoothiwa.
oFeesipuukhi mutthaka mmosa a epaaxina ya Aapemani Exitoronki onikhala ovikana mitthaka mikina sa atthu.
Aapemani Exitoronki ohooniherya ncampulo na mmiravo mwaamukhaani ookhalana miyaakha mithanu ni mmosa ni murokora awe ooyariwa niinaano.
Mmiravo ola ti ookhalana murala muulupale owiitho wawe, ni (ikhomo 90) mwaattotthyaawe sinimooneya, mwaha wa wiira aamwaakiha murokora awe aaphavela olumiwa ni mwalapwa.
Vakohiwawe mwaha wa exeeni iiranwe eyo, owo aahaakhula iiraka wiira ''waakhanleene mutthu waareerela okhwa waahaana okhala ole''.
Mutthaka ola khoreere waatannya atthu oowaatta, otepexa ele yaamukhumelenle mmiravo ole ni murala a wiitho wawe ohintthuna tho orimeelela.
Atthu oophiyeryaka ikonto 300 aaveleeliherya ni atthu oophiyeryaka ikonto 82 ahaakhula alepaka.
Makhuru a mphira a oParasiili ti ootepexa osivela impa iye sinipakiwa cuuku.
Lionel Messi ti ootepexa osivela wiira okhale namakoluxa wa muxinttano, sintoko vanihimyaaya epalantafooruma Peet365
Esayiti Oddschecker, empa yootepexa opakiwa acuuku olumwenku ola, enihimya wiira ti yootepexa omwaakhelela Muntiyaali ni yoosivelexa, ottharelana Arixentiina, Alemaanya ni Exipaanya.
Lontiriina William Hill, oowinnuwexa winkalateera, oniliva iliipara 4 wa khuta eliipara yooweexiwa mucuukuni elapo ya oParasiili.
Mweexeliwo wa cuuku Waarixentiina oniliviwa ithanu wa mmosa ni Waalemaanya ithanu ni emosa.
Ookhiserya weexiwa ompani - ni okhala wiira, yaakela waavaha ipereemiyu sooreerelexa anacuuku - ti Kooxita Riika, Hontuuraxi ni Irawu, ni iliipara soophiyeryaka 2.501 wa khula nacuuku.
Epalantafooruma SkyBet tho – weyiwo anacuuku okhanlaaya oomweexa ni telefooni wala intereneeti - aniliva iliipara 11 wa khula myeexeryo mixexe oParasiili.
Arixentiina wakhala namaxintta a muxinttano, nacuuku onookela waakhela iliipara xexe wa khula cuuku, ni Waalemaanya, ehisapo enikela okhala ya iliipara 11 wa khula cuuku ooweexiwa.
Irawu, Kooxita Riika wala Awuxitaraaliya yakuxasa etaasa wiira oroyihe owaani, epalantafooruma enookela oliva ehisapo yoophiyeryaka iliipara 2.501 wa khula cuuku ooweexiwa.
Wa anamuttikha mphira, vakhaani ayaru muneexiwaawe cuuku, Lionel Messi ti ootepexa osivela wiira okhale namakoluxa wa muxinttano, sintoko vanihimyaaya epalantafooruma Peet365
Empa eniliva iliipara 15 wa khula iliipara piili sooweexiwa Waarixentiina.
Ottharela waya onirwa Neymar (10 wa mmosa), neeraru aya porutukeexi Cristiano Ronaldo (12 wa mmosa) ni wa Arixentiinu Sergio Aguero (14 wa mmosa).
Masi nacuuku muulupale namaxintta a eKoopa, a empa yeeyo ya cuuku onihimya wiira anamasivelexa ti Arixentiina/Messi (16 wa mmosa), oolikana ni Parasiili/Neymar.
Cuuku ootepexa weexiwa ti Parasiili/Messi, ni 33 wa mmosa, tho oolikana ni Arixentiina/Sergio Aguero.
Mmalelo wootepexa waasivela anacuuku ti Parasiili/Arixentiina, ottharelanaka ni Parasiili/Exipaanya ni Arixentiina/Alemaanya.
Wa soopakiwa sa Waafirika: Mpaceriho wa Anamittompe Akhulupale a Waafirika wookhalana soopaka sooreerela.
Mwaakha ola Yali oniihaneliwa ni nsina na Waaxinttoni Manteela Fellowship, mwa muttittimihiyo wa Nelson Mandela, mwaha wa owooniherya atthu ni waakhupaliha wiira khiivo yoorika opaka mulaponi mu.

Noomala Mpaceriho wa Anamittompe Akhulupale a Waafirika nsu na Waafirika nilavunle ni anamakhalela araru, a Wankoola, oKwine-Pisawu ni a Mmosampiikhi, wiira asuwelaxe mananna xeene anikelaaya ovarela iye axunttaaya yatthikela mulaponi mwaya.

Akiules Neto, Edmar Nhaga ni Majo Joseph aavaanela wa iye sinaahupaareya, wa soophiyererya saya ni annivareleliha wiira porokaraama ola ti ooreerela ni oovareya ni anikhuma Ilapo Soowiiraana ni miruku sooreerela sinirowa oreeriha munikhalaaya.
Mwiiweke muvaanelo:

Akiules ti fiisiku nukeleyaari ni onitthuna ompaka poroxeetu ontthuna waakhaliherya a niinno a Ixikola sa suupale wiira apakeke iye asomalaaya, Edmar oniira mpantta a anamphira a Okwine a Ihakhi sa Atthu, ni ti oolikaneene wiira opatthanane anamisurukhu a impereesa ni ookhalana mulipelelo muulupale wa Kuveerunu ola wa niinaano.
Majo onivara ni eParalamento ya Mmosampiikhi ya Anamittompe ni onithoonyerya mikutakuto sinikhumelela Mmosampiikhi, onakhupalikiru iporokaraama sa ipoolosa Yali.
Barack Obama onniwoopererya anamittompe a Waafirika wi areerihe olimwenku.

Epoolosa Yali (Young African Leaders Iniciative) ti porokaraama opakiwe ni Muhooleli Mukhulupale a elapo ya Waameerika, Barack Obama, wi yaakhaliherye anamittompe ookhala iyaakha 25 mpakha 35 ni ontthuna waahela anamitthompe ala mapuro a murumeelo wa atthu, anakoso ni empereyentetoriximu ni eliteransa.
"Axilopwana, ninnoophavelani wiira nilokiherye itthu", Michelle Obama
Soophwanyiwa sa niinaano ni sootepexa woopiha "wa soorava" sa HIV
Ti soopisa waakhula mirette.
Opisa waakhula murette mwiirutthuni.
Oniihaniwa muravelo muulupale wa HIV ni musomo wa ninaano onooniherya okhala mukacamiho muulupale wahuupuweleliwa.
Anamathola anihimya wiira ela enniruuha mukacamiho mwa owuriwa miretthe saya ni vanitthuneya oruuha miruku sikina wiira epakiwe evasina ya SIDA.
Tothoro Andrew Redd onihimya wiira wookhala muravelo wa HIV ni wookhala muravelo wootepexa otakhala wa HIV ni oniileeliherya muvirikano aya.
“Onoonaneya muravelo wootepexa otakhala okathi mutthu onirava awe wuupaceryane eretta enirwa muhina mwa HIV.
Nto mutthu ola wennuwiha eretta ela yoopacerya, onakelatho orava vanayili eretta tho yeela, onikhala muravelo wootepexa otakhala.
Redd ti mwaneene a musomo ni Siyentiixita wa Inxitituutu Nasiyonaale ya Alerexiya ni Iretta Sooranvwa.

Onihimya wiira musomo wiiranen'ye elapo ya Ukanta waanyiheriwa wiira miravelo sootepexa otakhala saari soorikarika okhumelela, saaphwanyaneya paahi muhina mwa ananciitte wala anamararuwa ni alopwana akhwaaya.
Masi kehiyo ti enikhumelela.
Eyo enikhumelela mmwe muniphwanyaneyaaya ni mithinto sikina sa HIV ti soothipelela.
''Wookhala mukawanyeyo muhina mwa ilapo wa mithinto sikina sa HIV.
Elapo ya Ukanta sinniphwanyaneya mithinto iyo miili.
Mithinto iyo sookhalana malepo A,B,C ni D. Elapo ya Ukanta nookhalana muthinto A ni muthinto D.
Redd onnikhupaleela wiira mittharelelo sa niinaano soophavela opakiwa evasina wa mwaakhulo wa ephattu ya atthu simmalela ohiphiyerya wiira yaakhaliyerya atthu ale ookhalana eretta ela.
Orlando Venhereque: Namwiipa Oowiiraaniha Atthu.
Osomme oMaputu, masi omalin'he Aafirika a Okuusini weyiyo winnuwin'haawe muteko awe a nawiipe, wiipela ni woopa nipetta.
Osomme exikola ya esipo ya oMaputu.
Ookhala elapo ya Abu Dabi.
Masi niinaano va onikhala epooma ya oKhaapu, Aafirika a Okuusini.
Onaasimiwa Orlando Venhereque, oyarwe Mmosampiikhi, orina iyaakha 31, nawiipe, namwiipela ni namoopa nipetta.
Wa sootheene mphento awe oopacerya waari kalarineeti omwakakhanin'haawe mwakha wa 1997 ni nipetta nuulupale.
Ohoopa ni masina sintko a Jimmy Dlulu, Sibongole Khumalo, Tucan Tucan, anaahima Paco.
Ooxuttiha, sintoko namwiipa oolattuliwa, exikola ya esipo Riitimika ya oTinamaaraka.
Ookhalela mitthukumano sa anamwiipa oSuweesiya ni oTinamaaraka ni ePanta ya oMaputu Project.
Tesempuru wa mwaakha wa 2010 ti omalin'haawe okaravari muteko awe woopacerya “Healing a waAfirika.”
Niinaano kinivara wa soopunttheya saya.
Mmukawoni mwawe, otepexa waya Mmosampiikhi, weyiyo onipakaawe veekhaawe mwaha woohikhalana etitoora yoomukhaliherya miteko sawe.
Mpatthani ahu Amâncio Miguel ookumaana ni Orlando Venhereque oMaputu, yoowo waakilaathale ni owo ni onavaanela sa miteko sa ekumi awe ni muteko awe woopacerya "Healing a waAfirika."
Top Ten Amerikaanu: ePanta Sonoora ya Peleekhi Panther ti mureerelo wa itapela.
Opaka imilyawu munitumihiwa ipilyiti, Peleekhi Panther "ooniruma" ti tho etapela ya aalupu ootepexa owiriyaniwa Ilapo iye Soowiiraana.
Aalupu, mulipa ompaka ti, wa isumana piili iya soottharana oniphwanyaneya okhalaka mapuro oopacerya a vatapelani (okhula nihiku epacenryaaya wooniwa efiilime).
Ti efiilime ya suuperi-erooyi ya epanta tesenyaata, emutakiheryaka Marvel Comics, yoopakiwa ni Marvel Comics ni yookawiya ni Walt Disney.

Nilavulaka ya ifiilime, Natalia LaFourcade, Miguel ni Gael Garcia Bernal anirowa okuxa masina kamosa kamosa a epanta sonooru wa ifiilime soosivela “Coco” mwa Óscares namurunku ola, 4 mweer wa Maaruxu.
Ti “Mukuupuwele Miyo”, wa efiilime ela yoosivela enniruuhela wa soolimalela sa elapo ya oMeexiku ni oniilepiha muxinttano wa esipo yootepexa oreera.
Wa mithelano kamosa kanosa sa mwaakha ola onirowa okhala wa pirinsipi piritaaniku Harry ni wa atiriixi a waameerika Meghan Markle.
Mwa esiiri, eliixita ya anamalattuliwa nlelo enivira evaaneliwaka, masi vaasuweleya wiira Spice Girls onookela olattuliwa.
Ni anookelasa wiipa okasamentuni weekeekhayi.
Nuupuweleke wiira Spice girls ti Victoria Beckam, Mel B, Mel C, Emma Bunton e Geri Horner.
Ni wa okathi woowaarya wa Spice Girls "Mamma":
Namwiipa Maluma a oKolompiya oniipa oLas Vegas.
Owo onnirwa olavulaka wiira ookhalana esipo awe epheya.
Elansamentu enikela okhumelela mweeri wa Maaruxu mahiku yeettaka 9.
Ohiya tho vo noosuwela wiira ekaapa aya yookhalana elatarato yookhalana musurukhu a itoolare 100 ni epeecu yookhalana epato yooxeerya, wiira eruuhe eruuhe erisikhi.
Okhala wiira niheetta oKolompiya, vano ninrowa mpakha oParasiili.

Anitta, namwiipa a oParasiili ontonko olikanihiwa ni Kim Kardashian, mwaha wa makhalelo ni mawarelo awe, oniphwanyaneya muhina mwa ereviisita Vooke amerikaana, wa atthu 100 ootepexa woonaneya wa mawarelo aya.
Muliisitani aakhalana masina amawarelo, a esipo, soopakasa ni mayito, mphira ni mpakha iporoxeetu tixitaali.

Nilavulaka muhina mwa Vooki etisawu parasileyira Anitta onniikhupali wiira ti oohakalala'' okhala wiira oniphwanyaneya onari muhina mwa eliisita ni atthu ''oosivela'' ni arina myaha ''sooreerela'' mulaponi.
Oniphwanyaneya onari mpantta wa mapuro muloko wa Top Ten Amerikaanu ti Halsey ni Bad at Love.
Oniphwanyaneya onari mpantta wa mapuro thanu ni xexe wa Top Ten Amerikaanu wa nsu na Waameerika ti Bebe Rexha & Florida Georgia Line ni esipo ya Meant to Be.
Bebe Rexha, wa nsina na ekeekhaya Bleta Rexha, ti mwaana wa axitiithi alipaneexi ni oniipa okhuma miyaakha mixexe.
Nipuro na neethanu ni tthaaru ti Migos.
Awo aniira mpantta wa eliisita ya anamwiipa anirowa wiipa muhina mwa ifeesita suulupale sa Reepi oMinneyaapolisi, ni Atimoxipheere.
Etisawu ya mwaakha ola enikhumelela ni muvirelo wa miyaakha 25 na nikhuru Wu-Tang Clan.
Nipuro na neethanu ni tthaaru ti Migos wa Top Ten Amerikaanu a VOA.
Eposisawu ya neethanu ni piili ti ya The Weeknd ni Kendrick Lamar, ni esipo ya Pray For Me.
Nipuro na neethanu ni nimosa ori ti mwaaruusi oomusivela ottharihela, Dua Lipa.
Nihooniherya mittharelelo miili sa Dua Lipa, vano ninrowa wa neeraru.
''Ohikhale mpantthani awe''.
Onnisuwela wiira owo khonirowa ohihimuwa onari mpantta awe oxaakeene.
Eyo vo etiika ya Dua Lipa, namwiipa piritaanika a miyaakha 22.
Eposisawu ya neethanu ti namathipelela, owo isumana sootheene iya sinivira oniphwanyaneya onari nipuru nimusaru, Mutthka Malone ni Rockstar.
Camila Cabello tho nlelo orina eposisawu awe ya esumana ele evinri.

Voopuheya vo nipuru na 4º, namwiipa a miyaakha 20, opatthuxiwe elapo ya Havana, onikela wiipa omuhakalaloni Lollapalooza waArixentiina no oXile ni tho khoreerane soovarasawe mwaakha wootheene ola mwa Ilapo iye Soowuuraanya.
Finesse ori nipuro na neeraru:
Nipuru na nayili ti Perfect, mwaneene wa Ed Sheeran ni mukhalelo wa Beyoncé
Muupuwelo a Muluku (God's Plan) wa Drake ooxintta niouro noopacerya.
Ni esipo ti yootepa oreera mpakha enirumihiwa oliteransa wa Top Ten Amerikaanu wa isumana 3!
Onoona tho vanivira atthu vooxeerya ya esumana yeela.
Tereetinki: koorowa malenta a rock ni a reggae, Eddie Van Halen ni Johnny Nash
Makhwelo a Eddie Van Halen ni Johnny Nash annikweretha nihiku.
Mukhwelo wa Van Halen, namasuwela omoopa viyola a enerexiya, elamuliwe wuumaleloni wa nihiku na nsana.
Owo waarina miyaakah 65 ni khonvilenle kankuru.
Oyariwe Woolanta ni winnuwe oKalifooreneya, Van Halen oopaka nikhuru na rock ni muhima awe muulupale Alex wa miyaakha 1970 ni niinaanoru ooxintta osivela.
Nikhuru, nisuwelaxiwe okhala wa makhuru a rock amerikaanu ootepexa osuwelaxiwa "Jump", "Panama", "Runnin 'with the Devil" ni etthaya ya ceece "Eruption".

Van Halen ootumin'ha imilyawu soophiyeryaka 75 sa aalupu ni ookhalana tho ihiiti wa nummeru noopacerya sa rock mainstream wa Ilapo iye Soowuuraanya waavikana anamwiipa akina, ottharihaka eseelu ya epanta.
Aalupu a mwaakha ''1984'' a Van Halen, a mwaakha wa 1984, yaarowa okhala ekhomo yootepexa orekama, onvahaka siiso nummeru nawe nimosaru nenlo, "Jump".
eTensawu yoopakelela muhina wa epanta ehuncerereya okhuma okathi othweelenlaaya ''1984'', mwaha woohiiwananeya Eddie Van Halenni namwiipela orixinaali David Lee Roth.
Roth ohin'ye epanta mweeri wa apiriili mwaakha wa 1985.
Wa ikexa sawe kamosa kamosa ni Eddie Van Halen waari mwaha wa muteko awe wa ota, onitakaneela ni muthoonyiheryo wa Michael Jackson mwaakha wa 1983, "Beat It".
Siiso, epanta Van Halen yaahilamu epanca ya mmwalamwanyo mwaakha wa 2007 ni Roth yiithoonyiheryaka ni nikhuru emaara yoopacerya noovira miyaakha 22.
Mmwalamwanyo mukina waalakeliwe mwaakha wa 2022 waahaana okanselariwa mwaha wa Eddie Van Halen waakela wooperariwa voowaakuveya.
Masi epanta yaahittottelana mwaakha wa 2015 wiira okhale mmwalamwanyo muulupale wa ameerika a osulu.
Eddie Van Halen waasuweliwe okhala mulipa ahaakhanle saana murutthuni mwawe ni miteko sawe khisaamweettela saana miyaakha sivinre.

Owo aahirowaniwa wooperariwa nikhuva na etara mwaakha wa 1999 ni mpantta mukina wa nlumi nawe nithikiliwe mwaakha wa 2000, okathi wooneneliwaawe wiira waahikhalana kankuru mphumuni mwawe, voonaneyaka wiira onimalela okhala mwaha wa soona.
Mwaha wa orumeela wa soowurya ni wa soopaha sinhapala sihincererya mmwalano awe mwaakha wa 2007 ni atiriixi Valerie Bertinelli, noovira miyaakha 16 anathelanne.
Miyo kaari namuhapaliwa ni wiira kikhale saana kaahaana ohapaliwa'', owo aahilavula mmukohoni mwa mwaakha wa 2015 mureviixitani mwa Billboard.
''Miyo nkaahapaliwa mwaha wa efeesita''.
Nlinkwiti ni kokayina saari itthu saakisivela.
Miyo kaarumeela okathi ole kaavaraaka muteko.
Kokayina khonirupiha ni nlikwiti ninvukula woona ehaaya.
Kinnikhupali wiira sookhala itthu sikina sa isipo kahaakelaka owerya opaka voohihapaliwa.
Eddie Van Halen oohaahiya amwaara awe anayili Janie Liszewski ni mwana awe.

Namwiipa amerikaanu Johnny Nash, oosuwelaxiwa mwaha wa soopaka sawe sooreera ya reggae wa mwaakha 1970 "I Can See Clearly Now", okwaale onarina miyaakha 80 owaani wawe, oohimya mwana awemmwe munimwariwa mitthaka sa anamasuweliwa a ilapo sootheene TMZ ni vaniphwanyaneyaawe televisawu a Los TV Angeles.
Nash okhwaale enamayili mwaha wa iretta sa ephattu, mwana awe John Nash III, oomuhimeerya TMZ.
Owo waari tiithi ni mulopwana a amusi ooreera murima.
Aakhala waaphenta atthu ni olumwenku.
Owo onookela wunkhela muhina mwa muttetthe awe.
Emusi yaari etthu yootepexa omusivela owo ''oohimya mwana awe Nash oTMZ.
"I Can See Clearly Now", okhumelihiwe mwakha wa 1972, ohoolela Billboard Hot 100 chart isumana xexe ni khiwaareere osivela oKanata, oReyinu Woowiiraana ni Aafirika a okuusini.
Nash oyariwe Houston ni opancerye miteko sawe wuumaleloni wa mwaakha wa 1950 sintoko namwiipa ni atoore.
Owo othaamenle oXamayika eriyari ya mwaakha wa 1960, weyiwo wiipale awe esipo reggae.
Nash tho khoreere woonela muraarelo ni everesawu awe ya "Stir It Up" ya Bob Marley ni "There are More Questions Than Answers."
Esipo ekinaku yoosivela ya namwiipa ola ti “Tears on My Pillow”.
Aalupu awe ookhiserya a exituutiyu ti, "Here Again", okhumme mwaakha wa 1986.
Johnny Nash okhwaale ni miyaakha 80, mwaha wa iretta sa ephattu, oohimya mwana awe mmwe munimwariwa mitthaka sa waameerika wa enteretenimentu TMZ.
Ohasuwasa wa "Hoteeli Muulupale" a oPeyira onniwoopopiha atthu anceene.
Ikoretoore sowaanuwa ni sooriipela sa etifiisiyu ti mapuro sinitumihiwaaya wa soowurya ni soopahiwa sinihapala.
pooma mosampikaana ya oPeyira, atthu owaatta anikhala ooxankeene khula mahiku wooteeli muulupale, okathi ovinre waari oteeli ootepexa oreera mwa Aafirika.

Atthu oophiyeryaka 4.000 anikhala voohiliva, ikwaarutu 400 soolempwa sa oteeli ni ikomparitimentu 200, mukoretooreni, itixipensa ni ikwaarutu sa orampwa, soovarelelihiwa ni anamakhala wiira yaamakiheke amusi owaatta, voohikhala enerexiya eleetirika, maasi, ixoworo ni esixiteema ya esaneyamento.
''Mukhalelo wa oTeeli Muulupale ti oohireerela'', oolavula João Colete, muhooleli wa ale anikhala wooteeli, weyiwo owo onikhalaawe okhuma mwaakha wa 1998.
Colete onnoova opittuwa namukattha mwaha wa osareya maasi a epula ni onikhala oxenkereya mwaha wa mwinnuwelo wa mitari sa ixiri, eyiyo siri ti sinuncererya othaamiwa mwtifiisiyuni.

Namakhala mapuru ale ohincererya tho olavula wiira waahaalepela mwaakha wa 2000 ewarakha amuhooleli a Ekonseelyu Munisipaale, ni tho aahilepa ekinaku khunvaha Kuveerunu a mapuru yaal, ovekelaka wiira athamihiwe atthu ale yaakhala vootli vale okhala wiira khula nihiku onivira wunttaka.

Owaatta arwaale Wooteeli Muulupale ti ale atthyanwe ekhotto sivili, mas noomala ekhotto atthu ala anikhala arwenle mwaha wa othowa wookhala wala ohikhalana musurukhu owoolihana empa, otakanxereya alipa anivara muteko (mapuliisiya ni manfirimeera), anamasoma a ixikola suulupale ni anamatumiha.

Akinaku ti ale ahinivara muteko, oowoomoliwa moolihaaya impa, aniiruuha khula mahiku ni anakhala voohiratteleya ni voowaakuva waaphwanya eretta ni mikurumuwelo waixiri, mwaha wa munttelo wa etifiisiyu, otakanxereya mwiiyeliyo wa ikori- maawu, iparoti, aaru a ixanela ni mikhora, ohiya iviituru.
Mwaakha ola aamora anamwane athanu muxikattani ni nvarantani mwa etifiisiyu waahiya araru yaamonre mwaakha wa 2014.
Waahikhwa mmosa wa yaale.
Akinaku araru aalupaleru - oohapalasiwa - amorenl mwaha woohikhalana ixikatta mwaakha ola, masi khiyaakhwaasiye.
Masi tho sinniiraneya ihukhumu sa axaaruusi, aakhala anamwane arupalihiwe ni anamaatuphela athiyana.
Noopakiwa nikhuru nimosa na anamawehererya anikhala wooteeli wiira sivukuwe ihasara ni sinniruuha muraarelo, masi khaniphiyerya wiira simalamale,
Muttottelano wa ikokhola muniviriwa ni ikaruma sikinaku mukoretoore ti mwaha oniruuha iretta sa mmirimani ni malaariya muhina mwa etifiisiyu.

Ekonseelyu Munisipaale ya oPeyira yaahitteha ophavela omaliha mwaha wa esaneyamentu ni mulokiheryo wa ixoworo oxariti wa etifiisiyu, wiira malihe wa iye saavekela alipa anikhala mweetifiisiyu, masi empereesa ya maasi erimwiikittha elikasawu mwaha woohiliviwaka, eri ti enitepiha orikarikiha makhalelo.

''Mutthu wamaleliwa vale onikhala voohimuruku, khonoona yoovara'' oolavula Flora Julinho, onikhala Oteeli yoola Muulupale okhuma mwaakha wa 1990, weyiwo waayarenlaawe anamwane awe athanu ni mmosa, ayili ti ootheliwa mpuro yaale ni anikhala mananna yaale, kincereryaka moolumo, murweelo wa atthu akina anamoola ''ohaawa oruutepa, okhala wiira khinithonwe ni milattu siruutepa''.
Mwaakha wa 2000, Kuveerunu a emunisiipiyu waahaalaleerya waatamiha alipa anikhala Wooteeli Muulupale wiira oruuhiwe poroxetu mukinaku, masi mpanceriho ola khokenle wiitthu.
Okathi yoowo, eLiika ya Amaka yaahiteka inupa 25 wa inupa 60 saalipeleliwa otekiwa wiira yaakumihe alipa aniswali mapuro yaale.

Muhooleli a emunisiipiyu ya oPeyira, Daviz Simango onnikhupali muhaawelo wa atthu anikhala mmwe ni onnivareleliha wiira siniira siphwaveliwaka miruku sooreerela wiira akumihiwe atthu ale anikhala muhina mwa etifiisiyu.
Okathi ola, siniira sisommwaka miruku wiira okhumelele murumeelo wa mathala otekiwe Oteeli Muulupale.
Khaapu Veeriti: namalepa onirowa ovekela mukhaliheryo wiira opupilikari liivuru awe.
Alveno Figueiredo ni Silva, a miyaakha 52, soovira miyaakha soowaatta ophavelaka osuwela sa ilimalelo.
Wa mukoho a nsu na Waameerika, owo oolavula wiira musivelo wa isipo opacenrye mwaakha wa 70.
Miyaakha sa 80, opacenrye ovara muteko oraatiyu komunitaariya a Eyiilya ya Maakha ni tho onavolowa otelevisawu.
Ohaapaka atokumentaariyu anceene wa esipo waakohaka atthu yahoona voophwanya ni ohimyakasaka moolumo makina oovirikana anilavula sa etifiisiyu.
Siiso mpakha ohoolo.
Kivinre kipakaka ni kipakaka, ni mpakha olelo nlelo enikhala okisivela esipo ni ehantisi ya Okhaapu Veeriti''.
Alveno oolepa iliivuru muloko, nto niinaano va onivira ophavelaka mukhaliheryo wiira opupilikari.
Muruku wa 2009 ti opupilikari iliivuru enilavula sa ekumi ya Ildo Lobo ni ekina tho nilavula sa aviyasu muntiyaale ni myeettelo sawe oKhaapu Veeriti.
Nihiku na olelo, wa mukhalelo wa ikarafiiti, khinireere ocaaliwa.
Mulattu ahu va ohikhalana efinansiyamentu.
Namapaka a eliivuru oolavula sa mukhumelelo niwiiranya intepentensiya woophwanyiwa ni ekonomiya.
''Muweke wiira oKhaapu Veeriti wookhaliwa miyaakha soowaatta erumeliwaka eparitiitu emosa ni nto sinakhumelela iparitiitu sikinaku.
Wa sootheene iyo sookhalana ihisapo saya.
Okathi mukina, ni ekiriisi ya ekonomiya ephinye mpakha oPorutukaale, okhala wiira niniira mpantta mmosa wa mapuro ale enirumeeliwa ewooro, ooniphwanya muhaawelo owo.
Mahiku ala a olelo ti oorika waaphwanya anamakhaliherya, ovirikana miyaakha miloko sivinre.
Alveno oohimya wiira onirumelaka musurukhu ampoolosani mwawe wiira ophavele osuwela, okhala wiira khoniphavela ohiyererya ihantisi ni elimalelo ya oKhaapu Veeriti sirimeelaka.
''Kalipelela vale, atthu ari ooreerela wa elimalelo enoorimeela, animookhwa, okhala wiira khanirowa olipelela.
Etthu enimuriiriha murima namalepa okhalaka wiira iliivuru sakela opupilikariwa sinoonyesererya, ni tho sinoopacerya osivela.
Mooneke mukoho wiira musuwelo sa mwaha ola.
Muphutthelo wa elenta, onimora mwa toopinki.
Phelps, maxoronaliisita, Katinka, epoleemika munaattiwa oraame, O’Reilly ni "mwene".
Enamararu la, mahiku yeettaka 10, enoopacerya orupa epula ni oriirya oRiiyu wa Xaneero ni wa mahiku mararu ala anirwa nsuwa ninoorowa wiivitha epooma ela yooreera.
Muhupi wa nihiku, siiso, Muhooleli mukhulupale elapo okumihiwe, Dilma Rousseff, niinaano va orukunun'we okhala peresu ni onikela ophukiwa vaatthuni esumana yookhiserya ya mweeri wa Akooxitu.

Mwa evotasawu emanle oxaaka ola wa olele, wa ivooto 59 mpakha 21, owaatta voorikarika a eparitiitu yeeyo anookela oxapaluwa waanulari emantaatu awe, okhala wiira siniphaveleya paahi ivootu 54 sa masenatoore.

Siiso, ohiyu wa enamayili soomala mihupi miili ya ekuunyu ya nvaanyiho: Mukukutta wa mureeriho wa miphira Olimpiku waalovola anamasuweliha ihapari waarimoopelasiwa ni Michael Phelps waahixintta ni onakhala mapuro oopacerya a itthale sa Olimpiku ''elenta ya mphira''
Mukukutta waarina atthu 12 waaviravira mapuro a Teyotootu, weyiwo oniphwanyaneyaaya ikompeleekisu sa miphira wa Muro-2016, woopeliwaawe ni itiiru wala maluku, sintoko sinihimyaaya mihupi soopacerya.
Atthu ayili yaahivulala voohitepa, xoronaliixita mmosa a elapo ya oTuuruku ni namwiikumiherya mmosa.
Khorivo mukhupalelo woosuwanyeya, masi ifonte sa oKuveerunu soohimeerya wimperensa, voovitheya, wiira wookhala muphavelo wa osuwela oniviraneya niinaano va.

Emphavela osuweliwa wakhala wiira itiiru iya saaphaveliwa mikukutta sa anamavaha ihapari wala wakhala wiira saarwa mapuro makina yaakhumelela yoonanara irumeeliwaka itiiru, mapuru ale oosuwelaxiwa okhumelelaka wa soonanara oRiiyu wa Xaneeru.

Ekomite Muro-2016 ooveleeliha muhupi onihimya wiira niinaano va wookhala mphavelo osuwela oniviraneya, okhala wiira mapuliisiya aalavula ni namweettiha ni mukukutta ori opuliisiya wiira esuwanyeye ti exeeni ekhumelenle.

Masi ohiyu wa enamayili, ookhumelela mpisina wa ekompeleekisu Maria Lenth a “elenta olimpika”, Michael Phelps, mulopwana onilya ekhiilu emosa ya makarawu wa khula erefeyisawu ni onikela mmaasini ni onakhuma ni emetaalya.
Amerikaanu a imeeturu 1,94 ni ikhiilu sawe 89 ooxintta emetaalya awe enimphiyereriha 25a, wa seyiya, 21 ti sa ewooro.
Okathi wa ewoora emosa ni iminuutu 15, Phelps ooxintta ewooro ni imeeturu makuruthu 200 ni mporovani wa imeeturu 4x200 liivere.

Elatarato, yooneyanxe ohiyu, khuwaari mutthu oolakela ni kohiyo ''mulopwana oonanara murima'' ya Phelps nooxintta emetaalya yoopacerya, masi numpecari mwaana oohipixerya eyaakha, Boomer, nooxintta emetaalya ya nayili.
“Phelpesinho”, mwa nuulumo, onikhala ntoko khuwaasiveliwe, okhala wiira owiitho wa tiithi awe waahaana okhala wooriirya.
Wala owo waari ni ikhove.
Katinka Hosszú nlelo oniphwanyaneya onari ipurusentu 100 sa miphira Olimpiku wa oRiiyu wa Xaneeru.
Nooxintta ewooro wa imeeturu 100 sa ikooxita ni imeeturu 400 sa medley, hunkara oowela mapuro oorekamexa wa epootiyu mmeeturuni 200 sa medley.
Oolokiherya tho opheya-opheya muvirelo wa olimpiku: iwoora 2 iminuutu 06 isekuntu 58, omuchiraka mwaneeneene Omuro-2016 ori ti waalolaniwa.
Ni iwooro tthaaru, Kating oniphwanyaneya onari namakatelela orina imetaalya soowaatta wa iporova sa naveekhaawe okhuma miphira sa Sidney-2000.

Xoronaliixita a emisoora ya osulu wa ameerika NBC, Chris Marlowe, ohaakuxa maamerikaanu ni maparasileyiru okathi olavuliwaaya wiira Lili nkhama “iyawe” a voleyipoliixita Larissa, veeraneyaawe mphira a voleyipooli ophareya wa Copacabana.
Miyo kimphavela ovekela muswammaha wa ele kivonyalaaka olelo.
Voosuwanyeyawene, Liliane ti mwaara a Larissa”, oolavula Marlowe okathi mukina oTiwiiteri.
Noomala mphira a ilapo sa oParasiili ni Ilapo sa Wiiraana, Larissa waahirowa opankaata ohakalala ni Lili, yoowo othelannaawe mwaakha wa 2013.
Ti weyiwo Marlowe olavunlaawe: “Owo aahimukapatta Lili.
Owo ti iyawe (husband)”, oolavula Chris Marlowe, opacaka siiso etetere muhina mwa areeti sosiyaale.
Asosiyasawu Ateleetika a pookisi Irilanteesa oolavula woomoliwa wa puxiliixita Michael O’Reilly niwooniheriwa ‘B’ okhupaliki orumeela doping.
Ateleeta waahipaka isaame ohinatthi weetta mukwaha wa miphira Olimpiku oRiiyu wa Xaneeru, masi mukhumelelo awe orwaale niinaano.
“Michael oohiya eViila Olimpika ni khontthikela tho ommana mphira.
Ekonseelyu Olimpiku ya Wiirilanta eniphwanyaneya okathi ola epakaka mananna oomuttikiherya mulaponi mwahu voowaakuveya'', oohimya Asosiyasawu mmuhupini mwawe.
Ohinatthi wooniheriwa mooniheryo ‘B’, ateleeta a miyaakha 23 waaruumumulihiwa paahi mumphirani.
’Reilly waari mulipelelo a muroromelo muulupale wa Irilanta oxintta emetaalya wa Mphira Olimpiku.
''Mwene'' Pelé ookhupali wiira onipaka efisiyoterapiya wiira wakhalele omutthukweloni wa Miphira Olimpiku oMuro-2016 mahiku yeettaka 21.
Mulipa oomuttika mphira khiwaawenrye orowa omuhakalaloni mwaha wa ekumi awe yahaakhanle saana.
''Kinivira keettihika efisiyoterapiya aka ni kinipaka sooteene wiira kikhale ni nyuwosa omuhakalaloni wa omutthukweloni wa mphira.
Miyo kinnoophentasani! ''oolepa Pelé mutuwiitereni mwawe, weyiwo waahin'hiyaawe muhupi: ''Miyo kootepa otthapela mitthaka kaakhenlaaka sookilipiherya wiira kipenuwe olumwenku wooteene, wa #Olympics".
Pelé wooperariwe niinaano ni nto vo owo oniphwanyaneya okathi wompenuwa eretta awe.
''Ori oRiiyu wa Xaneero oolikaneene wiira okhalele Olimpiiyata?
Djokovic ti "ettheneeri" wa maateleeta a waalemaanya.
''Onikela okhala oRiiyu wa Xaneero oolikaneene wiira okhalele miphira sa Olimpika mwaneene ene?'' ti mukoho onimakela okhumelela atthuru, mahooleli ni maxoronaliixita.
Mwaha ola woolula mahiku ala ovikina waalavunlaaya imperensaa wa isumana iye sivinre, masi nlelo khasireere itthu soottharelela.
Ohiya maasi oottuxereya mmatthiyani ni moopopiho wa iviirusa Zika, mulovolo onimalela oruuha mulattu muulupale mmureerihoni.

Inakurasawu ya axipooro a niinaano anivira mmwe munitepaaya okhumelela iporova yaakela wiiraneya nihiku nla na noorempwa, 1, masi ehiiyale mpakha enamathanu, mahiku yeettaka 5, nihiku na mutthukulo wa Olimpiiyata.
Olelo, wiira kirowe esenturu komerisiyaali kikelaka oViila Olimpika, weyiwo oniviriwa iminuutu 15, miyo kivinre iminuutu 45 ephiro yoohaaweya, mphira ohinapacerye.
Voowi okacamihe tho mwaha, esixiteema ya esekuransa oroothikilela etaamika ni eroovukula mweettelo wa anamweettiha.
Okampu woowaatta mphira, aapacerya orwa atthu anceene ni anikhala ottyaawene wa imperensa, ohinkhala wiira ti ale akhalanne ihakhi soosuwanyeya.
Nihiku nawe noopacerya oRiiyu wa Xaneero, teniixita Novak Djokovic waahootheriwa “okulukhana” a maateleeta a miteko sikinaku oViila Olimpika.
Thomas Jaeschke, Aaron Russell e Kawika Shoji, anamwiira mpantta a nikhuru ninkela waakiherya Ilapo sa Wiiraana ovoleyipooleni wa alopwana, elamuliwe valataratoni ni seereviyu.
''Miraarelo sa okhala oViila Olimpika: waaphwanyaka anamphira aalupale'', oolepa Aaron Russell owinxitakaraama.
Janne Mueller, a ekiipa ya atthiyana ya ohokeyi reeliva, oohela tho mureetini sosiyaali muthukumano wa axipatthani awe ni Djokovic.
Vamutthakani wa elatarato, owo waahipaka murukuneyo mmosa omulamulaka liiteri wa ranking da ATP ni mitteho tixitaali sa niinaano: apilikatiivu a ekeekhayi oowuncereriwa "Pokémon GO".
"'Die Danas' (okhala wiira ekiipa ya atthiyana a waalemaanya a hokeyi reeliva ti yoosuwelaxiwa) oomutotha Pokémon ooreerela oViila Olimpika ohiyu ola", ohooniherya.
Oviila Olimpika nlelo aakhala maateleeta aniviravira anari ottyaawene wa imperensa.
Vakhaani ti ale anikhuma ni anarowa mapuro yaale anoonaaya wiira ammalela ovaanelaka ni maxoronaliixita.

Siiso, nihiku nla na nayili kinari vaava koowerya olavulana mukhulupale a oKwiné-Pisawu Renato Moura yoowo woonihenrye mulipelelo muulupale wi anamattikha oowayili anookhala makampeyawu a waafirika, Augusto Midana ni Taciana Baldé.
Davilson Morais ti puxiliixita a elapo ya okhaapu-veeriti ni evaara awe yoopacerya okhalela Olimpiiyata.
Nuuhikhala wawe saana, Morais onnilaleya otthuna wawe opacerya eporova, masi onnisuwela wiira ephiro ti yoorikarika.
Mahiku maxexe wiiraneyaka mutthukulo, nikoho ninviraneya ti wakhala wiira Riiyu ti oolikaneene wi wiiraneye Olimpiyata.
Mahooleli, anamphira ni mapuliitiku, aniira aayo, maateleeta tho, masi ale makariyooka aniripitula iphula saya.
Siiso, annikhupali wiira Epooma Yooreera ti ele eniwerya waakhele icapa wa ''mananna a oparasiili''
Okhaapu Veeriti ni Kwine Pisawu ni mikhumelelo soovirikana oTaasani wa Ilapo sa Waafirika.
Atuparawu ooripelela anihala vakhaani omaliheriwa, Kwine-Pisawu nlelo ori osulu wa nikhuru nawe.
Otaasani wa Ilapo sa Waafirika wa mphira Khaapu Veeriti wookacamiha olelo muvirelo awe mpantta wookhiserya wa muxinttano noochiriwa elapo ya Ukanta wa 1-0.

Ukanta oovarelela othanliwa wawe ni Khaapu veeriti oniphwanyaneya onari nipuru na neeraru ni ikhomo xexe ehaleelaka ekhomo emosa wi omphwanye Tanzaniya ori nipuro na nayili onittikha meelo ni Lesothu.
Tansaniya wamutthukwa Khaapu Veeriti ola onoomaliheriwa.
Nave tho Kwine-Pisawu khololanne ni Namiipiya khuuvo ohenle ikhoolu ni nlelo ori vasulu wa nikhuru K ni ikhomo seyiyo thanu ni tthaaru sintoko Namiipiya.
Mosampiikhi ni Sampiya ni ikhomo xexe anittikhasa meelo.
Ni tho Ankoola ommuttikha meelo ni Purikiina Faasu mphira.
Efiilime ya Mmosampiikhi ''Piipi Tesanoove ni Esiiri ya Soviyeetiku'' yooxintta etthuvo oKheeniya.
WAAXINTTONI

Efiilime ya Mmosampiikhi ''Piipi Tesanoove ni Esiiri ya Soviyeetiku'' yaahikhalana mithinto miili wa itthuvo Kisima ya Esipo ni Esineema, wuumalani wa esumana evinre, oKheeniya: mupakelo wooreerela, João Ribeiro; ni namapaka a neyili, Ana Magaia.
''Nkireere oxukhurela etthuvo ela kaakhenlaaka '', oolepa Ribeiro ofeesipuukhini wawe.

Mmutthakani, Ribeiro onnaaxukhurela anamwiira mpantta a nikhuru nawe ''wa mikhaliheryo sootheene avan'haaya'', ni amusi ''aniveleela miteko sawe anivilela mikwaha sawe sootikiniha, apatthani aka ootheene, nkireere oxukhurela''.

Efiilime ya Mmosampiikhi ''Piipi Tesanoove ni Esiiri ya Soviyeetiku'' epakiwe ni muttharelelo wa eliivuru yoolikana ni ya ankolaanu Onjaki, yoowo onimuxukhurelaawe Ribeiro ''ororomeleya ni ipewe sootthuniheriwa''.

Wa etthuvo aavahiwe Ana Magaia, nateyaaturu oopacerya khalayi ni esineema ya mmosampiikhi, Ribeiro oohimeerya imperensa wiira owo khoreere ovara itthu soorikarika ni waaphwanyeene etthuvo nkhama ela ti vootepa oreera.
''Ti atiriixi ookhalana ehisapo yoosuwelaxiwa ni owaattana soosuwela'', oolavula Ribeiro.

Ana Magaia onimulavulela piipi (Catarina) anamwiira mpantta kamosa kamosa a efiilime, enooniherya ya epooma yamukhaani ya Waafirika waattamela opeyira - maari, weyiyo mutekiyo wa Mawusolewu empa ya peresitente onoopopihaawe okurumula impa sa anammuttettheni.
Mikhumelelo sa efiilime sinooniherya wiira anamwiira mpantta ''Jaki ni mpantthani awe Pi anipakelelasa miruku wiira yoopolase muttetthe aya.
Mwaataleyo woolamuliwa ohikelenle wiitthu, wahaari winkiliwa wa soviyeetiku mmosa owaattana isiiri.

Efiilime ya Ribeiro, yooniwe ekhwaha yoopacerya Omuhakalaloni oPan Afirikaanu ya Los Angeles, yooxintta tho etthuvo Yooreerexa ya Lonka-Metaraaxi ya efikisawu ya etisawu 7ª ya Palateyawu - Muhakalalo a Ilapo soothene ya eSineema ya Epooma ya Ophareya, oKhaapu Veeriti.
Mwaahiyu, ''Piipi Tesanoove ni Esiiri ya Soviyeetiku'' onikela wooniheriwa oMuhakalaloni wa eFiilime Afirikaanu ya Noova Iyoorikhi.
Terentinki: Jefferson Davis, Nascar, Isabel dos Santos.
Nsina na Jefferson Davis nimkhala woonaneya muhina mwa trends wa Tiwiiteri, ni tho okapitaale wa Exitaatu ya Ovirixiiniya, Richmond, anamaphavela exariya aakurumula exitaatuwa awe.

Jefferson Davis waari puliitiku a waameerika ni waari perisitente wa Ixitaatu Sookonfeterariwa okhuma mwaakha wa 1861 mpakha 1865, okathi wa ekhotto sivili ya waameerika, yoosuwelaxiwa okhala Ekhotto ya mukawanyiho.

Ixitaatu Sookonfeterariwa saari 11, noovira mwaathanle wa peresitenti Abraham Lincoln sinakawanyeya muhina mwa Ilapo sa Wiiraana okhala wiira akina khiyaatthuna wiira mukontho ohaculiwa atthu sintoko xipalu ohimale wi muhakhu wa ilapo iya ohirimeele.
Jefferson Davis waari puliitiku oosuwelaxiwa okathi ole oovinre wa Ilapo Sookonfeterariwa.
Anamaphavela oxuwela exariya oRichmond aakumiha muru wa exitaatuwa.
Mukhumelelo ola oheliwe oTuwiitereni ni ohooniwa ivaara soophiyeryaka ikonto 70 mwaha wa mwaha yoola voosiiso wa enamathanu ela, 11 wa xuunyu.
Muuphaveloni mwa Google, imilyawu soophiyeryaka emosa ni eriyari aya ti sootominariwa ni kampeyonaatu a woomolana wa mikukutta Nascar.

Ela okathi Bubba Wallace, namweettiha ooriipa veekhaawe wa Nascar, noolavula mwintereviixitani, wiira Nascar waahaana omalamaliha epantera yookonfeterariwa mmukhumeleloni mwaya, wiira ooniherye muteko awe ookhattela erasiiximu.
Enamaxexe Nascar onikela opaka yeeyo.
Olelo alipa owaasivela moomolano kanhiya othokoca mwaha yoola.
Winstakaraama nihoona mutthaka mmosa wa IGTV wa eperifiili Hypebeast.

Hypebeast oomwarya eviitiyu yookhala anamasuweliwa ancipale, okhuma Demi Lovato, a Meek Mill, Justin Bieber, Billie Eilish, Post Malone ni akinaku alavulaka wa onyokhiwa wa anooriipe wala akhalelaka ophavela exariya mwaha wa mwiiveliyo wa George Floyd.
Wa yoolempwa, eperifiili yaalepiwe: Anamasuwelaxiwa
Mmwaryamwaryo ola ohooniwa ni atthu oophiyeryaka ikonto 100, ireyasawu soophiyeryaka ikonto 13 ni ikomentaariyu soophiyeryaka 100.
oYuutuupi esipo kamosa kamosa ori otoopi 3 wa iviitiyu sootepexa wooniwa ti a Moneybag Yo.
Esipo eyo eniihaniwa Could Shoulder ni mahiku mayili paahi ehooniwa ni atthu oophiyeryaka emilyawu emosa.
Mufiilimeni, tarayileri wa efiilime epheya ya Keanu Reeves, Bill & Ted 3: Face the Music nlelo enivira esivelaka.
Oweepisayite wa VOA mmosa ookhalayi onikhala waasivela anamoona.
Aafirika ohaana oreeriha mpakeliyo wa iliivuru sa oxikola, enoopererya wa yoolempwa ya Unesco.
Muhakhu oovirikaniha mwaha: oniphaveya okhalana muhakhu owaatta, orumeela vooreera muhakhu owo ni waatta soophaveleya.
Anamwane owaatta a waafirika kharina iliivuru sa oxikola.
Akinaku ahaana woolihana.

Maxipesiyaliixita a ixikola anilavula wiira vannireerela okhalana mapurusoori ansuwela ni iliivuru wiira ophwanyaneye mwinnuwelo wooreerela wookhaliheriwa ni Ilapo sa Wiiraana, anaakiherya etukasawu ya ekwalitaati wa atthu ootheene.

Mureeriho wa Ilapo sa Wiiraana wa musomiho, siyensiya ni elimalelo (Unesco) onilavula sa mwaha ola ni onivaha miruku sa oreeriha muhina mwa yoolempwa sa eMonitoriya Kolopaale wa iPoliitika ya Musomiho.
Elapo ya oKamarawu, musomo mmosa onnimaliherya ohimya wi eliivuru emosa annoolihana anaxikola oophiyerya 12 ni emosa ya Matemaatika anaxikola 14.
Mapuro makina a elapo ya Ukanta, anaxikola oophiyeryaka 30 aninyakulihana mwaha wa eliivuru ya osoma.
Asma Zubairi, namwiira mpantta wa nikhuru nilempe yoolempwa, onihimya wiira muthowelo wa iliivuru mwaha wa mwinnuwelo wa muleeliheryo ni vaniphwanyaneyaaya exikola.
Zubairi onnikhupalela wiira etthu yooreerela opacerya mukawelo wa iliivuru muhina mwa ikalaase iye soopacerya, okhala wiira iyo ti ikalaase anamwane owaatta ohirinaaya iliivuru.
Nto ti vo onihimyaawe wiira ixikola soowaatta siniphwanyaneya ottyaawene, sinikhala othowa iliivuru.
ePanku Muntiyaali ennoopererya ilapo iya wiira wa ipurusentu tthaaru wala thanu wa muhakhu aya wa musomiho ohaana opakeliwaka iliivuru sa oxikola.
Masi wa yoolempwa ennimaliherya wiira, veekeekhayi, mpantta vakhaani wa musurukhu onnivahiwa.
Ilapo sintoko oPurunti ni eRepuupilika ya Eriyari ya waAfirika, Ilapo sa Wiiraana sinihimya wiira epurusentu emosa ya musurukhu wa mpantta wa musomiho ti onipakeliwa iliivuru sa oxikola.
Masi sookhala mikacamiho sikina, wa simosaru aya okhalaka wiira musurukhu onikhala opisa ophiya wala onhapuwelihiwa mipantta sikina.
Anamahoolela a ilapo sikinaku sa waafirika aatteha othuma iliivuru sa epaphelo yoopunttheya ni musurukhu vakhaani ni mimaliheryo soovarelelihiwa.
Wiitiyoopiya, iliivuru sa anaxikola a osekuntaariya epaphelo aya yaari yoopuntthiwa ni mimaliheryo soohiloka, eri ti etthu enitthuneya oruuhiwa tho sikinaku.
Mwaha wa yeeyo, mukawelo woohimalelaniwa wa iliivuru ti oniiriha anamwane ahalaka voohiliivuru.
Wi omale mwaha ola, onikela wuncereriwa musurukhu onivahiwaka wa iliivuru ni onikela ovahiwaka voolikaneya.

Wa yoolempwa ya mureeriho sa Ilapo sa Wiiraana sa musomiho, eSensiya ni Ewahala sinivaha miruku wiira ohaana okhala mukhaliheryo owaatta wa musurukhu, orumeela vooreera muhakhu owo ni mwaattelo wa itthu soophaveleya.
Zubairi onihimya wiira mananna oorumeela musurukhu esetore enikela otakiheryaka Onthamwene Kolopaali wa Ivasina, enivukula otthowa ni mukawelo wa exitooki.
Wa soolavuliwa wa eFuntu Kolapaali wa iliivuru enookela okhaliherya osuwela iliivuru sikavi sinikela ophaveleya oWaafirika, onnilipelela Zubairi.
CAN 2021: Kwine-Pisawu ni Mawuritaaniya ti ikiipa simosa paahi sihihenle ikoolu wa ikiipa 24 saamuttikha mphira.
Thanu ni tthaaru wa soomaliherya eporova enikela opacerya namurunku.
YAWUNDE —
Kwine-Pisawu khowenrye okoluxa wa iselesawu piili sa makhuru a (CAN) 2021, weeraneya oKamarawu ni miphira sa Thanu ni tthaaru soomaliherya sinikela opacerya namurunku, mahiku yeettaka 23.
Noomala okathi wa makhuru, nipuro na okhiserya na nikhuru D, aakhala yahaaloliwe ni aakhala ayili yaaloliwe, voohikoluxa ni araru yaahihaawa.
Eselesawu ekinaku yahaatthunkwe nnakhala ekoolu emosa ti Mawuritaaniya okhisenre wa nikhuru F, ololiwe ivaara vararu, ni kohenle nnakhala ekoolu emosa.

Wa mwaattelo wa mmakhuruni, sookoluxiwa ikoolu 68 (eri ti enooniherya 1,89 wa khula mphira) ni ekiipa ekolunxe ikoolu soowaatta ti ya oKamarawu ni ikoolu thanu ni piili, wa seyiya, thanu sikoluxiwe ni Vincent Abubakar, namasuwelexa okoluxa mpakha va.
Ekiipa ephiyerenrye ikhomo soowaatta ti ya oNixeeriya ni ikhomo thanu ni ixexe ni Mawuritaaniya, ekiipa ehiwenrye okoluxa.
Ekiipa ekhumme voohiloliwa nnakhala ekoolu emosa ti ya oSenekaali, eri ti eronwe mpakha wuumaleloni wa mphira, ni ekoolu emosa ni miyoopolelo miili soohikoluxaniwa.
Wa ikiipa piili soowooneyaxa sironwe mpakha omalamala miphira ti Kamoorexi ni Kampiya.
Kalantaariyu:
Namurunku: Purikiina Faasu-Kapawu ni Nixeeriya- Tuniisiya
Noorempwa: Kwine Koonakiri–Kampiya ni Kamarawu–Komoorexi
Enamayili: Senekaali–Khaapu Veeriti ni Maroku-Malawi
