Munceene nipuuro aweehe opwattuwa wa Olumweeku wa isiipo, okhaliheriwa oreeriheliwa, niira na nsu na Olumweenku nniiraneeya mweeri wa neeraru wa khuuta mwaakha oniiraneya epaata ya Oluwaanta vamoosa ni masiina owunuheryexiwa muhina mwa isiipo seelapo n laapo sokhopeela.
Elaapo ya Osantumeeya enoolaxeryana ni José Aragão
Muliipo oleepa mwaha wothananiha "Ola Bandela Subli".
Nfaluume elaapo ya osantumeeya onikupali wi okwa wa muraatti ni namathokoosa José Aragão wi oyeleela omoosawa " muthiinto a ephattu yopaceerya wunuweexa".

Muhina mwa muhuupi wa makweelo opheleeliwa amuusi,Manuel Pinto da Costa, onilipiherya wi Aragão " ohixunuwiha variyaari va makooto a insiipo sa mulaponi yaawo iyaakha sa namuloko 60 yavimiiya XX, ahihoolela ni ovaaha mukhaliheryo awe ni wivahererya wawe, mutumereeryo orehereerya vasya-asya isiipo sa osantumeeya, ipaceryaaka mukhaleelo mmoosa otaphuuwa ni itakiheryo sokhopeela, vaceenexa wa ekontineeti ya waafirika,vohitapanyeerya mukhaleelo a msophattuxiiwa ni muthiinto sothaleleeya sa isiipo sa osantumeeya ".
Onoonetaxa saapa sotepeexa osuweeliwa ,nsiipo na ekanyeeryo ya elaapo “Ola Bandela Subli”,, Nfaluume ottopaanyerya" vohittipiheya ni ophattuwa wa mukhaleelo wa elaapo yapinaatamu Onitumeererya".
José Aragão,opweteeya mutiveela yoola elaapo ya Oportukaale omaliheheryeene iyaakha 73 sa manuweelo awe mwaha wacekwereere ya murupeela.

Muhooleli, muliipo Okhoopela wiipa ni maapuuru-ohimukhaawe wa nikhuuru nosivelaaxa na isiipo ‘Os Úntues’, José Aragão, onookhala muhantisini mwa masiipo osantumeeya ntooko muleepi a"Ola Bandela subliQuando a Bandeira Subiu, muthukumaano orepeele mwiriira wabotapwuwa wa elaapo ya Osantumeeya.

Ni mukhaleelo wa omuraatti ni onamathokiiha yooyo muteeko awe onawiipe onihoviherya ni ekwaaha yootepa wa nikhuuru “Os Úntues”, José Aragão taari muraatti ni namataphuleela a masiipo ya awo oleelo ari othaleeleya ni amupuweelo muhina mwa isiipo sa osantumeeya.
Mwaha nithonyiherya ahu ti vanceenexa ole oriiwaOla Bandela subliQuando epaattera yoweela .
Aleepi arumeela Nttaava na ekuunya animukhoromela Eyo piiyo Jaime de Figueiredo
Namwehereriha, namavaahyiha ni namaleepa mithaka sa isepweere a elaapo ya okaapu-Veerete onoorowa wooliha nsiina nawe mmatataani mwa empa ya iliivuru ya mittetthe a epooma eriyaari awe.
Anamaleepa a laapo sa Nttaava na ekuunya avuwiihasa emutiivela yeela, ipooma ya Opharaaya, namaleepa isaayu, namavaahyiha ni muleepi a isepweere okaapu-Veerete Jaime de Figueiredo (1905-1974).

Muthukumaano wa VIII wavaliipo oleepa arumeela Nttaava na Ekuunya, muraano mmoosa wa Muraano wa Ipooma Eriyaari aya irei iye sinlavuula Nttaava na ekuunya nirrina ekanyeeryo aya ( UCCLA) ni nikhuuro na aliipo aweha-weha Munsiipiyu wa Oparaaya,yothukumaanya milooko miili sa axaana axithiyana ni alopwaana a maleepo nipuuro nne niiri na neeraaru vaootharelana na eriima ya elaapo ya okaapu-Veerete.

Niira nottottopeliwa mwaaha mmoosa oyariwa epooma yeele weewo othapelawe iyaakha sawe iye 160( mahiiko yiira yeettaka 29"a mweeri wa nexeexe) ni ni enuuraanya miira maali Okhoopela nithtweliiwe ni nsiina na ekeleexi,Atlantic Music Expo (AME) ni Kriol Jazz Festival.
"Room ni muteeko solepa: maliitere alupanyeerya omuutthu, onawirukuuxe ni onanttompe" waari ti mwaha watanyeerye aliipo ari taleepa wi yakakhaane miruuku, moonelo ni iphiiro.

Waale yaari ahoolel,vyaarisi ti Nfaluume okaapu-Veerete, ni mukhaleelo awe omuleepi, ni miniixituuro avakhalayiini a muteeko sa ephattu ni Miyataneelo Nakhopeela wa Kuveeruni wa Kaapu-Veerite, Jorge Tolentino , yoniheerye omuthapeelavwawe omuttittimheryakan Jorge de Figueiredo.

Mmukhapeleeli okhiserya a mapuuro asukiiwa iliivuru na Munsiipiyu wa Oparaaya ni ole okupaleeliwa wi tuule mmoosa waalecari alupaalexanni olemeliheya muhina mwa maleepo okaapu-Veerete,Figueiredo onoorowa ovuwihiwa nsiinanawe volutteleleya ni empa yameelo ya iliivuru Munsiipiyu wa eriyaari ya epooma, ntooko vawuwihe awe oniiraani wa nfaluume a munisiipiyu Óscar Santos.
Neephattu, mwixittiihi ni muleepi Manuel Brito-Semedo, ovaaha mukhuneelo wa mweeri a namuloko ni miili a eyaakha ya 2017 a yorattela awe"Jaime.
Muleepi a isepweere, Namakhayaati ni muliipa oleepa isaayu" wabile otrerihela awe ni othoonyerya awe mulaattue sa muliipa onisayariiha, muleepi a isepweere ni muraatti omurumeela palaaxitiiku.
Brito-Semedo, olavuulamuhapaarininmwa VOA, muhiina mwa porokaraama Soratteliwa ni Sothukuleela, oromolaaka muthukumaano aleepi ni muliipa ovuwihiiwa.
Muwiriyane:
"Wiiya vohikapwitthi"muhina mwa mapuuro amaaka alipo amweetta

" Namiruuku Eyo piiyo akhopeela aryaasa ntooko 'toleeta' nibmalipeelo awalameela esisapo ", waari wixiliihakiwale akha nikhumaana mwaano mwa nahapaari, Oparasiili,yoreeriheliwa ni milooko milooko sede da asuuweli a muteeko sa mihuupi sohiimwa isiisapo ya woowurya ni soolya muhina mwa eseenturu ya Solaleerya, epwanyaneya Eri mittetthe wa Opaara ya Oticuka.

Voteepexa ti wi khekhaale etthu nnakhaala etthu mukerekhere, vahikhaale nipuuro na anakooso namukwiini nni, ni mapuuro ophiiwa maraaru, ahiwerya waaliha atthu imiiya sene, ihikhalaane nnakhaala okaathi owehereerya ipoorre sootteyiva.
" Muxiirini mwa masaasu" ti moolipa viira mutthu ophaveelaka olya yoothana mapuuro sohiiwa osenturu wa Solaleeriwa.

Ntooko vakhalecaya yooniwaka valataratoni, ekiilu ya yoolya viira otharihlaka mukhaleelo ovirikanyiiha soolya, soosivelaxa, iye maparasileero aromooaaya siikwa vohoviheryavo itoolari 30, vohikootha woowurya, ekaafe ni soolya yokiseryani.
Seeyo tho siiri sootepa oliipihiwa esisapo.

Okhuma -okhuma nihiiku nopaceerya koohapuwa nipuuro nne, ekitaanyerya omala okaathi owaatta kihilyiiye etthu wala yoole ekikuumiha kirowa aos mpaakha nipuuro nikhaliiwa ni khiyaroowa mpiixaani soottiyiiva nipuura namukhaani nne nitumihasiiwa nottiyiivela muhina mwa mikhaari-khaari 15 nnakhaala 20 wiira ori mweetto.
Ephaace ethonyeriwe valataratoni, vothoniyiherya, enkwa nipuuro neene nnle nakooso vophiyaaka itoolari 10, muvirikaneelo mmoosa mulupaale.
Masi vookhala vophovatho.
Epasawri yamukhaanixa yabepooma yamukhaani yanaaphiira ti voolattana wiiya ohirumeeliwaka akapwiitthi.

Elooca enikheeleela musuurukhu wa khuuta itthu oriiki, ntooko sooratteliiwa sa ikaruuma ya maluuxu ni niniye simoomoleela pwilimwiithi, isiisapo siiphiiya ikwaaha thaanu wa malipeelo esisapo wataanianiha ni isiisapo sinrumeeliwa epooma ya Riiyu ti Xaneero.
Eniiriha i wi Ilooca iye siiri ootteyiiwene.

Vanthoonyeryo, ekaaxa emoosa ya ikaruuma sikweheery eyo piiyo atapitatoore 10- ekaruuma yulupaalexa, voothariha vi evoloweelo mmuttettheni mwa Oparasiili ti emoosaru ya olumweeku-vomalelani enkwa itoolari 30, masi muhiina mmeeliivya ikwaaha piili, nnaamwi tuupulo emoosa ya mmureette a pwilimwiithi othawaali etoolari 6 omarakaato, okhaala othuumwaka ni itoolari 18 muhina mwa epooma yamukhaani yanaaphiira.

Okaathi wa ekwereere ya siika, mukhaleelo Ola towalameeliha nnleelo masi ale ari okhopeela ahiriina vexikhaani nibahikhaale Ilooca itoolari 40 mwaha wa ekaraatha esuuka sowuupuwela sa 32XP, viiraka omarakaato ohiviriikana ethawaali ni itoolari 12.
Isiisapo soowalameela muhina mwa epooma eni tho wiraneeyaka owalameela isisaapo, mwa sotheene iye mwaha wa mayeeso.

Okariyoka anikooha waalhaale wi, okaathi wa kathoowa ole muhina mwa elaapo ele tho, isisaapo siniireliwa aliipo ari taakhala aniipwanya'mikuukutta somahala' vothariheliwa ni mayeeso ale, inoorowa okeleelihiwa omihooli.
Trending: Mark Zuckerberg; Paulo Flores; Donald Trump; Kardashians
Muhiina mwa ekaruuma ya tuwiiteri mwaha mmoosa apinaatamu oaleelobo EUA anitakaaherya nsiina na CEO mufeesipuukhiini, Mark Zuckerberg.
Zuckerberg, opwanyaneeya ophunyeyeene, mwaha wi impressa sa ilaaponihunteerya ikampaanya saya Solaleerya mufeesipuukhiini.

Interessa sophiovaka imiiya 500 sihakwuleela eyeekeese ekeese, ikumiiha Solaleerya vsaya nibkhipwanyiiha exukhuuli muhina mwa nthaavi na semaahala vaavo vaari vaweeeya concerne, muhina mwa soopwaanya.
Wi ipwanyiwe iphiiro sa mwaha ola,Mark Zuckerberg okhupaali wi ohaana okumanela ni impressa iye esumaana eyo.
Muhina mwa ekaruuma yanamunceene Mark Zuckerberg, mwaha wa trending ti olaleerya ya nfaluume Donald Trump

Nfaluume a elaapo ya Wameerika othookiha muleleeryo mmoosa oniihimwa awe wi Epooma ya Noiva Yoorokhi onoorowa okuuruxa mukhaliheryo apiliisa okhaale ophiiyaka epilyaswu emoosa ya itoolari ni wi" nileelo doido nfaluume a nikhuuro mahooleli nnoorowa okhayaari mukuukutta mmoosa ni maleepa ancaano ekanyeeryo yaBlack Lives Matter epikaata ya 5, vonyoholeela epikaata ele".
Trump, oniihimwa wi nileelo nnaamwi ekanyeeryo ya Black Lives Matter ti " nthoonyeryo onyookana" ni winmusuruukhu wahasna orumeliwaka wi iwananiweke omaaliha ekhiriime.
Muleleeryo ola othawaliiha ikooto sene 19 okawanya, voophovaka ikooto 37 waale ari tavaahe moneelo aya ni ophiiyaka ikooto 200,yakhuule.
O EUA, mutheekeeso trending ya wiixiita karaamu ti exiittiwa ni nikhuuro na mayiriima Kardashian.

Kim Kardashian olaleerya elatarato emoosa oryeene ni mmoosa wa anaawe Kendal Jenner oni ovuwihaka ekampaanya awe esya Burberry, Khloe Kardashian onixooniherya owareene muxitiitu enaarya ni mulupaale waale ari axihima awe Kourtney akhumeelae mukuweeka.
Yakheleele paahi muleleeryo mmoosa wa Kylie, masibphataari wupuwela w ole mukhaawe waari nipuuro nopaceerya na trending ansaana.
Oleelo ti niira nothapeela iyaakha sa muraatti awankoolo Paulo Flores ni ole ti mwaha hatrending mukoothani mwa ixiitakaraami awankoola.
Muyutthuupini, isinyaalo sinooniwa sa Rookhi staari a reepi DaBaby vamoosa ni Roddy Ricch ori trending, oriina voophoovaka imilyawu seene waale ari tawehaase.
Esiipo ela tho khekhaale nipuuro nohilooka na osuulu waale 10 awameerika- vanireerela wiweleela esumaana !
Nipuura ninaakhuulabna ehapaari ya VOA ikaruuma piili sinivaaha ekasoopa yohaleleya waale arumeela anamasiveliiwa urumeelabekaruuma yab iterneeti:
Sol de Carvalho ni" iphiiro sa murrettele"

Mamosampikaano athapeela iyaakha 20 okhuma vaavale vasinariwe aya muraano a murrettele a Dilma, omalamaliihe ekhoomo tokhiseerya wa Ekhootto yavirikanyiha atoiropa a Kuveeruni ni anawixiniike a nikhuuru na Renamo.
"Ekhootto ya iyaakha 16".

Namathokoosa mosampikaano Sol de Carvalho okupaleela wi tivoreerela waruheela alli ari atthu Omosampiikhi ikaruuma sikhanle wakhaliheryasaka wi asuweelexe mukhaleelo wamuharooye okhanyereerya ovaha mukhaliheryo awe orumeelaka esineema ethalakaasa" Iphiiro Sa murettele mthokiiho mmoosa ohimukhaawe wa italo- mosampikaana.
Sol de Carvalho, owariwe eyaakha ya 1983 khuunuwela mmuttettheni mwa Winyapaani.
Osoomwe muhina mwa esineema Oportukaale.
Iyaakha sa namuloko 70 oviira Oraatiyo Mosampiikhi ni variyaari va ereviixita Teempo.
Mwaakha wa 1985 ahoolela vohiitharuwa tho ekareela yothokiha assinema ni ahitumiha voophovaka isineema 20.
Tokhiseerya wa iye seiiri sikhaale ti othalakaase awe olavulaka mwaha wa Muraano a murettele Omosampiikhi " Iphiiro iphiro sa murettele"
Mmwiiwe Sol de Carvalho mmuvanelooni vamoosa ni muxirikha ahu amuteekoOuri Pota Pacamutondo, a nossos na muthokiho okaathi wa Raatiiyo Mosampiikhi, mwaha a miruuku a esineema ela yapothonyiherya.
Xapokweese toori tovuwihiwe ni mukhaleelo okampiyawu wa mukuthaano a mittetthe sa iitto wa Ameeriika

Mutheekeeso a Amphira wa mittetthe sa othi wa Ameerika otweliiwe ni nsiina na Conmebol nolipiherya nihiiku notupheela muteeko terna, 5, viraneyaaka muthukumaano wa musinyaaloni, wi muliipo Oparasiili xapokweese ti kampeeya a ekwaaha yaveyaskha 216 wa mukuthaano ohiitto - Wameerika.

Vahilutteleeliwa mukhaleelo ole okhuuma enamaxeexe yokhisiirya,masi elipiheriwe vothaleleeya oleelo va paahi okaathi viraaya wiraneyaka muthukumaano wabaruumwa a Ilaapo 10 sa ohiitto wa Ameerika. Irumeeliwe ikaruma isya sa nvaanelo wa konseelyu, eriina aruumwa a Ilaapo 10 sa ohitto wa Ameerika.

Yoleepwa elaleeyiwe ni muraano muhiina mwa nikuukhu naya niiri ti Xapokweese " onrowa wakhelaaka wakhuta okaathi malemeelihiwo otheene ni sopwaneela Sá okampiyawu wa mukuthaano a ohitto -wameerika wa 2016", ni onittittimiha nikhuuru na Ateleetiko Nasioyonaale, na Okoloopiiya, niiri ti namanyakela- makhaata okampiyawu a mayeeso.

Vohiyatho vaavo, ekuluupi ya muttetthe okolompiiya onoorowa wakhela ethuuvo" yavimiiya saConmebol ao Fair Play", mwaha wa mukhaleelo a mupuweelo aya muhina movekeela mukhaleelo iyo piiyo nttitthimiho niireliwa xapekweensi.

Nikhuurna Chape, nne esumaana eviire nayeleele anaaphira, nikhuuru na ikettelo ni amahooleli muhina mwa ehasaara ya ntteeke mittetthe Okolompiiya, ninaano vá nokhalaana nipuuro nothokoseye René muhina mwa ekwaha yowuluula muxinttano ohitto- wameerika wa eyaakha 2017- eroowa oxiittana vamoosa ni ni nikhuuru na Ateleetiku Nasioyonaale o Metelam nihiiku nikhaake othaliwaka varões aya wiraneeya ekwaha ya makhuru a ethuuvo anamwakiherya a eyaakha ya 2017.
Mutumereeryo wa Conmebol oroowa okhaliheriwa tho mireerelo Sa Chape.
Mário Coluna oviira
Etheneeri ya nikhuuru na mphiira Pemfiika ni nikhuuru noportukaale, waari namathala a elaapo nibnfaluume amuraano omusampiikhi myaha Sa mphiira.
Etheneeri ya nikhuuru na mphiira Pemfiika ni nikhuuru noportukaale, waari namathala a elaapo nibnfaluume amuraano omusampiikhi myaha Sa mphiira.

Okaathi waniha awe nikuruuta, " mutikiniiho omwaleeliwa", oxiittiha etiitulu yopaceerya ya muxiittano wa elaapo ya Omosampiikhi nooviira okaathi wotaphuwa wavelaapo. Mwaakha wa 1976, vatumereriwa awe ni nikhuuru na Textaafiriika ya Oximooyu ni vothareelana nivaavo muhina Feriviyaariyu Omapuutu.

Eliika ya Waafirika ya mphiira ole onavonyiiwa, okhupareeliwa ni nikhuuru na NBA, nimpacerrya mahiiko aroowa aya wettaka 16 mweeri wa nethan muttetthe Okiikali
E BAL yalipeleliiwa wi tiá ya mweeri wa neeraaru wa mwaakha 2019, masi wuunteereriwa mwaha wa ekwereere.
KIIKALI-

Variyaari va mahiku 16 ni 30 a mweeri wa nithaanu wa 2021, anothukumanyiwa makhuru a Wafiriika 12 Okiikali, epooma eriyaari ya elaapo ya Ruwaata, nooviira eyaakha emoosa nookhala ehuuhu yopaceerya, yotanyeriwa ni mwaha wa ekwereere yaxiithu amutanyerya Koroona.
E BAL evonyeriwe vekeekhayi wi yaluuwe nihiiku 13 na mweeri wa neeraru wa 2020, Otakhaare, elaapo ya Senekaale, Masa yahitereeriwa mwaha wa epwepwetthe.
Muxinttano ti muhokhorokho wa mwataneelo mmoosa variyaari emoosa ya NBA ni muthekeso a Ilaapo muhina mwa mmphiira onavonyiiwa onithaniwa (FIBA).
Ikuluupi sa ilaapocsa wafriika 12 sinorowa wireele mmpaatte: Arixeeliya,Ankoola, Kamaraawu,Exiitu, Matakaaxikaare, Mali, Marooko, Mosampiikhi, Niceeriya, Ruwaata ni Tuniisiya.
Ela teeri ekwaaha yopaceerya wa muruuku da nikhuuru na NBA, wovonyeerya muxiittano mmoosa wireliwa akabota wa elaapo ya ota Wameerika.
Messi ti mphiira a eweero ekwaaha
Muliipo Waricentiina oxiitta vamukuthaanoni ni muliipa o walemaanya Lewandowski
PARIIXI-

Aricentiino Leonel Messi oxiitta ethuvo awe ya nethaneeli ya mphiira a weero ninmukhaleelo wa nanmuttkha mphiira wa Olumweeku, winyereriwe awe esekuunta yeela, mahikubari 29, o ipuuwa ya Châtelet, Opariixi, ni hapaari yaefaranseexi"France Football".

Ni muxiitto ole, “La Pulga" onooneyaxa ntooko namuttikha mphiira ni ithuuvo sa mukhaleelo a namphira alumweeku, vaninaanoni va matteivelaano WA itiitulu piili ni olebori Opurtukaale Cristiano Ronaldo.

Nthooko vanthoonya amwathaale anahapaari 180 a ilaapo sovirikana, nipuuro na nayili okeele mpuuwa ti polaaku Robert Lewandowski, a mpaatte wa Payeeri ti Muniiki, ni aneeraru, itaalu -Parasileero Jorginho, othariiwa ni Benzema o (Reyaale Matiriiti), Kanté o (Xelisiiya) ni Cristiano Ronaldo o (Maxeetere uniiteeti).
Mmoolumooni WA mwarya wa oxiitta, Messi ohimwa wi waari" voohiyu omoosa woteepexa othaleeleya.
" Te volemeela owaana wakhuta mmpaatte vamoosa ni Lewandowski, ori taxiittale phiira a weero a mwaakha ole oviire.
France Football awo tho ahiikhala ovaaha ethuvo.

Nyusi muri namaxutta ehaakhi ni mwahana mukhalanaka ethuuvo owaani " ohemereerta namphira a PSG, yoowo osuweleexe mulemeleelo wa muxiitto wa muraano a waricentiina wiraneeye mukuthaano Wameerika okhomooni vamoosa ni Parasiili.
" kwaaha sinceene koxiitta ithuuvo ela ni kahikhalana muruuku si yookhaala yakihaleela, masi mwaakha ola waari ovirikaana.

Miyo koweerya syoloherya Aka katthunexa Aka, nokwakwattula ikwaaha sinceene,okathi wa ekeekhayi kitherekuwasa, ni ithuuvo sinceene iye sinrya mwa iye niwerya ahu omuxittanooni a Wameriika, kimpheela okaawanyaa ethuuvo eyo naxirikha Aka a nikhuuru" ohiira.

Ethuuvo Kopa, eniireliwa namphira oreerela ohivikaane iyaakha 21 sa manuweelo muhina mwa mittetthe sa mutthetthe sa Wewuroopa, wa metiiyu Pedri, o Pareseloona, woowo omuxiittale Jude Bellingham o (Toriitimuuti),Jamal Musiala o (Payern ti Munikhi Nuno Mendes o (PSG), muliipo oportukaale ni okhalana maphattuwelo a Wankoola.

Mwa ipooxiiti iye, italiyaano Gianluigi Donnarumma oxiitta ethuuvo Yashin ya, mwakha wa 2021, vakwiriitani emoosa yakumaane awe ni Édouard Mendy ( oxiileya) Jan Oblak, (Atleetikuya Omatiriiti), Ederson (Manceexeteeri siiti) ni Manuel Neuer (Payeeri ti Muniikhi).

Muhii mwa mmphiira axaana axithiyaana, muxipanhoola Alexia Putellas a nikhuuru na Pareseloona, nomuxiitta mmphiira a eweero, ni, olaleerya waawe maasu, nimayiitthori amisiveelo, ohavekeela ethuuvo ele axirikha awe a Paarasa ni atua awe Jaume Putellas, aviire etuniiya mwaakha wa 2012.
" Ti vothaleeleya okhala okhoomo nno ni axirikha aka, khanirooweha itthu sinceene hiyo hoothe, ni nvavava noothaapa vamoosa ti mwaha okiteepiha otthaapa kitteliwe muriima.
Vanikisevela kipaceryaka waxukhureela axirikha aka, okhaale ti yamuttikhana aka mmphiira vootharelana ni ikwaaha sa mphiiro owo ni ale ari tattikhanea aka oleelo vaava.
Ti ethuuvo yomeekha masi mito kinookawanya ni nyuwaaso",
Ehaamo yoomwareela esetoore sa miteeko sothekuulela
Inyapaani ti mittetthe othaleeleya:Opasaruutu khosariiwe.

Ethooka yabokaathi wothekuleela Omosampiikhi vowoneyaxa yopaceerya, masi, mwaha wa ehaamu ya mukhaleelo ni troopa, nnleelo khonooneya nnakhala muteeko wotepa otuupa, vothaleleeya muttetthe wa Osofaala, epwanyaneya aya epaariki Nasioyonaale ya okoronkoosa.
Kuveeruni oleelo Omosampiikhi othalakaase othekula ntooko umoosa wa isetoore xeexe sowooneyaxa muhina mwa muthokiho wa iyaakha thanu,, masi manyakunyaku otoroopa anilaleerya oraala wawe.
Opaarikhi Nasioyonaale ya Okoronkoosa ohinuuheryeya, voovira, muteeko wothekula oniteepa okhuruwaxa, sala yarookhala Osofaala eriima ya manyakunyaku asaihaamu satoroopa mulaponi.

Mukhaleelo olattana oniraneeya tho epooma yotheene ya Omapuutu, wiyiiwo, vokaathi ola wa mwaakha, mapuru anakheleeliwa alerto onathekuleela shaana okhalaaka mmpaatte munceene sarowa wiraki isukiwe , masiela kheniraneya.

Mwivaavo, muttetthe wa Inyapaani, ni mwaattelo mmoosa owaattana mapuuro othekuleela,kherina mwaha oromoola nnakhala okuthakutheya, mwaha mpaakha vá onoorowa ovikaniha, vowaattexa, mwaattelo anamattekuula waakhele aya mwaakha wa 2015.
Mpanntte nnkiina, mapuuro otheene atthekuliwa oparatiisoxe nikhuuru na ikisiiro Pasaruutu sookhaalana vokaattin saya sotheene 200 sopwehiweene.
Mulaponi miteko sa otthekula onakhupaarele anaateko ikooto 300 wa atthu ni anikhaleela vophiyaaka ipuruseento 3,5 wa muruweryo amuumu nteryeene mwekunyani onithaniwa (PIB).
Mukuthaano a Ilaapo sa Wafiriika ori mwekunyani (CAN) a mwaakha 2021: Kaapu-Veeriti onittakakeela mayeeso vamoosa ni omuxiitta Etiyoopiya.
Okamaraawu amuxittasa Purkhiina Tasso nibamphiira 2-1 otthukuleliwa mayeeso.

Muraano wa nikhuuru na mphiira okaapu-Veerete yovolowa elibexitta ettimiinku,,9, muhina mwa mukuthaano wa Sa ilaapo sa Aafiiirik ekwaaha ya(CAN) 2021 , nomuxiitta Etiyoopiya muhina mwa iepooto 1 ni akinako 0 vamoosa ni ekiilu evolohiwe ni Júlio Tavares ,

Vimuthonyiherya mphira mulyeene, ni khuuru na Tubarões Azuis amuttikhasa mphiira muhina mwa mikhari khari 78 nibamphiira mmoosa ovonyoola mukhaleelo a mphiira, mwaha wowikariiwa mmwitiyoope Yared Baye mmukhari kharini 12, novonyola ekettelo ya namphiiraGarry Rodrigues.

Makaapu- veritiyaani, ahivolohiwe athanu wabale amuttikha mphiira okatti wotheene, ari ni ekwereere Covid-19, vamoosa ni tekiniiku Bubista ni anamattikha anli abalasse elapobaya ni mukhaleelo wa kwarenteena, yahattamelqsa bovoluwiha ekiilu ya nayiili vovirikanyiha ni Walias olattana mwaattelo wabikoolu wa mukwaha, nnaamwi yatamelexe epaliisa ya Márcio okaathi wa nayiili.Makaapu- veritiyaani
Oromoliwa waari namasuka matthavi mwetiyope,Teklemariam Shanko, wakiherye votepeexa oreera.
Anamphiira 6 paahi okaapu- Veerte yarokilathisi vamunyukhuni anamakhaoiiha.

Namukwiini a ekwaaha waari ankolaano Hérder Martins waari tokwehexa ovanyihiiwa anamattikha a wetiyoopiya nooviira, okaathi wopaceerya mwaha wawoniherya ekaraatha yacaano yiireliwa mwakiha Yared Baye,aruuye oraattela mwaha wa ekaraatha yoxeerya,nowehawa lsinyaalo a ekaruuma ya VAR.
Nomuxiitta ola, Kaapu- Veerte toori nipuuro nopacerya wa nikhuurna A, vamoosa ni axineene akamarawu, amuxiitte Purkhiina Faaso meamphiira 2-1.
Namaxexe, ya 13, akamaraawu anowanaana ni Etiyoopiya ni Kaapu-Veeriti onomuttikha vahinaatthi Purukhina Faaso.
Amphira ale ayiili oleelo va aroowa othoonyerya mavenyeryo wa ekwaaha ya 33'ya muxiittano wabIlaapo Sá Wafiriika, mesmo oniirela mpaantta miyuraanyo sothaleliwa 24, mwaseeye Kini-pisaawu.

Ale "Djurtus" taroowa ipaceryaaka enamaali , 11,ohinathi Sutaawu ,masi ale paahi 18 waale 24 anamattikha taarisa olikaaneene, mwaha wi aleesa 6 apwanyiwe ni mukhaleelo ekeekhayi muhina mwa omwaleyasiiwa waya.

Maali, nihiiku notupheela muteeko, 10, ananyiheriwa wi animwiraneya anphiiri a Senekaale - Simpaapwe ni Kine- konakiiri- Malawi,, ekwaaha ya nikhuuru B, ni Marooko-Kaana, Kamarawu- Kapaawu nnikhuuru C.
Macapuneexi aomiha manamuuna oreer otharihela Oparasiili
Kooxita ti Mariifi omuxiitta Capaawu mphiira 2-1
Mateeputu Ocapaawu aweehe mphiira CapaawuX Kooxita ti Mariifi, okaapu enithaniwa Arena Pernambuco ahavahasa nisoomi nimoosa na manamuuna oreer ela, wiraneyaka mukumaano a mphiira Olumweenku.
Nowehawa nikhuuru naya nixitiwaka ni Koxiita ti Mariifi, manipooniko aphukaasa okhuupa ikokhoola Sa mmunyukhuuni meemo yariisa aya, voohiya oriipwa muriima mwaha wa iresulutaato.
Mupuweelo othananiih Onitumeererya molumwenkuuni moteene.
Afinaale, kahiyo ti ya mahiiku oteene vawehiwa mupuweyo anamunceene masi ottottopeleya.
Capaawu otthikela ovolowa mukaapu enamaxeexe yeela, 19, ohoolo wa Kereesiya, oniihimwa nikuruuta no purutukeexi Fernando Santos.
Manipooniku orinokhanyereriwa oxiitta, watthuna okhalaaka nroromeelo nokeleela oohoolo.
Mayra Andrade, mukaapu - veritiyaani wa univerisitaate
Namathokoosa isiipo ni mutaphuleeli oni oniipa ele eri temukwaanya.

Owaariwa okhuupa vohapuwela, ntooko ohiimwa awe mwaneene, ni wunuuwe variyaari va ilaapo sa okaapu Veerete, Otakhaare, Luwaanta ni Alemaanya, ni variyaari va mipantte ikiina ikiina weetta awe, mmpaakha wihipeela muhina iyaakha 14 Opariixi.
Oleelo, ti mmoosa wa ale a nsu notepeexe osuwelexiiwa na muxoovo wa araatti a okaapu-Veerete ni, nnaamwi omwaavano awe, ,onithoonyerya mukhaleelo wa ewaraakha yekhopela.
Mayra Andrade oniipa ni ekeleexi, efaranseexi ni kiriyoolu, vohiiya tho ekuunya, orumeela awe wi otaphuleelaka mwaha sa maparasileero.
Namattokiha a mwaha sawe sinceene Mayrab oniromoola maasi ekeekhayixa, wi, ntooko vahimwa awe owaariwa okaapu-Veerete wawe niboniwuurya sowoona sa mukhaleelo ni sowoona sa mutthu a molumweekuni.

" Hiyo, niiri okaapu- veeriite mu nokhalaana otaphuuwa molumweekuni mu ni ninikhaala ni okaapu- veeriite ahu wa khuuta nipuuro nikhale ahu okhala", ohiire muratti wi, onikupaleela, " okhaala khuuta okaathi otthukuwa nimaasu makiina ni sotakiiherya".

Namalattuliwa wa erupiriika Soorattela ni Othekuleela,Mayra Andrade onilavula muhina mwa sotakiiherya, miruuku sivahiwe awe ni Cesária Évora okaathi wiira awe ótima iyaakha 12 ni sothokiha sawe mmukophani mwawe.
Muraatti onikupali wi aluupu "Lovelly Dificulty" onittikittha ekwaaha emoosa ya mukhaleelo a muteeko awe.

Vaari Sousa nvaanelo ni namathokoosa ni muraatti okaapu-Veerete Mayra Andrade, nossos na oleelo muhina mwa Sorattela ni Otthekuleela, muhina mwa Nsu na Ameerika, ni womalelani kinoohiyeryani mwaha ola wa aluupu aos okhiseeryaWe used to call it love.
Muraatti aloope omosampiikhi Ivan Mazuze olaleerya “Ndzuti”
Ivan Mazuze ti muliipa oniipa ni nloole nibnamathokiha insiipo vomosampiikhi, okhaala Oxikantinaaviya, ni mukhaleelo a muteeko owiipaa wawe sokhumela mwaha mwa sotakaheriwa ni sotakiha sovirikana.
Osoomwe isiipo Omapuutu, noovira Wunuverisitaate ya Okaapu,weewo okhume awe oroowaka Ota wa Wewuroopa, ntooko araatti akiina a cees Omosampiikhi.

Muteeko awe ti olo othalakasiwa afooro- ceesi nibsoopaaka sawe “Maganda" não ole aninaanoxe “Ndzuti” onooniherya mukhaleelo wovirikaana Sá isiipo(Afiriika ni itthu sa vaano ni sohiimwa sikina waale yaari anamalattuliwa- ntookoManou Gallo muliipo oniipa a okooxita ti mariifi ni kupaano Omar Sosa.

“Ndzuti”, olaleerya Omapuutu , wibnnoorowa oreeriheliwa vasta wa mahikubyaala ni nnokweherya orukureryani nsiina ole othaleela awe mmansawe mwaha wi ( vani somwa) wi oraapa sohiyeriwa muhina mwa ephattu wa ilavuleelo exankaana ntooko muruweryo wupuxerrya Sá makooto ale amukweherya osuweeliwa mukhaleelo awe.
Vaninaanoni vá Muzeze ti mwixittiihi a isiipo wa nikhuuru na ixikola sa Wooxilo, Noruweeka, weyiiwo ori tonkhalaa awe.

Vamurittini wawe sookhala sowaatta sa miirelo mpaatte awe muhina mwa miira othapeliwa muthinto oratteliwa Cassi, miirero mmpaatte sipakiwaaka miteko soluluwanavni isiipo sovirikanasa masiina a isiipo, ni tho itthuvo ntooko ele yotweliwa nikhuuru notemeexa oratteliwa Sá ceesi ni aluupu oreerexa wa ceesi/ okumenyeryena ni ikaruuma Sá eyaakha ya 2010.
Namuranya ahu ni muxirikhaAmâncio Miguel, , nahapaari ni namapaka isiipo, ovaneelanw ni Ivan Mazuze.
Muwiriyane nossos na nvaanelo muttapunyaka ekanyeeryo yoripeleela wala osuulu moono wolopwana wa nkuukhu.
Shortcutz muhina mwa mupuweleelo wa Riiyu ti Caneero
Niira niiriwa wooniherya ni nnoivaha ethuuvu ya esinema ya uurta -metaraxe yamaparasileero okhuuma esaapatu yeela, 18.

Nivaarte niiriwaOlho da Rua, Opoota Fooku, epooma ya Riiyu ti Caneero, enaimwakhela esaapatu yeela, 18 mweeri wa nethaanu miili, muthukumaano wolipuula wa Shortcutz Rio, nlaakabnowoonihiw esinema ya kuuruta- meteraxe.
Ti ekwaaha yopaceerya ya nlaaka naShortcutz, niphattuwa, eyaakha ya 2021, Olixipoowa, nnaphiya muttetthe a wa ekontineeti ya Wameerika.
Nipattuxiwe ni Pattuxiwe ni Rui de Brito, Shortcutzni tho esuweliwa Olixipoowa,Poorutu, Amisteritawu, Pareseloona, Pereeli ni Lonterexi.
Eyeekeese ekeese elayothaala Oriiyu ti Caneero mwaha vowehererya wa muliipa opala Purutukeexi Miguel Pinheiro ni atoore okiine Welket Bungué.
Muhina mwa nlaaka nna siroowa othonyeriwa paahi isinyaalo Sá maparasileero, mwiyaawose" Nikhuuli na Mwaanuni", na Clara Peltier, ni “Command Action'”,na João Paulo Miranda.
Anamathokiiha anihimwa wi “Shortcutz Rio khonivahererya mulataratoni mwa miira ottitthimiheya, onooniherya tho musiinekuluupi.

Ti tho nivekelo mimosa mowixaakiherya a manamuuna oweeha isinyaalo ni vatthuneliwa wibvalimalelihiwe voripeleela wakhuta okhaathi wa mukhaleelo a miruuku, ephattu ni sanamareeriha a Oriiyu ti Caneero".
Ni mwevaavo," wa khuuta muthukumano, anoorowa wiirela mpaatte anamalattuliwa- ottitthimiheya ni ale ari asuweeli okupaleeliwa variyaari va ephattu, wi vakweheriwe wepesiiwa mivaanelo wa miyupuweelo".

Oroowa okhalaaka Malásia mathanaxeexe, ni womalelani enookhala ekaala wabmwaakha, weyiiwo arowaasaya othikeela arumeela ithuuvo sovirikana Sá isineemasinooniwa, vatakaheteyaka esineema yopwanelexa, muratti oreerihexa, ilataarato yoreeraxa walavetuirilya wa nsu noreerexa.
Mwiweleele muhina mwa nvaanelo waMiguel Pinheiro famosa Welket Bungué:
Joseph Blatter ti otthikela othaliwa cabelo ni mukhaleelo wa nfaluume wa
Muhooleli Coritiyaano Ali bin al Hussein

Muhooli Cortaano Ali bin al Hussein ohiiya othikeela wirela mpaatta wa ekwaaha ya nayiiliya mwathaale wirelaka munyuuku wa ofaluuma wa nikhuuru na FIFA, niraneeyebensmathanu yeela, ya 29, opalaasiyo ya anapaaca ya muraano muttetthe wa Osuruukhi.

Muleleeryo Olá wiraneeye vookathi vakhaani vaavale nookhala osuweliiwa sopwanyiwa Sá ekwaaha yopaceerya yeeyo wa ivootu 206 sooloka Muhooleli ori vamunyukhuni valenJoseph Blatter wapwaanye ivootu 133 ni Ali bin al Hussein,73
Blatter waphaveela ivootu 140 wi oxiitte vekwaha yopcerya.
Vá mikhari khari soovira vakhaani hiya ya muhooli Coritaniyaano,Joseph Blatter walaleeriwe wi taxittale ni aniholeliha masi awe opaceerya ni mamaampuuru a FIFA.

Ola oroowa okhaala mutumereeryo wa nithaanu wa Blatter ohoolo wa muraano,mmasiponi mwa enamararu, ya 27, ni mwaha sohiloka muhina mwa makwaankwa atanyerye ovolowa mukalapoosa, wa atthu 10 vaninaanoxe va.
Reepi onalipiherya amwaavano Omosampiikhi nno wi ahiiye awuurya ikhaacu ni iye Siri sihapala. Wala isuruma
Phe Urbano a iyaakha 30, ninaanoxe va olaleerya yopaka awe emoseene ottwele awe "Vícios" Omosampiikhi.

Mukaano mwa mivaanelo muhina me Nsu na Wameerika, Reepi othalakaase wi nliipo ni lepiiwe vomutthu as wi amwaavano ari eriyaari vaviyaakha 16 ni 17, atupweela mmukhaleeloni mwa itthu sihapala ni wuntereeryase osoma.
Wakhuleeliwa, mwaavano onathalakaserya ameyaawe wi mukhaleelo ole opaceerya mmuttetthe wakhaala awe ni ohiimwa wi wopaceryaani wanyiherya wi ele yaarietthu yoreera.
Nlepo, mme, soosuweliha divide siniraneeya ni mwaavano muliipa olya sowaawa khithatuuwa namatumihavsohapala mwaha orya omukuxa khmurooha mukhatteya okaathi wa iyaakha thanu.
Nnaamwi esiipo ela eniira eleepwe vomutthuni wawePhe Urbano onithalakasa wi ele kahiyo ehantiisi awe.

Revela osuweliha wi muneepa omuruhele nlaaka na "Vícios" oruuye muthana thanaru mwaha woosoma ewaraakha ya aritiiku muhina mwa ikaruuma Sá mathaavi bandeja mwaha wa otumihiwa sihapala muxikola nisoweha musinyakoni emuthnyiherya nattompe othaleeni nnaamwi owaare iheepe Sá ixikola, omuhomaka naxikila mukinaku owiitho.
Owuurya sihapala ni sinwaawa variyaari vanattompe Omosampiikhi nno ti mmoosa wa mulatto oteepa o khala anitumereerya.

Okati wavinyeriwa eporoceetu “smashed” (owutakaseyeene), oholeliwa ni DIAGEO votakaherya ni Minixiteeriyu a Etukasaawu ni Wunuheriwa Apinaatamu onriwa (MINEDH) ni ekosulaato Piritaaniku ya Omosampiikhi, eriina muthokiho Solaleerya muhina mwa myaha sowopiha valyiwaka sihapala wala mwiixi variyaari va alipo anamuunuwa okhuuma iyaakha 12 mpaakhua 13, Miniixituuro a miteko Soma ni Wunuheriwa apinaatamu,Jorge Ferrão, , ohiire wi munuweelo wavano aliipo awuurya sihapala tiwoxankiiha maana voohiya tho otanyerya miyopopiho muhina mwa mukhaleelo wa Okuumi wanaxikola, otthikiherya ottuki mukhaleelo swoxuutta waya ole muxikola.
Phe Urbano, opaceerya owuurya sihapala okaathi wiira awe anariina iyaakha 15, onisuwelexa saneene yoripiha muriima ela kekhayi.
Ameyaawe owanyaya yatumiha sowaawa ni" wa khuuta okaathi wapwanya awe waniiya vakhiini".
" Vaari phitaari mito owurya.
Ovolowa musaala kihapaliwe, ohiimwa sohilokasa, oovanyiha mwixittiihi ni okhootta okhuma musaala musoomwa mm.
Reepi ole olaleerya w owuurya soohapala voophova mpaakha iyaakha sawe 29 ni paahi ohutteererya mwaha wootthuna wawe withukumanyerya muhina miosina wawe.
Mwaakha yopaceerya awe muhina mwa univerisitaate modelo wiira owuryaka
Okaathi ovirakacsisaale kahaana kittharihaka mithaali mmoosa.
Owuurya sohapala wala otharuwa kirelaka wi musoome".
Ekiilu ya mexikaano yotaanya " eteetere yopakiwa ni pinaatamu"
Ixitituutu ohiimwa wi., " Ettini tthini wowaatta"viraneyaaka miirabothapelabtaari tataanye ophattuwa wa mwiriira.

Emoosa " eteetere yopakelliwa", ntooko vathalelya awe Ixitituutu ya Invixitikasawu sabmiriira soluluwana nibXeyoloxiya ni Miraneyo sa Wiriimu ya Meexiku Siiximika yokasoopa, yowehiwa mulaponi okaathi wi eselesawu ya"tri" tabela yavoloha awe mphiira oruhele oxiitta wa ettimiku, ya 17, oniiraani na olumweeka wa mphiira Oruusiya. Emoosa " eteetere yopakelliwa", ntooko vathalelya awe Ixitituutu ya Invixitikasawu sabmiriira soluluwana nibXeyoloxiya ni Miraneyo sa Wiriimu ya Meexiku Siiximika yokasoopa, yowehiwa mulaponi okaathi wi eselesawu ya"tri" tabela yavoloha awe mphiira oruhele oxiitta wa ettimiku, ya 17, oniiraani nabolumweeka wa mphiira Oruusiya.
Mukoothani mwa Tuwiiterre, Ixitituutu enihimwa wi mwiriira olebokhala otanyeriwa mwaha wa " ettini tthini yowatteliwa" okatthi sothaleliwa ekoolu muhina mwa mmuttettheni mwa omeexiku.
Miteko sa Ureteres sa Xiile, Ixitituutu ekiinaku ethokoosa ottettemela wa ethaya, enikupali tho wi eteetere yopakelliwa epattuxiwe ni miira othapeliwa ya anamakhoropaniha.
" voolattana nihaana wanuula nmukhalelo sa matumereryo wi ekasoope wi ehiraneye okaathi wa niira na olumweeku", ohiire mutheekeeso ole muhina mwa munikukhuni mwa iterneeti.
Ekoolu yanLozano, oveloowe wa mikhari khari a 35 wa epaatte yopaceerya. nthoonyeryo na oxiitta wopaceerya wa nikhuuro na omeexiku vowanani waya nicAlemaanya muhina mwa miira na molumweekuni.
Mukuthaano ole ohalikelw wirelaka ekwaaha yopaceerya ya nikhuuru F niholeliwa ni Meexiku, oriina amphiira araaru.
Miyuraanyo iye ikiina ou piili sa nikhuuru Koreeya a ohitto ni Suweesiya akumaanelasa esekuunta yeela, 18.
Mpaatta muhiina, Alemaanya onotakaheryana nibnikhuuru na makampiyawu Olumweeku ahinaxittase yamuttikhaka mphiiraba niira oaphuleeliwa.
KAN 2021: Tuniisiya omututuxeerya ni khimuloola ni musiveelo Niceeriya
Purukhiina Faso omuhapuxa Kapaawu niboroowa ottikiha ni matunisiinu muhina mwa axeexe- ophiya -okhomooni

Oniromoola ntooko omusivelo mulueene omuhoolela kapiyonaatu wa Ilaapo sa Waafirika oriwa (CAN) a eyaakha ya 2021 ni nikhuuru nomeeka niiriwa waxiitta amphiira a ikwaaha wa makhuru, Niceeriya tiwaloliwe ettimiku yeela ya , 23 ni Tuniisiya

Ekoolunemoosw evolohiwe ni Youssef Msakni , okhaathi wiira aya iviiraka mikhari khari miili wa epaatte yabnaali telipiherye otuutuxerya wopaceerya ni yanaayili a mayeeso aniiraneya Okamaraawu, vaceenexa maana nikhuuru na"Águias de Cartago” khanipaakevo etthu yopwanela ekwaaha yopaceerya, ni mixiitto mmoosa ni oxiittiha ikwaaha piili muhina mwa makhuuru otepa olosowa.

Niceeriya, namaxiitta a mukuthaano a iyaakha sa 1980, 1994 ni 2023, khoweerye orukureryani muhina mwa yokhumeela ele, voreerelaxa noovira okaathi womoliwe awe mwaha wa ekaraatha yoxeerya yohimahove Alex Iwobi emaaa a mikhaari-khaari a 64.

Nikhuuru nav “Super Águias” nnleelo nokhanyereerya wi nilattanihe , massa matunisiino ale yahiwaleela otthul eu ni khakameela Sasha mapuuwa, nivotharelana okaathi yoowo yamutumererya aya mmphiira mpaatte wa okaathi munceene.

Mahiku terra aya 29, Tuniisiya, oweerye KAN mmoosa a mwaakha wa 2004, emohoolela Purkhiina Faaso, ni wi wa mphiira opaceerya a makhuuru matha naararu - a - wokhiseryani, oleelbtho, okweliha nikhuuru na Okapaawu muhina mwa amphiira 7-6 okaathi wa ipenaaliti

Okaathi wa mikhari- khari 90 sophaneleelq, mphiira okhaala vaxittaniwaka wa khuuta nikhuuro mmoosa ni sowiraniya saya sohiyhowa, wa iye okaathi Bertrand Traoré okosye awe epenaaliti emoosa ya mikhaari-khaari wa 18.Pena
Vá mikhaari -khari 10, aleesa yanittottopwsa ni "aliipo owittottopa oloola" yahirowa omuumula arineene efayita.
Masi nnleelo womumulani, muhoolelii mukapaawu Aaron Boupendza wahimarakhari ekoolo ekhotteliwe.
Mpaatte wa nayiili, mikhari khari 67 Sidney Obissawahomoliwa mwaha wothukumanya ancaano.

Bin kaathi Purukhiina Faaso wiraawe wixeteteeryaka wibothapeel oviiriha oroowaka ekwaaha ya omihooli, mikhari khari opaceerya wa okaathi wovukuliwa , mohooli Adama Guira ovlooohavmphiira mmpaliisa mwaawe, vohinatthi ovelaveliha wa "Panteras".
Noovira mikhari,- khari 30, mphiira wahasana olikanyihiwaka amphiira viraneyaaka ipenaaliti, ni Purukhiina -Faaso okosya sotthikhiwa piili ni Kapaawu thaaru.
Vireliwaka ekwahabya nihiiku notupheela muteeko,ya 24, athokihiwa amphiira anitharelana: Kini ,-konakiiri- Kampiiya ni Kamarawu- komoorexi.
Piliisa Omosampiikhi onihaaya miruuthu acokatoore wiiviwe ni ekoonya.
Estevão Gino, a iyaakha 19 munuweelo awe, okameliiwa okaathi wapwanyaneya awebonyawaka omuuro sampeese enamaxeexe.

Piliisa Omosampiikhi, oholeeliha omuhooliothokoosa miruutthu wa namphiira mosampikaanoEstevão Gino, wiivye esumaana ele eviire ni ekoonya emoosa, epharakaserye waamuru okaathi wapwanyanrya awe onyawaka ikuuru sSampeese.

." Miteko sohayasiwa siirya sipakiwaaka, masi mpaakha oleelo nnleelo khaniriina iresulutaato siniireliwa ipwanyiwe miruutthu" ohiiraLeonel Muchano, namuuhupi wa okumaatu ya Piliisa a Oteete,ororomeelihawi ibehasarya ele walaleeriwe Ohiiyu wa enamaxeexe, 16, okaathi ekuluupi evekele aya mukhaliheryo muhina mwa miteko sirumerliwa.
Muliipo ohaawa ole,Estevão Gino,a iyaakha 19, wamutthikha muhina mwa etivisaawu ya nayiili na mphiira Omosampiikhi mwa ekuluupi ya Ateleetiku Mineero, wa muttetthe wa Oteete.

Mwiiha nikuruta wa ekuluupi onakhuleela wi namphiira ole wahirowa oxinaasiyo ohiyu ya enamaxeexe , nivotharelana nibitereen wahirowa wi wanyawe mmuro sSampeese, vamoosa ni axirikha awe a ekuluupi,okaathi okhale awe opharakaseriwa ni khikuxiwa orohiwaka mmaasinini ekoonya.
" axirikha awe ayiili aariina awe vamoosa anakhuleels se ekoonya ele yaari ya emeeturu thaanu ni kivakhaale oweryaneya nohoolela enaamwvele" osuwelihexa Eduardo Carvalho.

Ipuuwa wa ikoonya sinonaneya wa khuta okaathi meeme muvire awe muito Sampeese, vomaleelani wakhaala wi apinaatamu anthimakela omuuro wi aroowe oriika maasivorumeela nnakhala wirapihasa, ntooko etanyeriwa ni wuliiwa kathoowa wa okweheriwa maasi oreera amupoopeni.
Ntteeke na LAM, niira noluttelelana variyaari epooma ya Omapuutu ni Oluwanta worimeela.

Ntteeke norimeela okhuma okhuma wopaceryani ya emakaaripi, okaathi niraala nekeelaka Ota wa Namiipiya, muttetthe mmoosa owattamana ni Poswaana ni Ankoola, weyiiwo wonaneye eruupe epuula yincerne nibyowiliipihaxa. Ntteeke nimoosa na Mittaalq sa Mmekhuuluni Sá Omosampiikhi , mwarya niluttelelaka Mapuru ni Luwaanta norimeela okhuma wopaceryani wa emakaaripi ya enamathaanu, 29.
Mulipiheryo opakiiwe ni mutumereeri namunuereriwa wa LAM valavulacawe ni anahapari okapitaale ya Omosampiikhi.

Ntteeke TM460 nalipeleeliwa wi naarowa ophiiya Oluwaanta okaathi wa ekhatiiri 14: 210 yacelaapo ele.

Okuma vaavale vathoowe mivaanelo mukaano mwa Raatiiyo ni ntteeke nne, amakhulupale Omosampiikhi yahivaanelan ni elaapo ya onamiipiya, weewo ipaceriwe aya muteeko sabohayasiwa sithoonya, Ota wa elaapo ele mpaakha okaathi ola.
Muhina mwa ekaruuma ele wahirowa mapasaceero 28 ni aliipo yaavara a 6.

Senzo Meyiwa waari muliipo ayiipithela matthavi a nikhuuru nothaleliwa na masuuli afirikaano a mphiira terno wathatuuwe awe okampiyawu vaninanooni va.
Meyiwa waattikha wa Orlando Pirates ni okwa wawe oniwuuliha kahiyo paahi axitityawe ntooko Olumweeku wotheene wa mitiko Sá mphiira.

Sotheene sinthoonyerya wi namphiira primeira wopeeliwa ettimiinku, okaathi wehererya awe onikupaleela mwaseeye ser muhina mwa okameliiwa, emoosa emoosa etteyiivrla muhina mwa ikhilomu 20 sorakamelana ni epooma ya ocuhaanixipuurukhu.

Onimooniya Osaayu Paayulu yusuweela muhina mwa siyeesiya Purtukeexi ni miyatanaano ni Parasiili ni SAfiriika

Neymar ohimaaleleya mwaha wooweha namattikha mmoosa mmuuro
Karaakhi ti namasiveliwa wa Usain Bolt

Neymar ari ni erooho yohimalleeleya wi wiirele mpaatte wa Amphiira oxiittana o Riiyu, masi khavahiyo paahi wi akiherye nikhuuru na yoparasiili neeno nihaaya etho ehinatoko yiireya eyeero ya muxiittano.
' Vohiloka kookhala olipelela wi kiiwehe Usain Bolt o.vaaraka muteko
" Miyo Kinamasiveliwa mutokweene mmoosa' ohiira Neymar variyari va nlaaka na nvaavelo muhina ma esiiti Olympics.org.
kapiyaawu amixiittano Bolt tho ahimwa we okhaala namasiveliwa wa Neynar ni ophavela okumaana ni parasileero ole Oriiyu wa Caneero.
Mpaatta wampiira oxittana, ivolowelo wa nikhuuru na Oparasiili oni wi tiwoovirikana.
' Olumweeku wotheene onii owehaka ni ti okaathi mmoosa olipiherya okhaala wowuraana ni opakaaka Omuusi ni Oxiirikha.
miyo vanikisivela waaweha amphiira mu TV ni okaathi karya aka mwanamwane ni vaninaanoni miyo kahaana nroromelo nowanenela oxiitta'', othalakaserya muneene mwaattelo a 10 wa nikhuuru na Oparasiili.
Josina Machel variyari va athiyana 100 otepeexa ottittimiheya wa eyaakha ya 2020

osina Ziyaya Machel oori variyaari va athiyana 100 otepeexa ottittimiheya a mwaakha wa wa ehapaari enithaniwa BBC, enathoonya'' aleesa arya aholelasaka mavirikanelo ni ampaaka minamuna sovirikana mokhathiini motikinihasa''

Orineene iyaakha sawe 44, Josina Machel wahithaleliwa ni BBC, mwaha yookhala '' namwakiha avakhalayini a ihaakhi sapinaatamu, oyaariwe muhina mwa sohiiya sa miteeko sa ikharari'' ni '' vootupawene osiiveliwa mwaha woothala mukhaleelo awe wi okeliihe omihooli ihaakhi sa athiyana''.
Machel ti ole othikele okhaala muhina mwa nihaasu na vapuwani ni ori totatuuxa mukhalelo owoova wemutthu awe muhina mwa mutthunelo orumeelaka eyeekeseekese Kuhluka.

Kuhluka ti muraano mmoosa oriina ntooko mupuwelo awe ''okhaliherya ne weteteyiiha marukunuwelo wa atthu aneema muhina mwa iitthu sinromola nihaasu niirina eriima aya wa mukhaleelo wa mutthu ni wi othokiihe nipuuro nottyawela nororomeleya wi aliipo oraapela nnyoho nne athikele mukhaleelo wa ekuumi awe yorerela muhina mwanamittettheni wa ohiitto wa afiriika''.

Ewaarakha ya athiyaana 100 otepexa wilipiiha a mwaakha 200, anaromoola amahooleli ni alipo avaara miteko sa onamakweherya a mittette sovirikana sa molumwenkuni ni mitteekeso soovirikana sa miteeko, okhuuma manamuuna ortumererya, soratteliwa, mukhalelo wa ipheeyo ni anamunceene.

muwarakhani mme akhaale masiina ntooko Jane Fonda (Namapaka ni ativiixita amerikaana) ,Sanna Marin( miniixitara -opaceerya a Filaatiya),Angelique Kidjo, (muraatti a isiipo O Peeni ni ativiixita) nnakhala Zahara ( nawiipe ni namapaaka O Afiirika ti Suuli)Josina Machel ori waale omeekha athiyana araaru a ilaapo ssirumeela nttaava na Epwittikisi.
Vohiya tho Mosampiikhi, Parasiili, ohooleliwa ni Cibelle Racy (mwixuttihi) ni Lea T(moteeu ohisuwaneya mukhalelo awe).
Amwaavano ahaana akuxaakaa omweene a Wafiriika, ahihimya ti muratti aisiipo simpapweyaano Thomas Mapfumo
." Wafiriika aroosaarya amahooleli ari anamakwaakwa.
" vookathi vakhinyeenexa nohoola", onilipiherya.
Muraatti simpwapweyaano Thomas Mapfumo anjo wi omeelo awaafirika oriina mmpatataani mwa ananttope, akhaale okeleela vomwene.
"Awoosa akalanasa miruuku isya, asomaasa, anisuwela itthu sinceene", anilipiherya muhina mwa nlaaka na nvaanelo nokweheriwa no ehapaari VOA.
Mmppattte wa Mapfumo o ephiiro wa muraano ohisuawanyeya a waafirika ophattuwa mwaha wa makhaakwa wamahooleli aya.
" kinaamini wi milattu nirinaahu ninanooxe vá tiiye siirina nnaata ni muxoovo owuluvala, yoowo ohipheeye ohiya omwene.
Ni avpceene wa hiyo niiri anamakwaakwa.
." Wafiriika aroosaarya amahooleli ari anamakwaakwa.
" Ti vookathi vakhinyeenexa nohoola", onilipiherya.
Mpaatte mukinaku, othawali wa Afiriika, onihihimwa muratti ole wzi, mwaha w o wataanan Variyaari va ilaapo: Afiriika ohaanabokhala Owuraana.
Niwehe wi hahaha mukhaleelo a ninyooho muhina mwa elapobaya Afiriika ti Suuli.
Manamuna seene nyuwo mukhalyanyu omittanaka afirikaano mukhopeela amuuhina mwa Afriika muumu?
Nnakhala ti vopwanelela?
Mapfumo ti osuwelexiiwa mwaha wa ovaanyiha wawe ohovelelaka wiira wulumaka mwiiha sanamunceene ni Sá mukhaleelo wa matumereryo.
Oniipa esiipo yokhottela opotthiwa wa elaapo awe wakelelihiwa omihooli ni elaapo ya Ikalateera.
Ovpaha mukhaliheryo awe muhina mwa Ekhootto wa Roberto Mugabe yiireliwa mwaha wotaphuwa e, masi taari waale opaceeryasa ahukhuumwe manamuna anitumereerya awe.
" Ole(Mugabe) waari muharoye,maasi ninaano va ti namakwaakwa, tiretoore, nataarawu", onihimwa Mapfumo.

Ole Mapfumo, Mugabe ti muhooleli a mukhaleelo wabkathoowa okhaliiwa Osimoaapwe, oni " vakhume René wa mukhaleelo wa matha na muttetthe niniirya khikhala elaapo emoosa yotepexa ohaawa ya molumweekuni", weewo" apinaatamu nnakhala khaasuwela owi otaphuuwa etthu hérnia"
Thomas Mapfumo owariwe meyaakha ya 1945, Omoretona, muttetthe wa elaapo ya Osimoaapwe, miteko awe opaceerya iyaakha sa namuloko sa 1970, epooma yamukhaani yabimiina enthaniwa Muhakurya.
Nikhuurou nawe nopaceerya naari nnle Hallelujah Chicken.
Eyaakha ya 1978, opatthuuxa nikhuuru Blacks Unlimited, niyeeno moovara muhina motaphuwani mwa elaapo ya Simpaapwe, mwaakha wa 1980, orumeela mukamoanyani mwa Bob Marley.
Eyaakha ya 2000 ohiiya elaapo awe ni khittikittherya muttetthe wa Ixitaato Sowiraana sa Ameerika.
Tivoothoowa oweha oxukuryaka muttetthe ophattuwa awe.

Zico, otthikela wilipiiha muxiittano owuulela munyukhuvwa

Namphiira ekhalaayi oparasiilZico olipiherya mupuwelo awe owilepiha wi wiirele mpaatta wa mwathaale wa omuhoolela wabFAFA ni anikupali otepa okweya owanela nipuuro nimoosa na mukhaleelo Onitumeererya mmphiira Olumweeku watananiha ni wilipiha omuhooeli a muthukumanyo Oparasiili ya mphiira .

Zico etheneeri ya nikhuuro nothaleliwa na Oparasiili ni na Falameeku muhina mwa iyaakha sa 1980 ni oneyeexe ekwaaha emoosa ya Itaaliya ni Ocapaawu,nnikupaali wi okhalana sotheene siiri sikweherya wi oxiitte mwaha wa sosuwela awe ni mukhaleelo wa namphiira, omwiiniha nikuruta a ekuluupi ni ya nikhuuro nothaleliwa no ominiixituru wa Mphiira, vohiyatho omuhoolela wa ikuluupi.
Parsileero ole ohhaana olikananaka opwanya mukhaliheryo wa ikuluupi nnakhaala makhuuru haanu wi thonyiherye muwanelo awe.
Namapaka Will Smith okhotteela akatemiiya ya Hollywood
Akatemiiya ya esineema wootthuna m okhootta iwe masi vophanels ohukhuumwa manamuna makiina.

Namarattela amerikaano Will Smith ohiiya enamathaanu yeela, 1, akatemiiya ya esinyaslo, noovmala omanakaasa, ohiiwu wa etthuvo, ni muliipo sepwere sotheyiiha Chris Rock ni ohiira wi waatthuna ehukhuumu ya khuuta manamunaa wowehereerya wi muraano omukhanyererye.
Muhina mwa muthaaka,Smith, olipiherya wi onikupaleela " sotheene ni siroowa wakhuta ihu erowa tanyereya" mwaha wa iyuuuwelo sawe.

" Soovara saia muhina mwa sowoniiha Sá ekwahabya 94 ya itthuuvo waari sokinanatiha, soweereya ni sihileveleleya" oleepa muraatti olevoxiittale etthuvo awee y yopaceerya muhina mwa soovara sawe musinyeemani mme, “ King Richard , okhaathi oviire weetta ayav nihiiku 27.

Ole onikupaleela wi ovonyoola ni ottheepwa nroromerlonna na akatemiiya ni ohattiyelela " akinaaku ari tathoonyeriwe okhaala aliipo oxiittiha wa mukhaleelo othapa ni wi athapelaaka muhina mwa muteeko awe otepexa othananiha.
"kiiri ni muriima avalakanyeya.

Kipheela othikeela mupuwelo awatthikela aliiea ampwaneleela okasoopa mwaha wa soopwaanya saya ni okweherye wi akatemiiya ole otthikiherye muteeko awe wothananiha othokihe awe wi wakhaliheryeke ale ariina miruuku ni sorattela muhina mwa esineema, okeleeliha omihooli Smith ariiki wi oniikupaali wi" orukuuda okhalaaka okaathi awe ni kinoona wi kiiri otumerereye ene eu kithookihe muteeko wi kilipiherye wi nn akhala kihithunihe wi ninyooho nivikane ehaskhi.
Nfaluume a nikhuuru na esineema,David Rubin, iwuteererya wa Smith wotthunihiwa.
" ninootthikel okeleeliha omihooli muteeko sahu Sá maphukeelo aniiromoola mwamulopwana.

Smith mwaha wovonyoolanikettelo sotharihela sabiyuupuwelo Sá nikhuuru, vahinaatthi wiraneeya muthukumano a ekonseelyu ahu, othokihe wi wiraaneye mahiiku yeettaka 18 a mweeri wa Mercedes"ohuncereerya Rubin.

Ninmunteereryo, Will Smithoniyeleela nttitthimiho na othaala ni wunterreryacwawe, vohiya tho mmpaatte nikiina mireerelo soyeva ovaraana waya samuphaleela mwaha wowiirela mmppattte wa muraano oteepa ottitthimiheya wa Hollywood, ovaaha nlemeleelo na ikasfirika wa aleesa ari taniirela mpaatte.

Mutumereeryo Olá opwattuwa noovira mahiku nayiili okaathi uraanovwa miruuku na akatemiiya, nikhottale aya winepaceerye ephukeeliwo mwaha wamuruuku a Smith novonyola niyovonyala awe ikettelonsa mukhaleelo wabnikhuuru.
Mutumereeryo aya okhala othoonyiwa wuteererya nnakhala womooliwa.

Ettimiinku, Smith oveenya vanipuuroni wawe muliipa wopaceerya wa Dolby Theatre khuttiiwa ohoolonwa epuuwa ni khumuuvaha nlaathumaChris Rock waruuye khipake esepwere yaro oliivya namuhano aya Smith, Jada Pinkett Smith.
Vookathi v wovira vakhaani, ole onaakhula ethuuvo awe yopaceerya.
Michael Schumacher onitthikela mukhaleelo exikhaani masi onittepa okhala wohisuwanyeya.

Mukhaleelo ti oheelo, " ecikhaani" noovira nihiiko na neeraru vaavale wimaathi awe oxiripitaali namwettiha matteka a mukhaleelo 1 mmwalemawu muhina mwa Exiripitaali weewo apwanyaneya otepaka, asuweliha anahapari vamosa ni namuuhupi awe Sabine Kehm.
" Vokathinola, ole onoona exikhaani", onilipiherya Sabine Kehm owakhulaka anahapari vamukhoora wa oxiripitaali ya Grenoble, vanooniwa seus wi vahimwa" ehapaari emoosa yoreera"

Sabine Kehm,onithalakasa wi olavuula ni anahapari vamoosa ni akulukhaana a xiripitaali oroowa paahi wiraneya yaweha wehiwa exikhaani ya mukhaleelo okumi wa namwettiha ntteeke, wumaathe oxiripitaali ya Grenoble okhuma okhuma ettimiinku.

Sabine Kehm, oruuma ovaha moonelo awe muhina wa mwaha amukhaleelo wa Okuumi wa Michael Schumacher muhina mwa ikhatiiri sintharelana, oholeeliha wi " pahi akulukhaana a eoxiripitaalivtaari osuuwela olavuula muhina wa mwaha".

Mattaava ephattu anithomowa wohivarel muttetthe wa osantumeeya .
Khivamahove wiborumeeliwa mattaava ephattu o saam Tome Piriisipe onithokosa vohikhuparela.
Soleepwa sa mwarepeele owulaanya wa apinaatamu eranerye mwaakha wa 2012 inithoonya irumeeliwe eyuuma vakhaani,ya akolaari ni ya lunkiiye, vomalaani ni muxoovo wa ananttope.
Okaathi tookathi sinirehereriwa ipalee seitera ni muthukumano wi ivanyihaniwe mwaha masi vekeekhayi ee vahikhaale khuta ekwaga asantomeese vakhaani owoona alavulaka mattaava ephattu selo ya elaapo.

Ohoolo wa sowoniabiya solempwa naale otheene, muleepi osamtomen Albertino Bragançaonikupaali wi ti vopwanela Ohaayia ikettelo apoios wi nunuuherye mattaava ephattu, otumihiwa vanceenexa mwahawa makooto masya.
Voophovaka ipuruseento 95 sa masantomeese anithalaowa vokweyexa ni ekuunya.

Ti a Nttaava na mwiraano muhina mwa elaapo kiriyoolu, weewo Artur tho avanela arumeelaka matraca nexeexe, iniitthaniwa toiro, kiriyoolu ya Kaapu- Veerete, yameelo nootepexa woluumwa muhina mwa elaapo, akolaari ni lukiiye.

Vathariheliwaka ni soleepwa sa mwarepeele owulaanya apinaatamu, waale ophiiyaka ikooto 173 wavatthu akhaale muhina mwa nikhuurubnaikisiiro ikooto 62 okupaleela wi anlavuulasa ikiriyoolu toori, Nttaava neephattu nootepa ohooleela muhina mwa ekisiiro ya Osantumeeya.
Manuweelvokhuuma iyaakha 40 tathukumanya mwaattelo munceenevwna aliipo alavuula nttava na fooro.
Eyankolaari, Nttaava namaphattuwel nniiwiwa mmawaani mwa aliip omiseerya, ti elavuuliwa né vophiyaaka ikooto piili sa atthu.
Apinaatamu onkolaare amaake vowoneyaxa mittetthe wa mukerekhere mwa ephareeya yabekisiiro ya Osantumeeya.
Eluukwiye, yowattela okisiiro ya opiriisipe, ni eri teriina vophiyaaka 1700 anamuuluma, muhina mwa muuttetthe ni vakhaani maasi a ikooto 7 ya atthu ankhaale.

Muleepi Albertino Bragança onikupali wi miyopopiho mutokweene wa kiriyoolu ti ophattuwa wabnnamuuna musya welavilelo Epwittikiisi walabnne nnitthaneliwa ekuunya ya Osantumeeya wala yooye otaphuleliwa vohitha wa efooro erowaaka epwittik, ri vaninaanoxe va Nttaava nolavulexiwa na mulaponi mme.
Olá toori mwaha wa soratteliwa ni Othekuleela wa esumaana ela.
Nametaalya itiiyope oni wibonoova ohokolowela muttetthe wa elaapo
Eparaatha yotthimaka Feyisa Lilesa opaaka weteteerya mukhaliheryo wa eipwepwetthe mulaponi ni oninvaanyiha mukhaliheryo akhopeela amwirelaka koveeruni etiyoopiya.
Nathuuvo ya paratta owa mukuthaano ottimaka wa amphiira ayitthuvo Riiyu 2016, mmwetiyoopiya Feyisa Lilesa olipiherya wibonoovabottikelanowaanyaye eyonpiiyo elapobawe maana pooti wokotthiwaka.

Lilesa, wikimaanye mmphiimo nibwoovara ya mukhaliheryo wabekeese ekeese ele ewananiwa vamoosa ni Kuveeruni etiiyope, ahatanya amakhulupale wi yakelihe mukalapoosa ni wokothiwabatthu, vanceenexa ale ari takhaale muxoovo awe,oroma.

" Nkiisuwela khankhaala wi kihaana otthikela owu noite okhala muumu maanabkokhala ovoloowaka mukalaposobwala wokothiwa" ohiira ateleeta ole walavula awe mulakaninmwa anahapari, ororomeelihawi wi wahahimweera amwaara awebni anaawe, ariisa muttetthe wa Etiyoopiya,wi wamuryabihiimwe nnakhala sohimwa sawevwakhala wi waapwanya ettthuu .
" Mito katthika mito kosuuwela wi presa anoorowa okookotha, nahikookothe, onoorowasa okikiliha mukalapoosa nnakhaala okivareleela okaapu wa matteeke" wahittikela namatyawavole.
Vohiya wi amuusi awe vohikalana milattu mpaakha vninaano vw, Lilesa onoovelela wi itthu iya sivukuwe ni oninvaanyiha anamuttettheni okhopela.

Exitaato Uniitu, Ikalateera Faraasa, ilaapo sotheene sa eyuroopa sinimukhalihe Kuveeruni wi, manamuuna yaala, anaatthuma akapwiitthi aluupalebwi awiiveke apinaatamu" anaromolaaya mamaratoniixita akiina, variyaari va miteko Solaleerya hapasri sokhopeela ari Oriiyu ya Caneero," mwaha wa xeeni ilaapo iye sihinikhalihavaya apinaatamu?
Nikhuuru naaphiira okhopeela,awateeriha epwepwetthe ya matumereryo, itiini ni mithiitho khamoosa, nleelo khayakhuule munamunonole ni sohimwakasiwa sa etiyoope Feyisa Lilesa.
Ohasariwa nahapaari okaxaari mwaha wa makwaankwa muhina mwa muteeko sa mphiira awafiriika
Ahmed Hussein-Suale,ahiiviwa okaathi serra awe othkelaka owanyawe né atthu ohisuawanyeya muttetthe wa Waakara.

Nahapaari kaneexi Ahmed Hussein-Suale , wathokosa mukhaleelo wa manamuna yavirihiwa aya makhaakwa muhina mmwa miteeko sa mphiira awafiriika, yoowo wiiviwe nibtiiru sakapwiitthi, enamaxeexe,16,:okaathi wahokoleelavawe owanyawe natthu ohisuawanyeya atyawaase vamootuni.
Axirikha a nikhuuru na mithokoosa satakaahereya,Tiger Eye, aniira wi soopwaanya itiiru thaaru, Omatiina, muttetthewa epooma eriyaari wa ekaaha.

Vookathi vakhiini, teeputaato mmoosa wa iiparitiitu eholeela omwene,olaleerya muhina mwa etelevisawu elatarato ya Hussein-Suale nolipiherya oruuha exikhaani wa Vookathi vakhiini, teeputaato mmoosa wa iiparitiitu eholeela omwene,olaleerya muhina mwa etelevisawu elatarato ya Hussein-Suale nolipiherya oruuha exikhaani eniireliwa ole opwatakanse.
Nnaamwi wi vaniira yonihiwe mukhaleelo wokaxariwa muhina mwa miteko sa ehaakhi, khiivo mitekobsiholelhiwwe ni amuhooleli.

Mweeri wa nethaana moosa wa mwaakha oviire wahilaleeriwabewaraakha ya etokomeento "Number 12", , ethokiihe Tiger Eye sinilaleerya mukhalelo wa mapakeliwo makwaankwa yaroomola aliipo amixiini olaana ni akinaaku a Ilaapo sa Waafirika, ntooko wa nfaluume wa Nikhuuro Nokaana mhna mwa mphiira, Kwesi Nyantakyi.
Ekomisaawu Yeelapo ya miteko Solaleeriwa anyohola ohasariwa ni onikasoopa mapiliisa wi apaceerye othokoosa wowiixerya.
Eliivuru ya Emanuel Kunzika enihimwa mukhaleelo sovirikanasa Sá Ekhootto wowanela otaphuuwa wa elaapo ya Ankoola.

Eliivuru ya enasiyonaliixta owankoola Emanuel Kunzika enithaniwa " Eforomasawu ya Nassau Alopwana mwaha wa Ekhootto Yotaphuwa" evonyeriwe muhina mwa muraano wa aliipo ara aleepi Awankoola, Oluwaanta,bmahiku yetta aya 28 a mweeri wa Caneero.

Eliivuru, eriina iwarakha saya 129, erwana erootta thaaru seeyo muleepi ohimwavawe ikhaleelobsa ehantiisi ni makhaleelo wa muttetthe a Ankoola, nibelaapo ya milaattubni eniluttelela iwarakhassolepwa sa vakhalayini ni Sá muraareloxe ni sokhayariwa ilataarato sabokaati wapacerya aya ophattuwa matumereryo.

Muliivuruni mme, nasiyonaliista anithalaowa iyaakha iye milooko Sá sowataaneliwa ni olebwaari Nfaluume wa FNLA, Holden Roberto, opweteeye mweeri wa nethanamiraaru wa eyaakha 2007, Oluwaanta, nihiiku na 25 na mweeri wa nexeexe ni ovuwihiwa mukhaleelo wa otaphuuwa elapobwa Ankoola mahiiko yetta aya 11 mweeri wa namuloko mmoosa wa 1957.

Otumihiwa ene mwaha woreeriheliwa wala yooye , Emanuel Kunzika oniira siiri saroromelihe awe olaleerya muliivuruni mme mwaha wa opweteya wokotthiwa atthu milooko nathanu yiirela mpaatta wa omampuru a exitaato Moyoore ya FNLA epaase ya Kinkozou, ,ni vohiiya tho mwixipuuwelo mmoosa oroomolabopweteya wa Deolinda Rodrigues, nakhootto wa MPLA, silaleeriwe ni ikumihiwe muhina mwa Palatoona Etitoora.
Muleepi ohiimwa wi oleelihia wi vahipisa vanceene wi yinyereriwe iye solupanyeryasiwa.
Emanuel Kunzika owariiwe muttetthe wa Kiito, Maleepa ti Somou, Epuruviisiya ya Uwiice.
Osomawawe wotheene wiire Erepuupilika Temokaraatika ya Okhooko variyaari va iyaakha 138 oroowaka 1963.
Kiiri volikaana Ixitaato Uniitu ya Ameerika muhina mwa iyuniverisitaate Sá Noiva Iyoorokhi ni Abraham Lincoln ya Ofilateelifiya, variyaari va iyaakha 1963 -1968.

Muhina mwa Eyuniverisitaate Yeelapo ya Sayiire (1970-1974), kahimpwanya Tipolooma muhina mwa asiyeesiya muhina mwa ipuliitika ni - Itumereeryo, ni muthoonyero wa monikararafiya enithaniwa “ ophattuwa wa Ilaapo sa wankoola ni Ekhootto yotaphuwa”.

Muleepi onilaleerya sorattela sawe" Nivekelo wi Ankoola mpaakha Omuthukumanooni wa16 ONU, Onoova Iyoorokhi 1961"," Mwiraano Owankoola" On wireliwaaka Otaphuuwa wa Ankoola- way,Léopoldiville (Kinxaasa), 1963”.

Ohatthuwa wa Elaapo Yawankoola mwaha wowaneliwa Otaphuuwa, eliivuru ya Manifiiya , Univerisitaate Nasiyonaalibya Osayiire, Kisaaxa 1974" ni, " Eliivuru ya ithaale Sa Ekikooko,etitoriyaale Nsiila, 2008"
Akhala asuweeli khamoosa khamoosa a mahiku yeettaka 5 mweeri wa nayiili- Ronaldo e Neymar athapelasa iyaakha saya.
Naaphura a nikhuuru na Cuveetu, muliipo axiitta wa ithuuvo sovirikana soreerela ni mukhaleelo wa namphiira Olumweenku,othaleela oleelo iyaakha 36.

Neymar, wa PSG, othapela iyaakha tho.
Namphiira parsileero omaliherya iyaakha 29 okaathi wa vayaakhani.

Anamphiira oweeli anisuwelasiwa mwaha onasivelasa niira numoosa nopwanelela, masi mwaakha ola mwaha wa ekasoopa mwaha wa ekhwereere ya Koronaviiru owalya aya ahaana akuruxaka manamuna wothapela wayase.
mwaakha ole oviire, Neymar ahalaleerya axirikha awe a nikhuuru nawe oteene, amuusi ni apathani wi niira nimoosa noriirma ni notteela otixikoteeka ya Pariixi.

iyo khiyireeye saneene mmattatani mwa namwiiriha nikuruuta na anamphiira Thomas Tuchel – Khavahiyo mulatthu wi ole khiwithaneliwe eyo piiyo kholattuliwe oniirane- masi mwaha wi niira niraneeye vottevelana mahiku mayiili wa Nphiira okumaanela PSG ni Nantes.
Neymar olaleerya orumeelaka ekaruuma ya tuwiitere wi mwaakha ola khorowa okhala niira notthapa.

Vano Ronaldo mwaakha ole oviire wahitutuxeriwa namwaseta awe Georgina Rodriguez khuvahiwa eyoolya ya ohiiyu wiraneeya nipuuro nimoosa noottittimiheya okhaale nipuuro niilyiwa nniithaniwa Turim, wi Itaaliya , ni ohoolo wa mukhoora Ronaldo opwaanya Mereseeti AMGG 63, ovahiwe awe nimwaseeta mmoosa, okwiiye ikooto 180 sa eyuuru.

Ronaldo onaamwi va okathi wa isumaana vakhaani wamuthokosiwa, mwaha wi wahirowa othampeela niira namwaseeta awe niiraneya muttetthe wowaterihiwa, mwaha wa epwepwethe, ohaana opakaaka nnakhala etho yottitthimiheya oleelo.
'' Ipoweema ya Neto ehathukumanya araatti aceene muhina mwa miteko sa wiipa", ohiimwa neephattu Analtino Santos
Epaaca enimupuwela Agostinho Neto, yoowo niira nothapela owariiwa wawe nivuwihiwa mahiku a 17 mweeri wa nethanaxeexe, okathi okhuuma okhuuma eyaakha ya 1980 ti nihiiku Namuharooye a Mulapooni.
Nipuro nomupuweela Totoore.

António Agostinho Neto (MAAN) nihakhelela epaaca emoosa nihiku nnle niviire 21 mweeri wa nethanaxexe yalipiherya mwaha "" epowesiiya ya Agostinho Neto muhina mwa sothokeleeliwa ni nsiipo nanamunceene ari makolaano'' naholeeliwa ni namathokoosa ni nephattu Analtino Santos.
Santos ohiimwa wi '' nikuxeene sokweherya Ekhootto mwaha wotaphuwa wa Elaapo ya Ankoola, ipoweema sa Neto, ehatanyerya araatti wi yiipeke.
Araatti a okaathi khayaapwanya mixaakiho wi yiipe isiipo arumeelaka ipoweema sa Neto.
ni mukhaleelo wathuna otaphuuwa waari osuulu wa ithu soteene''.
Epaaca enimupuwela Agostinho Neto, yoowo niira nothapela owariiwa wawe nivuwihiwa mahiku a 17 mweeri wa nethanaxeexe, okathi okhuuma okhuuma eyaakha ya 1980 ti nihiiku Namuharooye a Mulapooni.
Agostinho Neto nasceuoyaariwe mwaakha wa 1922, muttettha wa Okaxikani, Munisiipiyu wa Ikolo ni Penku, epuruviisiya ya Penku.
Wahitupwa mukano oroowa elapo ya Porutukaale ni muruuku osooma muhina mwa metisiina.
Okaathi woteene yoosoma wawe muhina mwa univerisitaate ya Olixipowa, weewo Neto apaceerye awe ovaha miruuku sawe ni miteeko sa nelaapo.
Mwaha wivaavo, wahivolowihiwa mukalaposo ekwaha sinceene.
Agostinho Neto oviira etuniiya mahiku yettaka 10 mweeri wa Nethaanaxexe wa eyaakha ya 1979, Omuxikhoovo, onariina iyaakha 56, mwaha wa ekwereere, nooviriha iyaakha xeexe oryeene nfalume.
'' Nroromeelo ninimaala mwaha wolipeleelaxa vanceene'', wixiiliha wa Alfa Thulana
Mosampikaano onimoonelela ceesi ni Koxipeele wi okhomakele nipheeto, otapwuwa.
'' nipweeto nahu nahikhalana mwa soteene nathuna ahu wi soteene silokasa'', masi nroromelo noothuuwa mwaha wolipeleelaxa'' siisi toniipa awe Alfa Thulana.

Nsiipo tiina '' koovaha okumi aka mwaha wa nyuwo'' ni nihiirela mpantta muhina mwa etiixiku awe yopacerya,“Send me”, nnaamalaru okhuma omarakaato womosampiikhi, ni ti mmoosa waaslesa vakhaani a muthiito Koxipeele.

nsiipo nne ti nopwanelela wi okaathi ola wovanyhihiwa oniiraneya vaninaanoni mulapooni mwawe, novuwihiwa sokoopwa vohilaleeriwa, epattuxe othikiliiwa wa mikhaliheryo wa anamakhaliherya aluupale a mireerelo sa xitaato

'' emothalakasa pinaatamu ovaahe soteete sawe mwaha wa mwataano mmmoosa ni vananyihereya wi khivakhuma ethu; ni vekeekhayi siisa vamoosa ni mamosampikaano anisiitiri okhathi yoola'' ni aniveka wi ovirikanyihiwe, '' maana soromooliwa khasiruuhela mukhaleelo oreerela'', aniira.
Vomaleelene, onithalakasa lfa,'' etiixiku emoosa muhina mwa nipheeto wolattanasa, khavahiyo ti mutiinini paahi .
kiniipa nsu nowaamini, nrooromelo, murettele''.
Mwana wa mitakiheryo nimoosa enooneya Ekereeca Evaxeelika ya Pomm Pxitoore- piixipu Fernando Magaia- Alfa, vithiirweene wi ephiro awe waari nsiipo.
Orineene iyaakha thana piili waniipa oxikoola tominikaana ya okapeela wawe ni vithiru ene wahitakaahana ni makhuuru ananttoope.
Ota wa okapeela, Alfa omoneelela caasi ni onikhanyanyerya omoopa paakwe ni nsu.

Caasi onimookola Alfa khiyamwiipa mmapaareni, mulimaleelo mmoosa othawanliha, ntooko yena:'' Mmapaare, nnkinakakhanyiha sisuwelaa aka, masi kireerihela muhupi, kinilaleerya maasu aroromeelo, kilavuula sa mwaha owixeetta''.
Ni manamuuna ala omwarya mwarya'' maasu'' yaawo wa okaathi vakhaani Alfa onoorowa owiipela mapereeso 1,200 ampwanyaneya okhatteya ya Omwaattiwa yo Omapuutu.
Ni munuweelo wa iyaakha 40. Alfa oni wi “Send me” nsiipo nikhaliha wi nleelo kikhaleke nookumi mmwiilini mwa omuraatti ni wonatiini.
'' Musiivelo aka wa khuta okathi nsiipo.
Kamesteraatu muhina mwa sothokorerya ni kinivaaratho muhina mwa mavareelo ala, masi kihana waamini wi mwa nihiku nimoosa kinoorowa okhalaka mwaha wa sniipo''.

vohiphiya miyeeri mithana moosa, etiixiku yotumiiha vophova ikoopiya ikooto 3.500, muruweryo mulwene muhina mwa emerekaato yohikeleela othu ni yootepa waatta mukhaleelo wa ithu sohilooka eyo piiyo ipiraata ntooko Omosampiikhi nno.
Muwiriyane nvaanelo:
Ethuuva 2016: Parasiili okhala namathuviwa mmoosa.
Niira nniiraneya mahiku aroowa aya wettaka 2 mweeri wa Neyiili ni eroowa othoniheriwa ni Chris Rock
niira nne ninilipeleliwa olumweeko woteene ya esineema ni tiyookhala nihiku nothsliwa eene ni athonyasiwa.
Vaninanooni va opacerya mmantte mmiriimani mwa araatti ntookoJennifer Lawrence, Tom Hardy, Mark Ruffalo, Leo DiCaprio nnakhala Kate Winslet.

Noovira Ikoloopu Ya Eweero, siiri muthiito mmoosa sowanyiheriwa siirowa wiraneeya okathi oroowa aya winyaniwa Ithuuvu, ikasoopa siri sorukunuwa mwaha wa niira na 88 na ithuuvo muhina mwa Hollywood ni mwaakha yoola esineema ya Lusofoniiya ti tho emoosa wa iye sikhaale sihaliwe.

'' Mmiiraavo ni Olumweeku'' ori othsliweene ni mukhaleelo wa esineema yotepexa osiveliha ni ti ,yoowi muhina mwa othukunukiwa waya ethalakasa ehaatiisi: '' wiira ohaawaka mulattho wothowa otiityi, mmiraavo mmoosa onihiya muttetthe awe ni khoneleela olumweeko mmosa wothananiha oholeeliwa ni mekaaruma ya namuuku ni ithu ikiina sohisuwanyeya.
musiveelo mmoosa ohisuwanyeya vamoosa ni ikettelo sovirikana sa araatti seeyo sinthalakasa mwaha sa olumweeku wa ninaano varumeeliwaka manamuna oweha wa mwaana mmoosa''.

''Mmiravi ni Olumweeku'' enixiittana ni isineema sosiveliha ntooko"Inside Out"(mupuwelo ottwelaneya mwekunyani) ''Miriira''"Shawn the Sheep" (wala a "epwittiphiitti Xoone'' mwekunyani) ni When Marnie Was There" (Miyuupuwelo sa Marnie).
Omuxiittanooni wa ithuuvo , muthiito mmoosa wootepa okhaleeliwa nriima ti.

muwarakhani mwa masiina ariisa:"" de Brad Pitt, Dede Gardner e Jeremy Kleiner; "" de Steven Spielberg, Marc Platt and Kristie Macosko Krieger; "" de Finola Dwyer ni Amanda Posey; "" de Doug Mitchell e George Millere; "" de Simon Kinberg, Ridley Scott, Michael Schaefer e Mark Huffam; "" de Arnon Milchan, Steve Golin, Mary Parent e Keith Redmon; "" de Ed Guiney ni "" de Michael Sugar, Steve Golin, Nicole Rocklin and Blye Pagon Faust.

Leonardo DiCaprio othiikela wehererya mwaakha ola ni s tisowaata mikweyeeryo soxiitta ethuuvo ya mukuthaano awe mwaha wowiirela mmpatte mwa"The Revenant".
mukuthaano ola akhalas tho Bryan Cranston muhina mwa "Trumbo", Matt Damon mwa "The Martian", Michael Fassbender mwa "Steve Jobs" ni Eddie Redmayne mwa "The Danish Girl".
varowaka ariisa Christian Bale mwa "The Big Short", Tom Hardy "The Revenant", Mark Ruffalo "Spotlight", Mark Rylance "Bridge of Spies", Sylvester Stallone "Creed".

Araatti axaana axithiyana athaaliwe muhina mwa mukhaleelo taalasaAlicia Vikander "The Danish Girl", Jennifer Jason Leigh "The Hateful Eight", Kate Winslet mwa" Steve Jobs", Rachel McAdams em "Spotlight" e Rooney Mara mwa "Carol".

Fifty Shades of Grey khatalelasiwe nnakhaala nipuuro na mukhaleelo muluupale, masi mwaha wa esineema "Earned It" yothalakasiwa ni The Weeknd eri variiyari va iye sithaaliwe muhina mwa mukhaleelo ola sokhala tho "Manta Ray" wa esinema "Racing Extintion", "Simple Song #3" ya isinema "Youth", "Til It Happens To You" ya Diane Warren ni Lady Gaga ya esinyaalo "The Hunting Ground" ni nsiipo nithalakasiwe ni Sam Smith "Writing's On The Wall" ya esineema "007 - Spectre"
muwehe nlaaka na evitiiyu ya epasareela yophilivila emalela ni"Earned It"
ethaleeliwe muhina mwa mikhaleelo mithanu: Sotaanyerya Maweheriwo, nNsu, Matakahereiwo a Nsu, nsiipo, ni nlaaka.

Trending: Beyoncé ovonyerya Deluxe ya “The Lion King: The Gift”
Muraati Beyoncé ohatutuxerya soteene ni ottheene ni olaleerya wa nlaaka nimoosa delux na nikhuuru a masiipo awe “The Lion King: The Gift” oxakha yoola.

Olaleeeriwa wa nikhuuru na masiipo ale anivaha ekasoopa wa sowoniheriwa ikiina niteepa wulelexiwa, waniheriwa wa mnikhuuru na ole sinawehiwa “Black is King” muhina momutekoni mwa streaming Disney Plus.
''Noriipe Mwene'' ti musiveelo mmoosa wa nikhuuli noriipa.
vaala oweeha nlaaka nolaleeriwa nihipisa
Milaleeryo sa Justin Bieber ni sa Rihanna tisootepexa okhala sanamawaani a ovosiisu ya enamathani yeela.
Bieber oneetta ekwaha orumeelaka mukukutta mulaponi mwawe vamoosa namwarawe Hailey Baldwin ni wa khuta elatarato olalerya awe ti yokumiha mwaha muhina mwa mathavi a mivaanelo sa nneema.
Rihanna olaleerya elatarato awe emoosa waxukhurelaka oteene ale yireele mpaatta wa niira nothapela narumeeliwa ikaruuma isya sa manamuunamovanela muhina mwa olaleeriwa wwopacerexa wa Fenty Skin.
Milaleeryo sawe sootepa ovuwexa variyari wapinaatamu taalasa Zayn Malik, Rihanna, Shraddha Kapoor e LeBron James.
amphiira a NBA, athikela wiraneya nsaana ni anamphiira oteene a makhuuru axiittana nsaana awaraasa iheepe saleepwe muhuupi ani Black Lives Matter

LeBron James, olaleerya elataraato emoosaari vamooa naxirikha awe alees Lakers okhoromeene nnikutha nimoosa nri vathi, oveenxale matata nthoonyero na omweene ni oleepa qu wa ithu sinthuna awe vamukhaleelo awe tiiya '' othokiha maverikanelo, wasiveliha ni watanyerya akiinaku''.
Ntooro othokoosa wa Google opweteya wa Herman Cain onihoolela sohayasiwa ni vophovaka imilyawu piili.
Cain waari muthawali mmoosa a nikhuuli noripa awameerika, woowo ayiilelepiihe wi wirele mpantte wa othanliiwa wi omuhooleli mwathanle nfaluume o EUa moono wa Marepupilikaano.
Cain waari tho namukhaliherya wa Nfaluume Donald Trump.
Muliipa amuhakha a iyaakha 74 opweteya mwaha wa ekwereere ya Koroonaviiru- ole waari, mwivaavo, mmoosa wa atthu yikhootta orumeela mwaakiho a maxikara owanoni.

Nnamwi vahisuweliwaka iwe Cain omukwakwilyawe mwaxiithu, ole wahipwanyaniwa mahikuu yertta aya 30 a mweeri wa nethanammoosa, noovira okathi wireele awe mpaatte wa muthukumaano wa Trump muttetthe wa Tulsa, mahiku yetta aya 20 a mweeri wa neexexe, vaava namuhakhu ahatharihele awe ikettelo sa ekasoopa ntooko owaara maxikara wala otteyiivelana mukina ni mukwaawe.
nihiko 1 na mweeri wa nethana miili ole wahimaatho oxiripitaali, mahiku 30 wa mweeri wa nethanamiili ole khoweerye okoosya ekwerere ele ya Kovit-19.
yokhala iviitiyu enamweeniwa esya ni tayaawawe Reepha Mulatto
Muraatti ole onitthaniwa Mwopp ni onaalikela ni wiirela mpaatte wa Gucci Maine.
muhina mwa ikhatiiri 20 mukaruumani opwaanya emilyawu 1 wa maweha-wehi.
Papa Francisco onoxukurya Omosampiikhi mwakha ola
Papa Francisco okhala oxukurya Mosampiikhi nleelo eyaakha yeela, ohiira parooku o okateteraale ya Mapuutu Giorgio Ferreti.
eroowa okhala oxuukurya yopacerya wa papa Omosampiikhi okhuma okhuma 1988.
'' kiphavela woleela-sani esiiri emoosa...
Mwaakha ola niirowa wakhelela muxukuryo mmoosa wothaleleya.
Papa Francisco onookhala wa hiyo mwaakha ola'',ohiira PaatiriFerriti walaleeryaka alipo owaamini muhina mwa ekateteraale.
muhina mwa miteko woxukurya Ovatikaano mweeri wa nethana xeexe Nfaluume Filipe Nyusi omulaleya papa wi oxukurye Omosampiikhi.

nnaamw nleelo vahilipiheriwa nihiku naya nleelo aceesiya France Press ahimwa wi nnaamwi nleelo vahilipiheriwe nihiku na oxukurya wa papa, oholelihiwa mweeri wa nexthanaxeexe ntooko '' nihiikun nothapeliwa ikuuphi'' wi oxukuurya okhale otakahereyaka elaapo ya Matakaaxikare
Namathola Suweeku onoorowa omukoha Joseph Blatter
Namathoola -owulaanyawa Suwiisa orowa omuthokoosa waka omukuha nfaluumeFifa Joseph Blatter mwaha wa othokosasiwa orya wiraneyaka mulatthu wa makwaakwa mwamikhaleelo sa molumwenkuni.
Michael Lauber ovaha ekharawu mithokoso iye so'' oteepa otikinihasa'', okupaliki wi okhala '' vopisaka mokathi khamoosa'' mpaakha ohiimwa, wala hooye, othoonyiwa wakhuuta moota.
'' sinokelihiwa omihooli mivaanelo samuttitthimiho sa atahuu oteene amurareloxe.

mwa othalakasiwa, iyo khekhale ohiya ota mivaanelo ni nfaluume wa FIFA NI Sakarataari awe- owulaanya, osuweliha Michael Lauber, wi oniiriwa muthokoso, variyari va mwaha. sovahereriwa sa mithekeso sa molumwekuui sa 2018 ni 2022 Oruusiya ni Khataari, vothafrelana.

okathi walaleerya awe ehalpari, namahaya Osuwiisa oholeliha wi mwattelo moosa wa miyataanelo 104 naliipo a ipaaka ihoniiwa ni siiri mothokosani mme, yovaha mukhalelo we'' otepa otikinihasa'', okupaleelaka wi vookhala'' vooviraka okathi vakhaani'' mpakha otyonyiwa, wala hooye,manamuka kwamoosa khamosa orumoliwa.

Minixiteeriyu Pupiliiku Osuwiisa olaleya mahiku yettaka 27 mweeri wa nethanu ohuliwa wa mwaha mmoosa aromooliwa Ohisuwanyeya mwaha wowanyiheriwa wa ifaraawuti ni lavaxee ya musurukhu muhina mwa sovahereriwa wa malaaka ale omuhooli Olumweeku, nnaamwi Piliisa awelivetika wahikhalana mamampuuru a FIFA, muhina mwa yoteeliwa Zurique.
Roley onoorowa olaleerya nikhuuru na isii '' Sowupuwela oroowa wiraneya mahiku yettaka 31 wa mweeri wa namuloko
soovira miyeeri 11 solipelela, masi vaninanoni va anamasiveliwa a Reepa ni namathokiha Roley anoorowasa owerya waliikela muthukumanyo musya ola a muraatti yomalani wa mweeri anamuloko.
Olaleeriwa waya oroowa okhalana opuro o Beer Garden, Omapuutu, okhuma ekhatiri 11 mpakha ekhatiri 14.

nikhuuru na isiipi iye '' Sowupuwela'' ninalikela ni ixaaxa 12 sa isiipo ni sowuncereriwa miili, oroowa osareya anamwirela mpatte othaleleya, ntooko Azagaia, Mark Exodus, Ellputo, Laylizzy, na variyari nakinaku oceenexa.
muvaneloni ni nlaaka na Nsu na Ameerika,Roley ahiira wi ale ari atthu asiveliwa anooowa otuthuwela ni anosiveliwa ni isiipo sinceene.
''Ti muteeko mmoosa atthitthimiho'' ni onooniherya ettokotthelo ya Reephe.
'' Vorere ene'' ti emoosa ya efaaxa yasiipo niri muhina mwa nikhurru nnla nisya.
Nsiipo nikinaku nneerela mapatta na nikhuuru ti '' orakamela''
Roley ohimw wi orwa ovaraka muteko vohiteererya okhuma okathi epwepwette ya Koroonaviiru oaperya awe ni ohakhulela wi aniira okhalane EP mmoosa olikane ene.
Mwivaavo, ohoolo waka ninaano va ti nikhuru '' Sawupuwela'' muteeko waneeraru wa ekareera awa.
MAmaholeli awameerika anihoveriha wi "limpeza" wa nikhuuru na maruusu muhina mwa niira na olumeku
Travis Tuygar anihimwa wi vakhala eluuttelelana variyari va manamuuno wa doping ni mphiira.

Nfaluume wa Axeesiya wa Ixitaato Sowiraana siwaneela sohapala nolaleerya mahove awa muhina mwaha wa ivareelo “limpo” ya eselesawu ya Ruusiya wi vovirikaniha ni vaale valipeleliwa anamaweeha, vakhaliwe nlaaka na makhuuru womaliheryani wa niira aphiira olumweekuni.
Travis Tuygar ophiyera onalavula muhina mwa isepweere.
'' narokhala otene ahu ohoona nakupaali wi ela ti yovirikakana niile erantteele Osooxi.
aleesa aniira atheyasaka paahi mmakhatani mwahu.

ninisuwela wi Kuveeruni Oruusu, siisa wi avahasiwe amphiira a ithuuvo sa eyiita ya 2014, aoolela okhathi ole ntooko mukheheryo wa axukhrele ntthitthimiho nelapo ni omweene mmpuwa mwa ilaaso sokhopela.
vaavo vapaceriwa iporokaraama sa doping, ni wakakhanyiwa iye soolawiha, wi akuxaseke iye apwanya aya, noromoolaka oxiitta ethuuvo ya emetaalya ni waholeela amphiira aya a ithuuvo.
Akhaala mayeso.
tTi vohikhotteya, ahiira Tygart olaleeryaka muhina mea ehapari USA Today.
Mahooleli ole ohicererya oriiki wi vanisuweliwa wi maruusu yahikhalana mukhaleelo mmoosa wa doping masi awosa khuta okathi yanirunasa.

Travis Tuygar, onikeleliha otteyiiwene ni okhupaleelaka wi '' nosuwela wi vookhala nluutte nimoosa na mukhaleelo ola muhina mwa mphiira Oruusiya ni yusuweliwa ekekhayi wi aroowasa iwe okhale aya owerya oxiitta''.
Top Ten Amerikaano: Nikhuuru nniipa na Black Panther ninilipiherya sosuwela sa Kendrick Lamar

Namarepaari ole Kendrick Lamar Oolalerya nikhuru na isiipo sa nikhuuru na paanta ya isiipo sa Black Panther ni asuuweli a ikafirika sa isiipo anilipelelasa otumiihasa vamalelaka ikooto 100 ssa makhuuru wa esuumana yopacerya.
Vohiya tho vaavo reephi Awameerika ole, nikhuuru nayiisipo sa Black Panther ninikotha ni muratti owafirika ti Suuli ntoko Babes Wodumo, Zacari, Saudi, Yugen Blakrok ni Sjava.
ti nimoosa wa isiipo wa nikhuuro nowiipa.
Eminem okhalana e evitiyu kiliipi awe esya ni enirela mpaatte mmoosa musuweli Ed Sheeran.

esinyaalo ele othoonyereya mwaha wa mukhaleelo owalamela, nnyoho navata ti mwaha awe avariyari ni ilatsaraato sipakiiwe wi valattanihiwele anamasiveliwa, ntooko wi sakaravariwe ni kamara a mukhaleelo wa nlipiherya wa eyapelano.
Vokaathi munceene nihamulavula ahu Beyoncé, masi atthu woteete anirya amuluuluma wawe.
wala manamubna xeeni ole ohikupali awe avonyoliwa nroromelo hothi ni iyaawe, Jay-Z, wla maana ole okhalana exitaatuwa ya seera yotepa onyakuliha ya moolumwekuni, mapkha vaninanoni va.
Mpakha va ixitaatuwa iye sa seera sa muratti Beyoncé sinanyihereyasa ni maleepa wovukuwa noole ni Manterinaatini, tivowooneya, onaakhula.
Xuwiixi okhanyererya wi maleepo a isiipo sa aylor Swift tootepiherxa esepwere wi siirya sikhupareliwe muhina mwa nlamulo na ihakhi sa mulipo olepa.
Vophiyaka iyaakha piili, Swift aniromoliwa wi othikela wiipa esiipo ya, anamathokiha Sean Hall vamosa ni ya Nathan Butler.
Masi xuwiixi ophuuke mwaha omaliherya wiira wi yolempwa ya nsiipo nne khanirina epowesiya wophanelela wi ekhupareliwe.

Mutumereryo ole tiwopwanela vameyiithoni wa Swift, oni nnakhala khorowa waliiva ethu anamathokiha ale ayiili, masi masi khivamphanela mwaha wa ekhiitta... khuuvo otthuna wiiwa wi solempwa iye tisootepa okhala sohitthukwasereya!
Esumana yasimwaseeta nolavulana vamoosa ni Louisa Hall, mwavano mmoosa ori muraatti amerikana, a muthito Folk, asiveliwa ni isiipo.
Ole ohiniherya muhina mwa ipuuwa sitokweene ntooko Kennedy Center ni tho ohiipa vamosa ni muratti Folk ohimwa.
Masi ele oharina awe nleelo yaari nikhuuru na isiipo
Omusivelexa anuuna okhuma okhuma okathi womwavano awe Louisa Hall olaleerya ninanoxe va, mwaha wa nipheeto nekekwayi niphatthuwe muhina mwa miruuku sawe m mwaha wa anuuna.
Ni wahirowa nipuuro nitumehiwa anuna weyiiwo nakumanease ahu ni vamosa ni yena!
ni vawarakhani wa iye sotepexa wiwanyeya sa Ameerika, nipuuro na namuloko okhaaleele ti Halsey ni.
