´´ Iyo Nnoona nttharihelo yoola okhala wooreera saana.

Ephiro ela enitthuna otthariwa tiyooreera´´ olavulaka Mark Lundell namararu, mahuku eettaya 7, epooma ya Maputu, otthikelatho, mupuwelo ola onitthariwa oniruuhela nkhalelo wooreera wa ilapo seyiya piili´´.

Waakhula wå Lundell woonanen'ye okathi mukhulupale wa exariya wa elapo ya Mosampiiki nooveleelihiwa ewarakha Otiripunaale Atiminixitaratiivu avekelaka wi ahimiwe atthu yaale alyiiye musurukhu yoole wa eteeni waaphiyelela imiya miloko miili sa itoolari.
Owiiwa okopihiwa musurukhu Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki onnitepiha ohaawa elapo yeela, nilavulaka nikhuru na teeni yeela epakiwe elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Mulopwana mmosa onaakhula nsina na Eufrigina Reis olavula wi makhuru ootepaxa waahoxa atthu ti ekumi, ixikola ni olima. Oh

Nikhuru nenla nithanliwe wi neettihe nkhalelelo wa eteeni yeele epakiwe elapo ya Mosampiiki no olavula nihimyaka wi ohiwa wala onyanyaliwa elepo ya Mosampiiki ni elapo seyiya sinooliha musurukhu enniruuhela nkamiho muulupale wahilinvwe musurukhu yoola.

Mukhulupale wa nikhuru nenla niniira mphantta makhuru ovirikana a mmuttettheni, olavula ahimyaka wi atthu yaale ohaawa annirowa woona ekoyi yuulupale wahilinvwe musurukhu yoola wa eteeni yeela epakiwe elapo sookhopela.

Eufrigina Reis olavulatho makhuru a muteko onnirowa woona a ekoyi yeela ti a ekumi, muxikola ni ematta, mwaha wi makhuru yaala anniruuhela nkhalelelo sooreera mulaponi ni makhuru yaala ilapo sookhopela anihelasaaya musurukhu wowaatta.

Reis, alavula okathi atthu athukumannaaya avaanelaka namuna sooreeriha muteko Sá Kuveerunu ni nikhuru na finansa, nthukumano yoola waahittharelana ni mukinaaku yoole sahiira mphantta ilapo sotheene wenno yaalavuliwa namuna yeela ya eteeni, nave wenno ahithoonyiwa atthu yaala alyiiye musurukhu yoola ni ipanko saari muhina okathi wooliwaaya musurukhu yoola.
Nkhulupale yoola oneettiha eteeni yeela epakiwe elapo ya Mosampiiki ovekela wi elamuliwe ewarakha yoomalela, yeela enilavula eteeni yeela epakiwe.

Nvekelo ola opakiwe mahuku yaala avinre y epooma ya maputu okathi wiiraneyaya nthukumano woothotola waaroyihiwa ohoolo ni funtu monetaariyu iterenasiyonaale, nikhuru nenla linnittimihiwa mwaha wi limphavela otthikela woonaxaxa wa nkhalelo wa finansa wa elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Nave, moonelo wa mulupa a xariya yoola onaakhula nsina na Baltazar Fael etthu yooreera okathi Purokuratoriiya ya elapo ya Mosampiiki enirowaaya osoma ewarakha yeela ya Kroll, yiiraneya siiso nikhuru nenla na Kroll linrowa wooniwa ni mayitho oreera.
Moonelo wa nikhuru nenla linittarelela eteeni yeela epakiwe, linni elapo ya Mosampiiki enniphwanyaneya ekacamiheyaka mwaha woohikhalano musurukhu ni nkacamiho yoola onnonaneya mmuttettheni.
Ereeta ya koolera elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Minixiteeriyu ya Ekumi yoolavula wi atthu ophiyelela 216 anniwereyiwa ni mutthu mmosa ohookhwa mwaha wa eretta yeela.
Minixiteeriyu ya Ekumi yoolavula namararu, mahuku eettka 16, wi eretta ya koolera yoopacerya ipooma piili elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Ewarakha esommwe ni nkhulupale wa nikhuru nenle na ekumi yohooniherya wi atthu ophiyelela 216 yohaaphwanya eretta yeela ya koolera ni mutthu mmosa ohookhwa mwaha wa eretta yeela.
Nkhulupale , Maria Matsinha aniphwanyaneya avaanelanaka maxoronaliixita epooma ya Maputu, ahaakhula eretta yeela enoonaneyaxa ipooma ya Maputu, Matoola ni Wamphula.

Nkhulupale yoola nave ahiruniha wi nkhalelo yoola woothowa maasi onoonaneya ipooma ya Maputu ni Matoola khuniira mphantta wa eretta ya koolera, moonelo awe mukhulupale yoola, eretta ela enoonaneya mwaha wa iphula yeela enirupa.
Sinnivira iyaakha tthaaru, epooma ya OMaputu ehoonaneyaka oretta yoola wa koolera.
Ehiiwaka ottuli eretta yeela ya koolera, nkhulupale Matsinha olavula wi atthu ophiyelela 226 okhwaasa eyaakha ela mwaha wa malaariya ni tiyareeya, ahilempwa nave aretta ophiyelela 900 eyaakha yeela.
Muniha wa iretta seyiya, okhala nave SIITA ni Tuperikuloosi seyiya sinnaakacamiha atthu owaatta mmuttettheni.

Ewarakha yoolempwa ni nikhuru na ONUSIDA enihimya wi, eyaakha ya 2015, ahilempwa atthu asya ophiyelela miloko mixexe (600) awereyiwa eretta yeela ya tuperikuloosi elapo ya Mosampiiki, atthu yaala 51 purusentu aniwereyiwa eretta ya SIITA.
Kuveerunu vamosa ni alupa anakosa a elapo ya Exitaatu Uniitu ya Ameerika avaranasa oxirikha wa nakoso ni elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Nhooleli wa nikhuru na nakoso na elapo ya Ameerika ti Miniixituru wa Mikukutta, Anthony Foxx.

Nikhuru nla na Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Exitaatu Uniitu ya Ameerika, soovarelela ni sirowihaka ohoolo miteko sa nakoso sa impereesa 14 sa elapo yeela, enamararu ela, mahuku eettaka 18, enirowa opaceriwa othotoliwa makhuru anakoso a elapo ya Mosampiiki.

mapuro yaala anirowa othotoliwa ari ntoko nikhuru na mikukutta, enerexiiya ni nikhuru noolima, alupa anakoso annirowa ovaanelana Kuveerunu ni makhuru a muteko soohikhana sa Kuveerunu atthunasaka opaka oxirikha wa nakoso.

Miniixituru wa nikhuru na mikukutta wa elapo ya Ameerika, Anthony Foxx, yoola oniira mpantta wa nikhuru nenle navaanela nanmuna sa nakoso, ottottopela ahimyaka wi ovaanela wenno woonanen ́ye ́ ́ ni akhulupale ovirikana a Kuveerunu ni akinaaku ahiiniira mpantta wa Kuveerunu onniruuhela nreerelo.
Foxx ohuulumatho ahimyaka wi ´´ Mosampiiki elapo emosa enivira yunnuwaka nkhalelo wa maali, mwaha yoola ennikuxa elapo yeela otthukaka oxirikha ni Obama wi apakiwe nakoso elapo iya piili.
Meettettelo yaala a nakoso anniira mpantta muupuwelelo wa ´´ Doing Busines´´ wa Afirika nikhuru nla tina peresitenti Obama, ni nenla nimphavela opaka oxirikha ni alupa anakoso a elapo ya Afirika

Nkhalelo ola woopacerya wa nakoso onirowa wiiraneya ni Kuveerunu wa Ameerika ni Mosampiiki ́ ́onirowa okhala nreerelo woosuwaneya nkhunti wa nakoso ni orowa opakeya oxirikha wa ilapo seyiya piili ́ ́.
Noovavaneliwa ni elapo ya Mosampiiki, onirowiwa elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli ni Kheeniya.
Ifaapika sa asuukari sinivira sunnuwaka, masi sookhala miteko sowaatta sintthunaaya wi sivariwe, alavulaka anamasoma.
Othowa wa mapuro mmuttettheni enitumihiwa asuukari ennaakiha akhulupale a ifaapika.

Enihaleela vakhaani wi elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki ewele mwana wa opaka asuukari, ennaakanyereriwa itonelaata soophiyelela 500 sa asuukari sinipakiwa khuta eyaakha, masi wookhala nkacamiho mukinaaku woohiphwanyaneya mihali .

Ifaapirika xexe sa asuukari siniphwanyaneya elapo ela ya Mosampiiki tiiya, Xinavaani ni Maraakara, iya siri eporovinsiya ya OMaputu; Maromeewu ni Mafampiisi iya siri elapo ya Sofaala, enilipeleliwa wi ifaapirika seyiya saapake asuukari ophiyelela itonelaata 430, enilikana ni 16.4 purusento ovikana mwaakha wa 2016, eyaakha yeela khisaalinwe saana mihali.
Mulupa anakoso onaakhula nsina na Eduardo Sengo olavula wi, ninnisuwela wi ifaapirika sa asuukari sinivira sunnuwaka, masi sookhala miteko sowaatta sinitthuna ovariwa.

´´ Muteko mmosa mmosa onitthuna ovariwa osoma moote xeeni ninrowaahu ohiya waasima nsina na ifaapirika sa asuukari nipacerye waasima ifaapirika sa kaana ti asuukari, mwaha olelo mihali seyiya khinivareliwa muteko saana, masi mihali seyiya saarowa opakeliwa eviinyu.

Nkhulupale wa faapirika ya Xinavaani, Rosário Cumbe, olavula wi okathi yoola enittekiwa efaapirika enirowa ompaka asuukari ophiyelela itonelaata 90 wakhula eyaakha, ni efaapirika yeela enirowa okhala yoopacerya elapo ela yotheene, omalawaya efaapirika ela meeri wa Owutuupuru eyaakha enirwa.
Eyaakha ya 2016, elapo ya Mosampiiki yohaatumiha asuukari elapo sikinaaku ophiyelela itonelaata 138, elapo yaathumme asuukar owaatta ti Uniyaawu Ewuropeeya.

Othowa wa mapura mmuttettheni enitumihiwa asuukari ennaakiha akhulupale a ifaapika na atthu akinaaku, alavulaka anamasoma a nikhuru nenla na ifaapirika, yaala esumana ela oonaxaxa meettettelo a ifaapika, epooma ya Maputu.

Jorge Manjate, yoola oniira mpantta wa Osenturu ya Poromosawu ya Akirikulutuura, olavula ohimyaka wi mpakha okhale sikhale imatta sowaatta wi silimiwe mihali seyiya sinirowa ofaapirika wa asuukari , nkhalelo yoola wa imatta mpakha anamuttettheni iire mpantta.
Mosampiiki ennirowa olempwa exariya yoowaarulela erutthu wala iphatte sa erutthu atthu yaale oniwereyiwa
Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki olepa ewarakha oroyiha Oparalamentu wi yaakanyereriwe exariya yeela yoowaarulela erutthu wala iphatte sa erutthu atthu yaale oniwereyiwa

Ewarakha yeela enilavula exarixa yootumuhiwa erutthu wala iphantte ya erutthu ya mutthu, enitthuneliwa wi ewoopole atthu yaale akhalanne iretta sootikiniha, ntoko orusarusa wala sa murima, ni sikinaaku seyiya sinikacamiha ophwanya mirette saya sitthunaka wi ekuxiwe ephantte ya mutthu mukumi aheleliwe muretta yoole.
Ewarakha yeela eveeleeliwa wa Asempeleeya yohoonaxaxiwa na atthu owaatta.
Mamfurumeero annilavula wi exariya yeela ennirowa oruuhela nreerelo wa ekumi.
Nikhuru na atthu yaale aniwereyiya eretta ya minyoso ni ale akinaaku aniwereyiwa eretta ya murima annuuluma hoote.
Ewarakha yeela eveleeliwe eniphwanyaneya okathi ola yoonooniwaka ni atthu atthu yaale athanliwe wi avare muteko yoole.
Mateputaatu anuuluma wi ewarakha yeela yookhalana itthu sowaatta sinitthuna wooniwa ehinahiiwe okhala exariya, itthu seyiya tiiye sinikottihiwa atthu akinaaku otumiha erutthu ya mutthu.
Ewarakha yeela eveleeliwe eniphwanyaneya okathi ola yoonooniwaka ni atthu atthu yaale athanliwe wi avare muteko yoole.
Yatthunihiwa ewarakha yeela ennirowa waaruhela nreerelo aretta owaatta , awo akinaaku ti ale aroyiye elapo sookhopela ophavela ekumi yoola woovahiwa ephantte ya erutthu.
Eteeni yeela epakiwe yohaaruheela ohaawa atthu owaatta, alavulaka nnsomi mmosa.
Miniixituru ya Ekonomiiya onnikupali wi eteeni yeela yoohisuwaneya yaatthuneliwa nikhuru na Ematu, Prolndicus ni Man yootepiha nkhalelo wa elapo.

Alupa anakoso ahuuluma wi ohisuweliwa meettelo wa eteeni yeela epakiwa enniphiyelela yahawihaka mamosampikaano owaatta ni yaawo annikhupanya Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki mwaha woonyaari nkhalelo ola woohaaxiwa atthu a elepo yeele.
Esumana ela, Epanko Muntiyaale yohaalaka atthu otheene wi eteeni yeela epakiwe ennikacamiha nkhalelo wa elapo.
Nkhalelo yoola wookacamiha wa eteeni yeela epakiwe waari mwaha waalavuliwa ni asomi owaatta iyaakha seyiye sivinre, etthu yaatepa olavuliwa yaari mwaha wa muteko waarowa ovareliwa musurukhu yoola.
´´ Kuveerunu nave ahikhotta itthu sotheene soonanara saarowa orwa mwaha nala wa eteeni yeela´´, alavulaka mulupa wa naloso Lucas Sitoi.
Wuupuwela wa mulupa anakoso, Antonio Francisco, eteeni ela enniphwanyaneya ehithanyeyaka, mwaha wi elapo yaatthuna wuunuwa mpakha ekhalane musurukhu wa popansa.

Mulupa anakoso yoole ahilavulatho ahimyaka wi nkacamiho muulupale wa itthu seyiya sinikhumelela mwaha woohononiwa musurukhu yoola wa popansa, olinvwaka itthu soohisuwaneya ni sihinruuha nkhalelo woreera mulaponi.

Ni Miniixituru mosampikaano ni ekonomiixita wa Finansa, Adriano Maleiane, onnikupali wi yaari eteeni ya apakeliwe makhuru a Ematum, Prolndicus ni Mam, eteeni yeela epakiwe eyaakha ya 2013-2014, opacerya vaavo ehonona nkhalelo wa elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Mosampiiki enniphwanyaneya ekhalanaka eteeni yuulupale soovikana iteeni sikinaaku sa Afirika Supisahariyaana.
Musurukhu yoola wa eteeni onniphiya 109, 7 pusento.
Mosampiiki elapo emosa enirowa okhalana eteeni yulupale ya Afirika Supisahariyaana, etthareliwaka mwaakanyerelo wa Busines Monitor Internacional.
Nikhuru na moonelo nniira mpantta nikhuru nikinaaku na nakoso nnaasimwa Fitch nnaakanyerya wi eteeni ya elapo ela enniphiyelela 109, 7 purusento.

´´Nuumora eteeni yeela mwaha woohilinvwa, yaarowa wiiraneya mahuku eettaka 20 mweeri wa Caneero, iyaakha sinrwa enirowa ohimmwa ni Kuveerunu ntoko enootthunihiwa opakiwatho eteeni´´ muulumo ala alempwe muwarakhani yeela aveleelihiwe atthu yaale oolinhe musukhu yoola.
Eporovinsiya ya Kaapu Telekaatu ennipaka nakoso ni epooma ya Xowanexipuuruku.
Epooma ya Kaapu Telekaatu annoonaneyawo alupa anakoso owaatta anitthuna wiira mpantta wa kaaxi yeele enphwanyaneya Opasiya ya Rovuuma.
Kuveernu wa porovinsiya ya Kaapu Telekaatu ohathoonyiherya alupa anakoso namuna sowaatta sa nakoso a elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli sa elapo yeele.

Sakarataari peremanenti wa eporovinsiya yeele , Antônio Domingos Mapure, yoola othoonyerinhe , onniphwanyaneya atthikelaka owaani wootteeliwa murima mwaha wa ovaanela opankayiye ni alupa anakoso a elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli.

Alupa anakoso yaala anikhumasa elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli ehaaphwanya ekuru yoomupaka nakoso epooma yeela ya Kaapu Telekaatu ni yaala anitthunasa wiira mpantta nakoso wa Kaaxi ni patarooya yoola aniphwanyaneya Opasiya ya Rovuuma.
Eporovinsiya ya Kaapu Telekaatu enniira mwiinaano ni elapo ya Tasaniiya.

Meerelo mphantta wa alupa anakoso a elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli OKaapu Telekaato ennaavaha mikacamiho wootumiha itthu saya aroyihaka epasari ya Afirika tu Suuli wenno, mwaha wi, wenno orakama ephiyelelaka ikiloometuru 2 000.
Elapo ya Kaapu Telekaato annoonaneyawo atthu owaatta anittuna wiira mpantta nakoso yoola wa Kaaxi enniphwanyaneya omuro wa Rovuuma.
Mosampiiki: elapo ela ennooneya onyaareya wala omora wa metikaali, muulumo ala alavuliwe ni FMI.
Onyaareya wala omora wa metikaali yoola onnoonaneya owelaka, muulumo ala alavuliwe esumana yeela ni FMI , epooma ya OMaputu.
Maxoronaliixita a epooma yeele arumenle moolumo a mukhulupale Alex Segura analavula wi nikhuru nenla na FMI naakanyera wi ekampiyu enoorowa okalelana epacereka 45 wa khutadolar etoolari.

" Nuupuwela wi onyaareya wala omora wa metikaale ni musurukhu mukinaaku wa Afirika Supisahariyaana yaari etthu yooreera, masi noonelaka pahi elapo ya Mosampiiki nkhalelo yoola woowelaxa vano woopacerya oruuha nkacamiho.
Esumana ela, ekampiyu yoowela ephiyaka 50 metikaali wa khuta etoolari.
Ettarelanaka mukhalolo yoola, Epanko ya Mosampiiki yooweliha ixxuru 8,25 sa purusentu ya atthu yaale anittuna ovekela musurukhu mweeri iya miili sinittarelana.
Exoronaale ya Mosampiiki " OPayiixi"yoolepa wi mukhulupale wa FMI muupuwelo yoola oniroohiwa ohoolo ni Panko ya Mosampiiki khuvonye iye
Alupa anakoso ni aneene impereesa alavulasa wi nkhalelo yoola woowela ixuuru onnirowa waakacamiha anmmuttettheni.
Venâncio Mondlane khaniira mpantta "mwawutarikiiya" elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Eparitiitu MDM, yeela iirawe mpantta khalayi Venancio Mondlane, yoolepa ekhottaka itthu soohisuwaneya.

Venâncio Mondlane yoola athanliwe wi iire mpantta wa mwathanle ni eparitiitu Renamo , okhottiwa ni nikhuru na nikhuru na Komisawu Nasiyonaale na mwathanle, yoola onirowa wiiraneya mweeri wa Owutuupuru , elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Mondlane yoola atthuna wiira mpantta wa mwathanle wa epooma ya Maputu, yeela ekhanle yuulupale ya Mosampiiki, Mondlane yoola arowa oxinttaana ni Eneas Comiche wa eparitiitu Frelimo; ni Machel Jr., yoola nave onniira mpatta wa Komite Senteraale ya eparitiitu Frelimo.
Mondlane yoola okhottihiwe wiira mpantta ni nikhuru na KNM, mwaha manyakunyaku akhumelenle ni eparitiitu ele iirawe mpantta khalayi, MDM, elavulaka wi yoola khaniphwanelela.
Yaala aari muulumo a eparitiitu MDM nuumala ohiya wiira mpantta wa mwathanle wa elapo ya OMaputu, numala othanliwa wi iire mpantta wa Asempeleeya ya Repuupika, mwathanle yoole ovinre.
Exoronaale ya epao ya OMaputu yoolepa wi khayakhanle mwiinano okathi wavaaneliwaaya, ni wiiraneya siiso, KNM onne opaka mwathanle.
Nkhalelo yoowo, Mondlane wonnawe eparitiitu Frelimo, MDM ni atthu akinaaku amulolaka Renamo ni ivootu thanu na xexe soovirikana ni iye thanu na piili avotarinwaawe Renamo yoola ni atthu akinaaku.
Atthu yaala otthyawasa elapo aya aphiyasa elapo ya OMusimpwa ta Paraaya.
Atthu yaala attyawanse mwaaluteeya wa mwathanle OManiila mwaha wa ekhotto.

Eviila ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya, eporovinsiya mosampikaana ya Kampu Telekaato, evenye wuumalini wa sumana, mahuku eettaka 11, asaren'yeene atthu attyawasa ekhotto elapo aya, yaala ahimyasa wi anikhuma wa aluteeya wa OManila, mwaha wa ekhotto yeela yaarohiwa ohoola atthu ohisuwaneya mapuro akhumasaaya, itthu seyiya sikhumelenle ohiyu wa nsana.
Mutthu mmosa avanenle namaxoronaliixita, yoola ovekenle wi lihihimwe nsina awe olavula wi okathi yiiraneyaaya ekhotto yeela ahikhwaasa atthu araru ni mmosa ahithikilasiwa.
Nikhuru nenla narumenle ikatátana ni naahipaha inupa sowaatta ankhalelo yoola waharuhelela atthu a muttetthe yoole nkacamiho apiyelalaka ottyawela epooma ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya.
Nikhuru na xoronaale na VOA noomulikarela nkhlupale wa elapo ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya yoola okathi mukinaaku anileele nilavule ni mapuluusa, noophavelatho wuulumana khamwaakhunle telefooni.
Eporovinsiya ya Kaapu Telekaato ennoonaneya ewaniwakawo ekhotto opacerya mweeri wa Owutuupuru mwaakha wa 2017, ekhotto yeela yoowiiva atthu ophiyelela 120 ni empa só ophiyelela 500 soopahiwa.
Etiripunaale ya OKaapu Telekaato ennirowa ophuka milatthu mweeri yoola ya atthu ophiyelela 160 yaala anaanyiheeriwa wiira mphantta wa ekhotto yeela ewinvale atthu owaatta.
Eparitiitu Frelimo eniphwanyaneya ethukumaneene epooma ya Wamphula.

Nthukumano yoola anniira mpantta masakarataari tixitiritaali, ahooleli a ipankaata sa asempeleeya sa munisiipiyu, makhulupale makhuru a miteko soovirikana, mamusatoro, ni atthu akinaaku, atthu yaala otheene aruuye na axaara aya.

Wamphula, mahuku eettaka 29 mweeri wa Tesempuru, mwaakha wa 2010- Paritiitu Frelimo ohaathukumanya makhulupale a eparitiitu yeele epoma ya Wamphula, nnikhuruni wa atthu yaala anniira mpantta masakarataari tixitiritaali, ahooleli a ipankaata sa asempeleeya sa munisiipiyu, makhulupale makhuru a miteko soovirikana, mamusatoro, ni atthu akinaaku, atthu yaala otheene aruuye na axaara aya.
Atthu akinaaku annupuwelela wi nthukumano yoola enilavuliwa namuna soovukula makhalelo oyeeha musurukhu.

Nkhulupale wa Komisawu Puliitika wa paritiitu Frelimo, Conceição Surtane olavula wi nthukumano yoola oniiraneya onitthuniwa osuweliwa meettelo a eparitiitu Frelimo, ennisuweliwa wi miteko sowaatta soovarima, ´´masi eparitiitu yeela ennirowa otthikela waaruhela makhalelo oreera atthu otheene´´ a elapo ya Mosampiiki, etthareliwaka miteko sa Kuveerunu iye sinihimwa wi ´´ itthu sotheene sikhale sowooneya ni atthu otheene asuweleke´´.

´´ Nimphavela wi makacamiho yaala anooneya elapo ahu ni Nkuveerunu mwahu, ntoko ohiwanana, opisa wa itthu, ohivara saana muteko, oveka musurukhu woohikhalelanavo ni wiiva, iretta, sotheene iyo nimalihe, olavulaka Surtane.
Nikhuru matteeke LAM linniphwanyaneya nitthikelaka weetta nttetthe wa ewuroopa ?
Elapo ya Mosampiiki enitthuna wi nikhuru na ntteeke LAM nitthikele weetta lirowaka Ewuroopa eyaaka ya 2020, alavula ti Miniixituru wa mikukutta, Carlos Mesquita.
´´Wookhala muteko onivariwa ni ilapo soovirikana etthuniwaka wi wiiwaniwe wi matteeke apacere weetta ilapo ilapo sene, alavula ti Mesquita, yoola nave oniira mpantta ya empereesa ya purutukeesa TAP.

Muulumo ala akhumelela mwaha wa Ekomite yeele enivarelela mateeke ya elapo Uniyawu Ewuropeeya, mweeri wa Apiriili olakekela wi makhuru otheene yaala alempwe elapo ya Mosampiiki apacere weetta nttetthe wa ewuroopa.

Atthu yaala osoma alavula ahimyaka wi etthu yooreera matteeke yaala opacera weetta nttetthe wa ewuroopa, masi matteeke a LAM weetta nttetthe yoola enirowa okhala nkacamiho muulupale, mwaha wa musurukhu ahikhalansaaya.
´´Wookhala muteko onivariwa ni ilapo soovirikana etthuniwaka wi wiiwaniwe wi matteeke apacere weetta ilapo ilapo sene, yoola nave oniira mpantta ya empereesa ya purutukeesa, alavula ti João Mosca.

Mosca olavulatho wi, ´´ nihikhalakhale nuupuwelaka wi nttetthe wa ewuroopa ni sikinaaku sinnitthunihiwa wi avireke matteeke, sookhala iwarakha sinitthariwa wi matteeke avire mmuttettheni muumu (...) nkinsuwela ntoko nikhuru na LAM linniwerya otthara iwarakha seyiya.
Ni onnikoha: ´´ Enirowa wiiraneya sayi mwaha wi nikhuru nenla na LAM empereesa yoohisuwanexa, kikhalanne matteeke muulupale antthuna wi akuxeke atthu aroyihaka ilapo sookhopela ?”
Miteko sinivariwa muhina wa empereesa ya LAM, ennoonaneya nreerelo, masi mikuthakutho khasireere mwaha wa matteeke ohisuwaneya.

Miniixituru Mesquita olavula wi ´´ nihinatthune opacera weettiha matteeke muulupale, mpakha nisuwela toko meettettelo a matteeka yaala makhaani ni etthu nimpakaahu olelo ni noonelaka siiso mpakha nipacere ovara muteko woosuwaneya wi matteeke ahu ahikhalane nkacamiho sowaatta.
Paritiitu Renamo ni MDM enitthuna ovaanela exariya ya nkhalelo wa ovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelelavo.
Etthu eniphaveliwa ni exariya yeela ´´evaaneliwe oparamentuni woohipiseyavo´´.
Elapo ya Mosampiiki, oparalamentu, iparitiitu sa moono weethiyana soolavula wi Frelimo khakhalanne ikuru yoovaanela exariya ya nkhalelo wa ovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelelavo.

Wuupuwela nno wa iparitiitu seyiya sa moono weethiyana sinikhumelela mwaha wa muulumo yaala alavuliwe ni nkhulupale Verônica Macamo, Peresitenti wa Asempeleeya ya Repuupilika, wi khuwaakhanle nkacamiho woonoonaneya wi ehivaaneliwe nkhalelo yooa nthukumano woopacerya wa Asempeleeya, mahuku eettaaya 12 mweeri wa Maarusu.
Jose Manuel de Sousa, nkhulupale wa MDM oparalamentuni.

Nkhulupale wa Oparalamentu, Verônica Macamo onihimya wi nkhalelo yoola onniiraneya, etthuniwaka oreerihiwa exariya yeela mwaha wi sookhala itthu sowaata siri muniha wa xariya yeela sinitthuna wi soonaxaxiwe.
Teputaata wa eparitiitu Renamo, Gania Mussagy olavula avarelelaka eparitiitu awe wi etthu eniphaveliwa wiiriwa nanaano va ´´ovaaneliwa woohipiseyavo mmparamentuni muumu exariya yeela ´´
Wuupuwela wå teputaata yoola wa Renamo ́ ́nkhalelo yoola woovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelelavo onnikacamiha wuunuwa elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
Mparalamentuni muumu yookhala eparitiitu anaanyihera eparitiitu Frelimo wi khikhalanne nreerelo wa epuliitika.

Mukhulupale wa mmparalamentuni wa eparitiitu MDN, José Manuel de Sousa olavula ahimyaka wi: ´´Hiyo mateputaatu otheene ninnisuwela wi opisa wenno wa ovaaneliwa exariya yeela ori mwaha iyo akinaaku ohitthuna wi yiiraneye, mwaha wi ntokoni exariya yoolavuliwa , akhalavo atthu akinaaku a Kuveerunu ari muumu yahasivenle wi exariya ela evire ni epacere orumeeliwa, atthu yaala ahisivelinwe tiyaale anilya musurukhu wa Kuveernu mahaleene akacamihaka wunnuwa wa elapo ela´´a
Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki owala misikitthi seyiya mwaha wi aniswali anamatakhali yaala awiivasa atthu epooma ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya.
Misikitthi miraru soowaliwa epooma ya OPhempa soowaliwa.

Owaliwa wa misikitthi seyiya ni Kuveerunu yaari mwaha wå anwiive yaala avolowanse muumu anaswalasa. Nikhuru nenla tinootakhala mwaha wi ahiwoopela ni awiiva mapuluusa axexe woopacerani wa mweeri wa Owutuupuru, opooma ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya, porovinsiya ya Kaapu Telekaato.

Misikitthi miraru soowaliwa epooma ya OPhempa soowaliwa ni kuveerunu wa epooma ya Kaapu Telekaatu, okathi sawaliwaaya ahiira mpantta akhulupale a misikitthi yaala aniira makhuru mayili, Konseelyu Ixilaamiku ni Konkereesu Ixilaamiku.

´´ONkhalelo yoola woowaliwa misikitthi seyiya wuupuweleliwe ni Kuveerunu wi siwaliwe paahi misikitthi iye aswalasaaya nukhuru nenle liniwiva atthu epooma ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya´´ alavulaka nkhulupale wa exariya ni etiini, Alvaro Gonçalves, muxoronaale Notiisiya ya elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Nihiyakatho epooma yuulupale yeela ya OPhempa, ipooma sikinaaku siniira mpantta sinnirowa owaliwa misikitthi ntoko iye siniphwanyaneya etixitiriitu ya Xiwuri, Mwentepweexi, Makomiiya, Mosimpwa ta Paraaya, Paaluma ni Nankaati.
Mahuku eettaka 5 ni 5 mweeri wa Owutuupuru, milokosene sa anamatakhala akuxanse kapwitthi awoopelasa mapuluusa epooma ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya ni ahiphiyelela awoomolasaka nuuvenya anamaka elapo yeele.

Mupuluusa ophiyelela axexe ni anamatakhala 14 ahikhaasa okathi yoola atthu opelanaaya, yiiraneka siiso, akhulupale ahilavula ahimyaka wi atthu ophiyelela emiya atthukasiwa wi akohiwe ni aphiyelele osuwaneya nipuru anamatakhala yaala anikhumaayawo.
Mpakha olelo khasuwaneeye nipuro atthu yaala anirwasaaya, nnakhale ntthu mmosa khapukinwe.
Kaapu Telekaato: Atakhali awiivasa atthu owaatta ni amakasa epooma yeela ya Makomiiya.

Atakhali awiivasa atthu, oxaka, namararu yeela, mahuku eettaaya 28, opooma ya tixitiriitu ya Makomiiya, elapo ya Kaapu Telekaato, ekwaha ela tiya neexexe iirasaka itthu saya seyiya, muhina wa eyaakha yeela, Nuumala owiiva atthu eppoma ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya ahirowasa avara muteko aya yoola e epooma ya Kisanka ni Mwitumpi, mweeri wa Apiriili.

Mpakha olelo khinisuwelewa itthu na atthu apweten´ye mwaha wa manyala wa anawiive yaala, wuupacerani awiivasale atthu epooma ya Makomiiya, yeela yattamenle exitaraata yuulupale lummuru EN380, exitaraata yeela enaakuxa atthu mpakha elapo ya Tansaniiya.
ohiya mooro waapatta epooma yootheene ya Makomiiya, atthu annihimya wi khisaarere woopiwa akapwitthi uulupale mmuttettheni wotheene wa epooma yeele mpakha oxaka, okathi weettaka 5 ora.
´´Atthu otheene atthyawela mutekhwani´´.

Nikhuru nenla na anawiive nakenle epooma ya Makomiiya okathi weettaka 1:00 oora yoohiyu, masi ekhotto yapacenre 5: oora , okathi yoola anammuttettheni wahaariipa murima ni khuta mutthu atthyawela nipuro nawe , olavula wa VOA, huuluma attettemelaka, nammuttettheni yoola onaakhula nsina na Salimo, yoola aphwanyaneya ipintheene nipuro noohisuwaneya.

Nammuttettheni mukinaaku ohimmye wi, okathi yoola wa ekhotto anawiive yaala akusanyeyanse makhuru mararu ekhotto, nikhuru nimosa naari epooma ya Makomiiya, na nenli naaphwanyaneya nttetthe wa N´nanka, Seeta ni Maxoova, Epooxito ya Oxaayi, ni na neeraru naphwanyaneya nttetthe wa Litamanka.
Atthu akinaaku annilavula wi ekhotto yeele yahiiraneya mpakha oxekuwa wa nihuku nenle.
Akhulupale yaala anikhala epooma ya OMaputu, anivara muteko wooxakiha namuna yeela ya anawiive, mpakha olelo khanahimye etthu.
Paralamentu ya elapo ya Mosampiiki eniphavela otthunihiwamo wiiweleliwa tilifooni.
Frelimo ni MDM akupali nkhalelo yoola wa tilifooni, Renamo nave khatthunne.
Eparalamentu ya elapo ya Mosampiiki yoolepa ni ekupaliwa namararu yeela, mahuku eettaka 18, exariya yoowiiwelela matilifooni ni namuna sikinaaku sa tekonoloxiiya.
Eparitiitu ya moono woolopwana ni MDM ya moono weethiyana akupalisa nkhalelo yoola wa tilifooni, Renamo nave nave khatthunne anyiheryaka wi nkhalelo yoola khunisuwaneya ni khulavulinwe oratteene.
Eparitiitu ya nkhulupa Dhlakama yoolavula wi exariya yeela ya tilifoone mpakha ettharelele ehakhi sa elapo sootheene ni asuwelihiwe akhulupale otheene nkhalelo yoola wowiivelela mutelefoonini.

Atthunaka olakiherya nkhalelo wa exariya yeela, nkhulupale wala miniixituru wa mikukutta ni Komunikasawu, Carlos Mesquita olavula iiraka nkhalelo yoola onitthara namuna seyiye sinitthareliwa ilapo sikinaaku´´ hiyo mpakha ninttharelele ehakhi sa elapo sootheene ni asuwelihiwe akhulupale otheene nkhalelo yoola wowiivelela mutelefoonini´´.
Paritiitu Frelimo yoolavula wi eparitiitu Renamo enipaka manyala onanara ni wahasula atthu.
Eparitiitu Renamo yoolavula wi kinirowa opweha ikapwitthi Kuveerunu ahimanle ni manyakunyaku.
Paritiitu Frelimo yoolavula namararu yeela wi, mateputaatu eparitiitu Renamo enipaka manyala onanara ni wahasula atthu, ni yaala anniphavelasa okacamiha munnuwelo wa elapo ela ya Mosampiiki.
Muulumo ala alavuliwa ni nkhulupale wa mateputaato a nikhuru na Frelimo, yoola alavula oparamentuni olelo nthukumano wa neeraru III.

Nthukumano yoola wiiraneya makhuru yaala mayili (Frelimo ni Renamo) aruwanasaka, okathi yoola, Renamo ahaakhula muulumo yaala otheriwayiye, ni veene ahimootherya Frelimo wi tuyoole anaaliva atthu yaala aniwiiva atthu elapo ya Kaapu Telekaato ni ahalavulela wi, Kuveerunu atthuna ekhotto ni Renamo, atoropa a Renamo khanaahiya akapwitthi wi aakihe eparitiitu aya.

Peresitente wa eparalamento ya Mosampiiki ahilavula avekela wooreereleyavo mateputaatu otheene wi iwananeke, aswaamihaneke ni aphentaneke akhalase atthu animuhiya mukhwaaya wuupuwela ni olavula ele onoonawe oreerela eparitiitu awe, itthu seyiya sotheene sintthuniwa wi okhale ereerelo wa atthu otheene.
Olavula nno onirowihiwa ohoolo ni miniixituru wa Finansa wa elapo ya Mosampiiki onnirowa olakiherya namuna iya sa ´´teeni yeela epakiwe´´.
Manuel Chang ahitthitta iwarakha seyiye sa eteeni yeela epakiwe.

Nkhulupale yoola, Manuel Chang olavula awe wenno oparamentoni, oniphaveliwa wi alakiherye atthu otheene moota yenttaaya eteeni yeela, mwaha wi yoola tatthintte iwarakha seyiya sa eteeni yeela, ni iira siiso makhuru yaala aniphuka milattu annirowa osuwela itthu sotheene sakhumelenle mpkha musurukhu yoola ovekeliwa elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
Akhala anamwaakanyerela anninwelela miteko sinivariwa oparamento seyiya sa eteeni yeela epakiwe elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Manuel Chang aari miniixituru, mwaha muteko awe yoola, ophiyelela awaraka nsina na Kuveerunu wa Mosampiiki atthitta iwarakha seyiya satthuniwa wooliwe musurukhu waatthuneliwa wi orumeeliwe impereesa ya Prolndicus, EMATUM ni MAM, musurukhu yoola wooliwe waari imiya miloko miili sa itoolari.

Alupa a xariya yaala iwasiwe ni maxoronaliixita a nikhuru na VOA alavusa wi nuwiiwasiwa atthu yaala inre mpahtta wa eteeni yeela ahikhumelela manyakunyaku a namuna sa epuliitika yaala onaneya mwaha wooveehiwa atthu yaala alyaasiye musurukhu yoole.

Mwakanyerelo wa nlupa xariya, José Machicame onihimya wi wiiwasiwa wa atthu yaala oniiraneya okathi wookacamiha, mwaha wi woopacerani akhalavo atthu akhotta apaka nikhuru na atthu yaala arowa osuwela itthu siranen´ye, nuwiireya siiso, vano nimphwanyaneya neetaka saana mwaha wi nikhuru nenla noopakiwa ni muteko onoovariwa saana´´

Anamwaakanyera anuupuwelasa wi wiiwiwa wenno oniira mpantta wa nkhalelo woophavela waaphwanya alupa yaala akuxanse alya musurukhu yoola wa eteeni, yiiraneya siiso, Mosampiiki ohaano avaanelana axirikha awe a elapo sookhopela wi alevelele eteeni yeela.
Okathi evithulinwaaya eteeni yeela yahasuweliwa, axirikha owaatta yaale olihaka musurukhu elapo ya Mosampiiki ahihiya wooliha musurukhu elapo yeela ni ahiyasatho omuvarelela Kuveerunu wa elapo yaala.
Soolempwa ikalawa elapo ya Ruusiya, Panama ni Xexeele seyiya sapwanyaneya siiyaka ihopa sa elapo ya Mosampiiki, alavulaka makhulupale.

Elapo ya Mosampiiki ennipweteyiwa wa khuta eyaakha imiya thanu ni mosa, 60 sa itoolari, mwaha wa atthu aniiya ihopa muphareya ya elapo yeela, atthu yaala owaatta anikhuma elapo ya Ruusiya, Panama ni Xexeele, ni nittharihelaka muulumo akhulupale a ilapo seyiya, ihopa seyiya aniiyasaaya sinikhala sikhaani seyiye sinikottihiwa omiseriwa.

Nkhalelo yoola olavuliwe ni miniixitira wa namuna seyiya soomiserya ehopa elapo ya Mosampiiki, Augusta Maita yoola khaliyalanse atthu a elapo ya Xiina mwaha wi yaala muteko athikila miri ni wiiya itthu sikinaaku elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.

Maita okupali wi, aniwiiye a ihopa khanthanla , anniphiyelela ahiyasaka ihopa sikhaani, akacamihaka munnuwelo wa ihopa seyiye, nkhalelo yoola oniiraneya mwaha wa elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki ohikhala atthu anxuka iphareya seyiye sinikhumihiwa ihopa seyiya.
Oxukeriwa ihopa erumeeliwaka esateeliti.
´´ Hiyo khanikhalanne nreerelo wooxuka iphareya sahu, ni oxuka vathi wa iphareya seyiya masi ninniphavela namuna wi nivare muteko yoola wooxuka´´, olavuka mukhulupale.

Miniixitira, Agusta Maita olamula wi ennirowa otekiwa eponte, mahuku yaala anaattamela, OKatempe ephantte ekinaaku yaattamenle epoma ya OMaputu, ni onnirowa ophaveliwa nikhuru na atthu anirowa owehaweha iphareya, ennirowa oheliwa esateeliti, ni ekaruma emosa enirowa oveleeliha ihapari sa meettelo sa ikalawa.

Eporoxeeto yeela yootekiwa eponti evareleliwe ni Panko Muntiyaale, ni ekhwiiye musurukhu woophiyelela imiya ikonto muloko miili sa itoolari, ni elapo ya Mosampiiki yahithanliwa wi etekiwe eonti yeela, olavulaka nkhulupale Maita yoola onooneya wi mutthu saana wooxakiha iphareya.
Ovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelelavo.
Alavulaka Augusta Maita, opakiwa itthu iya sotheene sinirowa opaceriwa eyaakha enirwa.

Namwaakanyerela, Moisés Mabunda olavula wi, esateelite seyiya sinnirowa okhaliherya nkacamiho yoola, yaahiraneye namuna yeela yoovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelelavo, namuna yeela ennaaruhela nreerelo anawiiye ihopa.
Namwaakanyerela yoola olavulatho wi atthu ale anikhuma nttetthe wa Aasiya, maxiina, yaala takhanle alupa anihonona itthu elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
Atthu anirowa wiira mpanttha wa mwanthanle elapo ya Wamphula annikacamiheya ni iparitiitu seyiya sinirowa othanliwa.

Olelo aneetta mahuku mararu wa ekampaanya yeela ya mwathanle yoola onirowa wiiraneya mahuku eettaka 15, mweeri wa Owutuupuru, elapo ya Mosampiiki, elapo ya Wamphula, wenno aniphwanyaneya atthu owaatta anirowa othanla, anamathanla yaala annilavula wi iparitiitu sotheene khasiniruuha itthu sinniwaneya.
Iparitiitu sikinaaku sinaaroromeliha atthu otheene , alavulaka atthu yaale anirowa othanla.

Waavaha atthu miteko, orehera exitaraata, waavaha maasi atthu, waavaha enerexiiya atthu, waavaha ekumi atthu, waavaha exikola atthu ni waaxakiherya namuna atthu namuna soovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelelavo, itthu seyiya sotheene saalavuliwa elapo ya Wamphula ni iparitiitu seyiya sinirowa wiira mpantta mwathanleni.
Anamthanla anitthuna osuwela moota xeeni iparitiitu iya sinirowaaya oruuha itthu seyiya sinihimaaya.
Namathanla mmosa orina eyaakha 24, onaakhula nsina na José Simão, onniloha okhalana muteko ni enupa.
Olavula wa namathanla yoola, inre wi iparitiitu sinniroromeliha itthu sowaatta.

´´Namathanliwa wa paritiitu Frelimo yoola onuupuweleliwa okhala peresitenti wa elapo ya Mosampiiki ahaaroromeliha amiravo otheene waaphwanyiha muteko, masi nihiliyale wi eyaakha ya 2014 mukhulupale yoola ahaaroromeliha waaphwanyiha muteko amirovo khuhiiraneya, alavulaka.

Namathanla yoola okhalano itthu sowaata onitthunaawe wi akohe: ´´ Miyo kinitthuna osuwela moote xeene namathalinliwa yoola onirowwawe waavaha miteko, eyaakha iya sinirwa, miteko iya sinirowa ovahiwa ?
Nave eparitiitu Renamo enaawokerya atthu namuna yoomaliha mavekelo wa musurukhu woohiphwanelelavo, etthu yeela onirowa omaliha ?"
Anamathanla, Laura Cherene ni Leonardo Agostinho iparitiitu sihikhaleke okathi wotheene sawokaka atthu, etthu yarowaaya wiira yaari oreeriha elapo.
Epooma ya Wamphula, annoonaneya mwathanle ovirikana, ontoko Asempeleeya Porovinsiila wi athanliwe Kuverenatoore wa iparitiitu Frelimo , Renamo, MDM ni Amusi.
Mosampiiki enniphwanyaneya eweleka namuna ya nkhalele wa maali ovikanaka ni eyaakha ele evinre.
Noonelaka mwyiyeeri thanu ni emosa seyiye sivinre wa eyaakha ya 2014, yahoonaneya owela wa 2,5 purusento.

Waavaha atthu miteko, orehera exitaraata, waavaha maasi atthu, waavaha enerexiiya atthu, waavaha ekumi atthu, waavaha exikola atthu ni waaxakiherya namuna atthu namuna soovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelelavo, itthu seyiya sotheene saalavuliwa elapo ya Wamphula ni iparitiitu seyiya sinirowa wiira mpantta mwathanleni eyaakha ya 2014.

Olima, ohuwa inama, osaya, waala miri ni miteko sikinaaku ntoko omiserya ihopa sahoonaneya siwelaka wa 22, 7 purusento wunnuwa wa Mosampiiki, opacerya mweeri wa Caneero eyaakha yeela, nittharelaka nikhuru na mikukutta, mapuro anipwehiha itthu ni mikukutta, ni muumu sinimwariwa ihapari waahiphwanyaneya owelaka 13, 7 purusento, mawelelo yaala alempwe mupuleti, namararu, mahuku eettaka 6, ni Ixitituutu Nasiyonaale ya Exitatiixitika.

Noonelaka makhuru makinaaku ntoko , muumu sinitumihiwa itthu samupaani, miteko seyiya sinaavarelela atthu wala impereesa, muxikola ni mapuro makinaaku owelawaya woonanen´ye okhalaka wa 7, 3 porusento ni 6, 6 purusento , ettharelanaka ni makhuru makinaaku aruuhela nreerelo wa 30, 1 purusento.
Nkhalelo wa itthu soolya ni soorumeela soowela elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Owela wenno woophiya 12 purusento.

Itthu soolya ni soorumeela elapo ya Mosampiiki sinivira siwelaka, owela wenno woophiya 12 purusento wuumalani wa mweeri yoola ovinre, owela wenno onoonaneya mwaha wa itthu soolya soowaatta siroowela ihisapu aya ni khankuruxiwa nanaano mwaha woorupa epula wenno woonane´ye Osuuli wa elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Nkhalelo yoola onitepihiwa mwaha wa ekhotto yeela enoonaneya mulaponi muumu.

Nave eteeni yeela epakiwe ya musurukhu oniphiyelela imiya miloko 850 sa itoolari ni empereesa Ematum wi yathume ikalawa niwiira siiso ehiiraneya, erowiwaka ohoolo nanaano yoosuweliwa eteeni ekinaaku ni nikhuru na Wall Street Journal ya emiya ikonto 187 sa itoolari, iteeni seyiya sookacamiha elapo yeela ephiyelelaka owelihiwa itthu soolya ni ohaawa wa atthu, alavulaka mulupa anakoso Alfredo Mondlane.

Ekwaha awe , mulupa anakoso Edilson Muguambe ahiruuha mwaakanyero woreera wa itthu seyiya, yoola onnikupali wi Kuveerunu akhalanne mapuro makinaaku ovekela eteeni ni nkhalelo wa wowaakhaliherya anammuttettheni , eteeni yeela yaarowa ovukuwa.

Mahuku ala, Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki olavula wi onoovukula itthu seyiya sinitumihiwa wi sikhale 7 purusentomwaakha ola, mwaha wa nkhalelo wa mmuttettheni , atthu anaanyiherya wi nkhalelo yoola tuyoole wooniheriwe ni FMI ni makhuru makinaaku.
´´Ohaawa onnirowa otepa elapo ela ya Mosampiiki´´ olavula mukhulupale yoola onoonaxaxa itthu sineetta mmuttettheni.

Mukhulupale yoola onoonaxaxa itthu sineetta mmuttettheni olavula wi ipuliitika sa atthu ohaawa mmuttettheni khasinsuwaneya ni yoola onnilamula wi mahuku anapise onnonaneya ohaawa wa atthu wenno onirowa wooniwa noomala Koronaviiru.

Nlamulo nna nilempwale muwakhani wa nikhuru na Nasawu Uniita, yeela esommwale nihuku noopacerya na esumana, neetakha 15, ewarakha yeela ennilavula wi lapo yeela ya Mosampiiki ahuncerereya atthu ohaawa aphiyelelaka imiya nloko mmosa iyaakha seyiya tthaaru, nkhalelo ola onnikacamiha mwaha wi onnitthuniwa omalihiwa ohaawa wenno onikhumelela mwaha woohiphwanyaneya eyoolya, eteeni yeele epakiwe, ikweneeri ni ohasuliwa wa atthu mulaponi.

Ewarakha yeela ennilavulatho wi, eyaakha ya 2015 ni 2018, mammeru a atthu ohaawa ahiwela aphiyelelaka imiya miloko mmosa, 21, 3 ya atthu alikanihaniwaka imiya milo miili 22, 2 , noonelaka elapo ekhalanne atthu ophiyelela imiya miloko miraru.
Nkhulupale wa OMR, João Mosca onnilavula wi, khuro waakuveya owela wenno mammeru atthu yaala ohaawa, masi nkhalelo ola oniiraneya mwaha wa eretta ya Koronaviiru.
´´ Wookhala nthoonyero anihimya wi ohaawa elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki onnirowa otepa´´, alavulaka João Mosca, nkhalelo ola onoonaneya mwaha wa ipuliitika sa Kuveerunu ohitthareya.
Alavulakatho mulupa anakoso yoole, ipuliitika sa elapo ya Mosampiiki ´´ khiniruuha nreerelo saana wi savarelele atthu yaala ohaawa, etthu eniiraneya enikhala ovula mahala-maheleene.

Ennihimwatho wi mwaakanyerelo yoola opakiwe ni nikhuru na Nasawu Uniita woolepwa muwarakhani yeela enilavula namuna ´´Woowincerereya ohaawa elapo ya Mosampiiki, elapo yeela eniphanyaneya ekacamihen´yeene wala ehanweene´´ ewarakha yeela elempwe ni Inxitituutu Univeresitaariyu Muntiyaale ya Ivexitikasawu Ekonoomika ya ONU, yeela enniruuha muupuwelelo wa namuna ya wunnuwiha elapo ni ipuliitika ni waalaka akhulupale a mulaponi wi akhalane osuwela wookava itthu seyiye sa Kuveerunu.
´´ Onipwetheya mutthu anaakiha ni yoola ari tithi ahu´´ alavulaka Daviz Simango.
Mukhulupale wa eparitiitu ya MDM olavula wi elapo ya Mosampiiki mpakha yisupuwele.
Mukhulupale wa eparitiitu MDM, Daviz Simango, olavulatho ahimyaka wi elapo ela yoopwetheyiwa ni muuthu awaakiha atthu otheene nuukhwa Afonso Dhlakama, elapo ya Mosampiiki mpakha yisupuwele.
´´ Onipwetheya mutthu anaakiha ni yoola ari tithi ahu´´ nopacerya enamwanane, mulopwana ola ahiisuwela wi muteko awe owaakiha atthu.
Mulopwana mmosa onaavarela muteko atthu, mulpowana ola oreera murima.
Mulopwana ola khathukumelela ophwanya wala okhalana itthu sooreera, okhala saana, masi etthu aphavela iye yaari owaakiherya mamosampikaano itthu soonanara, alavulaka nkhulupale wa eparitiitu MDM.
Wuupuwela wa Simango, oreera murima ariina iye mukhulupale yoola wa eparitiitu Renamo ´´ okhala mapuro ohisuwaneya areene mulopwana wowuuluvala´´.
´´okhati ola niraahu tiwookacamiha, atthu a elapo ya Mosampiiki mpakha asuwele wiivarelela ni wiiwanana, alavulaka Daviz Simango.
Mukhulupale Afonso Dhlakama okhwiiye oxaka wa namararu, mahuku eettaka 3, OSeera ti Koronkoosa mwaha wa eretta ya tiyapeeti.
Elapo ya Mosampiiki yoopwetheyiwa musurukhu woophiyelela imiya miloko miili sa metikaali mwaha wa namuna yeela yoovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelelavo.
Nkhulupale wa exariya olavula wi onnirowa winciviha nkalelo wa ovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelelavo.

Nkhulu yoola wa xariya wa elapo ya Mosampiiki olepa ekhotto mwaha wa namuna yeela ya yoovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelelavo ni wiiya musurukhu wa Kuveerunu, mwaakha yoola woohiiyiwa musurukhu woophiyela imiya miloko miili sa metikaali.

Nkhulupale yoola, Augusto Pulino olavunle itthu iya vanthukumanoni wa Koritinatoori wa Minixiteeriyu Puupiliku, yeela emanle namararu ni emalenle otixitiriitu ya Pileni, porovinsiya ya Kaaza. Eyaakha ela enirwa, Minixiteeriyu Puupiliku ahiroyiha ohoolo miteko sowaatta wi sivarelele nikhuru nenla na exariya niphiyelelaka waattuka atthu yaala anivara itthu sonanara.
Waakiha exariya yoohasuliwa anamwane ni waakiha exariya yoowiiwanana, nkhalelo onitthuniwa orohiwa ohoola eyaakha ya 2012.

Moonelo wa eyaakha ela onnihimya wi nikhuru na Minixiteeriyu Puupiliku nenla ninvara miteko sooxakiha namuna soowiviwa atthu lihoonaneya lilepaka ipuruseesu soophiyelela miloko mithanu (50) elapo yotheene, seyiya 83 purusento tisoomala. Ipuruseesu soomala siri 19,288 seya aneene aniphwanyaneya atthukinweene, ni ipuruseesu sa atthu ophiyelela 838 aneene aya atthukulasiwa.
Teofilo Nhangumele onniira mpatta wa eteeni yeela yoohisuwaneya epakiwe elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki, yoola nave oniphwanyaneya otthukinweene elapo ya OMaputu.

Mutthu mmosa onivara muteko Opurokuratoriiya Xeraale ya Repuupilika ya Mosampiiki ovaanelana maxoronaliixita a nikhuru na VOA alakiheryaka otthukiwa wa Teófilo Nhangumele ni waakhiwa itthu sawe sotheene mwaha wiira mpantta wa eteeni yeela epakiwe.
Mutthu yoola olavulatho wi nikhuru otthukiwa wa mulopwana yoola wirinwe ni PGR ni wiiranen´ye woomaleleyavo´´ wi ahikhale manyankunyaku ni ohankawaani´´.

Nhagumele yoola onnihimwana okhala mutthu ari ohoolo okathi yapakiwaaya eteeni yeela ni yoola ti akhanle mutthu awuulumiha atthu elapo ya OLiipanu, ntoko Jean Bustani, yoola otthukinwe nanaano elapo epooma ya Noova Yooriki, ni mukhulupale yoola aari Miniixituru wa Finansa wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, yoola otthukinwe elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli, Manuel Chang.
Mutthu mmosa ohitthunne ohimya nsina nawe khahimye ikateya yeela otthukelinwaaye Nhangumele, ohimye paahi wi mahuku yaala anirwa atthu owaatta anoorowa otthukiwa.

Teófilo Nhangumele yoola ohimya nikhuru na exariya ya Ameeririka ni elapo yeela yoovekela wi atthukiwe mulopwana ola, Manuel Chang ni Atonio Carlos Rosario, ola omalela avaraka muteko namwiiwelela wa Kuveerunu.
Nikhuru na VOA khaniwenrye oruuha ihapari soorerela sinithoonyerya wi atthu axexe atthukasiwa.

Muupuwele wi, Manuel Chang, avaraka muteko wa Miniixituru wa Finansa tupacenre ovekeliwa elapo ya Ameerika wi atthukiwe, mwaha wi akanyeriwa wi akuxaka musurukhu woowiyiwa anoroyiha ipanku sikinaaku ntoko Exitaatu Uniitu, Chang yoola onipwanyaneya otthukinweene, meelo, mahuku ettaka 15, onniroyihiwa Otiripunaale ya Kempitoni Paariki, epooma ya Xowanesipuuruku, wenno namaphuka milatthu seyiya tunirowa ohimya ntoko Chang yoola onorowihiwa elapo ya Noova Yooriki.
Atthu yaala iiyale nttetthe wa Mao Tse Tung mmoosa onaakanyeriwa okhala puluusa.

Atthu owaatta annilavula wi nikhuru nenla na anawiiya mmosaaya ari puluusa yoola onivara muteko wa (PIC), yoola ahoopeliwa okathi yoola yiiraneya itthu seyiya yoola opelinwe ni mulopwana mmosa onaanyiheriwa okhala wa elapo ya Aasiiya ni yoola alavula wi amoopaka kapwitthi yoola atthuna wiikassopiha anawiiye yaala, itthu seyiya siiraneya nsana nttetthe wa Mao Tse Tung, ephuro yooviraviriwa wa epooma ya OMpautu, elapo ya Mosampiiki.

´´Yaawo (anawiiye) aheemexa ekaaro aya (ekaaro yooriipa, yoolepwa Toyota, yaarina matricula ADD 934 MP) atthu yaala hiikuxerera okhala mapuluusa ni ahirwaanasa ekaaro ekinaaku yarina matricula olepmwa ABG 923 MP (ekaaro yootteela, yoolempwa nave Toyota).

Kinnaayihera wi mulopwana ari mukaaroni ahisuwela wi atthu yaala khaari mapuluusa, masi atthunasa wiiya wala omukuxa mutthu yoola, ni ehinapisa ahoopiwa kapwitthi´´, alavulaka muutthu aphwanyaneya nipuro nenla yoola akohiwa ni xronaale Veretaati ni mutthu yoola khamusuwenle namoopeliwa yoola.

Mutthu mukinaaku aphanyaneya nipuro nenla, onaakhula nsina na José da Costa, olavula wi ahimwiiwa kapwitthi arumaka ehilokenle ´´ kaahimoona mulopwana mmosa wa elapo ya Aasiya amukunxeene kapwitthi ni akapantteene murupa atthyawaka´´.
Xoronaliixita wa elapo ya Mosampiiki otthukeliwa okwarutelo ya atoropa elapo ya OMuweta

Mulopwana yoola onaakhula nsina na Abubacar yoola onivara muteko muraatiyu wa nikhuru na Ixitituutu te Komunikawu Sosiyaale, yoola oniphwanyaneya otthukinweene ni Kuveerunu, ni yoola onniira mpanttha nikhuru na Zitamar.
Xoronaliixita wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, Amade Abubacar otthukeliwa okwarutelo ya atoropa elapo ya OMuweta, Kaapu Telekaato, ehapari ela elavuliwe ni nikhuru na AIM.

Abubacar otthukinwe woohisuwaneyavo, esaapatu, elapo ya Makomiiya, yoola akanyereriwa waakumiha iratarato atthu yaale atthyawa ekhotto yeela enaamala atthu elapo ya Kaapu Telekaato opacerya mwaakha wa 2017.
Mukhulupale wa muteko wa Abubacar, olavula ohimyaka wi khasuwenle mwaha onintthukiha namuteko awe yoole.
Atthu ophiyelela thanu na piili okhwasa mukhottoni.

Nivinreene nihuku nimosa nootthukiwa Abubacar, ekaaro emosa yahoopeliwa ni ni yaahiphiyelela epahiwaka ni nikhuru na atakhali, okathi yoola ahikhwaasa atthu ophiyelela thanu na piili, owaatta ari athiyana.
Okathi omoopasaaya akapwitthi aheemexasa ikaaro, atthu oona itthu seyiya annihimya wi atakhali yaala yahimwiiva ni amuthikilasa xofeeri ni ahirumeela ikatana anaathikilasa atthu akinaaku.
Ekhotto yeela yiirannen´ye nihuku nenla yarowihiwe ohoolo ni nikhuru nenle liniwiiva atthu eporovinsiya ya Kaapu Telekaato.
Alupa a xariya annoona wi wookhala ´´nnyakunyaku´´ oniiraneya OTiripunaale Supereemo ni Paralamento mwaha wa Manuel Chang.

Onnitthikeliwa meelo, nihuku neettaka 1, mweeri wa Fevereero, ophukiwa nlatthu Otirupunaale ya Kempiton Paariki, epooma ya Xowanisipuuruku, elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli, nlatthu yoola tuule wa Miniixituru wa Finansa wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, Manuel Chang, mulopwana onimwaakiha yoola onnivekela wi atthukuliwe.
Nirowaka ohoola, epooma ya OMpautu itiripunaale ni paralamento sinninyakulihana mwaha wa eteeni yeele epakiwe.
Nikhuru na Tirupunaale Supereemo noovekele Paralamentu wi atthukiwe teputaato, anaxariya ahaakhulelo nvekelo yoola.
Eparalamentu ennilavula wi teputaato Chang onirowa otthukiwa okathi onirowaaya ohiihiwa ekhulupale, mpakha olelo okhulupale yoola khanakhumihiwe.
Ettharelanaka siiso, Tiripunaale Supereemu yoolepa ewarakha enihimya wi teputaato Manuel Chang atthukiwe, masi nkhalelo wa ewarakha yeela kiyaasivenle alupa axariya owaatta.
Mulupa a xariya mmosa anaakhula nsina na Rodrigo Rocha onnikupali wi nuulumo noomalela linrowa ohimwa ni nikhuru na exariya na Afirica do Sul.
Mwiiwelele ehapari:
Waatta ekokhola elapo ya Wamphula ennaakacamiha anammuttettheni.
Waatta wenno wa ikokhola ennakacamiha ni waareyiha muru atthu mwaha wi atthu akina anniliva miteko sa munisiipiyu.
´´Nyakunyaku muulupale´´
Wookhala nyakunyaku muulupale onniraneya na anammuttettheni OWaphula vamosa ni Munisiipiyu wa epooma yeela, elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.

Itthu seyiya sinikhumelela mwaha woowela musurukhu oniliveliwa ikokhola yoola onikhuma ikonto 10 orowa va ikonto 30 sa metikaale, owela wenno woonane´ye nuupacerya ekootiko esya, yeela yavaaneliwa ni Asempeleeya Munisipaale. Nave, owela nno wa musurukhu yoola oniiraneya okathi anammuttettheni Owamphula wenno apacenraaya khalayi omuvekela munisiipiyu wi akhupeke ikokhola siniphwanyaneya epooma yootheene ya Wamphula. Etthu enooneya epooma yeela, munisiipiyu muteko awe akhupa ikokhola sinipwanyaneya variyari wa epooma yeela.

Anammuttettheni yaala anikhala muttetthe soovirana wa epooma yeele ya Wamphula annikuxasa ikokhola athipa malitti athipela mmawanya aya. Atthu yaala annikupali wi waatta wenno wa ikokhola ennakacamiha ni waareyiha muru atthu mwaha wi atthu akina anniliva miteko sa munisiipiyu, alavulanaka nammuttettheni mmosa nikhuru na VOA. Munisiipiyu yoola aepooma ya Wamphula onivaanya mwaha yoola.

Abdul Paulo, mukhulupale wa munisipiiyu ya Wamphula yoola onivara miteko soorattela oolavula wi, mahuku ala miteko sookhupa ikokhola khasimpiya mittetthe seyiye soottyayiwene mwaha wi anammuttettheni yaala khaniphavela wiiwelela miruku sa munisiipiyu ni khaniiwanana yooyoru. Mwaha yoola wa ikokhola wooruhela iparitiitu olavula ni waatumerera anammuttettheni wi atthikele ovara muteko hoothe ni munisiipiyu.
Mahuku otheene manyakunyaku khanimala mwaha wa nkhalelo yoola wa ikokhola.
Etthaya eroohunyuwela ephiyelela ewiivaka anamathipa athanu na tthaaru epooma ya Maniika.
Nookhwaasa atthu yaala mammeru anamathipa akhwiiye awela aphiyelelaka 150 opacerya eyaakha ele envinre.

Opacerya eyaakha ele evinre, anamathipa ophiyele miloko miili akhwaasa oporovinsiya ya Maniika, mwaha woohunyuwela wa etthaya mapuro yaale enithipiwa maluku , muulumo ala alempwale muwarakhani ya nikhuru na mampiyentaliixita a elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Nkhumelelo yoola wiiranen´ye oxaka wa etuminku yeele evinre, nttetthe wa Tunta, tixitiriitu ya Makosa, wenno etthaya yaroohunyuwela ephiyelela ewiivaka anamathipa athanu na tthaaru ni akinaaku muloko na piili ahuuheeleya ni etthaya.

Ewarakha yeele elempwe ni nikhuru mampiyentaliixita a elapo ya Mosampiiki, nenla naphwanyanela nirumeelaka muulumo a atthu apwhanyaneya nipuro nenla, nkacamiho oola wiiranen´ye ewoora weetakha 23 yoohiyu, etuminku, okathi anamthipa yaala arisaaya vathi atholasaka maluku yaala anikhwa musurukhu wowaatta.
Atthu 12 yaala uhulelen´ye ni ni etthaya akinaaku ophiyelela 4 aphwanyaneya areene akumi.

Nkhalelo yoola wootipiwa maluku elapo ya Maniika, anilempwa anamathipa ophiyelela 100 akhwaasiye, yaala anniira mpahtta mamosampikaano ni masimpwapweyaano, mwaha wa athipasaka maluku yaala khankhala ikaruma soreerela wi ikaasoopihe nkhumelelo woonanara.

Nikhuru na exariya nenle nsaasimwa mapiyentaliixita noolavula olelo naavekela wooriipiwavo murima atthu yaala anivara muteko yoola wi ahiyerere ni linaavekela akhupale a iporovinsiya ni wa elapo yotheene wi onaxaxe saana okhalelo yoola mwaha wi atthu owaatta anivira akhwaasaka.
Minixiteeriyu ya Rekuurusu Mineraale ennooniherya oriipiwa murima ni okacamihiheya mwaha wa anamathipa yaala anivara miteko saya woohivekela .
Eparitiitu Renamo yoomuvekela nkhulupale Jacob Zuma wi onaxaxe nkhalelo wa elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Ewarakha yoolepwa nsina na peresitenti na elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli oveleelihiwa nkhulupale Filipe Nyuusi.
Epartitiitu Renamo yoomuvekela Kuveerunu wi alattuliwe pirisitenti wa elapo ya Afirika tu Suul arwe iire mpantta ovaanela wenno onirowa wiiraneya iparitiitu iya piili (Renamo ni Frelimo).
Nvekelo yoola elempwe mweeri yoola ovinre oveleeliwa pirisitenti wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, Filepe Nyuusi, alavulaka teputaatu wa Renamo, Antônio Muchanga, wuupacerani wa esuma, elapo ya OMaputu.
´´Peresitenti Jacob Zuma ahiira mpantta okathi savaneelaya ipartitiitu sa Zimpwaapwe´´ olavulaka Antonio Muchanga atumereyaka wiira wenno mpantta wa nkhulupale yoola wa Afirika tu Suuli.

´´ Anamavarelela nvaanelo akinaaku (elapo sookhopela) iire mpanhtta khaasuwela avarelela mwaha ni okathi yoola khalavulasa itthu sowiiwanana´´, alavulaka Muchanga mwaha okathi aruuyaya atororopa akelasaka mpa wa nkhulupale Afonso Dhlakama ni anaakuxa akapwitthi ari mmatani wa atoropa awe.
Kuveerunu khunahimye ni eparitiitu Frelimo khanahimye etthu.
Maxoronaliixita aromanasiwa ni atoropa a Renamo.
Maxoronaliixita aniphwanyaneya areene Oxipitaali yuulupale ya Wamphula.

Maxoronaliixita a Tilivisawu ya Mosampiiki (TVM), aromanasiwa ni ipwexeliwa ikaruma saya ni atoropa a Renamo okathi avarasaaya muteko epoma ya Wamphula wenno onikhalaawe Afonso Ddlkama, peresitenti woopacera wa eparitiitu Renamo.

Xoronaliixita onaakhula nsina na Vicente Martins ni muxirikha awe a muteko Horácio Hermínio aniphwanyaneya alyaasaka mirette Oxipataali yuulupale ya Wamphula, masi nkhalelo aya atthu yaala khutepanxe.

Mulopwana mmosa oniira mpantta wa eparitiitu Renamo, yoola othoonyiwe ni maxoronaliixita Simiao Pongoane, olavula wi oriipiwa murima ni ookacamiheya mwaha wa maxoronaliixita yaala ahisuwenle ovara saana muteko, mwaha wi aphiyansaaya ahipacerya ofilimari ahaavekenle aneene empa.

Maxoronaliixita yaala waakhula waya mwaha wa nkhalelo yoola orowansaya ovara muteko wanneene ahivekelanse, ahimyanse wi aahivekela masi woohirerelavo, ni atthu otheene aphwanyanekaru mmphiro khankhalatho mutthu wowanyawe.
maxoronaliixita yaala okathi arowasaaya ovara muteko aya yoola awelanse ekaaro yoolepwa TVM.
Nkhulupale wa paritiitu Renamo onnilavula namararu yeela enirwa.
Peresitenti wa Renamo onirowa olavula mwaha woomala wa ekhotto.

Peresitenti wa paritiitu Renamo onnilavula namararu yeela enirwa, mwaha wa woomala ekhotto eriyari ya mweeri miraru, muulumo ala alempwe ewarakha enirwa okapineeti ya peresitenti wa elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Yoola (Dhlakama) onoorowa ohimye mulatthu aya Kuveerunu ohimphavelaawe ekhotto´´, alavulaka nkhulupale Filipe Nyuusi okathi avaanelanaaya maxoronaliixita, epooma ya OMaputu Opalaasiyu , no akathi wenno avaanelaawe ohihimyawi ahimulikarela ni alavulana Afonso Dhlkama.

Akhulupale yaala ayili avaanelasa aphwanyasa nreerelo ni, atthareliwaka muulumo a exoronaale Opayiixi, Dhlakama onoorowa alamula omala ekhotto, namararu yeela enirwa, okathi weettaka iwoora 9 sa wiisiisu.
´´ Mamosampikaano anivaanela nkhalelo wala makacamiho elapo ya Mosampiiki´´, ovaanela wenno tuwowiiwana, alavuka Filipe Nyuusi.
Afonso Dhlakama olavula mahuku eettaka 27 wi onoomaaliha ekhotto esumana emosa ´´ omaala wa ekhotto wenno oniphavela mamosampikaano ahakalele saana niira nenla na wuumalani wa eyaakha ´´

Atthu yaala aniira mpantta wa nikhuru nenla noovaanela alavulasa wi omaala wa ekhotto yoola onnirowa mpakha okathi enirowaaya wiiraneya nthukumano woopacerya wa paralamentu ya Asempeleeya a Repuupilika, ni okathi yooa sinirowa ovaaneliwa itthu seyiya aniphavelaawe Renamo.
Epartitiitu yeela enihooleliwa ni Afonso Dhlakama eniphavela okuxa iporovinsiya thanu na mosa sa Mosampiiki mwaha wi mapuro yaala eparitiitu yeela yoolola mwathanle yoole iranen´ye eyaakha ya 2015.
Mosampiiki: Othipeya wa ixitaraata enaaruuhela nkhalelo woreera atthu yaale ohaawa.

Malitthi onoonaneya muxitaraatani N7, exitaraata ela enikhuma Mosampiiki anatthoowela ilapa sikinaaku sa Afirika, ennaaruuhela nkalelo woreera anammuttettheni owaatta, mwaha wi yaala annikuxa etthaya anattiyattiya malitthi yaala aniphwanyaneya muxitaraatani muumu, naawo nave analinvwa.

Athiyana ni anamwane yaala anikhalasa mittetthe sohaawiwa a itixitiriitu soovirikana ya epooma ya Kuuru (Maniika) ni Xankaara (Teete), annirowasa muxitaraatani ovara muteko soovirikana ntoko, otumiha makhala ni olapa, ni malitti yaala aniphwanyaneya muxitaraatani muumu ahaaruhela nreerelo amusi yaala.

Atthu yaala attiyela malitti khanoonava itthu soonanara sinikhumelelaka muxitaraatani muumu, ixitaraata seyiya sinnivira ikaaro suulupale sowaatta, seyiya sinikuxa itthu OPorutu ya OPeera sirowihaka ilapo sikinaaku.
Atthu yaala owaatta attiya malitti yaala aphwanyasa mathala aya ovara muteko.
Nikhuru nenla nnaalevelela atthu ninvekela osuwela makhwelo a nkhulupale a munisiipiyu, Mahamudo Amurane.
Nikhuru nenla linniriipiwa murima mwaha ´´woowiviwa woohisuwanela´´ wa namphira ole owaniwa.

Nikhuru nenla nnaalevelela atthu noonvekela osuwela, wowaakuveya namararu, mahuku eettaka 4 makhwelo a nkhulupale a munisiipiyu ya Wamphula, Mahamudo Amurane, yoola evinwe ni atthu ahisuwanen´ye mpakha olelo.

´´ Akhulupale a elapo ya Mosampiiki mpakha atthukule eporoseesu , ni yeettihiwe saana mwaha wa namuna ya wiiviwa atthu woohikhaleleyavo ni ehikhala etthu emosa enipakiwa. epuruseesu yeela mpaka epakiwe wala yiiraneya moota woorereleya´´ alavulaka Deprose Mucheia, mukhulupale wa elapo ya Afirika Awuxitaraale yoola onikasoopiha ohaxiwa atthu.
Nikhuruna A AI linniriipiwa murima mwaha ´´woowiviwa woohisuwanela´´ wa namphira ole owaniwa.

´´ Eyaakha ya 2013 okathi opacenra iye ovara muteko wooperesiteti wa munisiipiyu ya epooma ya Wamphula , opacerakaro ohooniherya wi khaniphavela itthu soohikhala ntoko wiiya musurukhu, mwaha yoola tukhale mulatthu woopacera otharatthariwa muhina wa eparitiitu awe (MDM) ´´ alavulaka Muchena, muwarakhani, yoola onilipelela wi ´´ atthu yaala anaakanyereriwa wi tamwiivale Amurane athukumanyiwe ni ophukiwe milatthu seyiya.
Enoonaneya owela wa nkacamiho yoola woovekela musurukhu woohiphwaneleleya´´, alavulaka nikhuru na Senturu ya Itekiritaati Puupilika.
Adriano Novunga onnithooya namuna ´´yoovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelela´´ wa namphira ole owaniwa.

Peresitenti wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, Armando Emílio Guebuza olavula okathi avaanelawe ni Raatiyu Vooxi ti Ameerika nsana ahmyaka wi nihiyaka ottuli nkacamiho sinikhumelela ni kinnikupali wi sinoorowa omala, elapo awe tiyooreera.

Okathi alavulanaawe maxoronaliixita a nikhuru na Vooxi ti Ameerika, nkhulupale wa itekiritaati puupilika, Adriano Nuvunga onnikupali wi muteko onoovariwa nnikhuruni mwawe, masi yoola nave ohiimya wi ekhalelo yeela yoovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelela onivira waattaka mmamutekoni.

Nkhulupale wa Senturu ya Intekiritaati Puupilika, nikhuru nimosa lihiniira mpantta miteko sa Kuveerunu ni nenla linnivara mitoko sowehaweha ni soophavela osuwela moota sineettaaya itthu nlapo moota oneettihiwaaya musurukhu wa elapoya Mosampiiki, yoola onnikacamiheya mwaha ixariya isya seyiya sinivaaneliwa oparalamentuni, exariya yeela khinithoonyiherya ewarakha enitthittiwa ni Kuveerunu ni impereesa seyiye sinirumeela itthu sa maali sa elapo yeela.

Adriano Nuvunga onnimunyakula Minixiteeriyu Puupiliku wi amalihe namuna yeela yoovekela musurukhu woohiphwaneleleyavo ni yoola olavula wi, nkhalelo yoola onnirowa owoopopiha atthu yaala anikhuma elapo sookhopela anitthuna omweetta nakoso elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.

Alavula ti Adriano Nuvunga, nkhulupale wa nikhuru na Senturu ya Intekiritaati Puupilika, okathi yoola aphawanyaneya avaanelaka ni Xoronaale Vooxi ti Ameerika epooma ya Waxintto, wenno aronwe wiira mpatta wa nthukumano waalavula namuna makhalelo a atthu mmuttettheni, elapo ya Xitaatu Uniitu-Afirika, nthukumano yoola omanle namararu.
Mahuku anirwa, Nyuusi ni Dhlakama onookumaanasa, olavulaka namakhaliherya a muulumo.
Mulupa a teeni, Piixipu Diniz Sengulane olavula wi atthu owaata ´´anaakanyera wi muthukumano yoola onirowa wiiraneya nanaano´´.
Makwaarata a mukhulupale Dhlakama atthukulelasiwa.
Elapo ya OPeera ennoonaneya emanleene.

Peresitente a elapo ya Mosampiiki, Filipe Nyuusi onnirowa othukumana nanaano ni mukhulupale wa eparitiitu Renamo, Afonso Dhlakama, alavuka mulupa a tiini, Piixipu Dinis Sengulane ni atthu akinaaku yaala aniphwanyaneya akhaliherya muulumo nthukumano yoola onirowa wiiraneya ni Kuveerunu ni eparitiitu Renamo.
Nikhuru nenla na anamalipiherya muulumo ahiphwanyaneya amuveleelaka mukhulupale Afonso Dhalakama okathi atthikaawe OPeera, nipuro nenla ipintha iye mwaha okathi yoole aphaveliwa iye wiiviwa.

Wuumalani wa esumana, mapuluusa a elapo ya Mosampiiki ahirukuresa enupa ya mukhulupale wa eparitiitu Renano, epooma ya Peera okathi yoola ahitthukasiwa makwaarata a mukhulupale yoola nkhalelo wa ekhotto wahaaripiha murima anammuttettheni yaala attamananne mukhulupale yoola
Nookuxiwa ikapwitti sa makwarata yaala a mukhulupale Afonso Dhlakama, ahirowaniwa opuluusa .

Makwarata athanu na tthaaru yaala atthukasiwe okathi yoole yaarukureriwe enupa ya mukhulupale yoole atthukulasiwa, wuumalani wa esumana ni okathi ola aniphwanyanela axukaka enupa ya mukhulupale aya, Dhlakama masi woohikhalana ikapwitthi.
Piixipu Sengulane olavula wi atthu owaata anaakanyerera muthukumano yoola onirowa wiiraneya nanaano.
´´ Mupuwelelo nirinaahu nnoona wi atthu otheene anaakanyera wi muthukumano yoola onirowa wiiraneya nanaano´´, nilavulaka nikhuru la anamakhaliherya a muulumo.
Elapo ya OPeera ennoonaneya ereene yoomaleeya.
Kaaza: Amiravo aneettela eparitiitu ya Nova Democracia atthukulasiwa; ni eparitiitu yeela yoottottela musurukhu okathi wowaatta.

Akhulupale a epooma ya Kaaza ahaatthukulela olelo, mahuku eettaka 30 mweeri wa Novempuru, amiravo ophiyelela 18 yaala aniira mpantta wa eparitiitu Nova Democracia, otthukuliwa waya amiravo yaala alinvwale musurukhu woophiyelela imiya muloko miili ni imiya piili sa metikaali (720).

Amiravo yaala atthukasiwe otixitiriitu ya Xookhwe, mahuku eettaka 15 mweeri wa Owutuupuru, nihuku eraneyaaya mwathanle, yaala akanyereriwa owoka ewarakha yeela enithoonyiherya nsina na atthu yaala aniwehaweha miteko seyiya sa mwathanle.

Akhulupale a eparitiitu Noba Democracia alavula wi nkhalelo yoola wiiranen´ye khayi weekekhayi, itthu seyiya sotheene siroopakiwa ni eparititu Frelimo, aviraka mahuku epariitu yeela tiyalonle mwathanle yoole.
Eparitiitu Nova Democracia yooliva musurukhu yoola aphwanyanse mwaha mwaha wa nthukumano wapakiwe waasimwa #Gaza18, musurukhu yoola waakusanyiwe mahuku mayili.

Mahuku ettaka 45, okathi ovinreene wohakuveya ni iwoora 48, okathi wootthyawa" moolumo ala alempwe mufeesipuukini wa muthiyana mmosa onnaakhula nsina na Quitéria Guirengane nkhulupale wa eparitiitu Nova Democracia.
Noonelaka muupuwelelo wå akhuluple, Guiregane olepa ewararakha enihimya wi ´´ okathi atthukiwansaaya amiravo yaala khuwaapinse onavekeliwa musurukhu wi opolasiwe (...)
Woopacerya naahiliwa musurukhu yoola waavekeliwa; anamattheka otheene ahaana alivaka mulattu aya ́ ́.
Otthukeliwa wa amiravo yaala waahinyaariwa ni atthu owaatta a mmuttettheni yaala a elapo ya Mosampiiki ni ale anivara miteko sowaatthuniherya exariya atthu elapo soteene.
Mpakha olelo kinahimmwe nihuku anirowaaya ophukiwa milatthu sa amiravo yaala.
Epartiitu Nova Democracia yoolavula wi ´´ mahuku ala ninikhala novalaka ni nisoovelelaka´´.
´´Ninrowa otthikela owana ekhotto mpakha atthu yaala ni hiyo noopowe´´.
Makhulupale a elapo ya Mosampiiki sootthuka empereesa soophiyelela 23 mwaha woowavaha miteko atthu anikhuma ilapo sookhopela.

Nikhuru nenle noowehaveha miteko ( Ixipensawu Xeraale tu Tarapaalyu) nootthuka impereesa soophiyele 23 sinivara miteko soovirakana, iporovinsi	ya sa elapo ya Mosampiiki, mwaha woowavaha miteko atthu anikhuma ilapo sookhopela.

Etthareliwaka moolumo elempwe ni Ixipensawu Xeraale tu Tarapaalyu, yaala aniphwanyaneya muxoronaale OPayiixi, impereesa seyiya sohaano oliva musurukhu mwaha wa itthu seyiya, etthariwaka exariya yeele yoowavaha muteko yeela enittareliwa elapo ya Mosampiiki, musurukhu yoola onirowa otthikiliwa wa khula namuteko.
Empereesa seyiya sipanke itthu seyiya sinivara miteko saya iporovinsiya ya Kaapu Telekaato, Wamphula, Teete, Sofaala, Maniika, Kaaza, epooma ya OMaputu ni eporovinsiya ya OMaputu.
Moolumo yaala elemwe annihimyatho wi, ahihiwa muteko atthu ophiyelela 59 yaala akhumasa elapo sookhopela, atthu yaala owaatta akhumasa elapo ya Porutukaale ni Xiina.
Elapo ya Mosampiiki eniphwanyaneya nnikhuru wa ilapo sa atthu ´´anikhwa woohisuwaneya´´.
Erretta yeela yoowiva atthu ophiyelela 124 elapo ya Matakaxikare, opacerya nihuku 1 mweeri wa Akooxitu, ni atthu ophiyelela 1200 annaanyiheriwa okhalana eretta yeela.

Elapo ya mosampiiki eniphwanyaneya nnikhuru na ilapo thanu na xexe seyiya sithoonyiwe ni nikhuru na orikanisawu Muntiyaale ti sawuti nikhuru nenla linnivare namuna sa ekumi ni okasoopiha ereetta yeela eniwiva atthu elapo ya Matakaxikare.

Elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli enniphwanyaneya nnikhuru na ilapo seyiya soorava eretta yeela, elapo ya Matakakaxikare enimupaka nakoso ni ilapo sikinaaku ni elapo yoorava eratta yeela enaasimmwa ´´okhwa woohisuwaneya´´. opacerya mweeri wa Akooxitu.

Nikhuru na OMS, olepa oveleeliha nikhuru na Xoronaale Times, na elapo na Afirika tu Suuli, ewarakha yeela ennilavula wi eretta ela enniraviwa ni yeela epacerenre mwaha wa mapele a enema ni amwaapalame ovirikana.
Eretta ela eniraviwa mwaha olumiwa ni iphepele seyiye sikhalanne erttta yeela ni yiiraneya siiso, mutthu onirava eretta yeela.
Nikhuru na ekumi nohaalamula atthu otheene aniphavela orowa elapo ya Makaxikare wi ikasoopiheke mapuro osariwa ni awarase maaxikaa.
Nikhuru na OMS liniphwanyaneya elapo ya Etiyoopiya, Kheeniya, Mawuriisiya, Mosampiiki, Ilya Rewuniyawu, Sexeeli, Tanzaniiya siniphwanyaneya mphantte sa ilapo siniphavela wiikusanyerya mwaha a eretta.
Mawereelo a ereeta:
Efeepiri yoohimala, ananariwa murima, owereyiwa muru, okhupaareya, orapheya ni ohikhala saana murutthuni.
Ithuku soonyoonya ni wiipiwa.
Mawereelo a eretta ya penemoniiya anipacerya mwaha woorava ni okathi yoola muuthu orava iye eretta ya penomoniiya khaniwerya omumula ni onnikothomola akhumihaka ephome mmwaano.
Enoonaneya nikhuru na Moody´s nenla nimphwanyaneya ela´po ya Mosampiiki nikhuruwaka ni miniixituru opacerya onirowa elapo ya Waxintto.
Carlos Agostinho do Rosário othukumana wuumalani olelo ni nikhuru na FMI.

Nikhuru nenla niwehaweha nkhalelo wa musurukhu na Moody´s nootthikela ottuli, wuupacerani wa esumana, mahuku eettaka 18, muphatte muumu ya elapo ya Mosampiiki, nenla naaphwanyaneya nnikhuru na B3 nikhuruwelaka nukhuru na Caa1 elapo yeela yootthikela vathi, nkhalelo yoola onikhumelela mwaha wa eteeni yeele epakiwe ni empereesa ya elapo ya Mosampiiki ya Atum ( Ematum).
Ehapari ela ekhumelenle nihuku miniixituru, Carlos Agostinho do Rosario arowaawe epooma ya Waxintto wi alakiherye nikhuru na FMI meettelo a eteeni yeele epakiwe elapo ya Mosampiiki

Exariya yootthareya ya makhuruwelo a ´rating´ maari mwaha wa mavirikanelo a eteeni yeela ya Ematum, yeela epakiwe ni Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, nikhuru na Mood´s linaanyiherya ovirikanihiwa wa ´etteni ophiyelelaka okhumelela nnikacamiho´ ni mwaha nkhalelo yoola woohisuwaneya meettelo ya eteeni yeela yoomuriipiha murima Kuveerunu, nilavulaka nikhuru nenla.

Nikhuru na Moody´s nohuulumatho wi ´´ Kuveerunu khaniphavela woonaxaxa nkhalelo yoola wa eteeni, ni mwaha yoola onniruuhela nlkhalelo woreera muhina wa eteeni yeela, etthu onuupuwela iye oliva ni musurukhu oniphwanyiwa mulaponi muumu, Kuveerunu onnaanyihjerya wi onooliva vakhaani-vakhaani musurukhu yoola´´.

Otthikela ottuli wenno wa nkhalelo musurukhu onoonaneya noovira mahuku mararu okathi nikhuru na FMI nookhotta othotola elapo ya Mosampiiki ni ohiya oxirikha ni Kuveerunu wa elapo yeele, nikhuru nenla nimphavela wi Kuveerunu wa epooma ya OMaputu vamosa ni nikhuru na Cretid Suisse ni epanko Ruusu alakiherya meettelo a eteeni ya musurukhu woophiyelela imiya miloko miiili sa itoolari, yeela atthu ahinisuwelaaya.
Miniixituru opacerya oniphwanyaneya epooma ya OWaxintto.
Etthuniwaka wi emalihiwe manyakunyaku ni nikhuru na FMI, miniixituru opacerya wa elapo ya Mosampiiki othukumana ni nikhuru na FMI olelo, mahuku eettaka 19 epooma ya Waxintto.

Carlos Agostinho do Rosário onnirowa olakiherya meettelo a eteeni yeela epakiwe elapo ya Mosampiiki, apaceraka olakiherya nkhalelo orumeeliwe wi epakiwe eteeni ni Kuveerunu, ehiiwaka ottili empereesa Ematum ni Pro - Indicus.
Empereesa yeela yoomaliherya timutthukunle mayitho nikhuru na FMI.
Othotola wa miniixituru epooma ya Waxintto onirowa wiiranen´ye mahuku maxexe ni annirowa wiira mpatta makhulupale a Minixiteeriyu a Finansa a elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki okuruxa ihisapu ya ephaawu.
Anathumiha iphaawu annilavula wi owelihiwa wa isapu sa iphaawu seyiya ennirowa oruuhela nkacamiho muulupale.

Nikhuru nivara miteko sa nakoso, nenla nnaasimwa Minixiteeriyu ya Ituuxitiya Komeerisiyu okuruxa, nihuku neettaka 1, ehisapu ya ephaawu moolumo ala alavuliwe nsana ni nikhuru nenla na namathukumana anakoso yaala anaanyiherya wi owela wa isapu ya ephaawu enoonaneya mwaha woolipa namuna yoopaka iphaawu seyiya.

Mukhulupale, Rodolfo, yoola onivara miteko sa woonaxaxa namuna sa nakoso sa Minixiteeriyu ya Ituuxitiriya ni Komeerisiyu, ovaanelana nikhuru na VOA wi muupuwelelo yoola wookuruxa ehisapu ya ephaawu olavuliwe okathi waathukumaniwe na atthu ovirikana olelo ´´ atthu otheene ahikupali mwaha yoola´´.

Mwaha yoola onnirowa otthikeliwa ovaaneliwa ni nikhuru, nenla ninrowa wiira mpantta wa alupa anakoso yaale anoonaxaxa nkhalelo woowunniwihiwa nakoso yoola ni ale anivara miteko sa mowaaxi ni, wamala, ennirowa oveleeliwa onikhuru na Maminiixituru wi onaxaxe ni atthitte, itthu seyiya oniphavela Rodolfo´´ wi siiraneya woohipisa´´.

Xoronaliixita akhalayi avara miteko sawe exorononaale ya Mosampiiki. yoola onaakhula nsina na Cassimo Ginaby okathi ovaanenlawe ni nikhuru na VOA, ahilavula wi atthu yaala anihoolela miteko sa nakoso akhalana exariya, masi anamathumiha anikhala elapo ya OMaputu annikacamiheya mwaha wi yawela eshiapu ya ipahaawu, ́ ́anoorowa okhumelela makacamiho muulupale´´´.

Nvaanelo wa nkhalelo yoola woowelihiwa ehisapu ya ephawu onoonaneya okathi yooal atthu anisunlihaaya mwaha woothowa musurukhu, ni murukhu yoola onaasimwa metikaale khukhalenne nttittimiho woovikana etoolari ya elapo ya Ameerika.
Mosampiiki: Empaxatoore wa elapo ya Ankoola omaliha nikhuru na nthukumano.

Empaxatoore wa Ankoola yoola onivara muteko elapo ya Mosampiiki, Garcia Bires, ororomeliha, wuupacerani wa esumana yeela, wi onoorowa mahuku anirwa ovukula ovelavela wala ohaala wa atthu a elapo ya Mosampiiki, mwaha wi onirowa waavaha woohikacamihevo iwarakha wi aphiyelele orowa elapo ya Ankoola.
Bires alavula okathi amuleyihaawe peresitente wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, Armando Guebuza, nleeho yoola nave nave okiserya ovara miteko sawe sa Empaxatoore wa elapo ya Ankoola.

Mukhulupale yoola ahaaleliherya atthu nkacamiho yoola onikhumelela okathi sinipakiwaaya iwarakha wi atthu aphiyelele orowa elapo ya Ankoola, nkhalelo yoola opacenre khalayi mwaha wa ekhotto yeela yahaatthuniha atthu okhuma elapo aya anarowa ilapo sikinaaku, masi nkhulupale yoola aharoromeliha atthu wi nkacamiho yoola onoorowa omala.

Omala wa iyaakha xexe areene Empaxatoore wa Ankoola avaraka muteko elapo ya Mosampiiki, Garcia Bires oriipiwa murima mwaha woohiwerya opaka opatthani nnikhuru na miina na patarooya, muxikola ni mapuro yaala anisomwa wala aniphavela osuweliwa itthu, olavulaka mukhulupale yoole, makhuru yaala otheene orowa opaka opatthani wa nakoso ni Empaxaata ya Ankoola.
Maativokaatu annitthapela mwaha woopaceriwa otholathola eteeni yeela yiiranen´ye´ ela ya Mosampiiki.
Etthu yooreera, alavulaka nikhuru na Maativokaatu a elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Noovira mahuku maruru etholatholiwaka meettelo a teeni yeela epakiwa elapo ya Mosampiiki, makhuru ovirikana anivara miteko sa mmuttettheni aniiwelela meettelo sa miteko seyiya.
Nikhuru na alupa anakoso, mateputaato ni atthu akinaaku ahithukumana wi iwelele namuna enitholatholiwaaya eteeni yeela.
Nikhuru na maativokaatu a elapo ya Mosampiiki annaakanyerela okhala ephiro yooreera yeela enitthariwa ni Purokuratoriiya Xeraale ya elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Ohikhale otholathola mwamukhaani, maativokaatu a elapo ya Mosampiiki aniphavela wi otholathola wa eteeni yeela emale ni osuweliwa wa atthu apanke ni alivase, mwaha wi eteeni yeela yooruhela ohaawa elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Ewarakha elempwe ni Purokuratoriiya Xeraale ya elapo ya Mosampiiki, nookhula nikhuru nnaasimwa forense nintholathola meettelo a teeni yeela, muteko yoola onirowa ovariwa ni empereesa Krol, yeela eniphanyaneya epooma ya Lontere.
Etthu yoothene enirowa ophwanyiwa ennirowa wooniheriwa mahuku eettaka 90.
Wuumalana wa mweeri ola, eparalamentu ya elapo ya Mosampiiki ennirowa ohimya nkhalelo wa eteeni yeela yoohisuwaneya epakiwe elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Frelimo, eparitiitu emosa ekhalanne atthu anirowa oxinttaana oteputaatu ilapo sa Afirika.
Ntthuniho ni wiiwanana wa atthu anikhuma ilapo sookhopela mwaha sowonaxaxeya sinirowa olavuliwa mahuku anirwa.
SIMIÃO PONGOANE —

Iparitiitu sa moono weethiyana elapo ya Mosampiiki khasaathonyihenre atthu anirowa wiira mpantta wa mateputaatu oparalamentuni sa Afirika, iparitiitu seyiya sihiikumiherya wi sinirowa wiira mpantta mmwathanle yoola onirwa.
Othowa wå atthu anirowa wiira mpantta mparamentuni, elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli, ennaanyiheriwa wi eparitiitu Frelimo enoolola nttetthe wå Afirika.

Mukhulupale wa nikhuru na miteko sa eparitiitu Frelimo yoola othanliwe wi avare muteko Afirika tu Suuli, Esperança Machevale, onnaanyiherya wi ohikhala wenno wa iparitittu sa moono weethiyana wi exittanane nkhalelo yoola wa paralamentu, eparitiitu awe yaanirowa wiira ekampaanya etthunaka wi anamathanla ophiyelela 49 imiyasene yaala alempwale arowe amuthanle Frelimo ni Filipe Jacinto Nyuusi.

Mamosampikaano anikhala elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli akhalana akhalana itthu sowaatta aniphavelasaaya wi sikhaliheriwe mwathanle yoola amala: etthu yoopacerya, olepwa otthunihiwa wala ovahiwa ettikitti mamosampikaano yaala ahikhalanne, ntoko alavula iye Ananias Banze, nkhulupale wa mamosampikaano a epooma ya Peretooriya.

Mulupa anakoso onaakhula nsina na José Mussanyane onitthuna wi mamosampikaano otheene ahikhalanne ttiktti athukumane mwaha wi yaala towaattasa, aphiyelelaka akinaaku ovirikaniha masina aya aniitthaneliwa masina a elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli mwaha wi anitthunasa ophwanya muteko.

Mukhulupale wa nikhuru na miteko sa eparitiitu frelimo yoola othanliwe wi avare miteko sa eparitiitu ilapo sa Afirika, mulopwana yoola mutthu woosuwelaxa mwaha wi ovara muteko wa Empaxatoore, ohiiwa sotheene, masi oreera wa itthu seyiya sotheene mpakha osuwela weettiha exariya mmuttettheni, noomal itthu sotheehe sinikhumelela ilapo seyiya piili sinooloka.
Anamakasoopiha etakhwa annivekela nikhuru na atoropa wi awehawehe saana atthu ale anisaya inama pure-pure mutakhwani.
Itthepo inama sikinaaku siniphwanyane siiviwaka woohikhalelanavo elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Namakasoopiha etakhwa wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, Carlos Serra ovaanelanela nikhuru na xoronaale VOA, mulopwana yoola onniikumeherya saana mwaha wa namuna yeela yookasopiha etakhwa ni enama elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Serra ohuuluma wi etthu yooreera opaka wi naatthunaka wi nimalihe nkhalelo yoola woowiviva itthepo ni inama sikinaaku nohoona owoomola anamasaya yaala naavara nnaatthukela, mwaha wi atthu yaala anniiva inama seyiye soothuwa elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Mulupwana yoola onnikupali wi makhuru otheene ontoko ale aniwehaweha nkhalelo yoola wowiiva inama, mapuluusa na atoropa, mpakha iwanane ni avarase muteko wi amalihe nkhalelo yoola.

Carlos Serra, mulopwana osuwelaxa, mwaha wi opacerenre okhalana iyaakha 16 avaraka muteko awe yoola, muhina wa iyaakha seyiya, 13 avaraka muteko wa epurusoore, waakhaliherya atthu, ophavela osuwela namuna soosoma, itthu sootheene iya soonaneya muhina wookasoopiha etakhwa ni inama.
Kaaza: elapo emosa enoonaneya othowa eyoolya, atthu ophiyelela 250 emiyasene annikacamiheya mwaha nkhalelo yoola.
Elapo ya kaaza, ephantte ya osuuli wa Mosampiiki, atthu ophiyelela 250 emiyasene anniphwanyaneya akacamiheyaka mwaha woothowa eyoolya, nkhalelo yoola onoonaneya mwaha woohirupa epula.
Nkhulupale wa elapo ya Kaaza, Estela Pinto Novo Zeca, ohuuluma miteko sinoovariwa wi ovukuwe nkhalelo yoola woothowa etala onoonaneya itixititriitu sotheene sa ephantte nooriti ya eporovinsiya.
Mukhulupale yoole ohuulumatho wi ´´ ohirupa epula tukhanle nkacamiho muulupale woothowa eyoolya epooma yeele ya OKaaza.

Nkhalelo woovarelela atthu yaale yoowathowa eyoolya elapo ya Kaaza, waavarelela wenno aniira mpantta wa axirikha a elapo sookopela, mwaakha ola, axirikha yaala ahirukunuxa makhalihiro aya arowanaka ephantte nooriti ya elapo ya OMosampiiki, wenno aphwanyaneya atthu yaaphwanye ehasara ya sikolooni IIdai ni Kenneth.

Etixitiriitu emosa-emosa yaaphwanye ehasara yeela yoothowa eyoolya yaari Xikuupu, wenno, etthareliwaka muulumo mukhulupale a elapo yeele, Artur Macamo, atthu aniphwanyaneya akacamiheya mwaha wi atthu ahimaliha itthu soolya saya sootheene saari vathatani, ni yaala arumeelasa mimiso, nkhalelo ola woonaneya mwaha woohirupa epula.
Makuveerunu khaniphavela owehawehiwa, muulumo ola alavuliwe ni mateputaato a nikhuru panafirikaano.
Nikhuru na paralamentu na Panaaririkaano khaniiikumiheryaxa ntoko nenle nimphuka milattu.
Makuveerunu khaniphavela owehawehiwa ni atakanyiheriwaka ni nikhuru na paralamentu Panafirikaano.
Ola mwanyihero wa mateputaatu makinaaku yaala okacamiheya mwaha opisa wa ewarakha yeela enitthuna orukunuxa wa nkhalelo wa exariya.
Mateputaatu a nikhuru na Panafirikaano athukumana epooma ya Xowanixipuuruku mpakha wuumalani wa esumana ela enirwa.
Wantthuneya matthokihereyo miloko miili ni mathannamaru wi nlaka na mukuttaano nanamathanliwa wa Afirika nikhale opuro wotthokiheriwa sa malamulo wa muttetthe.
“Ninnihaleliwa, wa Ankoola (…) afalume khamphavela wi yooniwe ele envaraaya ni ikwaha sinceene sinnonaneya ikhalelo iya sowaterihiwa“, olavulaka Mulato.
Ninopwahererya okhala mutthenkeso opaceriwaka okohereriwa, ohimya Mulémbwè wohivitha ohisiveliwa wawe ni mukhalelo wa miteko sa mukhuttaano amatopotaatu a mmuttettheni wa Afirika.
Mukhulupale wa nikhuru na ONU yoola oneettettela nnkhalelo Yowaalikaniherya exariya atthu elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Mukhulupale wa nikhuru na ONU yoola oneettettela nnkhalelo Yowaalikaniherya exariya atthu elapo ya Mosapiiki, Zeid Hussein, omuvekela, olelo, mahuku eettaka 13, Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki wi arumeele ikuru sawe noomala aphavele atthu yaala ahiniiwananeya ni ale anahaaxa atthu atthukele.

Al Hussein, yoola alavula okathi waapaceriwaaya muthukumano wa Konseelyu ti Tireyitu Umaanu wa ONU, epooma ya Xeneepera, elapo ya Suwiisa, ahimyaka wi ´´ elapo ya Mosampiiki onnooniherya nkhalelo wootthikela ohaaxiwa atthu, esuweliwaka wi nttetthe wa Afirika onnooneya okhala yoole anipakiwa manyala yaala.
´´ Otthikeliwa ekhotto nikhuru na Renamo ni atoropa a Kuveerunu yooruhela okhuma wa athama wa atthu mapuro yaala yiiraneya nkacamiho yoola´´ alavulaka Al Hussein.
Mukhulupale yoola olavulatho wi ahooniheriwa elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki nkhalelo wovariwa atthu otthuniwaka musurukhu, wiiviwa wa atthu, ni ohasuliwa atthu ni maxoronaliixita.

Ehiiwaka ottuli nkhale woophaveliwa atakhali yaala aniwiiva atthu, Al Hussein omuvekela Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki wi ´´ amalihe nkhalelo woovekela musurukhu woohiphwanelavo, mawaha yoola onnikacamiha wunnuwa wa elapo´´.
Atthu owaatta onaariipa mirima mwaha woosareya maasi mwaha wa epula yeela yonanen´ye epooma ya Wamphula.
Imatta suulupale soophiyelela Ekitaari 340 soolimmwa itthu soovirikana, soosareya maasi mwaha wa epula yeela erumpe.
Atthu ophiyelela imiya miloko thanu otixitirriitu ya OMalema, povinsiya ya Wamphula, ehaaphwanya epula yuulupale ni ettheku yeela evinre esumana iye thaaru elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Imatta suulupale soophiyelela Ekitaari 340 soolimmwa itthu soovirikana, soosareya maasi mwaha wa epula yeela erumpe.
Miro wa Likonya ni Nriipi saanivira maasi owaatta ni maasi yaala ahiphiya mmuttettheni wa Mukoroce ni Miluuku, mittetthe seyiya sotheene siniphwanyaneya aluteeya wa Makooni, etixitiriitu ya Mooma.

Olavula wa khulupale wa epooma ya Wamphula, Victor Borges, yoola athotonle mittetthe sa etixitiriitu yeele, ohimya wi ixitaraata sinikhuma mittetthe seyiya sisanre maasi sirowaka epooma ya Wamphula sootheene khasinivireya mwaha wa epula yeela ehononne ixitaraata sinaakuxa atthu a muttetthe wa Makooni saaroyihaka Mukorooxe.

Epula yeela ehireere orupa epooma ya Wamphula yohonona itthu sowaata, ntoko ohiphwanyaneya atthu okuma mutixitiriituni wi arowa mapuro makinaaku, ni okacamiheya nkhalelo woolavula na atthu anikhala oporovinsiya ni ale amutixitiriituni.

Nkhalelo ola watthikelaru, otakanyiheyaka ni ohikhala enerexiiya, ennoovihiya atthu a mmuttettheni waaphwanya etala yuulupale, mwaha wi itthu soolya, ntoko nakhuwo enniphwanyaneya iwelaka ihisapu, mwaha woohiphwanyaneya mapuro yaala sinithumiwaaya ni mwaha woohikhala enerexiiya wi erumeeliwe mmowaaxini muumu onixiliwa nakhuwo yoola.
Maputu ni Matoola siniphwanyaneya simalen´yeene mwaha woowela wa isapu sa sa mikukutta.
Woopacerya nvaanelo wå nkhalelo woowela isapu sa mikukutta så epooma ya OMaputu, elapo ya Mosampiiki.
