Ihisapu isya sa mikukutta , seyiya sinisuwaneya na nsina na ´´xaapa´´ sinirowa opacerya weetta opacerya wa esumana ela enirwa, mahuku eettaka 5, epooma ya OMaputu ni Matoola, elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki ettareliwaka ehisapu iye sa khalayi, masi mikukutta seyiya sinirowa ovareleliha ni mapuluusa omunisipiiyu a epooma ya Maputu ni Matoola.
Mittette soovirikana ya epooma ya OMaputu anoonaneya, attaranaka esumana yeela , mapuluusa owaatta, masi yaala khaphwanye nkacamiho.
Khuwakhanle nkacamiho, masi mwaha yoola waahittikela olavulaka namuna yooreeriha nkhalelo woopakhiriwa atthu mmukukuttani elapo yootheene.
Ennivira iyaakha thanu ni piili, anammutthettheni a ipooma piili attiyasa irampha ni apahasa ipenewu muxitaraatani, mwaha woowela wa isapu sa mikukutta.
Nave, anamuupuwela owaatta annaanyiherya wi, atthu owaatta khanyakula mwaha woowela wa isapu sa mikukutta, masi anniriipiwa mirima mwaha woohiloka wa mikukutta seyiya.
´´ Hiyo ninnoona ikaaro suulupale sinaakuxa atthu seyiya sinukuxa inama, itthu seyiya khasinreera´´ alavulaka namuupuwela, Moisés Mabunda.
Nittharelaka muulumo anamuupuwela yoola onaakhula nsina na José, nkhalelo atthu akuxasowaaya, mukaaroni sinikuxa inama, ´´ etthu yoonanara ni khiniphwanelela wiirela atthu´´.
Aluvulaka nave mulupa anakoso, Roberto Tibana, nikhuru na mikukutta noohaano muteko muulupale woowunuwiha nkhalelo wa elapo, masi nikhuru nenla khaninvara muteko woowoneya, elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
Atoropa anivara miteko saya elapo ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya aniphwanyaneya athukumanneene, onnaakanyerya mukhulupale wa elapo yeele.
Mukhulupale wa mapuluusa avaha esumana wi anamwiive yaala ahiye itthu iya anipakaaya.

Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki onnikupali wi nikhuru nenla na atthu yaala aniwiiva atthu elapo ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya, porovinsiya ya Kaapu Telekaato linnitthikela opaka itthu soonanara, anavahiwaro muulumo wi ahiya itthu seyiya ni mukhulupale a mapuluusa.
Wuupaceryani wa esuma, mahuku eettaka 25, nkhulupale wa eporovinsiya ya Kaapu Telekaato, Júlio Parruque, ohoona wi nkhalelo tiwooreera, masi anawiive yaala amwareyasa ni akinaaku atthukasiwa.

Mukhulupale yoola ohuuluma wi ´´ makhuru yaala anawiive ahaaruhela mukacamiho atthu anikhala mittetthe sa Musimpwa ta Paraaya, masi anawiive owaatta atthukasiwa, masi akinaaku atthawasa ni nikhuru na atoropa anaaphavela anawiive yaala´´.
Ennihimwa wi mahuku yaala avinre, 14, mukhulupale wa mapuluusa, Bernardino Rafael, ohaalaka akhulupale anawiive yaala anivara miteko sootakhala, elapo ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya wi ivarihe.

Nave, anawuupulela annitayixa nkhumelelo wa nikhuru nenla ninwiva atthu ni ni makhalelo makinaaku anoonaneya mahuku ala mmuttettheni wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, mwaha wa itthu seyiya, atthu owaatta anniriipiwa murima ni annaakanyerya wi akhala atthu akhalanne owerya owaavikana akinaaku.

Atthu akinaaku annaanyiherya wi, nkhalelo yoola onoonaneya elapo ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya wiiviha wa atthu enttuniha wi mapuluusa, makhulupale ni atoropa owehaxexa saana elapo ya Mosimpwa ta Paraaya, ahiyasaka ottuli ilapo sikinaaku sikhalanne maali, ntoko elapo ya Namanyumpiiri, wnno aniphwanyaneya atthu okhalana musurukhu wowaatta, yaala annikuxa musurukhu yoola oroyihaka ilapo sookhopela.

Muupuwelelo mukinaaku onniroyihiwa ohoolo mwaha wa nkhalelo yoola, masi mukhulupale wa eparitiitu ya Paz, Democracia e Desenvolvimento -PDD, Raul Domingos, onnilavula wi itthu sinniiraneya mwaha wa anaamwiire yaala akhalana oxirikha muhina wa Kuveerunu.

Ekampaanya yeeyo, wamphula eporovinsiya emosa yaacererinhe mphiyereryo oowaatta elapo yootheene. Makhulupale anivara Instituutu ya Efomentu ya Ekhacu, Wamphula, anihimya wiira mukontho ola woohikhala muruweryo wa ekampaanya ele evinre, mwaha wa mikhumelelo sa ephattu okhuma mweeri wa Namulooko mpakha mweeri wa namuloko ni miili sintoko ipheyo sowiliipiha, oviiha woowaatta itixitiriitu sa Omukhovola, Omooma ni waamukotta, akhanle siisuwelaxiwa waaruwerya akoroso eporovinsiya yootheene. Makhulupale anivara Instituutu ya Efomentu ya Ekhacu Owamphula, Emílio Furude ahisuweliwa wi miraneyo iya soopaha ithutu ni mihokorokho sihikhomaalale, miri khisaatempe waaleya. Wa itonelaata ikooto 56 saaphaveliwa wala sathokihiwe sa akoroso ekampaanya ela, mphaka va eporovinsiya ya Wamphula ewenrye okumiha itonelaata 36,908, eri ti enkhalela ipurusento 66, - oolavula Mukhulupale anivara Instituutu ya Efomentu ya Ekhacu a Owamphula, Emílio Furude. Wuupuweleke wiira koroso oniruweriwa Wamphula onikawanyiwa mipantta miili: mpantta mmosa onthokoreeriwa muhina mwa elapo ahu okweheriwa ni ikaafirika ni mpantta mukina oniroohiwa ilapo sa ota.
Muchanga onnivekela wi makhuru otheene aphavele atoropa wi amuxakaxakihe itthu soonanara mukhulupale Afonso Dhlakama.

Mukhulupale yoola onilamula muulumo a eparitiitu Renamo, Antônio Muchanga, ovekela wuumalani wa esumana ela wi makhuru otheene aphavele nikhuru na atoropa wi amuxakaxakihe mukhulupale wa eparitiitu Renamo, Afonso Dhalakama. ni
Nikhuru nenla mpakha iire mpatta atoropa a eparitiitu Renamo ni akinaaku a Kuveerunu, alavulaka mutthu yoola akohiwa.

Okathi avanelanaaya maxoronaliixita, Atonio Muchanga ovekela wi namuna anivarasaaya miteko mapuluusa khurenre mwaha wi anitthunasa waakuxa akapwitthi a eparitiitu Renamo, nkhalelo yoola onniruuha nkacamiho wa eparitiitu yeela ni Kuveerunu.

´´ Hiyo khanaakupali mapuluusa a elapo ya Mosampiiki ni khakhanle muuthu anitumereriwa wi akhaliheriwe ni atthu oohilipaneya´´, muulumo ala alavuliwa ni mukhulupale yoola oniroyiha ohoolo muulumo a eparitiitu Renamo, alavulaka mwaha wa nkhalelo woomuxakaxakiha itthu soonanara mukhulupale Afonso Dhlakama.
Antônio Muchanga onnikupali wi eparitiitu ayiye ennitthuna ophwanya nkhalelo woovanelana ni Kuveerunu.
Xoronaliixita wa elapo ya Itaaliya onnaanyiherya wi akhala manyakunyaku ni MFA ni eparitiitu FRELIMO .
Gincarlo Coccia oreerihatho eliivuru ayiye ´´ A Cauda do Escorpião ´´ ahelaka nkhalelo mikinaaku.
Nkhalelo yoola onaasimwa"A Cauda do Escorpião"
Gincarlo Coccia, xoronaliixita wa elapo ya Itaaliya, yoola okhala elapo ya Mosampiiki ni ohoona okathi akhinwe okhulupale kolooniya enyiwaka Frelimo, mweeri wa Apiriili ni Setempuru mwaaka wa 1974.

Okathi akhaliheyrawe eliivuru ayiye ´´ A Cauda do Escorpião ´´ Coccia ahuupuwelela okathi yoole wookacamiha ni woonanara ni onnilavula muliivuni muumu mwaha wa itthu soonanara seyiya saapakiwa ni atoropa a kolonu yaala akhuma elapo ya Porutukaale, okathi ahaatthunaaya omuhiyerya omwene Frelimo.
Giancarlo Coccia ovara muteko wa exoronaliixita epooma ya Milaawu ni Poona.
Eyaakha ya 1968, ovara muteko wa exoronaliixita okathi wa ekhotto yaawaniwa ni Viyetinaami ni atoropa a elapo ya Exitaatu Uniitu.
Omanlaaye ovara muteko elapo ya Lonter, ahirowihiwa epooma ya Puruxeela ni avahiwa muteko nikhuru na NATO ni anivaratho muteko munikhuru na Emaali na elapo na nttetthe wa Ewuroopa.
Opacere wiira mpatta nikhuru na ekotto yeela ya kolooniya yaari eyaakha ya 1970, okathi yoola ahoona ni mayitho ayiye ekhotto elapo ya Akoola.
Opacerya vaavo, muupuwelelo awe wa nkhalelo wa Afirika waahimukuxa omuroyihaka elapo ya Mosampiiki eyaakha ya 1973.
Okathi wotheene ovanraawe muteko yoola wa exoronaliixita opacerya mhuku 25 mweeri wa Apiriili mpakha okathi FRELIMO okunxaawe elapo ya Mosampiiki, Giancarlo Coccia akhala elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Okathi yoola avanelaniwaawe, Giacarlo Coccia olavula wi okhalano eliivuru ekinaaku enaasimwa ´´O Escorpião ´´- ni onniroromeliha oruuha itthu isya muliivuruni muumu, arumeelaka iwarakha soovirikana sa okathi wa kolooniya.
Akhulupale a nikhuru na exariya ´´anniroromeliha´´ wi milatthu sa eteeni yeele yoohisuwaneya sinoorowa ophukiwa.
Akhulupale a nikhuru na exariya na elapo ya Mosampiiki anniroromelih wi eyaakha yeela ´´milatthu sa eteeni yeele yoohisuwaneya sinoorowa ophukiwa, ehapari ela ela elempwe muxoronaale Notiisiya.
Arumeeliwaka muulumo akhulupale yaala, exoronaale yoolepa wi milatthu seyiya ´´ ephiro yowooneya wi asuweliwe exariya ya eteeni yeela, siphukiwe milatthu sa atthu yaala ni attikixiwe musurukhu yoola.

Ahiira mpatta wa eteeni yeela atthu ophiyelela 20, atthu yaala anaanyiheriwatho opaka itthu ntoko owoka, orumeela musurukhu wa Kuveerunu, ovekela musurukhu woohikhalenavo, orumeela ekhulupale wi apake eteeni ni ohisuwela ovara muteko wa Kuveerunu.

Nnikhuruni muumu aniphwanyaneyamo atthu 19 ootthukasiwa anilipelela yaala ophukiwa milatthu saya, ntoko Ndambi Guebuza, mwaana wa mukhulupale Armando Guebuza; Gregório Leão ni Antonio do Rosário, yaala avara miteko Kuveerunu; ni Teófilo Nhanhumele.

Eteeni yeela enihimwa epakiwe ni empereesa ProIndicus, EMATU ni MAN erumeeliwaka nsina na Kuveerunu, atthu apanke eteeni yeela aphavelasa orumeela musurukhu yoola wi amiserye ihopa atum ni akasoopiha iphareya.

Nkhalelo yoola woomiserya ihopa muphareya yaa Mosampiiki waaroyihiwa ohoolo ni empereesa Privinvest, Abu Dhabi, namatumiha wa empereesa seyiya nneene aya ahoolela ari Jean Boustani, yoola atthukeliwe ni atthukiliwa epooma ya Noova Yooriki.

Iwarakha seyiya sirumeeliwe okathi waakhophiwaaya musurukhu saatthittiwe ni Manuel Chang, okathi ole mulopwana yoola aari Miniixituru wa Finansa, mahuku ala oniphwanyaneya otthukinnweene elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli, yoola otthukelihiwe ni Exitaatu Uniitu.
Elapo ya Mosampiiki, Helder Muteia onnihoolela nikhuru na FAO elapo ya Afirika Senteraale.
Elapo ya San Tome Pirinsipi eniphwanyaneya nkhutti wa ilapo siri muhina wa Muteia.
Mosampikaano, Helder dos Santos Félix Monteiro Muteia koretenatoore insya wa nikhuru na Orikanizasawu ya Nasawu Uniita ya nkhalelo wa Olya ni Olima (FAQ) nttetthe wa Afirika Senteraale.

Mahuku ala, Muteia nkhulupale wa ekapineeti ya FAO elapo ya Porutukaale ni nikhuru na ilapo seyiya sinilavula nttaava na ekunya, masi onnirowa ovahiwa muteko mukinaaku nihuku neettaka 1 mweeri wa Tezempuru.

Ekapineeti ala eniphanyaneya epooma ya Lipereviili, elapo ya Kapawu wenno ennivariwa miteko sa nikhuru na FAO elapo ya San Tome ni Pirinsipi, Xaati, Konko, Kapawu, Kine Ekwatoriyaale, Repuupilika Senturu-Afirikaana ni Repuupilika Temokaraatiku tu Konko.
Muteia, onivara muteko wa emeetiku, ni yoola aari minixituru wa Akirikulutuura elapo ya Mosampiiki, ni yoola ari muhooleli wa nikhuru na FAO elapo ya Nixeeriya ni OParasiili.
Muteia oyariwe epooma ya Kelimaani, elapo ya Zampeesiya ni yoola onnivara muteko ya namalepa.
Olepa iliivuru sinaasimwa ´´Sonhos ao Avesso´´, ´´Verdade dos Mitos´´ ni Nhamboro´´.
Nttetthe wa Uniyaawu Ewuropeeya noovaha musurukhu woophiyelela 734 imiyasene sa ewuuro elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Nkhalihero yoola onipakiwa mwaha wootthuniwa wooniwa nikhuru na exariya lilimpeene.

Ekomisawu ya Uniyawu Ewuropeeya aKoperasawu ni Tesenvoluvimentu Interenasionaale, Neven Mimica, omaliha esumana ya namararu nvaanelo ni Viisi-minixituru wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, Nyeleti Mondlane, wi onoorowa ovahiwa musurukhu woophiyelela 734 imiyasene sa ewuro elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Musurukhu yoola onirowa ovahiwa Epurukaraama Intikatiivu Nasiyoonaale ya Mosampiiki onirowa orumeeliwa mwaha oreeriha nkhalelo wa sixiteema Temokaratiku, ni oreeriha nkhalelo ya exariya, ni ovarelela nkhalelo wa makhuru a Kuveerunu a elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Attareliwaka muulumo a Neven Mimica, ´´ ennoonaye wunnuwa wa elapo ya Mosampiiki okathi emaalaaya ekotto eyaakha ya 1992, ni ettu yooreera wuupuwelela nkhalelo yoola wowuunuwa elapo ya Mosampiiki ni attarelaka siiso atthu akhalana orumeela saana imaali siniphwanyaneya elapo yeela nnikhuruni wa Kaaxi, mineeriyu, itiriku ni olima.
Mímica olavulatho wi etthu yooreera wiira ´´ wunnuwiha nkhalelo wa elapo wi ekhalana maali owaatta, ekhalekhe yoowiwananeya saana.

Nkhalihero wa nikhuru na Uniyawu Ewuropeeya onniphavela nave otthara namunna yoohawa wa tthu mmuttettheni nkhalihero yoola onirowa oruuhela sooxuka itthu soolya ni wiirattela ni oxinttaana wa anamalime.

Ikhalelo iya sootheene sihmwe wuumalelani, iniphaveliwa yaattihihe maluuxu mmuttettheni ni ereheriwe ixitaraata, itthu seyiya sootheene enipakiwa wi yunnuwihiwe nkhalelo wa empereesa iye sikhaani ni suulupale siniphwanyaneya mmuttettheni.
Alupa anakoso a elapo ya Mosampiiki annivekela wi atthu ovahiwa mathala.
Miniixituru Celso Correia onnikupali wi mpakha atthu athukumane wi avaanele, masi yoola onnihihimyatho wi nkhalelo yoola khunikacamiho nikhuru nenla oniholela iye.
Alupa anakoso a elapo ya Mosampiiki annivekela wi atthu ovahiwa mathala arumeeleke atthunasaka olima.
Nkhalelo yoola woothowa mathala olima onnaakacamiha alimi, ni alupa anakoso onaariipa murima mwaha nkhalelo yoola.
Yookhala exariya enikottiha otumihiwa mathala, ni makhuru owaata anniphavela wi exariya yeela ewehawehiwe ettuniwaka waakuviheya nkhalelo woophwanya mathala yaala.
Muthiyana mmosa onaakhula nsina na La Rose, yoola namasuwela nkhalelo wa mathala, olavula wi, mathala mpakha avahike mutthu orina oniwerya n onisuwela orumeela.

Nave ativokaato, José Caldeira onnaanyiherya wi, yaahikhale exariya yoosuwaneya enirumeeliwa muhina wa meettettelo wa mathala onniphwanyaneya okhumelelaka mukacamiho muulupale, ni nkhalelo yoola onnivukula wunnuwa wa elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Otthareliwaka nkhalelo yoola wookottihiwa mathala, ennoonaneya mupooma ni mmutthettheni, nttharelo mmosa, exariya enihimwa wi mutthu yoole onirowa othuma mathala yoola tukhanle nneene mathala yaala.
Miniixituru Celso Correia onnikupali wi mpakha atthu athukumane wi avaanele, masi yoola onnihihimyatho wi nkhalelo yoola khunikacamiha nikhuru nenla oniholela iye.
Mapuluusa a epooma ya Sofaala annaalamu atthu otheene wi woomala nkhalelo wa atoropa waaveleela atthu muxitaraata Muxumkwe - Saave.

Nikhuru na mapuluusa a elapo ya Mosampiiki ahaalamuna atthu otheene wi woomala nkhalelo wa atoropa waavelela atthu muxitaraani yaala anikhuma OMuxumkwe arowasaka Oriiyu Saave, avirasaka exitaraata Masiyonaale lummeru 1, onnivira mwaakha mmosa ni myiyeeri thanu na mosa, yaakhumelela ekhotto muxitaraatani muumu.

Opacerya weetta wa atthu n mkukutta muxitaraatani muumu mwaha woomaalihiwa ekhotto, yeela evaaneliwe ni otthittiwa etuminku, ovaanela wenno onoonaneya okhalatho nthukumano wa Kuveerunu ni eparititu Renamo, ophiyelelaka omalihiwa manyakunyaku wa makhuru yaala mayili.

Mukhulupale wa mapuluusa a elapo ya Sofaala yoola yoola onilamula muulumo a nikhuru nenle, Daniel Macuacua ohaaroromeliha atthu wi atoropa aniphwanyaneya areene ntthetthe wa Muxumkw - Saave khanikhumasa mapuru yaala araaya, mwaha wi Kuveerunu onitthuna waaxakaxakiha atthu mwaha wa nkhalelo yoola wakhumelela.
Mamosapikaano ophiyelela 20 purusentu khanirowa wiira mpantta wa mwathanle, mwaha woohiresensiyari.

Saala ta Paaxi, nikhuru nimosa ninwehaweha nkhalelo yoola wa mwathanle, nkhuru nenla aniira mpantta makhuru makinaaku ntoko Atthu a mmutteni a elapo ya Mosampiiki, nenla noolavula wi waahvariwe muteko woowakuveveya, annirowa woonaneya atthu vakhaani ophiyelela 80 purusentu oresensiyari mpakha wuumalani wa resensiyamentu yeela, enimala mahuku eettaka 30 mweeri yoola wa Maayu.
Nikhuru nenla na Saala ta Paaxi noosoma wuumalani wa esuma, mahuku ettaka 10, ewarakha yoolepwa atthu otheene aresensiyanri, ewarakha yeela ennihimwa wi eresensiyamentu yeela tiyookacamihela.
´´ Saala ta Paaxi yeela yoolepa mapuru ophiyelela 325 yaala anipakiwa eresensiyamentu, mapuro yaala khavanre mutekosaya mahuku ophiyelela 15, mwaha wohikhala enerexiiya.
´´Mapuro yaala aniphwanyaneya elapo ya Sofaala, Maniika, Zampeesiya ni Kaapu Telekaato´´ alavulaka Juma Aiuba, namalamula muulumo wa nikhuru na Saala ta Paaxi.

Aiuba olavulatho wi waahiwehaxaxiwe nkacamiho yoola, atthu ophiyelela 59 imiyasene khanirowa wiira mpantta wa mwanthale wa nkhulupale wa elapo yotheene, ni akhulupale a iporovnsiya yoola onrowa wonaneya mahuku eettka 15 mweer wa Owutupuru onirwa.

Ennihimwa wi eresensiyamentu epacenre mahuku eettaka 15 mweeri wa Apiriili yoola omanle, ni enirowa omala mahuku eettaka 30, ennaakanyereriwa wi atthu asya ophiyelela imiya thanu ni piili alempwe mweeri yoola ohinamale.
Elapo ya Mosampiiki khiniphavela wuuluma mwaha wowoopoliwa wa paketi Vega 5.
Miniixituru wa Peexika olavula wi mpakha osuwela namuna yoowopola atthu aphwanyaneya mupaketini muumu.

Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki olavula wi khavanelanne atthu yaala amwiiyale paketi yoola ``Vega 5´´, paketi yoola oniphwanyaneya mmtani wa anawiiye yaala a elapo ya Somaaliya, olelo annivira mahuku ophiyelela 42.

Exoronaale Vooxi ti Ameerika noovaanela ni miniixituru wa Peexika, Victor Borges, wuumalani wa esumana yeela, mukhulupale ola khavanelanne anawiiye yaala amukunxe paketi yoola, avirikanihaka iye silavuliwe ni nikhuru na xoronaale ya elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Miniixituru ola onittharihela meettelo wa khalelo yoola wowiiyiwa paketi yoola olavula wi, Kuveerunu ni akhulupale akinaaku a elapo ya Xipaanya yaala anivara muteko empaxaata ya epooma ya OMaputu, olavula wi athukumana ni anniphavela nkhalelo woreera wi paketi yoola atthikihiwe ´´ opacerya nenna mpakha ephaveliwe ephiro yootthara´´.

Mukhulupale Victor Borge olavula ahimyaka wi, Kuveerunu onniphavela wi amuruuhe paketi yoola ori mmatani wa anawiiye, ni atthu yaala ophiyelela 19 avarasa miteko saya mwa ´´Veha 5´´ ari mupaketi oopowe ni nkhulupale yoolatho onnilipeherya wi anawiiye ala atthuna ovaanela ni Kuveerunu, anoorowa waakheleliwa woohikacamihiya.

Noomala olavula wi, atthu yaala anirowa ovaanela anawiiye yaala khapaka mpatta wa Kuveerunu, miniixituru ohimyatho wi muteko ohaano ovariwa wookasopeyavo etthuniwaka wi ehaphwanye yoonanara atthu yaala aniphwanyaneya mupaketini muumu.

Nneene Paketi ´´Vega 5´´ ti empereesa Efripe, paketi yoola avareliwa muteko ni ekompaniiya Pescamar ya elapo ya Mosampiiki - paketi yoola iiyinwe mahuku eettaka 28 mweeri wa Tezempuru mwaakha wa 2010 mmasini waattamela elapo ya Matakaxikare, mupaketeni muumu aniphwanyaneya atthu ophiyelela 24, yaala aniira mpatta mamosampikaano 19 ni maxipanyoola ayili.
Muttitte vathi, wäla wuuttharelaniwaya wå eteexitu ela, wi mwiiwe okathi miniixituru wa Peexika avanelanaaya maxoronaliixita.
Makhuru na matteeke a elapo ya Mosampiiki onirowa opacera weetta arowaka nttetthe wa Uniyaawu Ewuropeeya.
Opacerya weetta wa matteeke wenno onoonaneya mwaha wa muteko ovariwe ni Ixitituutu ya Aviyasawu Sivili ya Mosampiiki, muteko yoola nahiira mpatta nikhuru na LAM.

Makhuru a matteeke a elapo ya Mosampiiki anirowa weetta arowaka nttetthe wa Uniyawu Ewuropeeya, weetta wenno opacenre okathi Komite ya Sekuransa Ayereya otthuninhaawe wi ikompaniiya seyiya silempwe elapo ya Mosampiiki sipacere ovara miteko saya.

Yoolepwa muxoronaale Notiisiya ya elapo ya Mosampiiki wi, ekomite yeele ennikupali wi khasireere ovariwa miteko soreera ni Ixitituutu ya Viyasawu Siviili ya Mosampiiki vamosa ni nikhuru LAM, miteko seyiya saari owehaweha nkhalelo wa matteeke yaala, ophaveliwa nkhalelo woreera wi matteeke yaala apacere weetta.

Navetho, ettareliwaka exoronaale Notiisiya, nooniwaka wi nikhuru na matteeke LA, nenla naaphwanyaneya nanttenne nkacamiho, ekompaniiya yeela mpakha elepe ewarakha eveleelihe ilapo seyiya sinirowaaya weeta ehinapacere ovara miteko saya.
Ohiira mpatta mmuphirani wa namphira dos Santos mpakha nlelo khusuwaneya.
Peresitenti otthikela emaara ya nnenli opaka eporopakanta elapo ya Xipaanya.
Eyaakha ela, namphira yoola ari ekiipa ya Pariseloona wenno ahittikha myiyeeri miili.
´´Mathala otheene muneene ti Kuveerunu, itthu iya sinoonaneya nneene mathala yaala akhala ohaawa´´, alavulaka purusoore wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, Yussuf Adam.

Namalamula itthu sa khalayi, Yussuf Adam onnivekela wi alinvweke woorerelavo atthu otheene anikhuxiwa mathala aya na atthu yaala anitthuna ovara miteko soophavela itthu sa maali vamathalani vaavo wi omeelo ehikhale nkacamiho woohiwanana mwaha ´´ wa exariya yeela enuuluma wi nkhalelo wookhala mathala oniroyihiwa ohoola na atthu ohaawa´´.
´´Mathala anikhala a Kuveerunu nneene akhala ohaawa, akhala mutthu okhalana musurukhu mathala kakhala a Kuveerunu´´, alavulaka Adam.

Mulopwana yoola onnihimyatho wi, elapo ya OMosampiki ´´ mathala aniphwanyaneya elapo yaala makhaane ni maphwanyelo aya tookacamiha mwaha wi mutthu ohaana oliva, ni atthu otheene annisuwela nkhalelo yoola.
Akhala manyakunyaku owaatta anikhumelela mikacamiho seyiya sohaana omalihiwa´´.
Mwaha woovareleliwa atthu onnilavuliwa okathi anivaaneliwaaya makhalelo anikhumelela elapo ya Kaapu Telekaato.

Noovanelana purusoore Yussuf Adam opooma ya Waxintto, wenno ahiira mpatta wa nthukumano wa Senturu ti Extuutu Exitarateexiku ni Iterenasionaale, okathi yoola anamasoma owaatta aniphavela osuwela nkhalelo yoola wowiviwa atthu elapo ya Kaapu Telekaato, elapo ya Mosampiiki, wenno eyaakha ya 2017 ahivasiwa atthu ophiyelela 250.
Mwiiwelele nvaanelo orohiwe ohoolo ni anamasoma Yussuf ni Greg Pirio yaala alavula ´´Agenda Africana´´ em www.voaportugues.com
Ankoola, Kaapu Veriti ni Mosampiiki lapo iya soowela namuna sa maali.
Ankoola, Kaapu Verti ni Mosampiiki ilapo siniphwanyaneya muhina wa ilapo 10 sa Afirika soowela imaali saya epaceraka eyaakha ya 2000 ni 2001, elapo ya Kine Pisawu khiniphwanyaneya yunnuwaka.

Wuumalihani yoosomwa ewarakha enoonihela wunnuwa wa elapo ya Afirika, nthukumano yoola opakiwe ni nikhuru Africa Progress Panel, yaahithukumaniwa atthu ophiyelela muloko yaala aniphavela woona oreera wa elapo ya Afirika, nnikhuru muumu ahiira mpatta Graça Machel, nthukuman yoola waaholeliwe ni mukhulupale wa ONU, Kofi Annan.wara

Ewarakha yeela, ennonihereya muwunnuwelo wa ilapo sa Afrika ni miteko sinivariwa, wuumalihani ennaanyiheriwa wi aahikhala maafirikano ophiyelela imiya ikonto 493 akhalasa ilapo sa Afirika wenno ahaawasaka, eyaakha ya 2000 ni 2012.

Muhina wa ilapo seyiya, enniphwanyaneya Ankoola ereene ephantte ya 2li yeela ennoonaneya munnuwelaaya wa nkhalelo sa imaali ( ephiyelelaka 6%), Kaapu Veert eniphwanyaneya ephatte ya 4ru ni Mosampiiki ephantte ya 8hu.
Elapo ya Mosampiiki ennimananiha, masi khiniwerya omaliha nkacamho woothumiha atthu.
Moolumo omaliha anikhuma OKuveerunu wa elapo ya Ameerika annihimya wi khanisuwela ovara muteko.

Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki ohooniherya wi onnivara muteko wi amalihe nkacamiho yoola wootumihwa atthu, masi khanaphwanye ephiro yooreerela wi amalihe nkhalelo yoola onaakacamiha atthu a elapo yeele.

Moonelo ola tiwa Kuveernu wa elapo yeele, onnihimya wi Mosampiiki ovara muteko wi aphavele ni akhaliherye atthu yaala otumihiwa, waaphavela atthu anirowa ovara muteko yoola, waaphavela atthu anirowa ovara miteko soowaakhaliherya atthu anitthuna okhuma mulaponi.

´´ Governo ophuka milatthu ophiyelela thanu na mosa ni ohaatthukela anawiiye thanu na mosa, attharihelaka exariya yeela enikottiha otumihiwa atthu elempwe eyaakha ya 2008, atthu otheene siphukiwe milattu saya atthukasiwa´´ moolumo ala anisomwa muwarakhani yeela ewelinhe elapo ya Mosampiiki mpkha ephantte piili.

Ehiiwaka itthu seyiya, elapo ya Mosampiiki, okathi Kuveernunu attharattharaawe nkhalelo yoola wootumihiwa atthu, opaka nikhuru niira mpatta atthu otheene a elapo yeele ni ahuncererya malamulo anihimya nkhalelo yoola wootumihiwa atthu mupooma ni mmutthettheni.

Noovara muteko yoola wotheene, makhuru otheene yaala apakiwe khoonihenre nkhalelo wooreera, ehihiiwaka ottul nikhuru nenle na exariya ya 2008 enaaxakiha atthu atumihiwa; ni khikhanle exariya eniphuka milatthu sa atakhali okhopela anaatumiha atthu a elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Omaliha muteko yoola ni ottha nkhalelo woophuka milatthu sa atthu yaala.
Nikhuru na miteko seyiya linnivekela Kuveerunu wa Mosampiiki wi amalihe miteko sawe ni apacerye ophuka milatthu sa atthu yaala noomala atthukelasiwe.

Elapo ya Mosampiiki ehaano ophavela nkhalelo wowaavarelela nikhuru na atthu yaala anitumihasiwa, Kuveerunu ohaano wincererya musurukhu wala waakhaliherya akathi wootheene atthu yaala anivara muteko soowawehaweha atakhali yaala anatumiha aana ni atthu akinaaku.
Ni Kuveerunu yoola nave ohaano awehawehaka makhuru yaala anivara miteko soowavarelela atthu yaala atumihasiwe ni atakhali.
Mapuluusa a elapo ya Mosampiiki avara ikiilu 76 sa manyaka a rinoseronti.
Mapuluusa a elapo ya Mosampiiki ahuuluma wuupacerani wa esumana, mahuku eettaka 14, wi avara ikiilu 76 sa manyaka a rinoseronti OWarepoorutu ya epooma ya OMaputu.
Manyaka yaala avarinwe oroohiwa elapo ya Kheeniya, masi mapuluusa annaanyiherya wi aroohiwa nttetthe wa Aasiya, wenno manyaka yaala anikhwa musurukhu wowaatta.

´´ Mapuluusa a elapo ya Mosampiiki, vamosa na nikhuru na alifantika, avarasa maala mayili aphwanyaneyamo ikiilu 76,6 sa manyaka a rinoseronti ni ikiilu soophiyelela thanu na mosa sa mayino a mwatto´´ alavulaka ni maxoronaliita nkhulupale yoola oniroyha ohoolo moolumo a mapuluusa a elapo ya Mosampiiki epooma ya OMaputu.
Mulopwana mmosa onaakhula nsina na Orlando Modumane olavula wi atthu yaala avariwe khatthukelasinwe, masi yoolatho khahimye ntoko maala yaala ahikhalana masina atthu arowa waakhelela.
Mosampiiki elapo emosa anivirihiwa manyaka a rinoseronti ni marufim yaala anikhuliwa inama soowiviwa Opaariki Kruger, elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli.
Nikhuru na ONG kinense liniphavela osuwela ni empereesa multinasiyonaale seyiya sinaahela mirima ni ephatte sikinaaku atthu aniwereyiwa.
Okhurumuliwa wa empereesa multinasiyonaale woonanne ́ye epooma ya pafata ni Iilya, alavulaka Rui Jorge, epooma ya Tinikweena.

Anamaphavela ehaki yaala anivara miteko saya nikhuru na Oikanizasawu linivara miteko soowikhumiherya, guineese Tiniguena athoonyiherya ewarakha, yeela enilavula wi empereesa multinasiyonaale sinniphwanyaneya sithumaka imatta wi silimmwe itthu sowaakuwa wunnuwa.
Jorge olavula wi nkhalelo yoola ´´ onnaakacamiha atthu, mwaha wi mathala ni imatta sinilimmwa mmatani wa namalima etthu yuulupale.
Elavuliwaka moota mukinaaku, mapuro yaala tiyaala alimi, ahinlimasaaya, masi tho mathala yaala nipuro nimpakiwa miteko sowaatta, ni muumo sinniphaveliwa mirette´´.

Nave, mulupa axariya onaakhula nsina na Welema da Silva, onnilavula wi etthu yooriipiha murima mwaha wi atthu yaala anirumeela mathala yaala moota mukinaaku, onnirowasaka okathi mukinaaku analimasamo ´´ , nave atthu yaala anirumeela imatta seyiya wi alimase itthu sowaakuwa emela, sunnuwa sinaaruhela iretta atthu owaatta.
Mwiiwelele ehapari:
Manyakunyaku apakinwe ni asomi, epooma ya OMaputu khaasivenle, yaala apakasa mwaha anamuteko Oparamentu olinvwa musurukhu wowaatta.
Nsomi mmosa otthukiwa ni oroyihiwa oxikwaatara ya nttetthe wa Alutu Maye.
MAPUTU —
Mapuluusa a elapo ya Mosampiiki, owoomola namararu, mahuku eettaka 11, nikhuru na asomi anamuteko oparalamentuni waakheliha musurukhu wowaatta, manyakunyaku yaala apakiwa epooma ya OMaputu.
Nikhuru nenla na asomi, ahiira mpantta nsomi Valdo Nhamuneque, yoola ahitthukiwa oroyihiwa exikwaatara ya Alutu Maye.
Manyakunyaku yaala apacenre saana, yaala akuxanse ikarawu saalepwe ´´Ninoonela sayi nincerera musurukhu elapo ya Kaapu Telekaato´´.
Ni ekataaxi seyiya saahilepwa ´´Khannaatthuna anawiiye´´ ni moolumo makinaaku.
Ohivinre okathi wowaatta anarwaasa mapuluusa akuxanseeye akapwitthi okathi yoola asomi attyawasa, mwaha wi manyakunyaku yaala khaamuvekelanse Kuveerunu.
Nave asomi yaala alavula wi ahilepasa ewarakha oroyiha OKuveerunu ahinapacere opaka manyakunyaku yaala.

Asomi yaala ahithukumana akhumasa anarowa wa Asempeleeya ya Repuupilika amalanseene , masi mmphironi ahaakumanana mapuluusa nttetthe wa 24 ti Xuulyu, ephiro yeela yaaroyiha mpakha Oparalementuni wenno.

Nsana, woolepwa nlamulo mufesipuuk ni nikhuru na asomi a UEM nlamulo nenla ´´ naavekela atthu wi iire mpantta wa manyakunyaku orowa wiiraneya, mwaha wa wowaatta musurukhu yoola anaakhela mateputaato´´.

Yookhala ewarakha eniphavela wi yoonaxaxiwe mateputaato ahinapacere ovara miteko saya, muwakhani muumu soolepwa ´´ musurukhu´´ sowaatta onirowa olinvwa anamuteko oparalamentuni wi athumeke ikuwo awaraseke okathi wa muthukumano.
Nkhulupale Filipe Nyuusi ni David Simango attikela wuuluma khuta mahuku.
Mukhulupale wa eparitiitu MDM onniphavela wi atthu osuwaneya iire mpantta nkhalelo wovaanela elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Nkhalelo yoola wovaanela onniphanyaneya ottharaka iphiro isya, ovaanela wenno onirowihiwa ohoolo ni Peresitenti wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, Felipe Nyusi, yoola onirowa ovaanelana nkhulupale wa eparitiitu MDM, Daviz Simango, yoola omalela osuwela meettelo a itthu sinkhumelenle ni moota xeeni atoropa yaala oponwe anirowaaya wiira mpantta wa ekhotto yeela.

´´ Naahiwerya wiiwelela woohikacamiheyavo ni worerelavo meettelo a perestenti a elapo ya Mosampiiki yoola onivara muteko ni hiyo ninnoona nkahalelo yoola mayitho mayili ni onittenleene murima, epartiitu ahu hiyo tile ya moono weethiyana eri oparalamentuni, nihaano osuwela mwaha xeeni nnaalelaahu mamosampikaano wi asuwele epuruseesu ela.
Ni yovaneliwa wi aviraka mahuku, nihaano wiiwelela nkhahu itthu iye siniphaveliwa opakiwa ni mukhulupale wa elapo´´, alavulaka Simango.

Peresitenti wa eparitiitu MDM onnaanyiherya wi nthukumano ola insya onnaaruhela atthu wiwanana, mwaha wi makhuru yaala apakiwe ahaana ovara muteko mpakha mweeri Maarusu avaanelaka itthu soovirikana ntoko meettettelo nkhaya a makhuru a Kuveerunu mwaha yoola onirowa avaaneliwa wa Asempeleeya ya Repuuplika.
Olavula wa nkhulupale, Filipe Nyuusi oohimya wi ovaanelana nkhulupale wa eparotiitu Renamo, Afonso Dhlakama, ni atthu ahiiwanana.
Nttetthe wa Uniyawu Ewuropeeya onniphavela oveleeliha musurukhu elapo ya Mosampiiki wi orumeeliwe mmutekoni wowehawehiwa meettelo a eteeni yeela epakiwe.
Nhooleli a elapo ya Maputu onnivekela peresitenti Nyusi wi akhaliherye nkhalelo wowiiwanana.
Nttetthe wa Uniyawu Eropeeya (EU) olavula olelo wi onnirowa okhaliherya ´´ni ikuru sotheene´´ nkhalelo wovanela wi ephwanyaneye nreerelo wowiiwanana.

Moolumo ala alavuliwe olelo ni nkhulupale wa Telekasawu wa nttetthe wa UE epooma ya OMaputu, Sven Kuhn Von Burgsdorff, vanthukumanono yoola wiiraneya namararu, mahuku eettaka 12, ni peresitenti wa elapo ya Mosampiiki, Filipe Nyusi.
Von Burgsdorff owooniherya atthu aphwanyaneya vanthukumano vaava wi onniphavela mahuku anirwa othukumaniwatho ni avaaneliwe moolumo owiiwana wa atthu elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Okathi yoola waathukumaniwaaya, nkhulupale yoola wa elapo yookhopela ahimulakiherya peresitenti Nyusi wi nttetthe wa Uniyawu Ewuropeeya onniphavela okhaliherya elapo ya Mosampiiki evahaka musurukhu, masi itthu sotheene sinirowa wiiraneya okathi onirowaaya osuweliwa nkhalelo wa eteeni yeela epakiwe elapo yeela ya Mosampiiki.
ONU onnilamula wi elapo ya Mosampiiki ennirowa ohaawa ni onnivekela musurukhu woophiyelela 254 sa itoolare wi akhaliheriwe atthu a elapo yeela.
Atthu ophiyelela imiya miloko anniphanyaneya ahaawaka mwaha woohikhalana eyoolya elapo ya Kaapu Telekaato, Wamphula ni Niyaasa.

Nkhalelo wowiiviha atthu ni ovirikana ittheku elapo ya Mosampiiki, Kaapu Telekaato onnikacamiha nikhuru na Nasawu Uniita ni nikhuru nenla nimphwanyaneya nivekelaka musurukhu wi akhaliheriwe atthu aniphwanyaneya epooma yeele.

Namaveleeliha moolumu yoola onivara muteko nikhuru na ONU, Stephane Dujarric, olavula ni maxoronaliixita, namararu, mahuku eettaka 23, wi atthu yaala anivara miteko sowiikumiherya mmuttettheni ahuuluma wi ´´ nkhalelo yoola wowiiviwa atthu ni ovirikana wa ittheku elapo ya Kaapu Telekaato onniruuhela nkacamiho woothyawa atthu atthu arowaka ilapo sikinaaku, mwaha nkhalelo yoola, ennoonaneya ovukuwa wa atthu elapo yeele.
Atthu ophiyelela imiya 670 ahittyawa ilapo sa Kaapu Telekaato, Niyaasa ni Wamphula eyaakha yeele evinre.
Estephene Dujarric ohuupula wi, atthu yaala otheene, atthu ophiyelela 580 imiyasene ahihyasa impa saya anattyawa, eyaakha ya 2020

´´ Axirkha ahu yaala ninvaranahu (muteko) yoola wa mmuttettheni annilavula wi atthu ophiyelela 950 imiyasene yaala attyawanse ilapo seyiya tthaaru anniphwanyaneya akacamiheyaka mwaha wookhalano iyoola´´, Dujarric onnilavutho wi, nkhalelo yoola onnoonaneya pahi´´ mwaha okathi yoola miteko sa oxiripitaali, sa maasi ni iye sowiirattanela saaro ottukiwa mwaha wa manyakunyaku a ekhotto´´.

Ophaveliwaka nkhalelo woomalihiwa makacamiho yaala akhumelela, namalamula moolumo yoola ahuuluma wi axirikha yaala okhopela yaala anivarelela elapo ya Mosampiiki ahaano ´´ wowaakuveya okumiha musurukhu wi akhaliheriwe atthu yaala aniphwanyaneya ahaawaka elapo ya Kaapu Telekaato´´ yoola ahithoonyiherya wi musurukhu yoola mpakha okhale 254 sa itoolari etthuniwaka okhaliheriwa atthu ophiyelela 1000 emiyasene yaala yaaphwanye ehasara elapo ya Kaapu Telekaato ni ilapo iye sowaattamana, eyaakha ya 2021´´
Iparitiitu iye sihiniira mpatta mmparalamentuni sinniphavela omaliha nkhalelo woovekela musurukhu woohikhalelanavo elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Ororomelihiwa amiravo miteko ni impa, ovareleliwa woosuwaneya mittetthe, ntoko oreerihiwa ni otekiwa ixikola ni xiripitaali, owaniwa ekhotto yuulupale ephaveliwaka omaliha nkhalelo woovekela musurukhu woohikhalelanavo, itthu seyiya sotheene silempwe murakhani wa iparitiitu seyiya sihiniira mpantta muparalamentuni.
Mwantanle wa peresitenti wa elapo onirowa wiiraneya mahuku eettaka 15 mweeri yoola.

Eparitiitu Acção do Movimento Unido para Salvação Integral ennaanyiherya wi, ewarakha yeela eniroromeliha itthu alempasaaya, enniruuha nkhalelo wowiiwanana, opaka itthu sooreera ni oreherya itthu sa elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Nave eparitiitu yoocapuliwa ni ekoore yoophilivila, yoolavula wi yaphiyelela olola mwathanle yoola pnirwa, ennirowa oruuha nreerelo wa atthu otheene a elapo ya Mosampiiki ni annirowa ovara saana miteko saya nnikhuruni wa ixikola, oxiripitaali ni waamaliha ohaawa atthu otheene a mulaponi.
Nave eparitiitu Frelimo eniroromeliha wi sahola mwathanle yoola onirwa oniwa ovarexexa makhuru a muteko otheene a mulaponi, ni onirowa ovukula musurukhu woothuma enerexiiya.
Sikolooni Kenneth ohaaruhela ariipiwa murima atthu anikhala phatte nooriti ya elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Ephantte nooriti ya elapo ya Mosampiiki ehiikusanya wi yaakhelele ehasara ya sikolooni Kenneth, ennaanyiheriwa wi ehasara yeela, enirwa namararu, mahuku eettaka 25, iporovinsiya ya Wamphula ni Kaapu Telekaato.
Sikolooni yoola, ettariheliwaka moolumo alavuliwe ni Ixitituutu ya Metoroloxiiya, onirwaana ettheko yuulupale ni ottikinya wa elapo, ni epula yowaatta.
Anamuttettheni anikhala elapo ya Paaluma, eporovinsiya ya OKaapu Telekaato, annivekeliwa wi akhume mpa mwaya arowase mupuro alipaneya mawaha wa sikolooni yoola onirwa.
Anamuttettheni yaala avekeliwe taala anikhala muttetthe wa Paraparaani, Kilimaani.
Mwaaha ni Kiyuuya.
Akhulupale ahaavekela anamuttettheni yaala wi atthu yaala ohaariipe murima ni attharelele itthu seyiye silavulinwe.
Mapuro yaala athalinwe ni akhulupale yaala wi anamuttettheini orowase anniira mpantta Exikola Sekutaariya ya Paaluma ni Exikola Pirimaariya 16 ti Xuulyu.

Epooma ya Wamphula, nikhuru na Ixitituutu Nasiyonaale ti Xexitaawu ti Kalamitaati, ohaathoonyiherya atthu mittetthe sinirowa ophiyaxa sikolooni yoola, ntoko etixitiriitu ya ONakala- Veelya ni Nakala - Poorutu.
Mukhulupale wa Ixitituutu yeele, Alberto Armando olavula wi soophaveliwa iyoolya ni atekiwa mapantta wi saakhaliherye atthu saala anittyawasa mmawanya aya.
Elapo ya Mosampiiki, nikhuru na Kuruuxi Veremeelya nihaaphavela anmwiikumiherya wi iire mpantta miteko sinirowa ovariwa ni INGC, elapo ya Wamphula.
Afonso Dhlakama onnilavula wi eparitiitu Renamo yohoona ekoyi mmwathanle yoola ovinre elapo ya Wamphula.
´´ Kasaareere opakiwa itthu soonanara´´ olavulakatho nkhulupale wa eparitiitu Renamo.

Peresitenti wa eparitiitu Renamo, Afonso Dhlakama anaanyiherya wi itthu seyiya soonanara sipakiwe okathi wa mwathanle epooma ya Wamphula, sowaatta saari sowiwananiwa, ni itthu seyiya sohooniha ekoyi eparitiitu Renamo.

Okathi avanelaawe ni maxoronaliixita a nikhuru na VOA mutelefoonini areene elapo ya Koronkoosa, Dhalakama ohuuluma wi atthu arolekela ovonya ikateerunu seyiya saphanyaneya alempweene atthu yaala animutthapela Renamo, nkhalelo yoola wahaaruhela nkacamiho atthu yaala arowa othanla, masina atthu yaala ari ovonyeya ni anamathanla akinaaku khaphwanyaneya mukaterunu muumu, ni etepaka itthu itthu seyiya, anamathanla yaala khaatthunihiwa othanla ni attikitti sikinaaku woohikhala ekaratawu ya resensiyamentu.

´´ Kasaareere opakiwa itthu soonanara´´´´ Kasaareere opakiwa itthu soonanara´´ olavulakatho nkhulupale wa eparitiitu Renamo, atthikelatho wi ´´ itthu seyiye satthikela wiiraneya´´, sinnikacamiha muteko yoola wowiiwanana onivariwa elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Dhlakama olavula wi eparitiitu Renamo anivira avaraka miteko wi mwathanle ole onirwa sihoonaneye mikacamiho seyiye, mwathanle yoola khanisuwaneya mahuku oriwaaya wiiraneya.

Noomala mwathanle yoole, khiyaakhale eparitiitu yaaphwanye 50 purusentu ya ivootu, nikhuru na mwathanle naahilavula wi onootthikela mwathanle yoola, masi maminiixituru khahimyanse nihuku arowa opakiwa mwathanle yoola.
Nini Satar onniphanyaneya aphiyaka elapo ya Mosampiiki esumana yeela.
Nikhuru na Purukuratoriiya Xeeral ta Repuupilika olavula wi soolikaniwa iwarakha seyiya sinilavula mwaha wowiiviwa wa xoronaliixita Carlos Cardoso.

Purokuratoriiya Xeraale ti Repuupilika ya elapo Mosampiiki olamula olelo wi mulupa anakoso Nini Satar, yoola attyanwe aphiyelela ovariwa elapo ya Tayilantiya, mahuku eettaka 25 onniiruuhiwa esumana yeela elapo ya Mosampiiki.

Avaanelaka ni maxoronaliixita wuupacerani wa esumana, mahuku eettaka 30, elapo ya OMaputu, namalamuna moolumo onivara muteko OMinixiteeriyu Puupiliku, Alexandre Chiconela, olavula wi Satar onnirowa waakhula milatthu sa ipuruseesu piili: yoopacerya mwaha wootthukiliwa anaphwanyaneya attyawaka, mwaha yoola ohaano otthukiwa iyaakha 12, ni mwaha wowiira mpantta nkhalelo yoole wowaavara atthu anaphavela onlivwa.

Nini Satar ahitthukeliwa iyaakha 24 mwaha womwiiva, eyaakha ya 2000, joronaliixita Carlos Cardoso, masi yoola nave ahikhumihiwa mukateya muumu akhanla iye iyaakha 12, nookhuma anattyawela elapo ya Tayilantiya.
Nini Satar otthukiwe namararu elapo ya Tayilantiya wenno yaveeelihiwe ewarakha wi aphwanyiwa avariwe.

Esumana ele evinre, nikhuru na xoronaale na elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli noolavula wi mulupa anakoso, Nini Satar onnaanyiheriwa wi onnivara muteko wowaavara atthu okhalana musurukhu wowaatta anaphavela olinvwa wi ahiiye ni elapo yaala ya Afirika tu Suuli onnimuphavela mulopwana yoola wi aphuke milatthu sawe.
Mwaakha wa 2017: Elapo ya OMosampiiki enniiroromela.
Anamuupuwela annihimya wi eyaakha yeela enrowa otepa evikane eyaakha ya 2016.

Nkhulupale wa nikhuru nnaasimwa Panifikatoore, Victor Miguel ohimya wi " nuupuwelelaka moota siiranenyaaya itthu eyaakha ya 2016, eyaakha yeela yaari yookacamiheya mwaha wi khisaareere okhumelela itthu sootikiniha mmakhalelo a mamosampikaano, mwaha wi macelo aya wala emaali saya saahivukuwa ni sivirikina, ni yaahonaneya otepa ekhotto, eyaakha ela ya 2017 makhalelo ahu anootthikela akacamiheya.
Wuumalani wa esumana ela ennirowa olamuliwa moonelo wa nlikwiti nenla niwiivale atthu ophiyelela 73 elapo ya OTeete.
Nlikwiti nenla linaanyiheriwa wi naaheliwe murette wowiiva ni naahiphiyelela owuriwa atthu ophiyelela 130.

Akhulupale a elapo ya Mosampiiki ahaano olamula wuumalini wa esumana ela, mahuku eettaka 16, moonelo wa nlikwiti nenla niwiivale atthu ophiyelela 73 esumana yeele evinre ni ni atthu akinaaku ophiyelela 40 aniphwanyaneya awereyiwaka ni ummatheeni oxiripitaali.

Mapakelo a nlikwiti nenla nnaasimwa pompe, linitakanyiheriwa meele, nakhuwo ni asuukari, ni mateekiniku a elapo ya Afirika tu Suuli ni Porutukaale anniphwanyaneya avaraka muteko wowoonaxaxa etthu xeene yaahelinwe mmulikwiti muumu.
Anoonaneya nikhuru atthu atthikha omahiye wa nnttetthe ya Xitima, elapo ya OTeete.

Mwaana mmosa a eyaakha piili ni muthiya mmosa yaala apheen´yanse nlikwiti nenla okhwaasa, yaala arowuryasa nlikwiti nenla nnaanyiheriwa wi naaheliwe murette wowiiva yoola oniphwanyaneya mmurimani wa ekonya.

Alavulaka ni nikhuru na xoronaale VOA, nhooleli wa nikhuru na Orikanizawu Muntiyaale ya Ekumi, yoola onivara miteko sawe elapo ya Mosampiiki, Ambrósio Disadidi ohuuluma wi khanisuwela nlelo moonelo yoola opakiwe ni atthu aniwehaweha nlikwinti nenla ni mukhulupale yoola olavula wi nlelo anivira aphaveliwaka atthu akinaaku akhwiiye mwaha wa nlikwiti nenle.
Kuveernu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki oniphavela omurwaana patarooya ohikhumihaxa mwiixi.
Anakasoopiha muttetthe ni etakhwa annivekela wi atthu otheene owehaxaxe namuna yoohonona etakhwa, othikila miri wi sathumihiwe.

Kuveerunu a elapo ya Mosampiiki onnaawehexexa atthu otheene a mulaponi wi ahihonone wala ahithikile miri pure-pure ni Kuveerunu yoola onnirowa omuphavela mweeri wa Xuulyu, patarooya ohinikhuma muuxi wowaata arumeeliwaka, itthu seyiya siniiraneya okathi elapo yaala eniphwanyaneyaaya ekacamihiheyaka mwaha wohononiwa etakhwa ni itthu sikinaaku, ntoko othikiliwa pure-pure wa miri.
Anakasoopiha muttetthe ni etakhwa annilavulatho wi, elapo ya Mosampiiki yoowela akhalayi nkhalelo wa tiyoxitu ya azootu ewela wa nkhalelo yoola onaaruhela iretta atthu.

Mahuku ala, sinnoonaneya mikukutta sowaatta sinirumeela kazuliina ni anamakasoopiha muttetthe ni etakhwa annaanyiherya wi mikukutta seyiya sinaaruhela iretta atthu, mwaha enxoofere yoola anikhuma mmwiixini.

Moonelo wa mulupa okasoopiha muttetthe ni etakhwa, Osório da Costa, nkhalelo yoola ohiya waaruhela iretta atthu owaatta, oniruuhela wincerera wa kariponeetu, mulupwana yoola olavulatho wi, oniriipiwa murima ´´ muteko yoola wookasoopiha muttetthe ni orumeeliwa patarooya oreera waarowa opaceriwa khalayi´´.

Nave Kuveerunu, alavulaka nkhulupale wa Itokaripuneetu ni Patarooya. Moisés Paulino, onnikupali nkhalelo yoola ni onivulatho wi onnivariwa muteko wi aphaveliwe patarooya woreera omurumeela yoola yoola ahiniruuhela mikacamiho.

´´ Opacerya mweeri wa Xuunyu onirwa, elapo ya Mosampiiki onnirowa orumeeliwa patarooya wa 50 PPMs ahiiwaka ottuli ole arumeeliwa wa 500PPs, patarorooya yoola oniphaveliwa khakhalanne ixoofere yowaatta´´ alavulaka mukhulupale yoole.

Nave anamakasoopiha annilavula wi mpakha olelo murima khualattenle mwaha wi orumeeliwa wa patorooya wa 50 PPMs onoonaneya okhalaka woowela, etthu eniphavela nanaano, Kuveerunu mpakha aphavele omurumeela patarooya wa 10 PPMs, yoola onirumeeliwa ilapo sotheene.
Osório Costa olavulatho wi mahuku ala, ipooma sowaata ya elapo ya Mosampiiki, okathi yoola sowaatta mikukutta muxitaraatani, enoonaneya mwiixi wa ikaaro okhunenleene muttetthe wotheene.

´´ Masi nihuupuweleke wi mikhacamiho seyiya sininanariwa mittetthe elapo ya Mosampiiki sinoonaneya mwaha wa mwiixi yoola wa inxoofere, mwaha wi ennoonaneya nkacamiho mukinaaku yoola woorumeeliwa wala woopahiwa ikokhola wa itthu sikinaaku pure-pure, ni othikiliwa wa miri, opahiwa etakhwa ni mwiixi yoola onikhuma mufaapirikani, nkhalelo yoola oniphavela wi ovareleliwe saana ni Kuveerunu´´ olavulaka namakasoopiha muttetthe ni etakhwa.
Ilapo ntoko Mosampiiki, Kooxita ti Marufi ni Zampiya soohaano atthu okhalana musurukhu wowaatta.
Elapo ya Mosampiiki ennirowa okhalana mathaaciri owaatta iyaakha iya sinirwa ni ilapo sikinaaku sa Afirika, ntoko Kooxita ti Marufi ni Zampiya, elavulaka empereesa New Word Wealth.

Ottarelelliwaka mwaakanyerelo wa empereesa yeela enikhala epooma ya Xowanesipuuruku, elapo ya Mosampiiki ennirowa okhalana, eyaakha ya 2024 atthu ophiyelela 2,200 okhalanasa musurukhju, ni atthu yaala anirowa okhalana inupa saya, musurukhu yoola watakanyiheriwa onniphiyelela 1 emiya muloko mmosa sa itoolari sa elapo ya Ameerika.
Owela puwa 120 purusentu.

Elapo ya Kooxita tu Marufi ennirowa owela 19 purusentu, yiiraneyaka siiso onnirowa ophwanyaneya anamusurukhu ophiyelela 4, 800; elapo ya Zampiya ennirowa okhalana anamusurukhu ophiyelela imiya miloko miili.

Emaali sa elapo ya Mosampiiki enirwa mwaha woovithuliwa wa Kaaxi yeela epaceriwe orikiwa okhalayi; Kooxita tu Marufi yootthikela ophwanya musurukhu noomala ekhotto;ni Zampiya onnoonaneyawo owela wa musurukhu.

Wunnuwa wa ilapo seyiya onnirowa ovikana ilapo ya Akoola ni Khaana, ilapo seyiya piili sohaano patarooya owaatta, opacerya eyaakha ya 2000 ni 2014 anamusurukhu a ilapo seyiya ahiphwanya musurukhu woophiyelela emaara thanu woovikana yoola arinasaaya.
Afirika tu Suuli ennirowa otthikela elapo yookhalana anamusurukhu owaatta, akhumaka mwa 46, 800 arowaka 65, 5000.
Wamphula: Khukhumelenle nkacamiho mwawa wa niira nuumalani wa eyaakha.
Atthu araru akhwaasa mwaha woopittuwa wa mukukutta, masi khakhumelenle manyakunyaku- olavulaka nkhulupale onilamula moolumo a nikhuru na mapuluusa.

Wuumalani wa eyaakha epooma ya Wamphula khanonanen´ye nkacamihiho, onooriti wa elapo ya Mosampiiki. Masi, atthu ophiyelela araru akhwaasa mwaha woopittuwa wa nkukutta. Alavulaka nkhulupale onilamula moolumo a nikhuru na mapuluusa, Inácio João Dina, aalepwa atthu yaala apakasa itthu soonanara, nnikhuru muumu wa atakhali yaala annoonaneya amiravo a iyaakha 33 yaala awaranse ikhuwo sa atoropa nuukohasiwa ahilavulasa wi khaniira mpantta wa nikhuru nenle na atoropa a elapo ya Mosampiiki. Mukhulupale yoola onilamula moolumo a mapuluusa ohaattottopela anamuttettheni otheene a elapo ya Wamphula mwaha woosuwela orukuneya ni ´´niira nenla na wuumalani wa mwaakha niiranen´ye woomalelevo ni wowiiwananeyavo´´. Nikhuru na mikukutta, wohooneneyamo opittuwa wa nkukutta, wuupacerani ekhumelenle epooma ya Wamphula wenno aphitiwe muutthu, ni yoola ahiphiyelela okhwa.
Atthu akinaaku ayili ahikhwaasa mwaha woopittuwa wa nkukutta waakhuma, elapo ya Mekonta orowaka elapo ya Wamphula.

Exipiritaali yuulupale ya Wamphula yaahisareyiwa mwaha wa atthu aruuhiwa avulalanseene mwaha wa niira nenla na wuumalani wa eyaakha. Mukhulupale wa phantte ya kiliinika ya exiripitaali yeela, Anselmo Vilanculos, oleliherya wi alempwa aretta ophiyelela 626, yaala 9 aniwereyiwa tiyareeya ni ala akinaaku iretta soovirikana. Mukhulupale yoola wa eripitaali yuulupale ya epooma ya Wamphula, onnivekela woonaxaxiwa wa namuna yowiirattela wa mutthu ni atthu otheene a amuttettheni, mwaha wi wuumalani wa eyaakha ennipacerya orupa epula ni iretta sowaatta sinniphwanyaneya sirwaaka. Mwiiwelela ehapari aniruuhiwa ni Faizal Ibramugy.
Ihisapu sinilinvwa mpauro sinitumihuwa itthu ni oliveliwa itthu sinaakacamiha atthu a elapo ya Mosampiiki.
Kuveernu olavula wi ihisapu seyiya sinilinvwa sinaaruhela miteko atthu; alupa anakoso anaanyiherya wi isapu seyiya khasiniphwanelela ni sinnirruna nkhalelo woovekela musurukhu woohikalelanavo.
Waatta wa isapu seyiya sinniruuhela nkacamiho Kuveerunu musurukhu woophiyelela 400 imiya sa itoolari wa khuta yaakha ni nkhalelo yoola onnaakacamiha mamosampikaano.
Olavula wa Kuveernu inre wi isapu seyiya eniphaveleliwa oruuha miteko.
Alupa anakoso anaanyiherya wi isapu seyiya khasiniphwanelela ni sinnirruna nkhalelo woovekela musurukhu woohikalelanavo.

Alupa anakoso owaatta yaala avanenle ni nikhuru na xoronaale VOA ahuulumasa wi, Kuveerunu wa elapo ya Mosampiiki oniphavela wi musurukhu okhume elapo yeele, mwaha wa ipuliitika seyiya sinitthariwa, masi akhulupale aannuuluma wi owela wa isapu etthu yoonanara mwaha wi atthu yaala anitthuna oruuha musurukhu elapo ya Mosampiiki khaniphiyelatho eruuhaka.
Iwarakha sotheene sitthunihiwe muhina wa exariya ya yooruha musurukhu soolepwa wi ehilivihiweke mpooxito wowaacerereya, ntoko otthuna othuma itthu ilapo sookhopela.

Musurukhu ovahinwe wi opakeliwe nakoso elapo epooma ya OMaputu onnirowa, eyaakha thanu, okumihiwavo mwaha woothuniwa olinvwa mpooxito soola aniliveliwa atthu, ohavuliwa wenno onirowa opakiwa wooneliwaka musurukhu wotheene yoola ovahinwe.
Iporovinsiya sikinaaku ihisapu siphwanyinwaaya tiya 10 purusentu woovukuliwani wenno.

Alupa anakosa ahuuluma wi ekeekhayi wi musurukhu woophiyelela 400 imiya mulokosene sa itoolari elapo yeela eniphwetheyiwaaya wa khuta yaakha khuniruuha nreerelo elapo ya Mosampiiki, masi musurukhu yoola waanirowa orumeeliwa itthu sikinaaku.

Waakanyerya wa mulupa anakoso onaakhula nsina na João Mosca olavula wi , mwaha yoola yoosiveliha atthu wi aruuhe musurukhu elapo yeela khukhanle ekeekhayi, mwaha wi elapo ya Mosampiiki yohaano itthu sa maali sowaatta, ntoko Kaaxi ni makhala a maali ´´ ni atthu yaala onooliha musurukhu anniphiyelela orwaasaka mwaha woophavela itthu seyiya´´

Mosca olavulatho wi enniphiyelela ophaveliwa erumeeliwaka ´´isapu soovirikana, masi nreerelo wa nkhalelo yoola mpakha empereesa sotheene silive mpooxito, mwaha wi mipooxito seyiya siniruuhela nreerelo wa elapo.

Ewarakha yoolepwa ni nikhuru na Senturu ti Poromosawu ti Invexitimentu ennilavula wi eyaakha ya 2015, maattelo a makhuru aruuha musurukhu wi akhalihere elapo ya Mosampiiki ahiphiyele imiya thanu mosa sa itoolari.
